quotes.quote: Having a baby is a life-changer. It gives you a whole other perspective on why you wake up every day.
quotes.author: Taylor Hanson

quotes.quote: A baby is God's opinion that life should go on.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: A baby is born with a need to be loved - and never outgrows it.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: Having my baby fall asleep in my arms takes away all of my worries and stresses. A sense of complete and total peace comes over me.
quotes.author: Maria Jose Ovalle

quotes.quote: Every child born into the world is a new thought of God, an ever fresh and radiant possibility.
quotes.author: Kate Douglas Wiggin

quotes.quote: Babies are always more trouble than you thought ? and more wonderful.
quotes.author: Charles Osgood

quotes.quote: Babies are such a nice way to start people.
quotes.author: Don Herrold

quotes.quote: A baby is a blank cheque made payable to the human race.
quotes.author: Barbara Christine Seifert

quotes.quote: Every baby needs a lap.
quotes.author: Henry Robin

quotes.quote: A new baby is like the beginning of all things-wonder, hope, a dream of possibilities.
quotes.author: Eda J. Le Shan

quotes.quote: It is the nature of babies to be in bliss.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Loving a baby is a circular business, a kind of feedback loop. The more you give the more you get and the more you get the more you feel like giving.
quotes.author: Penelope Leach

quotes.quote: Having a child is surely the most beautifully irrational act that two people in love can commit.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: A baby is an inestimable blessing and bother.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Babies are like little suns that, in a magical way, bring warmth, happiness and light into our lives.
quotes.author: Kartini Diapari-Oengider

quotes.quote: Having a baby is like falling in love again, both with your husband and your child.
quotes.author: Tina Brown

quotes.quote: Babies are bits of star-dust blown from the hand of God. Lucky the woman who knows the pangs of birth for she has held a star.
quotes.author: Larry Barretto

quotes.quote: Every child begins the world again.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Every baby born into the world is a finer one than the last.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: A baby is a loud noise at one end and no sense of responsibility at the other.
quotes.author: Ronald Knox

quotes.quote: Carrying a baby is the most rewarding experience a woman can enjoy.
quotes.author: Jayne Mansfield

quotes.quote: A baby is an angel whose wings decrease as his legs increase.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A baby will make love stronger, days shorter, nights longer, bankroll smaller, home happier, clothes shabbier, the past forgotten, and the future worth living for.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Babies need social interactions with loving adults who talk with them, listen to their babblings, name objects for them, and give them opportunities to explore their worlds.
quotes.author: Sandra Scarr

quotes.quote: When babies look beyond you and giggle, maybe they're seeing angels.
quotes.author: Eileen Elias Freeman

quotes.quote: There is nothing like a newborn baby to renew your spirit and to buttress your resolve to make the world a better place.
quotes.author: Virginia Kelley

quotes.quote: A babe in the house is a well-spring of pleasure, a messenger of peace and love, a resting place for innocence on earth, a link between angels and men.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Every baby has turned into a ticking time bomb that can go off in your hand.
quotes.author: Dr Henry W. Flournoy

quotes.quote: Don't forget that compared to a grownup person every baby is a genius.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: Babies should enjoy the freedom to vocalize whether it be in church, a public meeting place, during a movie, or after hours when the lights are out. They have not yet learned that joy and laughter have to last a lifetime and must be conserved.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: I love these little people; and it is not a slight thing when they, who are so fresh from God, love us.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: In the garden of humanity every baby is a fresh new flower.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: A happy baby has shining eyes. It walks open hearted into the world and spreads magic.
quotes.author: Sigrid Leo

quotes.quote: Making the decision to have a child — it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stone

quotes.quote: Babies are bits of stardust, blown from the hand of God.
quotes.author: Larry Barretto

quotes.quote: Every child born into the world is a new thought of God, an ever fresh and radiant possibility.
quotes.author: Kate Douglas Wiggin

quotes.quote: Life is a flame that is always burning itself out, but it catches fire again every time a child is born.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: You know what the great thing about babies is? They are like little bundles of hope. Like the future in a basket.
quotes.author: Lish McBride

quotes.quote: It's extraordinary to look into a baby's face and see a piece of your flesh and your spirit. It makes you realize you are a part of the human race.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.quote: I think that I see something deeper, more infinite, more eternal than the ocean in the expression of the eyes of a little baby when it wakes in the morning and coos or laughs because it sees the sun shining on its cradle.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: A baby is a blank check made payable to the human race.
quotes.author: Barbara Christine Seifert

quotes.quote: The babies are amazing. They begin each day all warm and sleepy, smelling of promise.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: When he finally was placed into my arms, I looked into his precious eyes and felt an overwhelming, unconditional love. I never felt so complete and empowered in my life.
quotes.author: Giselle Bundchen

quotes.quote: A baby is born with a need to be loved - and never outgrows it.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: A new baby is like the beginning of all things — wonder, hope, a dream of possibilities.
quotes.author: Eda J. Le Shan

quotes.quote: Every newborn baby I see glows with love, a glow I see coming from the Soul.
quotes.author: Lorna Byrne

quotes.quote: A baby is God's opinion that life should go on.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Not flesh of my flesh, nor bone of my bone, but still miraculously my own. Never forget for a single minute, you didn't grow under my heart, but in it.
quotes.author: Fleur Conkling Heylinger

quotes.quote: If your baby is beautiful and perfect, never cries or fusses, sleeps on schedule and burps on demand, an angel all the time, you're the grandma.
quotes.author: Theresa Bloomingdale

quotes.quote: It's all kind of these profound things crashing on you when your child arrives into the world. It's like you've met your reason to live.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Little children are still the symbol of the eternal marriage between love and duty.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Babies are like little suns that, in a magical way, bring warmth, happiness and light into our lives.
quotes.author: Kartini Diapari-Oengider

quotes.quote: For having a baby's sweet face so close to your own, for so long a time as it takes to nurse 'em, is a great tonic for a sad soul.
quotes.author: Erica Eisdorfer

quotes.quote: I hadn't slept for two nights and yet when she was born, I had never felt more alive.
quotes.author: Emily Schuman

quotes.quote: Loving a baby is a circular business, a kind of feedback loop. The more you give the more you get and the more you get the more you feel like giving.
quotes.author: Penelope Leach

quotes.quote: Having a child is surely the most beautifully irrational act that two people in love can commit.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Before you were born I carried you under my heart. From the moment you arrived in this world until the moment I leave it, I will always carry you in my heart.
quotes.author: Mandy Harrison

quotes.quote: Having my baby fall asleep in my arms takes away all of my worries and stresses. A sense of complete and total peace comes over me.
quotes.author: Maria Jose Ovalle

quotes.quote: You never understand life until it grows inside of you.
quotes.author: Sandra C. Kassis

quotes.quote: A baby is an alimentary canal with a loud voice at one end a no responsibility at the other.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: An infant's smile was the greatest promise that the world would go on, no matter how much the grown-ups mucked around with it.
quotes.author: Janice Maynard

quotes.quote: As we carry our baby inside us, we know almost nothing about it that distinguishes it from anyone else's baby — except that we love it unlike any other baby.
quotes.author: Roni Jay

quotes.quote: A baby is something you carry inside you for nine months, in your arms for three years and in your heart till the day you die.
quotes.author: Mary Mason

quotes.quote: I always wondered why babies spend so much time sucking their thumbs. Then I tasted baby food.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Babies are such a nice way to start people.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: Every child begins the world again.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The jewel of the sky is the sun, the jewel of the house is the child.
quotes.author: Chinese Saying

quotes.quote: Carrying a baby is the most rewarding experience a woman can enjoy.
quotes.author: Jayne Mansfield

quotes.quote: Having a baby is a life-changer. It gives you a whole other perspective on why you wake up every day.
quotes.author: Taylor Hanson

quotes.quote: Every baby born into the world is a finer one than the last.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Just like a plant needs light and space to grow, a child needs love and freedom to unfold.
quotes.author: Sigrid Leo

quotes.quote: Babies need social interactions with loving adults who talk with them, listen to their babblings, name objects for them, and give them opportunities to explore their worlds.
quotes.author: Sandra Scarr

quotes.quote: Having a baby is one of the most wonderful things in your life, as well as the hardest thing in your life.
quotes.author: Nuno Bettencourt

quotes.quote: Life doesn't get more real than having a newborn at home.
quotes.author: Eric Church

quotes.quote: And when our baby stirs and struggles to be born it compels humility: what we began is now its own.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Having a baby is part of a woman's life, and it is surely a great waste to be afraid of life.
quotes.author: Joan Lowery Nixon

quotes.quote: Having a baby changes the way you view your in-laws. I love it when they come to visit now. They can hold the baby and I can go out.
quotes.author: Matthew Broderick

quotes.quote: With every newborn baby a little sun rises.
quotes.author: Irmgard Erath

quotes.quote: We can't form our children on our own concepts; we must take them and love them as God gives them to us.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The superstition of not physically preparing one's home for a new baby, of not having a baby shower until after the baby is born,
quotes.author: Douglas Weber

quotes.quote: Baby love, baby mild. Welcome, welcome, brand new child.
quotes.author: Linda Robertson

quotes.quote: We are grateful for this new being, who is small in body yet great in soul, who has come into our midst as a gift.
quotes.author: Anne Spring

quotes.quote: I am small, please hold me./ When I'm peevish, soothe me with your song./ when I'm frightened, remind me that you're there./ When I'm flailing, surround me with your love./ When the world is too big, please find me./ When you count your blessings, let me be your heart's desire.
quotes.author: Kate Robinson

quotes.quote: The worst feature of a new baby is its mother's singing.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: There is a time when things with holes seem particularly fascinating. That's not surprising. The baby's own mouth is an important source of information and comfort in the early weeks and months of life.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: When the first baby laughed for the first time, the laugh broke into a thousand pieces and they all went skipping about, and that was the beginning of fairies.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: The Grizzly Bear is huge and wild; / He has devoured an infant child./ The infant child is not aware / He has been eaten by the bear.
quotes.author: A.E. Housman

quotes.quote: But what am I? / An infant crying in the night :/ An infant crying for the light :/ And with no language but a cry.
quotes.author: Susan Ratcliffe

quotes.quote: At first the infant, / Mewling and puking in the nurse's arms./ And then the whining school boy, with his satchel / And shining morning face, creeping like snail./ Unwillingly to school.
quotes.author: Susan Ratcliffe

quotes.quote: A baby isn't meant to stay a baby forever, and neither is a new Christian.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: A babe at the breast is as much pleasure as the bearing is pain.
quotes.author: Marion Zimmer Bradley

quotes.quote: A mother's heart is a baby's most beautiful dwelling.
quotes.author: Ed Dussault

quotes.quote: Babies are more trouble than you thought, and more wonderful.
quotes.author: Charles Osgood

quotes.quote: Don't forget that compared to a grown up person every baby is a genius. Think of the capacity to learn! The freshness, the temperament, the will of a baby a few months old.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: Enchanting as that baby-laugh, all dimples and glitter— so strangely arch and innocent.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: Home alone with a wakeful newborn, I could shower so quickly that the mirror didn't fog and the backs of my knees stayed dry.
quotes.author: Marni Jackson

quotes.quote: Anyone who uses the phrase 'easy as taking a candy from a baby' has never tried taking a candy from a baby
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: In the sheltered simplicity of the first days after a baby is born, one sees again the magical closed circle. the miraculous sense of two people existing only for each other.
quotes.author: Ann Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Keeping a baby requires a good deal of time, effort, time, thought and equipment, so unless you are prepared for this, we recommend that you start with a hamster, whose wants are far simpler.
quotes.author: Elinor Goulding Smith

quotes.quote: Still, my heart was bursting with excitement, knowing every love, every soul is unique, and I would soon lock eyes with my amazing baby girl.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.quote: A baby's cradle with no baby in it/ A baby's grave where autumn leaves drop sere/ The sweet soul gathered home to paradise /The body waiting here.
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: I know a baby, such a baby / Round blue eyes and cheeks of pink / Such an elbow furrowed with dimples / Such a wrist where creases sink / ‘Cuddle and love me, cuddle and love me’/ Crows the mouth of coral pink / Oh, the bald head, and, oh, the sweet lips / And, oh, the sleepy eyes that wink!
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: The rain was uninhibitedly untamed; and so was my new born baby daughter; kicking left; right and center; in her diminutively blessed cradle.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Lightly they hold him and lightly they sway him / Soft as a pillow are somebody's arms / Down he goes slowly, ever so lowly / Over the rim of the cradle they lay him / Baby's first journey is free from alarms.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: This is a place where grandmothers hold babies on their laps under the stars and whisper in their ears that the lights in the sky are holes in the floor of heaven.
quotes.author: Rick Bragg

quotes.quote: You see your baby lying in front of you and you realize that it is now your responsibility to raise this beautiful little wonder and to equip your kid with everything it needs for life.
quotes.author: Steve Mueller

quotes.quote: A baby is as pure as an angel and as fresh as a blooming flower.
quotes.author: Debashis Mridha

quotes.quote: Babies cry at birth because it is the first time they experience separation from love.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: There are no words that can describe the euphoria you feel when your baby recognizes you for the first time and smiles.
quotes.author: Jared Padalecki

quotes.quote: It’s a good thing babies don’t give you a lot of time to think. You fall in love with them and when you realize how much they love you back, life is very simple.
quotes.author: Anita Diamant

quotes.quote: Perfection only exists in babies and pastries.
quotes.author: Gayle Wray

quotes.quote: It was the tiniest thing I ever decided to put my whole life into.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The children we bring into the world are small replicas of ourselves and our husbands; the pride and joy of grandfathers and grandmothers. We dream of being mothers, and for most of us that dreams are realized naturally. For this is the Miracle of Life.
quotes.author: Azelene Williams

quotes.quote: Having a baby is a life-changer. It gives you a whole other perspective on why you wake up every day.
quotes.author: Taylor Hanson

quotes.quote: A baby is God's opinion that life should go on.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: A baby is born with a need to be loved - and never outgrows it.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: Babies should be classified as an antidepressant. It's pretty hard to be in a bad mood around a 5-month-old baby.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: When a baby comes you can smell two things: the smell of flesh, which smells like chicken soup, and the smell of lilies, the flower of another garden, the spiritual garden.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: Carrying a baby is the most rewarding experience a woman can enjoy.
quotes.author: Jayne Mansfield

quotes.quote: Babies are bits of star-dust blown from the hand of God. Lucky the woman who knows the pangs of birth for she has held a star.
quotes.author: Larry Barretto

quotes.quote: Having a baby is one of the most wonderful things in your life, as well as the hardest thing in your life.
quotes.author: Nuno Bettencourt

quotes.quote: Babies control and bring up their families as much as they are controlled by them; in fact the family brings up baby by being brought up by him.
quotes.author: Erik Erikson

quotes.quote: All babies are beautiful.
quotes.author: Jeanne Calment

quotes.quote: Babies are such a nice way to start people.
quotes.author: Don Herrold

quotes.quote: Babies are always more trouble than you thought - and more wonderful.
quotes.author: Charles Osgood

quotes.quote: It is the nature of babies to be in bliss.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Babies act out when they're hungry, cold, tired. They do this for survival.
quotes.author: Marilu Henner

quotes.quote: They're not the sharpest people - babies. So, you must be everything to them.
quotes.author: Paul Reiser

quotes.quote: Babies who have not yet been taught to speak any language are the only race of the earth, the race of man: all the rest is pretence, what we call civilization, hatred, fear, desire for strength.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: When babies look beyond you and giggle, maybe they're seeing angels.
quotes.author: Eileen Elias Freeman

quotes.quote: A new baby is like the beginning of all things - wonder, hope, a dream of possibilities.
quotes.author: Eda J. Le Shan

quotes.quote: Babies are like little suns that, in a magical way, bring warmth, happiness and light into our lives.
quotes.author: Kartini Diapari-Oengider

quotes.quote: The laugh of a child is like a star on the sky.
quotes.author: Joseph Dirnbeck

quotes.quote: A baby is an inestimable blessing and bother.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A baby is a blank check made payable to the human race.
quotes.author: Barbara Christine Seifert

quotes.quote: Every child born into the world is a new thought of God, an ever-fresh and radiant possibility.
quotes.author: Kate Douglas Wiggin

quotes.quote: Every baby needs a lap.
quotes.author: Henry Robin

quotes.quote: With every newborn baby a little sun rises.
quotes.author: Irmgard Erath

quotes.quote: Babies need social interactions with loving adults who talk with them, listen to their babblings, name objects for them, and give them opportunities to explore their worlds.
quotes.author: Sandra Scarr

quotes.quote: Children are our most valuable natural resource.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Children are completely egoistic; they feel their needs intensely and strive ruthlessly to satisfy them.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Children are the hands by which we take hold of heaven.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Children are living jewels dropped unsustained from heaven.
quotes.author: Robert Pollok

quotes.quote: The younger brother must help to pay for the pleasures of the elder.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: There is a little boy inside the man who is my brother… Oh, how I hated that little boy. And how I love him too.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: I grew up with a younger brother, so I can get pretty rowdy.
quotes.author: Sarah Wynter

quotes.quote: Oh, brothers! I don’t care for brothers. My elder brother won’t die, and my younger brothers seem never to do anything else.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: As the younger brother, I think you always have crushes on your older brother’s girlfriends.
quotes.author: Liam Hemsworth

quotes.quote: The younger brother hath the more wit.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: I went on the longest, hardest, most exhausting journey I have ever been on, with the biggest pain in the neck I have ever met. Well, what do you expect from a little brother?
quotes.author: Tab Murphy

quotes.quote: What are little brothers for? The little brother we've always had. Twilight, darling, no pony knows you better than your own brother.
quotes.author: Lauren Faust

quotes.quote: Then... be someone your little brother can look up to.
quotes.author: Shôtarô Ishinomori

quotes.quote: He's the little freckled kid that looks like a football. At first, I was happy you took him away. But I've learned something today. That having a little brother... is a pretty special thing.
quotes.author: Trey Parker

quotes.quote: Little Brother, how I pray / You may sanctuary find / Peoples of the world succumb . ./ Fly, poor fools, the wrath to come!
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: Brother, you were born too late; / Human life is but a breath. / Men delve deep, where darkly wait
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: Led by your little elder hand, / I learned to walk alone; / Careful you used to be of me, / My little brother John.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Older brothers invented terrorism. 'Louie, see that swamp? There's a monster in it.' So for years I walked way around it. Until I got a little older, a little wiser - and a little brother.
quotes.author: Louie Anderson

quotes.quote: The best way to get a puppy is to beg for a baby brother - and they'll settle for a puppy every time.
quotes.author: Winston Pendelton

quotes.quote: Sometimes, I wonder, is it really the best being the eldest with two younger brothers? Some people may hate being the youngest, but I disagree with them.
quotes.author: Jay Cynn

quotes.quote: My little brother is important to me because without him I would have no-one to play with.
quotes.author: Leon Kuczynski

quotes.quote: The birth of a new baby can be challenging for any older sibling.
quotes.author: Yenn Purkis

quotes.quote: Growing up sad and lonely, not having a little brother to play with.
quotes.author: Michelle Vogel

quotes.quote: Older siblings can teach you stuff. I'd also like to have a baby brother and wish my parents would adopt one. I really like babies, even though they can be so bossy at times.
quotes.author: Richard Guy Condon

quotes.quote: While older sisters are more likely to be put in charge of baby brothers and sisters.
quotes.author: Richard Guy Condon

quotes.quote: I'm the big brother. / You're just little. But that's okay. / I have lots to show you.
quotes.author: Alexandra Penfold

quotes.quote: The joy of having a baby brother was a delight.
quotes.author: Tim Templer

quotes.quote: Most of the time when children get angry they want to attack their little brother (who broke their treasured memento).
quotes.author: Laura Markham

quotes.quote: My sister and I enjoyed having a baby brother; he was sort like a toy for us to play with and we used to put him in a blanket and swing him back and forth, like a hammock.
quotes.author: James Ivey Davis

quotes.quote: I think the reduction of attention I was given having a baby brother had a great impact on the development of my personality. And, I still say it wasn't me that let him fall off the porch.
quotes.author: Morgan Fenn

quotes.quote: The elder brother should be the role model for the younger brother, and the younger brother should respect the elder brother.
quotes.author: Ruiping Fan

quotes.quote: The younger brother must help to pay for the pleasures of the elder.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Only younger brothers will understand me. We're following in the footsteps of older brothers. You are looking up to your brother. You want to do the same things. You want to do as good as he and do it even better.
quotes.author: Wladimir Klitschko

quotes.quote: I can't wait to see him after school each day to hug and kiss and play. He gives me a big bright smile & reaches for me, too my little brother loves me too.
quotes.author: Zundrea

quotes.quote: There's no buddy like a brother.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A daughter is one of the most beautiful gifts this world has to give.
quotes.author: Laurel Atherton

quotes.quote: Children are our future we must take care of them with maximum effort.
quotes.author: Naomi Campbell

quotes.quote: When you hold an infant, hold him not just with your body, but with your mind and heart.
quotes.author: Magda Gerber

quotes.quote: There is nothing like a newborn baby to renew your spirit and to buttress your resolve to make the world a better place.
quotes.author: Virginia Kelley

quotes.quote: It's extraordinary to look into a baby's face and see a piece of your flesh and your spirit. It makes you realise, you are a part of the human race.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.quote: Every child, begins the world again.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A babe in the house is a well-spring of pleasure, a messenger of peace and love, a resting place for innocence on earth, a link between angels and men.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Every baby born into the world is a finer one than the last.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: A baby will make love stronger, days shorter, nights longer, bankroll smaller, home happier, clothes shabbier, the past forgotten, and the future worth living for.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A two-year old is kind of like having a blender, but you don't have a top for it.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: An infant always learns. The less we interfere with the natural process of learning, the more we can observe how much infants learn all the time.
quotes.author: Magda Gerber

quotes.quote: Every baby has turned into a ticking time bomb that can go off in your hand.
quotes.author: Dr Henry W. Flournoy

quotes.quote: A baby is a loud noise at one end and no sense of responsibility at the other.
quotes.author: Ronald Knox

quotes.quote: Babies should enjoy the freedom to vocalize whether it be in church, a public meeting place, during a movie, or after hours when the lights are out. They have not yet learned that joy and laughter have to last a lifetime and must be conserved.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Children reinvent your world for you.
quotes.author: Susan Sarandon

quotes.quote: A child is a curly, dimpled lunatic.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You can learn many things from children. How much patience you have, for instance.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: Raising kids is part joy and part guerilla warfare.
quotes.author: Ed Asner

quotes.quote: Having a child is surely the most beautifully irrational act that two people in love can commit.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Children make you want to start life over.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Loving a baby is a circular business, a kind of feedback loop. The more you give the more you get and the more you get the more you feel like giving.
quotes.author: Penelope Leach

quotes.quote: Make no mistake about why these babies are here - they are here to replace us.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Having a baby is like falling in love again, both with your husband and your child.
quotes.author: Tina Brown

quotes.quote: Don't forget that compared to a grownup person every baby is a genius.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: Children are the living messages we send to a time we will not see.
quotes.author: Neil Postman

quotes.quote: Every child comes with the message that God is not yet discouraged of man.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: We raise our glass to the new baby born. How pretty she is, and how lovely she be. She is mine you see.We raise our glass to the new baby born. How pretty she is, and how lovely she be. She is mine you see.
quotes.author: GD Peyton

quotes.quote: Her fragile infancy asks for gentle care from those who are strongest, yet we are weak with envy, and proud in the blood kin of which we are. When she requires our help, it is only in cry, she receives the love from her Mother and I.
quotes.author: GD Peyton

quotes.quote: As long as I'm living my baby you'll be.
quotes.author: Robert N. Munsch

quotes.quote: Woke up to God's glory am still loving you daily. My one in a million baby.
quotes.author: Ola Josiah

quotes.quote: Teach your daughter by example that whatever her size or shape, she is beautiful inside and out.
quotes.author: Carolyn Costin

quotes.quote: Teach your daughter not to take herself and her appearance too seriously. Teach her to laugh at herself and have a sense of humor.
quotes.author: Carolyn Costin

quotes.quote: Help your daughter see and appreciate the functional aspects of her body, how her heart, lungs, and kidneys work, and how breasts are designed to feed human offspring and are not just there as sources of desire and attraction.
quotes.author: Carolyn Costin

quotes.quote: Teach your daughter that her body is far too sacred to give it away easily and to be discerning with this precious gift.
quotes.author: Carolyn Costin

quotes.quote: Teach your daughter, especially by good role-modeling, that it helps to talk about her feelings, and find outlets for them in activities such as writing or art.
quotes.author: Carolyn Costin

quotes.quote: Discuss with your daughter examples of respected, powerful women for whom power had or has nothing to do with beauty.
quotes.author: Carolyn Costin

quotes.quote: Help your daughter turn her focus away from the external qualities of being a female towards what it means to be a female in a more internal and spiritual sense.
quotes.author: Carolyn Costin

quotes.quote: Teach your daughter instead to think about how her body feels.
quotes.author: Carolyn Costin

quotes.quote: Oh, my daughter. Everyone has the world's day. I also suggest for you today. The Daughter's Day
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Children will learn far more by watching than just by listening.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Love your children is to survive, he or she must know the rules of safety. If he is to be healthy, he must know the rules of health. If he is to drive a car, he must know the rules of the road. If he become a ball player, he must learn the rules of the game. And, contrary to popular thinking, children appreciate rules.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: There is always the exceptional child, but the average tells us that the child is largely what the home has made him.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Children respect discipline. They want to be guided. It gives them a sense of belonging, a sense of security.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: If our children grow up with no understanding of right and wrong. No desire to live with integrity. No faith in God. Their souls will be impoverished and they will miss life's highest good.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Children do need the guidance of their parents, and we guide them more by the example we set than by any other way. We need to be firm and sane and fair and consistent - and, above all, we need to discipline in a spirit of love.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Many children today are growing up without discipline. As they become adults and the discipline of job or family demands are placed upon them, they do not know how to cope.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Children need discipline to be useful members of society. Likewise, God's children need discipline to be useful members of His family.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Children, pray for the salvation of your parents.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Children must be taught obedience just as much as they need to be taught to read and write.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Every child begins the world again.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A baby is a blank cheque made payable to the human race.
quotes.author: Barbara Christine Seifert

quotes.quote: Babies are always more trouble than you thought â€” and more wonderful.
quotes.author: Charles Osgood

quotes.quote: A baby is an inestimable blessing and a bother.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Sometimes the smallest things take the most room in your heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Where did you come from, baby dear? Out of the everywhere and into here.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: Girl or boy, you'll bring much joy.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart.
quotes.author: Jeremiah 1:5

quotes.quote: Someone special, someone dear, someone new to love is here.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Having a baby is like falling in love again, both with your husband and your child.
quotes.author: Tina Brown

quotes.quote: A new baby is like the beginning of all things wonder, hope, a dream of possibilities.
quotes.author: Eda J. Le Shan

quotes.quote: A person's a person, no matter how small.
quotes.author: Dr Seuss

quotes.quote: A babe in the house is a well-spring of pleasure, a messenger of peace and love, a resting place for innocence on earth, a link between angels and men.
quotes.author: Martin Fraquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Making the decision to have a child is momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking around outside your body.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stone

quotes.quote: Babies make your heart bigger!
quotes.author: Brienne Kearney

quotes.quote: A baby is God's opinion that the world should go on.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Every child born into the world is a new thought of God, an ever-fresh and radiant possibility.
quotes.author: Kate Douglas Wiggin

quotes.quote: Ten little fingers, ten perfect toes fill our hearts with love that overflows.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Babies are bits of stardust, blown from the hand of God.
quotes.author: Barretto

quotes.quote:
This baby is your blessing,
I wish happiness in every way,
Good luck God bless,
I say
And many blessings and wishes,
To welcome baby into your life today.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A baby is born with a need to be loved -- and never outgrows it.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: I don't know why they say "you have a baby." The baby has you.
quotes.author: Gallagher

quotes.quote: It is no small thing that they, who are so fresh from God, love us.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: A baby will make love stronger, days shorter, nights longer, bankroll smaller, home happier, clothes shabbier, the past forgotten, and the future worth living for.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Babies: Messier, louder, sweeter, softer, and more loveable than you could ever imagine.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Aside from new babies, new mothers must be the most beautiful creatures on earth.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: A new baby is like the beginning of all things â€“ wonder, hope, a dream of possibilities.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Babies are such a nice way to start people.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: From there to here from here to there, baby things are everywhere!
quotes.author: Dr Seuss

quotes.quote: A baby is cuddles and tickles on toes, The sweet scent of powder, a kiss on the nose!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A baby is sunshine and moonbeams and more brightening your world has never seen before.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Hello, inner child, I'm the inner babysitter.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: It is a curious fact that small boys are more terrified of their babysitters than small girls are.
quotes.author: John Connolly

quotes.quote: Some parents sometimes use junk food as a babysitter.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: I need someone to be there 100% of the time. He thinks that's love. It's not love - it's babysitting.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: I'm not quite sure how I would do babysitting.
quotes.author: Sabrina Carpenter

quotes.quote: I grew up babysitting and always enjoyed it.
quotes.author: Matthew Perry

quotes.quote: When you're babysitting a kid, all you're seeing is a version of them, a small dosage.
quotes.author: J.B. Smoove

quotes.quote: I would rather be a babysitter than a nursemaid.
quotes.author: Ivana Trump

quotes.quote: I guess babysitters are like used cars. You never really know what you're getting.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: A babysitter is a teenager acting like an adult while the adults are out acting like teenagers.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Benadryl - the seven-dollar babysitter.
quotes.author: Christopher Titus

quotes.quote: Video games and computers have become babysitters for kids.
quotes.author: Taylor Kitsch

quotes.quote: It is a little ironic that one thing a babysitter should not do is sit on a baby.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Bribes and boybands. That's all you need to be a babysitter.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.quote: TV is the best babysitter.
quotes.author: John Goodman

quotes.quote: The best baby-sitters, of course, are the baby's grandparents. You feel completely comfortable entrusting your baby to them for long periods, which is why most grandparents flee to Florida.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: A bachelor is a guy who never made the same mistake once
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: A married man has many cares, but a bachelor no pleasures.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: A bachelor's life is a fine breakfast, a flat lunch, and a miserable dinner.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: A married man is a man with a past, while a bachelor is a man with a future.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A bachelor is a man who comes to work each morning from a different direction.
quotes.author: Sholom Aleichem

quotes.quote: A bachelor is a guy who leans toward women - but not far enough to lose his balance.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: Bachelors know more about women than married men; if they didn't they'd be married too.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: A bachelor gets tangled up with a lot of women in order to avoid getting tied up to one.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: A Bachelor of Arts is one who makes love to a lot of women, and yet has the art to remain a bachelor.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: To the bachelor, the language of women is mystery. In those matters, a married man is already a scholar.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: The bachelors admired freedom is often a yoke, for the freer a man is to himself the greater slave he often is to the whims of others.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.quote: A bachelor May thrive by observation on a little, A single life's no burthen: but to draw In yokes is chargeable, and will require A double maintenance.
quotes.author: John Ford

quotes.quote: People always assume that bachelors are single by choice and spinsters because nobody asked them. It never enters their heads that poor bachelors might have worn the knees of their trousers out proposing to girls who rejected them or that a girl might deliberately stay unmarried.
quotes.author: Jilly Cooper

quotes.quote: A bachelor is only half a man.
quotes.author: Louisa Lawson

quotes.quote: A bachelor's bed is the most pleasant.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: A bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: A bachelor has to have inspiration for making love to a woman, a married man needs only an excuse.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Bachelors alone can travel freely, and without any twinges of their consciences touching desertion of the fire-side.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Put your backbone where your wishbone is.
quotes.author: Vikram Seth

quotes.quote: The wishbone will never replace the backbone.
quotes.author: Will Henry

quotes.quote: Have the backbone to go after what you want in life. It's too easy to settle.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: A true leader must have enough backbone to stand alone - even when the crowd wants to take the easy road home. A true leader cannot be dependent on companionship for his or her security, but must learn to trust in God alone.
quotes.author: Leslie Ludy

quotes.quote: We need some clergy with some backbone, who don't mind making uncomfortable at times those who are very comfortable, and challenging them at the core of their faith, at least causing them to pause and to have dialogue and to be open for further discussion.
quotes.author: Tim McDonald

quotes.quote: Get a backbone, not a wishbone.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: Toughness is not being a bully, it's having a backbone.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Mutual understanding is the main backbone of every happy relationship.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: A garden scheme should have a backbone - a central idea beautifully phrased.
quotes.author: Edwin Lutyens

quotes.quote: Many a man has failed because he had his wishbone where his backbone should have been.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The backbone of success is...hard work, determination, good planning, and perserverence.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: We're always looking for the backbone, the central idea, and once you have that you know everything can circle around it.
quotes.author: Adam McKay

quotes.quote: The backbone of any improvement of governance, its development as well as its protection from any form of wastage or excessiveness, is a mechanism to place laws under the microscope of revision and modernization until they resonate in tune with the methodological development and new administrative technologies.
quotes.author: Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan

quotes.quote: Ceremony is all backbone.
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: My Christian faith is my backbone.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.quote: A vocation is the backbone of life.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Self-possession is the backbone of authority.
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: Good ideas are the backbone of good government.
quotes.author: Brian Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Small businesses are the backbone of our economy.
quotes.author: Ellen Tauscher

quotes.quote: The backbone of surprise is fusing speed with secrecy.
quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.quote: A well-educated populace is the backbone of our middle-class.
quotes.author: Mark Pocan

quotes.quote: Company culture is the backbone of any successful organization.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Demonisation is the ideological backbone of an unequal society.
quotes.author: Owen Jones

quotes.quote: Family farms and small businesses are the backbone of our communities.
quotes.author: Tom Allen

quotes.quote: Character is the backbone of our human culture. Music is the flowering of character.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Making money isn't the backbone of our guiding purpose; it is the by-product of our guiding purpose.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The moral backbone of literature is about that whole question of memory. To my mind it seems clear that those who have no memory have the much greater chance to lead happy lives.
quotes.author: W. G. Sebald

quotes.quote: Volunteers are the backbone, heart, and soul of the restoration movement. And whatever the eventual results of their labors may be, working to revive damaged ecosystems is transforming and strengthening their relationship with the rest of nature.
quotes.author: William K. Stevens

quotes.quote: The discipline of desire is the background of character.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: No matter where you are from, no matter what your background is, no matter what your socioeconomic status is, every person can achieve his or her dreams.
quotes.author: Ileana Ros-Lehtinen

quotes.quote: Your background and environment is with you for life. No question about that.
quotes.author: Sean Connery

quotes.quote: You never realize how much of your background is sewn into the lining of your clothes.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.quote: A weak background is a deadly thing.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: A stage setting is not a background; it is an environment.
quotes.author: Robert Edmond Jones

quotes.quote: Your life can become the background for the art you create.
quotes.author: Alicia Keys

quotes.quote: Your background has a lot to do with your approach to movement.
quotes.author: Cholly Atkins

quotes.quote: A man can overcome his background, even as he can overcome a skilled opponent.
quotes.author: David Gemmell

quotes.quote: Don't worry about your background, whether it's odd or ordinary, use it, build on it.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Culture is taking the background you come from and either running with it or running from it.
quotes.author: Imani Nettles

quotes.quote: The background - your own history - is way more important than what you can achieve as a professional.
quotes.author: Javier Bardem

quotes.quote: Having a mixed background and feeling a little bit like a fish out of water in most places can be a benefit.
quotes.author: Viggo Mortensen

quotes.quote: Your background or colour has nothing to do with your progress, but your endowments are the determining factors.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey

quotes.quote: Much of life becomes background, but it is the province of art to throw buckets of light into the shadows and make life a new again.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: My background is deep and set in deep time, and in a narrow space, oral traditions going back a long, long time, which I inherited by osmosis.
quotes.author: Alan Garner

quotes.quote: It's really amazing that two people from such different backgrounds and geographical origins ever got together. That was perhaps part of the attraction.
quotes.author: Desi Arnaz

quotes.quote: We should not and cannot change all our differences. Each of us brings from our own background things which we should share. There is good in diversity.
quotes.author: Georgie Anne Geyer

quotes.quote: Man's unique reward, however, is that while animals survive by adjusting themselves to their background, man survives by adjusting his background to himself.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The backgrounds by design are a very key part of the conversation, because I want a kind of fight or pressure to exist between the figure and the background.
quotes.author: Kehinde Wiley

quotes.quote: The background reveals the true being and state of being of the man or thing. If I do not possess the background, I make the man transparent, the thing transparent.
quotes.author: Juan Ramon Jimenez

quotes.quote: Anything is possible. My background is a bad background, but a lot of people said I couldn't do it. You can do anything if you put your mind to it.
quotes.author: Michael Oher

quotes.quote: Medicine is probably one of the best backgrounds for a writer to find stories. I always think cops and docs have the best background because we see so much of human behavior, such a range of human emotions.
quotes.author: Tess Gerritsen

quotes.quote: No matter our background, we all have crazy families.
quotes.author: Kevin Kwan

quotes.quote: Every experience in life enriches one's background and should teach valuable lessons.
quotes.author: Mary Barnett Gilson

quotes.quote: You don't need a religious background to strive for something good, for genuine compassion and love for others.
quotes.author: Miriam Toews

quotes.quote: It is hard to deal with someone who smiles and pretends to like you to your face and sticks that eight inch blade in your back when you turn around.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Someone who smiles too much with you can sometime frown too much with you at your back.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Sweetie, if you're going to be two faced, at least make one of them pretty.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Some people will pretend to care just so they can get a better seat to watch your struggle. Every helping hand isn't always there to help.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never trust someone who will just get up and tell you another person's story or secrets, cause they'll share yours just the same.
quotes.author: Christon Henry

quotes.quote: The same person that speaks highly of you will be the same person that downs you. Be careful who you call friends.
quotes.author: Jerico Mosley

quotes.quote: Be very careful of who you share your problems with, remember that not every friend that smiles at you is your best friend.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: This is what happens. You tell your friends your most personal secrets, and they use them against you.
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: Being betrayed is one of the most valuable lessons life can teach.
quotes.author: Shania Twain

quotes.quote: When you betray somebody else, you also betray yourself.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: No wise man ever thought that a traitor should be trusted.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Don't fear the enemy that attacks you, but the fake friend that hugs you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Fire false friends. They are in to fast-forward your fall and failure.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Neither a fake friend nor a liar can be trusted, with a secret.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: The only time people dislike gossip is when you gossip about them.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: False friends are like our shadow, keeping close to us while we walk in the sunshine, but leaving us the instant we cross into the shade.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: It's sad how the same people who say they care about you are the same ones who tear you down when they get the chance.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: He could shake your hand and stab you in the back at the same time.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Beware the FRENEMY; enemy disguised as friend who pretends to look after your interests but really loves it when things turn sour for you.
quotes.author: Mufti Ismail Menk

quotes.quote: If you reveal your secrets to the wind, you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Fake friends; those who only drill holes under your boat to get it leaking; those who discredit your ambitions and those who pretend they love you, but behind their backs they know they are in to destroy your legacies.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Most people want to see you to do better, but not doing better than them.
quotes.author: London Mond

quotes.quote: A false friend and a shadow attend only while the sun shines.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Don't worry about those who talk behind your back, they're behind you for a reason.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I've got more respect for someone who comes out and says they don't like me than for the ones who act like they do but talk bad about me when I'm not around.
quotes.author: Mitchell Perry

quotes.quote: Every coin has two sides, just like most people have two faces.
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: We fear our enemy but the bigger and real fear is that of a fake friend who is sweetest to your face and most vile behind your back.
quotes.author: Mufti Ismail Menk

quotes.quote: Once people stop talking with you then they start talking about you.
quotes.author: Sushan R Sharma

quotes.quote: Dealing with backstabbers, there was one thing I learned. They're only powerful when you got your back turned.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: A traitor is everyone who does not agree with me.
quotes.author: George III

quotes.quote: Some people are willing to betray years of friendship just to get a little bit of the spotlight.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: When you talk about me, it says more about you.
quotes.author: Joe Budden

quotes.quote: You got nothing to lose. You don't lose when you lose fake friends.
quotes.author: Joan Jett

quotes.quote: It's better to be alone than to have a fake friend.
quotes.author: Ann Palacios

quotes.quote: Liars are always most disposed to swear.
quotes.author: Vittorio Alfieri

quotes.quote: The snake will always bite back.
quotes.author: Jake Roberts

quotes.quote: False friends are worse than bitter enemies.
quotes.author: Scottish Proverb

quotes.quote: Bestfriends has 11 letters, but so does Backstabber.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; Average minds discuss events; Small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Never wound a snake; kill it.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: Watch who you call friend, because friends are the same ones that will leak your business to everyone after yall not friends anymore.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: I don't tolerate liars. When somebody lies to me, that's really, like, just unbearable.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: Liars need to have good memories.
quotes.author: Algernon Sidney

quotes.quote: The liar's punishment is not in the least that he is not believed but that he cannot believe anyone else.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: That's the mark of a great storyteller, never to give away secrets in advance.
quotes.author: Ian McDiarmid

quotes.quote: I hate two faced people, It's so hard to decide which face to slap first.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than a liar is a liar that's also a hypocrite!
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: People become backstabbers because they are first stabbed at the back
quotes.author: Adrain Furnham

quotes.quote: Behind the smile— a hidden knife.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Backstabbers are most often passive-aggressive.
quotes.author: Shirley Babilya Dickinson

quotes.quote: Yet, girl/women backstabbers do it without much thought about their responsibility. Regardless of their own conscience, it is a person of poor integrity and could be viewed as 'unsportsman-like' behaviour in the game of life.
quotes.author: Shirley Babilya Dickinson

quotes.quote: Backstabbers typically hold grudges and women especially will hold onto past grievances bringing things forward many years later.
quotes.author: Shirley Babilya Dickinson

quotes.quote: Confidantes tell your secrets are backstabbers and not true friends.
quotes.author: Shirley Babilya Dickinson

quotes.quote: People don't say stuff about me behind my back... just to my face.
quotes.author: William Cook

quotes.quote: Usually a backstabber is someone who has NO BALLS and no friends either. People like that can't trust anyone because no one will trust them or stay as friends with them too long.
quotes.author: Ted Schreiber

quotes.quote: They smile in your face, / all the time they want to take your place.
quotes.author: Sonia J. Ruffin

quotes.quote: Backstabbers referred to as backbiters by some, are people who speak badly of someone without that person's knowledge. In person they are polite and friendly, all the while collecting information to twist and use for their own purposes.
quotes.author: Barbara L. Brook

quotes.quote: Don't smile in my face like you're my friend / Then lie behind my back. / Don't come to me like you're praising my work / Really thinking that's what I lack.
quotes.author: Fitzhugh G. Houston

quotes.quote: Conniving and hiding, gossiping and lying / Backstabbers do it all. / Not caring who's hurt along the way / But one day they will fall.
quotes.author: Fitzhugh G. Houston

quotes.quote: Jezebel loves to give false praise / And that's what lures you in. / Not wanting you to see what's really inside / Is a demon who loves to sin.
quotes.author: Fitzhugh G. Houston

quotes.quote: Backstabbers do things behind your back and are frequently at a loss when confronted.
quotes.author: Maryln Appelbaum

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of enemies who attack you. Be afraid of the friends who flatter you.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Do not get sucked in by the hero-worship, because it is just a matter of time before those roses they are throwing turn into daggers.
quotes.author: Dr. Phil McGraw,

quotes.quote: When all is said, and all is done, / and everyone looks back / Will you be known for what you were / —that knife in someone's back
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: You got my pride and slashed my mind / And carved your name so deep / You took a stab at making sure / Your memory I'd always keep
quotes.author: Jeffrey A. Ross

quotes.quote: People who talk behind you, always left behind you!
quotes.author: imsophie

quotes.quote: A stab from a friend cuts deeper than a stab from a foe.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: If they talk about other people with you, they will talk about you with other people.
quotes.author: Carlos Wallace

quotes.quote: Backstabbers specialize in saying the wrong thing at the wrong time to the wrong person.
quotes.author: Les Parrott

quotes.quote: Let's be honest, the cards' on the table: / Jealousy's a sin, Cain killed Abel. / Backstabber...Caesar had Brutus. / It's hard to weed 'em out, even Jesus had Judas.
quotes.author: Pusha T

quotes.quote: To have a traitor for an ally is to have an enemy in waiting.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Carey

quotes.quote: To me, the thing that is worse than death is betrayal. You see, I could conceive death, but I could not conceive betrayal.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: All trust involves vulnerability and risk, and nothing would count as trust if there were no possibility of betrayal.
quotes.author: Robert C. Solomon

quotes.quote: You know that you have been stabbed when you feel the deep pain of betrayal.
quotes.author: Les Parrott

quotes.quote: If you're betrayed, release disappointment at once. By that way, the bitterness has no time to take root.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Betrayal is the only truth that sticks.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: I'm not crying because of you; you're not worth it. I'm crying because my delusion of who you were was shattered by the truth of who you are.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Backstabbers specialize in saying the wrong thing at the wrong time to the wrong person.
quotes.author: Les Parott

quotes.quote: If evil be spoken of you and it be true, correct yourself, if it be a lie, laugh at it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Your life must be filled with such incredible loneliness that your only joy comes from destroying everyone else's happiness.
quotes.author: Mary Margaret

quotes.quote: You know that you have been stabbed when you feel the deep pain of betrayal
quotes.author: Les Parrott

quotes.quote: False friends are like our shadow, keeping close to us while we walk in the sunshine, but leaving us when we cross into the shade.
quotes.author: Christian Nevell Bovee

quotes.quote: You may shoot me with your words, you may cut me with your eyes, you may kill me with your hatefulness, but still, like air, I'll rise.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: There are many backstabbing friends who in your hard time will ignore you, without to ask something from them. You just are filled with sadness and they don't confide in you anymore. The downside of your hard time is being considered rude, negative, boorish and insistent.
quotes.author: Camelia C.

quotes.quote: Be certain that he who has betrayed thee once will betray thee again.
quotes.author: Johann Caspar Lavater

quotes.quote: No one ever really pays for betrayal in silver.... The price of any betrayal always comes due in flesh.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Betrayal does that -- betrays the betrayer.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: It was a mistake, you said. But the cruel thing was, it felt like the mistake was mine, for trusting you.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: It's hard to tell who has your back, from who has it long enough just to stab you in it?.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: Trust is a fragile thing once earned, it affords us tremendous freedom but once trust is lost, it can be impossible to recover of course the truth is, we never know who we can trust. Those we're closest to can betray us.
quotes.author: Mary Alice Young

quotes.quote: Be careful to whom you trust. Betrayal always come from the persons you trusted.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: We can tolerate our true enemies, but not the back stabbers and betrayers.
quotes.author: Sanji Paul Arvind

quotes.quote: Betrayal is the only truth that sticks.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: I would never betray a friend to serve a cause. Never reject a friend to help an institution. Great nations may fall in ruin before I would sell a friend to save them.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: FIDELITY, n. A virtue peculiar to those who are about to be betrayed.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: When you betray somebody else, you also betray yourself.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: There are three signs of a hypocrite: when he speaks he speaks lies, when he makes a promise he breaks it, and when he is trusted he betrays his trust.
quotes.author: Muhammad

quotes.quote: We have to distrust each other. It is our only defense against betrayal.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: An open enemy is better than a false friend
quotes.author: Greek Proverb

quotes.quote: One should rather die than be betrayed. There is no deceit in death. It delivers precisely what it has promised. Betrayal, though ... betrayal is the willful slaughter of hope.
quotes.author: Steven Deitz

quotes.quote: They talk of a man betraying his country, his friends, his sweetheart. There must be a moral bond first. All a man can betray is his conscience.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: If I had to choose between betraying my country and betraying my friend, I hope I should have the guts to betray my country.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: There must be love, and understanding, to betray. Most men haven't the wit or the honor for betrayal: not to know it when they see it; not the stomach to apprehend it as they do it. Most men, blind and dumb in their self-centeredness, don't betray: they merely disappoint.
quotes.author: Janet Morris

quotes.quote: People are complicated creatures. On the one hand, able to perform great acts of charity. On the other, capable of the most underhanded forms of betrayal. It's a constant battle that rages within all of us.
quotes.author: Mary Alice Young

quotes.quote: To understand loyalty you need to experience betrayal.
quotes.author: Ed Stoppard

quotes.quote: A man who trusts can never be betrayed, only mistaken.
quotes.author: Jan Chappell

quotes.quote: True friends stab you in the front.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Backstabbing, especially from close friends and family, is extremely devastating.
quotes.author: Mikki C. Zimmerman

quotes.quote: Stabbed from behind / am I really that blind. / No matter what you do / the pain leads back to you / No matter how I try / I still cry / You were there / and now you just don't care.
quotes.author: Kryssandra Brust

quotes.quote: After all that I've done / you now have lost a ton. / After everything that has happened / I'm really quite finished / with backstabbing friends / waiting for me to diminish.
quotes.author: Kryssandra Brust

quotes.quote: No matter what I do the pain keeps coming / Every smile turns to tears. / Every friend becomes an enemy. / My heart bleeds and no one sees / how much it hurts.
quotes.author: Kryssandra Brust

quotes.quote: Backstabbing is more vicious form of gossip and depending on the precise definition, we could also say that backstabbing occurs a whole lot, too.
quotes.author: Andrew Bushard

quotes.quote: I don't even understand how it happened. We were all best friends one day, and then it seemed like overnight, everything changed.
quotes.author: Morgan

quotes.quote: Don't flirt with someone one of your friend's likes. It's backstabbing your friend.
quotes.author: Melissa Trevathan

quotes.quote: I wish to be accepted for just who and what I am; / I wish so-called friends would not laugh in my face while behind / my back gossiping; I'd wish for true friendship / not a joke; This is how I feel; I can't speak for other folks.
quotes.author: Joyce Joyce Ashton-Douglas

quotes.quote: So I'd wish all the backstabbing friends in this world would be given a mirror, so they could turn their judgemental eyes on themselves.
quotes.author: Joyce Joyce Ashton-Douglas

quotes.quote: We cannot exalt a friend in his or her face and then turn around to gossip about their predicaments.
quotes.author: Nathan S. Ajoku

quotes.quote: Backstabbing is unproductive, u healthy, and an inexcusable tool that often destroys amity.
quotes.author: Nathan S. Ajoku

quotes.quote: Those who indulge in backstabbing, are those who lack the courage and the boldness to confront their friend's activities face to face.
quotes.author: Nathan S. Ajoku

quotes.quote: Thine own friend, and thy father's friend; forsake not.
quotes.author: Proverbs 27:10

quotes.quote: To resent injuries under the disguise of friendship and benevolence argues a degeneracy at which common humanity and justice must blush.
quotes.author: L.M. Stretch

quotes.quote: Betrayal is never easy to handle and there is no right way to accept it.
quotes.author: Christine Feehan

quotes.quote: The worst pain in the world goes beyond the physical. Even further beyond any other emotional pain, one can feel. It is the betrayal of a friend.
quotes.author: Heather Brewer

quotes.quote: Faithful are the wounds of a friend, but the kisses of an enemy are deceitful.
quotes.author: Proverbs 27:6

quotes.quote: Betray a friend and you'll often find you have ruined yourself.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Some people are willing to betray years of friendship just to get a little bit of the spotlight.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: He who throws away a friend is as bad as he who throws away his life.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Dealing with backstabbers, there was one thing I learned. They're only powerful when you got your back turned.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: Best Friends has 11 letters, but so does Backstabber.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: Sometimes your dearest friend whom you reveal most of your secrets to becomes so deadly and unfriendly without knowing that they were not really your friend.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: Mineko Iwasaki

quotes.quote: If I had to choose between betraying my country and betraying my friend, I hope I should have the guts to betray my country.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: I am grateful to those who have betrayed me… They thought they were just stabbing me in the back, but they were also cutting me free from their poisonous life.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: All trust involves vulnerability and risk, and nothing would count as trust if there were no possibility of betrayal.
quotes.author: Robert C. Solomon

quotes.quote: I could never hurt him enough to make his betrayal stop hurting. And it hurts, in every part of my body.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: I'm not sure how healthy bacon is in general, but I know it's incredibly delicious.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: It's a proven fact that all plans involving bacon have a 90 percent better chance of working out.
quotes.author: Jeff Gunhus

quotes.quote: The adults said the only good food was the bacon, but the kids knew better. They had never had a more fun breakfast in their lives. Although they had to agree the bacon was very good. Then again, it was bacon. It was always good.
quotes.author: Ella Minster

quotes.quote: Almost anything can be improved with the addition of bacon.
quotes.author: Jasper Fforde

quotes.quote: It is a truth universally acknowledged that bacon can improve any situation.
quotes.author: Jen Rasmussen

quotes.quote: Consider the silent repose of the sausage as compared to the aggressiveness of bacon.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Bacon's not the only thing that's cured by hanging from a string.
quotes.author: Hugh Kingsmill

quotes.quote: Look a pig in its eyes, and understand the truth behind bacon.
quotes.author: Mango Wodzak

quotes.quote: The world is split into two halves: the bacon, and the bacon eaters.
quotes.author: Nick Offerman

quotes.quote: Bacon's the best. Even the frying of bacon sounds like applause.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: Bacon is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: When you have bacon in your mouth, it doesn't matter who's president or anything. Every time I'm eating bacon I think, I could die right now, and I mean it. That's how good life is.
quotes.author: Louis CK

quotes.quote: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Bacon is so good by itself that to put it in any other food is an admission of failure. You're basically saying, I can't make this other food taste good, so I'll throw in bacon.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.quote: Bacon bits are like the fairy dust of the food community.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: They'll have sausages seasoned high / Soused mackerel and rabbit pie, / Rashers of bacon nicely done, / Lobster sauce and donkey's tongue, / Lots of crabs and pickled sprats, / Cabbage and onions covered in fat, / Skillygolee and paddywhack / For the foreigners in England.
quotes.author: Henry Disley

quotes.quote: We shall have to pay a half-a-crown / For a slice of rusty bacon / I wonder what they do put in / The faggots and the sausages? / Cold donkeys' dung, says Biddy Flinn, / Candle ends and rotten cabbages.
quotes.author: Henry Disley

quotes.quote: I sent our Nell as I'm a sinner, / To get some liver and bacon for dinner, / We fasted so long we are quite thinner / We thought we'd have a feast day.
quotes.author: John Harkness

quotes.quote: One side of bacon could suffice a family an entire season. And a small bit of bacon made peas much more palatable.
quotes.author: Boze Hadleigh

quotes.quote: Bacon, a savory workhorse ingredient that lends an underpinning of hauntingly rich and complex flavor to a dish, frequently without celebration or menu credit, is finally having its heyday.
quotes.author: Peter Sherman

quotes.quote: Bacon makes everything better, and good bacon can always become extraordinary.
quotes.author: Peter Sherman

quotes.quote: A little indulgence won't do you in so long as you stick to the mantra, ' everything in moderation.' Well, everything except bacon.
quotes.author: Morgan Murphy

quotes.quote: The meaty, smoky aroma as it's cooking, the rich, salty taste, and the unmistakable sizzle as it's frying in the pan are memories we all share and savor.
quotes.author: Bonnie Scott

quotes.quote: Whether standard fare for breakfast, a decadent topping for a burger, or a crunchy addition to a favorite salad, bacon is at home with any meal.
quotes.author: Bonnie Scott

quotes.quote: When you want to treat yourself, there's nothing that satisfies like the savory, crunchy goodness of bacon.
quotes.author: Bonnie Scott

quotes.quote: Bacon has come in and out of favor over the past few decades, and it's currently the hottest food trends around— encompasing every course on the menu from appetizers to beverages and desserts.
quotes.author: Bonnie Scott

quotes.quote: Bacon — that perennial favorite, known even to sway hardened vegetarian.
quotes.author: Jack Campbell

quotes.quote: They sat there having breakfast / It was bacon eggs and toast / A pot of tea for two to share / For dinner they'd have roast.
quotes.author: Mark Nadin

quotes.quote: You know, it's hard to beat bacon at any time of day. But I also am a big fan of corned beef hash.
quotes.author: Nick Offerman

quotes.quote: If you record the sound of bacon in a frying pan and play it back, it sounds like the pops and cracks on an old 33 1/3 recording. Almost exactly like that. You could substitute it for that sound.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: I always use my 'Holy Trinity' which is salt, olive oil, and bacon. My motto is, 'bacon always makes it better.' I try to use bacon and pork products whenever I can.
quotes.author: Anne Burrell

quotes.quote: Bacon. Let's talk about bacon. There's no meat more glorious than bacon. You can add it to pasta instead of cheese. You can stick it in a sandwich, er... instead of cheese.
quotes.author: Rob Manuel

quotes.quote: I think we love bacon because it has all the qualities of an amazing sensory experience. When we cook it, the sizzling sound is so appetizing, the aroma is maddening, the crunch of the texture is so gratifying and the taste delivers every time.
quotes.author: Alex Guarnaschelli

quotes.quote: Onions and bacon cooking up just make your kitchen smell so good. In fact, one day I'm going to come up with a room deodorizer that smells like bacon and onions. It's a fabulous smell.
quotes.author: Paula Deen

quotes.quote: Who cannot appreciate the smell of bacon? It smells good, but I never want to grab a bite.
quotes.author: Tony Cardenas

quotes.quote: You worry too much. Eat some bacon...what? No, I got no idea if it'll make you feel better, I just made too much bacon.
quotes.author: Justin Halpern

quotes.quote: And hey, bacon made everything better.
quotes.author: Jennifer Estep

quotes.quote: Bacon: Duct tape for food.
quotes.author: Darynda Jones

quotes.quote: Bacon: Duct tape for food.
quotes.author: Darynda Jones

quotes.quote: Most people just want to be left in peace to eat their bacon, not realizing that there is no peace behind bacon.
quotes.author: Mango Wodzak

quotes.quote: Bacon is the meth of meats.
quotes.author: Lisa Scottoline

quotes.quote: I don't know if there is too much bacon! I used to have bacon parties. That's how much I love bacon.
quotes.author: Nicole Byer

quotes.quote: All bad behavior is really a request for love, attention, or validation.
quotes.author: Kimberly Giles

quotes.quote: Forgiveness requires a sense that bad behaviour is a sign of suffering rather than malice.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: To change undesirable behaviors we see in the world, we must change the thinking that leads to those behaviors.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.quote: Good character going bad is like a beast escaping it's cage; it will be hard to capture it again!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: I just feel like we as a human race tend to fear that which we don't understand. It's cause for a lot of bad things and bad behavior to exist on the planet.
quotes.author: Billy Porter

quotes.quote: I will overlook bad behavior if I know that people's intentions are good. I have this belief that people really can do good things and that people want to be good.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Mitchell

quotes.quote: One thing I believe strongly in this life is that you just don't reward bad behavior.
quotes.author: Dr. Phil

quotes.quote: The problem with merely tethering your bad behavior is that you'll eventually drop the chain.
quotes.author: Alan Robert Neal

quotes.quote: Don't give money to people who won't behave properly with it. You'll just enable bad behavior.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: A person who is knowingly bent on bad behavior, gets upset when better behavior is expected of them.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: The end result of positively reinforcing bad behavior is that you get more of it. The culmination of a failure to punish predators is a debased, dissolute, slum-dog society in which, by legal decree, the righteous suffer and the wicked prosper.
quotes.author: Ilana Mercer

quotes.quote: Knowledge is no guarantee of good behavior, but ignorance is a virtual guarantee of bad behavior.
quotes.author: Martha C. Nussbaum

quotes.quote: Genetically influenced behavior is not necessarily good and not necessarily unchangeable. Explanations of bad behavior that appeal to genes do not absolve a person any more than do explanations that appeal to upbringing.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker
