quotes.quote: I think sometimes bad behaviour can be liberating for certain people. They need to behave badly to find themselves - to go off path to find their path. You see it with kids all the time: They're testing boundaries, and I think that's healthy.
quotes.author: Noah Baumbach

quotes.quote: Bad behaviour makes men more glamorous. Women get destroyed, thrown out of society and locked up in institutions.
quotes.author: Marianne Faithfull

quotes.quote: The trouble with the world today, she thought, was that people were not prepared to stand up to bad behaviour.
quotes.author: Alexander Mccall Smith

quotes.quote: If there's bad behaviour, the quickest way of stopping it is to give more love. That always works, you know. People say we must punish when there is wrongdoing, but if you punish you're only punishing yourself. And what's the point of that?
quotes.author: Alexander McCall Smith

quotes.quote: Do not speak in the hearing of a fool, for he will despise the good sense of your words.
quotes.author: Proverbs 23:9

quotes.quote: Most of the bad guys in the real world don't know that they are bad guys. You don't get a flashing warning sign that you're about to damn yourself. It sneaks up on you when you aren't looking.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: I can't bear inequality, I can't bear bad behaviour to other people. I cannot bear it that people are mean to people who can't help what they are.
quotes.author: Janet Suzman

quotes.quote: If a bad habit is a learned behavior, then what we've learned needs to be burned in/thru the Refiner's Fire! el.
quotes.author: Evinda Lepins

quotes.quote: The objective is to change the system and the behaviour it encourages, rather than replacing 'bad' people with 'good' people.
quotes.author: Owen Jones

quotes.quote: There is no difference between the person who wishes he can change his bad character and did not and the person who never wished for it. Wishes alone don't change the world!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: I sometimes marvel at how far I've come - blissful, even, in the knowledge that I am slowly becoming a well-evolved human being - only to have the illusion shattered by an episode of bad behaviour that contradicts the new and reinforces the old.
quotes.author: B.G. Bowers

quotes.quote: It is important to correct bad behavior one toe at a time.
quotes.author: Gasmaskamn

quotes.quote: The worst tragedy of sin isn't that it produced bad behavior, but that it produced the idea that bad behavior is strong enough to deflect love.
quotes.author: D.R. Silava

quotes.quote: Atrociously bad behavior from a company with a history of atrociously bad behavior.
quotes.author: Craig Conway

quotes.quote: We tend to learn from bad examples, but we should take care not to use bad examples as a rationalization of our own bad behavior.
quotes.author: Cathy Burnham Martin

quotes.quote: No day is so bad it can't be fixed with a nap.
quotes.author: Carrie P. Snow

quotes.quote: The only difference between a good day and a bad day is your attitude.
quotes.author: Dennis S. Brown

quotes.quote: Everyone can have a bad day.
quotes.author: Nikki Haley

quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong or evil about having a bad day. There's everything wrong with making others have to have it... with you.
quotes.author: Neil Cavuto

quotes.quote: Sometimes you need those bad days, to help you appreciate the good ones.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Some days are just bad days, that's all. You have to experience sadness to know happiness, and I remind myself that not every day is going to be a good day, that's just the way it is.
quotes.author: Dita Von Tesse

quotes.quote: A bad day is just a day where you have been thinking more negative thoughts than positive ones.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Just because you're having a bad day doesn't mean you're having a bad life.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: What? You're having a bad day? Think of those who didn't wake up this morning, and can no longer live this day
quotes.author: Patty Medina

quotes.quote: If you've had a bad day, look at it as a good day and you'll never have a bad day again.
quotes.author: Charles Robert Simmons II

quotes.quote: It's a bad day when you don't get the work done that you need to get done or you don't get it done to the satisfaction.
quotes.author: David Fincher

quotes.quote: You have to fight bad days to have best days in your Life.
quotes.author: Rea Erika Paraz Ebate

quotes.quote: At midnight, even bad days come to an end.
quotes.author: Ms. Moem

quotes.quote: You have to remember that the hard days are what make you stronger. The bad days make you realize what a good day is. If you never had any bad days, you would never have that sense of accomplishment!
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.quote: Bad days makes you stronger, those are the best days because God is talking to you. you just have to listen closely. Don't let your tears become louder than his voice.
quotes.author: Les Simple

quotes.quote: We all have bad days, but one thing is true; no cloud is so dark that the sun can't shine through.
quotes.author: Miranda Kerr

quotes.quote: We don't have a choice in how or when our bad days will blindside us. But what we do choose is how we allow them to leave us once they're gone. You can use those moments as a catalyst to spur you on to greater things or you can let it be the event that breaks you and leaves you shattered and forever lost in darkness.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: If you have a bad day, guess what you chose it!
quotes.author: Robert W. Merriweather

quotes.quote: A bad day is only as bad as you let it be.
quotes.author: James Yager

quotes.quote: For many of us, a day is neither bad or good. It is our attitude that seems to make it what it is.
quotes.author: Darryl Van Kirk

quotes.quote: Some days are for living. Others are for getting through.
quotes.author: Malcolm S Forbes

quotes.quote: The cure for bad times is patience.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: No matter how bad things get, you got to go on living, even if it kills you.
quotes.author: Sholom Aleichem

quotes.quote: A bad day never hath a good night.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: You can become blind by seeing each day as a similar one. Each day is a different one, each day brings a miracle of its own. It's just a matter of paying attention to this miracle.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: No matter what looms ahead, if you can eat today, enjoy today, mix good cheer with friends today enjoy it and bless God for it.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: There is no good day or bad day, only good or bad actions.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: This too shall pass.
quotes.author: Persian Proverb

quotes.quote: I get up every morning and it's going to be a great day. You never know when it's going to be over so I refuse to have a bad day.
quotes.author: Paul Henderson

quotes.quote: A lonely day is God's way of saying that he wants to spend some quality time with you.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: There would be no cloud-nine days without rock-bottom moments left below.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: A day is a day. It's just a measurement of time. Whether it's a good day or a bad day is up to you. It's all a matter of perception.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than a bad day is no day at all.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Life is fully as bad as you think it is, so never think life is bad.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: There are bad times, but thats okay, just look for the love in it, don't burn the day away.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews Band

quotes.quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: After all, tomorrow is another day!
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
quotes.author: Bern Williams

quotes.quote: Bad is never good until worse happens.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Things are never so bad they can't be made worse.
quotes.author: Humphrey Bogart

quotes.quote: Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Remember when life's path is steep to keep your mind even.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, please, just don't squirt them in other people's eyes.
quotes.author: J. Andrew Helt

quotes.quote: If you want a place in the sun, you have to expect a few blisters.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: When you're feeling your worst, that's when you get to know yourself the best.
quotes.author: Leslie Grossman

quotes.quote: God brings men into deep waters not to drown them, but to cleanse them.
quotes.author: Aughey

quotes.quote: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
quotes.author: Bern Williams

quotes.quote: Do not confuse my bad days as a sign of weakness. Those are actually the days I am fighting my hardest.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You never see bad days in a photo album, but it is these days that get us from one happy snapshot to the next.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Bad days elicit anger and frustration because they negate being one's preferred self.
quotes.author: Kathy Charmaz

quotes.quote: Bad days reflect a frustrating and frightening self, a self that limits are present and might foretell the future.
quotes.author: Kathy Charmaz

quotes.quote: Lessen bad days allow for more elastic definitions.
quotes.author: Kathy Charmaz

quotes.quote: Those who desire good life never be in bed at the rising of the sun.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: You cannot beat hard time, but hard times bears fools and scatters their destiny.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: If you allow condition to get rid of you, you are not worthy of a good life.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: Do not fail in life, do not disappoint yourself, seek to know the hidden treasures of life; and you will live longer than your ancestors.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: As tides of life rise and fall, life is constant, like the waves crashing upon the shore. Persistence is the key in high and low times...
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: Encourage yourself, speak to yourself, and lift yourself right on up. Encourage yourself that change its here. Encourage yourself tp continue to pursue.
quotes.author: Delene Williams

quotes.quote: Encourage yourself to carry it out, to walk it out, to search it out, shout it out, and praise your way out to the change that's being presented with encouragement.
quotes.author: Delene Williams

quotes.quote: When things get really hard, people pray.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: Those who do not have worthy struggles in their lives never enjoy the pleasure of celebrating a hard-won victory.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: You need resilience not just for the hard times. You need resilience if you're going to be happy.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: If you have a bad day, the first step is to give up the guilt. Do not beat yourself up about it - you're human after all.
quotes.author: Hardie Grant Books

quotes.quote: There will always be temptations and obstacles in your way, so turn them into positives. Learn from any lapse you may have had.
quotes.author: Hardie Grant Books

quotes.quote: Bad days happen to everyone. They come more often than we think we deserve, and they sometimes last much longer than we think we can stand.
quotes.author: Jack W. Hayford

quotes.quote: Bad days are the results of things that happen, and things that happen are the results of what people do. People who misunderstood. People who hurt us.
quotes.author: Jack W. Hayford

quotes.quote: No matter what you do, you will still have good days, bad days and average days. If you can survive a bad day, or a bad round, and still maintain your mental composure, it will serve as an example and a building block.
quotes.author: Vishnu Karmakar

quotes.quote: A bad day requires attention, but an especially good shot or good round requires as much, if not more, attention to the workings of your mind.
quotes.author: Vishnu Karmakar

quotes.quote: Life has a beautiful way of teaching lessons through the challenges you face.
quotes.author: Donna Daisy

quotes.quote: When adversity occurs, you always have a choice. You can become helpless and give up, believing that nothing you do will make a difference. Or, you can choose to become empowered by acquiring the mindset, the lifestyle, and the skills.
quotes.author: Donna Daisy

quotes.quote: Everything and anything is possible when you believe, put forth some action, and focus!
quotes.author: Aliya Abbas

quotes.quote: To push forward and show the world that you won't take any more of this nonsense truly defines the person you are and want to be.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: Life is hard and what you do with your difficult life experiences will determine how you turn out in the end.
quotes.author: Franca Lawrence

quotes.quote: There will always be problems and challenges as long as we live.
quotes.author: Franca Lawrence

quotes.quote: You had a bad day and everything changed. Dressing up like a flying rat doesn't hide it, it screams it. You had a bad day and it drove you as crazy as everybody else, only you won 't admit it. You have to keep pretending that life makes sense, that there's some point to all...
quotes.author: Brian Azzarello

quotes.quote: But as long as we live, we shall have bad days. They're not always bad things though. A glass to drink always tastes better at the end of such days.
quotes.author: Hideaki Sorachi

quotes.quote: Even on a bad day, there is always something good.
quotes.author: Foz Allan

quotes.quote: It's not about what you do on a good day. It's what you do on a bad day.
quotes.author: Menno Meyjes

quotes.quote: I have my bad days, but then I remember what a cute smile I have.
quotes.author: David Crane

quotes.quote: They're just having a bad day. Sometimes they don't think, they get caught up. They're just trying to survive.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: Cause you had a bad day / You're taking one down / You sing a sad song just to turn it around
quotes.author: Daniel Powter

quotes.quote: I'm having a bad bad day / If you take it personal that's okay / Watch this is so fun to see, huh / Despicable me
quotes.author: Heitor Teixeira Pereira

quotes.quote: I'm having a bad bad day / It's about time that I get my way / Steam rolling whatever I see, huh
quotes.author: Heitor Teixeira Pereira

quotes.quote: No day is so bad it can't be fixed with a nap.
quotes.author: Carrie Snow

quotes.quote: I think, what has this day brought me, and what have I given it?
quotes.author: Henry Moore

quotes.quote: When life is viewed as good, a bad day is easily absorbed.
quotes.author: Neil Maxwell

quotes.quote: You're not going to make me have a bad day. If there's oxygen on earth and I'm breathing. It's going to be a good day.
quotes.author: Cotton Fitzsimmons

quotes.quote: Give goodness to the day and before you know it, the day will be giving goodness to you.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: If you keep on saying things are going to be bad, you have a good chance of becoming a prophet.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: Don't be mean when you've had a bad day. Be nice, and your day will get better.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The only difference between a good day and a bad day is your attitude.
quotes.author: Dennis S. Brown

quotes.quote: The only thing that could spoil a day was people.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: A day of worry is more exhausting than a day of work.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: Finish each day before you begin the next, and interpose a solid wall of sleep between the two.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You need to be empathetic in your own personal life and we help our neighbors and our friends out who are struggling in our neighborhoods. But we don't make bad decisions based on empathy.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: But with your life you make a few bad decisions, get unlucky a few times, whatever, but you have to keep going, right?
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: My bad luck got tangled up with my bad decisions, and I'm paying for it.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: The whole point of life is learning to live with the consequences of the bad decision we've made.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: Guard yourself and your conscience no one else will and know that a bad decision at the right time can destroy you far more surely than any bullet!
quotes.author: James Clavell

quotes.quote: Things usually make sense in time, and even bad decisions have their own kind of correctness.
quotes.author: Miranda July

quotes.quote: If you make enough bad decisions, every once in a while things work out for you.
quotes.author: Geoff Ramsey

quotes.quote: Boredom is usually what spurs either bad decisions or any decision at all.
quotes.author: Amy Seimetz

quotes.quote: A lonely person on a college campus is never more than a few minutes and a bad decision from company.
quotes.author: Thomm Quackenbush

quotes.quote: Making a wrong decision is understandable. Refusing to search continually for learning is not.
quotes.author: Phil Crosby

quotes.quote: The hardest decisions in life are not between good and bad or right and wrong, but between two goods or two rights.
quotes.author: Joe Andrew

quotes.quote: Give your decisions, never your reasons.Your decisions may be right, your reasons are sure to be wrong.
quotes.author: James Mansfield

quotes.quote: There is no stigma attached to recognizing a bad decision in time to install a better one.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: People go down bad paths and they make bad decisions, but it's always justified in their head.
quotes.author: Maisie Williams

quotes.quote: Take responsibility for your last bad decision, and then let it go. Don't blame others or make excuses for yourself.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: There's more to us than the moment we made a bad decision.
quotes.author: Jenji Kohan

quotes.quote: A very simple bad decision is to get into debt. And that is very expensive.
quotes.author: Dan Ariely

quotes.quote: Making bad decisions and choosing the wrong partner can ruin your life for a long time, perhaps forever.
quotes.author: Karrine Steffans

quotes.quote: When being unable to differentiate a good from a bad decision:it has become time to follow your heart.
quotes.author: Mac Miller

quotes.quote: It's better to make a decision, even the wrong one, than to be in limbo.
quotes.author: Seth

quotes.quote: Start taking bad decisions and it will take you to a place where others only dream of being.
quotes.author: Paul Arden

quotes.quote: Good people can do bad things, make bad decisions. It doesn't make them bad people.
quotes.author: Sonia Sotomayor

quotes.quote: Even bad decisions usually result in good lessons learned.
quotes.author: Cynthia Addai-Robinson

quotes.quote: We all make mistakes. Sometimes I think the only point of our miserable lives is simply to learn how to live with the consequences of the bad decisions weÂ´ve made.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: Parts of you die with every decision you have to make. It becomes about making decisions between bad decisions and worse decisions.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Rodriguez

quotes.quote: Good decisions come from experience. Experience comes from making bad decisions.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Never put yourself in a position that will put yourself at risk if you make the wrong decision. We spent cash on everything. It's fashionable to make 'bet the company' decisions, but don't do it.
quotes.author: Joel Spolsky

quotes.quote: The fact that we are culturally ignorant and we don't know what our heritage is, the price that we pay is that we act outside of ourselves almost all the time. We make very bad decisions how we deal with other people and their culture.
quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

quotes.quote: A bad decision well implemented is better than a brilliant decision not well implemented.
quotes.author: Peter Schutz

quotes.quote: The fact that you made worse decisions in the past shouldn't be an excuse to make bad decisions in the present.
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Life is simple. Make good decisions and good things happen. Make bad decisions and bad things happen.
quotes.author: Dick Vitale

quotes.quote: In business, if you realize you've made a bad decision, you change it.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: It's amazing that no matter how much money you have, you can make some bad decisions, and in five months you're on the street, begging.
quotes.author: Paz De La Huerta

quotes.quote: We can make mistakes about what we ought to do, and these are not the same as making bad decisions about what to do.
quotes.author: Allen W. Wood

quotes.quote: When you are angry, you make bad decisions in direct proportion to the level of your anger.
quotes.author: W. E. B. Griffin

quotes.quote: We've all made bad decisions, but they haven't always been resulting in the deaths of innocent people.
quotes.author: Bruce Campbell

quotes.quote: It's a good idea to prioritize your life and not making drinking the top priority. I think there are aspects of it that definitely illuminate bad decisions and how they'll negatively affect you.
quotes.author: Madeline Zima

quotes.quote: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: Don't mourn over your bad decisions. Just start overcoming them with good ones.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Young people in the business have grown up and made the wrong decisions, or bad decisions, and haven't been good role models. To be someone that people look up to is important to me.
quotes.author: Justin Bieber

quotes.quote: If you're not going to have consequences to a bad decision or to mislead Congress or any other aspect of life, that only incubates people to hatch bigger ideas that are not forthright and not abiding by the law.
quotes.author: Paul Gosar

quotes.quote: Bad decisions made with good intentions, are still bad decisions.
quotes.author: James C. Collins

quotes.quote: If someone you know makes a bad decision or uses bad judgment, it doesn't mean you have to allow that to alter your attitude. Why should you allow anyone else's bad decisions to send you into a tailspin of misery?
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Human life occurs only once, and the reason we cannot determine which of our decisions are good and which are bad is that in a given situation we can make only one decision; we are not granted a second, third, or fourth life in which to compare various decisions.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: The problems we face, did not come down from the heavens. They are made, they are made by bad human decisions, and good human decisions can change them.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.quote: There are no bad people, there are people with insufficient information to make appropriate decisions.
quotes.author: Jacque Fresco

quotes.quote: Burning bridges behind you is understandable. It's the bridges before us that we burn, not realizing we may need to cross, that brings regret.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Never cut a tree down in the wintertime. Never make a negative decision in the low time. Never make your most important decisions when you are in your worst moods. Wait. Be patient. The storm will pass. The spring will come.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: No good decision was ever made in a swivel chair.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: The more decisions we make in a day, the more likely we are to make bad decisions - because deciding wears us down. You start making decisions in the morning, and by the middle of the afternoon, you're running on fumes.
quotes.author: Mehmet Oz

quotes.quote: Sometimes good choices are really bad ones, wrapped up in so much fear you can’t even see straight.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: Unnecessary fear of a bad decision is a major stumbling block to good decisions.
quotes.author: Jim Camp

quotes.quote: You don't sit around looking for reasons to do the right thing; it's the bad decisions that require creative reasoning.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Every decision is liberating, even if it leads to disaster. Otherwise, why do so many people walk upright and with open eyes into their misfortune?
quotes.author: Elias Canetti

quotes.quote: The hardest thing in life is to know which bridge to cross and which to burn.
quotes.author: David Russell

quotes.quote: All our final decisions are made in a state of mind that is not going to last.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: The quality of decision is like the well-timed swoop of a falcon which enables it to strike and destroy its victim.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Ever notice that "what the hell" is always the right decision?
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Tender-handed stroke a nettle, / And it stings you for your pains; / Grasp it like a man of mettle, / And soft as silk it remains.
quotes.author: Aaron Hill

quotes.quote: If a committee is allowed to discuss a bad idea long enough, it will inevitably vote to implement the idea simply because so much work has already been done on it.
quotes.author: Ken Cruickshank

quotes.quote: Even a correct decision is wrong when it is taken too late.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: You only have to do a very few things right in your life so long as you don't do too many things wrong.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: If you don't make mistakes, you can't make decisions.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Don't be too concerned about bad decisions. Bad decisions make good stories.
quotes.author: Ellis Vidler

quotes.quote: Everything happens for a reason. But sometimes the reason is that you're stupid and you make bad decisions.
quotes.author: Marion G. Harmon

quotes.quote: We are free to choose, but we reap the consequences of bad moral decisions.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: If someone tells you he is going to make a 'realistic decision', you immediately understand that he has resolved to do something bad.
quotes.author: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.quote: The only bad thing about making a mistake is to keep on making it.
quotes.author: James Rupert Nance

quotes.quote: Men of ill-judgment oft ignore the good that lies within their hands, til they have lost it.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Bad decisions create even worse circumstances.
quotes.author: Ranal Currie

quotes.quote: Impulsive actions, and bad decisions, / one cannot dive in wells when they’re thirsty, / But at one point- out of desperation, we all did.
quotes.author: Sarah Bhatnagar

quotes.quote: Don't let one bad decision be the first in a series of more bad decisions.
quotes.author: Will Conaway

quotes.quote: Don’t ever feel bad for making a decision that upsets other people. You are not responsible for their happiness. You are responsible for your happiness.
quotes.author: Isaiah Henkel

quotes.quote: Have you ever thought that if you could go back in time you probably wouldn't make the same decisions? And that we all make our own snowballs with our bad decisions, snowballs that get bigger and bigger, like the rock in Indiana Jones, and slide down after you to squash you. All the decisions we made in the past they take us inexorably to our future.
quotes.author: Tokio

quotes.quote: Sometimes, even the best of us make rash decisions - bad decisions. Decisions we pretty much know we're gonna regret the moment, the minute - especially the morning after. I mean, maybe not "regret" regret because at least, you know, we put ourselves out there but still, something inside us decides to do a crazy thing.
quotes.author: Dr. George O'Malley

quotes.quote: Even a good decision if made for the wrong reasons can be a wrong decision.
quotes.author: Governor Swann

quotes.quote: Every bad decision has to start somewhere.
quotes.author: Sunny

quotes.quote: I wonder why it is, that young men are always cautioned against bad girls. Anyone can handle a bad girl. It's the good girls men should be warned against.
quotes.author: David Niven

quotes.quote: Good girls go to heaven, bad girls go everywhere.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: I don't look at her like she's a bad girl. She just misunderstood sometime, she's a little troubled, she's a little dysfunctional. She's a survivor.
quotes.author: Aida Turturro

quotes.quote: The whole 'bad girl' thing allows me to mess up sometimes. And I have freedom to say more of what I want to.
quotes.author: Ronda Rousey

quotes.quote: There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: It's the good girls who keep diaries; the bad girls never have the time.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: Bad girls ain't no good but good girls ain't no fun.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I'm half good and I'm half bad. My mama is a very good girl and my daddy is a very bad boy. And I guess that leaves me somewhere sort of...here.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: There is nothing uglier than a very beautiful face with an ugly heart.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: You're a bad girl, trying to force me over the edge ... But you don't have to. I'm already there. I'm already lost in you.
quotes.author: Charlotte Stein

quotes.quote: I think that everybody would love to play the bad girl. 'Cause for most of us. It's a stretch.
quotes.author: Sara Foster

quotes.quote: A bad attitude can literally block love, blessings and destiny from finding you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Treat me like a queen and I'll treat you like my king. Treat me like a game. And I'll show you how it's played.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Good girl doesn't exist; you just have to choose between bad and worse.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: A bad attitude is the worst thing that can happen to a group of people. It's infectious.
quotes.author: Roger Allan Raby

quotes.quote: When one maintains her proper attitude in life, he does not long after externals.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: I was like the good girl, bad girl, there were no grey areas for me.
quotes.author: Belinda Carlisle

quotes.quote: Good girls are just bad girls that never got caught.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I want a girl with extensions in her hair,Bamboo earrings, at least two pair,A Fendi bag and a bad attitude,That's all I need to get me in a good mood.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.quote: You don't have to listen to those mean girls. They're just there to make you upset and feel bad about yourself. And you know, inside, they feel bad about themselves too. But they don't wanna admit it to anybody.
quotes.author: Amanda Seyfried

quotes.quote: I don't have an attitude problem. You have a problem with my attitude, and that's not my problem.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You say that I have a bad attitude. Guess what? My attitude is a result of your actions. Change your actions and I will change my attitude.
quotes.author: Ruchir Patel

quotes.quote: A bad attitude is worse than a bad swing.
quotes.author: Payne Stewart

quotes.quote: Good girls go to heaven and bad girls go everywhere.
quotes.author: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.quote: We want a lady in the street but a freak in the bed.
quotes.author: Ludacris

quotes.quote: The woman who does not require validation from anyone is the most feared individual on the planet.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I can only please one person per day, today is not your day and tomorrow doesn't look good either.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: They say you can't turn a bad girl good, but once a good girls gone bad, she’s gone forever.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.quote: The main reason Santa is so jolly is because he knows where all the bad girls live.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: I'm good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I'm not the devil. I'm just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Girls do not dress for boys. They dress for themselves and, of course, each other. If girls dressed for boys they'd just walk around naked at all times.
quotes.author: Betsey Johnson

quotes.quote: Just because you dress sexy doesn't mean you're a bad girl, it just means you know how to dress.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: I never said I was a 'good girl. I'm not a bad girl. I'm just normal and that's what I'm going to be.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.quote: She's a nice girl, but her bad girl's better.
quotes.author: Jethro Tull

quotes.quote: But I wasn't a bad girl. I don't want to be forgotten. I want people to remember me.
quotes.author: Christopher Pike

quotes.quote: The main reason Santa is so jolly is because he knows where all the bad girls live.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: How about a cheer for all those bad girls? And all those boys that play that rock and roll? They love it like you love Jesus, It does the same thing to their souls.
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.quote: My biggest mistake is in believing there are limits to how bad it can get.
quotes.author: Laura Wiess

quotes.quote: I think every girl's dream is to find a bad boy at the right time, when he wants to not be bad anymore.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Most people don't have that willingness to break bad habits. They have a lot of excuses and they talk like victims.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: It is easier to prevent bad habits than to break them.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A change in bad habits leads to a change in life.
quotes.author: Jenny Craig

quotes.quote: Not managing your time and making excuses are two bad habits. Don't put them both together by claiming you 'don't have the time'.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Make no mistake about it. Bad habits are called 'bad' for a reason. They kill our productivity and creativity. They slow us down. They hold us back from achieving our goals. And they're detrimental to our health.
quotes.author: John Rampton

quotes.quote: Working people have a lot of bad habits, but the worst of these is work.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: A single bad habit will mar an otherwise faultless character, as an ink-drop soileth the pure white page.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: A bad habit never disappears miraculously, it's an undo-it-yourself project.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: Bad habits are our enemies because they hinder us from being the person we want to be.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: The best way to stop a bad habit is never to begin it.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: Good habits are the key to all success. Bad habits are the unlocked door to failure.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Good or bad, habits always deliver results.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: A bad habit is only a habit until you can observe it, then it's a choice you make
quotes.author: Boonaa Mohammed

quotes.quote: Good habits are hard to develop but easy to live with; bad habits are easy to develop but hard to live with. The habits you have and the habits that have you will determine almost everything you achieve or fail to achieve.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: One bad habit often spoils a dozen good ones.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Cutting out bad habits is far more effective than cutting out organs.
quotes.author: Herbert M. Shelton

quotes.quote: You can't break a bad habit by throwing it out the window. You've got to walk it slowly down the stairs.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: All bad habits start slowly and gradually, and before you know you have the habit, the habit has you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Bad habits are easier to abandon today than tomorrow.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: The strongest thing in the world is a bad habit.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The best way to break a bad habit is to drop it.
quotes.author: Leo Aikman

quotes.quote: Bad habits are like a comfortable bed, easy to get into, but hard to get out of.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best cure for one’s bad tendencies is to see them in action in another person.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: Bad habits are like chains that are too light to feel until they are too heavy to carry.
quotes.author: Warren Buffet

quotes.quote: First we form habits, then they form us. Conquer your bad habits or they will conquer you.
quotes.author: Rob Gilbert

quotes.quote: I don’t have any bad habits. They might be bad habits for other people, but they’re all right for me.
quotes.author: Eubie Blake

quotes.quote: Bad habits are like infection. Inflammation starts from the mouth and weaken the body’s ability.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: I'll give up my bad habits as soon as equally satisfying good habits become available.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: Don't be too quickTo break bad habits: better stick,Like the Mission folk, to your arsenic.
quotes.author: Bret Harte

quotes.quote: We've all got our self-destructive bad habits, the trick is to find four or five you personally like the best and just do those all the time.
quotes.author: David Lee Roth

quotes.quote: Each year one vicious habit rooted out, in time might make the worst man good throughout.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The only proper way to eliminate bad habits is to replace them with good ones.
quotes.author: Jerome Hines

quotes.quote: Correcting bad habits cannot be done by forbidding or punishment.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: Weaken a bad habit by avoiding everything that occasioned it or stimulated it, without concentrating upon it in your zeal to avoid it. Then divert your mind to some good habit and steadily cultivate it until it becomes a dependable part of you.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Bad habits fill needs, so find good alternatives for them.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: Exchange the bad habit of worrying with the excellent habit of trusting God.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: The only way to break a bad habit was to replace it with a better habit.
quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

quotes.quote: The truth is, you don't break a bad habit; you replace it with a good one.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: There are no good or bad habits. All habits are, by definition, bad.
quotes.author: Jose Bergamin

quotes.quote: Bad habits are like comfort zones; easier to get into, but harder to get out of.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: Bad habits are easy to form, but hard to live with. Good habits are hard to form, but easy to live with. And as Goethe said, ‘Everything is hard before it’s easy.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: What you learn from bad habits and in bad society you will never forget, and it will be a lasting pang to you.
quotes.author: John Bartholomew Gough

quotes.quote: There's a natural law of karma that vindictive people, who go out of their way to hurt others, will end up broke and alone.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: The person who is basically evil by nature will always be averse to virtuous deeds. He is always engaged in bad karma.
quotes.author: Sri Guru Granth Sahib

quotes.quote: Karma moves in two directions. If we act virtuously, the seed we plant will result in happiness. If we act nonvirtuously, suffering results.
quotes.author: Sakyong Mipham

quotes.quote: The jealous are troublesome to others, but torment to themselves.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Every sin carries its own punishment.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Let them fall into the snare which they have laid.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: Whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
quotes.author: The Bible

quotes.quote: Karma is not just about the troubles, but also about surmounting them.
quotes.author: Rick Springfield

quotes.quote: Men are not punished for their sins, but by them.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Whoso diggeth a pit shall fall therein.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Men may not get all they pay for in this world; but they must certainly pay for all they get.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglas

quotes.quote: Whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
quotes.author: Galatians

quotes.quote: They who give have all things; they who withhold have nothing.
quotes.author: Hindu Proverb

quotes.quote: If you keep saying things are going to be bad, you have a chance of being a prophet.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: One who previously made bad karma, but who reforms and creates good karma, brightens the world like the moon appearing from behind a cloud.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Never Try To Ruin Someone.. That's Bad Karma.. Let Them Ruin Themselves The Victory Is That Much Sweeter. You Reap What You Sow!
quotes.author: Amanda Bynes

quotes.quote: Life is just like a boomerang doing bad things to others and karma is turning back double to you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Before you begin on the journey of revenge, dig two graves.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Punishment awaits all offenses.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: He falls into the pit who leads another to it.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: I would never disrespect any man, woman, chick or child out there. We re all the same. What goes around comes around, and karma kicks us all in the butt in the end of the day.
quotes.author: Angie Stone

quotes.quote: He who sows evil reaps remorse.
quotes.author: Arabic Proverb

quotes.quote: He prepares evil for himself who plots mischief for others.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: He that slays shall be slain.
quotes.author: Scottish Proverb

quotes.quote: Every man's sin falls on his own head.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: Be careful how you treat people. What you do to others has a funny way of coming back on you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Harm set, harm get.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: KARMA is nothing more than a REMINDER that we are ONE. Harming others we ultimately end up harming ourselves.
quotes.author: Gordana Biernat

quotes.quote: Remember! What goes around comes around three times harder than before. Karma is a bitch and one day it will come for you.
quotes.author: Crescans Master

quotes.quote: Let the punishment match the offense.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: I'm a true believer in karma. You get what you give, whether it's bad or good.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.quote: Is Fate getting what you deserve, or deserving what you get?
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Sooner or later in life, we will all take our own turn being in the position we once had someone else in.
quotes.author: Ashly Lorenzana

quotes.quote: My actions are my only true belongings. I cannot escape the consequences of my actions. My actions are the ground on which I stand.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: How people treat you is their karma, how you react is yours.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Still others commit all sorts of evil deeds, claiming karma doesn't exist. They erroneously maintain that since everything is empty, committing evil isn't wrong. Such persons fall into a hell of endless darkness with no hope of release. Those who are wise hold no such conception.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: Leave behind the passive dreaming of a rose-tinted future. The energy of happiness exists in living today with roots sunk firmly in reality's soil.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: As long as karma exists, the world changes. There will always be karma to be taken care of.
quotes.author: Nina Hagen

quotes.quote: I believe in Karma. If the good is sown, the good is collected. When positive things are made, that returns well.
quotes.author: Yannick Noah

quotes.quote: If you're really a mean person you're going to come back as a fly and eat poop.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: Like gravity, karma is so basic we often don't even notice it.
quotes.author: Sakyong Mipham

quotes.quote: Every action of our lives touches on some chord that will vibrate in eternity.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: A man is born alone and dies alone and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone; and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: I never kill insects. If I see ants or spiders in the room, I pick them up and take them outside. Karma is everything.
quotes.author: Holly Valance

quotes.quote: Karma comes after everyone eventually.
quotes.author: Jessica Brody

quotes.quote: The law is simple. Every experience is repeated or suffered till you experience it properly.
quotes.author: Ben Okri

quotes.quote: I must have killed a lot of cows in a past life for Karma to hate me this much.
quotes.author: Katie McGarry

quotes.quote: Those who pray for your downfall are concentrating negative thoughts towards you, without taking cognisance of the slippery ground in which they are standing, which could lead to their downfall.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: You cannot control the results, only your actions.
quotes.author: Allen Lokos

quotes.quote: What goes around comes around. And sometimes you get what’s coming around.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: People pay for what they do, and still more, for what they have allowed themselves to become. And they pay for it simply, by the lives they lead.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: Don’t waste time on revenge. The people who hurt you will eventually face their own karma.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Karma bides it’s time. You will always have to watch out. Karma is unforgiving and always gets payback.
quotes.author: Benjamin Bayani

quotes.quote: No need for revenge. Just sit back and wait. Those who hurt you will eventually screw up themselves and if you’re lucky, God will let you watch.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sooner or later, everyone sits down to a banquet of consequences.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Stop blaming others for the pains and sufferings you have. They are because of you, your karma, and your own disposition.
quotes.author: Girdhar Joshi

quotes.quote: Dear Karma, I really hate you right now, you made your point.
quotes.author: Ottilie Weber

quotes.quote: This is your karma. You do not understand now, but you will understand later. The source of pain is within your own larger expression of being.
quotes.author: H. Raven Rose

quotes.quote: I believe that the Laws of Karma do not apply to show business, where good things happen to bad people on a fairly regular basis.
quotes.author: Chuck Lorre

quotes.quote: When you don't manage your life well, you become angry and frustrated as things don't go as intended, and our bad mood is a sign showing we were not able to resolve the conflict.
quotes.author: Jorge Bucay

quotes.quote: That's one of the peculiar things about bad moods we often fool ourselves and create misery by telling ourselves things that simply are not true.
quotes.author: David D. Burns

quotes.quote: I am mean; I'm nasty at times. I don't feel like talking to people at times. When I am in a bad mood and have had a really awful day, don't come in my face because I am not tolerant and I am not a goddess; I can't handle it after a point. I am going to get up, and I am going to scream, and I am going to say bad things to you.
quotes.author: Kajol

quotes.quote: Emotional self-awareness is the building block of the next fundamental emotional intelligence: being able to shake off a bad mood.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Sometimes you can't realize you're in a bad mood until another person enters your orbit.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Just don't go to a place where everything is too expensive it'll put your husband in a bad mood.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: A bad mood is often the reason for blaming others; but very often blaming others causes bad feelings in us: The more we blame others, the worse we feel.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Your partner blames you for his or her problems, bad moods and overall unhappiness.
quotes.author: David Wolfe

quotes.quote: I think weather affects my mood a lot more than I thought, and I like to be in bad moods sometimes.
quotes.author: Ellie Kemper

quotes.quote: You don't think in depression that you've put on a gray veil and are seeing the world through the haze of a bad mood. You think that the veil has been taken away, the veil of happiness, and that now you're seeing truly.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: When I'm in a bad mood, I don't listen.
quotes.author: Cathy Freeman

quotes.quote: You can only be in a bad mood for so long before you have to face up to the fact that it isn't a bad mood at all; it's just your sucky personality.
quotes.author: Megan Mccafferty

quotes.quote: Nothing lifts me out of a bad mood better than a hard workout on my treadmill. It never fails. Exercise is nothing short of a miracle.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: When I wake up in a bad mood, I try not to stay in one. Learn to make the best of what you have.
quotes.author: Faith Hill

quotes.quote: If someone is in a bad mood, tickling only makes it worse.
quotes.author: Amy Krouse Rosenthal

quotes.quote: To understand me, you have to meet me and be around me. And then only if I'm in a good mood don't meet me in a bad mood.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.quote: My moods are continuously shifting like the weather.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: I never make the mistake of arguing with people for whose opinions I have no respect.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: A bad mood is like bad breath. Both are wrong to inflict onto others.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: A cat has to be in a very bad mood if a human cannot coax him to purr.
quotes.author: Derek Tangye

quotes.quote: Sometimes you can't tell if you're just in a bad mood or everyone around you is being annoying.
quotes.author: Hussein Nishah

quotes.quote: You can find me in the frozen mood section.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Everybody knew that being dead could put you in a terrible mood.
quotes.author: Luis Alberto Urrea

quotes.quote: Every time you feel depressed about something, try to identify a corresponding negative thought you had just prior to and during the depression. Because these thoughts have actually created your bad mood, by learning to restructure them, you can change your mood.
quotes.author: David D. Burns

quotes.quote: The bad mood fairy comes to annoy you only when you are actually in a good position, but don't yet realise it!
quotes.author: Jonathan Cainer

quotes.quote: Nothing helps a bad mood like spreading it around.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Ignoring to change your thoughts and beliefs wouldn't fail to cause your negative mood to remain unchanged.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: It's hard to be in a bad mood when you're walking around looking like you're about to play the semifinals at wimbledon.
quotes.author: A. J. Jacobs

quotes.quote: They thought depression was like bieng depressed. They thought it was like being in a bad mood, only worse. Therefore, they tried to get him to snap out of it.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: It's not always easy to distinguish between existentialism and a bad mood.
quotes.author: Matthew Woodring Stover

quotes.quote: Don't kill yourself just because you think and feel you are empty. God needs empty vessels to fill!
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: Beware of what you say when you are in a bad mood; dont mix bad words with a bad mood. You'll have many opportunities to change a mood, but you won't be able to replace the words youve spoken.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: Remember that a man, a true man, never hates. His rages and his bad moods never last beyond the present moment-like electric shocks.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Just like seasons people change. But the difference is, once gone, seasons come back.
quotes.author: Himanshu Chhabra

quotes.quote: You know sometimes when you're in a really bad mood and you're not sure why? That's how I get sometimes.
quotes.author: Maisie Williams

quotes.quote: When you're in bad mood, you find jerk on anywhere.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Good moods're as fragile as eggs. Bad moods're as fragile as bricks.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: I got my wife a mood ring. It works real good! When shes in a good mood it turns blue, but when shes in a bad mood theres a red mark across my forehead.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: If you're not in the mood, you can't do that stuff right.
quotes.author: J D Salinger

quotes.quote: When you're in a good mood, bring up the past. When you're in a bad mood, stick to the present. And when you're not feeling emotional at all, it's time to talk about the future.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: If I go on a diet and work out, I'm always in a bad mood. I'd rather be a little heavier but nice.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: My concentration and focus level tends to go down sometimes when I'm in a bad mood.
quotes.author: Randy Moss

quotes.quote: A relationship without trust is like a car without gas, you can stay in it all you want, but it won't go anywhere.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No partner in a love relationship... should feel that he has to give up an essential part of himself to make it viable.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: If you're giving love and not receiving it, you're not in the right relationship. If you're receiving it and not giving it than you are taking advantage of the other person.
quotes.author: Patti Stanger

quotes.quote: A bad relationship is like standing on broken glass, if you stay you will keep hurting...If you walk away, you will hurt but eventually you will heal.
quotes.author: Autumn Kohler

quotes.quote: When you struggle with your partner, you are struggling with yourself. Every fault you see in them touches a denied weakness in yourself.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: There was a time in the marriage when I could no longer look at myself in a mirror, couldn't feel I was a nice person. A bad relationship can do that, can make you doubt everything good you ever felt about yourself.
quotes.author: Dionne Warwick

quotes.quote: In any relationship where one person depends on another to be his or her 'parachute' — and the other accepts this role — both will fall to the ground.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Relationships based on obligation lack dignity.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Maybe the most that you can expect from a relationship that goes bad is to come out of it with a few good songs.
quotes.author: Marianne Faithfull

quotes.quote: The hottest love has the coldest end.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Don't be reckless with other people's hearts, and don't put up with people that are reckless with yours.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut, Jr.

quotes.quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Suspicion and jealousy are the death knell of any relationship.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: The one who loves the least, controls the relationship.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: How can I let you be a priority in my life, when I'm still an option in your life?
quotes.author: Hussein Nishah

quotes.quote: Anger repressed can poison a relationship as surely as the cruelest words.
quotes.author: Dr. Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: I am getting nowhere with you and I can't let you go and I cant get through.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
quotes.author: Henry Winkler

quotes.quote: The wrong person isn't breaking their back to make you happy. So, stop breaking your back for them.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: A bad relationship will make you feel more alone than when you were single.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Why is it that the right people never wind up together? Why are people so afraid to leave a relationship, even if they know it's a bad one?
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: Don't allow someone not worth it to have the power to occupy your thoughts. If they don't find you worth the effort or the time, why should you waste yours?
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: I was married by a judge. I should have asked for a jury.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: A deadness occurs in relationships when people are no longer willing to tell each other how they really feel.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: Any relationship primarily built on physical attractiveness is predestined to be short lived.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Relationships are like crystals, you don't realize how much you love it until it breaks.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: We are responsible for our own relationships, their success, their failures, the good times, the bad times. Take responsibility for creating the relationships that you desire.
quotes.author: Sam Owen

quotes.quote: Positive, affirming relationsips bring great pleasure while poor relationship brings great pain. Great happiness found in good relationships, greatest pain found in bad relationships.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: Break free of toxic people and relationships, they erode your quality of life.
quotes.author: Ty Howard

quotes.quote: Whenever you're in conflict with someone, there is one factor that can make the difference between damaging your relationship and deepening it. That factor is attitude.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: If you look for the bad in people expecting to find it, you surely will.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Almost all of our relationships begin and most of them continue as forms of mutual exploitation, a mental or physical barter, to be terminated when one or both parties run out of goods.
quotes.author: Wiston Auden

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to get to know someone really well to realize you're really strangers.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.quote: The quality of your life is the quality of your relationships.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: For there is but one problem - the problem of human relations. We forget that there is no hope or joy except in human relations.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Every good relationship, especially marriage, is based on respect.If it's not based on respect, nothing that appears to be good will last very long.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.quote: Relationship does not live in essence unless you can reliablytell the truth without being prompted.
quotes.author: Kathryn Hendricks

quotes.quote: Problems in relationships occur because each person is concentrating on what is missing in the other person.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: All the lies and pain you put me through, I know now that your love was never true.
quotes.author: Francine Chiar

quotes.quote: I wish I knew how to quit you!
quotes.author: Jack Twist

quotes.quote: People must be taken as they are, and we should never try make them or ourselves better by quarreling with them.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: While one person hesitates because he feels inferior, another is busy making mistakes and becoming superior.
quotes.author: Henry C. Link

quotes.quote: Relationships are supposed to make you feel good. Relationships are not supposed to make you feel bad.
quotes.author: Laura Bowers

quotes.quote: Professionalism makes work relationships healthy, foolishness and dishonesty erodes them.
quotes.author: Ty Howard

quotes.quote: There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: Almost all of our sorrows spring out of our relations with other people.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Failed relationships can be described as so much wasted make-up.
quotes.author: Marian Keyes

quotes.quote: Nostalgia has a way of blocking the reality of the past.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Spend your time with those who love you unconditionally, not with those who only love you under certain conditions.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Love is supposed to lift you up, not hold you down. It is supposed to push you forward, not hold you back.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: I have to remember it is not love that has hurt me; but someone who could not love me in the right way.
quotes.author: R. YS Perez

quotes.quote: Manage your relationships. Great relationships may not be profitable, but bad ones always result in losses.
quotes.author: Tarun Sharma

quotes.quote: Nothing hurts more than being disappointed by the one person who you thought would never hurt you.
quotes.author: Gugu Mofokeng

quotes.quote: Just say NO to complicated, dead-end, unhealthy, and toxic relationships.
quotes.author: Stephanie Lahart

quotes.quote: How can a woman be expected to be happy with a man who insists on treating her as if she were a perfectly normal human being.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A bad relationship can do that, can make you doubt everything good you ever felt about yourself.
quotes.author: Dionne Warwick

quotes.quote: Love cannot live where there is no trust.
quotes.author: Edith Hamilton

quotes.quote: Sometimes a bad relationship is the best you can do.
quotes.author: Matt Nix

quotes.quote: Intelligence work is all about relationships. Like a romance, working with a source is more about the heart than the head. Of course, romantic relationships usually end if there's a betrayal, whereas spy relationships often begin with one.
quotes.author: Matt Nix

quotes.quote: It's a guide to help women get out of bad relationships. It's called, 'You're a Great Guy, BUT...'
quotes.author: Betsy Thomas

quotes.quote: I think we go through these bad relationships for a reason.
quotes.author: Jerry Siegel

quotes.quote: It's amazing how you can not only know it's a relationship, but that it's a bad relationship based on nothing but nothing.
quotes.author: David Shore

quotes.quote: I went down to get my sister out of a bad relationship. Turns out she didn't want to get out of it so here I am.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Lieber

quotes.quote: Relationships aren't just about being happy.
quotes.author: Michael Patrick King

quotes.quote: We don't have a love/hate relationship! We have a hate/hate relationship.
quotes.author: Arne Olsen

quotes.quote: Born in bad relationships / Growing up in gutters to learn the tricks / At daggers drawn with all the laws / Don't know what the rules are for
quotes.author: Tom Angelripper

quotes.quote: Bad relationships and people I thought were friends / And people judging me / Before they get to know a thing
quotes.author: Maureen Collin

quotes.quote: Situations have ended sad / Relationships have all been bad / Mine've been like Verlaine's and Rimbaud / But there's no way I can compare
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: I never seen you before, so were ya been&were you been hiding? / Probably, having a bad relationship, steadily fighting / Came to find me someone like yo, problem solver
quotes.author: Danyle Robinson

quotes.quote: You see, I've had some bad relationships already and / I've fooled around goin' steady / But this time when I reach out, it may be my last try.
quotes.author: Phoebe Snow

quotes.quote: Now I was in a real bad abusive relationship / Knowing that, that was no way for me to live
quotes.author: Robert S. Kelly

quotes.quote: I can't count the lovers that I've had / All those relationships gone bad / I want to thank you for guiding me / And showing me love
quotes.author: Harvey Jay Masson

quotes.quote: This is so all bad, nothing good can come from this / Sweet but sad, I don't know love ruins a relationship / It will never last but it feels so good, guess I gotta deal with it
quotes.author: Kimberly Pate

quotes.quote: Me and my girl we got this relationship / I love her so bad but she treats me like / On lock down like a penitentiary
quotes.author: Rick Rubin

quotes.quote: See the problem with relationships / In general is that it's always a game
quotes.author: Brandon Casey

quotes.quote: In the beginning they'll do / Anything to have you / And once they do it's never the same / And I, know everyone out there can relate
quotes.author: Brandon Casey

quotes.quote: Everything is perfect, it seems divine / But for some strange reason, there's always a catch / It's a one-way relationship, it hurts inside
quotes.author: Simon Smith

quotes.quote: One person smirks while the other one cries / Butterflies in the stomach of the one whose in love / It cuts like a knife, the truth mixed with lies
quotes.author: Simon Smith

quotes.quote: One good relationship can mitigate the effect of other bad relationships.
quotes.author: Leonora M. Cohen

quotes.quote: The single most potent perpetuator of depression is a stable bad relationship
quotes.author: Jon G. Allen

quotes.quote: Some couples, of course, are better off splitting up, but far too many of them sabotage a relationship that could have worked.
quotes.author: John Tierney

quotes.quote: No relationship is totally without conflict.
quotes.author: H. Norman DMin Wright

quotes.quote: In healthy relationships, the partners are determined to resolve conflicts.
quotes.author: H. Norman DMin Wright

quotes.quote: Unhealthy relationships often develop into love-hate relationships.
quotes.author: H. Norman DMin Wright

quotes.quote: Some relationships just move from one unresolved conflict to another.
quotes.author: H. Norman DMin Wright

quotes.quote: We all have been in a bad relationship, the type of relationship that leaves is saying that we have had all wae can stand and that we are done with being in the situation we are in.
quotes.author: Decarlos Stewart

quotes.quote: There is a real need for interpersonal skills to understand and resolve the differences between partners.
quotes.author: Michael Crowe

quotes.quote: Your body is the baggage you must carry through life. The more excess the baggage, the shorter the trip.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasgow

quotes.quote: Never ever hurt anyone in this journey. We are all travelers and we must carry kindness in our baggage!
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: Where I can't take you along with me, I stuff my emotional baggage with your words and unpack them slowly, a bit all the way, till I return.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: After a bad trip, don't carry your luggage on board the next flight. Stay grounded til you figure out a new way to travel.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Even the elephant carries but a small trunk on his journeys. The perfection of traveling is to travel without baggage.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Maybe your baggage is lighter or you carry it in a fancier suitcase, but we all have baggage.
quotes.author: T Jay Taylor

quotes.quote: I’ve been alive a long time, long enough to know that the more baggage you carry in life, the more unstable you’ll be, until eventually you get sick of carrying it, and then you just fall down.
quotes.author: Rebecca McNutt

quotes.quote: Everyone you meet comes with baggage, find someone who cares enough to help you unpack.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Only by going alone in silence, without baggage, can one truly get into the heart of the wilderness. All other travel is mere dust and hotels and baggage and chatter.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Keeping baggage from the past will leave no room for happiness in the future.
quotes.author: Wayne L.Misner

quotes.quote: In life, when the baggage gets too heavy, you have to put it down.
quotes.author: Nikki Sixx

quotes.quote: Life truly is a journey, and the less baggage we carry the easier the ride.
quotes.author: Wally Amos

quotes.quote: Things you believe are baggage in your life.
quotes.author: Stuart Wilde

quotes.quote: Modern Americans travel light, with little philosophic baggage other than a fervent belief in their right to the pursuit of happiness.
quotes.author: George William Curtis

quotes.quote: I sort of leave the character at the end of the day. I don't carry anything around with me - no excess baggage or unnecessary thoughts. I think it's too exhausting to do that. To put things into perspective - your work is your work, and your leisure time is something else.
quotes.author: Sean Bean

quotes.quote: Simplicity is making the journey of this life with just baggage enough.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: In my conscience I believe the baggage loves me, for she never speaks well of me herself, nor suffers anybody else to rail at me.
quotes.author: Willliam Congreve

quotes.quote: Love is not the easy thing... The only baggage you can bring Is all that you can't leave behind.
quotes.author: Paul David Hewson

quotes.quote: Everybody sooner or later has to drop the luggage and the baggage of illusions.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: I keep my children safe and protected from all my baggage. They get to have a normal childhood, and they're not affected by my life.
quotes.author: Dolores O'Riordan

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's hard to tell where your instincts start and your baggage stops.
quotes.author: Rory Freedman

quotes.quote: The way the game is, players come to a football club with baggage. Whether that's positive or negative, they come to a new club with some luggage. Tony's baggage over the last four or five years has been not playing so many games at Tottenham.
quotes.author: Phil Brown

quotes.quote: The only way to lose weight is to check it as airline baggage.
quotes.author: Peggy Ryan

quotes.quote: Baking cookies is comforting, and cookies are the sweetest little bit of comfort food. They are very bite-sized and personal.
quotes.author: Sandra Lee

quotes.quote: Baking is too precise for me. I cook with a pinch of this or that.
quotes.author: Eva Longoria

quotes.quote: So we baked and sweated together. I like punching the dough. I told myself it was the moon and punched it senseless.
quotes.author: Susan Beth Pfeffer

quotes.quote: The smell of good bread baking, like the sound of lightly flowing water, is indescribable in its evocation of innocence and delight.
quotes.author: M. F. K. Fisher

quotes.quote: It's all about a balancing act between time, temperature and ingredients: That's the art of baking.
quotes.author: Peter Reinhart

quotes.quote: Most recently, I learned another hobby: baking. It's so much fun to mix all the ingredients and to see the cake come out nice. It's so rewarding when the cake comes out great and tastes great.
quotes.author: Yani Tseng

quotes.quote: Baking happens with ingredients that last for months and come to life inside a warm oven. Baking is slow and leisurely.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: I like the idea of baking. I'd like to be good at it. But I feel like I'm young and one day I can be.
quotes.author: Thu Tran

quotes.quote: A basic rule of baking is that, in general, it's almost impossible to make an inedible batch of brownies.
quotes.author: Linda Sunshine

quotes.quote: Baking may be regarded as a science, but it's the chemistry between the ingredients and the cook that gives desserts life. Baking is done out of love, to share with family and friends, to see them smile.
quotes.author: Anna Olson

quotes.quote: Never promise to make pie and fail to deliver on that promise.
quotes.author: Kate Lebo

quotes.quote: I think baking cookies is equal to Queen Victoria running an empire. There's no difference in how seriously you take the job, how seriously you approach your whole life.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.quote: The future seems to me no unified dream but a mince pie, long in the baking, never quite done.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: A bad review is like baking a cake with all the best ingredients and having someone sit on it.
quotes.author: Danielle Steel

quotes.quote: If baking is any labor at all, it's a labor of love. A love that gets passed from generation to generation.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: Manifesting is a lot like making a cake. The things needed are supplied by you, the mixing is done by your mind and the baking is done in the oven of the universe.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: I think baking is very rewarding, and if you follow a good recipe, you will get success.
quotes.author: Mary Berry

quotes.quote: Baking is Life. So when you describe what you're making, you must describe life. Do you see? It's not just recipes.
quotes.author: Jenny Colgan

quotes.quote: Baking is therapy.
quotes.author: Paul Hollywood

quotes.quote: Life was like a batch of biscuits without the baking powder: flat, flat, flat.
quotes.author: Kirby Larson

quotes.quote: Baking is like washing--the results are equally temporary.
quotes.author: Patricia Briggs

quotes.quote: It baking is very artistic but exact and I'm very detail oriented. You have to have a lot of patience, which is why a lot of American men can't handle it.
quotes.author: Anne McManus

quotes.quote: Bad bread wrecks my outlook on life.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Steingarten

quotes.quote: Baking is how you start kids at cooking in the kitchen.
quotes.author: Sandra Lee

quotes.quote: I think baking is an incredible thing; cooking in general is an incredible thing.
quotes.author: Blake Lively

quotes.quote: Baking is fundamental to the Jewish culture. Every holiday has its own food.
quotes.author: Harriet Davidson

quotes.quote: When baking, follow directions. When cooking, go by your own taste.
quotes.author: Laiko Bahrs

quotes.quote: It looked like the world was covered in a cobbler crust of brown sugar and cinnamon.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: I want to work on some more complicated baking and it would be interactive!
quotes.author: Lisa Loeb

quotes.quote: God gives us the ingredients for our daily bread, but he expects us to do the baking!
quotes.author: Chip Ingram

quotes.quote: When art calls, you have to follow it. It doesn't happen often, so take the opportunity when it strikes. In all reality, what I do is art. I do create fabulous pieces of decorative baked goods.
quotes.author: A.M. Willard

quotes.quote: Cake baking has to be, however innocently, one of the great culinary scams: it implies effort, it implies domestic prowess; but believe me, it's easy.
quotes.author: Nigella Lawson

quotes.quote: I think baking's far easier than cooking, and because of that, it's more approachable.
quotes.author: Paul Hollywood

quotes.quote: A party without cake is just a meeting.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: My idea of baking is buying a ready-make cake mix and throwing in an egg.
quotes.author: Cilla Black

quotes.quote: This is the product that everyone in the world eats, that is so difficult to give up. It's so deeply embedded in our psyches that bread is used as a symbol for life.
quotes.author: Peter Reinhart

quotes.quote: Flour and butter, cream and sugar, words and images, all the ingredients for a rich, tasty story.
quotes.author: Rona Simmons

quotes.quote: Baking is problematic for me because I usually drink a lot of wine when I cook!
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.quote: Keep it simple, keep it tasty. Salt, pepper and garlic. Shallot another day, lemon grass for nextweek. Nutmeg and cinnamon every now and then.
quotes.author: Riana Ambarsari

quotes.quote: The Second Law of Pies: they must be baked, not fried (or boiled, or steamed).
quotes.author: Janet Clarkson

quotes.quote: There is a mystery inherent in a pie by virtue of its contents being hidden beneath its crust.
quotes.author: Janet Clarkson

quotes.quote: Civilisation was built around wheat, around people settling down and not being nomadic. Baking is one of the oldest professions.
quotes.author: Paul Hollywood

quotes.quote: Baking is about multi-tasking. If you are organized and prepared, that's half the battle.
quotes.author: Johnny Luzzini

quotes.quote: Baking is a matter of precision and timing, but I just make things up as I go.
quotes.author: Rumaan Alam

quotes.quote: There are divisions between a culinary chef and a dessert chef, also called a pastry chef. There are specializations within the pastry chef field. Some pastry chefs specialize in baking breads, while others are master cake designers. Each field requires an exceptional level of creativity and attention to detail.
quotes.author: Ron Ben-Israel

quotes.quote: We light the oven so that everyone may bake bread in it.
quotes.author: José Martí

quotes.quote: Roasting is one of the oldest and most spectacular forms of cooking. Originally, roasting was done on a spit in front of the fire. What we call roasting—food cooked by dry heat in the oven—was known until the end of the nineteenth century as baking.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: I baked bread for the first time to impress a girl.
quotes.author: Jim Lahey

quotes.quote: My mother liked to bake. I don't. I don't do it well, because you have to be right on target. I think that is where baking and I fall apart.
quotes.author: Leah Chase

quotes.quote: Baked not fried... the healthy choice.
quotes.author: Chris Ferreira
