quotes.quote: [Bread making is] one of those almost hypnotic businesses, like a dance from some ancient ceremony. It leaves you filled with peace, and the house filled with one of the world's sweetest smells... there is no chiropractic treatment, no Yoga exercise, no hour of meditation in a music-throbbing chapel, that will leave you emptier of bad thoughts than this homely ceremony of making bread.
quotes.author: M.F.K. Fisher

quotes.quote: Bread, like so many staples, is one of those foods that we imagine to be more of a project than it really is. In fact, there are dozens of easy ways to make bread at home.
quotes.author: Alana Chernila

quotes.quote: Tenderness in baking is usually the result of simple, but superb technique— proper measuring, mixing, and timing. It's easier than you think.
quotes.author: Alice Medrich

quotes.quote: Your hands and a hot oven are the only essential pieces of equipment to bake a loaf of bread.
quotes.author: Nancy Silverton

quotes.quote: The biggest challenge of being a pastry chef is that, unlike other types of chefs, you can't throw things together at a farmer's market. When you're working with baking powder and a formula, you have to be exact. If not, things can go wrong.
quotes.author: Carla Hall

quotes.quote: In baking, as in many other things, timing is of the essence... Start with a clean kitchen and have everything prepped to go. Once you are organized and have your tools ready, you will have the confidence to mix and bake like a pro.
quotes.author: Cheryl and Griffith Day

quotes.quote: If a man bakes a pie, or a cake, or cupcakes, or cookies, even, he becomes a curiosity to the opposite sex.
quotes.author: Manuel Gonzalez

quotes.quote: Many happy childhood memories begin in the kitchen, baking cookies or decorating birthday cakes. It's one of the sweetest parts of childhood.
quotes.author: Deanna F. Cook

quotes.quote: In order to become a baker, I'd have to stop looking for answers and just bake some bread.
quotes.author: Nancy Silverton

quotes.quote: As you bake, so shall you brew.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: As you brew, so you shall bake.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: He is little suited to be a baker, whose head is made of butter.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: The baker's child goes hungry.
quotes.author: Turkish Proverb

quotes.quote: You must bake with the flour you have.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: The bread you bake by your own sweat tastes better than the dishes of sultans.
quotes.author: Armenian mothers

quotes.quote: I was not a classic mother. But my kids were never palmed off to boarding school. So, I didn't bake cookies. You can buy cookies, but you can't buy love.
quotes.author: Raquel Welch

quotes.quote: Cooking & baking is both physical and mental therapy.
quotes.author: Mary Berry

quotes.quote: At the risk of sparking a barrage of angry letters from biologists - boy, can those guys kick off - when it comes to baking, the heart truly is connected to the stomach.
quotes.author: Sue Perkins

quotes.quote: You might give it a try, boss. Bake a pie... sing a song... wish somebody a happy holiday and mean it. We make our own happiness.
quotes.author: Ghost of Christmas Present

quotes.quote: It's Thanksgiving. Some people bake pies, we bake ourselves.
quotes.author: Michael Kelso

quotes.quote: The way to bake a delicious cake / To make a princess proud / Is to use all the right ingredients / And none that are not allowed / You said it / It's fun to bake a delicious cake / But make sure you prepare / Here's a list of the things you'll need / To bake a cake you'll be proud to share / There's cake flower, baking powder / Sugar, shortening, salt / We got baking soda / If that cake falls, it's your fault / Oh grumpy / Buttermilk should not be spilt / The eggs should all be cracked / Careful / Pure vanilla, water too / And any mixing bowl will do / A great big baking pan / Chocolate for a chocolate cake / If that's your baking plan / Gosh, that's a lot of ingredients / Could we go over them again?
quotes.author: Don Grady and Marty Panzer

quotes.quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A good method of juggling different tasks is to always balance the short and long term tasks.
quotes.author: Gretchen Pilar

quotes.quote: Live life in harmony. Balance the elements of life around you to live in peace. Let your worries go. Do not stress over things you cannot control. Live and be.
quotes.author: Jenna Bognar

quotes.quote: The best and safest thing is to keep a balance in your life, acknowledge the great powers around us and in us. If you can do that, and live that way, you are really a wise man.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Balance is not something you find, it's something you create.
quotes.author: Jana Kingsford

quotes.quote: Man maintains his balance, poise, and sense of security only as he is moving forward.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: I have so much admiration for women who are mothers, who balance family and work.
quotes.author: Beyonce Knowles

quotes.quote: We need to introduce a little balance into your life. Part of this balance means not missing out on some of the marvels of life around you, the fun, some excitement, or other challenges in life.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Happy thoughts or wishful thinking won't cut it. Rather, the trick is to replace negative thoughts with more balanced thoughts.
quotes.author: Senora Roy

quotes.quote: The balance of power is the scale of peace.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Belief and disbelief creates the balance of our existence.
quotes.author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quotes.quote: You need a balance in life between dealing with whats going on inside and not being so absorbed in yourself that it takes over.
quotes.author: Nigella Lawson

quotes.quote: It's one of the things that makes it enjoyable to keep playing; you have to approach each set differently and make some balance between what you want to do and what seems right.
quotes.author: Ira Kaplan

quotes.quote: The balance between confidence and humility is best learned through extensive experience and mistakes.
quotes.author: Michael Steinhardt

quotes.quote: The balance of power in a society accompanies the balance of property in land.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Achieve balance through the combined conscious states of the heart and mind.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Problems arise in that one has to find a balance between what people need from you and what you need for yourself.
quotes.author: Jessye Norman

quotes.quote: So divinely is the world organized that every one of us, in our place and time, is in balance with everything else.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Feeling that your life is on the edge doesn't mean that you're going to end up falling. Find the balance to stay strong and carry on.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: Happiness would lose its importance if it is not be balanced by sadness.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: The challenge of work-life balance is without question one of the most significant struggles faced by modern man.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: It was all balance. But then, she already knew that from surfing.
quotes.author: Eve Babitz

quotes.quote: When we focus on our blessings it creates an appreciative heart and adds a strong sense of balance to our lives.
quotes.author: Senora Roy

quotes.quote: Somehow, we'll find it. The balance between whom we wish to be and whom we need to be. But for now, we simply have to be satisfied with who we are.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: The gift of balance in your life - may you find the balance of life, time for work but also time for play. Too much of one thing ends up creating stress that no one needs in their life.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The dogged determination and patience of one person to do what is Right and Necessary may not always win the day or even be noticed, but it will tip the balance just a little in the direction of good.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: The best relationships are those with an equal balance between communication and action.
quotes.author: Tshepo Koos Maluleke

quotes.quote: Women need real moments of solitude and self reflection to balance out how much of ourselves we give away.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: Life is about balance. Be kind, but don't let people abuse you. Trust, but don't be deceived. Be content, but never stop improving yourself.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Live a balanced life - learn some and think some and draw and paint and sing and dance and play and work every day some.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When bored of sitting, move! When bored of moving, sit! Balance your life or there will remain neither moving nor sitting in your life but only falling!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Happiness depends on how you balance your life's equations between positive and negative experiences and attitudes.
quotes.author: Kall

quotes.quote: I believe a balanced life is essential, and I try to make sure that all of our employees know that and live that way. It's crucial to me as a manager that I help ensure that our employees are as successful as our customers and partners.
quotes.author: Marc Benioff

quotes.quote: Balance your thoughts with action. If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: In all aspects of our lives balance is key. Doing one thing too much can cause upset, like the old saying goes, everything in moderation is the secret!.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Beauty is only skin deep. What's really important is finding a balance of mind, body and spirit.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: Balance is not better time management, but better boundary management. Balance means making choices and enjoying those choices.
quotes.author: Betsy Jacobson

quotes.quote: You have to have a balance and understand that as much as you would like to have absolute control over everything, it's just not realistic.
quotes.author: Khoi Vinh

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as work-life balance. There are work-life choices, and you make them, and they have consequences.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: It's always about finding the right balance between answering some questions and raising new ones to keep your story going.
quotes.author: Oren Peli

quotes.quote: We need to maintain a proper balance in our life by allocating the time we have. There are occasions where saying no is the best time management practice there is.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsife

quotes.quote: Fortunate, indeed, is the man who takes exactly the right measure of himself and holds a just balance between what he can acquire and what he can use.
quotes.author: Peter Latham

quotes.quote: There's a balance in my life. There's reality, and there's the part that looks really glamorous, but we're all just people in the end.
quotes.author: Olivia Newton-John

quotes.quote: Don't work too hard. Try to maintain balance. Don't make work your whole life.
quotes.author: Bronnie Ware

quotes.quote: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
quotes.author: Philip Green

quotes.quote: When you have balance in your life, work becomes an entirely different experience. There is a passion that moves you to a whole new level of fulfillment and gratitude, and that's when you can do your best... for yourself and for others.
quotes.author: Cara Delevingne

quotes.quote: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance and order and rhythm and harmony.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Life works with balance. If you give and receive out of giving, you create a balance with life. You serve life, before you expect life to serve you.
quotes.author: Roshan Sharma

quotes.quote: Balance is key, without balance there's conflict , a battle between positivity and negativity.
quotes.author: Brian Benjamin Sotomayor

quotes.quote: Power is bad / Silence is good / Violence is bad / But balance is good / The world isn't fair / The challenge is great / It's bitter and sweet
quotes.author: Carlos Coleman

quotes.quote: We all in the way, too stubborn to move / We try and we fail, we love and we lose / We push and we pull, we come and we go / It's one and the same, cause it's one thing I know / Balance is good, balance is good
quotes.author: Carlos Coleman

quotes.quote: I'd do anything for a soul, for a soul, 'cause I feel nothing / But I know there's some way to bring back my balance / A soul, for a soul, 'cause I feel nothing
quotes.author: Hannah Evyenia Karydas

quotes.quote: Don't lose ya balance / Losing your balance / The fool never loved you / Babygirl you are a soldier / Whichever way you take don't let that crown tip over
quotes.author: Scott Benji

quotes.quote: Man on the run / You better step aside / Man on the run / Running for his life / Man on the run / Racing through the balance
quotes.author: Gavin Rossdale

quotes.quote: There's more besides joyrides / Little house in the countryside / Understand, learn to demand / Compromise, sometimes lie / Get the balance right, get the balance right
quotes.author: Martin Gore

quotes.quote: Don't take this way, don't take that way / Straight down the middle until next Thursday/ Push to the left, back to the right / Twist and turn till you've got it right / Get the balance right
quotes.author: Martin Gore

quotes.quote: Once to every deer there comes a deer / And from that first moment it's very clear that / The balance of nature goes on / Forever and ever with true love
quotes.author: Burt Bacharach

quotes.quote: Till your memory starts to fade out and your game of life is played out / Got to balance out the power don't we? / Balance your emotions / Push and pull positions like the moon pulls on the ocean
quotes.author: Edwin J Hayes

quotes.quote: The balance of love is now in the red / I'm fed up with the empty things you said
quotes.author: Howard Jones

quotes.quote: Oh can you taste your life / Balanced, balanced, balanced / How will you spend your time / Reborn, reborn, reborn
quotes.author: Chino Moreno

quotes.quote: Realign your mind, soul and body, begin again / Time to get ready for childhood's end / Too many overfed, underfed, landrich, landless / The time has come for justice or maybe one last kiss / Got my eyes wide open time for new birth / Restore the balance
quotes.author: Steven Van Zandt

quotes.quote: Breathe and balance and love, I was born on the scene / Now it runs in my blood, yeah, you know what I mean
quotes.author: Tove Lo

quotes.quote: And every life spawned in this Universe by the Creator; sagaciously balanced itself between its share of enchantingly good and diabolically bad.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: In talking / In walking / In working / In life / In all subjects / Balance is magnet / To the strength / For a sustainable way / And / The strong security / Of yourself.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Better learn balance. Balance is key. Balance good, karate good. Everything good. Balance bad, better pack up, go home. Understand?
quotes.author: Robert Mark Kamen

quotes.quote: When you really are enjoying what it is you do, who needs balance? There's your balance! There's your balance. When you're really enjoying what it is you do, there's your balance.
quotes.author: Tony Gilroy

quotes.quote: Sometimes to lose balance for love is part of living a balanced life.
quotes.author: Ryan Murphy

quotes.quote: Listen, balance, my darling, is not letting anybody love you less than you love yourself.
quotes.author: Ryan Murphy

quotes.quote: Everything you see - exists together in a delicate balance. While others search for what they can take, a true king searches for what he can give.
quotes.author: Jeff Nathanson

quotes.quote: Yes. But you're lacking balance in your life. You're pushing yourself too hard. And that's not letting you be at your best.
quotes.author: Haim Saban

quotes.quote: You must gain balance within yourself before you can bring balance to the world.
quotes.author: Michael Dante DiMartino

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
quotes.author: John Bellairs

quotes.quote: You've got to have balance in a relationship.
quotes.author: David Chase

quotes.quote: For everything in nature, there is a balance.
quotes.author: Alfred Gough

quotes.quote: People out of balance can be out of balance with their goals.
quotes.author: Margaret Wehrenberg

quotes.quote: As a human beings, our life gets out of balance when our priorities are out of whack.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: The calm and balanced mind is the strong and great mind; the hurried and agitated mind is the weak one.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: Work, love and play are the great balance wheels of man’s being.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Next to love, balance is the most important thing.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Wisdom is your perspective on life, your sense of balance, your understanding of how the various parts and principles apply and relate to each other.
quotes.author: Steven Covey

quotes.quote: Extremes are easy. Strive for balance.
quotes.author: Colin Wright

quotes.quote: Balance. The ultimate goal.
quotes.author: Ricky Lankford

quotes.quote: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance and order and rhythm and harmony.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: The best and safest thing is to keep a balance in your life, acknowledge the great powers around us and in us. If you can do that, and live that way, you are really a wise man. Euripides to go beyond is as wrong as to fall short.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A true balance between work and life comes with knowing that your life activities are integrated, not separated.
quotes.author: Michael Thomas Sunnarborg

quotes.quote: The critical part of a balance life is choosing priorities. If you are tying to balance family and a career, the choices are complex because both are important.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Whether you go up the ladder or down it, your position is shaky. When you stand with your two feet on the ground, you will always keep your balance.
quotes.author: The Tao Te Ching

quotes.quote: All of my experience has taught me that the key to life boils down to one thing: balance.
quotes.author: Ambuj Bajpai

quotes.quote: Balance, peace, and joy are the fruit of a successful life. It starts with recognizing your talents and finding ways to serve others by using them.
quotes.author: Thomas Kinkade

quotes.quote: Balance is important in every aspect of our lives- our health, our relationships; our diet... the list goes on.
quotes.author: Ambuj Bajpai

quotes.quote: Moderation is a commitment to balance.
quotes.author: Ambuj Bajpai

quotes.quote: First and foremost is an understanding that the most powerful drug available to human kind is one called 'Life Balance.'
quotes.author: Ambuj Bajpai

quotes.quote: Yes, life's good when things go right, and vitality is the reward for creating and maintaining life balance in all three realms of mind, body and spirit.
quotes.author: Ambuj Bajpai

quotes.quote: If you want to avoid burn-out you must maintain a healthy balance between work, rest and play.
quotes.author: Seymour R. Ian

quotes.quote: I have the feeling that in a balanced life one should die penniless. The trick is dismantling.
quotes.author: Art Garfunkel

quotes.quote: Balance is a journey, not a destination.
quotes.author: Sea Change Publishing

quotes.quote: Part of the balance for me is making time for friends as well as building new friendships.
quotes.author: Sea Change Publishing

quotes.quote: Being more balance has helped me to come to the realization that 'things' can't make us happy, only we hold the key to our own happiness.
quotes.author: Sea Change Publishing

quotes.quote: So many of us yearn for balance in our lives. We hope to find that precise alignment which will leave all our daily responsibilities in perfect harmony.
quotes.author: Marilyn Meberg

quotes.quote: Life, religion and art all converge in Bali. They have no word in their language for 'artist' or 'art.' Everyone is an artist.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: And like tea dissolving in hot water, the sun dissolved in the sky… creating a velvet horizon, announcing for the stars’ night dance with the moon, the awaited joy for the wounded souls. — From Bali – The Rebirth
quotes.author: Abeer Allan

quotes.quote: There is a saying in Bali: "We have no art. We do everything as beautifully as possible." This reflects my philosophy of practice. I try to remember daily what a gift it is to have the privilege of living in this wondrous world.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: [In Bali] life is a rhythmic, patterned unreality of pleasant, significant movement, centered in one's own body to which all emotions long ago withdrew.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Don't talk about heaven if you've never been to Bali.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Tahiti has been spoiled for many years, but Bali is one of the few cultures with origins in one of the great ancient cultures which is still alive.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.quote: I could probably live in Bali the rest of my life and completely live in the sticks and have a f–king moped and make a record every couple of years and not step in public and break even like I do anyway. That's really tempting.
quotes.author: Ben Folds

quotes.quote: My favorite hotel is the Villa Alilla in Bali. The setting is pure bliss, overlooking the ocean of Uluwatu; the eye line makes you feel as if you're floating on top of the ocean.
quotes.author: Carolyn Murphy

quotes.quote: My favorite place in Indonesia is Bali. I was there with my family in Nusa Dua, and my kids loved it. I'm a workaholic, so for me, Bali is a place where you can have a vacation, but you can have your own moment as well. You feel like you blend with nature - and I love the beach.
quotes.author: Joe Taslim

quotes.quote: I went to Bali, and I was in a small village, and somebody who was with me showed a woman a little figurine of Bart and asked: 'Do you know who this is?' And she said: 'Mickey Mouse.'
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: Stay away from Europe, stay away from Japan, Australia. If you go to the Western world, you're gonna pay more money. You can spend five months in Bali for what you'd spend in one month in Europe.
quotes.author: Rita Gelman

quotes.quote: Religious ceremonies are of paramount importance in Bali ( an island, don’t forget, with seven unpredictable volcanoes on it-you would pray, too).
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Bali is the sort of place where you can walk down the street and find something picturesque.
quotes.author: Henry Golding

quotes.quote: Bali is one of my favorite places in the world. In one of my past lives, I believe I was living on the island of Bali.
quotes.author: Chip Conley

quotes.quote: Bali Ha'I may call you, any night, any day. In your heart, you'll hear it call you. Come away, come away.
quotes.author: Peggy Lee

quotes.quote: I'll be in Bali. Beautiful Bali. That's where I want to be.
quotes.author: The Wondermints

quotes.quote: Balls are to men what purses are to women.
quotes.author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quotes.quote: Beach balls at festivals are the work of the devil.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: The tennis ball doesn't know how old I am. The ball doesn't know if I'm a man or a woman or if I come from a communist country or not. Sport has always broken down these barriers.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: When you control the ball you control the score.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: When you have the ball in your hand, you're the most important guy in the whole organization.
quotes.author: Stefon Diggs

quotes.quote: The ball is man's most disastrous invention, not excluding the wheel.
quotes.author: Robert Morley

quotes.quote: Basketballs dont hold grudges!
quotes.author: Dave Bautista

quotes.quote: Basketball is a pure invention.
quotes.author: James Naismith

quotes.quote: Keep all your balls in the air.
quotes.author: Vivian Nixon

quotes.quote: It takes some balls to live life to the fullest.
quotes.author: Brock Lesnar

quotes.quote: Keep your head on the ball. You've got to hit it first, then look where it goes. People get in trouble when they look for where the ball's going, and they haven't even hit it yet.
quotes.author: Mike Trout

quotes.quote: Behind every kick of the ball there has to be a thought.
quotes.author: Dennis Bergkamp

quotes.quote: The ball was coming down like a butterfly with sore feet.
quotes.author: Jamie Redknapp

quotes.quote: It takes balls to execute an innocent man.
quotes.author: Rick Perry

quotes.quote: The ball is round so that the game can change direction.
quotes.author: Sepp Herberger

quotes.quote: If everybody went to balls and did less drugs, itd be a fun world, wouldnt it?
quotes.author: Dorian Corey

quotes.quote: A curve ball is not something you can pick up overnight. It took me years to perfect mine.
quotes.author: Bob Gibson

quotes.quote: Don't throw the ball before you have it.
quotes.author: Vern Law

quotes.quote: A charity ball is like a dance except it's tax deductible.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: I hit a ball for a living, but I have that passion to keep learning.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.quote: You have to love dancing to stick to it. It gives you nothing back, no manuscripts to store away, no paintings to show on walls and maybe hang in museums, no poems to be printed and sold, nothing but that single fleeting moment when you feel alive.
quotes.author: Merce Cunningham

quotes.quote: Every dance you make belongs to you. It is part of your collection. When you think of it like that, you'll want to make your next routine the best you've ever made!
quotes.author: Torron-Lee Dewar

quotes.quote: It ballet is a perfect medium for the expression of spiritual love.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Dance as the narration of a magical story; that recites on lips, illuminates imaginations and embraces the most sacred depths of souls.
quotes.author: Shah Asad Rizvi

quotes.quote: Dance to inspire, dance to freedom, life is about experiences so dance and let yourself become free.
quotes.author: Shah Asad Rizvi

quotes.quote: Dancing is creating a sculpture that is visible only for a moment.
quotes.author: Erol Ozan

quotes.quote: One step, two steps, three steps; like winds of time experience joy of centuries, when movements become revelations of the dance of destinies.
quotes.author: Shah Asad Rizvi

quotes.quote: The ballet needs to tell its own story in such a way it can be received without having to be translated into language.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: All ballet galas are unbearable, but they're unbearable in different ways.
quotes.author: Robert Gottlieb

quotes.quote: The ballet is a purely female thing; it is a woman, a garden of beautiful flowers, and man is the gardener.
quotes.author: George Balanchine

quotes.quote: Ballet is an incredibly difficult, beautiful art form that takes a lot of training, a lot of time, and a lot of hard work.
quotes.author: Sutton Foster

quotes.quote: Ballet is like any other art form in that we all start out knowing nothing about it.
quotes.author: Robert Gottlieb

quotes.quote: Dance design is not simply one element; it is that without which ballet cannot exist. As aria is to opera, words to poetry, color to painting, so sequence in steps their syntax, idiom, vocabulary are the stuff of stage dancing.
quotes.author: Lincoln Kirstein

quotes.quote: In ballet a complicated story is impossible to tell we can't dance synonyms.
quotes.author: George Balanchine

quotes.quote: Ballet is purifying, every movement physically honed and essential, with no superfluity or excess.
quotes.author: Jennifer Homans

quotes.quote: Ballet is a universe of the imagination, a place of magic and enchantment, beauty and romance. Its many worlds vibrate with graceful dancers, glorious music, and sumptuous costumes.
quotes.author: Trudy Garfunkel

quotes.quote: Ballet is the body rising. Ballet is ceremonial and hieratic. Its disdain for the commonplace material world is the source of its authority and glamour.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: Ballet is created on beautiful lines and shapes. If what you hear and what you see mesh, there's a very thrilling experience.
quotes.author: Martin Fridmann

quotes.quote: The physical language of the body is so much more powerful than words.
quotes.author: Bill Irwin

quotes.quote: Dancing is the loftiest, the most moving, the most beautiful of the arts. For it is no mere translation or abstraction of life. It is life itself.
quotes.author: Henry Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: Ballet is not just movement, not simply abstract. It's something beautiful. Sometimes there's this feeling in the movement that makes me want to cry.
quotes.author: Nina Ananiashvili

quotes.quote: Ballet is not technique but a way of expression that comes more closely to the inner language of man than any other.
quotes.author: George Borodin

quotes.quote: Dancing is like bank robbery, it takes split-second timing.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: Ballet technique is arbitrary and very difficult. It never becomes easy; it becomes possible.
quotes.author: Agnes De Mille

quotes.quote: Ballet is the one form of theater where nobody speaks a foolish word all evening, nobody on the stage at least.
quotes.author: Edwin Denby

quotes.quote: A ballerina takes steps given to her and makes them her own. Each individual brings something different to the same role,
quotes.author: Maria Tallchief

quotes.quote: A real ballerina must fill her space with her own personality.
quotes.author: Natalia Makarova

quotes.quote: The ballerina style is here to stay. An added advantage is that the shoes blend well with Indian as well as Western attire.
quotes.author: Priya Sachdev

quotes.quote: Blue jean baby, LA lady, seamstress for the band. Pretty eyed, pirate smile, you'll marry a music man. Ballerina, you must have seen her dancing in the sand.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: The first movement ballerina should be a paradigm of strength and authority.
quotes.author: Robert Gottlieb

quotes.quote: Dancing can reveal all the mystery that music conceals.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Ballet is only good when it is great.
quotes.author: Arlene Croce

quotes.quote: When one lifts a ballerina, it is not her weight but her nature that causes the problem.
quotes.author: Maris Liepa

quotes.quote: Dancing is great for your body. Dancers tend to live long lives, in superb health.
quotes.author: Eliza Gaynor Minden

quotes.quote: Respect your body. Eat well. Dance forever.
quotes.author: Eliza Gaynor Minden

quotes.quote: Life can be a wonderful ballet, letting us express all the values we are living for if the sky of our imagination remains open to passion.
quotes.author: Francesca Flood

quotes.quote: Ballet can also make some feel like they are watching wallpaper dry. Yet even this group would concede admiration for the dancers' strength, grace, and coordination.
quotes.author: Francesca Flood

quotes.quote: Ballet is the foundation of all other dance styles. It is an art form that challenges the performer physically, mentally, and emotionally.
quotes.author: Francesca Flood

quotes.quote: If a child's chosen passion is ballet, he or she typically begins between five and eight years of age to establish proper foundations for learning the craft well.
quotes.author: Francesca Flood

quotes.quote: Let us read and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The only thing within your control is how you react and respond to the chaotic dance of life.
quotes.author: Kerli

quotes.quote: Dancing is a contact sport.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: To me, boxing is like a ballet, except there's no music, no choreography, and the dancers hit each other.
quotes.author: Jack Handy

quotes.quote: Nobody cares if you can't dance well. Just get up and dance.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: We're fools whether we dance or not, so we might as well dance.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Dance till the stars come down from the rafters, dance, dance, dance till you drop.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Dance first. Think later. It's the natural order.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: If you can walk, you can dance. If you can talk, you can sing.
quotes.author: Zimbabwean proverb

quotes.quote: Learning ballet is wonderful for children even if they never become dancers. It is wonderful because it teaches discipline, grace, and manners.
quotes.author: Anna Paskevska

quotes.quote: Ballet is created on beautiful lines and shapes. If what you hear and what you see mesh, there's a very thrilling experience.
quotes.author: Martin Fridmann

quotes.quote: I think most dancers would agree that the art of ballet chooses the dancer, not the other way around.
quotes.author: Kevin Mckenzie

quotes.quote: You go to the ballet and you see girls dancing on their tiptoes. Why don't they just get taller girls?
quotes.author: Greg Ray

quotes.quote: Ballet is not technique but a way of expression that comes more closely to the inner language of man than any other.
quotes.author: George Borodin

quotes.quote: Ballet technique is arbitrary and very difficult. It never becomes easy; it becomes possible.
quotes.author: Agnes De Mille

quotes.quote: Ballet is a dance executed by the human soul.
quotes.author: Alexander Pushkin

quotes.quote: You don't have to know about ballet to enjoy it, all you have to do is look at it.
quotes.author: Edwin Denby

quotes.quote: Ballet is important and significant - yes. But first of all it is a pleasure.
quotes.author: George Balanchine

quotes.quote: Ballet is only good when it is great.
quotes.author: Arlene Croce

quotes.quote: Ballet class is like Life Lessons 101. You learn some of life's most important lessons here that you will carry with you forever.
quotes.author: Joanne H. Morscher

quotes.quote: Ballet is the one form of theater where nobody speaks a foolish word all evening, nobody on the stage at least.
quotes.author: Edwin Denby

quotes.quote: Most people think of ballet as children in little tutus. They don't know it is sweat, blood and tears as well!
quotes.author: Nan Keating

quotes.quote: Ballet is an incredibly difficult, beautiful art form that takes a lot of training, a lot of time, and a lot of hard work.
quotes.author: Sutton Foster

quotes.quote: Ballet is good, because it makes you stand up tall.
quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

quotes.quote: Ballet is like any other art form in that we all start out knowing nothing about it.
quotes.author: Robert Gottlieb

quotes.quote: If ballet was easy, then everyone would be doing it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The domain of the ballet dancer is not earth but air.
quotes.author: Lincoln Kirstein

quotes.quote: In ballet a complicated story is impossible to tell... we can't dance synonyms.
quotes.author: George Balanchine

quotes.quote: Ballet is the fairies' baseball.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: Ballet is purifying, every movement physically honed and essential, with no superfluity or excess.
quotes.author: Jennifer Homans

quotes.quote: Ballet is a universe of the imagination, a place of magic and enchantment, beauty and romance. Its many worlds vibrate with graceful dancers, glorious music, and sumptuous costumes.
quotes.author: Trudy Garfunkel

quotes.quote: The ballet is a purely female thing; it is a woman, a garden of beautiful flowers, and man is the gardener.
quotes.author: George Balanchine

quotes.quote: The ballet embodies the notes of music. And sometimes you almost feel like you can see the notes dance up there on the stage.
quotes.author: Robert Caro

quotes.quote: The ballet needs to tell its own story in such a way it can be received without having to be translated into language.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: At the ballet, you really feel like you're in the presence of something outside the rest of your life. Higher than the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Robert Caro

quotes.quote: Ballet is completely unnatural to the body, just being turned-out... it's not the way your body is supposed to function, so you actually train your body to be a different structure than you were born with.
quotes.author: Neve Campbell

quotes.quote: Ballet is such a disciplined craft and it has given me a good grounding.
quotes.author: Jennifer Ellison

quotes.quote: A fine picture is but the image of nature; a finished ballet is nature herself.
quotes.author: Jean-Georges Noverre

quotes.quote: Ballet will speak for itself. About itself.
quotes.author: George Balanchine

quotes.quote: You have to love dancing to stick to it. It gives you nothing back, no manuscripts to store away, no paintings to show on walls and maybe hang in museums, no poems to be printed and sold, nothing but that single fleeting moment when you feel alive.
quotes.author: Merce Cunningham

quotes.quote: And even this heart of mine has something artificial. The dancers have sewn it into a bag of pink satin, pink satin slightly faded, like their dancing shoes.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: When ballet takes to the sea, even the sunset comes to take a sneak peak.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Ballet shoes... I cannot play with them like they're toys. But when the music is playing they get deep on my toes.
quotes.author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quotes.quote: Ballet: something pure in this crazy world.
quotes.author: Misty Copeland

quotes.quote: Beauty, like male ballet dancers, makes some men afraid.
quotes.author: Mordecai Richler

quotes.quote: If a ballet dancer falls over, it's knowing how to get out looking clumsy that counts.
quotes.author: Ritchie Blackmore

quotes.quote: There's nothing like the force and challenge of a new ballet to galvanize everyone involved in bringing it to life.
quotes.author: Karen Kain

quotes.quote: Ballet is not technique but a way of expression that comes more closely to the inner language of man than any other.
quotes.author: George Sava

quotes.quote: You increase muscle bulk by training against resistance. For example, weights. And in ballet, this isn't the case.
quotes.author: Deborah Bull

quotes.quote: Being a former dancer, classical dancer, it informed me as a human being just in terms of the grace I guess. Ballet is a very graceful form of art. You also become very aware of your body and your mind and your body is working in conjunction.
quotes.author: Zoe Saldana

quotes.quote: The real American type can never be a ballet dancer. The legs are too long, the body too supple and the spirit too free for this school of affected grace and toe walking.
quotes.author: Isadora Duncan

quotes.quote: Some people think that movements, such as the movements in ballet, are a higher cultural expression, whereas some are just dirt. I think it is elitist to think that a trained movement is more acceptable than untrained and possibly unrehearsed movements.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: A lot of people insisted on a wall between modern dance and ballet. I'm beginning to think that walls are very unhealthy things.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: The highest heels I do are six-inch heels - but mostly only dancers can wear them, since they are used to being on point in ballet shoes.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: The discipline that ballet requires is obsessive. And only the ones who dedicate their whole lives are able to make it. Your toenails fall off and you peel them away and then you're asked to dance again and keep smiling. I wanted to become a professional ballet dancer.
quotes.author: Penelope Cruz

quotes.quote: It's no good running a pig farm badly for 30 years while saying, 'Really, I was meant to be a ballet dance.' By then, pigs will be your style.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Even the ears must dance.
quotes.author: Natalia Makarova

quotes.quote: Technical perfection is insufficient. It is an orphan without the true soul of the dancer.
quotes.author: Sylvie Guillem

quotes.quote: When other little girls wanted to be ballet dancers, I kind of wanted to be a vampire.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Non-cooks think it's silly to invest two hours' work in two minutes' enjoyment, but if cooking is evanescent, well, so is the ballet.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Ballet is like writing poetry with your body.
quotes.author: Elif Shafak

quotes.quote: To dance is to be out of yourself. Larger, more beautiful, more powerful… This is power, it is glory on earth and it is yours for the taking.
quotes.author: Agnes De Mille

quotes.quote: They all owe their success to ballet because it gives them discipline and grace, it embodies our emotions, it's breathtaking in its beauty, and most importantly, it expresses what cannot be put into words.
quotes.author: Louis Litt

quotes.quote: I do ballet because it has nothing to do with the people. Give me tiaras and boys in tights any day.
quotes.author: Erik Jones

quotes.quote: Ballet is fine conditioning. Every woman should have an air of delicate grace.
quotes.author: Dean Martha Stone

quotes.quote: Classical ballet, modern dance, theatrical dancing. Today, we see these styles dance overlapping, borrowing steps and movements from each other. This, I believe, is wonderful. We all to learn from each other, bringing more joy and satisfaction to the audience.
quotes.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

quotes.quote: Ballet for a rainy day / Silent film of melting miracle play / Dancing out there through my window / To the backdrop of a slow descending grey.
quotes.author: Andy Partridge

quotes.quote: It's a gutter ballet / Just a menagerie / Still the orchestra plays / On a dark and lonely night / To a distant fading light.
quotes.author: Christopher M. Oliva; John N. Oliva; Paul O'Neill

quotes.quote: Ballerinas are always on their toes. Why don't they just get taller ballerinas?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Notice that the stiffest tree is most easily cracked, while the bamboo or willow survives by bending with the wind.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The bamboo that bends is stronger than the oak that resists.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Memory that yearns to join the center, a limb remembering the body from which it has been severed, like those bamboo thighs of the god.
quotes.author: Derek Walcott

quotes.quote: Give me a Japanese division armed with bamboo spears and I'll wipe out the entire Russian Far Eastern Army.
quotes.author: Sadao Araki

quotes.quote: Study the teachings of the pine tree, the bamboo, and the plum blossom. The pine is evergreen, firmly rooted, and venerable. The bamboo is strong, resilient, unbreakable. The plum blossom is hardy, fragrant, and elegant.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: I wanted to inspire people not to work under a bamboo ceiling. Whatever you are — yellow, black, white, brown — you don't have to allow your skin to define who you are or how you operate your business. There's not one face to anything.
quotes.author: Eddie Huang

quotes.quote: The human capacity for burden is like bamboo- far more flexible than you'd ever believe at first glance.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: The young bamboo can be easily bent, but the full grown bamboo breaks when it is bent with force. It is easy to bend the young heart towards God, but the untrained heart of the old escapes the hold whenever it is so drawn.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna Paramahansa

quotes.quote: And as a friend at a major American newspaper said to me when I complained about this tendency in his own paper, 'You know how these media narratives are. They’re like bamboo.' Meaning, once they start growing, you can’t kill them.
quotes.author: George Weigel

quotes.quote: You can learn from an ordinary bamboo leaf what ought to happen. It bends lower and lower under the weight of snow. Suddenly the snow slips to the ground without the leaf having stirred. Stay like that at the point of highest tension until the shot falls from you. So, indeed, it is: when the tension is fulfilled, the shot must fall, it must fall from the archer like snow from a bamboo leaf, before he even thinks it.
quotes.author: Eugen Herrigel

quotes.quote: Bamboo is flexible, bending with the wind but never breaking, capable of adapting to any circumstance. It suggests resilience, meaning that we have the ability to bounce back even from the most difficult times.
quotes.author: Ping Fu

quotes.quote: There is one thing sure about life: Life will push us hardly many times! When you are pushed, don't be surprised; stay firm like a plane tree or be elastic like a bamboo!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: My mother always says, "The bamboo that bends is stronger than the oak." I can be very focused and determined. But, I can also be very stubborn. Be flexible be nuanced.
quotes.author: Sarah Lafleur

quotes.quote: Bamboo is not a weed, it's a flowering plant. Bamboo is a magnificent plant.
quotes.author: Steve Lacy

quotes.quote: Memory that yearns to join the centre, a limb remembering the body from which it has been severed, like those bamboo thighs of the god.
quotes.author: Derek Walcott

quotes.quote: Destroy the man of wicked thoughts, Like a bamboo-tree with its fruit.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Learn about a pine tree from a pine tree, and about a bamboo plant from a bamboo plant.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: If we have a thousand bamboo spears, there's nothing to worry about a war with the Soviet Union.
quotes.author: Sadao Araki

quotes.quote: You'd think I was shoving bamboo splinters under your nails.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: From the pine tree, learn of the pine tree; And from the bamboo, of the bamboo
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: When a storm comes, bamboo bends. It doesn't break.
quotes.author: Michelle Moran

quotes.quote: The key to great bamboo, Yamashita tells me, is space. Bamboo trees can reproduce for six years, but their roots need room to spread, and the sun needs room to bake the forest floor.
quotes.author: Matt Goulding

quotes.quote: I stopped using plastic cooking spoons years ago and love my bamboo spoons and spatulas by Bambuhome.
quotes.author: Anna Getty

quotes.quote: Well, it was just, the bars was all just like the bamboo roofs and everything. You know. As I say, to me, it’s completely spoiled all, all these places now. Make them all just tourist traps.
quotes.author: David Walker

quotes.quote: And as a friend at a major American newspaper said to me when I complained about this tendency in his own paper, 'You know how these media narratives are. They’re like bamboo.' Meaning, once they start growing, you can’t kill them.
quotes.author: George Weigel

quotes.quote: Golden bamboo wind beated Is far away care golden is the noble heart.
quotes.author: Jingtao Zhang

quotes.quote: Constructed of thin strips of bamboo loosely bound to make a flat, rectangular, but flexible surface, sushi mats help tightly roll together the seaweed, sticky rice and fillings to create a sushi roll.
quotes.author: Xiaoyuan Yin

quotes.quote: And then he got a long bamboo And tightly tied the sausage to it; Says he, ""This is the thing to do, And I am just the man to do it.
quotes.author: Andrew Barton Paterson

quotes.quote: Do you see me in the meadow Coming from the woodland spring With a bamboo on my shoulder With a bamboo on my shoulder
quotes.author: Claude Mckay

quotes.quote: An ijjit grinnin' in a dream -- for shells an' parrakeets, An' walkin'-sticks o' carved bamboo an' blowfish stuffed an' dried -- Fillin' my bunk wi' rubbishry the Chief put overside.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: a cuckoo cries and through a thicket of bamboo the late moon shines.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: On a bended bamboo shouldered, Bearing a block of stone, Two worn out Coolies half-naked Utter their grunting groan.
quotes.author: Francis William Lauderdale Adams

quotes.quote: The sparrows chirped enchanting rhymes in unison, hoisted fine threads of bamboo sticks to their place of dw elling
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: A blue canal the lake's blue bound Breaks at the bamboo bridge; and lo!
quotes.author: William Ernest Henley

quotes.quote: the sparrows chirped enchanting rhymes in unison, hoisted fine threads of bamboo sticks to their place of dw elling
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Lying down the young girl slides into sleeping. Her bamboo comb loosely attached to her hair
quotes.author: Ho Xuan Huong

quotes.quote: Ghostly smoke rises and fades away with a west wind strong in fields of small bamboo grasses and reedy fields.
quotes.author: Yosa Buson

quotes.quote: Dismantling weak foundations of cheap bamboo, tearing apart tin roofs from thatched hay, uprooting tree roots from deep recesses of ground
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: When I drank water in a glass of pure bamboo; the liquid looked glistening and mesmerizing under the sun.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Young bamboo trees -- at Hashimoto, the courtesan, is she still there or not?
quotes.author: Yosa Buson

quotes.quote: I liked the way; in which a plethora of bamboo sticks were used to construct fortified enclosures for dwelling.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: charging them with the highest treason, sweeping them away like piece of dirt, with cheap broomsticks of twined bamboo.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: An evening she had watched the moon made dizzy by the shaking of bamboo leaves, and on many a rainy day the smell of the wet earth.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: If you throw a banana at a wall, there's a small possibility that it will pass through the wall.
quotes.author: Garth Risk Hallberg

quotes.quote: Any ape can reach for a banana, but only humans can reach for the stars.
quotes.author: Vilayanur S. Ramachandran

quotes.quote: Never make eye contact with anyone while eating a banana.
quotes.author: Harry Style

quotes.quote: An old banana leaf was once young and green.
quotes.author: Nigerian Proverb

quotes.quote: Believe it or not, bananas do contain a small quantity of Musa Sapientum bananadine, which is a mild, short-lasting psychedelic.
quotes.author: William Powell

quotes.quote: Where the banana grows man is sensual and cruel.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You never know where to look when eating a banana.
quotes.author: Peter Kay

quotes.quote: You cannot taste me, until you undress me. Sincerely, banana.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Goals are like bananas, they come in bunches.
quotes.author: Brendan Morrison

quotes.quote: If the banana pest doesn't die it will always reach at the ripe banana.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Intellectual property has the shelf life of a banana.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: The weakest part of the banana is its underside. It's better to store them on their belly or hang them on a tree. That's why bananas aren't piled two layers high.
quotes.author: Willie LeHay

quotes.quote: Anything can happen. The great banana peel of existence is always on the floor somewhere.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: No fruit dies so vile and offensive a death as the banana.
quotes.author: Kiran Desai

quotes.quote: Life is full of banana skins. You slip, you carry on.
quotes.author: Daphne Guinness

quotes.quote: The woman who gives birth to a child is like the banana tree that breaks under the weight of its fruit.
quotes.author: Kikuyu Proverb

quotes.quote: On a traffic light green means go and yellow means yield, but on a banana it's just the opposite. Green means hold on, yellow means go ahead, and red means where the hell did you get that banana at.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: If you must eat a banana in public, never make eye contact.
quotes.author: Darynda Jones

quotes.quote: The banana is good for retaining water, and the sugar brings me up. It's going to look like oatmeal when it's done, but it tastes much better.
quotes.author: Helio Castroneves

quotes.quote: Donkey Kong, defender of the world's largest banana horde.
quotes.author: Nick Cramer

quotes.quote: I think I just invented the banana daquiri a couple centuries early.
quotes.author: Steven Moffat

quotes.quote: Bananas are an excellent source of potassium.
quotes.author: Jim Davis

quotes.quote: The tree of your body may be losing a cherry, but it's gaining two plums and a banana!
quotes.author: Mark Ellinger

quotes.quote: Tastes like onions and bananas, but strangely, something else. Pickles?
quotes.author: Ken Koonce

quotes.quote: Don't look now but i think this apes one banana short of a bunch.
quotes.author: Larry Bernard

quotes.quote: Bananas don't float. You said the Orangutan floated to you in a bundle of bananas, but bananas don't float.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: Waking up too early / Maybe we can sleep in / Make you banana pancakes / Pretend like it's the weekend now / And we could pretend it all the time
quotes.author: Jack Johnson

quotes.quote: Bananas are one of the few fruits found in stores everywhere in the world.
quotes.author: Frederic Patenaude

quotes.quote: Banana tress can be grown anywhere that does not experiencing freezing temperatures.
quotes.author: Frederic Patenaude

quotes.quote: Bananas are a good food for those transitioning into a raw-vegan diet because bananas are high in sugar(with some starch), and are both filling and satisfying.
quotes.author: Frederic Patenaude

quotes.quote: Bananas are an excellent source of potassium, as many people know, and of other minerals and nutrients.
quotes.author: Frederic Patenaude

quotes.quote: The question of how it is possible for banana plants to multiply is answered very simply: by cloning.
quotes.author: Lorna Piatti-Farnell

quotes.quote: Bananas reproduce through a grafting system where parts of the banana plant are replanted to grow thousands of new one.
quotes.author: Lorna Piatti-Farnell

quotes.quote: Every banana is exactly the same as the next, with the same taste, the same texture, the same color and the virtually the same size.
quotes.author: Lorna Piatti-Farnell

quotes.quote: Every banana is a clone of itself.
quotes.author: Lorna Piatti-Farnell

quotes.quote: The cloning process grants the banana the ability to please the consumer with the same experience every time.
quotes.author: Lorna Piatti-Farnell

quotes.quote: In the early 1900's, British colonial policies transformed Jamaica into the major supplier of bananas to Britain, the largest market in Europe.
quotes.author: Duke University Press

quotes.quote: Banana isn't technically a tree, it actually has no trunk.
quotes.author: Dan Koeppel

quotes.quote: The proper term for banana's central support is a pseudo stem.
quotes.author: Dan Koeppel

quotes.quote: A typical Indian market sells dozens of banana types, including the country's favorite, Mysore, best described as a sweet and sour banana.
quotes.author: Dan Koeppel

quotes.quote: Peeling and eating the fruit is just the beginning of Indian banana cuisine.
quotes.author: Dan Koeppel

quotes.quote: Bananas are used it curries and stews; banana leaves are used as plates in many parts of the country.
quotes.author: Dan Koeppel

quotes.quote: Banana is an antique fruit crop of the world is known as 'Apple of the Paradise' and botanically named as Musa Paradisiaca.
quotes.author: T. Radha

quotes.quote: Banana is the staple food in Uganda, Bukoba and Tanzania.
quotes.author: T. Radha

quotes.quote: Banana is the most important traded tropical fruit.
quotes.author: T. Radha

quotes.quote: Banana was introduced to East Africa even before Christ and to the Mediterranean region about 650 AD.
quotes.author: T. Radha

quotes.quote: Banana is the most nourishing fruit, contains vitamins and minerals, and has several medicinal properties.
quotes.author: T. Radha

quotes.quote: Banana puree or mashed bananas are, at present, the highest volume processed banana product.
quotes.author: Laszlo Somogyi

quotes.quote: The banana is a berry originally containing numerous hard seeds and historians speculate that its root was the edible portion.
quotes.author: Marilyn Rittenhouse Harris

quotes.quote: Banana has been cultivated for at least 10,000-15,000 years.
quotes.author: Marilyn Rittenhouse Harris

quotes.quote: Early man propagated the species to give more fruit and less seeds, hence the seedless banana.
quotes.author: Marilyn Rittenhouse Harris

quotes.quote: From its origin in the Asian tropics, the Arabs carries the banana to Africa and to the Canary Islands, from which the Portuguese or Spanish took it to the New World.
quotes.author: Marilyn Rittenhouse Harris

quotes.quote: The banana has captured the imagination of man throughout history in legends, religious practices, and music.
quotes.author: Marilyn Rittenhouse Harris

quotes.quote: The conventional technique for making dried banana chips is to use unripe fruit having a solid texture and sugar.
quotes.author: Jasper Woodroof

quotes.quote: I have always been afraid of banks.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: If Congress has the right under the constitution to issue paper money, it was given them to be used by themselves, not to be delegated to individuals or corporations.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: We use Halloween to scare the kids and bankers to scare the adults.
quotes.author: Anthony T Hincks

quotes.quote: When the paper money goes the banks will become the gods of man.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: The greedy loathe wars, but not as much as they love profit.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: You don't make money from peace. You make money from wars!
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: What is robbing a bank compared with founding a bank?
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: It is easier to rob by setting up a bank than by holding up a bank clerk.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: I do not think you can trust bankers to control themselves. They are like heroin addicts.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: Every day is a bank account, and time is our currency. No one is rich, no one is poor, we've got 24 hours each.
quotes.author: Christopher Rice

quotes.quote: Bank failures are caused by depositors who don't deposit enough money to cover losses due to mismanagement.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: The fear among bankers is that there’s this guy out there, and he can do whatever he wants, and nobody can stop him, I would be afraid too if I were a bank.
quotes.author: Dick Bove

quotes.quote: Nobody knows banking better than I do.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Drive in banks were established so most of the cars today could see their real owners.
quotes.author: E. Joseph Cossman

quotes.quote: Under pressure, people admit to murder, setting fire to the village church, or robbing a bank, but never to being bores.
quotes.author: Elsa Maxwell

quotes.quote: Good Banking is produced not by good laws, but by good bankers.
quotes.author: Hartley Withers

quotes.quote: I hate banks. They do nothing positive for anybody except take care of themselves. They're first in with their fees and first out when there’s trouble.
quotes.author: Harvey Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Advances in digital banking will not eliminate the branch, they will allow for more creative ways to help clients achieve financial well being.
quotes.author: Hendrith Vanlon Smith

quotes.quote: It is well enough that people of the nation do not understand our banking and monetary system, for if they did, I believe there would be a revolution before tomorrow morning.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Most people find a disorientating mismatch between the long-term nature of their liabilities and the increasingly short-term nature of their assets.
quotes.author: Howard Davies

quotes.quote: Banks are an almost irresistible attraction for that element of our society which seeks unearned money.
quotes.author: J. Edgar Hoover

quotes.quote: Good bankers, like good tea, can only be appreciated when they are in hot water.
quotes.author: Jaffar Hussein

quotes.quote: Because bankers measure their self-worth in money, and pay themselves a lot of it, they think they're fine fellows and don't need to explain themselves.
quotes.author: James Buchan

quotes.quote: I hesitate to deposit money in a bank. I am afraid I shall never dare to take it out again. When you go to confession and entrust your sins to the safe-keeping of the priest, do you ever come back for them?
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Always be nice to bankers. Always be nice to pension fund managers. Always be nice to the media. In that order.
quotes.author: John Gotti

quotes.quote: The process by which banks create money is so simple that the mind is repelled.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: The sound banker, alas! is not one who foresees danger and avoids it, but one who, when he is ruined, is ruined in a conventional and orthodox way along with his fellows, so that no one can really blame him.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: Banks do not create money for the public good. They are businesses owned by private shareholders. Their purpose is to make a profit.
quotes.author: John Rogers

quotes.quote: We're sorry. It's not us. It's the monster. The bank isn't a man. The bank isn't like a man. Yes, but the bank is only made of men.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: The bank, the monster has to have profits all the time. It can't wait. It'll die. No, taxes go on. When the monster stops growing, it dies. It can't stay one size.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: The issue which has swept down the centuries and which will have to be fought sooner or later is the people vs. the banks.
quotes.author: Lord Acton

quotes.quote: With a group of bankers I always had the feeling that success was measured by the extent one gave nothing away.
quotes.author: Lord Longford

quotes.quote: A banker is a fellow who lends you his umbrella when the sun is shining but wants it back the minute it begins to rain.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Central banks don't have divine wisdom. They try to do the best analysis they can and must be prepared to stand or fall by the quality of that analysis.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: No one has a greater asset for his business than a man’s pride in his work.
quotes.author: Mary Parker Follet

quotes.quote: So I went to the bank and proposed that they lend money to the poor people. The bankers almost fell over.
quotes.author: Muhammad Yunus

quotes.quote: Today, if you look at financial systems around the globe, more than half the population of the world out of six billion people, more than three billion. Do not qualify to take out a loan from a bank. This is a shame.
quotes.author: Muhammad Yunus

quotes.quote: They explained to me that the bank cannot lend money to poor people because these people are not creditworthy.
quotes.author: Muhammad Yunus

quotes.quote: The only thing useful banks have invented in 20 years is the ATM.
quotes.author: Paul Volcker

quotes.quote: I don't have a bank account, because I don't know my mothers maiden name.
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.quote: Anytime three New Yorkers get into a cab without an argument, a bank has just been robbed.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: The rich rule over the poor and the borrower is slave to the lender.
quotes.author: Proverbs 22:7

quotes.quote: Those who think banks and governments are making them poor haven't seen the whole picture. Poverty is the act of trusting their system.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: And I sincerely believe, with you, that banking establishments are more dangerous than standing armies, and that the principle of spending money to be paid by posterity, under the name of funding, is but swindling futurity on a large scale.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Being a [bank] director is like being a pilot of an aircraft, it’s years of boredom and seconds of terror
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Adventure is the life of commerce, but caution, I had almost said timidity, is the life of banking.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: Banking is very good business if you don't do anything dumb.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: There are two things that can disrupt business in this country. One is War, and the other is a meeting of the Federal Reserve Bank.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: If only God would give me some clear sign! Like making a large deposit in my name at a Swiss bank.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: A bank is a place where they lend you an umbrella in fair weather and ask for it back when it begins to rain.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Your bank account can be overdrawn, but it can never be overfilled.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: The bank hath benefit of interest on all moneys which it creates out of nothing.
quotes.author: William Paterson

quotes.quote: It is not by augmenting the capital of the country, but by rendering a greater part of that capital active and productive than would otherwise be so, that the most judicious operations of banking can increase the industry of the country.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: Banking is a branch of the information business.
quotes.author: Walter Wriston

quotes.quote: Food banking as well as other antihunger programs do a good job of managing poverty by alleviating its worst symptom, hunger.
quotes.author: Mark Winne

quotes.quote: At its core, banking is not simply about profit, but about personal relationships.
quotes.author: Felix Rohatyn

quotes.quote: Investment banking is not a business; it is a personal service where bankers work hand in hand with their clients. And it is a service that must not simply be about making bigger and bigger deals that reap rewards for only a small group of executives.
quotes.author: Felix Rohatyn

quotes.quote: The art of banking is always to balance the risk of a run with the reward of a profit. The tantalizing factor in the equation is that riskier borrowers pay higher interest rates. Ultimate safety a strongbox full of currency would avail the banker nothing. Maximum risk a portfolio of loans to prospective bankrupts at usurious interest rates would invite disaster. A good banker safely and profitably treads the middle ground.
quotes.author: James Grant

quotes.quote: In central banking as in diplomacy, style, conservative tailoring, and an easy association with the affluent count greatly and results far much less.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: The modern banking system manufactures money out of nothing.
quotes.author: Josiah Stamp

quotes.quote: This is the twilight of the banks. It would be a more cheerful spectacle if we could envision the dawn of the institutions that will replace them.
quotes.author: Martin Mayer

quotes.quote: Banking is a very treacherous business because you don't realize it is risky until it is too late. It is like calm waters that deliver huge storms.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: A bank is a place where they lend you an umbrella in fair weather and ask for it back when it begins to rain.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: There's more honor in investment management than in investment banking.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: The large banking interests were deeply interested in the World War because of the wide opportunities for large profits.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: Good banking is produced not by good laws, but by good bankers.
quotes.author: Hartley Withers

quotes.quote: A banking system is an act of faith: it survives only for as long as people believe it will.
quotes.author: Michael Lewis

quotes.quote: Because bankers measure their self-worth in money, and pay themselves a lot of it, they think they're fine fellows and don't need to explain themselves.
quotes.author: James Buchan

quotes.quote: Investment banking fees are geared towards success.
quotes.author: John Williams

quotes.quote: Banking may well be a career from which no man really recovers.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Banking establishments are more dangerous than standing armies.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: There's a way of transferring funds that is even faster than electronic banking. It's called marriage.
quotes.author: James Holt McGavran

quotes.quote: Drive-in banks were established so most of the cars today could see their real owners.
quotes.author: E. Joseph Cossman

quotes.quote: Banking technology has made it simple and efficient to invest in good causes.
quotes.author: Mark Skousen

quotes.quote: Banking is very good business if you don't do anything dumb.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Adventure is the life of commerce, but caution is the life of banking.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: Banks are fundamentally different from manufacturing companies. For one, the raw material and finished products for all banks are the same - money.
quotes.author: Saurabh Mukherjea

quotes.quote: Given their central role in a country's economy, banks are also heavily regulated by the government and the central bank.
quotes.author: Saurabh Mukherjea

quotes.quote: Being a bank director is like being a pilot of an aircraft. It's years of boredom and seconds of terror.
quotes.author: Moira Johnston

quotes.quote: When you're in a commodity business, the only way to thrive is to be a low-cost producer. And when you're selling money, you're in a commodity business.
quotes.author: Duff Mcdonald

quotes.quote: In financial services, if you want to be the best in the industry, you first have to be the best in risk management and credit quality. It's the foundation for every other measure of success. There's almost no room for error.
quotes.author: John Stumpf

quotes.quote: Banks fail in the vast majority of cases because their managements seek growth at all costs, reach for profits without due regard to risk, give privileged treatment to insiders, or gamble on the future course of interest rates. Some simply have dishonest management that loots the bank.
quotes.author: Irvine H. Sprague

quotes.quote: Deposit insurance has proved to be the crack cocaine of American finance.
quotes.author: Martin Mayer

quotes.quote: The goal is not only to earn high returns at the top of the cycle but also to avoid giving them back at the bottom.
quotes.author: Duff Mcdonald

quotes.quote: It's not just whether you tell the truth. It's whether you even shave the truth.
quotes.author: Daniel Tully

quotes.quote: It is nowhere written that banks cannot fail
quotes.author: Louis Schirano

quotes.quote: Every banker knows that if he has to prove he is worthy of credit, in fact his credit is gone.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: I sincerely believe that banking establishments are more dangerous than standing armies, and that the principle of spending money to be paid by posterity, under the name of funding, is but swindling futurity on a large scale.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Everyday is a bank account, and time is our currency. No one is rich, no one is poor, we've got 24 hours each.
quotes.author: Christopher Rice

quotes.quote: It is well enough that people of the nation do not understand our banking and monetary system, for if they did, I believe there would be a revolution before tomorrow morning.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Got no checkbooks/Got no banks/Still I'd like to express my thanks/I got the sun in the morning and the moon at night.
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: The best way to rob a bank is to own one.
quotes.author: William K. Black

quotes.quote: Banks are the temples of America. This is a holy war. Our economy is our religion.
quotes.author: Giannina Braschi

quotes.quote: What kind of a crime is the robbing of a bank, compared to the founding of a bank?
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: Baptism is rich in meaning. It suggests cleansing. When you are a disciple, you understand that you are cleansed by Christ. You understand that Christ died in your place on the cross, paying for your sins, fully forgiving you for all your wrongs. You are cleansed from guilt, and you are becoming a cleaner, healthier, more whole person.
quotes.author: Brian McLaren

quotes.quote: Baptism was to put a line of demarcation between your past sins when you are buried with Him by Baptism-you are burying your past sins-eradicating them-putting a line in the sand saying that old man is dead and he is no longer alive any more and I rise up to walk in the newness of life.
quotes.author: T D Jakes

quotes.quote: A man who knows that he is saved by believing in Christ does not, when he is baptized, lift his baptism into a saving ordinance. In fact, he is the very best protester against that mistake, because he holds that he has no right to be baptized until he is saved.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Prominent Christians in Constantine's time waited to be baptized until their deathbeds lest they commit a "major"sin that couldn't be forgiven of those already baptized. Others felt anyone who did anything to avoid martyrdom were apostates had no valid subsequent ministry.
quotes.author: Thomas F. Madden

quotes.quote: To the lover of the Lord Jesus Christ there can be nothing legal about baptism. It is simply the glad expression of a grateful heart recognizing its identity with Christ in death, burial, and resurrection. Many of us look back to the moment when we were thus baptized as one of the most precious experiences we have ever known.
quotes.author: Henry Allen Ironside

quotes.quote: When we were baptized we took upon us not only the name of Christ, but also the law of obedience.
quotes.author: Robert D. Hales

quotes.quote: Baptism with water is the sign and seal of baptism with the Spirit, as much as it is of the forgiveness of sins. Water-baptism is the initiatory Christian rite, because Spirit-baptism is the initiatory Christian experience.
quotes.author: John Stott

quotes.quote: Baptism is not the work of man but of Christ, and this sacrament is so holy that it would not be defiled, even if the minister were a murderer.
quotes.author: St. Isidore

quotes.quote: I called it a baptism in flaming ink that forced me to shed my shyness about recognizing myself as a poet and to accept the fact that life had never given me any choice in the matter. And then I had to discover exactly what that meant.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: Baptism in the Holy Spirit belongs to them that believe and are not of this world.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: We bring them Lord, in thankful hands, And yielding them up to Thee; Joyful that we ourselves are Thine, Thine let our off-spring be.
quotes.author: John H. Gower

quotes.quote: Baptism is the initial step of a faithful heart.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Indeed, baptism is a vow, a sacred vow of the believer to follow Christ. Just as a wedding celebrates the fusion of two hearts, baptism celebrates the union of sinner with Savior.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: The full benefit of forgiveness of sin through the Savior's Atonement begins with repentance and baptism and then expands upon receiving the Holy Ghost.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: The word baptism means derailment. Christ baptizes Peter on the rock when he tells him: "Because you confessed your love for me, your life is no longer your own. Before you said this, you fastened your belt and you walked wherever you liked. Now, others will put a belt around you and take you where you would rather not go." To submit to love is to be baptized, that is, to let one's life be forever interrupted. To not let one's life be interrupted is to say no to love.
quotes.author: Ronald Rolheiser

quotes.quote: For that purpose Christ instituted holy baptism, thereby to clothe you with his righteousness. It is tantamount to his saying, My righteousness shall be your righteousness; my innocence, your innocence. Your sins indeed are great, but by baptism I bestow on you my righteousness; I strip death from you and clothe you with my life.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: All of us who desire the kingdom of God are, by the Lord's decree, under an equal and rigorous necessity of seeking after the grace of Baptism.
quotes.author: Saint Basil

quotes.quote: Baptism is not only a sacrament of our union with Christ; it is also a sacrament of our communion as the body of Christ.
quotes.author: Michael Horton

quotes.quote: Baptism is the sacrament of allegiance of them that are to be received into the Kingdom of God, that is to say, into Eternal life, that is to say, to Remission of Sin. For as Eternal life was lost by the committing, so it is recovered by the remitting of men's sins.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: In baptism, new Christians become part of a body of fellow believers who are called to spiritually encourage one another and hold one another responsible for consistent Christian living.
quotes.author: Tony Compolo

quotes.quote: Baptism is the gate through which all must enter to accomplish the Lord's desire to bring to pass the immortality and eternal life of man.
quotes.author: Bruce R. McConkie

quotes.quote: If you accept the belief that baptism incorporates us in the mystical body of Christ, into the divine DNA, then you might say that the Holy Spirit is present in each of us, and thus we have the capacity for the fullness of redemption, of transformation.
quotes.author: Thomas Keating

quotes.quote: The Church does not dispense the sacrament of baptism in order to acquire for herself an increase in membership but in order to consecrate a human being to God and to communicate to that person the divine gift of birth from God.
quotes.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar
