quotes.quote: The Lord will bless us with more baptisms if you make sure the ones you have are going to keep their commitments. The Lord will not prepare more people for baptism if we are not converting the ones we have.
quotes.author: Richard G. Scott

quotes.quote: Baptism, then, is not what produces salvation. It 'saves' in that it reflects a heart decision: a pledge of loyalty to the risen Savior. In effect, baptism in New Testament theology is a loyalty oath, a public avowal of who is on the Lord's side in the cosmic war between good and evil. ... Early baptismal formulas included a renunciation of Satan and his angels for this very reason. Baptism was and still is spiritual warfare.
quotes.author: Michael S. Heiser

quotes.quote: Even before baptism, a child or an adult can have the Holy Ghost testify to their hearts of sacred truth. They must act on that testimony to retain it, but it will guide them toward goodness.
quotes.author: Henry B Eyring

quotes.quote: Bishop Hostettler explained that baptism was not the means by which one is saved, but simply an outward sign of salvation. Just as an Amishman's beard is an indication of his marriage and commitment to his wife, so baptism symbolizes our covenant with Christ.
quotes.author: J.E.B. Spredemann

quotes.quote: Baptism is not to be conferred on a man who is unwilling to give up his other sins, so neither should Baptism be given to one who is unwilling to renounce his unbelief. Nevertheless, each of them receives the Sacrament if it is conferred on him, although not unto salvation.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Baptism is an outward expression of an inward faith.
quotes.author: Watchman Nee

quotes.quote: Every child born into the world is a new thought of God, an ever fresh and radiant possibility.
quotes.author: Kate Douglas Wiggins

quotes.quote: Based or our baptism, all are called to a mystical life, to communion with God. We need to claim that, to taste it and feel it, to trust that the deeper we live this communion, the more our behavior will witness to the truth.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: Besides the physical ordinance of baptism and the laying on of hands, one must be spiritually born again to gain exaltation and eternal life.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: Although among heretics and schismatics there is the same Baptism, nevertheless, the remission of sins is not operative among them because of the very rottenness of discord and wickedness of dissension ... Baptism was in them, but it did not profit them outside the Church ... Outside the Church, Baptism works death because of discord.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Baptism is the door of the spiritual life and the gateway to the sacraments.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Baptism has always been a compound act absorbing cultural patterns into itself: it has taken on definite shape in various cultures, shaping those cultures in turn.
quotes.author: Aidan Kavanagh

quotes.quote: Barbershop. It's in their interests to find alternate vehicles to promote the shows.
quotes.author: Rob Bennett

quotes.quote: Being a barber is about taking care of the people.
quotes.author: Anthony Hamilton

quotes.quote: Barbershop is not a hobby, it's a lifestyle.
quotes.author: Harvey Feldman

quotes.quote: Doing barbershop has made us all better singers. When we hit just the right chord together, there's no better feeling.
quotes.author: Jonny Moroni

quotes.quote: Beware of the young doctor and the old barber.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: No barber shaves so close but another finds worke.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: You might be a redneck if you need an estimate from your barber before you get a haircut.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: There is no bad day that can't be overcome by listening to a barbershop quartet. This is just truth, plain and simple.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: If you keep walking past the barbers, eventually you'll get a haircut.
quotes.author: Paul Merson

quotes.quote: You don't ever ask a barber whether you need a haircut.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: There's things people say in the barbershop they won't even say in their own living room, because it's just one of those zones where nobody's going to judge you too much about your dumb opinion.
quotes.author: Ice Cube

quotes.quote: Your barber always knows everything that goes on in the town, doesn't he?
quotes.author: Adam Peaty

quotes.quote: This is a barbershop, not a hair salon. You come in here not trying to impress anyone. It's a place just to talk, to hang out with the fellows, talk about sports, women, relationships.
quotes.author: Joe Davis

quotes.quote: No matter what barbershop you go to, there's always that guy who's just hanging around and doesn't do much, but knows everything that's going on in the community.
quotes.author: Deon Cole

quotes.quote: Your services might be as useful as a barbershop on the steps of a guillotine.
quotes.author: Rowan Atkinson

quotes.quote: A barber lathers a man before he shaves him.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: To make a fine gentleman, several trades are required, but chiefly a barber.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Barbershop conversations are irrefutable proof that heads exist for the sake of hair.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: All the barbershops and funeral-homes were open and the customers were coming and the business was doing great.
quotes.author: Regina Spektor

quotes.quote: I'm always at the top of barbershop gossip.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Whatever you hear at the barber shop, stays at the barber shop.
quotes.author: Bernie Mac

quotes.quote: When you go into your customary barber shop, you will wait for the man who gives you a little better shave, a little trimmer hair-cut. Business leaders are looking for the same things in their offices that you look for in the barber shop.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schwab

quotes.quote: I don't have any beauty shop memories. I remember the barber shop.
quotes.author: Jenifer Lewis

quotes.quote: Bartenders want to give you good service, but they also want to give everyone a good service. If the bar is slow, then the bartender will be able to spend more time with you.
quotes.author: Cheryl Charming

quotes.quote: A good bartender has to be part philosopher, part psychiatrist, part psychic.
quotes.author: Al the Bartender

quotes.quote: No one ever made history in the living room. And without a bartender, who at home are you going to tell your troubles to? Your dog?
quotes.author: Steven Kates

quotes.quote: A professional bartender is someone who can do his or her best work when he or she doesn't feel like it.
quotes.author: Bruce Tomlinson

quotes.quote: By the time a bartender knows what drink a man will have before he orders, there is little else about him worth knowing.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: A theory that you can't explain to a bartender is probably no damn good.
quotes.author: Ernest Rutherford

quotes.quote: A bartender is just a pharmacist with a limited inventory.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I like the sound the glass makes when the bartender puts on the counter. I like the way it feels in my hand. I bring it in close, and I can smell it, and a wave of release goes through my body even before I take the first sip.
quotes.author: Rude Awakening

quotes.quote: An American goes into an Irish pub. He said to the bartender, 'Whiskey and ice.' The bartender said, 'There's no ice.' The American said, 'I'll have water.' He said, 'You can't. The water's frozen.'
quotes.author: Hal Roach

quotes.quote: Is it true,' asked the customer 'that alcohol makes people able to do things better?' 'No,' replied the bartender, 'it just makes them less ashamed of doing them badly.
quotes.author: Ray Foley

quotes.quote: The difference between a rich drunk and a poor one is that a rich one tells his problems to a psychiatrist and a poor one tells his to a bartender.
quotes.author: Ray Foley

quotes.quote: People tend to talk openly to bartenders.
quotes.author: Johnny Welsh

quotes.quote: The professional bartender has the convenience of a daily fresh produce delivery to the restaurant or bar room door.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Morgenthaler

quotes.quote: There's a myth out there that chilling citrus will reduce the yield of juice, so some bartenders leave it on the counter, but you can trust me when I tell you that this is a load of bull.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Morgenthaler

quotes.quote: A bartender can't be made overnight, though, and a headful of recipes and facts will get you only so far.
quotes.author: Ray Foley

quotes.quote: That's the magic of being a bartender— the sleight of hand at play, to hide all the work and serve up all the pleasure.
quotes.author: Jim Meehan

quotes.quote: Bartenders want to give you good service, but they also want to give everyone a good service. If the bar is slow, then the bartender will be able to spend more time with you.
quotes.author: Angus Winchester

quotes.quote: Bartenders and contemporary cocktail historians must be more transparent about our formulas and practices, in order to preserve them for generations to come.
quotes.author: Jim Meehan

quotes.quote: Bartenders recognize through practice what liquid increments look like in a standard mixing glass.
quotes.author: Dave Arnold

quotes.quote: For the bartender, the weight of the finished beverage isn't important but the volume is.
quotes.author: Dave Arnold

quotes.quote: You know you have a drinking problem when the bartender knows your name — and you’ve never been to that bar before…
quotes.author: Zach Galifianakis

quotes.quote: A good writer is not, per se, a good book critic. No more so than a good drunk is automatically a good bartender…
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.quote: I was a bartender for four years, and that was the best training that I had for learning how to approach people.
quotes.author: Maggie Haberman

quotes.quote: The greatest accomplishment of a bartender lies in his ability to exactly suit his customer.
quotes.author: Harry Gordon Johnson

quotes.quote: If I go / Before I'm old / Oh, brother of mine / Please don't forget me if I go / Bartender, please / Fill my glass for me / With the wine you gave Jesus that set him free / After three days in the ground.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Baseball is like church. Many attend, few understand.
quotes.author: Leo Durocher

quotes.quote: I do what I've trained my whole life to do. I watch the ball. I keep my eye on the ball. I never stop watching. I watch it as it sails past me and lands in the catcher's mitt, a perfect and glorious strike three.
quotes.author: Barry Lyga

quotes.quote: Baseball is a game with a lot of waiting in it; it is a game with increasingly heightened anticipation of increasingly limited action.
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: Oh, to be a center fielder, a center fielder- and nothing more.
quotes.author: Philip Roth

quotes.quote: Baseball is the only field of endeavor where a man can succeed three times out of ten and be considered a good performer.
quotes.author: Ted Williams

quotes.quote: You gotta be a man to play baseball for a living, but you gotta have a lot of little boy in you, too.
quotes.author: Roy Campanella

quotes.quote: No game in the world is as tidy and dramatically neat as baseball, with cause and effect, crime and punishment, motive and result, so cleanly defined.
quotes.author: Paul Gallico

quotes.quote: A baseball game is simply a nervous breakdown divided into nine innings.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: I have observed that baseball is not unlike war, and when you get right down to it, we batters are the heavy artillery.
quotes.author: Ty Cobb

quotes.quote: Baseball is the only major sport that appears backwards in a mirror.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Baseball is a team game but, at the same time, it's a very lonely game: unlike in soccer or basketball, where players roam around, in baseball everyone has their little plot of the field to tend. When the action comes to you, the spotlight is on you but no one can help you.
quotes.author: Chad Harbach

quotes.quote: The thing I like about baseball is that it's one-on-one. You stand up there alone, and if you make a mistake, it's your mistake. If you hit a home run, it's your home run.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.quote: Baseball is a game where a curve is an optical illusion, a screwball can be a pitch or a person, stealing is legal and you can spit anywhere you like except in the umpire's eye or on the ball.
quotes.author: James Patrick Murray

quotes.quote: Baseball is 90 percent mental and the other half is physical.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: In baseball, you can't kill the clock. You've got to give the other man his chance. That's why this is the greatest game.
quotes.author: Earl Weaver

quotes.quote: The crack of the bat, the sound of baseballs thumping into gloves, the infield chatter are like birdsong to the baseball starved.
quotes.author: W. P. Kinsella

quotes.quote: Catching a fly ball is a pleasure, but knowing what to do with it after you catch it is a business.
quotes.author: Tommy Henrich

quotes.quote: A pitcher has to look at the hitter as his mortal enemy.
quotes.author: Early Wynn

quotes.quote: Baseball is like driving, it's the one who gets home safely that counts.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: Playing baseball for a living is like having a license to steal.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: I throw the ball ninety-two miles an hour, but they hit it back just as hard.
quotes.author: Joaquin Andujar

quotes.quote: Guessing what the pitcher is going to throw is eighty percent of being a successful hitter. The other twenty percent is just execution.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.quote: Baseball is a game, yes. It is also a business. But what it most truly is, is disguised combat. For all its gentility, its almost leisurely pace, baseball is violence under wraps.
quotes.author: Willie Mays

quotes.quote: After I hit a home run I had a habit of running the bases with my head down. I figured the pitcher already felt bad enough without me showing him up rounding the bases.
quotes.author: Mickey Mantle

quotes.quote: I never blame myself when I'm not hitting. I just blame the bat and if it keeps up, I change bats.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: The pitcher has got only a ball. I've got a bat. So the percentage in weapons is in my favor and I let the fellow with the ball do the fretting.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.quote: Baseball is drama with an endless run and an ever-changing cast.
quotes.author: Joe Garagiola

quotes.quote: Baseball is the only sport I know that when you're on offense, the other team controls the ball.
quotes.author: Ken Harrelson

quotes.quote: Baseball is almost the only orderly thing in a very unorderly world. If you get three strikes, even the best lawyer in the world can't get you off.
quotes.author: Bill Veeck

quotes.quote: Baseball is a man maker.
quotes.author: Al Spalding

quotes.quote: The formula for success is simple practice and concentration then more practice and more concentration.
quotes.author: Babe Didrikson Zaharias

quotes.quote: Never allow the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Baseball was, is, and always will be to me the best game in the world.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Don't let the fear of striking out hold you back.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.quote: You could be a kid for as long as you want when you play baseball.
quotes.author: Cal Ripken

quotes.quote: Baseball was different. Schwartz thought of it as Homeric – not a scrum but a series of isolated contests. Batter versus pitcher, fielder versus ball. You couldn’t storm around, snorting and slapping people, the way Schwartz did while playing football.You stood and waited and tried to still your mind. When your moment came, you had to be ready.
quotes.author: Chad Harbach

quotes.quote: Baseball is a lot like life. It's a day-to-day existence, full of ups and downs. You make the most of your opportunities in baseball as you do in life.
quotes.author: Ernie Harwell

quotes.quote: Close doesn't count in baseball. Close only counts in horseshoes and grenades.
quotes.author: Frank Robinson

quotes.quote: Baseball is like a poker game. Nobody wants to quit when he's losing nobody wants you to quit when you're ahead.
quotes.author: Jackie Robinson

quotes.quote: One of the beautiful things about baseball is the history.
quotes.author: James Anthony Abbott

quotes.quote: Never save a pitcher for tomorrow. Tomorrow it may rain.
quotes.author: Leo Durocher

quotes.quote: It's unbelievable how much you don't know about the game you've been playing your whole life.
quotes.author: Mickey Mantle

quotes.quote: Nothing's ever been as fun as baseball.
quotes.author: Mickey Mantle

quotes.quote: I'd be willing to bet you, if I was a betting man, that I have never bet on baseball.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: You owe it to yourself to be the best you can possibly be in baseball and in life.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: A hitter's impatience is the pitcher's biggest advantage.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: If my uniform doesn't get dirty, I haven't done anything in the baseball game.
quotes.author: Rickey Henderson

quotes.quote: Poets are like baseball pitchers. Both have their moments. The intervals are the tough things.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: I am convinced that God wanted me to be a baseball player.
quotes.author: Roberto Clemente

quotes.quote: You may glory in a team triumphant, but you fall in love with a team in defeat. Losing after great striving is the story of a man, who was born to sorrow, whose sweetest songs tell of saddest thought, and who, if he is a hero, does nothing in life as becomingly as leaving it.
quotes.author: Roger Kahn

quotes.quote: People ask me what I do in the winter when there's no baseball. I'll tell you what I do. I stare out the window and wait for spring.
quotes.author: Rogers Hornsby

quotes.quote: I became a good pitcher when I stopped trying to make them miss the ball and started trying to make them hit it.
quotes.author: Sandy Koufax

quotes.quote: Baseball is also a game of balance.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: There are three types of baseball players: those who make it happen, those who watch it happen, and those who wonder what happened.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: Remember these two things play hard and have fun.
quotes.author: Tony Gwynn

quotes.quote: Baseball was 100% of my life.
quotes.author: Ty Cobb

quotes.quote: They give you a round bat, and they throw you a round ball, and then they tell you to hit it square.
quotes.author: Willie Stargell

quotes.quote: When you start the game, they don't say 'Work Ball!' They say, Play ball.
quotes.author: Willie Stargell

quotes.quote: Love is the most important thing in the world, but baseball is pretty good, too.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Little League baseball is a very good thing because it keeps the parents off the streets.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: The game of baseball isn't over until it's over.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Basketball doesn't build character it reveals it.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Basketball is like photography, if you don't focus, all you have is the negative.
quotes.author: Dan Frisby

quotes.quote: Basketball is like war in that offensive weapons are developed first, and it always takes a while for the defense to catch up.
quotes.author: Red Auerbach

quotes.quote: Basketball is a full court game, so every drill must be done full court.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: Basketball is a beautiful game when the five players on the court play with one heartbeat.
quotes.author: Dean Smith

quotes.quote: Basketball isn't a game; It's an art form. You master the fundamentals so you can forget 'em, so you can improvise and just concentrate on what really matters: getting buckets.
quotes.author: Kyrie Irving

quotes.quote: Basketball is a simple game. Your goal is penetration, get the ball close to the basket, and there are three ways to do that. Pass, dribble and offensive rebound.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: Basketball is the second most exciting indoor sport , and the other one shouldn't have spectators.
quotes.author: Dick Vertlieb

quotes.quote: A basketball team is like the five fingers on your hand. If you can get them all together, you have a fist. That's how I want you to play.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: Basketball is a game that gives you every chance to be great, and puts every pressure on you to prove that you haven't got what it takes. It never takes away the chance, and it never eases up on the pressure.
quotes.author: Bob Sundvold

quotes.quote: Basketball, more than any other sport, is a team game about the thousands of small, unselfish acts, the sacrifices on the part of the players that result in team building.
quotes.author: Dean Smith

quotes.quote: The game of basketball is a game of accepting failure; of accepting imperfection; of realizing that the perfect game has never been played, never will be played, or ever could be played.
quotes.author: Tony Alfonso

quotes.quote: Basketball doesn't care what color your skin is. It doesn't care what language you speak or what religion you practice. It doesn't care if you're big or small, fast or slow. It just asks you to play, to compete, to lose with dignity, to win with humility.
quotes.author: Jim Calhoun

quotes.quote: Practice habits were crucial to my development in basketball. I didn't play against the toughest competition in high school, but one reason I was able to do well in college was that I mastered the fundamentals. You've got to have them down before you can even think about playing.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.quote: Remember that basketball is a game of habits. If you make the other guy deviate from his habits, you've got him.
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.quote: I just love the game of basketball so much. The game! I don't need the 18,000 people screaming and all the peripheral things. To me, the most enjoyable part is the practice and preparation.
quotes.author: Bob Knight

quotes.quote: Good basketball always starts with good defense!
quotes.author: Bob Knight

quotes.quote: Basketball is a team game. But that doesn't mean all five players should take the same amount of shots
quotes.author: Dean Smith

quotes.quote: A key basketball skill is imagery. The best players see situations before they happen so they can be prepared.
quotes.author: Dr. Jack Ramsay

quotes.quote: Basketball is a sport that involves the subtle interweaving of players at full speed to the point where they are thinking and moving as one.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: Basketball is not an equal opportunity game. If you can't shoot it well, you don't get to shoot.
quotes.author: Bob Donewald

quotes.quote: Basketball is a game of sacrificing yourself for the next guy, being a team that takes good shots, and taking the right shots.
quotes.author: David Blatt

quotes.quote: The fundamentals of the game are the same wherever you go: pass, dribble, shoot, defend, rebound, screen, play hard and together.
quotes.author: Terry Stotts

quotes.quote: In basketball, the mental is to the physical as four is to one.
quotes.author: Bob Knight

quotes.quote: The most important thing in basketball: BE A TEAM.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Basketball is not played simply with X's and O's. It's played with both trust and confidence.
quotes.author: Isiah Thomas

quotes.quote: Basketball, a game which won't be fit for people until they set the basket umbilicus-high and return the giraffes to the zoo.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Basketball is the MTV of sports.
quotes.author: Sara Levinson

quotes.quote: Basketball can serve as a kind of metaphor for ultimate cooperation. It is a sport where success, as symbolized by the championship, requires that the dictates of community prevail over selfish impulses.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.quote: If you're playing basketball with someone who's better than you, you have to get better or else it's no fun.
quotes.author: Jason Behr

quotes.quote: The two ingredients in success in basketball are playing hard and playing intelligently.
quotes.author: Pete Carill

quotes.quote: Guitar is for the head, drums are for the chest, but bass gets you in the groin.
quotes.author: Suzi Quatro

quotes.quote: In life's orchestra, the bike is the double bass. Hard to forget it
quotes.author: Paul Fournel

quotes.quote: Bass guitar is the engine of the band.
quotes.author: Suzi Quatro

quotes.quote: The bass, no matter what kind of music you're playing, it just enhances the sound and makes everything sound more beautiful and full. When the bass stops, the bottom kind of drops out of everything.
quotes.author: Charlie Haden

quotes.quote: The bass is the link between harmony and rhythm. It is the foundation of a band. It is what all the other instruments stand upon, but it is rarely recognized as that.
quotes.author: Victor Wooten

quotes.quote: The absence of a bass player always makes things go faster and hit harder in the high-end range.
quotes.author: Mark Lanegan

quotes.quote: Bass players are always the intellectual kind, but nobody knows it.
quotes.author: Stanley Clarke

quotes.quote: A bass should sound like a bass with the thump of the finger against the wood, like it began with stand up.
quotes.author: Suzi Quatro

quotes.quote: Sometimes one of us will have a riff or a bass line from home but it really gels when we come together. We really have a strong special chemistry that we take advantage of when we get together.
quotes.author: Chad Smith

quotes.quote: A bass player has to think and play like a bass player. A drummer has to play and think like a drummer, and stay out of the way of the vocalist. The guitar player has to respect everybody else.
quotes.author: Hunter Hayes

quotes.quote: A good bassist determines the direction of any band.
quotes.author: Ron Carter

quotes.quote: The bass player's function, along with the drums, is to be the engine that drives the car everything else is merely colours.
quotes.author: Suzi Quatro

quotes.quote: It's really important for the bass and the drums to somehow blend.
quotes.author: Mike Gordon

quotes.quote: Bass players and drummers are brothers in the basement cooking up the groove that makes people move.
quotes.author: John Densmore

quotes.quote: If you go long enough without a bath, even the fleas will leave you alone.
quotes.author: Ernie Pyle

quotes.quote: There must be quite a few things a hot bath won't cure, but I don't know many of them.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Bath twice a day to be really clean, once a day to be passably clean, once a week to avoid being a public menace.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: You can often wash your troubles away with the right kind of bath. Throw everything you have into the tub: bubble gels, bubble oils, bubble powders, bubble gum.
quotes.author: Henry Beard

quotes.quote: You're welcome to take a bath. You look like the second week of the garbage strike.
quotes.author: Neil Simon

quotes.quote: I love a warm bath at the end of a day.
quotes.author: Cynthia Nixon

quotes.quote: A hot bath! How exquisite a vespertine pleasure, how luxurious, fervid and flagrant a consolation for the rigours, the austerities, the renunciations of the day.
quotes.author: Rose Macaulay

quotes.quote: I love to have a bath with beautiful, relaxing music on and have no rush to do anything. It's a wonderful indulgence, and it helps me to calm down and stop my mind running overtime.
quotes.author: Kylie Minogue

quotes.quote: Take a music bath once or twice a week for a few seasons, and you will find that it is to the soul what the water bath is to the body
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: It is a mistake that there is no bath that will cure people's manners, but drowning would help.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: BATH, n. A kind of mystic ceremony substituted for religious worship, with what spiritual efficacy has not been determined.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: You cannot wash the feet of a dirty world if you refuse to touch it
quotes.author: Erwin McManus

quotes.quote: As we wash our body so we should wash destiny, change life as we change clothes.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: I'm really old-fashioned. An Epsom salt bath, that's genuinely better than any massage.
quotes.author: Emilia Clarke

quotes.quote: I don't know what it is about the shower that generates creative thoughts. Maybe it's the hot water. Maybe it's being unencumbered even by the restriction of clothing.
quotes.author: Lyle Lovett

quotes.quote: I think best in a hot bath, with my head tilted back and my feet up high.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Jane Howard

quotes.quote: Baths, she thought, were just like her relationships, all "ooh, ah" in the beginning and then suddenly, without warning, she had to get out, out, out!
quotes.author: Liane Moriarty

quotes.quote: A bath and a tenderloin steak. Those are the high points of a man's life.
quotes.author: Curt Siodmak

quotes.quote: Sprinkling drops of lavender and clary-sage oil into a bath is a totally simple yet complex pleasure.
quotes.author: Isabel Gillies

quotes.quote: Baths are my favorite thing. I can have two, three a day.
quotes.author: Kristin Scott Thomas

quotes.quote: Meditate and bath in the light of eternity. Nothing else is worthwhile.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: A long, hot bath is a real treat. But from a 'green' point of view, that's probably what it should be: an occasional treat.
quotes.author: Sheherazade Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Noble deeds and hot baths are the best cures for depression.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.quote: People who wash much have a high mind about it, and talk down to those who wash little.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Dip him in the river who loves water.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: It seemed silly to wash one day when I would only have to wash again the next. It made me tired just to think of it.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: I shower in the dark, barely able to tell soap from conditioner, and tell myself that I will emerge new and strong, that the water will heal me.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: I take three showers a day. I don’t need to be in the shower for 15 minutes. I’m a five-minute guy.
quotes.author: Rodney Harrison

quotes.quote: Everyone who's ever taken a shower has an idea. It's the person who gets out of the shower, dries off and does something about it who makes a difference.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.quote: Yes, I still take my baths all day long. They're meditative. I have three a day.
quotes.author: Tom Ford

quotes.quote: In the middle ages, couples used to get married in the bathtub because water signified purity. The couple and their attendants would stand in a tub filled with water.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: If you linger in the bathtub, chances are you will emerge as a wrinkled prune. That's because prolonged exposure to water causes skin's natural water repellent, keratin, to dissolve and the cells in the epidermis layer to absorb water and swell, causing puckering.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: Before the days of indoor plumbing, wealthy French women didn't like the idea of showing their bodies in public at public bathhouses. So they would pay for horse-drawn bathtubs to come to them— complete with towels and hot water.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: Somewhere right now, water is filling up a bathtub, steam is fogging up a mirror, washcloths and rubber duckies are waiting...
quotes.author: Wade Bradford

quotes.quote: Sometimes love is like being in a bathtub. You are in the bathtub with the person you love. The bathtub is fun.
quotes.author: Katherine Obermeyer

quotes.quote: Have you ever heard that the best way to clean the bathtub is to get in? You can reach all the sides; you are not leaning across. You don't mind getting water on your elbows because you are naked and in the water.
quotes.author: Katherine Obermeyer

quotes.quote: Have you added too much water and need to drain some out? Someone will have to take this action or the bath will overflow. Since the bathtub just has two people in it, that someone is either you or your spouse. Water that overflows will ruin the carpet/tile/linoleum and rot the floor underneath the bathtub.This is a marriage where people worked at it, but they didn't realize all the different types of work that needed to be done.
quotes.author: Katherine Obermeyer

quotes.quote: Breathing, meditating, and stretching in the bathtub can become a natural ritual for our culture.
quotes.author: Barbara Isenberg

quotes.quote: I stepped into a large, cold bathtub. I dunked my head underwater. I did not exactly know what my sins were but I felt them wash away.
quotes.author: Deborah Hanekamp

quotes.quote: The average person spends a year and a half of their entire life in the bathroom. 66 percent of mothers hide out in the bathroom for quiet time. 47 percent of Americans contemplate their future in there, so now you can accomplish all that with a positive intention.
quotes.author: Paulette Kouffman Sherman

quotes.quote: You know when you put a stick in water and it looks bent? That's why I never take baths.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: When I pricked minuscule bubbles of soap emanating from the bathtub; / a pungent spray flew in my eyes, / It was as if someone had hurled tones of chili powder; and the interiors of my eye developed a severe red allergy.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: I filled the bathtub to the brim; with a solution of my crystalline tears, / She entered; cleansed her blotted hands in the same; exited as phlegmatically as she had come.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: As a bathtub lined with white porcelain, / When the hot water gives out or goes tepid, / So is the slow cooling of our chivalrous passion, / O my much praised but-not-altogether-satisfactory lady.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: When I was young, I would sit in the bath and ideas would come to me. But I'm not young anymore, so now I just sit in the bath.
quotes.author: Aki Kaurismaki

quotes.quote: I think a lot of contemplation happens in bathtubs. It does for me. Nothing like a hot bath to ease the tension and think about what's going to happen next.
quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

quotes.quote: There is no need to go to India or anywhere else to find peace. You will find that deep place of silence right in your room, your garden or even your bathtub.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kubler Ross

quotes.quote: Our goal is to shrink government to the size where we can drown it in a bathtub.
quotes.author: Grover Norquist

quotes.quote: Writing fiction, especially a long work of fiction, can be a difficult, lonely job; it's like crossing the Atlantic Ocean in a bathtub. There's plenty of opportunity for self-doubt.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The bathtub was invented in 1850 and the telephone in 1875. In other words, if you had been living in 1850, you could have sat in the bathtub for 25 years without having to answer the phone.
quotes.author: Bill Dewitt

quotes.quote: Every tub must stand upon its bottom.
quotes.author: Charles Macklin

quotes.quote: In the lobby of every business incubator there needs to be a bathtub, to get the ideas flowing. But to make it functional, it needs to be used as a fish tank.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: In what we call trophy baths, the tub is set up as the focal point, and people want to make sure it is seen.
quotes.author: Gary White

quotes.quote: The truth isn't easily pinned to a page. In the bathtub of history the truth is harder to hold than the soap and much more difficult to find.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: There is no need to go to India or anywhere else to find peace. You will find that deep place of silence right in your room, your garden or even your bathtub.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: You know you're big when you sit in the bathtub and the water in the toilet rises.
quotes.author: Art Donovan

quotes.quote: You can often wash your troubles away with the right kind of bath. Throw everything you have into the tub: bubble gels, bubble oils, bubble powders, bubble gum.
quotes.author: Henry Beard

quotes.quote: People run from rain but sit in bathtubs full of water.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Getting married is a lot like getting into a tub of hot water. After you get used to it, it ain't so hot.
quotes.author: Minnie Pearl

quotes.quote: To me bathtubs are the epitome of luxury. Either you have no money to own one or you have no time to use one.
quotes.author: Akilnathan Logeswaran

quotes.quote: If you want to catch fish, don't throw your net into the bathtub.
quotes.author: Reinhard Bonnke

quotes.quote: Where there is no peril in the fight, there is no glory in the triumph.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Don't fight a battle if you don't gain anything by winning.
quotes.author: Erwin Rommel

quotes.quote: In every battle there comes a time when both sides consider themselves beaten, then he who continues the attack wins.
quotes.author: Ulysses S. Grant

quotes.quote: In preparing for battle I have always found that plans are useless, but planning is indispensable.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Never think that war, no matter how necessary, nor how justified, is not a crime.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: War does not determine who is right - only who is left.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: War can only be abolished through war, and in order to get rid of the gun it is necessary to take up the gun.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: It is good that war is so horrible, or we might grow to like it.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: Battle not with monsters lest you become one.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: War is a quarrel between two thieves too cowardly to fight their own battle.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: You must not fight too often with one enemy, or you will teach him all your art of war.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Nothing except a battle lost can be half so melancholy as a battle won.
quotes.author: Arthur Wellesley

quotes.quote: Wars are poor chisels for carving out peaceful tomorrows.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: War is the greatest plague that can afflict humanity, it destroys religion, it destroys states, it destroys families. Any scourge is preferable to it.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: A battle won is a battle which we will not acknowledge to be lost.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Foch

quotes.quote: The real trouble with war (modern war) is that it gives no one a chance to kill the right people.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: It is fatal to enter any war without the will to win it.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: All wars are follies, very expensive and very mischievous ones.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: War is not an adventure. It is a disease. It is like typhus.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: For a war to be just three conditions are necessary - public authority, just cause, right motive.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Wars spring from unseen and generally insignificant causes, the first outbreak being often but an explosion of anger.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: War is what happens when language fails.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: You don't always win your battles, but it's good to know you fought.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: No battle plan survives contact with the enemy.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: War is a defeat for humanity.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: There is no avoiding war; it can only be postponed to the advantage of others.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: If we don't end war, war will end us.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: Once we have a war there is only one thing to do. It must be won. For defeat brings worse things than any that can ever happen in war.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: No one ever goes into battle thinking God is on the other side.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: Wars have never hurt anybody except the people who die.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: War is only a cowardly escape from the problems of peace.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: The hotter the battle the sweeter the victory.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: A lost battle is a battle one thinks one has lost.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: No battle is worth fighting except the last one.
quotes.author: Enoch Powell

quotes.quote: Anyone that goes to battle goes to battle knowing the mindset and tactics of their enemies.
quotes.author: Brad Thor

quotes.quote: War is so unjust and ugly that all who wage it must try to stifle the voice of conscience within themselves.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Preparation for war is a constant stimulus to suspicion and ill will.
quotes.author: James Monroe

quotes.quote: War means blind obedience, unthinking stupidity, brutish callousness, wanton destruction, and irresponsible murder.
quotes.author: Alexander Berkman

quotes.quote: The quickest way of ending a war is to lose it.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: We make war that we may live in peace.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: No war is inevitable until it breaks out.
quotes.author: A. J. P. Taylor

quotes.quote: Everyone prepares for battle in his own way.
quotes.author: Janet Morris

quotes.quote: To be prepared for war is one of the most effective means of preserving peace.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: War is cruelty, and none can make it gentle.
quotes.author: Gilbert Parker

quotes.quote: War is fear cloaked in courage.
quotes.author: William Westmoreland

quotes.quote: War is the science of destruction.
quotes.author: John Abbott

quotes.quote: In war, events of importance are the result of trivial causes.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: War should never be entered upon until every agency of peace has failed.
quotes.author: William McKinley

quotes.quote: No battle was ever won according to plan, but no battle was ever won without one.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Carry the battle to them. Don't let them bring it to you. Put them on the defensive and don't ever apologize for anything.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Only great and general battles can produce great results
quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.quote: All battles are fought by scared men who'd rather be some place else.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: The battle is lost or won in the secret places of the will before God, never first in the external world.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: A battle sometimes decides everything and sometimes the most trifling thing decides the fate of a battle.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The hardest battle you're ever going to fight is the battle to be just you.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Battles are sometimes won by generals. Wars are nearly always won by sergeants and privates.
quotes.author: F. E. Adcock

quotes.quote: The legal battle against segregation is won, but the community battle goes on.
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.quote: Battles are lost in the same spirit in which they are won.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The purpose of battle is to attain the greatest heights within your own limits.
quotes.author: Yukito Kishiro

quotes.quote: There are more battles won through prayer than by any other means.
quotes.author: Chuck Smith

quotes.quote: It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Battle is the most magnificent competition in which a human being can indulge.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Battle scars from the war of good versus evil have a unique beauty all their own.
quotes.author: P. C. Cast

quotes.quote: Battles are won by slaughter and maneuver. The greater the general, the more he contributes in maneuver, the less he demands in slaughter.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: No battle was ever won by wholly sane men.
quotes.author: Lynn Viehl

quotes.quote: Believe that you can whip the enemy, and you have won half the battle.
quotes.author: James Ewell Brown Stuart

quotes.quote: The battle between good and evil is endlessly fascinating because we are participants every day.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Pick your battles, and accept yourself for who you are.
quotes.author: Chrissie Wellington

quotes.quote: The manner in which one loses the battle can sometimes outshine the victory.
quotes.author: David Millar

quotes.quote: In a battle between force and an idea, the latter always prevails.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: Do battle with the challenges of your present, and you will unlock the prizes of your future.
quotes.author: Andy Andrews

quotes.quote: Be bold, be brave enough to be your true self.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: The doors will be opened to those who are bold enough to knock.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.quote: Be original; don’t be scared of being bold.
quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

quotes.quote: Boldness is ever blind, for it sees not dangers and inconveniences whence it is bad in council though good in execution.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: It’s only by being bold that you get anywhere.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: The bold adventurer succeeds the best.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: All people need in order to rise up against tyranny is a leader bold enough to take up the banner.
quotes.author: Harald Hardrade

quotes.quote: I would rather be a hot mess of bold action, a make it happen learn on the fly kind of person, than a perfectly organized coward.
quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

quotes.quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Act boldly and unseen forces will come to your aid.
quotes.author: Dorothea Brande

quotes.quote: We need to be visionary; we have to be bold.
quotes.author: Angela Hunt

quotes.quote: Originality implies being bold enough to go beyond accepted norms.
quotes.author: Anthony Storr

quotes.quote: Above all else, be daring, be bold, be unconventional.
quotes.author: Kevin Rampe

quotes.quote: Put a grain of boldness into everything you do.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Fortune favors the bold.
quotes.author: James Swartz

quotes.quote: Make bold choices and make mistakes. It’s all these things that add up to the person you become.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Taking bold focused action creates explosive results.
quotes.author: John Di Lemme

quotes.quote: Be bold when others are scared.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Powell

quotes.quote: Whatever you dream of, be bold and pursue it.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Freedom lies in being bold.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Take risks, be bold and let your genius convert your fear into power and brilliance.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: You decide every day who you will and will not be. Be bold in your decision but remember, choose wisely.
quotes.author: Joel Brown

quotes.quote: How does the Meadow flower its bloom unfold? Because the lovely little flower is free down to its root, and in that freedom bold.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: I was bold in the pursuit of knowledge, never fearing to follow truth and reason to whatever results they led, and bearding every authority which stood in their way.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: In criticism I will be bold, and as sternly, absolutely just with friend and foe. From this purpose nothing shall turn me.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Live each day like it could be your last. Drink it in. Be adventurous, be bold, but savor it. It goes fast.
quotes.author: Matt Ross

quotes.quote: You and Father taught me not to careful, but to be bold.
quotes.author: David J. Corbett

quotes.quote: Sometimes bravery isn't enough. Sometimes the world requires us to be bold.
quotes.author: Greg Berlanti

quotes.quote: I am an ambitious man, Mister Povey... and an ambitious man, if he be bold enough, can carve himself a kingdom.
quotes.author: Norman Reilly Raine

quotes.quote: We should do something special - be bold. It's leap year - take a leap!
quotes.author: David Angell

quotes.quote: To build a home and a life in this harsh, unforgiving country required that a man be bold, fearless, and tough as iron. The men who were courageous and resilient were the men who prospered.
quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

quotes.quote: Be bold, Zev, don't compromise yourself with sentiment! Together we can own the universe! You know this is what you want...
quotes.author: Jeffrey Hirschfield

quotes.quote: Trust your gut reaction / Be bold, be bold baby / If you don't take chances / You won't make advances
quotes.author: Keith Richards

quotes.quote: Be bold. Be yourself. / Stand up. / Keep on lookin' for a light. / You cut thick clouds.
quotes.author: Taishi

quotes.quote: You gotta be bad, you gotta be bold, you gotta be wiser/ You gotta be hard, you gotta be tough, you gotta be stronger / You gotta be cool, you gotta be calm, you gotta stay together / All I know, all I know, love will save the day
quotes.author: Des'ree Weekes

quotes.quote: I'm gonna be bold / Gotta hold my head up / 'Cause I know when I get up / There's a victory I already hold
quotes.author: Jen Ledger

quotes.quote: It's either you're in or out / Gotta know what you're all about / Be bold and strong / Tell yourself you're not doing wrong
quotes.author: David Cole

quotes.quote: The morning is cold / We'll wake when we're bold / For the rest of our lives / And though / The evening is warm / We'll sleep through the storm
quotes.author: Nicholas Fleece

quotes.quote: Yes, she's bold / Bold enough / To set fire to your plain / Her fire to your plain
quotes.author: Tori Ellen Amos

quotes.quote: That you're no longer alone tonight / You're coming into your own tonight / One of the brave and the bold tonight
quotes.author: Kevin Churko

quotes.quote: Excuse me if I'm wrong / But I need some encouraging / Thank you for being so bold
quotes.author: Henry Stephen Font

quotes.quote: How can you just leave me standing? / Alone in a world that's so cold (so cold) / Maybe I'm just too demanding / Maybe I'm just like my father, too bold
quotes.author: Prince Rogers Nelson

quotes.quote: Brave, bold / Acting for what, a name on road / It's like man wanna see fame on road / But don't really want to get blazed on road
quotes.author: Jack William Adams

quotes.quote: Hold your fire, cool your temper / Young guns ever too bold / Hold your fire, just remember / Young guns never grow old
quotes.author: Norman Hassan

quotes.quote: If you play it brave and bold / These are streets of gold
quotes.author: Felix Snow

quotes.quote: With my vassals brave and bold; / We'd hunt all day, / Through the wild wood gay, / In our guise of green and gold.
quotes.author: Charles Sangster

quotes.quote: And good and bad, the battles bold / You fought with principalities / And powers. We chaffed and laughed away / Such woes that day!
quotes.author: Harriet Monroe

quotes.quote: No -- I must maintain my hold, / 'Tis thy goodness makes me bold; / I can no denial take, / When I plead for Jesu's sake.
quotes.author: John Newton

quotes.quote: Modest men must needs endure, / And the bold must humbly bow; / Thus thy fate's the same, be sure, / Whether bold or modest thou.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: We rovers bold, / To the land of Gold, / Over the bowling billows are gliding: / Eager to toil, / For the golden spoil
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Swift and resistless through the land he pass'd / Like that bold Greek who did the east subdue, / And made to battles such heroic haste / As if on wings of victory he flew.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Boldness is a mental attitude, a liberating force. It is a way of interacting with the world.
quotes.author: Susan Mitchell

quotes.quote: I believe that you have to be bold in order to live fully, to be able to make the most of the cards that life deals you.
quotes.author: Susan Mitchell

quotes.quote: It is possible to learn how to be bold. Bold enough to change. Bold enough to risk failure. Bold enough to pick yourself up and try again.
quotes.author: Susan Mitchell

quotes.quote: Every sports person knows how terrifying it is to risk failing but they keep being bold enough to try.
quotes.author: Susan Mitchell

quotes.quote: Being bold does not mean that you are not afraid. It means that you face up to that fear and keep going.
quotes.author: Susan Mitchell

quotes.quote: By giving something a go you gradually learn to be bolder and less afraid.
quotes.author: Susan Mitchell

quotes.quote: To live boldly is to be fully alive, to experience the full range of emotions.
quotes.author: Susan Mitchell

quotes.quote: Determined people are bold. And boldness always involves risk.
quotes.author: Susan Mitchell

quotes.quote: You should always encourage yourself to be bold enough to work out what it is you really believe in and what kind of life you want to lead.
quotes.author: Susan Mitchell

quotes.quote: Not to have a bold vision for the future means that our enemies have won. They have diminished our dreams and therefore they have diminished us.
quotes.author: Susan Mitchell

quotes.quote: Leaders is about not being afraid to be bold and not being afraid to be seen to be bold.
quotes.author: Susan Mitchell

quotes.quote: The world needs more people to be bold and take on this important work for our tomorrow.
quotes.author: Don Cheadle

quotes.quote: Boldness is taking action to do the right thing, despite fear and discomfort. It isn't about being obnoxious, slick, or manipulative.
quotes.author: Jeff Shore

quotes.quote: To be bold is to initiate strong, positive action at a time when others would give in and take the easy path.
quotes.author: Jeff Shore

quotes.quote: Bold living...being courageous under all adversities and learning that triumph goes to those who practice this truth.
quotes.author: Don Gossett

quotes.quote: You have the power. Be a hero too. Be brave and be bold. Be your best you.
quotes.author: Elsie Olson

quotes.quote: Being bold means having courage. People who are bold are brave or daring. They take chances. They try new thing. People who are bold face their fears.
quotes.author: Elsie Olson

quotes.quote: Be bold! It's important to be brave. But true heroes are smart too. They don't take unnecessary risks. These are actions that could put themselves or others in danger.
quotes.author: Elsie Olson

quotes.quote: Be bold! Break out of it today, and jump over one of the biggest mental barriers in your mind.
quotes.author: Bridgette Murphy

quotes.quote: A principle that goes hand in hand with doing the small things is to be bold.
quotes.author: Tyson T. Cooper

quotes.quote: Goals must be realistic and achievable, dreams can be bold, fantastic and outrageous
quotes.author: Chitra Jha

quotes.quote: Bold dreams push us forward and extend our possibilities because boldness has a powerful magnetic quality to it.
quotes.author: Chitra Jha

quotes.quote: It requires courage, conviction and imagination to be bold -- but the rewards can be immense.
quotes.author: Shaun Smith

quotes.quote: They are bold. Not reckless. Just bold: they stand out from others because they stand up for something.
quotes.author: Shaun Smith

quotes.quote: Some are bold because what they do is so dramatically different to what has been done before.
quotes.author: Shaun Smith

quotes.quote: All are bold because they have an unshakable belief in what they stand for and let their actions follow their beliefs.
quotes.author: Shaun Smith

quotes.quote: Being bold is an attitude of mind but is evidenced by what people do.
quotes.author: Shaun Smith

quotes.quote: Being bold starts with individual people having belief in something, a commitment to achieving it and a determination to see it sustained. Boldness starts with you.
quotes.author: Shaun Smith

quotes.quote: To be bold, to be strong, and courageous through which they can lead a sweet, good, happy, and prosperous life.
quotes.author: Baldev Bhatia

quotes.quote: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: Be bold, but not too bold. Have courage, but not too much.
quotes.author: Fay Weldon

quotes.quote: Be bold enough to use your voice, brave enough to listen to your heart, and strong enough to live the life you have always imagined.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Take bold decisions. Don't let doubts fumble decisions in your mind and make you confused over them. Pursue what you are convinced to do; else you set yourself up where you do not belong.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Be bold in what you stand for and careful what you fall for.
quotes.author: Ruth Boorstine

quotes.quote: Courage leads you to win battles everyone may lose.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Begin, be bold, and venture to be wise.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Be bold in pursuing what others believe is unrealistic because this will achieve more than being bland and unimaginative.
quotes.author: Janna Cachola

quotes.quote: Stand up, be bold, be strong. Take the whole responsibility on your own shoulders, and know that you are the creator of your own destiny. All the strength and succor you want is within yourself. Therefore make your own future.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Stop being self-conscious when you write. You are the expert about the world you are creating, no one else. So be bold and write on.
quotes.author: Nirav Sanchaniya

quotes.quote: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
quotes.author: Peter T. Mcintyre

quotes.quote: People who make no mistakes lack boldness and the spirit of adventure. They are the brakes on the wheels of progress.
quotes.author: Dale E. Turner

quotes.quote: Virtue is bold, and goodness never fearful.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You must be bold, brave, and courageous and find a way to get in the way.
quotes.author: John Lewis

quotes.quote: Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. The fearful are caught as often as the bold.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Be brave. Take Risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Be bold, proclaim it everywhere: They only live who dare.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Always be yourself, express yourself have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: We need to be bold and adventurous in our thinking in order to survive.
quotes.author: William O. Douglas

quotes.quote: Let us be bold. Let us be brave. Let us be together.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: Be grateful that you only see the outward man. Be grateful that you never see the passions, the hatreds, the jealousies, the malice, the sicknesses be grateful you rarely see the frightening truth in people.
quotes.author: Alfred Bester

quotes.quote: Be grateful for your problems, for they stimulate an I can solve it attitude.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: Be grateful for what you already have, and you will attract more good things.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: Focus on being grateful for what you have already enjoy it!! Then release into the universe. The universe will manifest it.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: Each of us has much for which to be grateful if we will but pause and contemplate our blessings.
quotes.author: Thomas S Monson

quotes.quote: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: May you find the courage to be grateful for every circumstance.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Be grateful for the wound that pushes you towards God.
quotes.author: Yasmin Mogahed

quotes.quote: Be grateful for what you have, while in pursuit of what you want.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Practice being grateful for everything that life has blessed you with.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Be grateful for every single person who was part of your story.The ones that hurt you. The ones that helped you. Because they all taught you.
quotes.author: Yasmin Mogahed

quotes.quote: Be grateful for each moment we have and be happy, but more than anything live it fully.
quotes.author: Valerie Harper

quotes.quote: Be grateful for small mercies.
quotes.author: Alexandra Adornetto

quotes.quote: By talking to yourself about the things you have to be grateful for you can fill your mind with thoughts that soar.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: We need to be grateful for many things that didn't happen.
quotes.author: C.J. Langenhoven

quotes.quote: A grateful heart is not one that is very selective and choosy about what to be grateful for.
quotes.author: Radhanath

quotes.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: What you truly acknowledge truly is yours. Invite your heart to be grateful and your thank yous will be heard even when you don't use words.
quotes.author: Pavithra Mehta

quotes.quote: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Be grateful for your challenges, setbacks, adversity and disappointments. Be grateful for your opportunity to overcome every single one, because doing so contributes to your growth and your ability to help others overcome theirs.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue your goals.
quotes.author: Roy Bennett

quotes.quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Just remember: to be grateful and thank the people who are there and support you along the way is a great start to success.
quotes.author: Meryl Davis

quotes.quote: Be grateful everyday for the brief but magnificent opportunity that life provides.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Be grateful for whoever comes, because each has been sent as a guide from beyond.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: No matter what the circumstances, we can be grateful that God fulfills His promises, that our faith is sufficient to sustain us, and that our eternal life is assured.
quotes.author: Mary C. Neal

quotes.quote: To be grateful is to recognize the love of God in everything.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Feeling grateful or appreciative of someone or something in your life actually attracts more of the things that you appreciate and value into your life.
quotes.author: Christiane Northrup

quotes.quote: No matter what the situation is close your eyes and think of all the things you could be grateful for in your life right now.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Be grateful to those who refuse your demands. They are your benefactors.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: I think you have to be grateful to those who have helped you.
quotes.author: Cesc Fabregas

quotes.quote: Be grateful for the joy of life. Be glad for the privilege of work. Be thankful for the opportunity to give and serve. Good work is the great character builder, the sweetener of life, the maker of destiny. Let the spirit of your work be right, and whether your task be great or small you will then have the satisfaction of knowing it is worth while.
quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.quote: Be grateful for the tiny details of your life and make room for unexpected and beautiful blessings.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: My smile will always be broken, but I'll always be grateful for the chance to get to do what I get to do.
quotes.author: Trent Franks

quotes.quote: Be grateful for good breaks and kind favors but don't count on them.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: The trick is to be grateful when your mood is high and graceful when it is low.
quotes.author: Richard Carlson

quotes.quote: Every moment of life is precious and can never happen again and therefore is a reason to appreciate, be grateful for and celebrate the fact that you are alive.
quotes.author: Zelig Pliskin

quotes.quote: Cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Contemplate the good things in your life and be grateful for them.
quotes.author: Rebecca Pidgeon

quotes.quote: Be grateful for what you have and stop complaining it bores everybody else, does you no good, and doesn't solve any problems.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: So every single day, I found something to be grateful for and that's a powerful lesson.
quotes.author: Alice Barrett

quotes.quote: Be grateful for your life, every detail of it, and your face will come to shine like a sun, and everyone who sees it will be made glad and peaceful.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Always be grateful for your blessings, especially your heritage. When we are blessed with goodly parents, we should be grateful. This is the debt each of us owes for our heritage.
quotes.author: Quentin L. Cook

quotes.quote: Don't focus on what's wrong. Things may not be perfect, but be grateful for the opportunity to experience each day. Live each day like it could be your last.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Build on past successes, be grateful for what you do have, and know that this, too, shall pass. It's only for the now. Whatever we're facing, it's not forever.
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.quote: Exercise is about being grateful for the body you have and sustaining the life you have.
quotes.author: Nicole Ari Parker

quotes.quote: If people begin to be more grateful, they will see the wonders of life.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: It is just that we should be grateful, not only to those with whose views we may agree, but also to those who have expressed more superficial views; for these also contributed something, by developing before us the powers of thought.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Kindness is no virtue, but a common duty.
quotes.author: Frederick Greenwood

quotes.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
quotes.author: Tenzin Gyatso

quotes.quote: A good man is kinder to his enemy than bad men to their friends.
quotes.author: Joseph Hall

quotes.quote: Men are only as great as they are kind.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: Kindness in words creates confidence.. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness.. Kindness in giving creates love.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: It is more important to be of pure intention than of perfect action.
quotes.author: Ilyas Kassam

quotes.quote: You cannot do a kindness too soon, for you never know how soon it will be too late.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: I admire those who do good and expect nothing in return.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The simplest acts of kindness are by far more powerful then a thousand heads bowing in prayer.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Kindness is a distemper which is soon cured by experience.
quotes.author: Abraham Miller

quotes.quote: If you can be kind and considerate for one day, then you can be for another. It won't cost you a penny in the world. Begin today.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Kindness is ever the begetter of kindness.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Our kindness may be the most persuasive argument for that which we believe.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: If you are kind, people may accuse you of ulterior motives. Be kind anyway.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: A kind and compassionate act is often its own reward.
quotes.author: William John Bennett

quotes.quote: Kindness is loving people more than they deserve
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: The very nature of kindness is to spread. If you are kind to others, today they will be kind to you, and tomorrow to somebody else.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: Take care, be kind, be considerate of other people and other species, and be loving.
quotes.author: John Lithgow

quotes.quote: Never look down on anybody unless you're helping them up.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: A warm smile is the Universal language of kindness.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Being kind is more important than being right.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Today I bent the truth to be kind, and I have no regret, for I am far surer of what is kind than I am of what is true.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Always be a little kinder than necessary.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Time itself is created through deeds of true kindness.
quotes.author: Dara Horn

quotes.quote: Kindness can become its own motive. We are made kind by being kind.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: We are made kind by being kind.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: If you want to be holy, be kind.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: The more you extend kindness to yourself, the more it will become your automatic response to others.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Be kind to yourself and others. Come from love every moment you can.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Practice kindness all day to everybody and you will realize you're already in heaven now.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Kindness is the golden key that unlocks the hearts of others.
quotes.author: Henry Drummond

quotes.quote: Act with kindness, but do not expect gratitude.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: He that has done you a kindness will be more ready to do you another, than he whom you yourself have obliged.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Kindness is in our power, even when fondness is not.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Because that's what kindness is. It's not doing something for someone else because they can't, but because you can.
quotes.author: Andrew Iskander

quotes.quote: Tenderness and kindness are not signs of weakness and despair but manifestations of strength and resolution.
quotes.author: Kahil Gibran

quotes.quote: Kindness is the noblest weapon to conquer with.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for kindness.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: To be kind is good. To be kind without expecting anything in return is better.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Being kind to others is a way of being good to yourself.
quotes.author: Harold S. Kushner

quotes.quote: Kindness makes a fellow feel good whether it's being done to him or by him.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: A random act of kindness, no matter how small, can make a tremendous impact on someone else's life.
quotes.author: Roy Bennett

quotes.quote: Gentleness and kindness will make our homes a paradise upon earth.
quotes.author: C. A. Bartol

quotes.quote: Kindness is the golden chain by which society is bound together.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the greatest intention.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Constant kindness can accomplish much. As the sun makes ice melt, kindness causes misunderstanding, mistrust, and hostility to evaporate.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: The world is always going to be dangerous, and people get badly banged up, but how can there be more meaning than helping one another stand up in a wind and stay warm?
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Love and kindness are never wasted. They always make a difference. They bless the one who receives them, and they bless you, the giver.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: Behind every beautiful thing, there's some kind of pain.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Every time we choose courage, we make everyone around us a little better and the world a little braver. And our world could stand to be a little kinder and braver.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Human kindness has never weakened the stamina or softened the fiber of a free people. A nation does not have to be cruel in order to be tough.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Do things for people not because of who they are or what they do in return, but because of who you are.
quotes.author: Harold S. Kushner

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the inward feeling of kindness received. Thankfulness is the natural impulse to express that feeling. Thanksgiving is the following of that impulse.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: The wonderful thing is that it’s so incredibly easy to be kind.
quotes.author: Ingrid Newkirk

quotes.quote: What wisdom can you find that is greater than kindness?
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: A little thought and a little kindness are often worth more than a great deal of money.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Kindness is a passport that opens doors and fashions friends. It softens hearts and molds relationships that can last lifetimes.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Kindness is like snow, It beautifies everything it covers.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: I've been searching for ways to heal myself, and I've found that kindness is the best way.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: We can each change the world, with genuine acts of kindness.
quotes.author: Mongai Fankam

quotes.quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
quotes.author: Philo

quotes.quote: Carry out a random act of kindness, with no expectation of reward, safe in the knowledge that one day someone might do the same for you.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: You can accomplish by kindness what you cannot by force.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: But remember, boy, that a kind act can sometimes be as powerful as a sword.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Today I bent the truth to be kind, and I have no regret, for I am more sure of what is kind than I am of what is true.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Kindness is the sunshine in which virtue grows.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Kindness makes you the most beautiful person in the world, no matter what you look like.
quotes.author: Saffron Barker

quotes.quote: The words of kindness are more healing to a drooping heart than balm or honey.
quotes.author: Sarah Fielding

quotes.quote: Remember there’s no such thing as a small act of kindness. Every act creates a ripple with no logical end.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Kindness is more important than wisdom, and the recognition of this is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quotes.quote: Don't assume, ask. Be kind. Tell the truth. Don't say anything you can't stand behind fully. Have integrity. Tell people how you feel.
quotes.author: Warsan Shire

quotes.quote: When you are kind to someone in trouble, you hope they'll remember and be kind to someone else. And it’ll become like a wildfire.
quotes.author: Whoopi Goldberg

quotes.quote: It will make you feel good because there is satisfaction in taking the time to be kind.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: The words you speak and the actions you take determine your life experience; therefore, it is always wise to think and speak positively. If you can choose on thought, you can choose another. The happiness in your life is directly correlated to your thinking.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: It is better to make mistakes in kindness than to work miracles with unkindness.
quotes.author: Mother Theresa

quotes.quote: It is very important to be kind to ourselves and control ourselves by keeping our balance.
quotes.author: Mother Theresa

quotes.quote: It's always wise to be kind, grateful, and supportive to others.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: One should be kinder than needed.
quotes.author: R. J. Palacio
