quotes.quote: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: There is nothing that makes its way more directly to the soul than beauty.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: People are like stained - glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Beauty of whatever kind, in its supreme development, invariably excites the sensitive soul to tears.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Everything beautiful is loveable.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: It is the beautiful bird that gets caged.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Beauty, like a lantern’s light, will shine outward from within him.
quotes.author: George Garrett

quotes.quote: Beauty, like supreme dominion is best supported by opinion.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Beauty without grace is the hook without the bait.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Beauty is only skin deep.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Overbury

quotes.quote: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
quotes.author: Greek Proverb

quotes.quote: Butterflies come to pretty flowers.
quotes.author: Korean (on beauty)

quotes.quote: Don't gild the lily.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Everything is lovely when the geese honk high.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Poetry moves heaven and earth.
quotes.author: Japanese (on art and creativity)

quotes.quote: A beautiful thing is never perfect.
quotes.author: Egyptian (on beauty)

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Real beauty is to be true to oneself.
quotes.author: Laetitia Casta

quotes.quote: The words that enlighten the soul are more precious than jewels.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: Music has charms to soothe a savage beast.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: The beautiful is always bizarre.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: There is certainly no absolute standard of beauty. That precisely is what makes its pursuit so interesting.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: Beauty is the shadow of God on the universe.
quotes.author: Gabriela Mistral

quotes.quote: Judge nothing by the appearance. The more beautiful the serpent, the more fatal its sting.
quotes.author: William Scott Downey

quotes.quote: Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: There is a road from the eye to the heart that does not go through the intellect.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: Glamour is a shooting star, it catches your eye, but fades away, beauty is the sun always brilliant day after day.
quotes.author: Mike Dolan

quotes.quote: There is nothing more beautiful than someone who goes out of their way to make life beautiful for others.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: People are more than just the way they look.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: Beauty awakens the soul to act.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Everything is more glamorous when you do it in bed anyway.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: George Horace Lorimer

quotes.quote: To carry care to bed is to sleep with a pack on your back.
quotes.author: Haliburton

quotes.quote: Don't take tomorrow to bed with you.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.
quotes.author: Richard Grenier

quotes.quote: Early to bed and early to rise probably indicates unskilled labor.
quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.quote: Getting out of bed in the morning is an act of false confidence.
quotes.author: Jules Feiffer

quotes.quote: A man would prefer to come home to an unmade bed and a happy woman than to a neatly made bed and an angry woman.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: No one ever died from sleeping in an unmade bed.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: The best thing about lying in bed late is that you learn to distinguish between first things and trivia, for whatever presses on you has to prove its importance before it makes you move.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: A hospital bed is a parked taxi with the meter running.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Never go to bed with someone whose problems are greater than yours.
quotes.author: Studs Terkel

quotes.quote: Only a fool would make the bed every day.
quotes.author: Nancy Spain

quotes.quote: Those who hate to go to bed fear death; those who hate to get up fear life.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: The bed is a metaphysical piece of furniture.
quotes.author: Nelson Rodrigues

quotes.quote: And bed, he thought. Bed is my friend. Just bed, he thought. Bed will be a great thing. It is easy when you are beaten, he thought. I never knew how easy it was. And what beat you, the thought.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: O bed! O bed! delicious bed! That heaven upon earth to the weary head.
quotes.author: Thomas Hood

quotes.quote: The bed is a bundle of paradoxes: we go to it with reluctance, yet we quit it with regret; we make up our minds every night to leave it early, but we make up our bodies every morning to keep it late.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Bed is the best place for reading, thinking, or doing nothing.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: On the soft bed of luxury many kingdoms have expired.
quotes.author: Andrew Young

quotes.quote: The bed is just gorgeous. It's bright and colorful. It looks like a whole bunch of mattresses piled up. But it's an optical illusion. It's really just fabric, stuffing, nails and a staple gun. It's so tall, you need a ladder to get in.
quotes.author: Walker Quotes

quotes.quote: A bed is where a sense of shared purpose first takes root.
quotes.author: Rick Moody

quotes.quote: The happiest part of a man's life is what he passes lying awake in bed in the morning.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The bed is now as public as the dinner table and governed by the same rules of formal confrontation.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: The bed comprehends our whole life, for we were born in it, we live in it, and we shall die in it
quotes.author: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.quote: In bed we laugh, in bed we cry, and born in bed, in bed we die; the near approach a bed may show of human bliss to human woe.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Go to bed early and wake up early. The morning hours are good.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: How peaceful a bedroom is without a man in it.
quotes.author: Dorothy Eden

quotes.quote: Be generous in the bedroom. Share your sandwich.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: If you're gonna fall apart, do it in your own bedroom.
quotes.author: Margot Kidder

quotes.quote: It's okay to laugh in the bedroom so long as you don't point
quotes.author: Will Durst

quotes.quote: The spirit of the marriage left the bedroom and took to living in the parlor.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: When things don't work well in the bedroom, they don't work well in the living room either.
quotes.author: William Masters

quotes.quote: A husband and wife who have separate bedrooms have either drifted apart or found happiness.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: The only interesting thing that can happen in a Swiss bedroom is suffocation by feather mattress.
quotes.author: Dalton Trumbo

quotes.quote: My bedroom is my sanctuary. It's the only place in the house that has a beautiful lush shag rug, which is my favorite.
quotes.author: Evangeline Lilly

quotes.quote: You remember some bedrooms you have slept in. There are bedrooms you like to remember and others you would like to forget.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: My bedroom is my sanctuary. It's like a refuge, and it's where I do a fair amount of designing - at least conceptually, if not literally.
quotes.author: Vera Wang

quotes.quote: Of all the rooms in the house your bedroom is yours.
quotes.author: Dorothy Draper

quotes.quote: But even the law cannot be in your bedroom at night.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: Where the bedroom is wrong the whole house is wrong.
quotes.author: Margaret Kennedy

quotes.quote: A bedroom is just as nice as whoever sleeps in it with you.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Just following orders' is no excuse unless you're in the bedroom.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: More divorces start in the bedroom than in any other room in the house.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Real intimacy depends on truth - lovingly told - especially in the bedroom.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: It feels really sad, to me, to go to a dark bedroom. It's like surrendering to the night or something.
quotes.author: James Franco

quotes.quote: Ultimately, who you choose to be in a relationship with and what you do in your bedroom is your business.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: A sleepy man's eyes generally go to bed some time before he does.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: Good night! Good night! Far flies the light; But still God's love Shall shine above, Making all bright, Good night! Good night!
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: It was such a beautiful day I decided to stay in bed.
quotes.author: W Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: You can only sleep in one bed at a time.
quotes.author: Nick Rhodes

quotes.quote: So much for modern science and its wonderful discoveries that just about everything can kill you. Life is only a bedtime story before a long, long sleep.
quotes.author: Robert Bloch

quotes.quote: The bed is a bundle of paradoxes: we go to it with reluctance, yet we quit it with regret; we make up our minds every night to leave it early, but we make up our bodies every morning to keep it late.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: White pill, blue pill, yellow pill, purple pill; its like swallowing a rainbow every bedtime
quotes.author: Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

quotes.quote: Rest fixed most things. Sleep was my sweet reward. I treated bedtime as both incentive and sacrament.
quotes.author: Aspen Matis

quotes.quote: The amount of sleep required by the average person is five minutes more.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Bedtime is daytime, and we come into bloom after midnight.
quotes.author: Lenore Kandel

quotes.quote: O sleep, O gentle sleep, Nature's soft nurse, how have I frighted thee, That thou no more wilt weigh my eyelids down and steep my sense in forgetfulness?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Don't fight with the pillow, but lay down your head And kick every worriment out of the bed.
quotes.author: Edmund Vance Cooke

quotes.quote: A time when it is far too early to arise, but so late that going to bed makes small sense.
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: Sometimes you lie in bed at night, and you don't have a single thing to worry about.That always worries me!
quotes.author: Charles M Schulz

quotes.quote: May sleep envelop you as a bed sheet floating gently down, tickling your skin and removing every worry. Reminding you to consider only this moment.
quotes.author: Jeb Dickerson

quotes.quote: Before you go to bed think about what you left behind in the wake of the day.
quotes.author: Nanette L. Avery

quotes.quote: Sleeping is no mean art: for its sake one must stay awake all day.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Ironically, to my children, bedtime is a punishment that violates their basic rights as human beings. Once the lights are out, you can expect at least an hour of inmates clanging their tin cups on the cell bars.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: These were our bedtime stories. Tales that haunted our parents and made them laugh at the same time. We never understood them until we were fully grown and they became our sole inheritance
quotes.author: Edwidge Danticat

quotes.quote: Go to bed smarter than when you woke up.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: It is one of life's bitterest truths that bedtime so often arrives just when things are really getting interesting.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: Three meals plus bedtime make four sure blessings a day.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The feeling of sleepiness when you are not in bed, and can't get there, is the meanest feeling in the world.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: It's very easy to see those on a bedtime schedule and those not.
quotes.author: Michael Longenberger

quotes.quote: Bedtime rituals for children ease the way to the elsewhere of slumber teeth brushing and pajamas, the voice of a parent reading, the feel and smell of the old blanket or toy, the nightlight glowing in a corner
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: Any kid will run any errand for you, if you ask at bedtime.
quotes.author: Red Skelton

quotes.quote: Sleep is when all the unsorted stuff comes flying out as from a dustbin upset in a high wind.
quotes.author: William G. Golding

quotes.quote: Suggested remedy for the common cold. A good gulp of whiskey at bedtime it's not very scientific, but it helps.
quotes.author: Alexander Fleming

quotes.quote: That settles it, no more books about vampire before bedtime.
quotes.author: Amanda Ashley

quotes.quote: I love the silent hour of night, for blissful dreams may then arise, revealing to my charmed sight what may not bless my waking eyes.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: I told my three sons stories about germs more than fifty years ago as fanciful bedtime tales.
quotes.author: Arthur Kornberg

quotes.quote: A ruffled mind makes a restless pillow.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: And if tonight my soul may find her peace in sleep, and sink in good oblivion, and in the morning wake like a new-opened flower then I have been dipped again in God, and new-created.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: The world is a more mysterious place than it seems to be most of the time, when we're plodding along from breakfast to bedtime in a reassuringly familiar routine.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: There is more refreshment and stimulation in a nap, even of the briefest, than in all the alcohol ever distilled.
quotes.author: Edward Lucas

quotes.quote: The worst thing in the world is to try to sleep and not to.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The sky grew darker, painted blue on blue, one stroke at a time, into deeper and deeper shades of night.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: As a well spent day brings happy sleep so a life well spent brings happy death.
quotes.author: Leonardo de Vinci

quotes.quote: We are but older children, dear, Who fret to find our bedtime near.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Each night, when I go to sleep, I die. And the next morning, when I wake up, I am reborn.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Goodnight stars, goodnight air, goodnight noises everywhere.
quotes.author: Margaret Wise Brown

quotes.quote: Your future depends on your dreams, so go to sleep.
quotes.author: Mesut Barazany

quotes.quote: But love, I’ve come to understand, is more than three words mumbled before bedtime. Love is sustained by action, a pattern of devotion in the things we do for each other every day.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The bed is a bundle of paradoxes, we go to it with reluctance, yet we quit it with regret. We make up our minds every night to leave it early, but we make up our bodies every morning to keep it late.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Angels do not whisper in our ears. Predestination is a fairy tale, a bedtime story for adults scared of meaningless death.
quotes.author: Paul Doiron

quotes.quote: When you lie down, you will not be afraid. Your sleep will be sweet.
quotes.author: Proverbs 3:24

quotes.quote: The persons hardest to convince that they're at the retirement age are children at bedtime.
quotes.author: Shannon Fife

quotes.quote: From candlelight to early bedtime, I read.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: A flock of sheep that leisurely pass by One after one; the sound of rain, and bees Murmuring. The fall of rivers, winds and seas, Smooth fields, white sheets of water, and pure sky. I've thought of all by turns, and still I lie Sleepless.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The hum of bees is the voice of the garden.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Lawrence

quotes.quote: The flower doesn't dream of the bee. It blossoms and the bee comes.
quotes.author: Mark Nepo

quotes.quote: The keeping of bees is like the direction of sunbeams.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Every epigram should resemble a bee; it should have sting, honey, and brevity.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: The men of experiment are like the ant, they only collect and use; the reasoners resemble spiders, who make cobwebs out of their own substance. But the bee takes the middle course: it gathers its material from the flowers of the garden and field, but transforms and digests it by a power of its own.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The bee is more honored than other animals, not because she labors, but because she labors for others.
quotes.author: Saint John Chrysostom

quotes.quote: Even bees, the little alsmen of spring bowers, know there is richest juice in poison-flowers.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: The busy bee has no time for sorrow.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Bees that have honey in their mouths have stings in their tails.
quotes.author: Scottish Proverb

quotes.quote: The bee and the serpent often sip from the selfsame flower.
quotes.author: Pietro Metastasio

quotes.quote: Everything takes time. Bees have to move very fast to stay still.
quotes.author: David Foster Wallace

quotes.quote: If bees only gathered nectar from perfect flowers, they wouldn’t be able to make even a single drop of honey.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee-- his hands can’t hit what his eyes can’t see.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: When the flower blossoms, the bee will come.
quotes.author: Srikumar Rao

quotes.quote: The bee collects honey from flowers in such a way as to do the least damage or destruction to them, and he leaves them whole, undamaged and fresh, just as he found them.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: A bee is never as busy as it seems; it's just that it can't buzz any slower.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: That which is not good for the bee-hive cannot be good for the bees.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: We think we can make honey without sharing in the fate of bees, but we are in truth nothing but poor bees, destined to accomplish our task and then die.
quotes.author: Muriel Barbery

quotes.quote: The little bee returns with evening's gloom, to join her comrades in the braided hive, there, housed beside their might honey-comb, they dream their polity shall long survive.
quotes.author: Charles Tennyson Turner

quotes.quote: Bee stings are very educational .
quotes.author: Garth Nix

quotes.quote: It takes a bee to get the honey out.
quotes.author: Arthur Guiterman

quotes.quote: The bee fertilizes the flower it robs.
quotes.author: Charles A. Beard

quotes.quote: The bee's life is like a magic well: the more you draw from it, the more it fills with water.
quotes.author: Karl von Frisch

quotes.quote: As a bee without harming the flower, its colour or scent, flies away, collecting only the honey, even so should the sage wander in the village.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Don't wear perfume in the garden — unless you want to be pollinated by bees.
quotes.author: Anne Raver

quotes.quote: When the bee comes to your house, let her have beer; you may want to visit the bee's house some day.
quotes.author: Congo Proverb

quotes.quote: The bee is domesticated but not tamed.
quotes.author: William Longgood

quotes.quote: Bees are the batteries of orchards, gardens, guard them.
quotes.author: Carol Ann Duffy

quotes.quote: Bees have so much to offer us if we only listen.
quotes.author: Jay Ebben

quotes.quote: For to the bee a flower is the fountain of life, and to the flower a bee is the messenger of love.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: If the bee disappeared off the face of the earth, man would only have four years left to live.
quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.quote: She liked to tell everybody that women made the best beekeepers, 'cause they have a special ability built into them to love creatures that sting. It comes from years of loving children and husbands.
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: If beef is your idea of real food for real people, you'd better live real close to a real good hospital.
quotes.author: Neal Barnard

quotes.quote: Beef also was difficult to be procured and exceedingly poor. The price nearly sixpence farthing per pound.
quotes.author: William Bligh

quotes.quote: No soldier can fight unless he is properly fed on beef and beer.
quotes.author: John Churchill

quotes.quote: Beef is not what Jay said to Nas. Beef is when the working folks can't find jobs.
quotes.author: Mos Def

quotes.quote: If we gave up eating beef we would have roughly 20 to 30 times more land for food than we have now.
quotes.author: James Lovelock

quotes.quote: The end of an ox is beef, and the end of a lie is grief.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Pity is like eating mustard without beef.
quotes.author: Augustus J. C. Hare

quotes.quote: I don't have beef with anyone, only martians.
quotes.author: Charlie Murphy

quotes.quote: Having beef with someone is unnecessary and avoidable. Whatever the issue, if not positive, it is an opportunity to cut the excess fat from an unhealthy dietary network. Simply excuse yourself from the table of negativity and lean forward in peace.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Roast beef, medium, is not only a food. It is a philosophy.
quotes.author: Edna Ferber

quotes.quote: A lot of beefs in the music industry are caused from miscommunication and just not really understanding what's going on, having people in your ear saying this is what somebody did, or this is what somebody did to you.
quotes.author: Ludacris

quotes.quote: It's been a lifetime of trying to have less beef. Beef comes very naturally to me. I was born with my dukes up, but that's not always necessary anymore. I have to retrain myself.
quotes.author: Kelly Reichardt

quotes.quote: If a girl have beef with me, she gon' have beef with me forever.
quotes.author: Cardi B

quotes.quote: Beef is the soul of cooking.
quotes.author: Marie-Antoine Careme

quotes.quote: I don't beef with people, because I don't be around people. Nobody can't say nothing about me, because ain't nobody know nothing about me.
quotes.author: Fetty Wap

quotes.quote: But beef is rare within these oxless isles; Goat's flesh there is, no doubt, and kid, and mutton; And, when a holiday upon them smiles, A joint upon their barbarous spits they put on.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: A hunk of beef raised on Scottish moorland has a very different ecological footprint from one created in an intensive feedlot using concentrated cereal feed, and a wild venison or rabbit casserole is arguably greener than a vegetable curry.
quotes.author: Tristram Stuart

quotes.quote: You're gonna know, if I have beef with somebody, then one of us is just falling out.
quotes.author: Tory Lanez

quotes.quote: Beer is in the eye of the beer holder.
quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

quotes.quote: Milk is for babies. When you grow up you have to drink beer.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: He was a wise man who invented beer.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: For a quart of Ale is a meal for a King.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You can't be a real country unless you have a beer and an airline - it helps if you have some kind of a football team, or some nuclear weapons, but at the very least you need a beer.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Without question, the greatest invention in the history of mankind is beer. Oh, I grant you that the wheel was also a fine invention, but the wheel does not go nearly as well with pizza.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Beer, if drunk in moderation, softens the temper, cheers the spirit and promotes health.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: In a study, scientists report that drinking beer can be good for the liver. I'm sorry, did I say scientists' I meant Irish people.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: Most people hate the taste of beer to begin with. It is, however, a prejudice.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Beer may not solve your problems, but neither will water or milk.
quotes.author: Wiley

quotes.quote: Beer is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Beer is a wholesome liquor ..it abounds with nourishment.
quotes.author: Dr. Benjamin Rush

quotes.quote: Pretty women make us BUY beer. Ugly women make us DRINK beer.
quotes.author: Al Bundy

quotes.quote: 24 hours in a day, 24 beers in a case. Coincidence?
quotes.author: Stephen Wright

quotes.quote: They who drink beer will think beer.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Fermentation may have been a greater discovery than fire.
quotes.author: David Rains Wallace

quotes.quote: The mouth of a perfectly happy man is filled with beer.
quotes.author: Ancient Egyptian Saying

quotes.quote: A little bit of beer is divine medicine.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: Give me a woman who loves beer and I will conquer the world.
quotes.author: Kaiser Welhelm

quotes.quote: Beer will always have a definite role in the diet of an individual and can be considered a cog in the wheel of nutritional foods.
quotes.author: Bruce Carlton

quotes.quote: Brewers enjoy working to make beer as much as drinking beer instead of working.
quotes.author: Harold Rudolph

quotes.quote: People who drink light 'beer' don't like the taste of beer; they just like to pee a lot.
quotes.author: Capital Brewery

quotes.quote: If you ever reach total enlightenment while drinking beer, I bet it makes beer shoot out your nose.
quotes.author: Jack Handy

quotes.quote: A bar is better than a newspaper for public discussion.
quotes.author: Jim Parker

quotes.quote: For a quart of ale is a dish for a king.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Religions change; beer and wine remain.
quotes.author: Hervey Allen

quotes.quote: Beer makes you feel the way you ought to feel without beer.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: Give a man a beer, he'll drink for the day.Teach a man to brew, he'll be drunk the rest of his life.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Why is American beer served cold? So you can tell it from urine.
quotes.author: David Moulton

quotes.quote: There is more to life than beer alone, but beer makes those other things even better.
quotes.author: Stephen Morris

quotes.quote: Most Americans are born drunk, and really require a little wine or beer to sober them.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: What two ideas are more inseparable than beer and Britannia?
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Give a man a beer and he'll waste an hour. Teach a man to brew and he will waste a lifetime!
quotes.author: Charlie Papazian

quotes.quote: Life, alas, / Is very drear. / Up with the glass! / Down with the beer
quotes.author: Louis Untermeyer

quotes.quote: I will make it felony to drink small beer.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare (Henry IV)

quotes.quote: I will make it felony to drink small beer.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare (Henry IV)

quotes.quote: Not all chemicals are bad. Without chemicals such as hydrogen and oxygen, for example, there would be no way to make water, a vital ingredient in beer.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Men are simple things. They can survive a whole weekend with only three things: beer, boxer shorts and batteries for the remote control.
quotes.author: Diana Jordan

quotes.quote: Heineken refreshes the parts other beers cannot reach.
quotes.author: Terry Lovelock

quotes.quote: Prohibition makes you want to cry into your beer and denies you the beer to cry into.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: I’m only a beer teetotaller, not a champagne teetotaller.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Oh, I was down by Manly Pier / Drinking tubes of ice-cold beer / With a bucket full of prawns upon me knee. / But when I’d swallowed the last prawn / I had a technicolour yawn / And I chundered in the old Pacific sea.
quotes.author: Barry Humphries

quotes.quote: Life isn’t all beer and skittles; but beer and skittles, or something better of the same sort, must form a good part of every Englishman’s education.
quotes.author: Thomas Hughes

quotes.quote: Dost thou think because thou art virtuous, there shall be no more cakes and ale?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare (Twelfth Night)

quotes.quote: When you invite the whole world to your party, inevitably someone pees in the beer.
quotes.author: Xeni Jardin

quotes.quote: To suckle fools and chronicle small beer.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare (Othello)

quotes.quote: 'Did you ever taste beer?' 'I had a sip of it once,' said the small servant. 'Here's a state of things!' cried Mr. Swiveller—'.She never tasted it — it can’t be tasted in a sip!'
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Paintings are like a beer. Only beer tastes good, and it's hard to stop drinking beer.
quotes.author: Billy Carter

quotes.quote: Bread is the staff of life, but beer is life itself.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Better weak beer than an empty cask.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Beware, froth is not beer.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Cider on beer, never fear; beer upon cider, makes a bad rider.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Froth is no beer.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: He that drinks beer, thinks beer.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: I am a firm believer in the people. If given the truth, they can be depended upon to meet any national crisis. The great point is to bring them the real facts, and beer.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: After water and tea, beer is the third most popular drink in the world. This should not he surprising, as beer is also the most complex and varied of drinks. It can taste like lemons or smoke, coffee or coconuts, bananas or bread, chilies or ginger. Beer can be crisply acidic and earthy, or it can be bracingly bitter and spectacularly aromatic. It can evince a mere prickle of carbonation or flourish on the palate into a fine mousse. It can be enjoyed days after it was brewed or emerge from a bottle more than a century later and produce rapturous delight.
quotes.author: Garrett Oliver

quotes.quote: Many of life’s great moments happen at the table, whether these be the tables in our homes, in our restaurants, or in our pubs. The world of beer, this great culture, is worthy of far more respect than it has ever enjoyed, and it is capable of producing far more joy than most people realize.
quotes.author: Garrett Oliver

quotes.quote: When the beer came, I dipped a finger in it and wet down each corner of the paper napkin to anchor it, so it would not come up with the mug each time and make me appear ridiculous.
quotes.author: Charles Portis

quotes.quote: A beer drinker drinks as much with his or her eyes as with their mouth.
quotes.author: Charles W. Bamforth

quotes.quote: There are only two things on Earth that can make an otherwise intelligent, cultured person grab a microphone and start belting out 'Afternoon Delight' in front of total strangers: a lot of beer, and a Karaoke song list.
quotes.author: Duane Swierczynski

quotes.quote: Dear Beer, It's become quite clear that life is better when you're not near.
quotes.author: Sean Donovan

quotes.quote: Beer . . . a high and mighty liquor.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: Bless, O Lord, this creature beer, which thou hast deigned to produce from the fat of grain: that it may be a salutary remedy to the human race, and grant, through the invocation of thy holy name, that whoever shall drink it may gain health in body and peace in soul. Through Christ our Lord. Amen.
quotes.author: Roman Rite

quotes.quote: A little beer is delicious. A little curiosity makes beer more inspiring. And a little knowledge allows beer to take you places. Cheers!
quotes.author: Rich Higgins

quotes.quote: If you give a guy a beer, / He'll want popcorn to go with it.
quotes.author: Phil Newton and J. Edward

quotes.quote: Want beer. Like beer. Beer good.
quotes.author: Buffy Summers

quotes.quote: Vote for beer! Put men to work. Put money in circulation. Don't cha want people to have somethin' in their pockets besides their hands? Don't cha?
quotes.author: Jimmy Potts

quotes.quote: Beer! Beer! Beer! What marvelous beer! How gratifyin'. How gratifyin'. Why, look at that beer! Look at that quality of it! Aw, get the feel of it. Get the feel of it!
quotes.author: Jimmy Potts

quotes.quote: Beer goes very good with beer.
quotes.author: Tony Hunter

quotes.quote: I have respect for beer. I have respect for beer!
quotes.author: John Nash

quotes.quote: No beer until you finish your tequila!
quotes.author: Turanga Morris

quotes.quote: Breakfast beer! Ain't you ever had a beer for breakfast? You take one sip of breakfast beer, the cobwebs go, your voice rises two octaves, and 'Hey, man!' the sun comes up inside you.
quotes.author: Joseph 'Jacknife' Megessey

quotes.quote: Nothing alcoholic. Oh, a beer, maybe.
quotes.author: J.J. Bealer

quotes.quote: Pretty women makes us BUY beer. Ugly women makes us DRINK beer.
quotes.author: Al Bundy

quotes.quote: This movie was shot in 3B - three beers - and it looks good, eh?
quotes.author: Bob McKenzie

quotes.quote: I like the sound of a beer church.
quotes.author: Red Forman

quotes.quote: I am a large man, and I have had many beers to make up for that.
quotes.author: Sgt. Abraham Ford

quotes.quote: Beer before liquor, get drunk quicker. Liquor before beer, you like Pam Grier!
quotes.author: Cal

quotes.quote: You're talking beer, you're talking his belly.
quotes.author: Marcy

quotes.quote: If I asked her master he'd give me a cask a day; / But she with the beer at hand, not a gill would arrange! / May she marry a ghost and bear him a kitten and may / The High King of Glory permit her to get the mange.
quotes.author: James Stephens

quotes.quote: What do you think / The bravest drink / Under the sky?' / 'Strong beer,' said I.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: Teach me to live that I may fear / The grave as little as my beer.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: Tell us, now, how and when / We may find the bravest men?' / 'A sure test, an easy test: / Those that drink beer are the best, / Brown beer strongly brewed, / English drink and English food.'
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: Oh, never choose as Gideon chose / By the cold well, but rather those / Who look on beer when it is brown, / Smack their lips and gulp it down.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: There’s a prize for every one / Every one, any one, / There’s a prize for every one, / Whoever he may be: / Crags for the mountaineer, / Flags for the Fusilier, / For English poets, beer! / Strong beer for me!”
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: O Beer! O Hodgson, Guinness, Allsopp, Bass! / Names that should be on every infant's tongue! / Shall days and months and years and centuries pass, / And still your merits be unrecked, unsung?
quotes.author: Charles Stuart Calverley

quotes.quote: Unfortunately almost all our beer knowledge comes from Budweiser, Miller, and Coors. It's as if all we knew about food we learn from McDonalds.
quotes.author: Jim Koch

quotes.quote: Ah, beer. So many choices, and it makes so little difference.
quotes.author: Bender

quotes.quote: I like it ice cold, I take it with a lime, / Canadian, Mexican, Heineken, American, they're all real good friends of mine / I like it in a mug, in a bottle, or a cup, I like it with a shot / It hits the spot / Beer
quotes.author: Scooter Collins

quotes.quote: It's beer thirty, and I'm thirsty / And I been workin' like a dog all week long / So maybe somethin' cold won't hurt me / 'Cause it's beer thirty, and it's time to party
quotes.author: Brian Kelley; Canaan Lee Smith; Corey Crowder; Ernest K. Smith; Tyler Hubbard

quotes.quote: It’s cold beer country / 110 in the shade / Iced tea won’t cut it / And neither will lemonade / I need a cold Budweiser on a bar stool / And a jukebox by my dear / Singing cold beer country / 'Cause it’s cold beer country round here
quotes.author: Bobby Olen Pinson; Marc David Fortney; Toby Keith Covel

quotes.quote: How I love a glass of beer (More beer) / Beer goes very good with beer (More beer) / When I'm drinking beer I'm thinking, ach life is beer / But there's someone I love even more than beer
quotes.author: Arthur Schwartz; Howard Dietz

quotes.quote: Beer one tastes just like a beer / Beer two, a little bit better than one / Beer three, beer four / Yeah, that was pretty damn good so hand me one more / Beer five and I'm comin' alive / Beer six, man that went down quick / Seven, eight, nine, I'm feelin' fine / And by number ten life's good again, hey / Yeah, that's the power of positive drinkin'
quotes.author: Mark Irwin; Chris Janson; Chris Dubois

quotes.quote: Liquor before beer, in the clear. Wine before whiskey before beer before whiskey before rum before beer, I'm an idiot.
quotes.author: Jen Lewis

quotes.quote: Our local beer maker went out of business - there had been trouble brewing for a while.
quotes.author: Steven W. Skinner

quotes.quote: A flight attendant judged me for ordering alcohol at 7:10 AM on a 50-minute flight. Sorry, lady. The first rule of free beer is drink it.
quotes.author: James Breakwell

quotes.quote: You could consider a new beginning as the start of a new year. A fresh start, a new goal, a year to make your dreams come true. Be determined and persevere.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Do not despise humble beginnings. The Son of God began His life in a humble manger.
quotes.author: Miriam Kinai

quotes.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.author: Maria Robinson

quotes.quote: Be willing to be a beginner every single morning.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: All beginnings are delightful; the threshold is the place to pause.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Every beginning is difficult, but it gets easier from there on.
quotes.author: Erki Nool

quotes.quote: Every beginning is a consequence every beginning ends some thing.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: All endings are also beginnings. We just don't know it at the time.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: A beginning is the end of something, always.
quotes.author: Spider Robinson

quotes.quote: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The beginning is always today.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quotes.quote: Truth is the beginning of every good to the gods, and of every good to man.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: A beginning is that which does not itself follow anything by causal necessity, but after which something naturally is or comes to be.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Great beginnings are not as important as the way one finishes.
quotes.author: James Dobson

quotes.quote: The beginning of atonement is the sense of its necessity.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Keep on beginning and failing. Each time you fail, start all over gain, and you will grow stronger until have accomplished a purpose not the one you began with perhaps, but one you'll be glad to remember.
quotes.author: Anne Sullivan

quotes.quote: What we call the beginning is often the end. And to make an end is to make a beginning. The end is where we start from.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: To see and listen to the wicked is already the beginning of wickedness.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Do not wait until the conditions are perfect to begin. Beginning makes the conditions perfect.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide that you are not going to stay where you are.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: A beginning is the time for taking the most delicate care that the balances are correct.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: Beginnings are apt to be shadowy and so it is the beginnings of the great mother life, the sea.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: Begin at the beginning and go on till you come to the end; then stop.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There are two mistakes one can make along the road to truth not going all the way, and not starting.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Before any beginning, there needs to be a plan of how you are going to get to the end. If you do not create a plan, it is like deciding to play football without the ball.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: There will come a time when you believe everything is finished. That will be the beginning.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: Beginning to think is beginning to be undermined.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: He who chooses the beginning of a road chooses the place it leads to. It is the means that determine the end.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: Beginnings are usually scary and endings are usually sad, but it's everything in between that makes it all worth living.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
quotes.author: Igbo Wisdom

quotes.quote: The hard part is the first grinding; when that is done the rest is easy.
quotes.author: Hausa Wisdom

quotes.quote: Start where you are with what you have, knowing that what you have is plenty enough.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: We have only started; we are just on our way we have just made the first lap in the great race for existence, and for a place in the political and economic sun of men.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: The end is in the beginning and lies far ahead.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: It ain't nothing to find no starting place in the world. You jus start from where you find yourself.
quotes.author: August Wilson

quotes.quote: If initiative is the ability to do the right thing, then efficiency is the ability to do the right thing.
quotes.author: Kelly Miller

quotes.quote: I got myself a start by giving myself a start.
quotes.author: Madame C.J. Walker

quotes.quote: The man who simply sets and waits/For good to come along/Ain't worth the breath that one would take/To tell him he is wrong.
quotes.author: Paul Lawrence Dunbar

quotes.quote: You can't just sit there and wait for people to give you that golden dream, you've got to get out there and make it happen for yourself.
quotes.author: Diana Ross

quotes.quote: Nothing is going to be handed to you. You have to make things happen.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.quote: You start with the perception that the world is an unlimited opportunity.
quotes.author: Bill Strickland

quotes.quote: We start with gifts. Merit comes from what we make of them.
quotes.author: Jean Toomer

quotes.quote: The day you take complete responsibility for your life is the day you start to the top.
quotes.author: O.J. Simpson

quotes.quote: Whenever we stop growing, we start deteriorating.
quotes.author: Louis Farrakhan

quotes.quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
quotes.author: Marin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: When you begin to appreciate the fantastic being you are, you will also begin to see a change in your behavior.
quotes.author: Famous Amos

quotes.quote: Our visions bein with our desires.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Meditation reveals that the obvious place to begin is not in some other place, it's right here.
quotes.author: Angel Kyodo Williams

quotes.quote: No matter how terrible we think we are, how bad we believe we have been, how low we think we have fallen, we can clean out our minds and begin again. The only way out is truth.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: You aspire to great things? Begin with little ones.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Change did not begin with you, and it will not end with you, but what you do with your life is an absolutely vital piece of that chain.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Life only appears to begin with birth and end with death. The flow of life is in fact continuous and eternal, birth and death are merely transformations.
quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

quotes.quote: Do you wish to rise? Begin by descending. You plan a tower that will pierce the clouds? Lay first the foundation of humility.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Do not follow the path. Go where there is no path and begin the trail.
quotes.author: Ashanti Wisdom

quotes.quote: I start where the last man left off.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The trouble with many people is that they take so long to start to begin to get ready to commence.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: It takes all kinds of people to make a world, and it's about time they got started.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Take stock of your thoughts and behavior. Each night ask yourself, when were you negative when you could have been positive? When did you withhold love when you might have given it? When did you play a neurotic game instead of behaving in a powerful way? Use this process to self-correct.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The test of a man or woman's breeding is how they behave in a quarrel.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Human beings, viewed as behaving systems, are quite simple. The apparent complexity of our behavior over time is largely a reflection of the complexity of the environment in which we find ourselves.
quotes.author: Herbert A. Simon

quotes.quote: Good behavior is the last refuge of mediocrity.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: The way we treat people we think can’t help or hurt us—like housekeepers, waiters, and secretaries—tells more about our character than how we treat people we think are important. How we behave when we think no one is looking or when we don’t think we will get caught more accurately portrays our character than what we say or do in service of our reputations.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: Remember that you ought to behave in life as you would at a banquet. As something is being passed around it comes to you; stretch out your hand, take a portion of it politely. It passes on; do not detain it. Or it has not come to you yet; do not project your desire to meet it, but wait until it comes in front of you. So act toward children, so toward a wife, so toward office, so toward wealth.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The big question about how people behave is whether they've got an Inner Scorecard or an Outer Scorecard. It helps if you can be satisfied with an Inner Scorecard.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The weirder you're going to behave, the more normal you should look. It works in reverse, too. When I see a kid with three or four rings in his nose, I know there is absolutely nothing extraordinary about that person.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Behave so the aroma of your actions may enhance the general sweetness of the atmosphere.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: What a person says and does in ordinary moments when no one is looking reveals more about true character than grand actions taken while in the spotlight. Our true character is revealed by normal, consistent, everyday attitudes and behavior, not by self-conscious words or deeds or rare acts of moral courage.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: Behavior seemeth to me as a garment of the mind, and to have the conditions of a garment. For it ought to be made in fashion; it ought not to be too curious; it ought to be shaped so as to set forth any good making of the mind, and hide any deformity; and above all, it ought not to be too straight, or restrained for exercise or motion.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Just as people behave to me, so do I behave to them. When I see that a person despises me and treats me with contempt, I can be as proud as any peacock.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.quote: A man's behavior on dry land differs from his behavior in water; he acts differently indoors and out, in summer and in winter. A man's behavior is always a function of his environment; that is one of the things we mean by behavior.
quotes.author: Ralph Barton Perry

quotes.quote: I believe that you control your destiny, that you can be what you want to be. You can also stop and say, 'No, I won't do it, I won't behave this way anymore. I'm lonely and I need people around me, maybe I have to change my methods of behaving,' and then you do it.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Patience is not simply the ability to wait—it's how we behave while we're waiting.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: One’s character is one’s habitual way of behaving. We all have patterns of behavior or habits, and often we are quite unaware of them. When Socrates urged us to Know thyself, he clearly was directing us to come to know our habitual ways of responding to the world around us.
quotes.author: Tom Lickona; Eric Schaps; Catherine Lewis

quotes.quote: If the human race wishes to have a prolonged and indefinite period of material prosperity, they have only got to behave in a peaceful and helpful way toward one another.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: One must think like a hero to behave like a merely decent human being.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: Trying to understand behavior solely on the strength of observations of behavior is like trying to understand television by looking at the screen and abstaining from theorizing about electromagnetic waves and electrons.
quotes.author: Mario Bunge; Ruben Ardila

quotes.quote: Most of the ills we suffer from are directly traceable to our own behavior. Man is not suffering from the ravages wrought by earthquakes and volcanoes, by tornadoes and tidal waves; he is suffering from his own misdeeds, his own foolishness, his own ignorance and disregard of natural laws.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: As a rule, there is no surer way to the dislike of men than to behave well where they have behaved badly.
quotes.author: Lew Wallace

quotes.quote: You've got to have something to eat and a little love in your life before you can hold still for any damn body's sermon on how to behave.
quotes.author: Billie Holiday

quotes.quote: What a man does, not what he feels, thinks, or believes, is the universal yardstick of behavior.
quotes.author: Benjamin C. Leeming

quotes.quote: We tend to judge others by their behavior, and ourselves by our intentions.
quotes.author: Albert F. Schlieder

quotes.quote: A test of a people is how it behaves toward the old. It is easy to love children. Even tyrants and dictators make a point of being fond of children. But the affection and care for the old, the incurable, the helpless are the true gold mines of a culture.
quotes.author: Abraham J. Heschel

quotes.quote: Behavior is the mirror in which everyone shows their true image.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: There is no better test of a man's integrity than his behavior when he is wrong.
quotes.author: Marvin Williams

quotes.quote: If you behave normally, people treat you normally. It's only when you act as if you're someone special that they feel obliged to stand on ceremony.
quotes.author: Victoria Wood

quotes.quote: The people I respect most behave as if they were immortal and as if society was eternal.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: A man's behavior is the index of the man, and his discourse is the index of his understanding.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: The less I behave like Whistler's mother the night before, the more I look like her the morning after.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: Society becomes how we behave.
quotes.author: Gavin Newsom

quotes.quote: Human behavior flows from three main sources desire, emotion, and knowledge.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: But practically I know men and recognize them by their behavior, by the totality of their deeds, by the consequences caused in life by their presence.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Don't tell me what you believe in. I'll observe how you behave and I will make my own determination.
quotes.author: Alex Trebek

quotes.quote: There are different groups of people in your life that you behave slightly differently with. You behave one way with your family. You behave in a different way with your work colleagues. You behave differently with your friends from the movie club, your fitness instructor⁠—all subtly different personas.
quotes.author: Charlie Brooker

quotes.quote: Your behavior is a choice; it isn't who you are.
quotes.author: Vanessa Diffenbaugh

quotes.quote: As the occasion, so the behavior.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Be + Have = Behave. You will experience your success when you BEHAVE accordingly. BE and you shall HAVE.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Even if society dictates that men and women should behave in certain ways, it is fathers and mothers who teach those ways to children not just in the words they say, but in the lives they lead.
quotes.author: Augustus Y. Napier

quotes.quote: Woe, woe, woe... in a little while we shall all be dead. Therefore let us behave as though we were dead already.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: If you want to change attitudes, start with a change in behavior.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Know how to behave at a fine restaurant, which is a telltale measure of social maturity.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: People's behavior makes sense if you think about it in terms of their goals, needs, and motives.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: Charming people live up to the very edge of their charm, and behave as outrageously as the world lets them.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: I think sometimes bad behaviour can be liberating for certain people. They need to behave badly to find themselves—to go off path to find their path. You see it with kids all the time: They're testing boundaries, and I think that's healthy.
quotes.author: Noah Baumbach

quotes.quote: The true test of character is not how much we know how to do, but how we behave when we don't know what to do.
quotes.author: John W. Holt Jr.

quotes.quote: When a person tries to act in accordance with his conscience, when he tries to speak the truth, when he tries to behave like a citizen, even in conditions where citizenship is degraded, it won't necessarily lead anywhere, but it might. There's one thing, however, that will never lead anywhere, and that is speculating that such behavior will lead somewhere.
quotes.author: Václav Havel

quotes.quote: Our behavior is human with a sliver of animal, our souls animal with a sliver of human.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: It is usually when men are at their most religious that they behave with the least sense and the greatest cruelty.
quotes.author: Ilka Chase

quotes.quote: One of the greatest mistakes of successful people is the assumption, 'I behave this way, and I achieve results. Therefore, I must be achieving results because I behave this way.' This belief is sometimes true, but not across the board.
quotes.author: Marshall Goldsmith

quotes.quote: The laws of behavior yield to the energy of the individual.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Human beings are the only creatures who are able to behave irrationally in the name of reason.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.quote: Perfect valor is to behave, without witnesses, as one would act were all the world watching.
quotes.author: François de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Your thoughts greatly influence how you feel and behave. In fact, your inner monologue has a tendency to become a self-fulfilling prophecy.
quotes.author: Amy Morin

quotes.quote: Always behave like a duck—keep calm and unruffled on the surface but paddle like the devil underneath.
quotes.author: Jacob Braude

quotes.quote: Whether in the locker room, the community, or at home, our goal should not be to simply behave in a specific way. It should instead be to instill the correct values in our hearts, so that our actions will flow out unimpeded, confirming what we truly believe.
quotes.author: Benjamin Watson

quotes.quote: Men behave very oddly in the company of attractive women.
quotes.author: Alex Kapranos

quotes.quote: Men are created like upright angels, but too often behave like downright devils.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: People who dance well, dress well, are well groomed and know how to behave seem to know others who dance, dress and behave well.
quotes.author: Don Cornelius

quotes.quote: To behave with dignity is nothing less than to allow others to freely be themselves.
quotes.author: Sol Chaneles

quotes.quote: It is hard enough to make a plan for how you are going to spend an evening with somebody else. So to make a plan for how you are going to behave in 25 years seems based on a view of life that is incomprehensible to me.
quotes.author: Wallace Shawn

quotes.quote: Behavior, what wert thou / Till this madman show'd thee?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You can't sow an apple seed and expect to get an avocado tree. The consequences of your life are sown in what you do and how you behave.
quotes.author: Tom Shadyac

quotes.quote: In the last analysis we must be judged by what we do and not by what we believe. We are as we behave—with a very small margin of credit for our unmanifested vision of how we might behave if we could take the trouble.
quotes.author: Geoffrey L. Rudd

quotes.quote: Our values and behaviors are incongruent, and this incongruence causes us a certain degree of moral discomfort. In order to alleviate this discomfort, we have three choices: we can change our values to match our behaviors, we can change our behaviors to match our values, or we can change our perception of our behaviors so that they appear to match our values.
quotes.author: Melanie Joy

quotes.quote: History teaches us that men and nations behave wisely once they have exhausted all other alternatives.
quotes.author: Abba Eban

quotes.quote: We delude ourselves into believing that morality comes from somewhere else, whereas in reality we behave as we've been told to behave.
quotes.author: Greg Gaffin

quotes.quote: I place a high moral value on the way people behave. I find it repellent to have a lot, and to behave with anything other than courtesy in the old sense of the word—politeness of the heart, a gentleness of the spirit.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: I like men to behave like men⁠—strong and childish.
quotes.author: Francoise Sagan

quotes.quote: A lot of people get credit for being well-behaved simply because they haven't the money to be otherwise.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: I have nothing but regret that I cannot continue to behave the way I behaved all my life, and I can't wait for a chance to behave immoderately again.
quotes.author: Sonny Mehta

quotes.quote: When a woman behaves like a man why doesn't she behave like a nice man?
quotes.author: Edith Evans

quotes.quote: People are going to behave however the social norms permit, and beyond that.
quotes.author: Max Cannon

quotes.quote: People in distress behave in a stressful way. They aren't all sweetness and light. They don't behave well when they are unhappy. That's just what I've observed.
quotes.author: Penelope Wilton

quotes.quote: I've behaved badly in my life. I hope I haven't behaved as badly as Dickens! In a way, if you're a woman, you're not in a position to behave as badly, because you don't have the economic power.
quotes.author: Claire Tomalin

quotes.quote: The idea is that in any situation, people have a notion as to who they are and how they should behave. And if you don't behave according to your identity, you pay a cost.
quotes.author: George Akerlof

quotes.quote: Little girls as children, I think, are expected to behave better. If a boy's naughty at school, he's a little bit cheeky and mischievous. If a girl's naughty, she's trouble.
quotes.author: Emily Berrington

quotes.quote: Behave yoursel' before folk; / Whate'er ye do, when out o' view, / Be cautious aye before folk.
quotes.author: Alexander Rodger

quotes.quote: The truth is that we all have lives that are complicated. We all get hurt by people we love sometimes. It's laughable to believe that anyone is immune. The important thing is how you behave.
quotes.author: Tamara Mellon

quotes.quote: I'm always astonished to see how badly people can behave when they think no one is noticing.
quotes.author: Diane Mott Davidson

quotes.quote: Etiquette means behaving yourself a little better than is absolutely essential.
quotes.author: Will Cuppy

quotes.quote: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: One thing I believe strongly in this life is that you just don't reward bad behavior.
quotes.author: Dr. Phil McGraw

quotes.quote: If they do it often, it isn't a mistake; it's just their behavior.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The problem with merely tethering your bad behavior is that you'll eventually drop the chain.
quotes.author: Alan Robert Neal

quotes.quote: It's good to know that if I behave strangely enough, society will take full responsibility for me.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: The way we all behave is not understandable / It is so sad to see the wealth of our planet fade away / We all behave like children, taking off the head of our / Teddy bear to see what's inside, taking, not giving back.
quotes.author: Christian Andreu; Joseph Duplantier; Mario Duplantier

quotes.quote: People don't change their behavior unless it makes a difference for them to do so.
quotes.author: Sharon Stone

quotes.quote: We change our behavior when the pain of staying the same becomes greater than the pain of changing. Consequences give us the pain that motivates us to change.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: All male animals, including men, when they are in love, are apt to behave in ways that seem ludicrous to bystanders.
quotes.author: Francis Galton

quotes.quote: OH, when I was in love with you, / Then I was clean and brave, / And miles around the wonder grew / How well did I behave.
quotes.author: A.E. Housman

quotes.quote: We should never permit ourselves to behave in excess except with those whom we will leave soon.
quotes.author: Pierre-Ambroise Choderlos de Laclos

quotes.quote: There seems to be a terrible misunderstanding on the part of a great many people to the effect that when you cease to believe you may cease to behave.
quotes.author: Louis Kronenberger

quotes.quote: Just because everyone is behaving like a clown, it doesn’t mean you have to join the circus.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: If men would behave decently, the world would be decent.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Well-behaved women seldom make history.
quotes.author: Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

quotes.quote: If you can understand human behavior, it can't hurt you nearly as much.
quotes.author: Carol Plum-Ucci

quotes.quote: Because you believed I was capable of behaving decently, I did.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Nothing is so unimpressive as behavior designed to impress.
quotes.author: Jon Elster

quotes.quote: Human behavior flows from three main sources: desire, emotion, and knowledge.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: You have to know human behaviour … And the quality of your writing is absolutely capped at your understanding of human behaviour. You’ll never write above what you know about people.
quotes.author: Tony Gilroy

quotes.quote: Behaviour is the mirror in which we can display our image.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A man's ethical behaviour should be based effectually on sympathy, education, and social ties and needs; no religious basis is necessary. Man would indeed be in a poor way if he had to be restrained by fear of punishment and hope of reward after death.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Behavior is the mirror in which everyone shows their image.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Behavior is what a man does, not what he thinks, feels, or believes.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Our thinking and our behaviour are always in anticipation of a response. It is therefore fear-based.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: We can know a person by observing his behaviour, understanding the reasons for his actions and ascertaining his intentions. If we do this, how can we not know him?
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Our behaviour as an athlete is often determined by our previous experiences and how we dealt with those experiences. It is these experiences from past performances that can often shape what will happen in the future. It is for this reason that you learn and move on to be more mentally stronger as both an athlete and as a human!
quotes.author: David Horne

quotes.quote: Some split between the inner world and outer world is common to all behaviour, and the need to bridge the gap is the source of creative behaviour.
quotes.author: Anthony Storr

quotes.quote: Your behaviour is the mirror, for your mental state.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: The way people behave is usually just a reflection of where they are in their journey of consciousness, what their own experiences thus far have been. We do not have to react to them, we can simply move to our own level of understanding. By observing others, we can also reflect upon our selves, and out own ways of being.
quotes.author: Julia Woodman

quotes.quote: The behaviour and attitude of another person's towards you reflect their state of inner self and mindset.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Our behavior is human with a sliver of animal, our souls animal with a sliver of human.
quotes.author: Carrie Latet

quotes.quote: Practice self-awareness, self-evaluation, and self-improvement. If we are aware that our manners - language, behavior, and actions - are measured against our values and principles, we are able to more easily embody the philosophy, leadership is a matter of how to be, not how to do.
quotes.author: Frances Hesselbein

quotes.quote: People repeat behaviour that leads to flooding their brains with pleasurable chemicals. The short-term reward loop acts over hours to years, and the long-term reproductive success loop over generations.
quotes.author: Keith Henson

quotes.quote: Perfect behavior is born of complete indifference.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Anything that changes your values changes your behaviour.
quotes.author: George A. Sheehan

quotes.quote: There's no map to human behaviour.
quotes.author: Bjork

quotes.quote: The world sees in our conduct, in our behaviour, the proof that we are the real children of God.
quotes.author: Pope Shenouda III of Alexandria

quotes.quote: Don't indulge in careless behaviour. Don't be the friend of sensual pleasures. He who meditates attentively attains abundant joy.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: The basic fundamental of behaviour should be to give.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: How you are perceived is impacted more by passage of time than by any behavioural changes.
quotes.author: Alok Karkera

quotes.quote: Your behaviour can make friends and as well as opponents and enemies too. It depends on you.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Hard work make us strong and behaviour makes us unique.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: We change other people's behavior by changing our own
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Let that which stood in front go behind, let that which was behind advance to the front, let bigots, fools, unclean persons, offer new propositions, let the old propositions be postponed.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: If you fall behind, run faster. Never give up, never surrender, and rise up against the odds.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Unless we move beyond what’s behind us, we cannot reach out to what lies in front of us.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: Always try to see behind what you see because all you need to see can be only at the behind of the thing you see!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Be there for others, never leave yourself behind.
quotes.author: Dodinsky

quotes.quote: If you focus on what you left behind, you will never see what lies ahead.
quotes.author: Gusteau Ratatouille

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies ahead of us are tiny matters compared to what lives within us.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: It is better to lead from behind and to put others in front, especially when you celebrate victory when nice things occur.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Behind all their personal vanity, women themselves always have an impersonal contempt for woman.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
quotes.author: Mike Pence

quotes.quote: There are times when parenthood seems nothing more than feeding the hand that bites you.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: Fatherhood is great because you can ruin someone from scratch.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: Anyone can be a father but it takes someone special to be a dad.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't worry that children never listen to you; worry that they are always watching you.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: The quality of a father can be seen in the goals, dreams and aspirations he sets not only for himself, but for his family.
quotes.author: Reed Markham

quotes.quote: Dad always thought laughter was the best medicine, which I guess is why several of us died of tuberculosis.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: A successful father is not more successful than his children.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is a very small one, particularly if he plays golf.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Being a father means you have to think fast on your feet. You must be judicious, wise, brave, tender, and willing to put on a frilly hat and sit down to a pretend tea party.
quotes.author: Matthew Buckley

quotes.quote: You don't raise heroes, you raise sons. And if you treat them like sons, they'll turn out to be heroes, even if it's just in your own eyes.
quotes.author: Walter M. Schirra, Sr.

quotes.quote: A good father is one of the most unsung, unpraised, unnoticed, and yet one of the most valuable assets in our society.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Fatherhood is a lifetime responsibility with its challenges, sweetness and bitterness.
quotes.author: Oluwakemi Ola-Ojo

quotes.quote: It is a wise father that knows his own child.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: More specifically being a dad is a diverse responsibility, and it is also defined by providing support to your partner in the glorious journey of parenthood.
quotes.author: Natalie L S West

quotes.quote: A father is always making his baby into a little woman. And when she is a woman he turns her back again.
quotes.author: Enid Bagnold

quotes.quote: A child looks up at the stars and wonders. Great fathers put a child on his shoulders and helps them to grab a star.
quotes.author: Reed Markham

quotes.quote: The father who does not teach his son his duties is equally guilty with the son who neglects them.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Being a great father is like shaving. No matter how good you shaved today, you have to do it again tomorrow.
quotes.author: Reed Markham

quotes.quote: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: It is much easier to become a father than to be one.
quotes.author: Kent Nerburn

quotes.quote: Becoming a father is easy enough, but being one can be very rough.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Busch

quotes.quote: A father has to be a provider, a teacher, a role model, but most importantly, a distant authority figure who can never be pleased. Otherwise, how will children ever understand the concept of God?
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: Being a father is the most rewarding thing a man whose career has plateaued can do.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
quotes.author: Theodore Hesburgh

quotes.quote: It is not flesh and blood but the heart which makes us fathers and sons.
quotes.author: Johann Schiller

quotes.quote: He was a father. That's what a father does. Eases the burdens of those he loves. Saves the ones he loves from painful last images that might endure for a lifetime.
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.quote: Becoming a dad is one thing being a dad is many things.
quotes.author: Steve Chapman

quotes.quote: Fatherly love is the act of giving your life for the sake of someone else's needs.
quotes.author: Nate Dallas

quotes.quote: By the time a man realizes that maybe his father was right, he usually has a son who thinks he's wrong.
quotes.author: Charles Wadsworth

quotes.quote: The guys who fear becoming fathers don't understand that fathering is not something perfect men do, but something that perfects the men.
quotes.author: Frank Pittman

quotes.quote: As fathers, we understand that we have the opportunity to image forth God's love to our family.
quotes.author: Matt Click

quotes.quote: Dads are most ordinary men turned by love into heroes, adventures, story-tellers, and singers of songs.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: The heart of a father is the masterpiece of nature.
quotes.author: Antoine Francois Prevost

quotes.quote: One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Blessed indeed is the man who hears many gentle voices call him father!
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: A father is the one friend upon whom we can always rely. In the hour of need, when all else fails, we remember him upon whose knees we sat when children, and who soothed our sorrows; and even though he may be unable to assist us, his mere presence serves to comfort and strengthen us.
quotes.author: Émile Gaboriau

quotes.quote: To a father growing old nothing is dearer than a daughter.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: The greatest mark of a father is how he treats his children when no one is looking.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: Fathers provide not only support but also encouragement.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Anyone who tells you fatherhood is the greatest thing that can happen to you, they are understating it.
quotes.author: Mike Myers

quotes.quote: Fatherhood is pretending the present you love most is soap on a rope.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Being a father is about adaptation and about making the most of the opportunities that are given to you.
quotes.author: Colin Adams

quotes.quote: The guys who fear becoming fathers don't understand that fathering is not something perfect men do, but something that perfects the man. The end product of child raising is not the child but the parent.
quotes.author: Frank Pittman

quotes.quote: Being a father truly is a blessing and a role not to be taken for granted.
quotes.author: Derek Polen

quotes.quote: If you take being a father seriously, you'll know that you're not big enough for the job, not by yourself. Being a father will put you on your knees if nothing else ever did.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote: When a father gives to his son, both laugh; when a son gives to his father, both cry.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Having children is like having a bowling alley installed in your brain.
quotes.author: Martin Mull

quotes.quote: Becoming a good father is not about learning five practical handy techniques that can be pulled out of the kitbag whenever they're needed. It's a mind game. It's about having a set of attitudes and ideas that shape what you do in the thousands of different situations you find yourself in as a dad.
quotes.author: Tony Payne

quotes.quote: Any man can be a father. It really does take someone extra special to be a dad!
quotes.author: Anne Geddes
