quotes.quote: A father is a giant from whose shoulders you can see for ever.
quotes.author: Perry Garfinkel

quotes.quote: Up until I became a father, it was all about self-obsession. But then I learned exactly what it's all about: the delight of being a servant.
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.quote: Being a dad is the new black.
quotes.author: Laurence Llewellyn-Bowen

quotes.quote: Fathering is the most masculine thing a man can do.
quotes.author: Frank Pittman

quotes.quote: Fathers embody a delicious mixture of familiarity and novelty; they are novel without being strange or frightening.
quotes.author: Louise Kaplan

quotes.quote: Being a father is like doing drugs—you smell bad, get no sleep and spend all your money on them.
quotes.author: Paul Bettany

quotes.quote: Dads regard themselves a giant shock absorber, there to protect the family from the ruts and bumps on the road of life.
quotes.author: W. Bruce Cameron

quotes.quote: [A father is] chock-full of qualms and romantic terrors, believing change is a threat... like your first shoes with heels on.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: There's a time for being a rockstar, on TV, and in the studio, but you've got to put time aside for being daddy, and getting chocolate rubbed in your face.
quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

quotes.quote: Being a dad is more important than football.
quotes.author: David Beckham

quotes.quote: What' a good investment? Go home from work early and spend the afternoon throwing a ball around with your son.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: I feel cheated never being able to know what it's like to get pregnant, carry a child and breastfeed.
quotes.author: Dustin Hoffman

quotes.quote: I make it a rule to pat all children on the head as they pass by — in case it is one of mine.
quotes.author: Augustus John

quotes.quote: Being a dad is one of the oldest "professions" around.
quotes.author: Marcus Jacob Goldman

quotes.quote: ... when I looked at you first I saw not your mother and me, but your two grandfathers... and, as my father, whom I loved a great deal, had died the year before, I was moved to see that here, in you, he was alive.
quotes.author: Peter Carey

quotes.quote: You know the only people who are always sure about the proper way to raise children? Those who've never had any.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: It is easier for a father to have children than for children to have a real father.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: I was the same kind of father as I was a harpist—I played by ear.
quotes.author: Harpo Marx

quotes.quote: Fathers, like mothers, are not born. Men grow into fathers—and fathering is a very important stage in their development.
quotes.author: David Gottesman

quotes.quote: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Ideally, they should give you a couple of "practice kids" before you have any for real. Sort of like bowling a few frames for free before you start keeping score. Let you warm up.
quotes.author: Paul Reiser

quotes.quote: The father is always a Republican toward his son, and his mother's always a Democrat.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: My son is seven years old. I am fifty-four. It has taken me a great many years to reach that age. I am more respected in the community, I am stronger, I am more intelligent and I think I am better than he is. I don't want to be his pal, I want to be a father.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: My children give me the gift of stepping out of the daily ordinariness into the father zone—a place where my innate curiosity, sense of adventure, and love of a weekend gets rediscovered.
quotes.author: Jeff Stone

quotes.quote: Father of fathers, make me one, / A fit example for a son.
quotes.author: Douglas Malloch

quotes.quote: A young man asks an older musician, "How do I get to Carnegie Hall?" To which the older man answers, "Practice, my son, practice." You can say the same for fatherhood.
quotes.author: Jean Marzollo

quotes.quote: By profession I am a soldier and take great pride in that fact, but I am also prouder, infinitely prouder, to be a father. A soldier destroys in order to build; the father only builds, never destroys.
quotes.author: General Douglas MacArthur

quotes.quote: Fatherhood is the best thing I ever did. It changes your perspective. You can write a book, you can make a movie, you can paint a painting, but having kids is really the most extraordinary thing I have taken on.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.quote: Being a father has been, without a doubt, my greatest source of achievement, pride, and inspiration. Fatherhood has taught me about unconditional love, reinforced the importance of giving back, and taught me how to be a better person.
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.quote: I wasn't anything special as a father. But I loved them and they knew it.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis Jr.

quotes.quote: Of all the titles that I've been privileged to have, Dad has always been the best.
quotes.author: Ken Norton

quotes.quote: One of the scary things is that, when you're a kid, you look at your dad as the man who has no fear. When you're an adult, you realize your father had fear and that you have it, too.
quotes.author: David Duchovny

quotes.quote: Men should always change diapers. It's a very rewarding experience. It's mentally cleansing. It's like washing dishes, but imagine if the dishes were your kids, so you really love the dishes.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.quote: Be a dad. Don't be a 'Mom's assistant.'
quotes.author: Louis CK

quotes.quote: He adopted a role called Being a Father so that his child would have something mythical and infinitely important: a Protector.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.quote: Words have an awesome impact. The impression made by a father's voice can set in motion an entire trend of life.
quotes.author: Gordon MacDonald

quotes.quote: Being a father can "unreason" your worldview, or at least make it very flexible, and that can create all sorts of fun and insights. It's sad that children's open-eyed wonder and sense of play begin to fade as they approach adolescence. One grand function of fathering is to keep the fading to a minimum.
quotes.author: Clyde Edgerton

quotes.quote: A man's fatherliness is enriched as much by his acceptance of his feminine and childlike strivings as it is by his memories of tender closeness with his own father. A man who has been able to accept tenderness from his father is able to later in life to be tender with his own children.
quotes.author: Louise Kaplan

quotes.quote: Becoming a father increases your capacity for love and your level of patience. It opens up another door in a person—a door which you may not even have known was there. That's what I feel with my son. There's suddenly another level of love that expands. My son is my greatest joy, out of everything in my life.
quotes.author: Kyle MacLachlan

quotes.quote: Being a father makes everything in the world make sense.
quotes.author: Cameron Mathison

quotes.quote: Fatherhood is a very natural thing; it's not something that shakes up my life but rather it enriches it.
quotes.author: Andrea Bocelli

quotes.quote: When you teach your son, you teach your son’s son.
quotes.author: The Talmud

quotes.quote: I believe that what we become depends on what our fathers teach us at odd moments, when they aren’t trying to teach us.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: Every dad, if he takes time out of his busy life to reflect upon his fatherhood, can learn ways to become an even better dad.
quotes.author: Jack Baker

quotes.quote: The nature of impending fatherhood is that you are doing something that you’re unqualified to do, and then you become qualified while doing it.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Son, there are times a man has to do things he doesn’t like to, in order to protect his family.
quotes.author: Ralph Moody

quotes.quote: There are many kinds of success in life worth having. It is exceedingly interesting and attractive to be a successful business man, or railway man, or farmer, or a successful lawyer or doctor; or a writer, or a President, or a ranchman, or the colonel of a fighting regiment, or to kill grizzly bears and lions. But for unflagging interest and enjoyment, a household of children, if things go reasonably well, certainly makes all other forms of success and achievement lose their importance by comparison.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: To have done no man a wrong to walk and live, unseduced, within arm's length of what is not your own, with nothing between your desire and its gratification but the invisible law of rectitude this is to be a man.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: You have to be a man before you can be a gentleman.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: He understood well enough how a man with a choice between pride and responsibility will almost always choose pride if responsibility robs him of his manhood.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: A man's ledger does not tell what he is, or what he is worth. Count what is in man, not what is on him, if you would know what he is worth whether rich or poor.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: It is not what he has, or even what he does which expresses the worth of a man, but what he is.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: No great man ever complains of want of opportunity.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There is nothing noble being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: It takes a great man to be a good listener.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: A man does what he must -- in spite of personal consequences, in spite of obstacles and dangers, and pressures -- and that is the basis of all human morality.
quotes.author: John Kennedy

quotes.quote: Men are like steel. When they lose their temper, they lose their worth.
quotes.author: Chuck Norris

quotes.quote: It is not titles that make men illustrious, but men who make titles illustrious.
quotes.author: Machiavelli

quotes.quote: Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Few men have virtue to withstand the highest bidder.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Man is least himself when he talks in his own person. Give him a mask, and he will tell you the truth.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If a man's mind becomes pure, his surroundings will also become pure.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: A man who does not think for himself does not think at all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A man may conquer a million men in battle but one who conquers himself is, indeed, the greatest of conquerors.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The value of a man should be seen in what he gives and not in what he is able to receive.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Have you never seen a strange unconnected deformed representation of a figure, which seen in another point of view, became proportioned and agreeable? It is the picture of man.
quotes.author: Fulke Greville

quotes.quote: Man, unlike anything organic or inorganic in the universe, grows beyond his work, walks up the stairs of his concepts, emerges ahead of his accomplishments.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: A man ought to carry himself in the world as an orange tree would if it could walk up and down in the garden--swinging perfume from every little censer it holds up to the air.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Men aren't really complicated ... They are very simple, literal creatures. They usually mean what they say. And we spend hours trying to analyze what they've said, when really it's obvious.
quotes.author: E. L. James

quotes.quote: A strong man doesn't have to be dominant toward a woman. He doesn't match his strength against a woman weak with love for him. He matches it against the world.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: There is one rule, above all others, for being a man. Whatever comes, face it on your feet.
quotes.author: Larissa Ione

quotes.quote: A man must at times be hard as nails: willing to face up to the truth about himself, and about the woman he loves, refusing compromise when compromise is wrong. But he must also be tender. No weapon will breach the armor of a woman's resentment like tenderness.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote: A man should be able to hear, and to bear, the worst that could be said of him.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: You can't measure manhood with a tape line around his biceps.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: The teaching of one true man will carry further and deeper then that would dozen white Babus.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Show yourself in all respects to be a model of good works, and in your teaching show integrity, dignity,
quotes.author: Titus 2:7

quotes.quote: But as for you, O man of God, flee these things. Pursue righteousness, godliness, faith, love, steadfastness, gentleness.
quotes.author: 1 Timothy 6:11

quotes.quote: Stand true to your calling to be a man. Real women will always be relived and grateful when men are willing to be men.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote: It takes a strong man to accept somebody else's children and step up to the plate another man left on the table.
quotes.author: Ray Johnson

quotes.quote: A man knows his limits, but a real man can overcome them.
quotes.author: Travis Martin

quotes.quote: The value of a man is no measured by what he does for himself to make his life easier, but, measured by what he does for others to make their lives easier.
quotes.author: Eric E. Thomas

quotes.quote: Only real men handle truly delicate women.
quotes.author: Allegra

quotes.quote: Power does not corrupt men; fools, however, if they get into a position of power, corrupt power.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: If you would convince a man that he does wrong, do right. Men will believe what they see.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Man will occasionally stumble over the truth, but most times he will pick himself up and carry on.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Adversity makes men, and prosperity makes monsters.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: All men's miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: In every real man a child is hidden that wants to play.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A man should choose a friend who is better than himself. There are plenty of acquaintances in the world; but very few real friends.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: The real problem is in the hearts and minds of men. It is easier to denature plutonium than to denature the evil spirit of man.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Let men see, let them know, a real man, who lives as he was meant to live.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The real man is one who always finds excuses for others, but never excuses himself.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: You can't relate to a superhero, to a superman, but you can identify with a real man who in times of crisis draws forth some extraordinary quality from within himself and triumphs but only after a struggle.
quotes.author: Timothy Dalton

quotes.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: A real man loves his wife, and places his family as the most important thing in life. Nothing has brought me more peace and content in life than simply being a good husband and father.
quotes.author: Frank Abagnale

quotes.quote: You can't be a real man if you don't look out for your kids. They need you.
quotes.author: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.quote: Real men stay faithful. They don't have time to look for another woman, because they're too busy looking for new ways to love their own.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: To be a man, you have to kill animals, win ballgames, you-you don't cry, you tough out whatever comes your way.
quotes.author: Dick Wolf

quotes.quote: You really think love has anything to do with being a man? A man wouldn't just sit here and do nothing.
quotes.author: Tab Murphy

quotes.quote: You're not brave... men are brave. You say that you want to help people, but you can't feel their pain... their mortality... It's time you learn what it means to be a man.
quotes.author: Chris Terrio

quotes.quote: You don't know how hard it is being a man looking at a woman looking the way you do.
quotes.author: Gary K. Wolf

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to fight to be a man.
quotes.author: Rachel Hall

quotes.quote: Being a man don't mean you have to fight for honor / Being a man don't mean you got the right to all the / All the things that make your eyes grow open wide / Those things don't earn you true respect / They are not a measure of your pride
quotes.author: Francis Griffiths

quotes.quote: It takes more strength sometimes to turn and walk away / When you feel like you have got to prove / That you're a man and you don't play / Being a man isn't easy so try to be a man
quotes.author: Francis Griffiths

quotes.quote: Being a man isn't measured by your way with women / I need a man who will stand by me through thick and thin
quotes.author: Francis Griffiths

quotes.quote: Some people think being a man is unmanly / Some people think that the whole concept's a joke / But some people think being a man is the whole point / And then some people wish they'd never awoke
quotes.author: Lou Reed

quotes.quote: Being a man got nothing to do with age / You can be a boy until the day you lay in your grave / None of us behave like the image of who we're made
quotes.author: Amisho Baraka Lewis

quotes.quote: Well that's just what comes with being a man / I try to do all that I can to make sure that / My son grow up without having to see half of the stuff I've been through
quotes.author: Eric Dan

quotes.quote: I tried to talk to my father he told me not to bother him / He said boy being a man means being strong / Now leave me alone
quotes.author: Owen (Ted) Hewitt

quotes.quote: She says a woman is your pride and joy / And that's why I treat you with seniority / A gentleman is what I strive to be
quotes.author: Kevin Roberson

quotes.quote: Baby I'm a gentleman / And I'm not trying to win you over / Just give me your hand and I'll do what I can
quotes.author: Kevin Roberson

quotes.quote: He's a gentleman with a family / A gentle man, living day to day / He's a gentleman with pride, one may conclude / Sign reads, gentleman with a family will work for food
quotes.author: Cheryl Bentyne

quotes.quote: Men need guidance on the small things: how to make an old-fashioned, the best way to negotiate a raise, how to buy a suit. But also on the more elemental question, such s what i means to be a man and how to live up to that responsibility.
quotes.author: Colum Mccann

quotes.quote: Manhood is a realm, so you might as well rule it. Use your head. Give it your best shot.
quotes.author: Glenn O'Brien

quotes.quote: Being a man really means being everything a man can be.
quotes.author: Glenn O'Brien

quotes.quote: Being a gentleman is really a matter of being sensitive and observant in all situations and not giving offense as one elevates the tone and terms of transactions.
quotes.author: Glenn O'Brien

quotes.quote: A gentleman is reason personified. He improvises.
quotes.author: Glenn O'Brien

quotes.quote: A true Alpha Male, a man who goes for what he wants and has positive expectations that he will achieve his goals, will choose his purpose and his passion.
quotes.author: Corey Wayne

quotes.quote: A man pursuing a purpose he has a burning desire to accomplish gives off a much happier, peaceful, relaxed, successful, inviting, confident and positive vibe.
quotes.author: Corey Wayne

quotes.quote: Once you understand the mindset and actions a man should take, the words really don't matte. It is how you say things rather than what you say that matters.
quotes.author: Corey Wayne

quotes.quote: A man is supposed to be the leader and gently lead the interaction to where he wants it to go.
quotes.author: Corey Wayne

quotes.quote: A man can enhance his eligibility for being high-value by always being purpose-driven and having his priorities in order.
quotes.author: Acie Mitchell

quotes.quote: You are valuable as a man. We are the perpetuators of humanity, leaders, fathers, protectors, conquerors, innovators, and providers for our families and communities.
quotes.author: Acie Mitchell

quotes.quote: As long as you remain on your purpose. You also need to continue to be the best version of yourself as a high-value man.
quotes.author: Acie Mitchell

quotes.quote: But becoming a man isn't all about mind and body. There's another vitally important aspect of life: your soul.
quotes.author: Jason Boyett

quotes.quote: Being a man means learning self-control when it comes to our competitive and aggressive nature.
quotes.author: Jason Boyett

quotes.quote: Real men can discuss their feelings, show compassion, and be sensitive. Real men can cry without it being a news event.
quotes.author: Jason Boyett

quotes.quote: A strong man can have a positive effect on his family.
quotes.author: Harold D. Edmunds

quotes.quote: When a man takes care of his wife and children, he is really helping his family to be healthy, the family will fare better because they have his support.
quotes.author: Harold D. Edmunds

quotes.quote: A man ,will take care of his family whereas an immature boy will run away from his responsibilities.
quotes.author: Harold D. Edmunds

quotes.quote: In order to understand what a man is, we must understand what a man is not.
quotes.author: Harold D. Edmunds

quotes.quote: A man doesn't act like a child or a woman. He's mature and masculine.
quotes.author: Harold D. Edmunds

quotes.quote: A man who does not know how to work, is not more than half a man.
quotes.author: Harvey Newcomb

quotes.quote: You are a man who takes charge of your own life - you make the decisions and choices for yourself - you do not let other people make decisions for you.
quotes.author: Robert Laynton

quotes.quote: Without goals, a man will not reach half of his potential. But with goals, a man will far exceed his wildest dreams.
quotes.author: Darryl Scriven

quotes.quote: A man who had mastered the art of manliness embodied many if not ll.
quotes.author: Brett McKay

quotes.quote: Being a gentleman is more than following a bunch of dos and don'ts. It's about haing a profound respect for yourself and for others.
quotes.author: Brett McKay

quotes.quote: Developing the traits of gentleman is a key to success in all aspects of your life.
quotes.author: Brett McKay

quotes.quote: The difference between a man of sense and a fop is that the fop values himself upon his dress; and the man of sense laughs at it, at the same time he know he must not neglect it.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Appearance matters. Dressing like a gentleman will boost your confidence and win the respect of others.
quotes.author: Brett McKay

quotes.quote: Like every good man, I strive for perfection, and, like every ordinary man, I have found that perfection is out of reach-but not the perfect.
quotes.author: Edward Tivnan

quotes.quote: Men disguised as people who care. So, being a man who really does care, I have to just be tottaly real, and break it down!
quotes.author: Nelson Brown

quotes.quote: If you are drawn into such a discussion without intending to be so, be careful that your individual opinion does not lead you into language and actions unbecoming a gentleman.
quotes.author: Cecil B. Hartley

quotes.quote: A man in a passion ceases to be a gentleman.
quotes.author: Cecil B. Hartley

quotes.quote: A man of real intelligence and cultivated mind, is generally modest.
quotes.author: Cecil B. Hartley

quotes.quote: A gentleman should never appear to be trying too hard. His brilliance should seem effortless and natural.
quotes.author: Alfred Tong

quotes.quote: Along with politeness which is about keeping order, the other characteristic of a gentleman is courtesy.
quotes.author: Sam Guzman

quotes.quote: I like being a woman, even in a man's world. After all, men can't wear dresses, but we can wear the pants.
quotes.author: Whitney Houston

quotes.quote: Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: I feel there is something unexplored about woman that only a woman can explore.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: The reason women don't play football is because 11 of them would never wear the same outfit in public.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Being a lady is an attitude.
quotes.author: Chuck Woolery

quotes.quote: The chief excitement in a woman's life is spotting women who are fatter than she is.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: And verily, a woman need know but one man well, in order to understand all men; whereas a man may know all women and understand not one of them.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: One is not born a woman, one becomes one.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: A man is as good as he has to be, and a woman is as bad as she dares.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Being a woman is hard work.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Being a woman has only bothered me in climbing trees.
quotes.author: Frances Perkins

quotes.quote: The great and almost only comfort about being a woman is that one can always pretend to be more stupid than one is and no one is surprised.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.quote: Being a grown-up woman doesn't mean you can't look beautiful, individual and different.
quotes.author: Twiggy

quotes.quote: A woman's mind is cleaner than a man's: She changes it more often.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.quote: Every woman is a queen, and we all have different things to offer.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: The quickest way to know a woman is to go shopping with her.
quotes.author: Marcelene Cox

quotes.quote: If you ask men about their body image, they will tell you they look better than they do. And if you ask a woman, she'll tell you she looks worse.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: It's simple. Women only nag when they feel unappreciated.
quotes.author: Louis de Bernieres

quotes.quote: I think being a woman is like being Irish... Everyone says you're important and nice, but you take second place all the same.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: When she stopped conforming to the conventional picture of femininity she finally began to enjoy being a woman.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: There is pain in being a woman, yes, but there is pride in it, too.
quotes.author: Mary pauline Lowry

quotes.quote: To rebel against being born a woman seemed as foolish to her as to take pride in it.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: A woman can keep one secret - the secret of her age.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: If a woman has to choose between catching a fly ball and saving an infant's life, she will choose to save the infant's life without even considering if there are men on base.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: The three words women most want to hear from a man are, "You lost weight".
quotes.author: Lori Gottlieb

quotes.quote: A woman who has no way of expressing herself and of realizing herself as a full human being has nothing else to turn to but the owning of material things.
quotes.author: Enriqueta Longauex-Vasquez

quotes.quote: Every woman is wrong until she cries, and then she is right, instantly.
quotes.author: Thomas C. Haliburton

quotes.quote: A man falls in love through his eyes, a woman through her ears.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wyatt

quotes.quote: Woman begins by resisting a man's advances and ends up blocking his retreat.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The expression a woman wears on her face is far more important than the clothes she wears on her back.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: I am a woman in process. I'm just trying like everybody else. I try to take every conflict, every experience, and learn from it. Life is never dull.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: It is hard to be a woman. You must think like a man, act like a lady, look like a young girl, and work like a horse.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Behind every successful woman...... is a basket of dirty laundry.
quotes.author: Sally Forth

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag. She only knows her strength when put in hot water.
quotes.author: Nancy Reagan

quotes.quote: When women are depressed they either eat or go shopping. Men invade another country.
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.quote: No woman should ever perceive herself as inferior to a man, because there is absolutely nothing inferior about child bearing and upbringing.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Women are always being tested ... but ultimately, each of us has to define who we are individually and then do the very best job we can to grow into it.
quotes.author: Hillary Rodham Clinton

quotes.quote: Women are like tricks by sleight of hand, which, to admire, we should not understand.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: Two women can't share a house comfortably, no matter how fond they might be of each other. It's got to be one woman's kitchen.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: A woman is rarely up to date on the subject of her age.
quotes.author: ROBERT ELLIOTT GONZALES

quotes.quote: Women wish to be loved without a why or a wherefore; not because they are pretty, or good, or well-bred, or graceful, or intelligent, but because they are themselves.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Women are strange and incomprehensible, a device invented by Providence to keep the wit of man well sharpened by constant employment.
quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

quotes.quote: Woman is the salvation or destruction of the family. She carries its destinies in the folds of her mantle.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Women are beautiful when they're young, and not after. Men can still preserve their sex appeal well into old age.... Some men can maintain, if they embrace it ... cragginess, weary masculinity. Women just get old and fat and wrinkly.
quotes.author: Tracy Letts

quotes.quote: If a woman is sufficiently ambitious, determined and gifted - there is practically nothing she can't do.
Most women bestow their favors upon men, not from Passion, but from Compassion.
quotes.author: Abraham Miller

quotes.quote: There is in every true woman's heart, a spark of heavenly fire, which lies dormant in the broad daylight of prosperity, but which kindles up and beams and blazes in the dark hour of adversity.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: All is possible to woman, for woman alone may make herself impossible.
quotes.author: Charles Edward Jerningham

quotes.quote: Women don't want to hear what you think. Women want to hear what they think - in a deeper voice.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: A woman can say more in a sigh than a man can say in a sermon.
quotes.author: Arnold Haultain

quotes.quote: When virtue and modesty enlighten her charms, the lustre of a beautiful woman is brighter than the stars of heaven, and the influence of her power it is in vain to resist.
quotes.author: Akhenaton

quotes.quote: The woman who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. The woman who walks alone is likely to find herself in places no one has ever been before.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I am a woman with thoughts and questions and shit to say. I say if I’m beautiful. I say if I’m strong. You will not determine my story, I will.
quotes.author: Amy Schumer

quotes.quote: A woman should be like a single flower, not a whole bouquet.
quotes.author: Anna Held

quotes.quote: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.
quotes.author: Anne Roiphe

quotes.quote: Beauty isn't about having a pretty face. It's about having a pretty mind, a pretty heart, and a pretty soul.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Behind every successful woman is a tribe of other successful women who have her back.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: he most alluring thing a woman can have is confidence.
quotes.author: Beyonce

quotes.quote: Whatever women do they must do twice as well as men to be thought half as good. Luckily, this is not difficult.
quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.quote: Feminism is the radical notion that women are human beings.
quotes.author: Cheris Kramarae

quotes.quote: It matters more what's in a woman's face than what's on it.
quotes.author: Claudette Colbert

quotes.quote: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Keep your heels, head, and standards high.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The best protection any woman can have, is courage.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.quote: I'm excited about the ageing process. I'm more interested in women who aren't perfect. They're more compelling.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: Girls should never be afraid to be smart.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: God gave women intuition and femininity. Used properly, the combination easily jumbles the brain of any man I've ever met.
quotes.author: Farrah Fawcett

quotes.quote: A strong woman looks a challenge dead in the eye and gives it a wink.
quotes.author: Gina Carey

quotes.quote: The story of women’s struggle for equality belongs to no single feminist nor to any one organization but to the collective efforts of all who care about human rights.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: A woman's heart is a deep ocean of secrets.
quotes.author: Gloria Stuart

quotes.quote: Character contributes to beauty. It fortifies a woman as her youth fades. A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude, and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Bisset

quotes.quote: Doubt is a killer. You just have to know who you are and what you stand for.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: Better to be strong than pretty and useless.
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: There is a special place in hell for women who do not help other women.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.quote: A strong woman is a woman determined to do something others are determined not be done.
quotes.author: Marge Piercy

quotes.quote: You are more powerful than you know, you are beautiful just as you are.
quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

quotes.quote: A beautiful woman delights the eye; a wise woman, the understanding; a pure one, the soul.
quotes.author: Minna Antrim

quotes.quote: No matter what a woman looks like, if she's confident, she's sexy.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: Taking joy in living is a woman’s best cosmetic.
quotes.author: Rosalind Russell

quotes.quote: You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.quote: The thing women have yet to learn is that nobody gives you power. You just take it.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: I declare to you that woman must not depend upon the protection of man, but must be taught to protect herself, and there I take my stand.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.quote: I can hear the roar of women’s silence.
quotes.author: Thomas Sankara

quotes.quote: Confidence is 10 percent hard work and 90 percent delusion.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: Translation is like a woman. If it is beautiful, it is not faithful. If it is faithful, it is most certainly not beautiful.
quotes.author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

quotes.quote: I used to think that the worst thing in life was to end up all alone. It's not. The worst thing in life is ending up with people who make you feel all alone.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: I love to be alone. I never found the companion that was so companionable as solitude.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: I live in that solitude which is painful in youth, but delicious in the years of maturity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: I think it's good for a person to spend time alone. It gives them an opportunity to discover who they are and to figure out why they are always alone.
quotes.author: Amy Sedaris

quotes.quote: There are days when solitude is a heady wine that intoxicates you with freedom, others when it is a bitter tonic, and still others when it is a poison that makes you beat your head against the wall.
quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quotes.quote: The most terrible poverty is loneliness, and the feeling of being unloved.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, learn to be alone without being lonely. Learn that being alone does not mean being unhappy. The world is full of plenty of interesting and enjoyable things to do and people who can enrich your life.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: Until you get comfortable with being alone, you'll never know if you're choosing someone out of love or loneliness.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: My alone feels so good, I'll only have you if you're sweeter than my solitude.
quotes.author: Warsan Shire

quotes.quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: It is only when we silent the blaring sounds of our daily existence that we can finally hear the whispers of truth that life reveals to us, as it stands knocking on the doorsteps of our hearts.
quotes.author: K.T. Jong

quotes.quote: In order to be open to creativity, one must have the capacity for constructive use of solitude. One must overcome the fear of being alone.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: You’ve got to be fond of yourself enough to support yourself emotionally regardless of the intimate company of someone else.
quotes.author: Chidere Eggerue

quotes.quote: Nobody is ever going to be able to fill your you shaped hole for you...The gaping hole we all have inside that deeply craves validation, love and comfort.
quotes.author: Chidere Eggerue

quotes.quote: Let me tell you this: If you meet a loner, no matter what they tell you, it’s not because they enjoy solitude. It’s because they have tried to blend into the world before, and people continue to disappoint them.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: What has really happened when you feel alone is that you’ve  abandoned yourself. You have stopped taking care of your own basic needs — you don’t value yourself, you don’t listen to your own thoughts, and you don’t take care of your physical, emotional, or spiritual self. This is what is causing you to feel alone. You have abandoned you.
quotes.author: Gregg Michaelsen

quotes.quote: I wish I could show you when you are lonely or in darkness the astonishing light of your own being.
quotes.author: Hafiz

quotes.quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone.
quotes.author: Sienna Miller

quotes.quote: Don't go away. I don't want to be alone. I can't stand being alone.
quotes.author: Arnold Rothstein

quotes.quote: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.quote: I don't want to be alone, I want to be left alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: I had already found that it was not good to be alone, and so made companionship with what there was around me, sometimes with the universe and sometimes with my own insignificant self; but my books were always my friends, let fail all else.
quotes.author: Joshua Slocum

quotes.quote: When we truly realize that we are all alone is when we need others the most.
quotes.author: Ronald Anthony

quotes.quote: Don't feel alone, because there is always someone out there who loves you more than you can imagine.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Without great solitude no serious work is possible.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: If you are afraid of being lonely, don't try to be right."
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Sometimes its better to be alone, no one can hurt you that way.
quotes.author: Tinku Razoria

quotes.quote: What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
quotes.author: Ellen Burstyn

quotes.quote: All man's miseries derive from not being able to sit quietly in a room alone.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: On some level I walk through the world like the adult human version of the baby bird in Are You My Mother? Subconsciously waiting for someone to see that I am very take-care-of-able, can I live with you now? I know you are my age, but have you ever thought of adopting an adult.
quotes.author: Lane Moore

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to sit awhile and think.
quotes.author: Lorraine Hansberry

quotes.quote: Alone had always felt like an actual place to me, as if it weren't a state of being, but rather a room where I could retreat to be who I really was.
quotes.author: Cheryl Strayed

quotes.quote: What the fear of being alone represents and what causes loneliness is a wake-up call from your heart and soul. They want to show you what lies dormant and triggers all your emotions. They ask you to understand instead of just listen. They beg for attention and ask for reminders of your true nature. They do not know guilt or shame, only truth and profoundness.
quotes.author: Janett Menzel

quotes.quote: Being solitary is being alone well: being alone luxuriously immersed in doings of your own choice, aware of the fullness of your won presence rather than of the absence of others. Because solitude is an achievement.
quotes.author: Alice Koller

quotes.quote: Gotta be okay for a while alone / Look out the window, feeling the glare / Wish I knew how to come up for air / But when I can't see the light / And I wanna hide / When I feel like I'm losing my mind / I gotta sing it out, sing it all to myself / There's no one to run to / There's a voice inside of me / And it's time to listen
quotes.author: Amber Coffman, David Donnell Longstreth

quotes.quote: The great virtue of being alone is that your mind can go its own way.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone; and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom; for it is only when he is alone that he is really free.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: For unknown numbers of people, being alone is not just a preference - it is a craving, a need. Deprived of their time alone for too long, they begin to fantasize about it. Nothing feels quite right until their need for solitude is replenished.
quotes.author: Bella DePaulo

quotes.quote: Being alone when one's belief is firm, is not to be alone.
quotes.author: Berthold Auerbach

quotes.quote: Sitting alone, sleeping alone, acting alone, let the diligent one enjoy the forest, taming the self alone.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: To dare to live alone is the rarest courage; since there are many who had rather meet their bitterest enemy in the field than their own hearts in their closets.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: He is never less at leisure than when at leisure, nor less alone than when he is alone.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Perhaps only people who are capable of real togetherness have that look of being alone in the universe. The others have a certain stickiness, they stick to the mass.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: I mean one of the things about being alone is that you’ve no people to define yourself off, I mean, people are like all-round mirrors, because let’s face it, we don’t often see ourselves all round in a mirror anyway, do we.
quotes.author: Diana Wynn Jones

quotes.quote: All alone! Whether you like it or not, alone is something you'll be quite a lot!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: People think being alone is a luxury, but it's crucial: Whatever you're not down with about yourself gets loud and in your face.
quotes.author: Earl Sweatshirt

quotes.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: By all means use sometimes to be alone. Salute thyself; see what thy soul doth wear.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Associate yourself with men of good quality, if you esteem your own reputation, for ‘tis better to be alone than in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Alone and forsaken / By fate and by man / O lord if you hear me / Take hold my hand
quotes.author: Hank Williams Sr.

quotes.quote: Nobody likes being alone that much. I don't go out of my way to make friends, that's all. It just leads to disappointment.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: I don't mind being alone. Conversation's better.
quotes.author: Helen Jellicoe, Enlightened

quotes.quote: It's hard to love yourself when everyone berates you / I try my best / But there is no rest / But its okay, ill be okay / I'll be alone when the night ends
quotes.author: I AM Jory

quotes.quote: Which is worth more, a crowd of thousands, or your own genuine solitude? Freedom, or power over an entire nation. A little while alone in your room will prove more valuable than anything else that could ever be given you.
quotes.author: Jalaluddin Rumi

quotes.quote: All men's misfortunes spring from their hatred of being alone.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: If you're lonely when you're alone, you're in bad company.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: In solitude, the soundless dialogue which the soul holds with herself finally becomes audible.
quotes.author: Jennifer Stitt

quotes.quote: In solitude What happiness? Who can enjoy alone, Or all enjoying what contentment find?
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Being alone in nature is another way to feel the joy of beauty - and oneness with a greater whole.
quotes.author: Jude Bijou

quotes.quote: Freedom of being alone is intoxicating.
quotes.author: Kangana Ranaut

quotes.quote: There are those among you who seek the talkative through fear of being alone. The silence of aloneness reveals to their eyes their naked selves and they would escape.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: People think being alone makes you lonely, but I don't think that's true. Being surrounded by the wrong people is the loneliest thing in the world.
quotes.author: Kim Culbertson

quotes.quote: In the quiet, unexpressed, unwrestled-through disappointments, Satan is handcrafting his most damning weapons against us and those we love. It's his subtle seduction to get us alone with our thoughts so he can slip in whispers that will develop our disappointments into destructive choices. If the enemy can isolate us, he can influence us.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: Nowhere can man find a quieter or more untroubled retreat than in his own soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: It is only alone, truly alone that one bursts apart, springs forth.
quotes.author: Maria Isabel Barreno

quotes.quote: Being alone was easier. No risk, just loneliness. No one ever died from that.
quotes.author: Marjorie M. Liu

quotes.quote: Being alone with fear can rapidly turn into panic. Being alone with frustration can rapidly turn into anger. Being alone with disappointment can rapid turn into discouragement and, even worse, despair.
quotes.author: Mark Goulston

quotes.quote: Every man must do two things alone; he must do his own believing and his own dying.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: I simply adore being alone - I find it a consuming thirst - and when that thirst is slaked, then I am happy.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: We come alone and we leave alone. Everything else is a gift.
quotes.author: Michael Brandon, A Change of Seasons

quotes.quote: We must reserve a little back-shop, all our own, entirely free, wherein to establish our true liberty and principal retreat and solitude.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Being courageous in solitude, without witnesses, without the prize of a consent, alone in front of oneself, requires great courage and great strength
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Leave me alone; to battle my loneliness till the time I emerged irrevocably triumphant; sprinted forward in untamed exhilaration to bask in the full fervor of life.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh, "Leave Me alone"

quotes.quote: Solitude is the profoundest fact of the human condition. Man is the only being who knows he is alone.
quotes.author: Octavio Paz

quotes.quote: Nothing else so destroys the power to stand alone as the habit of leaning upon others. If you lean, you will never be strong or original. Stand alone or bury your ambition to be somebody in the world.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: I think it's very healty to spend time alone. You need to know how to be alone and not be defined by another person.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Our language has wisely sensed the two sides of being alone. It has created the word "loneliness" to express the pain of being alone. And it has created the word "solitude" to express the glory of being alone.
quotes.author: Paul Johannes Tillich

quotes.quote: Inside myself is a place where I live all alone, and that’s where I renew my springs that never dry up.
quotes.author: Pearl Buck

quotes.quote: To be alone: You must have something to be alone from.
quotes.author: Queen of the Beggars, Thief

quotes.quote: Alone by herself she built the kingdom that she wanted.
quotes.author: R.H. Sin

quotes.quote: I am much too alone in this world, yet not alone enough to truly consecrate the hour...I want my free will and want it accompanying the path which leads to action; and want during times that beg questions, where something is up, to be among those in the know, or else be alone.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke, "I Am Much Too Alone in This World, Yet Not Alone"

quotes.quote: Real love is not an escape from loneliness, real love is an overflowing aloneness. One is so happy in being alone that one would like to share.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Being alone has nothing to do with how many people are around.
quotes.author: Richard Yates

quotes.quote: That's one of the advantages of living alone, no one tells you anything.
quotes.author: Richard, Desk Set

quotes.quote: Truth is, I’m generally happiest when it’s just me. It’s okay to be madly in love with yourself.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Every man who is truly a man must learn to be alone in the midst of all the others, and if need be against all the others.
quotes.author: Romain Rolland

quotes.quote: You need to know how to be alone in order to know how to be together.
quotes.author: Sherry Turkle

quotes.quote: Alone ... The word is life endured and known. It is the stillness where our spirits walk And all but inmost faith is overthrown.
quotes.author: Siegfried Sassoon

quotes.quote: Being alone has a power that very few people can handle.
quotes.author: Steven Aitchison

quotes.quote: We cannot avoid being alone, so we'd better learn to love our own company. We learn our greatest life lessons alone. We discover the truth of who we are alone.
quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

quotes.quote: Being alone is scarier than any boogey man and the reason why I don’t choose to see Horror movies as a rule.
quotes.author: Tom Sizemore

quotes.quote: People drain me. That's why I embrace Silence and Solitude, I can spend days and days On my own without Any human contact, Not feeling lonely for even a moment.
quotes.author: Willowcat

quotes.quote: Sometimes we don't realize the blessings we have until we no longer have them. Appreciate all the blessings in your life, take none for granted.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Gratitude lifts our eyes off the things we lack so we might see the blessings we possess.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: The ability to be genuinely grateful for the things that we have and the people we love, as well as for simply being alive and conscious, will do more for bringing a true feeling of happiness to us on a regular basis than almost anything else.
quotes.author: Cary David Richards

quotes.quote: The best things that have ever happened to me have not been the result of anything I have done. Some might say that is luck. I call them blessings and in some cases miracles.
quotes.author: Tom Krause

quotes.quote: Reflect upon your present blessings, of which every man has plenty; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: Some wish blessings, others pray for them. Some send blessings and they become one.
quotes.author: Joyce C. Lock

quotes.quote: Sometimes we must look outside our own backyards to realize how big the world is and how blessed we are.
quotes.author: Eugene Nathaniel Butler

quotes.quote: Briefly look back on the past, occasionally, to see and feel relief as to how much you were blessed and how far you've progressed with the help of God and His word.
quotes.author: Myra Lee

quotes.quote: Those blessings are sweetest that are won with prayer and worn with thanks.
quotes.author: Thomas Goodwin

quotes.quote: When we lose one blessing, another is often most unexpectedly given in its place.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Be grateful for who you are and whatever you have. Everything you have is a gift from God.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: It is God's will to bless us, but not necessarily on our terms. Sometimes what we think would be a wonderful blessing would not bless us at all.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyers

quotes.quote: In gratitude for God's gift of life to us we should share that gift with others. The art of giving encompasses many areas. It is an outgoing, overflowing way of life.
quotes.author: Wilferd A. Peterson

quotes.quote: It is not doing the thing we like to do, but liking the thing we have to do, that makes life blessed.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: If you concentrate on finding whatever is good in every situation, you will discover that your life will suddenly be filled with gratitude, a feeling that nurtures the soul.
quotes.author: Harold Kushner

quotes.quote: It is impossible to feel grateful and depressed in the same moment.
quotes.author: Naomi Williams

quotes.quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought; and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Being blessed is a condition of the heart and a frame of mind.
quotes.author: Errin Rhorie

quotes.quote: I am blessed for God who allowed me to experience to fall to learn more things, to be matured and to strength my faith and trust in him and to rise to move on and start a new beginning. I am blessed to God for everything in life.
quotes.author: Ivy Geurin

quotes.quote: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Those blessings are sweetest that are won with prayer and worn with thanks.
quotes.author: Thomas Goodwin

quotes.quote: Blessed are they who see beautiful things in humble places where other people see nothing.
quotes.author: Camille Pissarro

quotes.quote: Not what we say about our blessings, but how we use them, is the true measure of our thanksgiving.
quotes.author: W. T. Purkiser

quotes.quote: Be happy when God answers your prayer but be happier when you are an answer to others prayers.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: A blessed thing it is for any man or woman to have a friend, one human soul whom we can trust utterly, who knows the best and worst of us, and who loves us in spite of all our faults.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: Each day offers us the gift of being a special occasion if we can simply learn that as well as giving, it is blessed to receive with grace and a grateful heart.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy.
quotes.author: Guillaume Apollinaire

quotes.quote: Liberty without virtue would be no blessing to us.
quotes.author: Benjamin Rush

quotes.quote: Blessed are those who give without remembering. And blessed are those who take without forgetting.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: When people bother you in any way, it is because their souls are trying to get your divine attention and your blessing.
quotes.author: Catherine Ponder

quotes.quote: Reflect upon your present blessings.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Let us realize that the privilege to work is a gift, the power to work is a blessing, the love of work is success!
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: No man is entitled to the blessings of freedom unless he be vigilant in its preservation.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: The hardest arithmetic to master is that which enables us to count our blessings.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The love of a family is life's greatest blessing.
quotes.author: Eva Burrows

quotes.quote: An early morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: However many blessings we expect from God, His infinite liberality will always exceed all our wishes and our thoughts.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Life holds so many simple blessings, each day bringing its own individual wonder.
quotes.author: John McLeod

quotes.quote: Pray for guidance and give thanks for your blessings everyday.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Bless more blame less.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: If I choose to bless another person, I will always end up feeling more blessed.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: When you wish someone joy, you wish them peace, love, prosperity, happiness all the good things.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Nourish beginnings, let us nourish beginnings. Not all things are blest, but the seeds of all things are blest. The blessing is in the seed.
quotes.author: Muriel Rukeyser

quotes.quote: We should certainly count our blessings, but we should also make our blessings count.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: God will not permit any troubles to come upon us, unless He has a specific plan by which great blessing can come out of the difficulty.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: We are all born to be a blessing.
quotes.author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We failed, but in the good providence of God apparent failure often proves a blessing.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: You never know where a blessing can come from.
quotes.author: Teena Marie

quotes.quote: Those who expect to reap the blessings of freedom must, like men, undergo the fatigue of supporting it.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is to count your blessings while others are adding up their troubles.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Cheating and lying aren't struggles, they're reasons to break up.
quotes.author: Patti Callahan Henry

quotes.quote: Never love someone beneath your level of evolution. If you want a monkey, you can visit one at your local zoo.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Surprises, I feel now, are primarily a form of violence.
quotes.author: Suzanne Finnamore

quotes.quote: I called to tell her I loved her, which was smart, because if I'd have done it in person, I'd have caught her with another man. I don't care if he was my clone, it isn't right and it pisses me off. I was backstabbed by myself.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Sometimes there a hundred lies behind a smile and not a single truth behind a tear.
quotes.author: Saahil Prem

quotes.quote: The sure way to be cheated is to think one's self more cunning than others.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: One of the worst things about trusting someone is really believing that everything they ever told you was the truth. From the I love you's, I need you, I care for you, and that you make them happy and complete, but only in the end to realize you wasn't the only one they was telling that too!
quotes.author: Telisa McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Our supporters can send the message that it's wrong for politically connected corporations to make millions while people doing an honest day's work are being cheated out of an honest day's pay.
quotes.author: Morris Dees

quotes.quote: A wise man can say a foolish thing at any time, anywhere, and to anybody.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey

quotes.quote: Cheaters dont think cheating is wrong until they get cheated on.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Cheating someone is a choice not a mistake.
quotes.author: Sushan Sharma

quotes.quote: Once a cheater, always a repeater.
quotes.author: Melissa Edwards

quotes.quote: Cheating is easy.. Try something more like being faithful.
quotes.author: Don Kel

quotes.quote: I know very well what it is to be out of work and to be cheated by employers and I know what it is to be an employer.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: There is no excuse for cheating in a relationship.
quotes.author: Vicki Sein

quotes.quote: People never know how strong is their lust for being cheated.
quotes.author: Joe Chung

quotes.quote: So whoever knows the right thing to do and fails to do it, for him it is sin.James
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Better is a poor person who walks in his integrity than one who is crooked in speech and is a fool.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: Do not lie to one another, seeing that you have put off the old self with its practices
quotes.author: Colossians

quotes.quote: I tried to keep us together, you were busy keeping secrets.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: So cheat your landlord if you can and must, but do not try to shortchange the Muse. It cannot be done. You can't fake quality any more than you can fake a good meal.
quotes.author: William Burroughs

quotes.quote: It was beautiful and simple as all truly great swindles are.
quotes.author: O. Henry

quotes.quote: For nothing can seem foul to those that win.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Cheaters dont think cheating is wrong until they get cheated on.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Anything worth having is a thing worth cheating for.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: Doubtless the pleasure is as great of being cheated as to cheat.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Cheating is the most selfish thing a person can do in a relationship! If your not happy with the person your with then end it. It's that simple!
quotes.author: Bryan Burden

quotes.quote: He who stands for nothing will fall for anything.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: If you marry a man who cheats on his wife,you'll be married to a man who cheats on his wife.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: It is better to have a relationship with someone who cheats on youthan with someone who does not flush the toilet.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.quote: I don't think he cheated on me.During the marriage, I think he was there
quotes.author: Marla Maples

quotes.quote: Better to be occasionally cheated than perpetually suspicious.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: The easiest way to be cheated is to believe yourself to be more cunning than others.
quotes.author: Pierre Charron

quotes.quote: You didn't just cheat on me; you cheated on us. You didn't just break my heart; you broke our future.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The hardest thing you can do is look back and see what the person you love has done to you.
quotes.author: Sammi Giancola

quotes.quote: Some abuse is not physical. Abuse does not have to be physical. There's emotional abuse, psychological abuse and spiritual abuse.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: It isn't what we say or think that defines us, but what we do.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Next to hurting my family, cheating on me is the worst thing someone could do.
quotes.author: Robert Buckley

quotes.quote: The truly scary thing about undiscovered lies is that they have a greater capacity to diminish us than exposed ones. They erode our strength, our self-esteem, our very foundation.
quotes.author: Cheryl Hughes

quotes.quote: Betrayal was what I felt, my heart broken not just by a guy I was in love with, but also by, as I once believed, a true friend.
quotes.author: Danka V.

quotes.quote: I gave my heart to a man who loved me, who wanted to be with me. Who ultimately was afraid of all I offered.
quotes.author: Rachel Thompson

quotes.quote: People cheat when they are afraid. When there is no cost to being wrong or confessing ignorance, there is no reason to cheat or fake comprehension.
quotes.author: Leah Hager Cohen

quotes.quote: Cheating is the most disrespectful thing one human being can do to another. If you aren't happy in a relationship, end it before starting another one.
quotes.author: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.quote: Where cheating is, there's mischief there.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Cheating was easy, but impossible to go back to.
quotes.author: Dean Osborne

quotes.quote: The truth is that perhaps everything has a price, but certainly everyone has to pay more price only for their lies.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: People generally didn't cheat in good relationships.
quotes.author: Emily Giffin

quotes.quote: One must not cheat anybody, not even the world of one's triumph.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Someone who thinks the world is always cheating him is right. He is missing that wonderful feeling of trust in someone or something.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: To cheat oneself out of love is the most terrible deception; it is an eternal loss for which there is no reparation, either in time or in eternity.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Cheating can assist not just in living an unconventional life, but also in redeveloping your individuality and courage to end the current relationship and move one with confidence that you know what you want and have made the best decision for yourself.
quotes.author: Marleen Marylin Mour

quotes.quote: The act of cheating is something to be seriously considered and thoroughly thought over with trepidation and logic before committing.
quotes.author: Marleen Marylin Mour

quotes.quote: Men and women who have recently discovered that their partner is cheating report experiencing a whole range of emotions, including anger, fear, pain, and humiliations.
quotes.author: Caroline Jackson

quotes.quote: Cheating is an inescapable part of the human condition. Some of us are more comfortable that others acknowledging this fact, but it's still fact, plain and simple.
quotes.author: Jessica Dorfman Jones

quotes.quote: Cheating of any kind can be a moral dilemma for most people. Even so, it's much easier to rationalize small lie or lies of convenience, while the big ones can eat away at you.
quotes.author: Jessica Dorfman Jones

quotes.quote: All things being equal, the more individual free time people have the more likely they are to cheat.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: People with a dismissing style of attachment, are more likely to cheat.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: Infidelity is more common in relationships where people feel misunderstood, under appreciated and where fighting and bickering is common.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: Some people, due to their position in society, their beliefs about gender roles, and their cultural upbringing, believe that it is their right to cheat on their partners.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: Whether your goal is to save your marriage or divorce your unfaithful spouse, you need to keep a level head and develop good coping strategies.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: A victim of infidelity can become completely overwhelmed with trying to figure out why their mate has been disloyal. Victims often become obsessed with attempting to find an answer when there could be several answers or none at all.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: Cheaters come in all ages, shapes, sizes, and colors. They are not limited to a particular race, religion, or financial status. All types of people cheat. Rich ones, poor ones, ugly ones, pretty ones. fat ones, skinny ones, tall ones.. all types of people cheat.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: Cheating can be tricky. You can notice it from jump, or you may not see any changes at all.
quotes.author: Sierra N. Smith

quotes.quote: A typical man will cheat, because for some reason he thinks that he can get away with it.
quotes.author: Sierra N. Smith

quotes.quote: When a man is not ready to commit to you, he will most likely cheat.
quotes.author: Sierra N. Smith

quotes.quote: Women you know that if your significant other has cheated on you before chances are he will do it again. You cannot expect for him to avoid trying what he has gotten by with before a second time.
quotes.author: Sierra N. Smith

quotes.quote: Cheaters may feel good when they cheat. They may even gain from it. But that seems beside the point. Cheating is unfair to others. And many do not know how to make it stop.
quotes.author: Bonnie Szumski

quotes.quote: Cheaters cheat for the same reason hey have always cheated. They want to do better than they deserve to. Many try to avoid responsibility for cheating.
quotes.author: Bonnie Szumski

quotes.quote: Both men and women cheat. However, men are more likely than women to cheat because it is our tendency to think we want more than we have in one woman.
quotes.author: Kevin Rasberry

quotes.quote: Cheating is the largest cause of divorce in world history, evolving over generations and remaining as relative to the time in which we live today, as it did in centuries part.
quotes.author: Maxwell Billieo

quotes.quote: This is not to say that there is no man for you, ladies, but simply to bring you to the reality that for true happiness, it's not just men who have to stop cheating on you; you also have to stop cheating yourself.
quotes.author: Maxwell Billieon

quotes.quote: Women are able to get away with their cheating because no one suspects them. They are good mothers who are always at their kid's events. They are wives supporting their husbands. When outsiders see these women, they are happy, laughing and loving towards their family. These women are able to to get away with cheating because of this very perception.
quotes.author: Terry Azzouz MA LPC LSOTP

quotes.quote: Cheating is not a fantasy, it is an action.
quotes.author: Francisco Bujan

quotes.quote: Men cheat because it's in a man's sinful nature to cheat.
quotes.author: Renee' Lambert

quotes.quote: The act of cheating and not getting caught increases their self-confidence.
quotes.author: Renee' Lambert

quotes.quote: Some men cheat because they have a problem with commitment and intimacy. Some men cheat because of the fear of getting old. Cheating with younger woman makes them feel young again and makes them think they can have any young woman they want.
quotes.author: Renee' Lambert

quotes.quote: Most people do not set out to cheat; their personal dissatisfaction gets the best of them.
quotes.author: Chidi Asika-Enahoro

quotes.quote: Many men succumb faster to temptation when they are married than committed women do even if they are desired.
quotes.author: Chidi Asika-Enahoro

quotes.quote: Most times, serial cheaters cheat with persons that are not as attractive or even in the same intellectual or social league as their life partners.
quotes.author: Chidi Asika-Enahoro

quotes.quote: Cheat me once, you ought to be ashamed; cheat me twice, I ought to be ashamed.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Doubtless the pleasure is as great of being cheated, as to cheat.
quotes.author: Sarah Josepha Buell Hale

quotes.quote: Love is a game in which one always cheats.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: It was all a mistake / Now I've got yo fight to win your love back / I give this all it would take / Never meant to cheat behind your back.
quotes.author: Ola Josiah

quotes.quote: If you cheat now out of revenge, you might do things you could regret later.
quotes.author: Francisco Bujan

quotes.quote: When you cheat, you first say 'No' to your existing couple and 'Yes' to a new connection.
quotes.author: Francisco Bujan

quotes.quote: Cheating is anything that you would not do in front of your mate.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: Emotional cheating can occur without physical cheating and is also harder to detect when no physical acts are taking place.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: A cheating mate who has an emotional connection with another person ordinarily leaves their partner feeling betrayed when their emotional relationship is revealed.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: Many marriages failed is due to broken vows and broken promises and when this lead to the downfall of a marriage; you may start to feel that you cannot trust others.
quotes.author: Beatrice Ivory

quotes.quote: Cheating is the ultimate form of betrayal of trust to the relationship that you are breaking the very reason why you are together.
quotes.author: Gabriel Angelo

quotes.quote: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Elegance is a glowing inner peace. Grace is an ability to give as well as to receive and be thankful. Mystery is a hidden laugh always ready to surface! Glamour only radiates if there is a sublime courage & bravery within: glamour is like the moon; it only shines because the sun is there.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: True class can never receive the highest grade..for its grade is endless.
quotes.author: Denise Newsome

quotes.quote: Dressing well is a form of good manners.
quotes.author: Tom Ford

quotes.quote: I dress in a sophisticated and classy way - I always dress in a way I know my mother wouldn't be embarrassed to see.
quotes.author: Jessie Ware

quotes.quote: You may be a princess or the richest woman in the world, but you cannot be more than a lady
quotes.author: Lady Randolph Churchill

quotes.quote: Elegance is something more than ease--more than a freedom from awkwardness and restraint.--It implies precision, a polish, and a sparkling which is spirited, yet delicate.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Class is a mysterious essence that comes in many forms, depending on the woman. It largely comes from a woman’s sense of herself – from confidence without brashness, from courtesy, from kindness, and often includes a distinct sense of style – though that style can be unique and unconventional.
quotes.author: Selene Kinder

quotes.quote: Tact is the ability to tell someone to go to hell in such a way that they look forward to the trip.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I am by no means a Proper Patty. My grandmother had many bones to pick with me, even as a three year old ('you are never too young for etiquette'). But I was raised with a certain standard that I considered 'the norm.' Manners and class went hand-in-hand. One did not exist without the other. However, in today's society, expecting 'the norm' is like looking for water in the desert.
quotes.author: Rachel Jablow

quotes.quote: Ah, dinner time. A time when you can class it up, or inadvertently do the opposite.
quotes.author: Sara Altschule

quotes.quote: Respect for ourselves guides our morals, respect for others guides our manners.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: Every woman is after a kind of classy image.
quotes.author: Evangeline Lilly

quotes.quote: Being classy isn't a choice. Its a lifestyle.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Being classy is a culmination of being yourself, being positive, and doing good in all the places you can by all the means you can. Clothes, hair, music, film....none of these things a classy person make.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: I don't consider myself a goody-goody, but I like to be perceived as classy.
quotes.author: Kristen Johnston

quotes.quote: Braininess is not attractive unless combined with some signs of elegance; class.
quotes.author: Alice Munro

quotes.quote: A truly elegant taste is generally accompanied with excellency of heart.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: In character, in manner, in style, in all the things, the supreme excellence is simplicity.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: We're very sensitive about what we do, or don't do. We're sassy and classy.
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.quote: Dress shabbily and they remember the dress; dress impeccably and they remember the woman.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: We have classy things and sexy things. We like to look pretty, no matter how big we get.
quotes.author: Carol Johnson

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Be classy. Anything but trashy.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: The most sophisticated people I know - inside they are all children.
