quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.quote: There is more to being classy than simply being stylish and confident. Being classy means always being kind, respectful and polite, even to those who are unkind to you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: She's just a very classy lady, always knows what to say and how to approach someone; she is very caring.
quotes.author: Joy Smith

quotes.quote: A guy wants a classy girl who is smart and has goals - someone that he wouldn't be afraid to bring home to his parents.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.quote: Beauty of style and harmony and grace and good rhythm depend on simplicity.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Respect is love in plain clothes.
quotes.author: Frankie Byrne

quotes.quote: The expression a woman wears on her face is more important than the clothes she wears on her back.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Being stylish is about enjoying your life and expressing yourself and your inner light.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: Chic is when a woman is in harmony with herself.
quotes.author: Giambattista Valli

quotes.quote: Chic is a combination of style and fashion.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Hawes

quotes.quote: Being classy is my teenage rebellion.
quotes.author: Rebecca Mckinsey

quotes.quote: It is not chic to be too chic.
quotes.author: Elsie de Wolfe

quotes.quote: A stylish person, for me, is one who draws your eye without necessarily being showy; they wear clothes that are beautifully cut, flatter the wearer, and show that they are not impervious to fashion, but not a slave to it either.
quotes.author: Jojo Moyes

quotes.quote: Always be a first rate version of yourself instead of a second rate version of somebody else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Elegance is when the inside is as beautiful as the outside.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: To be truly elegant one should not be noticed.
quotes.author: Beau Brummell

quotes.quote: Elegant is not what you wear, and it's not about how you wear it, but it's more about who you are.
quotes.author: Alber Elbaz

quotes.quote: Your intellect may be confused, but your emotions will never lie to you.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: The most confused we ever get is when we're trying to convince our heads of something our heart knows is a lie.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: Anyone who isn't confused, really doesn't understand the situation.
quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.quote: If I look confused it is because I am thinking.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: If you're not confused, you're not paying attention.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: Today, if you are not confused, you are not thinking clearly.
quotes.author: Irene Peter

quotes.quote: Whenever I'm confused about something, I ask God to reveal the answers to my questions, and he does.
quotes.author: Beyonce Knowles

quotes.quote: Someday, everything will make perfect sense. So for now, laugh at the confusion, smile through the tears, be strong and keep reminding your self that everything happens for a reason.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You can't follow your heart when it is more confused than your head.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: However confused the scene of our life appears, however torn we may be who now do face that scene, it can be faced, and we can go on to be whole.
quotes.author: Muriel Rukeyser

quotes.quote: I am both happy and sad at the same time, and I'm still trying to figure out how that could be.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: When you don't know where to start, just go to a place you miss so much.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Confused? Confusion is good. It's an excellent place to learn something new from.
quotes.author: Henna Inam

quotes.quote: If confusion is the first step to knowledge, I must be a genius.
quotes.author: Larry Leissner

quotes.quote: I'm not confused, I'm just well mixed.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Sometimes I'm confused by what I think is really obvious. But what I think is really obvious obviously isn't obvious
quotes.author: Michael Stipe

quotes.quote: Love is when two people who care for each other get confused.
quotes.author: Bob Schneider

quotes.quote: For I am a bear of very little brain and long words bother me.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: The more you explain it, the more I don't understand it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The little waiter's eyebrows wandered about his forehead in confusion.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: It's funny. All you have to do is say something nobody understands and they'll do practically anything you want them to.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: To be given permission to be confused -- and remain confused -- for as long as it takes would have been a huge gift.
quotes.author: Janet Jackson

quotes.quote: To cut off the confusion and accept an answer just because it's too scary not to have an answer is a good way to get the wrong answer.
quotes.author: Janet Jackson

quotes.quote: I pretty much try to stay in a constant state of confusion just because of the expression it leaves on my face.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: We often confuse what we wish for with what is.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: I was just stock in the middle, vague and undefined.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: I am here; and here is nowhere in particular.
quotes.author: William Golding

quotes.quote: We are buried beneath the weight of information, which is being confused with knowledge; quantity is being confused with abundance and wealth with happiness. We are monkeys with money and guns.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: If you are sure you understand everything that is going on, you are hopelessly confused.
quotes.author: Walter F. Mondale

quotes.quote: It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: You always admire what you really don't understand.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: People always seemed to know half of history, and to get it confused with the other half.
quotes.author: Jane Haddam

quotes.quote: A good sacrifice is one that is not necessarily sound but leaves your opponent dazed and confused.
quotes.author: Nigel Short

quotes.quote: The good die young but not always. The wicked prevail but not consistently. I am confused by life, and I feel safe within the confines of the theatre.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: Confusion now hath made his masterpiece.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Without censorship, things can get terribly confused in the public mind.
quotes.author: William Westmoreland

quotes.quote: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Haters are confused admirers who can’t understand why everybody else likes you.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: We have confused the free with the free and easy.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.quote: We feel unhappy and confused with our life when we don't do the focus or calling that God has on our life.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: People don't expect too much from literature. They just want to know they're not alone with being confused.
quotes.author: Jonathan Ames

quotes.quote: The mind that engages in subjects of too great variety becomes confused and weakened.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Confusion is the welcome mat at the door of creativity.
quotes.author: Michael J. Gelb

quotes.quote: The heresies we ought to fear are those that can be confused with orthodoxy.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: When both a speaker and an audience are confused, the speech is profound.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Right is right, and wrong is wrong, and when people start getting it confused, that means they need to sit down with some real people.
quotes.author: Chuck D

quotes.quote: Confused by thoughts, we experience duality in life. Unencumbered by ideas, the enlightened see the one Reality.
quotes.author: Huineng

quotes.quote: A great many of us have confused change with progress.
quotes.author: Adela Rogers St. Johns

quotes.quote: If being crazy means living life as if it matters, then I don't mind being completely insane.
quotes.author: Kate Winslet

quotes.quote: Insanity is often the logic of an accurate mind overtasked.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: You have to go on and be crazy. Craziness is like heaven.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Of course I'm crazy, but that doesn't mean I'm wrong.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: I want to continue being crazy; living my life the way I dream it, and not the way the other people want it to be.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: I can handle the craziness some of the time, maybe most of the time. But I know I can't handle it all of the time.
quotes.author: Chris Evans

quotes.quote: With craziness, you can't predict it. There's very little defense you can have on craziness.
quotes.author: Bryan Cranston

quotes.quote: One person's craziness is another person's reality.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.quote: Insanity - a perfectly rational adjustment to an insane world.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: Insanity in individuals is something rare - but in groups, parties, nations and epochs, it is the rule.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Insanity is hereditary; you get it from your children.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Insanity is knowing that what you're doing is completely idiotic, but still, somehow, you just can't stop it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.quote: Insanity is just what we call stupidity when it doesn't make sense.
quotes.author: Josh Lieb

quotes.quote: Insanity is doing the same thing over and over again, but expecting different results.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: In a totally sane society, madness is the only freedom.
quotes.author: J.G. Ballard

quotes.quote: Insanity destroys reason, but not wit.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Emmons

quotes.quote: One is very crazy when in love.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: If you're going to be crazy, you have to get paid for it or else you're going to be locked up.
quotes.author: H.S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Craziness is what makes the world round, without crazy, there wouldnt be passion.
quotes.author: Wes Campton

quotes.quote: We are all born mad. Some remain so.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: You need a little bit of insanity to do great things.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: I think insanity is the hardest thing to play.
quotes.author: Richard Armitage

quotes.quote: Insanity doesn't run in my family. It gallops.
quotes.author: Cary Grant

quotes.quote: Everyone is more or less mad on one point.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The great proof of madness is the disproportion of one's designs to one's means.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: There is no insanity so devastating in man's life as utter sanity.
quotes.author: William Allen White

quotes.quote: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Better mad with the rest of the world than wise alone.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: You know, a long time ago being crazy meant something. Nowadays everybody's crazy.
quotes.author: Charles Manson

quotes.quote: Insanity is contagious.
quotes.author: Joseph Heller

quotes.quote: Here's all you have to know about men and women: women are crazy, men are stupid. And the main reason women are crazy is that men are stupid.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Being crazy isn't enough.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Don't gobblefunk around with words.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: The Edge... There is no honest way to explain it because the only people who really know where it is are the ones who have gone over.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Rejection, though--it could make the loss of someone you weren't even that crazy about feel gut wrenching and world ending.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: Some are born mad, some achieve madness, and some have madness thrust upon 'em.'
quotes.author: Emilie Autumn

quotes.quote: To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Many people hear voices when no one is there. Some of them are called mad and are shut up in rooms where they stare at the walls all day. Others are called writers and they do pretty much the same thing.
quotes.author: Margaret Chittenden

quotes.quote: The thoughts written on the walls of madhouses by their inmates might be worth publicizing.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: I may be crazy, but it keeps me from going insane.
quotes.author: Waylon Jennings

quotes.quote: Live life fully while you're here. Experience everything. Take care of yourself and your friends. Have fun, be crazy, be weird. Go out and screw up! You're going to anyway, so you might as well enjoy the process. Take the opportunity to learn from your mistakes: find the cause of your problem and eliminate it. Don't try to be perfect; just be an excellent example of being human.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: What sane person could live in this world and not be crazy?
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: It wasn't until I started reading and found books they wouldn't let us read in school that I discovered you could be insane and happy and have a good life without being like everybody else.
quotes.author: John Waters

quotes.quote: Men have called me mad; but the question is not yet settled, whether madness is or is not the loftiest intelligence - whether much that is glorious - whether all that is profound - does not spring from disease of thought - from moods of mind exalted at the expense of the general intellect.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The point is to be free, not to be crazy.
quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.quote: Live life fully while you're here. Experience everything. Take care of yourself and your friends. Have fun, be crazy, be weird.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Crazy people are considered mad by the rest of the society only because their intelligence isn't understood.
quotes.author: Weihui Zhou

quotes.quote: Some people never go crazy. What truly horrible lives they must live.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Some people hear their own inner voices with great clearness. And they live by what they hear. Such people become crazy… or they become legends.
quotes.author: Jim Harrison

quotes.quote: Love is the gross exaggeration of the difference between one person and everybody else.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A man in love is incomplete until he is married. Then he’s finished.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: My advice to you is get married: if you find a good wife you’ll be happy; if not, you’ll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: You can always trust the information given to you by people who are crazy; they have an access to truth not available through regular channels.
quotes.author: Sheila Ballantyne

quotes.quote: We’re all crazy and the only difference between patients and their therapists is the therapists haven’t been caught yet.
quotes.author: Max Walker

quotes.quote: You could have all the crazy thoughts you wanted, as long as you smiled and kept them to yourself.
quotes.author: Mara Purnhagen

quotes.quote: Crazy' is a term of art; 'Insane' is a term of law. Remember that, and you will save yourself a lot of trouble.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Silence speaks so much louder than screaming tantrums. Never give anyone an excuse to say that you're crazy.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Minds that have withered into psychosis are far more terrifying than any character of fiction.
quotes.author: Christian Baloga

quotes.quote: You need to decide to stop letting their crazy box you in.
quotes.author: Ella Fox

quotes.quote: We are all agreed that your theory is crazy. The question which divides us is whether it is crazy enough to have a chance of being correct. My own feeling is that it is not crazy enough.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: What I love most about this crazy life is the adventure of it.
quotes.author: Juliette Binoche

quotes.quote: Work like there is someone working twenty-four hours a day to take it all away from you.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: I’m not strange, weird, off, nor crazy, my reality is just different from yours.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: The truth is you don’t know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: In a mad world, only the mad are sane.
quotes.author: Akira Kurosawa

quotes.quote: To myself I am only a child playing on the beach, while vast oceans of truth lie undiscovered before me.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: People think you’re crazy if you talk about things they don’t understand.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: I’m crazy, but I’m not stupid.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.quote: The surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe is that it has never tried to contact us.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: In order to develop normally, a child requires progressively more complex joint activity with one or more adults who have an irrational emotional relationship with the child. Somebody’s got to be crazy about that kid. That’s number one. First, last and always.
quotes.author: Urie Bronfenbrenner

quotes.quote: Sane is boring.
quotes.author: R.A. Salvatore

quotes.quote: My psychiatrist told me I’m going crazy. I told him, ‘If you don’t mind I’d like a second opinion.’ He said, ‘All right… you’re ugly too!’
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: A question that sometimes drives me hazy: am I or are the others crazy?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I was nauseous and tingly all over. I was either in love or I had smallpox.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, ‘What! You too? I thought I was the only one!
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four Americans is suffering from some form of mental illness. Think of your three best friends. If they’re okay, then it’s you.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: When you're the only sane person, you look like the only insane person.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: So you're a little weird? Work it! A little different? OWN it! Better to be a nerd than one of the herd!
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Life's no piece of cake, mind you, but the recipe's my own to fool with.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Be different so that people can see you clearly amongst the crowds.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The person who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. The person who walks alone is likely to find himself in places no one has ever seen before.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I think every person has their own identity and beauty. Everyone being different is what is really beautiful. If we were all the same, it would be boring.
quotes.author: Tila Tequila

quotes.quote: I think being different, going against the grain of society is the greatest thing in the world.
quotes.author: Elijah Wood

quotes.quote: It's really important to share the idea that being different might feel like a problem at the time, but ultimately diversity is a strength.
quotes.author: Carson Kressley

quotes.quote: People have a problem with me being different, but that propels me forward in life.
quotes.author: Mary-Louise Parker

quotes.quote: Share our similarities, celebrate our differences.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: Be daring, be different, be impractical, be anything that will assert integrity of purpose and imaginative vision against the play-it-safers, the creatures of the commonplace, the slaves of the ordinary.
quotes.author: Cecil Beaton

quotes.quote: If you want to stand out, don't be different; be outstanding.
quotes.author: Meredith West

quotes.quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: The hardest struggle of all is to be something different from what the average man is.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schwab

quotes.quote: When we allow ourselves to exist truly and fully, we sting the world with our vision and challenge it with our own ways of being.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: My great mistake, the fault for which I can't forgive myself is that one day I ceased my obstinate pursuit of my own individuality.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: To be nobody but yourself in a world doing its best to make you everybody else means to fight the hardest battle any human can ever fight and never stop fighting.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: At bottom every man knows well enough that he is a unique being, only once on this earth; and by no extraordinary chance will such a marvelously picturesque piece of diversity in unity as he is, ever be put together a second time.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music which he hears, however measured or far away.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Always be a first rate version of yourself, instead of a second rate version of somebody else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Originality is a by product of sincerity.
quotes.author: Marianne Moore

quotes.quote: Some are born weird, some achieve it, others have weirdness thrust upon them.
quotes.author: Dick Francis

quotes.quote: The longer you go by yourself the weirder you get, and the weirder you get the longer you go by yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Shepard

quotes.quote: There's a whole category of people who miss out by not allowing themselves to be weird enough.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: If everyone is thinking alike, then somebody isn t thinking.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a weird human being, It's just that some people require more understanding than others.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Fitting in allows you to blend in with everyone else, but being different allows you to be yourself, to be unique and to be more creative.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Do something remarkable or accept being the mere statistic that you have always been awarded.
quotes.author: Tsepiso Makhubedu

quotes.quote: Remind yourself that you don't have to do what everyone else is doing.
quotes.author: Rajat Dogra

quotes.quote: Most people are other people. Their thoughts are someone else's opinions, their lives a mimicry, their passions a quotation.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Ride the energy of your own unique spirit.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.quote: It is the chiefest point of happiness that a man is willing to be what he is.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Once conform, once do what others do because they do it, and a kind of lethargy steals over all the finer senses of the soul.
quotes.author: Michel Eyquem De Montaigne

quotes.quote: Individualism is rather like innocence: There must be something unconscious about it.
quotes.author: Louis Kronenberger

quotes.quote: If I'm going to sing like someone else, then I don't need to sing at all.
quotes.author: Billie Holiday

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Never forget that only dead fish swim with the stream.
quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quotes.quote: Our culture has made us all the same. No one is truly white or black or rich, anymore. We all want the same. Individually, we are nothing.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: I believe that every person has uniqueness -- something that nobody else has.
quotes.author: Michael Schenker

quotes.quote: As we grow as unique persons, we learn to respect the uniqueness of others.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: A human being is a single being. Unique and unrepeatable.
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: Trusting your individual uniqueness challenges you to lay yourself open.
quotes.author: James Broughton

quotes.quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: Let the world know you as you are, not as you think you should be, because sooner or later, if you are posing, you will forget the pose, and then where are you?
quotes.author: Fanny Brice

quotes.quote: Imitation is suicide.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You are special and worth being cared about, loved, and accepted just as you are. Never, ever let anyone convince you otherwise.
quotes.author: Alex Sanchez

quotes.quote: There is just one life for each of us: our own.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: It's not easy, being different.
quotes.author: Joanne Harris

quotes.quote: I'm finally realizing who my friends really are. And maybe being different isn't the end of the world. That's just who I am.
quotes.author: Adam Armus

quotes.quote: Differences sometimes scare people. I have learned that some of them use humor to hide their fear.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong with being different.
quotes.author: David Leslie Johnson-McGoldrick

quotes.quote: Being different is nothing to be scared of.
quotes.author: Julian Jones

quotes.quote: You know, being different isn't always a bad thing.
quotes.author: Mark Frost

quotes.quote: Just because a person chooses to express themselves in an extreme way doesn't mean they have an extreme personality.
quotes.author: Susane Colasanti

quotes.quote: Just remember this, Emma -- not every Jell-O salad turns out perfect. But it can still taste real good.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Atkinson

quotes.quote: Originality must still compare itself to others. The Authentic only compares itself to itself.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: Your uniqueness becomes clearer when you combine two mediums, interests or fields of knowledge.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: You are unique. Your combination of thoughts are yours alone. A strand of your hair is like no other.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: People try hard to be defined by the way they look, rather than by what they do.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: The best thing you can do isn't being the best, but being different.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: I always knew I was different, it just took me a while to see the beauty in being different, and different is gorgeous.
quotes.author: Heather Maria Ramirez

quotes.quote: Sometimes, being different is not so bad at all! It took me a long time to realize that.
quotes.author: Heather Maria Ramirez

quotes.quote: The DNA is genetically different, and we are made up of different elements.
quotes.author: Heather Maria Ramirez

quotes.quote: What most people call the ugliest people, some of the strangest people, and even some of the most different people in the world end up being, the most beautiful people to lay the naked eyes upon.
quotes.author: Heather Maria Ramirez

quotes.quote: Never pre-judge a person, because their sky is a different color, because you may miss a beautiful sunset.
quotes.author: Heather Maria Ramirez

quotes.quote: It took me quite a long time to develop a voice, and now that I have it, I am not going to be silent.
quotes.author: Dr.Madeleine Albright

quotes.quote: Normal is not something to aspire to; it's something to get away from.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.quote: We realize the importance of our voices only when we are silenced.
quotes.author: Malala Yuosafzai

quotes.quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: We must make our diversity a living reality .
quotes.author: Shri Mani Shankar Aiyar

quotes.quote: Every one of us is able to help change and shape the future by fighting back, by being a voice for those who gone ... to see and accept others for who they are instead of judging and being afraid of that which is different from what we know.
quotes.author: Jenna Kandyce Linch

quotes.quote: Be the person you want to be, not what others want you to be because you are special, amazing and beautiful just the way you are and being different is something to be proud of.
quotes.author: Jenna Kandyce Linch

quotes.quote: Your thoughts, your feelings, your emotions, none of those can be copied in any way for they are yours and yours alone.
quotes.author: Jenna Kandyce Linch

quotes.quote: Being different is what makes you stand out, it is never something to be ashamed of for if we were alike in this world, how boring that would be.
quotes.author: Jenna Kandyce Linch

quotes.quote: You are a hero and a leader for being true to yourself and for making the most of what you have and where you're at in your life and using it to help you create a better life for yourself.
quotes.author: Jenna Kandyce Linch

quotes.quote: It's obvious that our social spheres have been widely different.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: What everyone else is doing is quite irrelevant when it comes to doing what is right.
quotes.author: Russel Gough

quotes.quote: We humans do have a tendency to view anything that makes a person different with some suspicion.
quotes.author: Bob Weinstein

quotes.quote: The real issue is the true value of every human being sometimes gets lost in the differences.
quotes.author: Bob Weinstein

quotes.quote: A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.
quotes.author: Saint Basil

quotes.quote: Different people react and act differently in the same situation.
quotes.author: Zett Why

quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong with people being different or having different roles in life, There differences only make life more interesting.
quotes.author: Peter Smith

quotes.quote: I felt like it made me, hate me / But I won't apologize for being different / I can be who I am, and yeah / I felt so dead inside / But now I feel so alive, for the first time
quotes.author: Jack Fowler

quotes.quote: Looking for an easy way out was not for me / Being different from the rest has set me free / And if I am a broken in their eyes - let it be / I am the best version I can be
quotes.author: Thorne Empire

quotes.quote: And if they had turned their backs on me / I will survive, and I will thrive / Being different from the rest / It made me feel alive
quotes.author: Thorne Empire

quotes.quote: Being cool, well you've gotta be different / Being different means being cool / It's alright to be different / Until something else is cool
quotes.author: Nunley Royce Asher

quotes.quote: Shining like a shooting star / You live your life like you're here on a mission / Yeah, you're not afraid of being different / You hear the doubters, but you don't listen / 'Cause you know who you are
quotes.author: Matthew West

quotes.quote: Being gay is like glitter, it never goes away.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: It's better to like beautiful girls than to be gay.
quotes.author: Silvio Berlusconi

quotes.quote: I'd rather be black than gay because when you're black you don't have to tell your mother.
quotes.author: Charles Pierce

quotes.quote: Being gay and being a woman has one big thing in common, which is that we both become invisible after the age of 42. Who wants a gay 50-year-old? No one, let me tell you.
quotes.author: Rupert Everett

quotes.quote: For thousands of years, there have been lies about being gay or not being gay. If you know they're lies, you're free.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: I believe the scripture says that being gay is a sin.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Being gay is not a Western invention. It is a human reality.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Being gay doesn't take your brain away or exclude me from having the same attributes as anyone else.
quotes.author: Don Lemon

quotes.quote: I don't particularly like going on about being gay or making a big thing about it, but I think it's a bit of a pain to be secretive about it.
quotes.author: Evan Davis

quotes.quote: You are not a bad person because you are gay. You are you because you are you and you were meant to be you. So be you proudly.
quotes.author: Tegan Quin

quotes.quote: Gay people got a right to be as miserable as everybody else.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.quote: As long as society is anti-gay, then it will seem like being gay is anti-social.
quotes.author: Joseph Francis

quotes.quote: The way I approach the character isn't about being gay or straight.It's just about who you love.Gender has very little to do with it.
quotes.author: Mia Kirshner

quotes.quote: There is a tendency in the gay community to become worse than straight people ever could be!
quotes.author: Michael Lucas

quotes.quote: A gay male never gets over the idea the he is a thing of beauty, and a boy forever!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When a gay person turns his back on you, it is anything but an insult; it's an invitation.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: You know what they say: You can't teach a gay dog straight tricks.
quotes.author: Trey Parker & Matt Stone

quotes.quote: Being gay is natural. Hating gay is a lifestyle choice.
quotes.author: John Fugelsang

quotes.quote: Why can't they have gay people in the army? Personally, I think they are just afraid of a thousand guys with M16s going, "Who'd you call a faggot?"
quotes.author: John Stewart

quotes.quote: Gay people are the sweetest, kindest, most artistic, warmest and most thoughtful people in the world. And since the beginning of time all they've ever been is kicked.
quotes.author: Little Richard

quotes.quote: We had gay burglars the other night.They broke in and rearranged the furniture.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Today, many people are engaging in same sex relationshipsand saying they are not gay.
quotes.author: Pam Grier

quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong with being gay. I have plenty of friends who are going to hell.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: There are so many different camps about what being gay means. The danger comes when each one is so rigid that it sees itself as the true picture.
quotes.author: Dan Butler

quotes.quote: I'm not ashamed of being gay, never have been and never will be. For that I have no apologies.
quotes.author: Tommy Kirk

quotes.quote: I was raised thinking I'd burn in hell for being gay, but I didn't have a choice. It's just who I am.
quotes.author: Jai Rodriguez

quotes.quote: My mother thought me being gay was a death sentence.
quotes.author: Jai Rodriguez

quotes.quote: As anyone who is gay will confirm, being that way is not something you become, it is a set of emotional and physical responses that just are.
quotes.author: Lance Loud

quotes.quote: I would advise any gay person that being out in the real sense can never happen too soon.
quotes.author: George Michael

quotes.quote: If someone is gay nd he searches for the lord and has good will, who am I to judge?
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Each morning when I open my eyes I say to myself: I, not events, have the power to make me happy or unhappy today. I can choose which it shall be. Yesterday is dead, tomorrow hasn't arrived yet. I have just one day, today, and I'm going to be happy in it.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: My greatest beauty secret is being happy with myself. I don't use special creams or treatments - I'll use a little bit of everything. It's a mistake to think you are what you put on yourself. I believe that a lot of how you look is to do with how you feel about yourself and your life. Happiness is the greatest beauty secret.
quotes.author: Tina Turner

quotes.quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy, and inspires your hopes.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Happiness is not defined by any circumstance, condition, or person. You need not tie your happiness to anything. The choice to be happy is always yours to make. Make that choice and cultivate a happy spirit.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kr Sinha

quotes.quote: We all live with the objective of being happy; our lives are all different and yet the same.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Doing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happiness.
quotes.author: Frank Tyger

quotes.quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: A happy life consists not in the absence, but in the mastery of hardships.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness is like a butterfly which, when pursued, is always beyond our grasp, but, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: One of the biggest challenges in trying to be happy right now isn't that we don't know how to be happy. It's mostly that we just don't do it. We don't make the time for happiness, for peace, and for overall joy in our life.
quotes.author: Kumar Anupam

quotes.quote: Being happy is something that each of us determines, it is not something that we find outside of ourself, it is within us and our choice.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The reason people find it so hard to be happy is that they always see the past better than it was, the present worse than it is, and the future less resolved than it will be.
quotes.author: Marcel Pagnol

quotes.quote: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance, the wise grows it under his feet.
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: A happy man is too satisfied with the present to dwell too much on the future.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Happiness is the art of learning how to get joy from your substance.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Happiness is the aim of life. Virtue is the foundation of happiness. Utility is the test of virtue. If the wise be the happy man, as the sages say, he must be virtuous too; for without virtue, happiness cannot be.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Happiness is found in doing, not merely possessing.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Better to be happy than wise.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Happy the man, and happy he alone, he who can call today his own: he who, secure within, can say, tomorrow, to thy worst, for I have liv’d today.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Real happiness is cheap enough, yet how dearly we pay for its counterfeit.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: Happiness lies in the consciousness we have of it, and by no means in the way the future keeps its promises.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: Mankind are always happier for having been happy; so that if you make them happy now, you make them happy twenty years hence by the memory of it.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: True happiness ne’er entered at an eye; true happiness resides in things unseen.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: A happy life is one spent in learning, earning, and yearning.
quotes.author: Lillian Gish

quotes.quote: The greatest part of our happiness depends on our dispositions, not our circumstances.
quotes.author: Martha Washington

quotes.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it’s all that matters.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: It is not easy to find happiness in ourselves, and it is not possible to find it elsewhere.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: A happy life is made up of little things…a gift sent, a letter written, a call made, a recommendation given, transportation provided, a cake made, a book lent, a check sent.
quotes.author: Carol Holmes

quotes.quote: Anyone can be happy when times are good; the richer experience is to be happy when times are not.
quotes.author: Susan Harris

quotes.quote: One of the secrets of a happy life is continuous small treats.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: Happy is he who learns to bear what he cannot change.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: A multitude of small delights constitute happiness.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Happiness, not in another place but this place, not for another hour but this hour.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing I know.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Happiness: An agreeable sensation arising from contemplating the misery of another.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Happiness is a way of travel, not a destination.
quotes.author: Roy Goodman

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is freedom, and the secret of freedom, courage.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: For peace of mind, resign as general manager of the universe.
quotes.author: Larry Eisenberg

quotes.quote: To fill the hour—that is happiness.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In order to be utterly happy, the only thing necessary is to refrain from comparing this moment with other moments in the past.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: The happiest person is the person who thinks the most interesting thoughts.
quotes.author: Timothy Dwight

quotes.quote: We act as though comfort and luxury were the chief requirements of life, when all that we need to make us happy is something to be enthusiastic about.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you so are in harmony.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Happiness is a state of which you are unconscious, of which you are not aware. The moment you are aware that you are happy, you cease to be happy…You want to be consciously happy; the moment you are consciously happy, happiness is gone.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: There will always be a lost dog somewhere that will prevent me from being happy.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.quote: The only thing that will make you happy is being happy with who you are, and not who people think you are.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.quote: The talent for being happy is appreciating and liking what you have, instead of what you don't have.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Dream as if you'll live forever, live as if you'll die today.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Be happy with what you have. Be excited about what you want.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Be believing, be happy, don't get discouraged. Things will work out.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: One of the simplest ways to stay happy is by letting go of the things that make you sad.
quotes.author: Tinku Razoria

quotes.quote: You can never be really happy if you keep holding to those bad memories which makes you sad.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash

quotes.quote: Happy is entirely up to you and always has been.
quotes.author: Janette Rallison

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, be.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: The habit of being happy enables one to be freed, or largely freed, from the domination of outward conditions.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Most folks are about as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If only we'd stop trying to be happy we could have a pretty good time.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: Nobody really cares if you're miserable, so you might as well be happy.
quotes.author: Cynthia Nelms

quotes.quote: Indeed, man wishes to be happy even when he so lives as to make happiness impossible.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: To be happy, we must not be too concerned with others.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
quotes.author: James Matthew Barrie

quotes.quote: Happiness comes from within, not from without.
quotes.author: David DeNotaris

quotes.quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems; but the ability to deal with them.
quotes.author: Jack Brown

quotes.quote: Being happy doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude._
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: If being happy is important to you, try this:instead of regretting all you lack, celebrate all you've got.
quotes.author: Brian Vaszily

quotes.quote: Happiness adds and multiplies, as we divide it with others.
quotes.author: A. Nielsen

quotes.quote: Trying to be happy without giving to others is liketrying to kiss alone.
quotes.author: Brian Vaszily

quotes.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Nothing can bring you happiness but yourself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Talking about someone who makes you happy actually makes you happy.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Scott

quotes.quote: Learn to value yourself, which means: fight for your happiness.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Our capacity to draw happiness from aesthetic objects or material goods in fact seems critically dependent on our first satisfying a more important range of emotional or psychological needs, among them the need for understanding, for love, expression and respect.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: The true secret of happiness lies in the taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: People should find happiness in the little things, like family.
quotes.author: Amanda Bynes

quotes.quote: As people spin faster and faster in the pursuit of merely personal happiness, they become exhausted in the futile effort of chasing themselves.
quotes.author: Andrew Delbanco

quotes.quote: All happiness or unhappiness solely depends upon the quality of the object to which we are attached by love.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: Happiness consists more in conveniences of pleasure that occur everyday than in great pieces of good fortune that happen but seldom.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Happiness is not an ideal of reason, but of imagination.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one’s family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one’s own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: There is some kind of a sweet innocence in being human—in not having to be just happy or just sad in the nature of being able to be both broken and whole, at the same time.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness. It is far better to take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is freedom, the secret of freedom is courage.
quotes.author: Carrie Jones

quotes.quote: There is no happiness like that of being loved by your fellow creatures, and feeling that your presence is an addition to their comfort.	There is no happiness like that of being loved by your fellow creatures, and feeling that your presence is an addition to their comfort.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: If you want happiness for an hour, take a nap. If you want happiness for a day, go fishing. If you want happiness for a year, inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime, help someone else.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The only way to find true happiness is to risk being completely cut open.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: We can’t control the world. We can only (barely) control our own reactions to it. Happiness is largely a choice, not a right or entitlement.
quotes.author: David C. Hill

quotes.quote: Happiness is being content with what you have, living in freedom and liberty, having a good family life and good friends.
quotes.author: Divyanka Tripathi

quotes.quote: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Somethings soon to come over you / You just can't please the world and yourself / You gotta start doing what's right for you / 'Cause life is being happy yourself.
quotes.author: Jackie Jackson

quotes.quote: If loving you is all that means to me / When being happy is all I hope you'd be.
quotes.author: Dale Longworth

quotes.quote: Is being happy such a crime when I / Just want to enjoy the universe with you.
quotes.author: Chloe Watkinson

quotes.quote: Clap along if you feel like a room without a roof / Because I'm happy.
quotes.author: Pharrell Williams

quotes.quote: Clap along if you feel like happiness is the truth / Because I'm happy.
quotes.author: Pharrell Williams

quotes.quote: I didn't know that I was capable of being happy right now / But you showed me how.
quotes.author: Faye Webster

quotes.quote: Being happy loving whom I please / And each time we make romance, / I'll be thankful for a second chance.
quotes.author: Edward Jr. Holland

quotes.quote: Happiness is spread / A peace is felt / Places of magic are open / Places of great beauty / You can be happy.
quotes.author: Allen Hollandsworth

quotes.quote: Laugh and be merry, remember, better the world with a song / Better the world with a blow in the teeth of a wrong.
quotes.author: John Masefield

quotes.quote: Laugh, for the time is brief, a thread the length of a span / Laugh and be proud to belong to the old proud pageant of man.
quotes.author: John Masefield

quotes.quote: Laugh and be merry: remember, in olden time / God made Heaven and Earth for joy He took in a rhyme.
quotes.author: John Masefield

quotes.quote: Laugh, and battle, and work, and drink of the wine outpoured / In the dear green earth, the sign of the joy of the Lord.
quotes.author: John Masefield

quotes.quote: Laugh and be merry together, like brothers akin, / Guesting awhile in the rooms of a beautiful inn.
quotes.author: John Masefield

quotes.quote: Glad till the dancing stops, and the lilt of the music ends / Laugh till the game is played; and be you merry, my friends.
quotes.author: John Masefield

quotes.quote: I am determined to be cheerful and happy in whatever situation I may find myself / For I have learned that the greater part of our misery or unhappiness is determined not by our circumstance but by our disposition.
quotes.author: Tori Blue

quotes.quote: I dream of world happiness / Where there is no jealousy or selfishness / A world where greatness exists / Where there are no fights / no risks.
quotes.author: Eleni Karipidis

quotes.quote: I dream of world love / Where we would fly in the sky like doves / Together forever, sharing our lives / Being happy and loving, like dolphins that dive.
quotes.author: Eleni Karipidis

quotes.quote: Making comparisons can spoil your happiness.
quotes.author: Maria von Heland

quotes.quote: A lot of people think happiness means being richer or more important.
quotes.author: Maria von Heland

quotes.quote: Sometimes happiness is not knowing the whole story.
quotes.author: Maria von Heland

quotes.quote: Happiness is answering your calling.
quotes.author: Maria von Heland

quotes.quote: Happiness is being loved for who you are.
quotes.author: Maria von Heland

quotes.quote: We should concern ourselves, not so much with the pursuit of happiness, but with the happiness of pursuit.
quotes.author: Maria von Heland

quotes.quote: How many of us, I wonder, can recall that childhood moment when we experienced happiness as a state of being. That single moment of untarnished joy. That moment when everything in our world, inside and out, was alright. Everything was alright.
quotes.author: Maria von Heland

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.
quotes.author: Vea Cabral

quotes.quote: Not one of us can rest, be happy, be at home, be at peace with ourselves, until we end hatred and division.
quotes.author: John Lewis

quotes.quote: It's good to be happy and tell us how cool your life is and how awesome you are on social media. That's great because it inspires other people to be happy, too. But a lot of times, people are trying to be happy in the wrong ways - with money or with different things that are not true happiness.
quotes.author: Vea Cabral

quotes.quote: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored. Earl Nightingale
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.
quotes.author: Tom Bodett

quotes.quote: When you're Happy for No Reason you're unconditionally happy. It's not that your life always looks perfect. It's just that however it looks, you'll still be happy.
quotes.author: Marci Shimoff

quotes.quote: You don't need to manipulate the world around you to try to make yourself happy. You live from happiness, rather than for happiness.
quotes.author: Marci Shimoff

quotes.quote: Even if you wake up on the wrong side of the bed, determine that you will not take negative feelings into your day. Try smiling at yourself in the mirror.
quotes.author: Dadi Janki

quotes.quote: Too much thinking and internalizing can make you dull and self-centered. Lift up your chin and be an overcomer. You really can be happy if you try; and that makes every one around you happy.
quotes.author: Dadi Janki

quotes.quote: In many ways, being happy is the culmination of many other states of being, such as feeling calm, pleasure, satisfaction, and joy.
quotes.author: Alex A. Lluch

quotes.quote: Being happy includes walking around with a smile on your face, savoring the day you just had, and looking forward to tommorow.
quotes.author: Alex A. Lluch

quotes.quote: The best thing about happiness is that there exists an infinite supply. We need to tap into the various sources within us to raise our level of positivity. At the same time, we must quell the negativity that tends to creep within us.
quotes.author: Alex A. Lluch

quotes.quote: The key to being happy is to balance the internal scale that measures out doses of positive or negative feedback and reactions.
quotes.author: Alex A. Lluch

quotes.quote: Society tells us that the only life worth living is a happy one, but if we didn't know sadness, we couldn't know happiness.
quotes.author: Alex A. Lluch

quotes.quote: Having patience is one of the hardest things about being human. We want to do it now, and we don't want to wait. Sometimes we miss out on our blessing when we rush things and do it on our own time.
quotes.author: Deontay Wilder

quotes.quote: Being human means you will make mistakes. And you will make mistakes, because failure is God's way of moving you in another direction.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Being human always points, and is directed, to something or someone, other than oneself - be it a meaning to fulfill or another human being to encounter.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: I think part of being human is learning to roll with the punches, to deal with any kind of personal or professional disaster that might crop up. You have to learn to deal with that stuff or not survive.
quotes.author: Amy Gerstler

quotes.quote: Being human means there's a wall-builder in each of us. Our minds naturally divide the world into me and not-me, us and them. For thousands of years, our sages have taught that we're all one, yet we still divide wherever we look.
quotes.author: Robert J. Waldinger

quotes.quote: The great advantage of being human is that we can employ rational thought and resolve to change our circumstances.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.quote: Don't try to be perfect; just be an excellent example of being human.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The essence of being human is that one does not seek perfection.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Being human is a lot more difficult than being on tour.
quotes.author: Trent Reznor

quotes.quote: There is no doubt that being human is incredibly difficult and cannot be mastered in one lifetime.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: We can make ourselves whole only by accepting our partiality, by living within our limits, by being humans not by trying to be gods.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Being human, at times, is very painful, and that leads us to reawakening.
quotes.author: Suzanne Giesemann

quotes.quote: That's the beauty and the terror of being human beings: We just have these symbolic languages, these dreams, and that's all it ever is.
quotes.author: John Edgar Wideman

quotes.quote: The essence of being human is that, in the brief moment we exist on this spinning planet, we can love some persons and some things, in spite of the fact that time and death will ultimately claim us all.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: If being human requires freedom, then enslavement to the cares of this world is dehumanizing.
quotes.author: Tony Campolo

quotes.quote: Being vulnerable, in my opinion, is not a weakness. It's being human. It is allowing yourself to not have all the answers.
quotes.author: T. Mills

quotes.quote: Being human, we can only receive infinite truth in finite doses
quotes.author: Norman Grubb

quotes.quote: Being human, we would expel from our lives physical pain and mental anguish and assure ourselves of continual ease and comfort, but if we were to close the doors upon sorrow and distress, we might be excluding our greatest friends and benefactors. Suffering can make saints of people as they learn patience, long-suffering, and self-mastery.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: This is the most exciting part of being human. It is using our brains in the highest way. Otherwise we are just healthy animals
quotes.author: Edwin Land

quotes.quote: Being human is difficult. Some people make it more difficult than others. I was one of those people.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: Being human is the most terrible loneliness in the universe.
quotes.author: A.A. Attanasio

quotes.quote: The plain state of being human is dramatic enough for anyone; you don't need to be a heroin addict or a performance poet to experience extremity. You just have to love someone.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.quote: Being human is a precious situation, and we shouldn't waste time in useless activities.
quotes.author: Sakyong Mipham

quotes.quote: Part of the blessing and challenge of being human is that we must discover our own true nature.
quotes.author: Mark Nepo

quotes.quote: Oh, humiliation is poisonous. It's one of the deepest pains of being human.
quotes.author: Pierce Brosnan

quotes.quote: We're all human, and part of being human is showing respect and support for others' life choices.
quotes.author: Daniel Lubetzky

quotes.quote: The main thing in life is not to be afraid of being human.
quotes.author: Aaron Carter

quotes.quote: I'm happy to be human, and being human means we aren't perfect.
quotes.author: Alesha Dixon

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter who you are: being human is being human. Everyone has days that are challenging.
quotes.author: Miranda Kerr

quotes.quote: Obviously the idea of being human is a very human idea.
quotes.author: Dominic Monaghan

quotes.quote: Being human is being a lot of things at the same time.
quotes.author: Matthias Schoenaerts

quotes.quote: Without emotion, what's the point of being human?
quotes.author: Marie Lu

quotes.quote: Being human is overrated.
quotes.author: Mark Penn

quotes.quote: Being human in the digital world is about building a digital world for humans.
quotes.author: Andrew Keen

quotes.quote: The passion to explore is at the heart of being human.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Being human means asking the questions of one's own being and living under the impact of the answers given to this question. And, conversely, being human means receiving answers to the questions of one's own being and asking questions under the impact of the answers.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Merely being human is morally significant.
quotes.author: Alice Crary

quotes.quote: Part of being human is having a sense of humor.
quotes.author: Patrick Wolf

quotes.quote: You are human, you will make mistakes, and it's one of the most beautiful things about being human, but you must learn from your mistakes, otherwise your life will have a lot of unnecessary pain.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: It's a basic fact about being human that sometimes the self seems to just melt away.
quotes.author: Jonathan Haidt

quotes.quote: Being human is itself difficult, and therefore all kinds of settlements (except dream cities) have problems. Big cities have difficulties in abundance, because they have people in abundance.
quotes.author: Jane Jacobs

quotes.quote: Thats the beautiful thing about being human: Things change.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: Being human means having power; specifically, the power to accomplish whatever we want.
quotes.author: Yongey Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.quote: The essence of being human is being creative.
quotes.author: Joel Garreau

quotes.quote: Being human means having doubts and yet still continuing on your path.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Being human means throwing your whole life on the scales of destiny when need be, all the while rejoicing in every sunny day and every beautiful cloud.
quotes.author: Rosa Luxemburg

quotes.quote: Part of the job of being human is to consistently underestimate our effect on other people.
quotes.author: Lucy Grealy

quotes.quote: Part of being human is that we can’t go back, we can only hope that if we come across that moment again we’ll do it the right way.
quotes.author: Jesse Lacey

quotes.quote: Being human is not just a statement, it’s an order.
quotes.author: Dharma Gowda Hassan

quotes.quote: I stand here before you not as a prophet, but as a humble servant of you, the people.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Humility is the only true wisdom by which we prepare our minds for all the possible changes of life.
quotes.author: George Arliss

quotes.quote: To be humble to superiors is duty, to equals courtesy, to inferiors nobleness.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The true way to be humble is not to stoop until you are smaller than yourself, but to stand at your real height against some higher nature that will show you what the real smallness of your greatness is.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Being humble means recognizing that we are not on earth to see how important we can become, but to see how much difference we can make in the lives of others.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: I claim to be a simple individual liable to err like any other fellow mortal. I own, however, that I have humility enough to confess my errors and to retrace my steps.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Humility leads to strength and not to weakness. It is the highest form of self-respect to admit mistakes and to make amends for them.
quotes.author: John J. Mccloy

quotes.quote: We have to humble ourselves and the way you do that is by serving other people.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.quote: No matter how high up you get, never forget where you came from.
quotes.author: Beeru Singh

quotes.quote: I'll never forget where I'm from. It's essential to remain humble and evolving.
quotes.author: Freida Pinto

quotes.quote: He is a very humble man, that thinks not himself better than some others.
quotes.author: Joseph Hall

quotes.quote: Humility is royalty without a crown.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: We come nearest to the great when we are great in humility.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: A great man is always willing to be little.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you are really humble you will put yourself first when you need to take care of you.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Humility is not thinking less of yourself, but thinking of yourself less.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Nobody stands taller than those willing to stand corrected.
quotes.author: William Safire

quotes.quote: Humility is the ability to give up your pride and still retain your dignity.
quotes.author: Vanna Bonta

quotes.quote: Humility means accepting reality with no attempt to outsmart it.
quotes.author: David Richo

quotes.quote: Nothing is more intolerable than to have to admit to yourself your own errors.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: We must quit thinking we know everything, and quit placing "knowledge" over kindness and compassion.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: True humility is having the understanding that, even as a small seed, we are still an important part of the greater plan. However, we are not the master planner.
quotes.author: Tanya Copprue

quotes.quote: If you would have people speak well of you, then do not speak well of yourself.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: No truly great person ever thought themselves so.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Always remember when you are on top of the world , that the earth rotates every 24 hrs.
quotes.author: Steve G. Makris

quotes.quote: It is far more impressive when others discover your good qualities without your help.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: A man who is at the top is a man who has the habit of getting to the bottom.
quotes.author: Joseph E. Rogers

quotes.quote: There's a lot to be said for the fellow who doesn't say it himself.
quotes.author: Maurice Switzer

quotes.quote: The less people speak of their greatness, the more we think of it.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: True humility involves opposites. The truly humble work in silence. Because they do not speak of their accomplishments, credit for them can never be taken away.
quotes.author: Lao-Tzu

quotes.quote: He who truly knows has no occasion to shout.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: A genuinely humble person humbles himself even before those who should be humbled by his presence.
quotes.author: Bishop Michael Eneja

quotes.quote: Always acknowledge a fault. This will throw those in authority off their guard and give you an opportunity to commit more.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Humble souls are fearful of their own strength.
quotes.author: William Gurnall

quotes.quote: Being humble takes more courage than hauling arrogance.
quotes.author: Desmond Fouche

quotes.quote: The higher we get educated and higher we are placed, the softer should be our approach and humbler should be our attitude.
quotes.author: Senora Roy

quotes.quote: Only those who feel little in the eyes of God, can hope to be mighty in the eyes of men.
quotes.author: Ernest Moritz Arndt

quotes.quote: A true genius admits that he/she knows nothing.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The higher we are placed, the more humbly we should walk.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Humble people ask for help.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Being humble matters.
quotes.author: Kevin Hart

quotes.quote: One may be humble out of pride.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Don't let proud get to your head, always humble yourself.
quotes.author: Henry Johnson Jr

quotes.quote: To the extent we behave with humility, to that extent good will result.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: Be smart, but never show it.
quotes.author: Louis B Mayer

quotes.quote: Humility is to make a right estimate of one's self.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Swallow your pride occasionally, it's non-fattening!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: The biggest challenge after success is shutting up about it.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: We have to stop and be humble enough to understand that there is something called mystery.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Plenty of people wish to become devout, but no one wishes to be humble.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: God will have a humble people. Either we can choose to be humble, or we can be compelled to be humble.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: Self-praise is for losers. Be a winner. Stand for something. Always have class, and be humble.
quotes.author: John Madden

quotes.quote: You've gotta be humble. That's what I've been throughout my whole career.
quotes.author: Ginuwine

quotes.quote: My family has taught me to keep my feet on the ground and be humble.
quotes.author: Carlos Vela

quotes.quote: It is very important to be humble but to maintain the conviction that we can do something good.
quotes.author: Claudio Ranieri

quotes.quote: If we remain humble and hungry, we can win.
quotes.author: Dave Allison

quotes.quote: Never be haughty to the humble. Never be humble to the haughty.
quotes.author: Jefferson Davis

quotes.quote: Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love.
quotes.author: Rev. Fr. Peter Obinna Umekwe

quotes.quote: Successful indeed are the believers; those who humble themselves in their prayers.
quotes.author: Rev. Fr. Peter Obinna Umekwe

quotes.quote: More of us would probably agree that we "should" be more humble.
quotes.author: Hannah Anderson

quotes.quote: When you encounter a person who - for whatever reason - is "trying" to be humble, you can spot it almost immediately.
quotes.author: Hannah Anderson

quotes.quote: We know that God "opposes the proud" and so we commit to practising humility, to intentionally "be humble".
quotes.author: Hannah Anderson

quotes.quote: Being humble is something you either are or you aren't.
quotes.author: Hannah Anderson

quotes.quote: If we are humble people, it will be obvious.
quotes.author: Hannah Anderson

quotes.quote: Be humble and allow humility in your own personal and professional imperfections to invigorate your drive to improve, to get better, and to push yourself further.
quotes.author: Daniel McMahon

quotes.quote: By exercising humility in circumstances you will thus demonstrate how to be a humble and respected leader.
quotes.author: Daniel McMahon

quotes.quote: Learn to be humble but not timid.
quotes.author: Franklin A. Ohiozebau

quotes.quote: Be humble for you are made of earth. Be noble for you are made of stars.
quotes.author: Franklin A. Ohiobezau

quotes.quote: It is better to be humble and happy than to be arrogant and lonely.
quotes.author: Darlene Bennett

quotes.quote: A humble heart gets God's attention all the time.
quotes.author: Darlene Bennett

quotes.quote: The humble person has access to God's wisdom and God's favor.
quotes.author: Pat Robertson

quotes.quote: If we can develop a truly humble attitude, we can change the world.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Krames

quotes.quote: We have to be humble, but with real humility, from head-to-toe.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: The humble spirit and contrite is an abode of my delight.
quotes.author: Isaac Watts

quotes.quote: Act surprised. Walk slowly to the podium. Be modest. Thank them for this incredible honour.
quotes.author: Reese Whiterspoon

quotes.quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Truth is everybody is going to hurt you: you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: I have learned now that while those who speak about one's miseries usually hurt, those who keep silence hurt more.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Just because one person's problem is less traumatic than another's doesn't mean they're required to hurt less
quotes.author: J.A. Redmerski

quotes.quote: Those who really love you don't mean to hurt you and if they do, you can't see it in their eyes but it hurts them too.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: It is when we hurt that we learn.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The surest way to hurt yourself is to give up on love, just because it didn't work out the first time.
quotes.author: Amanda Howells

quotes.quote: Just because somebody is strong enough to handle pain doesn't mean they deserve it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You don't get to choose if you get hurt in this world. But you do have some say in who hurts you.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Do you know the feeling, when your heart is so hurt, that you could feel the blood dripping?
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Being hurt by someone you truly care about leaves a hole in you heart that only love can fill.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Being brokenhearted is like having broken ribs. On the outside it looks like nothing's wrong, but every breath hurts.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: He who lives long knows what pain is.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: True pain cannot be concealed.
quotes.author: Serbian Proverb

quotes.quote: A man can sleep on every hurt but his own.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: The least and weakest man can do some hurt.
quotes.author: Cambodian Proverb

quotes.quote: ‘Tis easier to hurt than heal.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: When you are dressing a wound, pain is pain’s medicine.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: From hurt comes pain, from pain comes change. If it hurts enough, change will happen.
quotes.author: Tripp Evans

quotes.quote: Pain is only bearable if we know it will end, not if we deny it exists.
quotes.author: Victor Frankl

quotes.quote: When an emotional injury takes place, the body begins a process as natural as the healing of a physical wound. Let the process happen. Trust that nature will do the healing. Know that the pain will pass, and, when it passes, you will be stronger, happier, and more sensitive and aware.
quotes.author: Mel Colgrove

quotes.quote: To have a body is to suffer.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: Better to have pain than paralysis.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: Love means exposing yourself to the pains of being hurt, deeply hurt by someone you trust.
quotes.author: Renita Weems

quotes.quote: A person in pain is being spoken to by that part of himself that knows only how to communicate this way.
quotes.author: Malidoma Somé

quotes.quote: Pain is what we’re in most of the time. And I think the bigger the pain the more gods we need.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: All we need to do is learn not to be afraid of pain. Grit your teeth and let it hurt. Don’t deny it, don’t be overwhelmed by it. It will not last forever. One day, the pain will be gone and you will still be there.
quotes.author: Harold S. Kushner

quotes.quote: There were things I wanted to tell him. But I knew they would hurt him. So I buried them, and let them hurt me.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: It hurts to have someone in your heart that you can't have in your arms.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I still own my heart, which I know because it hurts so much.
quotes.author: Emilie Autumn

quotes.quote: If someone really wants to hurt you, they'll find a way whatever. I don't want to live my life worrying about it.
quotes.author: George Michael

quotes.quote: It doesn't hurt to feel sad from time to time.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: That old saying, how you always hurt the one you love, well, it works both ways.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk
