quotes.quote: Sometimes, being hurt too many times, doesn't make you stronger, it destroy who you were, who you wanted to be and makes who you are today.
quotes.author: Rafael Prado

quotes.quote: It's a lot easier to be angry at someone than it is to tell them you're hurt.
quotes.author: Zakiya Caswell

quotes.quote: A torn jacket is soon mended, but hard words bruise the heart of a child.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: When someone stabs you it's not your fault that you feel pain.
quotes.author: Louise Penny

quotes.quote: Forget what hurt you in the past, but never forget what it taught you.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Two barrels of tears will not heal a bruise.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: I can feel the hurt. There's something good about it. Mostly it makes me stop remembering.
quotes.author: Albert Borris

quotes.quote: He who is or has been deeply hurt has a RIGHT to be sure he is LOVED.
quotes.author: Jean Vanier

quotes.quote: If you're in trouble, or hurt or need -- go to the poor people. They're the only ones that'll help -- the only ones.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: What hurts us is what heals us.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: As one grows weaker one is less susceptible to suffering. There is less hurt because there is less to hurt.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: If we aren't capable of being hurt we aren't capable of feeling joy.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: When a girl gives up, it's not because she doesn't love you. But she's tired of getting hurt and feels like you'll never care.
quotes.author: Justice Cabral

quotes.quote: Pain is always emotional. Fear and depression keep constant company with chronic hurting.
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: We are more often frightened than hurt; and we suffer more from imagination than from reality.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Don't hold to anger, hurt or pain. They steal your energy and keep you from love
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: When you can't remember why you're hurt, that's when you're healed.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: Being hurt is something you can't stop from happening, but being miserable is always your choice.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Dont chase after the people that hurt you, replace them with people that care.
quotes.author: Kaoru Shinmon

quotes.quote: Sometimes even stuff you expect to happen can still hurt.
quotes.author: Jennifer Brown

quotes.quote: Some people use their own hurt as an excuse for hurting others
quotes.author: Roland Merullo

quotes.quote: No man can think clearly when his fists are clenched.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.quote: Sometimes pain and hurt are good things because it means you strived for something in your life.
quotes.author: Kathryn Perez

quotes.quote: Pain can be endured and defeated only if it is embraced. Denied or feared, it grows.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Wounds make better lessons than lectures.
quotes.author: Brian Herbert

quotes.quote: If you are still being hurt by an event that happened to you at twelve, it is the thought that is hurting you now.
quotes.author: James Hillman

quotes.quote: I have never been hurt by anything I didn't say.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: No matter how beautiful a lie is, in the end it hurts even more than the truth would have done.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: It hurts too much so I don't want to talk about it.
quotes.author: Alex Flinn

quotes.quote: Being hurt personally triggered a curiosity about how such beliefs are formed.
quotes.author: Philip Zimbardo

quotes.quote: Hurt me with the truth but never comfort me with a lie.
quotes.author: Antonio Suhuba-Baruti

quotes.quote: No matter how much it hurts now, someday you will look back and realize your struggles changed your life for the better
quotes.author: Birister Sharma

quotes.quote: With love, you should go ahead and take the risk of getting hurt because love is an amazing feeling.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.quote: Anger is the most impotent of passions. It effects nothing it goes about, and hurts the one who is possessed by it more than the one against whom it is directed.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Nothing else wounds so deeply and irreparably. Nothing else robs us of hope so much as being unloved by one we love.
quotes.author: Clive Barker

quotes.quote: Listen to God with a broken heart. He is not only the doctor who mends it, but also the father who wipes away the tears.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: We live very close together. So, our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can’t help them, at least don’t hurt them.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: You will never know the power in yourself until someone hurts you badly.
quotes.author: Daryl G. Weinman

quotes.quote: Not all scars show not all wounds heal.
quotes.author: Diana Elmessiri

quotes.quote: Some old wounds never truly heal, and bleed again at the slightest word.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: You can set a boundary with your words when you are honest and when you establish a consequence for another’s hurtful actions.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: You care so much you feel as though you will bleed to death with the pain of it.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: If we don’t risk being hurt, we cannot give unconditional love. Unconditional love gives others the right to hurt us.
quotes.author: John Bevere

quotes.quote: If it hurts it’s probably doing you good. If it’s pleasant, it’s most likely wrong.
quotes.author: John Graves

quotes.quote: I wish i were a little girl again, because skinned knees are easier to fix than broken heart.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today, and you make your tomorrow.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: Never allow someone to be your priority while allowing yourself to be their option.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: One is never wounded by the love one gives, only by the love one expects.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Life is a gamble. You can get hurt, but people die in plane crashes, lose their arms and legs in car accidents; people die every day. Same with fighters: some die, some get hurt, some go on. You just don't let yourself believe it will happen to you.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: The heart was made to be broken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The pain of yesterday is the strength of today.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Do not suppress it - that would hurt you inside. Do not express it - this would not only hurt you inside, it would cause ripples in your surroundings. What you do is transform it.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: Have you ever been hurt and the place tries to heal a bit, and you just pull the scar off of it over and over again.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: The more you try to avoid suffering, the more you suffer, because smaller and more insignificant things begin to torture you, in proportion to your fear of being hurt. The one who does most to avoid suffering is, in the end, the one who suffers most.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: It doesn’t matter who hurt you, or broke you down, what matters is who made you smile again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Forget what hurt you but never forget what it taught you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A goodbye is never painful unless you're never going to say hello again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Death leaves a heartache no one can heal, love leaves a memory no one can steal.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Love the heart that hurts you, but never hurt the heart that loves you.
quotes.author: Vipin Sharma

quotes.quote: A remark generally hurts in proportion to its truth.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The stroke of death is as a lover's pinch, which hurts and is desired.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, and live like it's heaven on earth.
quotes.author: William W. Purkey

quotes.quote: I used to think that the worst thing in life was to end up all alone. It's not. The worst thing in life is ending up with people who make you feel all alone.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Feel proud when people ignore you and thank God you missed the worst.
quotes.author: Sanjiv Dogra

quotes.quote: Lonely isn't a feeling when you're alone, lonely is a feeling when no one cares.
quotes.author: James Merrow

quotes.quote: A man said unto the universe, 'Sir, I exist' 'However,' replied the universe, 'that fact has not created in me a sense of obligation.'
quotes.author: Stephen Crane

quotes.quote: There is only one thing in life worse than being talked about, and that is not being talked about.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: People with insufficient personalities are fond of cats. These people adore being ignored.
quotes.author: Henry Morgan

quotes.quote: In presence of the Moon nobody sees stars.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: What's worse than being hated is being ignored, because it's like you don't exist at all and your presence is nothing.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: The great thing about being ignored is that you can speak the truth with impunity.
quotes.author: Steve Aylett

quotes.quote: If you're being ignored, that's a good time to concentrate on finding yourself and creating your own mystery.
quotes.author: Lykke Li

quotes.quote: Facts do not cease to exist because theyare ignored.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: The worst thing a guy could do for a girl is to ignore her while she's loving you with all her heart.
quotes.author: Liam Payne

quotes.quote: Probably the most neglected friend you have is you. And yet every man, before he can be a true friend to the world, must first become a friend to himself.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: Whenever we give up, leave behind, and forget too much, there is always the danger that the things we have neglected will return with added force.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: If you feel neglected or ignored in the beginning, don't expect a miracle as time goes on and he gets more use to you, it's only going to get worse wake up, move on, and find someone who makes you feel you are truly wanted if you have to wonder about it,
quotes.author: Debbie Rutherford

quotes.quote: I grew up like a neglected weed - ignorant of liberty, having no experience of it.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: What is a neglected child? He is a child not planned for, not wanted. Neglect begins, therefore, before he is born.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: A little neglect may breed mischief ... for want of a nail, the shoe was lost; for want of a shoe the horse was lost; and for want of a horse the rider was lost.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: People ignore design that ignores people.
quotes.author: Frank Chimero

quotes.quote: He also knew that rivals are best unmanned by being ignored.
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: I just want to make a point that it's not just great teachers that sometimes shape your life. Sometimes it's the absence of great teachers that shapes your life and being ignored can be just as good for a person as being lauded.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: When your friends are ignoring you that means they weren't your friends from the beginning, they where just acting like it.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Sometimes people can hunger for more than bread. It is possible that our children, our husband, our wife, do not hunger for bread, do not need clothes, do not lack a house. But are we equally sure that none of them feels alone, abandoned, neglected, needi
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: When your're nothing, people will ignore you but when you're on top that's when everybody swear they know you.
quotes.author: Lincey Alphonse

quotes.quote: Well tended garden is better than a neglected wood lot.
quotes.author: Dixie Lee Ray

quotes.quote: These doorsteps seldom have a visitor.The warping boards pull out their own old nails With none to tread and put them in their place.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: A spark neglected makes a mighty fire.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: Being taken for granted is an unpleasant but sincere form of praise. Ironically, the more reliable you are, and the less you complain, the more likely you are to be taken for granted.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.quote: The cold iron of neglect is sharper to a child's sensitive nature than any alteration of harshness and affection.
quotes.author: Annie Edwards

quotes.quote: If the people in the audience are talking, you're being ignored. If the people are gazing at you, you've got something they want to hear
quotes.author: Chuck Berry

quotes.quote: Being ignored hurt worse.Shunning is harsh.Brutal. Worse than a beating.
quotes.author: Lori Nelson

quotes.quote: Some children who are looked after, either by foster-parents or who reside in children's homes, are also sometimes emotionally abused and neglected.
quotes.author: Dorota Iwaniec

quotes.quote: Being taken for granted can be a compliment. It means that you’ve become a comfortable, trusted element in another person’s life.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: Be so good they can't ignore you.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: All of us make mistakes. The key is to acknowledge them, learn, and move on. The real sin is ignoring mistakes, or worse, seeking to hide them.
quotes.author: Robert Zoelick

quotes.quote: When your husband ignores you, no matter if it’s all the time or just after arguments, he is trying to avoid and run away from a problem instead of dealing with it and solving it.
quotes.author: Lisa Penn

quotes.quote: You’re ignoring me so loud that it’s deafening. This silence is so deep that it’s echoing
quotes.author: Anna Jae

quotes.quote: Being ignored is a great privilege. That is how I think I learned to see what others do not see and to react to situations differently. I simply looked at the world, not really prepared for anything.
quotes.author: Saul Leiter

quotes.quote: It is impossible to treat a child too well. Children are spoiled by being ignored too much or by harshness, not by kindness.
quotes.author: Sloan Wilson

quotes.quote: In a way, bullying is an ordinary evil. It's hugely prevalent, all too often ignored - and being ignored, it is therefore condoned.
quotes.author: Trudie Styler

quotes.quote: There's really no such thing as the 'voiceless'. There are only the deliberately silenced, or the preferably unheard.”
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: We will not take this anymore.These words will never be ignored. You want a battle, here's a war.
quotes.author: Bullet for My Valentine

quotes.quote: I can't feel the way I did before, / Don't turn your back on me. / I won't be ignored. / Time won't heal this damage anymore. / Don't turn your back on me I won't be ignored
quotes.author: Linkin Park

quotes.quote: Long neglect has worn away, Half the sweet enchanting smile; Time has turned the bloom to gray, mold and damp the face defile.
quotes.author: Emily Jane Brontë

quotes.quote: To not ignore is a freedom to ignore violation, to then target an individual is called discrimination. Not because they hurt you or inflicted damage, but because the adult in you wasn't managed.
quotes.author: Matthew Tuck

quotes.quote: If you live your life correctly,death walks close by your side. To constantly remind you, that time’s not on your side. Your choice on how to handle,to ignore or then befriend. Will change your life completely —as each day begins again
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Fate might forgive greed, or gluttony, or even bloodlust, but it never ignores being ignored.
quotes.author: Erik Bundy

quotes.quote: One of the reasons why I think people have gone from reading mainstream newspapers to the Internet is because they realize they're being lied to.
quotes.author: Robert Fisk

quotes.quote: I'm telling you a lie in a vicious effort that you will repeat my lie over and over until it becomes true.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Lies were like acid, corrosive: They could dissolve trust in a heartbeat.
quotes.author: Rob Thurman

quotes.quote: People aren't suckers. Some are, perhaps. But most people inside know when we're being lied to.
quotes.author: Matt Bevin

quotes.quote: Language always betrays us, tells the truth when we want to lie, and dissolves into formlessness when we would most like to be precise.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: O, what a tangled web we weave; When first we practice to deceive!
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: He who tells a lie, is not sensible how great a task he undertakes; for he must be forced to invent twenty more to maintain that one.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: If you say that you never lie in life, you honestly insult my intelligence.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: False words are not only evil in themselves, but they infect the soul with evil.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Almost everything a person thinks is a lie, and an assault against the natural soul.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: Masks camouflage the faces of both good and evil. Keeps hidden what is a truth and what is a lie.
quotes.author: Patti Roberts

quotes.quote: To say that the first casualty of war is truth is to miss the rather more important point that a principal weapon of war is lies.
quotes.author: Harry M. Collins

quotes.quote: The lie is a virtue if it saves lives.
quotes.author: Venko Andonovski

quotes.quote: Nothing is easier than self-deceit. For what each man wishes, that he also believes to be true.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: I don't like being lied to, so I only lie about the stupid things. White lies, basically.
quotes.author: Enrique Iglesias

quotes.quote: For people who say they hate being lied to, just start telling them nothing but the pure truth--about everything. That will teach them.
quotes.author: Seth Adam Brown

quotes.quote: Life experience is what defines our character, even if it means getting your heart broken or being lied to. You know, you need the downs to appreciate the ups. Going on the adventure or taking that risk is important.
quotes.author: Nev Schulman

quotes.quote: The liar's punishment is, not in the least that he is not believed, but that he cannot believe anyone else.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Whoever tells a lie is not pure of heart, and such a person can not cook a clean soup.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: When people tell a lie about something, they have to make up a bunch of lies to go with the first one. Mythomania is the word for it.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: And, after all, what is lie? 'Tis but the truth in masquerade.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Because its not a lie if its how you feel.
quotes.author: Jennifer Niven

quotes.quote: Never hide things from hardcore thinkers. They get more aggravated, more provoked by confusion than the most painful truths.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: A lie cannot live.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Within every elaborate lie, a kernel of truth.
quotes.author: Marisha Pessl

quotes.quote: The lie took form as she spoke, pulling on as many strands of truth as it could reach.
quotes.author: Scott Westerfeld

quotes.quote: Being a practiced liar doesn't mean you have a powerful imagination. Many good liars have no imagination at all; it's that which gives their lies such wide-eyed conviction.
quotes.author: Philip Pullman

quotes.quote: That's the crazy thing about lies. You start to fall for them, yourself.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: A lie is an affront to the soul, as well as an insult to the intelligence of the person to whom one lies.
quotes.author: Judith Mcnaught

quotes.quote: You can believe in whatsoever you like, but the truth remains the truth, no matter how sweet the lie may taste.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: I know a lie when I hear one.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Scott

quotes.quote: Half-truths are worth more than outright lies.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Lying's wrong, but when the world spins backwards, a small wrong may be a big right.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: There is a lie in between a promise and many excuses.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: A smiling lie is a whirlwind, easy to enter, but hard to escape.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: If a man confessed anything on his death bed, it was the truth; for no man could stare death in the face and lie.
quotes.author: Richard Wright

quotes.quote: Human has the ability to believe in something wrong as if it is true.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: An unexciting truth may be eclipsed by a thrilling falsehood.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Some liars are so expert they deceive themselves.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: No one can be happy who has been thrust outside the pale of truth. And there are two ways that one can be removed from this realm: by lying, or by being lied to.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: I always sensed instinctively from the earliest age that I was being lied to.
quotes.author: Richard Linklater

quotes.quote: The best lies were always mixed with truth.
quotes.author: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.quote: And even a liar can be scared into telling the truth, same as honest man can be tortured into telling a lie.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: I'd rather hear an ugly truth, rather than an obscure lie.
quotes.author: Ana Monnar

quotes.quote: Truth is as straight as an arrow, while a lie swivels like a snake.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: You may tell the greatest lies and wear a brilliant disguise, but you can't escape the eyes of the one who sees right through you.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Truth does not sit in a cave and hide like a lie. It wanders around proudly and roars loudly like a lion.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: One ought always to lie, when one can do good by it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: While people lie for many different reasons, their lying rarely benefits the person lied to. And there's that one undeniable truth about lying. Everybody does it, but nobody likesl it when it's done to them.
quotes.author: Dr. David J. Lieberman

quotes.quote: We lie loudest when we lie to ourselves.
quotes.author: Dr. David J. Lieberman

quotes.quote: It takes two people for a lie to be effective--one to offer the lie and one to believe it. And while we certainly can't stop people from trying to lie to us, we can keep them from being successful.
quotes.author: Dr. David J. Lieberman

quotes.quote: Lying to oneself sooth many of the stresses of life, but, more importantly, it also helps one lie to others.
quotes.author: David Livingstone Smith

quotes.quote: Lying is universal--we all do it; we all must do it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Lying is obliged by its very nature to cover its traces, for in order to lie effectively we must lie about lying.
quotes.author: David Livingstone Smith

quotes.quote: Anything more than occasional white lie is considered a symptom of madness and badness.
quotes.author: David Livingstone Smith

quotes.quote: Lying is not exceptional; it is normal, and more often spontaneous and unconscious than cynical and coldly analytical. Our minds and bodies secrete deceit.
quotes.author: David Livingstone Smith

quotes.quote: Deception follows us from birth to death, and seeps into every coener of our public nad private lives.
quotes.author: David Livingstone Smith

quotes.quote: Events that are painful or dramatic tend to be memorable, and tend to also shape our impressions of the circumstances--like being lied to.
quotes.author: Robert Feldman

quotes.quote: One man lies in his words and gets a bad reputation; another in his manners and enjoys a good one.
quotes.author: Thoreau

quotes.quote: A man finds it awfully hard to lie to the woman he loves the first time.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: It takes a wise man to hand a lie; a fool had better remain honest.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.quote: A man comes to believe in the end the lies he tells about himself to himself.
quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Pretending that you believe a liar is also a lie.
quotes.author: Arthur Schnitzler

quotes.quote: Heaven lies about us in our infancy, and everybody else when we grow up.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Actions lie louder than words.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Half the world doesn't know how much the other half lies about it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: If at first you're not believed, lie, lie again.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Children learn to lie from parents who teach them to say they don't want a second portion of ice cream.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Some people have a habit of lying, while others do very well without the habit.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Everyone is lying, the only difference is by how much.
quotes.author: Seth Stephens-Davidowitz

quotes.quote: People frequently lie to themselves and to others.
quotes.author: Seth Stephens-Davidowitz

quotes.quote: He that speaketh truth sheweth forth righteousness: but a false witness deceit. - Proverbs 12:17
quotes.author: Holy Bible

quotes.quote: Deceit is in the heart of them that imagine evil. - Proverbs 12:20
quotes.author: Holy Bible

quotes.quote: The folly of fools is deceit. - Proverbs 14:8
quotes.author: Holy Bible

quotes.quote: A true witness delivereth souls: but a deceitful witness speaketh lies. - Proverbs 14:25
quotes.author: Holy Bible

quotes.quote: Bread of deceit is sweet to a man; but afterwards his mouth shall be filled with gravel. - Proverbs 24:28
quotes.author: Holy Bible

quotes.quote: I really know nothing more criminal, more mean, and more ridiculous, than lying.
quotes.author: Samuel Austin Allibone

quotes.quote: It is the production either of malice, cowardice, or vanity ; and generally misses of its aim in every one of these views; for lies are always detected, sooner or later.
quotes.author: Samuel Austin Allibone

quotes.quote: The most terrible poverty is loneliness, and the feeling of being unloved.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: Loneliness is never more cruel than when it is felt in close propinquity with someone who has ceased to communicate.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The lonely one offers his hand too quickly to whomever he encounters.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The worst thing about loneliness is that it brings one face to face with oneself.
quotes.author: Mary Balogh

quotes.quote: Remember: the time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself. Life's cruelest irony.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: The loneliest moment in someone's life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The worst part of holding the memories is not the pain. It's the loneliness of it. Memories need to be shared.
quotes.author: Lois Lowry

quotes.quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Loneliness expresses the pain of being alone and solitude expresses the glory of being alone.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: At the innermost core of all loneliness is a deep and powerful yearning for union with one's lost self.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.quote: Human beings can withstand a week without water, two weeks without food, many years of homelessness, but not loneliness.It is the worst of all tortures, the worst of all sufferings.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: When I feel truly alone, with a sense of being lost,even empty inside, it is then I realize I have unknowingly moved away from God, so I move back.
quotes.author: David L. Weatherford

quotes.quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: The person who tries to live alone will not succeed as a human being. His heart withers if it does not answer another heart. His mind shrinks away if he hears only the echoes of his own thoughts and finds no other inspiration.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Who knows what true loneliness is - not the conventional word but the naked terror? To the lonely themselves it wears a mask. The most miserable outcast hugs some memory or some illusion.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Loneliness is not a fault but a condition of existence.
quotes.author: Ivan Albright

quotes.quote: It would do the world good if every man would compel himself occasionally to be absolutely alone. Most of the world's progress has come out of such loneliness.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: Thirsty for attention is a cry of loneliness.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone - so far.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall in misery the time when we were happy.
quotes.author: Dante

quotes.quote: The lonely become either thoughtful or empty.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: People are lonely because they build walls instead of bridges.
quotes.author: Joseph F. Newton

quotes.quote: The worst loneliness is not to be comfortable with yourself.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The trouble is not that I am single and likely to stay single, but that I am lonely and likely to stay lonely.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bront

quotes.quote: If you are afraid of being lonely, don't try to be right.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: For whoever is lonely there is a tavern.
quotes.author: Georg Trakl

quotes.quote: People drain me, even the closest of friends, and I find loneliness to be the best state in the union to live in.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: A lonely person is at home everywhere.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: The woman who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. The woman who walks alone is likely to find herself in places no one has ever been before.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I’m most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.quote: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom for it is only when he is alone that he is really free.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Some people can’t stand being alone. I love solitude and silence. But when I come out of it, I’m a regular talking machine. It’s all or nothing for me.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.quote: Sometimes you need to sit lonely on the floor in a quiet room in order to hear your own voice and not let it drown in the noise of others.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: Find company within yourself and you’ll never spend a day alone. Find love within yourself and you’ll never have a lonely day.
quotes.author: Connor Chalfant

quotes.quote: It is far better to be alone than to be in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Loneliness is not lack of company, loneliness is lack of purpose.
quotes.author: Guillermo Maldonado

quotes.quote: The price of being a sheep is boredom. The price of being a wolf is loneliness. Choose one or the other with great care.
quotes.author: Hugh MacLeod

quotes.quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don’t have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: People think being alone makes you lonely, but I don’t think that’s true. Being surrounded by the wrong people is the loneliest thing in the world.
quotes.author: Kim Culbertson

quotes.quote: If you are alone, you belong entirely to yourself. If you are accompanied by even one companion, you belong only half to yourself or even less in proportion to the thoughtlessness of his conduct, and if you have more than one companion, you will fall more deeply into the same plight.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The thing that makes you exceptional, if you are at all, is inevitably that which makes you lonely.
quotes.author: Lorraine Hansberry

quotes.quote: It’s easy to stand in the crowd but it takes courage to stand alone.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A season of loneliness and isolation is when the caterpillar gets its wings. Remember that next time you feel alone.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Loneliness is proof that your innate search for connection is intact.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: The greatest thing in the world is to know how to belong to oneself.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: If you are never alone, you cannot know yourself.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The only way to survive is to admit you are on your own, learn to make your own decisions, and trust your judgement.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: I used to think the worst thing in life was to end up all alone. It’s not. The worst thing in life is to end up with people that make you feel all alone.
quotes.author: Robin William

quotes.quote: Loneliness is a sign you are in desperate need of yourself.
quotes.author: Rupi Kaur

quotes.quote: If you go deeper and deeper into your own heart, you’ll be living in a world with less fear, isolation and loneliness.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is necessary to be lonely in order to prove that you are right.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It's a lot easier to be lost than found. It's the reason we're always searching and rarely discovered — so many locks not enough keys.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: In the middle of the journey of our life I came to myself within a dark wood where the straight way was lost.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: When you're feeling lost, take heart. It's just your brain gathering the information it needs to make good decisions.
quotes.author: Josh Kaufman

quotes.quote: No matter how much light I carry within me, there will always be times of feeling lost, being confused, seeking direction. It is the way of the human heart.
quotes.author: Joyce Rupp

quotes.quote: The soul which has no fixed purpose in life is lost; to be everywhere, is to be nowhere.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: Every one goes astray, but the least imprudent are they who repent the soonest.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Man's true nature being lost, everything becomes his nature; as, his true good being lost, everything becomes his good.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Many of us know nothing other than a directionless cadence, having left the footprints of our lives meandering down a road that's meandering itself.
quotes.author: Craig D Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: When you are directionless like we are right now, people are looking for something to hang their hat on.
quotes.author: John Pickett

quotes.quote: What leads us astray is confusing more choices with more control. Because it is not clear that the more choices you have the more in control you feel. We have more choices than we've ever had before.
quotes.author: Sheena Iyengar

quotes.quote: It is an ironic habit of human beings to run faster when we have lost our way.
quotes.author: Dr. Rollo May

quotes.quote: A young man is so strong, so mad, so certain, and so lost. He has everything and he is able to use nothing.
quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

quotes.quote: Feeling lost? Take a dream and convert it into small goals, then start taking the steps to hit those goals.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: I lost some time once. It's always in the last place you look for it.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: I am suffocated and lost when I have not the bright feeling of progression.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: Feeling lost, crazy and desperate belongs to a good life as much as optimism, certainty and reason.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: If you've lost focus, just sit down and be still. Take the idea and rock it to and fro. Keep some of it and throw some away, and it will renew itself. You need do no more.
quotes.author: Clarissa Pinkola Estes

quotes.quote: The best thing we can do is to make wherever we're lost in look as much like home as we can.
quotes.author: Christopher Fry

quotes.quote: It felt as if things were literally slipping through my fingers. Things were just streaming away from me. I lost my sense of humor. I'm still looking for that.
quotes.author: Michelle Williams

quotes.quote: It's easy to be led astray when you're so broken. People take advantage of you.
quotes.author: Willie Aames

quotes.quote: Suppose you could gain everything in the whole world, and lost your soul. Was it worth it?
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: When all else is lost, the future still remains.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: The only real progress lies in learning to be wrong all alone.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: You got to go down a lot of wrong roads to find the right one.
quotes.author: Bob Parsons

quotes.quote: My mind is led astray by every faint rustle.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: If you board the wrong train, it is no use running along the corridor in the other direction.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: We are commanded to seek out those who are lost. We are to be our brother's keeper.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: When I feel lost and can't make a decision, I just stop and get quiet. I take a time-out.
quotes.author: Kim Cattrall

quotes.quote: The art of being bored is lost.
quotes.author: Ted Klauber

quotes.quote: I'm gutted and feeling a bit lost, but I'm determined to get through it.
quotes.author: Gareth Evans

quotes.quote: When you are feeling lost or confused...just remember you are a cross-section of four-space.
quotes.author: Thomas Richter

quotes.quote: Feeling lost? Good! Now you get to walk new paths that lead to much better places.
quotes.author: Robin S Sharma

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a hopeless situation. Every single circumstance of your life can change.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: Have courage for the great sorrows in life, and patience for the small ones. And when you have laboriously accomplished your daily tasks, go to sleep in peace, God is awake.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Too many people get lost in the game of having a good time and being naive about things.
quotes.author: Steve Brown

quotes.quote: I need to have a reason why I'm doing something. Otherwise I'm lost.
quotes.author: Steve Mcqueen

quotes.quote: I lost my head for a little while.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: I got lost but look what I found.
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: We have lost contact with reality, the simplicity of life.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: We are at the edge of an abyss and we're close to being irrevocably lost.
quotes.author: David R. Brower

quotes.quote: If he was lost for a moment, he would dive straight back into its honey.
quotes.author: Laurence Olivier

quotes.quote: Be Thankful for all things in life. Even for the bad things. SOMETIMES the worst situations in life turn out to be the best things that ever happened to us.
quotes.author: John Wilson

quotes.quote: To be lost is as legitimate a part of your process as being found.
quotes.author: Alex Ebert

quotes.quote: When I feel confused or depressed, I remember back to junior high and I silently repeat, 'This, too, shall pass.'
quotes.author: Josh Groban

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: In life, No matter what you are going through, have faith, and believe your sorrows won't last forever because what time does not heal God will.
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: It's amazing how confused and distracted and misdirected so many people are.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: I don't look for signs. But when things happen, I say, 'OK, something must be right.' Or 'OK, something must be wrong.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: After climbing a great hill, one only finds that there are many more hills to climb.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Be patient toward all that is unsolved in your heart and try to love the questions themselves... And the point is to live everything. Live the questions.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: But maybe you never really had someone, she thought now. Maybe, no matter how much you loved them, they could slip through your fingers like water, and there was nothing you could do about it.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Don’t be distracted by criticism. Remember the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Feeling sorry for yourself, and your present condition, is not only a waste of energy but the worst habit you could possibly have.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Go somewhere you know nothing about and see what happens.
quotes.author: Karl Ove Knausgård

quotes.quote: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: However confused the scene of our life appears, however, torn we may be who now do face that scene, it can be faced, and we can go on to be whole.
quotes.author: Muriel Rukeyser

quotes.quote: I'm not sure this is a world I belong in anymore. I'm not sure that I want to wake up.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: I've crossed some kind of invisible line. I feel as if I've come to a place I never thought I'd have to come to. And I don't know how I got here. It's a strange place. It's a place where a little harmless dreaming and then some sleepy, early-morning talk has led me into considerations of death and annihilation.
quotes.author: Raymond Carver

quotes.quote: If you are working on something exciting that you really care about, you don’t have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: If you don’t go after what you want, you’ll never have it. If you don’t ask, the answer is always no. If you don’t step forward, you’re always in the same place.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: If you don’t stand for something, you will fall for anything.
quotes.author: Gordon A. Eadie

quotes.quote: If you feel lost, disappointed, hesitant, or weak, return to yourself, to who you are, here and now and when you get there, you will discover yourself, like a lotus flower in full bloom, even in a muddy pond, beautiful and strong.
quotes.author: Masaru Emoto

quotes.quote: If you hear a voice within you say “you cannot paint,” then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: It is only when we silent the blaring sounds of our daily existence that we can finally hear the whispers of truth that life reveals to us, as it stands knocking on the doorsteps of our hearts.
quotes.author: K.T. Jong

quotes.quote: It is worth remembering that the time of greatest gain in terms of wisdom and inner strength is often that of greatest difficulty.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Just because someone stumbles and loses their path, doesn’t mean they’re lost forever.
quotes.author: Charles Xavier

quotes.quote: Life is not about waiting for the storms to pass. It’s about learning how to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Vivian Greene

quotes.quote: Man is almost mad—mad because he is seeking something which he has already got; mad because he’s not aware of who he is; mad because he hopes, desires and then ultimately, feels frustrated. Frustration is bound to be there because you cannot find yourself by seeking; you are already there. The seeking has to stop, the search has to drop: that is the greatest problem to be faced, encountered.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: No one compares to you, but there's no you, except in my dreams tonight.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Nothing is more beautiful than a smile that has struggled through the tears.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: One day you will ask me which is more important, my life or yours? I will say mine and you will walk away not knowing that you are my life.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Some beautiful paths can't be discovered without getting lost.
quotes.author: Erol Ozan

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you lose your way, you find YOURSELF.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Sorrow looks back. Worry looks around. Faith looks up.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Storms make trees take deeper roots.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: The creative is the place where no-one else has ever been.You have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition. What you’ll discover will be wonderful. What you’ll discover is yourself.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: The happiest people don’t necessarily have the best of everything but they make the most of everything.
quotes.author: Sam Cawthorn

quotes.quote: The one who falls and gets up is stronger than the one who never tried. Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The quiet sense of something lost.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: The Truth is, we all get lost as we try to find our way. Perhaps the key is to stop, take a look around and enjoy the scenery as we go.
quotes.author: JaTawny Muckelvene Chatmon

quotes.quote: The world breaks everyone and afterward many are strong at the broken places.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: There are two tragedies in life. One is to lose your heart's desire. The other is to gain it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: There came a time when the risk to remain tight in the bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: To get lost is to learn the way.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in the sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We are forlorn like children, and experienced like old men, we are crude and sorrowful and superficial—I believe we are lost.
quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

quotes.quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.
quotes.author: Dr. Henry Link

quotes.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: We must be willing to get rid of the life we've planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us. The old skin has to be shed before the new one can come.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Weeping is not the same thing as crying. It takes your whole body to weep, and when it's over, you feel like you don't have any bones left to hold you up.
quotes.author: Sarah Ockler

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: You can’t start the next chapter if you keep re-reading the last one.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You really have to look inside yourself and find your own inner strength, and say, ‘I’m proud of what I am and who I am, and I'm just going to be myself.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: Being myself includes taking risks with myself, taking risks on new behavior, trying new ways of 'being myself', so that I can see who it is I want to be.
quotes.author: Hugh Prather

quotes.quote: Simply being myself makes me feel vulnerable.
quotes.author: Nathan Parsons

quotes.quote: I never went wrong by being myself.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.quote: I take a lot of pride in being myself. I'm comfortable with who I am.
quotes.author: James McAvoy

quotes.quote: I'm terrified of just being myself because I think it's boring. I know who I really am and I think it's boring.
quotes.author: Sufjan Stevens

quotes.quote: When I'm trusting and being myself as fully as possible, everything in my life reflects this by falling into place easily, often miraculously.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: I don’t have to be anything at all. I don’t even have to be myself, because there is no such thing as not being myself. I am inescapably myself.
quotes.author: Mooji

quotes.quote: I have never regarded myself as this or that. I have been too busy being myself to bother about regarding myself.
quotes.author: Rex Stout

quotes.quote: I try to keep it real. I don’t have time to worry about what I’m projecting to the world. I’m just busy being myself.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: If being me offends you, maybe I'm not the problem.
quotes.author: Tsem Tulku

quotes.quote: It took a lot of years of me on my own, coaching myself, to look in the mirror and love the reflection.
quotes.author: Alyssa Edwards

quotes.quote: You really have to look inside yourself and find your own inner strength, and say, 'I'm proud of what I am and who I am, and I'm just going to be myself.'
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: I allow myself to fail. I allow myself to break. I'm not afraid of my flaws.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: It took me years to realize that 'normal' is actually super boring and that being myself was harder but infinitely more rewarding.
quotes.author: Franchesca Ramsey

quotes.quote: I prefer to be true to myself, even at the hazard of incurring the ridicule of others, rather than to be false, and to incur my own abhorrence.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: I don’t care what you think about me. I don’t think about you at all.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Being myself is what got me to where I am.
quotes.author: Jeff Hardy

quotes.quote: I’ve always prided myself on being myself and trying to stick true to who I am and how I was raised.
quotes.author: Patrick Kane

quotes.quote: I am not trying to give an image of a fairytale, perfect, everything else, I am just being myself.
quotes.author: Rebecca Loos

quotes.quote: I’m just saying I’m being myself, and people understand that.
quotes.author: Dennis Rodman

quotes.quote: I think especially since going solo it’s pretty clear that I’m completely being myself.
quotes.author: William Beckett

quotes.quote: Sometimes being me is very confusing.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Scott

quotes.quote: Being me right now is sort of amazing.
quotes.author: Helen Mirren

quotes.quote: Being me is no different than being most anyone else, I guess.
quotes.author: Layne Staley

quotes.quote: I'm not trying to be different. To me, I'm just being myself.
quotes.author: Jaylen Brown

quotes.quote: I'm having fun. I'm being myself. I'm doing what I love. That's all that matters.
quotes.author: James Charles

quotes.quote: I stay true to myself and my style, and I am always pushing myself to be aware of that and be original.
quotes.author: Aaliyah

quotes.quote: I would classify myself as an individual. That's what I try to stay true with - being myself, 100 percent.
quotes.author: Khalid

quotes.quote: The single most powerful thing I can be is to be myself.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.quote: It gets better and better being me
quotes.author: Liam Gallagher

quotes.quote: Being nice to everybody, saying hello to everyone in the room, signing every autograph; it was instilled in me at a very young age that this was what I was suppose to do. But I don't think it helps at all. I see more people who are rude or arrogant being rewarded - but, this way, I can put my head on the pillow at night.
quotes.author: Brooke Shields

quotes.quote: Not only do I think being nice and kind is easy but being kind, in my opinion, is important.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.quote: It's all about people. It's about networking and being nice to people and not burning any bridges. Your book is going to impress, but in the end it is people that are going to hire you.
quotes.author: Mike Davidson

quotes.quote: I think being nice and being safe is unfair to yourself when you have big dreams as a woman. I think you have to prepare yourself that not everyone in this world has the same personality... The one thing I've chosen to be great at in my life is singing - so why not be proud that I'm great at it?
quotes.author: Jessie J

quotes.quote: No person in the world ever lost anything by being nice to me.
quotes.author: Lillie Langtry

quotes.quote: Being nice to someone you have an issue with doesn't mean you are fake...it means someone taught you how to be polite.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: The awkward moment when you're just being nice and the person thinks you're flirting with them.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Sometimes being nice isn't always the best thing because everyone knows that it's so easy to hurt nice people.
quotes.author: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.quote: Being nice to people you don't like isn't called two-faced... it's called growing up.
quotes.author: Bernajoy Vaal

quotes.quote: Do not take me for granted, being nice is not a matter of weakness, it is a matter of choice.
quotes.author: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.quote: Sometimes being too nice is dangerous,you have to show your mean side once in a while to avoid getting hurt.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Be nice to everyone, always smile and appreciate things because it could all be gone tomorrow
quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

quotes.quote: Being nice merely to be liked in return nullifies the point.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: People being nice for no apparent reason always made me suspicious. People being nice to me with no apparent reason made me even more suspicious.
quotes.author: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.quote: Be nice. And if you can't do that, just don't be mean.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Be nice to the environment. Be nice to animals. Be nice to people. If you do that, you will leave a mark on the world.
quotes.author: Enock Maregesi

quotes.quote: Being nice merely to be liked in return nullifies the point.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Treat everyone with politeness, even those who are rude to you not because they are nice, but because you are.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: It's nice to be important, but it's more important to be nice
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Always be nice to your children because they are the ones who will choose your rest home.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Be nice to people on your way up because you'll meet them on your way down.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Be nice to nerds. Chances are you'll end up working for one.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Sometimes being too nice is dangerous, so you have to make your stands once in a while to avoid getting hurt.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Being too nice gets you used and being too mean pushes people away. You should be nice but you should also put your foot down if you have to.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Being too nice gets you nothing more than a compliment.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Being too nice literally increases your chances of being hurt, used and or taken for granted.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: It's all about people. It's about networking and being nice to people and not burning any bridges. Your book is going to impress, but in the end it is people that are going to hire you.
quotes.author: John Davidson

quotes.quote: No person in the world ever lost anything by being nice to me.
quotes.author: Lillie Langtry

quotes.quote: It does not take strength to hate someone, it takes strength to be kind to them even when they have done you a bad turn.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: Being nice doesn't win games.
quotes.author: Early Rice

quotes.quote: While it is true that we have to be wary of people being nice to us for nefarious ends, that doesn't mean not being nice is the hallmark of intellectual rigor.
quotes.author: Julian Baggini

quotes.quote: Charity begins at home' is not a bromide. It is a direction. It means start with being nice to yourself, your authentic self, tehen try being nice to everyone else.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: Be nice to your kids. They'll choose your nursing home.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: Leadership is not about being nice. It's about being right and being strong.
quotes.author: Paul Keating

quotes.quote: Being nice and kind does not mean that we are volunteering to let someone else take advantage of us.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: Be kind, for every man you meet is fighting a hard battle.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: I had rather never receive kindness than never bestow one.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Always try to be a little kinder than necessary.
quotes.author: Sir James Matthew Barrie

quotes.quote: Ask yourself daily, how many ill-minded persons you have shown a kind disposition.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.
quotes.author: Joubert

quotes.quote: The unfortunate need people who will be kind to them; the prosperous need people to be kind to.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Little deeds of kindness, little words of love, help to make earth happy like the heaven above.
quotes.author: Julia A. Fletcher

quotes.quote: Kindness it is that which brings forth kindness always.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: You can accomplish by kindness what you cannot do by force.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Write injuries in sand, kindness in marble.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: We can each change the world, with genuine acts of kindness.
quotes.author: Mongai Fankam

quotes.quote: Constant kindness can accomplish much. As the sun makes ice melt, kindness causes misunderstanding, mistrust, and hostility to evaporate.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Be nice to people... maybe it'll be unappreciated, unreciprocated, or ignored, but spread the love anyway. We rise by lifting others.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Don't let a cruel word escape your mouth. There's no greater sin than breaking a heart.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: Life isn't always kind. It isn't gentle and loving or sympathetic to the pains and sorrows of humanity. I, however, as an individual in control of my own actions, can be kind and loving, gentle, and sympathetic to those around me, and in the process improve what life is for everyone.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Do good even if no one is watching you and do it as if everyone is watching you.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Niceness is magic, but no one thinks of it that way since it's quiet and constant.
quotes.author: Kimberly Karalius

quotes.quote: Everybody wants to be good, but not many are prepared to make the sacrifices it takes to be great. To many people, being nice in order to be liked is more important. There's equal merit in that, but you must not confuse being good with being liked.
quotes.author: Paul Arden

quotes.quote: Being nice doesn't necessarily mean you're weak. You can be nice and be strong at the same time. That's a character trait that we need more in Washington.
quotes.author: Shelley Moore Capito

quotes.quote: I could do nice, but it's just not as much fun. Being nice isn't my biggest goal in life. I'm trying to be honest about who I am, and that's not always nice. I'm not always the world's cheerleader.
quotes.author: Sharon Stone

quotes.quote: The most attractive thing about you should have less to do with your face or body and more to do with your attitude and how you treat people.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: In my experience, many people confuse being cowardly with being nice.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Being pregnant is an occupational hazard of being a wife.
quotes.author: Queen Victoria

quotes.quote: Truthfully, being pregnant is changing me as a person. Each day is part of this amazing journey that has completely shifted the focus of my life and made me reevaluate my personal and professional goals.
quotes.author: Holly Madison

quotes.quote: I think the best thing about being pregnant would definitely have to be seeing just my belly grow and seeing, like, wow, there is, you know, something inside of me.
quotes.author: Tia Mowry

quotes.quote: It's a great thing about being pregnant - you don't need excuses to pee or to eat.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Being pregnant is supposed to be the happiest time in your life.
quotes.author: Kyla Pratt

quotes.quote: Being pregnant finally helped me understand what my true relationship was with my body - meaning that it wasn't put on this earth to look good in a swimsuit.
quotes.author: Amy Adams

quotes.quote: I really like being pregnant. Not that there aren't things I don't love, but when I think about what my body is doing - creating a child - it just blows my mind. I'm in awe of the process and science.
quotes.author: Emily Deschanel

quotes.quote: I truly loved being pregnant and feeling what was going on inside my body and watching it change. It's difficult to recoup, but still amazing nonetheless. I would have another one.
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.quote: Being pregnant was a lot like being a child again. There was always someone telling you what to do.
quotes.author: Emily Oster

quotes.quote: The good thing about being pregnant is that I don't have to worry about sucking it in or dieting!
quotes.author: Busy Philipps

quotes.quote: I love being pregnant. You can do whatever you want.
quotes.author: Claudia Schiffer

quotes.quote: Every four weeks I go up a bra size... it's worth being pregnant just for the breasts.
quotes.author: Natasha Hamilton

quotes.quote: Of course I'd like children. But I have to get over my impression that being pregnant is like popping corn. You expand and expand until you pop.
quotes.author: Markie Post

quotes.quote: Being pregnant was the healthiest I've ever been in my life. Except for the cupcakes.
quotes.author: Ashlee Simpson

quotes.quote: There are two sides to being pregnant. There is the beautiful, wonderful blessing side. The second side - it sucks!
quotes.author: Tamar Braxton

quotes.quote: Being pregnant is the most natural thing our bodies can do. Our grandparents did it without all these books, and they came out okay.
quotes.author: Jamie-Lynn Sigler

quotes.quote: A lot of women say they love being pregnant, but I wasn't such a big fan.
quotes.author: Marion Jones

quotes.quote: Going into a pregnancy is a really challenging time for a woman, because it's forever-changing, both mentally and physically.
quotes.author: Brooke Burke

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a kind of miracle. Especially so in that it proves that a man and woman can conspire to force God to create a new soul.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is something that I always love. It's about hope and the future and a new baby.
quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

quotes.quote: A pregnancy is a marvelous moment that I would love to repeat and repeat.
quotes.author: Paz Vega

quotes.quote: If pregnancy were a book they would cut the last two chapters.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: The thing that's nice about pregnancy is that in the end, you have a baby.
quotes.author: Ann Romney

quotes.quote: In the pregnancy process I have come to realize how much of the burden is on the female partner. She's got a construction zone going on in her belly.
quotes.author: Al Roker

quotes.quote: Pregnancy was probably the best and the hardest thing I'll ever go through. I know for a lot of women, it can be wonderful and relatively easy.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: Unplanned pregnancy is an equal-opportunity affliction.
quotes.author: Ann McLane Kuster

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a very creative phase for me.
quotes.author: Natalie Massenet

quotes.quote: Whether your pregnancy was meticulously planned, medically coaxed, or happened by surprise, one thing is certain-your life will never be the same.
quotes.author: Catherine Jones

quotes.quote: I don't particularly like being pregnant. I like the baby at the end. Pregnancy is a very distant thing for me. I can't seem to believe there's really a baby there. It's such a miracle.
quotes.author: Mary Beth Whitehead

quotes.quote: It's normal to gain weight during pregnancy. It's something that has to happen to your body.
quotes.author: Carnie Wilson

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a kind of miracle. Especially so in that it proves that a man and woman can conspire to force God to create a new soul.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: Pregnancy seemed like a tremendous abdication of control. Something growing inside you which would eventually usurp your life.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Let us make pregnancy an occasion when we appreciate our female bodies.
quotes.author: Merete Leonhardt-Lupa

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a process that invites you to surrender to the unseen force behind all life.
quotes.author: Judy Ford

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is getting company inside one's skin.
quotes.author: Maggie Scarf

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a disease from which you recover in 18 years and 9 months.
quotes.author: Carrie Latet

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a process that invites you to surrender to the unseen force behind all life.
quotes.author: Judy Ford

quotes.quote: Everything grows rounder and wider and weirder, and I sit here in the middle of it all and wonder who in the world you will turn out to be.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.quote: A wanted pregnancy as much as a dreaded pregnancy can play differently than all one's previous imaginings.
quotes.author: Susie Orbach

quotes.quote: It's amazing, the mentality shift that occurs in pregnancy. All of a sudden you want to be good to yourself.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Hasselbeck

quotes.quote: Of course, I have the emotional ups and downs of pregnancy, like crying jags for no reason and then the next day I can't even remember what I was crying about!
quotes.author: Jodi Sweetin

quotes.quote: When you gain 50 pounds during pregnancy like I did, you fear that you'll never get back in shape.
quotes.author: Charisma Carpenter

quotes.quote: Pregnancy seems designed to prepare you for life as a mother. You start making sacrifices nine months before the child is born, so by the time they put in an appearance you are used to giving things up for them.
quotes.author: Brett Kiellerop

quotes.quote: I went up a pants size during my pregnancy.
quotes.author: Ellen Pompeo

quotes.quote: For many women - myself included - pregnancy brings on tremendous anxiety and confusion, along with the joy.
quotes.author: Emily Oster

quotes.quote: Pregnancy humbles husbands. After an initial rush of male pride they quickly recognise the minor role that nature had assigned them in the drama of reproduction.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: In pregnancy, there are two bodies, one inside the other. Two people live under one skin.... When so much of life is dedicated to maintaining our integrity as distinct beings, this bodily tandem is an uncanny fact.
quotes.author: Joan Raphael-Leff

quotes.quote: I am not finding pregnancy much of a joy. I am afraid of childbirth, but I am afraid I can't find a way of avoiding it.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.quote: A lot of women use pregnancy as an excuse to let their bodies go, and that's the worst thing.
quotes.author: Tracy Anderson

quotes.quote: They say that your second trimester is when you get most of your energy and it's the 'easiest' part of the pregnancy.
quotes.author: Malin Akerman

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a time for women to feel more connected with their bodies, and yet often the opposite occurs.
quotes.author: Amanda de Cadenet

quotes.quote: It’s a really magical time, those first few weeks. It almost makes you wish you didn’t have to tell anyone, ever. You could just watch your belly grow bigger, and no one would be allowed to ask you about it, and you would have your baby and a year later you would allow visitors to finally come and meet your little miracle.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Being pregnant is a conundrum. You have this freedom, because it's a wonderful time that a human being is growing inside of you, and it is truly magical. On the other hand, your body changes.
quotes.author: Anna Gunn

quotes.quote: What good mothers and fathers instinctively feel like doing for their babies is usually best after all.
quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

quotes.quote: It is the most powerful creation to have life that is growing inside of you. There is no bigger gift.
quotes.author: Beyonce

quotes.quote: There is something very beautiful about being pregnant. I think I enjoy being pregnant more than not being pregnant. I know it could go either way, and the next pregnancy could be the complete opposite.
quotes.author: Chrissy Teigen

quotes.quote: Of course I can do this. I’m pregnant, not brain-damaged. My condition doesn’t change my personality.
quotes.author: Christine Feehan

quotes.quote: When you do take the home pregnancy test, it doesn't quite seem real. But when you see the baby and the heartbeat on the ultrasound, it's so incredible.
quotes.author: Danica Mckellar

quotes.quote: Pregnancy and motherhood are the most beautiful and significantly life-altering events that I have ever experienced.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Hasselbeck

quotes.quote: Making the decision to have a child it is momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking around outside your body.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stone

quotes.quote: Life doesn’t get more real than having a newborn at home.
quotes.author: Eric Church

quotes.quote: If I had my life to live over, instead of wishing away nine months of pregnancy, I’d have cherished every moment and realized that the wonderment growing inside me was the only chance in life to assist God in a miracle.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Now my belly is as noble as my heart.
quotes.author: Gabriela Mistral

quotes.quote: Words can not express the joy of new life.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Giving birth should be your greatest achievement not your greatest fear.
quotes.author: Jane Weideman

quotes.quote: Carrying a baby is the most rewarding experience a woman can enjoy.
quotes.author: Jayne Mansfield

quotes.quote: Of all the rights of women, the greatest is to be a mother.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is magical, I've never felt more connected to my body.
quotes.author: Mary Helen Bowers

quotes.quote: Before you were conceived I wanted you. Before you were born, I loved you. Before you were here an hour, I would die for you. This is the miracle of Mother’s Love.
quotes.author: Maureen Hawkins

quotes.quote: The amazing thing about becoming a parent is that you will never again be your own first priority.
quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

quotes.quote: Loving a baby is a circular business, a kind of feedback loop. The more you give the more you get and the more you get the more you feel like giving.
quotes.author: Penelope Leach

quotes.quote: The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: If your baby is beautiful and perfect, never cries or fusses, sleeps on schedule and burps on demand, an angel all the time—you’re the grandma.
quotes.author: Theresa Bloomingdale

quotes.quote: A baby fills a place in your heart that you never knew was empty.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A baby will make love stronger, days shorter, nights longer, bankroll smaller, home happier, clothes shabbier, the past is forgotten, and the future worth living for.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People often say that beauty is in the eye of the beholder, and I say that the most liberating thing about beauty is realizing you are the beholder.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness.
quotes.author: Maria Mitchell

quotes.quote: Taking joy in living is a woman's best cosmetic.
quotes.author: Rosalind Russell

quotes.quote: Being pretty doesn't mean that I'm dumb. As well as being silent in a situation doesn't mean that I'm wise. Merely look at it my way; I'm pretty because of all the ugliness I've seen and dealt with and I'm silent in your wake because even an idiot knows when to bite their tongue!
quotes.author: Nicole Hill

quotes.quote: Being pretty on the inside means you dont hit your brother and you eat all your peas thats what my grandma taught me.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: It's sad when girls think they don't have anything going on except being pretty.
quotes.author: Keri Russell

quotes.quote: Beauty is only skin deep, and the world is full of thin skinned people.
quotes.author: Richard Armour

quotes.quote: Looks are so deceptive that people should be done up like food packages with the ingredients clearly labeled.
quotes.author: Helen Hudson

quotes.quote: Beauty is a mystery. You can neither eat it nor make flannel out of it.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: You can be gorgeous at thirty, charming at forty, and irresistible for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Beauty, to me, is about being comfortable in your own skin. That, or kick-ass red lipstick.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There is nothing ugly; I never saw an ugly thing in my life: for let the form of an object be what it may, -- light, shade, and perspective will always make it beautiful.
quotes.author: John Constable

quotes.quote: A person is only beautiful, when their own beauty, is reflecting on to others.
quotes.author: Tara Grady

quotes.quote: [The lover says:] How beautiful you are, now that you love me.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: Beauty can pierce one like a pain.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: Beauty is a mystery. You can neither eat it nor make flannel out of it.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: I think being beautiful is only one aspect of your life.
quotes.author: Alicia Machado

quotes.quote: A thing of beauty is a joy for ever:Its loveliness increases; it will neverPass into nothingness; but still will keepA bower quiet for us, and a sleepFull of sweet dreams, and health, and quiet breathing.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Think of all the beauty that's still left in and around you and be happy.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Beauty is the promise of happiness.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: Behind every pretty little face & beautiful smile there is a girl that needs to be loved..!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: She's the prettiest girl in townThe kind you'd never think would feel sad or downShe's full of charm and gloryBut the look in her eyes tell a different story
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: She hears she's beautiful and she smilesBut doesn't real want to believe itHow everyone sees her beauty but not what's beneath itWhat's hidden from sadness and hurt
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A good face they say, is a letter of recommendation. O Nature, Nature, why art thou so dishonest, as ever to send men with these false recommendations into the World!
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: As a beauty I'm not a great star. Others are handsomer far; but my face -- I don't mind it because I'm behind it; it the folks out in front that I jar.
quotes.author: A. H. Euwer

quotes.quote: The faces that have charmed us the most escape us the soonest.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: A pretty face is nothing of you have an ugly heart.
quotes.author: unknown
