quotes.quote: A pretty face gets old, a nice body will change, `
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: But I don't want some pretty face to tell me pretty lies. All I want is someone to believe
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: Not being beautiful was the true blessing. Not being beautiful forced me to develop my inner resources. The pretty girl has a handicap to overcome.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: No matter how plain a woman may be, if truth and honesty are written across her face, she will be beautiful.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
quotes.author: Charles Reade

quotes.quote: Judge nothing by the appearance. The more beautiful the serpent, the more fatal its sting.
quotes.author: William Scott Downey

quotes.quote: It has been said that a pretty face is a passport. But it's not, it's a visa, and it runs out fast.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.quote: A pretty girl is like a melody that haunts you night and day.
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: What's the whole point of being pretty on the outside when you're so ugly on the inside?
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: Look at yourself in the mirror and don't be afraid to notice how beautiful you are.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Beauty is only skin deep. I think what’s really important is finding a balance of mind, body, and spirit.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: Adornment, what a science! Beauty, what a weapon! Modesty, what elegance!
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Happiness and confidence are the prettiest things you can wear.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: The best color in the whole world is the one that looks good on you.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Being uncool is being pretty much the coolest you can be.
quotes.author: Rufus Wainwright

quotes.quote: It's your outlook on life that counts. If you take yourself lightly and don't take yourself too seriously, pretty soon you can find the humor in our everyday lives. And sometimes it can be a lifesaver.
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.quote: A real girl isn’t perfect, and a perfect girl isn’t real.
quotes.author: Harry Styles

quotes.quote: You were born an original. Don t die a copy.
quotes.author: John Mason

quotes.quote: But above all, in order to be, never try to seem.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: To be natural is such a very difficult pose to keep up.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Forget about being impressive and commit to being real. Because being real is impressive!
quotes.author: Jonathan Harnisch

quotes.quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: You can put your boots in the oven but that doesn't make them biscuits.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Men often applaud an imitation and hiss the real thing.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Be what you are. This is the first step toward becoming better than you are.
quotes.author: Julius Charles Hare

quotes.quote: Learn to... be what you are, and learn to resign with a good grace all that you are not.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: The strongest force in the universe is a human being living consistently with his identity.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Be yourself- not your idea of what you think somebody else's idea of yourself should be.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: To be one's self, and unafraid whether right or wrong, is more admirable than the easy cowardice of surrender to conformity.
quotes.author: Irving Wallace

quotes.quote: Share your weaknesses. Share your hard moments. Share your real side. It'll either scare away every fake person in your life or it will inspire them to finally let go of that mirage called 'perfection,' which will open the doors to the most important relationships you'll ever be a part of.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: A cynic might suggest as the motto of modern life this simple legend--'Just as good as the real.'
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: Outside show is a poor substitute for inner worth.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Be content to seem what you really are.
quotes.author: Martial

quotes.quote: What is important to consider, I think, is the difference between what is imaginary and what is real--and the fears are real.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: All that glitters is not gold.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Real isn't how you are made,' said the Skin Horse. 'It's a thing that happens to you. When a child loves you for a long, long time, not just to play with, but REALLY loves you, then you become Real.'
quotes.author: Margery Williams Bianco

quotes.quote: I realised a long time ago that a warrior in search of his dream must take his inspiration from what he actually does & not from what he imagines himself doing.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Authenticity is a collection of choices that we have to make every day. It's about the choice to show up and be real. The choice to be honest. The choice to let our true selves be seen.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Our true self is being who we are.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Anyone can possess, anyone can profess, but it is an altogether different thing to confess.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Never apologize for what you feel. It's like saying sorry for being real.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: If you don't like my words, don't listen. If you don't like my appearance, don't look. If you don't like my actions, turn your head; It's as simple as that.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you want, for those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Best be yourself, imperial, plain and true!
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Ride the energy of your own unique spirit.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Being yourself is all it takes. If you want to impress someone don't be someone else just be yourself.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: Do your own thing on your own terms and get what you came here for.
quotes.author: Oliver James

quotes.quote: Let yourself be drawn by the stronger pull of that which you truly love.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: I've always loved the idea of not being what people expect me to be.
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.quote: Be yourself, don't take anything from anyone, and never let them take you alive.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Don't be into trends. Don't make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress and the way to live.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: Some people say you are going the wrong way, when it's simply a way of your own
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Do your thing and don't care if they like it.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: Its not just changing our minds - it's changing what we consider to be real.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: You must...love me, myself, not my circumstances, if we are to be real friends.
quotes.author: Herb Galewitz

quotes.quote: Being real is over expected and under appreciated.
quotes.author: Muneer H. Waheed

quotes.quote: Being real these days ain't easy.
quotes.author: Bernard James Freeman

quotes.quote: Think of what you are / How very far you are from being real
quotes.author: John Bettis

quotes.quote: Seems like ain't nothing cool about being real / No one's honest about what they feel
quotes.author: Lyrica Nasha Anderson

quotes.quote: I'm being real and that's the thing to do / I'm just living and loving
quotes.author: Alan Maman,

quotes.quote: If I'm being real honest / I'm fighting uphill battles / I can't seem to find the right light / 'Cause I've Been living in the shadows
quotes.author: Bear Rinehart

quotes.quote: Being real ain't got no drawbacks.
quotes.author: Harold Gonzalez-Mejia

quotes.quote: The saddest summary of a life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have.
quotes.author: Louis E. Boone

quotes.quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Anger, tears and sadness are only for those who have given up.
quotes.author: Katie Gill

quotes.quote: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not, and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Don't criticize something you know nothing about. It only brings people down and makes everyone miserable.
quotes.author: Laura Hall

quotes.quote: Pain and suffering are always inevitable for a large intelligence and a deep heart. The really great men must, I think, have great sadness on earth.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: I'm not okay, I'm just good at pretending I am.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There can be no rainbow without a cloud and a storm.
quotes.author: John H. Vincent

quotes.quote: Sadness does not come from bad circumstances. It comes from bad thoughts.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: When feeling sad, dream on! When feeling happy, dream on! You shall survive by means of your dreams!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: When sorrows come, they come not single spies, but in battalions.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The best thing for being sad, is to learn something. That's the only thing that never fails. Learning is the only thing for you. Look what a lot of things there are to learn.
quotes.author: T. H. White

quotes.quote: Every thought is a battle. Every breath is a war, and I don't think I'm winning anymore.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than being sad is for others to know you are sad.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Behind every beautiful thing, there's some kind of pain.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: If life doesn't kill you, emptiness will.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Being sad with the right people is better than being happy with the wrong ones.
quotes.author: Philippos Syrigos

quotes.quote: You have to hurt in order to know. Fall in order to grow. Lose in order to gain. Because most of life's lessons are learned through pain.
quotes.author: Boonaa Mohammed

quotes.quote: Some days are just bad days, that's all. You have to experience sadness to know happiness, and I remind myself that not every day is going to be a good day, that's just the way it is!
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.quote: Don't be sad because it's over. Be happy because you can start over.
quotes.author: Ria Tumimomor

quotes.quote: It can be really powerful to write something when youre sad.
quotes.author: Kathryn Stockett

quotes.quote: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you knew.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to do things when sad things happen.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Never make someone a priority when all you are to them is an option.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Tears are words that need to be written.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Absolute silence leads to sadness. It is the image of death.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: Sinks my sad soul with sorrow to the grave.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: At times, I feel overwhelmed and my depression leads me into darkness.
quotes.author: Dorothy Hamill

quotes.quote: Don't cry over someone who wouldn't cry over you.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: It's easy to cry when you realize that everyone you love will reject you or die.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: For all sad words of tongue and pen, the saddest are these, 'It might have been.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: A feeling of sadness that is not akin to pain resembles sorrow only, As the mist resembles the rain.
quotes.author: Longfellow

quotes.quote: By sadness, you destroy the divine image in your soul. God is joy. All nature rejoices in him, and would you be sad? A true joy makes the heart fear God.
quotes.author: Lombez

quotes.quote: Take my word for it, the saddest thing under the sky is a soul incapable of sadness.
quotes.author: Countess de Gasparin

quotes.quote: If one person does not become sad, another person does not become happy.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: Better by far you should forget and smile / Than that you should remember and be sad.
quotes.author: Christina Rosetti

quotes.quote: Atone of sorrow doth the mass pervade, / And grief hath here bestowed her deepest shade; / No one is joyous here— no one seems glad / But the childhood, youth, and age, all, all, are sad...
quotes.author: R. Douglas Jr

quotes.quote: In sooth, I know not why I am so sad. It wearies me, you say it wearies you.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: There's a long streak of melancholia in my world. Often when I'm sad, I make things to get out of the sadness. Everything is more emotionally vivid when you're sad.
quotes.author: Mike Mills

quotes.quote: Life was suddenly too sad. And yet it was beautiful. The beauty was dimmed when the sadness welled up. And the beauty would be there again when the sadness went. So the beauty and the sadness belonged together somehow.
quotes.author: William Steig

quotes.quote: Young children don't know that sadness isn't forever. It's frightening for them to feel that their sadness may overwhelm them and never go away.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: The weight of this sad time we must obey; / Speak what we feel, not what we ought to say.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Talk happiness. The world is sad enough / Without your woe, no path is wholly rough / Look for the places / That are smooth and clear.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Sad or depressing thoughts...produce changes in brain chemistry that have a detrimental effect on the body's physiology.
quotes.author: Chopra

quotes.quote: No one makes us happy or sad. Our emotions don't happen to us so much as we choose them. In fact, our own thoughts, emotions, and actions are the only things we really do control.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.quote: The lessons we learn in sadness and from loss are those that abide. Sorrow clarifies the mind, steadies it, forces it to weigh things correctly.
quotes.author: T.T. Manger

quotes.quote: A man who knows sadness, if he laughs his laughter will have depth. His laughter will have something of his sadness too; his laughter will be more colorful.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: When sadness comes, accept it. Listen to its song. It has something to give you. It has a gift which no happiness can give to you, only sadness can give you.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Being sad has become cool / Drowning yourself in a pool of tears is the latest trend / If you shout 'I want to die' in the middle of high school cafeteria, the only response you'll get is 'same.'
quotes.author: Nola Debera Leech

quotes.quote: It ain't depressing that I'm being troubled / But the utmost concern is, my heart being crumbled / Yet never were these emotions portrayed out by me / Cause I knew it all along, that was what made me / All I could say was, 'I'm happy being sad!' / 'And I don't really care, you may think I'm mad.'
quotes.author: Sindhura Sajja

quotes.quote: Sadness is but a wall between two gardens.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Nothing can cure the soul but the senses, just as nothing can cure the senses but the soul.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The word ‘happy’ would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Behind every sweet smile, there is a bitter sadness that no one can ever see and feel.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: Sad hurts but it’s a healthy feeling.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Life is too short to be angry or sad for long.
quotes.author: Alphonso Davies

quotes.quote: A sad soul can kill quicker than a germ.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: It doesn’t hurt to feel sad from time to time.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: Sad things happen. They do. But we don’t need to live sad forever.
quotes.author: Mattie Stepanek

quotes.quote: Sad people dislike the happy, and the happy the sad; the quick thinking the sedate, and the careless the busy and industrious.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Sometimes we have to stop being being scared and just go for it.
quotes.author: Alex Elle

quotes.quote: If we let things terrify us, life will not be worth living.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: People are just afraid of things too much. Afraid of things that don't necessarily merit fear.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: We are afraid to care too much, for fear that the other person does not care at all.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Only when we are no longer afraid do we begin to live.
quotes.author: Dorothy Thompson

quotes.quote: Never stop because you are afraid - you are never so likely to be wrong.
quotes.author: Fridtjof Nansen

quotes.quote: Being scared can keep a man from getting killed, and often makes a better fighter out of him.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: To be afraid is to behave as if the truth were not true.
quotes.author: Bayard Rustin

quotes.quote: There's no purer feeling in the world than being scared.
quotes.author: Stephen Graham Jones

quotes.quote: Stop being afraid of what could go wrong and start being positive about what could go right.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Learning how to face fear really makes you invincible because you stop being scared.
quotes.author: Alexa Von Tobel

quotes.quote: You can only be brave by being afraid. Embrace what you are scared of and shift its energy to destroy your fears.
quotes.author: Joel Brown

quotes.quote: Being scared isn't the problem. It's not running away that's the hard part.
quotes.author: John Connolly

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to stop being scared & just go for it. Either it will work, or it won't. That's life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: What you are afraid to do is a clear indicator of the next thing you need to do.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Sometime it's good to be scared. It means you still have something to lose.
quotes.author: Meredith Grey

quotes.quote: A man who is not afraid is not aggressive, a man who has no sense of fear of any kind is really a free, a peaceful man.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Being scared is part of being alive. Accept it. Walk through it.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Of the mental hazards, being scared is the worst. When you get scared, you get tense.
quotes.author: Sam Snead

quotes.quote: Everything worth doing starts with being scared.
quotes.author: Art Garfunkel

quotes.quote: There's no point in being scared of just trying.
quotes.author: Zac Efron

quotes.quote: For some reason, people value being scared less than they value laughing.
quotes.author: Jason Blum

quotes.quote: Being scared is really a good thing. It's being scared of being scared that's bad. Being scared of walking through your fear, going to a place of true creativity - that's what an artist is, that's what he does. If you do that, then being inspired by your contemporaries or people from the past is really great.
quotes.author: Lawrence Bender

quotes.quote: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you push through that feeling of being scared, that feeling of taking risk, really amazing things can happen.
quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

quotes.quote: You have decided being scared is caused mostly by thinking.
quotes.author: David Foster Wallace

quotes.quote: That's the trouble with being scared all the time. Eventually, people just go numb.
quotes.author: Mira Grant

quotes.quote: One is never afraid of the unknown; one is afraid of the known coming to an end.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: What's risky is living your life and never trying for anything and never doing something brave and never getting yourself scared.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Fear is, I believe, a most effective tool in destroying the soul of an individual - and the soul of a people.
quotes.author: Anwar Sadat

quotes.quote: Seems to me people are mean or evil because they're scared, mostly, or in pain, or afraid they're going to lose something.
quotes.author: Barbara Samuel

quotes.quote: Too often we are scared. Scared of what we might not be able to do. Scared of what people might think if we tried. We let fears stand in the way of our hopes. We say no when we want to say yes. We sit quietly when we want to scream. And we shout with the others, When we should keep our mouths shut. Why? After all, we do only go around once. There's really no time to be afraid. JUST DO IT.
quotes.author: Barry Sanders

quotes.quote: Fear is the main source of superstition, and one of the main sources of cruelty. To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: In this business, by the time you realize you're in trouble, it's too late to save yourself. Unless you're running scared all the time, you're gone.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: If you're scared to lose rather than excited to win, then that's the wrong way to approach a race.
quotes.author: Cate Campbell

quotes.quote: I know you're upset, I know you're scared, but don't walk away.
quotes.author: Cheryl Rainfield

quotes.quote: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow. It empties today of its strength.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Be yourself, be an individual - people are scared to be themselves.
quotes.author: Dan Bilzerian

quotes.quote: Courage is doing what you are afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you are scared.
quotes.author: Eddie Rickenbacker

quotes.quote: Courage is doing what you are afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you are scared.
quotes.author: Eddie Rickenbacker

quotes.quote: We are so scared of being judged that we look for every excuse to procrastinate.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: Fear is an insidious virus. Given a breeding place in our minds it will eat away our spirit and block the forward path of our endeavors
quotes.author: James F. Bell

quotes.quote: Obedience isn’t a lack of fear. It’s just doing it scared.
quotes.author: Jen Hatmaker

quotes.quote: Often, our most rewarding dreams are staring us right in the face, but for some reason, we focus on how hard things are, how we are scared of the unknown, and what would happen if we failed.
quotes.author: Joel Brown

quotes.quote: When we face our fears, we can find our freedom.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyers

quotes.quote: Life is too short to be scared and not take risks. I'd rather be the person that's like, 'I messed up,' than, 'I wish I did that.'
quotes.author: Justine Skye

quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: Facing your fears robs them of their power.
quotes.author: Mark Burnett

quotes.quote: When we experience our fear, when we say the words "I am scared," we have the choice, the ability to acknowledge that being 'scared' is not who we are. It is not our identity.
quotes.author: Paul Michael Glaser

quotes.quote: Sometimes we gotta be brave even when we're scared. We gotta not let being scared keep us from thinkin' straight. That's all brave is, boy, when you come right down to it, not lettin' the fear get you so turned around you start doin' stupid things, instead of what you know you ought to do.
quotes.author: Poppy Z. Brite

quotes.quote: Fearless means trusting your instincts and clarity of thought. Once you have made up your mind, don't be scared of what if.
quotes.author: Ravi Shastri

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, Keep on going, don't slow down, If you're scared, don't show it You might get out Before the devil even knows you're there.
quotes.author: Rodney Atkins

quotes.quote: I'm scared of failure all the time. But not scared enough to stop trying.
quotes.author: Ronda Rousey

quotes.quote: If you're never scared or embarrassed or hurt, it means you never take any chances.
quotes.author: Rosalyn Drexler

quotes.quote: Stop being scared of the unknown, because anything I worried about didn't happen. Other stuff happened. The unknown, we can't do anything about.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.quote: Friends. They aren’t any such thing as good friend or bad friend. Maybe there are just friend. People who stand by you when you're hurt and who helped you feel not so lonely. Maybe there are worth being scared for and hoping for and living for. Maybe worth dying for too. If that what has to be. No bad friends. Only people you want. Need to be with. People who build their houses in your heart.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: My daddy always said being brave wasn’t not being scared. Being brave was keeping going when you were.
quotes.author: Susan Crandall

quotes.quote: I'm tired of being scared, and I know you are too. Not that there isn't alot to be scared of in this world today, between the non-stop headlines about wars and nuclear power plants and terrorists and assasinations and civil unrest and economic uncertainty and political doublespeak and insane weather and an environment that's becoming unhealthier by the day. But a point comes when it's too much to deal with, and thinking about it accomplishes nothing more than sending you to bed with a cold cloth on your head.
quotes.author: Sylvia Browne

quotes.quote: Every time you go up to the board, you get scared. It's more like adrenaline, though you feel pumped and ready to go.
quotes.author: Tom Daley

quotes.quote: The reason many people in our society are miserable, sick, and highly stressed is because of an unhealthy attachment to things they have no control over.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The fact that we are living does not mean we are not sick.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: The most poetical thing in the world is not being sick.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Being sick feels like you're wearing someone else's glasses.
quotes.author: Megan Boyle

quotes.quote: Treat a sick man with the medicine and a sad man with the music.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: I reckon being ill as one of the great pleasures of life, provided one is not too ill and is not obliged to work till one is better.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Physical ills are the taxes laid upon this wretched life; some are taxed higher, and some lower, but all pay something.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Illness is the most heeded of doctors: to goodness and wisdom we only make promises; pain we obey.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Sickness is the vengeance of nature for the violation of her laws.
quotes.author: Charles Simmons

quotes.quote: Diseases crucify the soul of man, attenuate our bodies, dry them, wither them, rivel them up like old apples, make them as so many Anatomies.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: If you be sick, your own thoughts make you sick
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: To be sick is to enjoy monarchical prerogatives.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: The most important thing when ill, is to never lose heart.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: The modern sympathy with invalids is morbid. Illness of any kind is hardly a thing to be encouraged in others.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: For every ailment under the sun, There is a remedy, or there is none, If there be one, try to find it; If there be none, never mind it.
quotes.author: Mother Goose

quotes.quote: There is one consolation in being sick; and that is the possibility that you may recover to a better state than you were ever in before.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I'm sick and tired of being sick and tired.
quotes.author: Fannie Lou Hamer

quotes.quote: Oh, I am very weary, Though tears no longer flow; My eyes are tired of weeping, My heart is sick of woe.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.quote: The very first requirement in a hospital is that it should do the sick no harm.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: Even when I'm sick and depressed, I love life.
quotes.author: Arthur Rubinstein

quotes.quote: A bowl of warmth, a soft face, a new day. Some get-well thoughts sent your way. Feel better soon.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The treatment is really a cooperative of a trinity--the patient, the doctor and the inner doctor.
quotes.author: Ralph Bircher

quotes.quote: If just knowing that someone cares about you helps the healing process...then you should be feeling better already.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Try not to get overwhelmed by the full scope of your recovery instead look at it one day at a time. Right now you just have to get through today, when that seems impossible know that I'm just a phone call away.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Tis healthy to be sick sometimes.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The sick do not ask if the hand that smoothes their pillow is pure, nor the dying care if the lips that touch their brow have known the kiss of sin.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The sick are the greatest danger for the healthy; it is not from the strongest that harm comes to the strong, but from the weakest.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: If you treat a sick child like an adult and a sick adult like a child, everything usually works out pretty well
quotes.author: Ruth Carlisle

quotes.quote: A healthy body is a guest chamber for the soul: a sick body is a prison
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: A sad soul can kill you quicker than a germ
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Sickness comes on horseback but departs on foot
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: Sometimes I get the feeling that aspirin companies are sponsoring my headaches
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: It takes more than just a good looking body. You've got to have the heart and soul to go with it
quotes.author: Epictetus.

quotes.quote: As you rest and heal, know that you are thought of warmly and wished a quick recovery.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Give yourself whatever gifts of time and rest you need to feel better - and know that you're surrounded by caring thoughts and prayers and heartfelt wishes. Rest easy. Get well.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I enjoy convalescence. It is the part that makes the illness worth while.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I wonder why you can always read a doctor's bill and you can never read his prescription.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.quote: The art of medicine consists of amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The art of being sick is not the same as the art of getting well.
quotes.author: Tony Snow

quotes.quote: That's the thing about pain. It demands to be felt.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: The world will change for the better when people decide they are sick and tired of being sick and tired of the way the world is, and decide to change themselves.
quotes.author: Sydney Madwed

quotes.quote: In the beginning, when I first found out I had a disease that was incurable, emotionally I had to get used to the idea of being sick before I could think about making any other major decisions in my life.
quotes.author: Karen Duffy

quotes.quote: A faithful friend is the medicine of life.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Every human being is the author of his own health and disease.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Always laugh when you can...it is a cheap medicine.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Do what is healing to your spirit and without effort you will bring the world healing in return.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Health is not a condition of matter, but of mind.
quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding. Much of your pain is self-chosen. It is the bitter potion by which the physician within you heals your sick self. Therefore trust the physician, and drink his remedy in silence and tranquility.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I’m so mean I make medicine sick!
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: My mother had morning sickness after I was born.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: You can’t have healing without sickness.
quotes.author: T.D. Jakes

quotes.quote: It should be a crime to make a profit off somebody being sick.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.quote: When you die, it does not mean that you lose to cancer, you beat cancer by how you live, why you live and in the manner in which you live.
quotes.author: Stuart Scott

quotes.quote: Old age and sickness bring out the essential characteristics of a man.
quotes.author: Felix Frankfurter

quotes.quote: Some remedies are worse than the disease.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Some days there won’t be a song in your heart. Sing anyway.
quotes.author: Emory Austin

quotes.quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of people, those who are always well and those who are always sick. Most of the evils of the world come from the first sort and most of the achievements from the second.
quotes.author: Louis Dudek

quotes.quote: Prayer is an act of love, words are not needed. Even if sickness distracts from thoughts, all that is needed is the will to love.
quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: Everyone who is born holds dual citizenship, in the kingdom of the well and in the kingdom of the sick. Although we all prefer to use only the good passport, sooner or later each of us is obliged, at least for a spell, to identify ourselves as citizens of that other place.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Health is not valued till sickness comes.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: My heart, which is so full to overflowing, has often been solaced and refreshed by music when sick and weary.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Nurses, one of the few blessings of being ill.
quotes.author: Sara Moss-Wolfe

quotes.quote: In order to change, we must be sick and tired of being sick and tired.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Symptoms, then are in reality nothing but the cry from suffering organs.
quotes.author: Jean-Martin Charcot

quotes.quote: I was feeling as sick as the proverbial donkey.
quotes.author: Mick McCarthy

quotes.quote: There is something in sickness that breaks down the pride of manhood.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: There's nothing the matter with being sick that getting well can't fix.
quotes.author: Peg Bracken

quotes.quote: Only do always in health what you have often promised to do when you are sick.
quotes.author: Sigismund

quotes.quote: Being sick, have in some measure made me well.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A sick man's dreams are often extraordinarily distinct and vivid and extremely life-like.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: All living things were irritable, restless, disturbed; sick without being sick; sad without being sad; annoyed without any apparent cause for annoyance!
quotes.author: John Cowper Powys

quotes.quote: I am not sick, I am not well. My quondam dreams are shot to hell.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Thousands of them sick and crying. 'Cause when it bumps, it's really very sore.
quotes.author: Lascelles Abercrombie

quotes.quote: Forget about cancer that is inside and how sick I really am.Because I am long from done on this earth and am as silly as ever but still say yes sir and no ma'am.
quotes.author: Buffy Sammons

quotes.quote: You missed it when you pay more attention to the damaged car in the mechanic shop than the sick human being in the hospital.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: If you feel sick just be sick.
quotes.author: Chris (Simpsons Artist)

quotes.quote: Yet the best cure for a sick soul is love, but even the most advanced physician cannot prescribe it as medicine.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Mix a little foolishness with your serious plans. It is lovely to be silly at the right moment.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: 'Have fun' is my message. Be silly. You're allowed to be silly. There's nothing wrong with it.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: If people did not sometimes do silly things, nothing intelligent would ever get done.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: Whenever a man does a thoroughly stupid thing, it is always from the noblest motives.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I didn't like the idea of being foolish, but I learned pretty soon that it was essential to fail and be foolish.
quotes.author: Daniel Day-Lewis

quotes.quote: Most of us would be upset if we were accused of being 'silly.' But the word 'silly' comes from the old English word 'selig,' and its literal definition is 'to be blessed, happy, healthy and prosperous.'
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You don't get old being stupid.
quotes.author: Chili Davis

quotes.quote: When you're young, you're stupid. You do silly things.
quotes.author: Ozzy Osbourne

quotes.quote: Until you're ready to look foolish, you'll never have the possibility of being great.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: You will do foolish things, but do them with enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Colette

quotes.quote: People do not wish to appear foolish; to avoid the appearance of foolishness, they are willing to remain actually fools.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: I'm childish and silly. Most people tease me because I'm a bit daft.
quotes.author: Harriet Walter

quotes.quote: I don't get embarrassed easily, and I do silly things all the time!
quotes.author: Emily Osment

quotes.quote: Make yourself look really stupid so you don't feel bad doing something a little stupid.
quotes.author: Mark Hoppus

quotes.quote: When a stupid man is doing something he is ashamed of, he always declares that it is his duty.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Sometimes being silly with a friend is the best therapy.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every time I do something silly, it comes off really funny because it's natural.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quotes.quote: With silly stuff, it's seventy-five percent confidence. I always tell people that it's because I'm nervous about getting that next laugh and I need to hear it. I always want to condense a joke.
quotes.author: Tim Vine

quotes.quote: I like being absurd. Being silly.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to look silly.
quotes.author: Tara Strong

quotes.quote: It's stupid to have a simple-minded view.
quotes.author: Jeremy Paxman

quotes.quote: If a million people say a foolish thing, it is still a foolish thing.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: The best way to convince a fool that he is wrong is to let him have his own way.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Who is more foolish? The fool or the fool that follows it?
quotes.author: Alec Guinness

quotes.quote: Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: How do you know what it's like to be stupid if you've never been smart?
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Ever since I can remember, I've always been silly.
quotes.author: Craig Robinson

quotes.quote: Be silly. Be honest. Be kind.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Read, every day, something no one else is reading. Think, every day, something no one else is thinking. Do, every day, something no one else would be silly enough to do. It is bad for the mind to continually be part of unanimity.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: The word silly derives from the Greek selig meaning blessed. There is something sacred in being able to be silly.
quotes.author: Paul Pearsall

quotes.quote: There's power in looking silly and not caring that you do.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: I do not know whether it ought to be so, but certainly silly things do cease to be silly if they are done by sensible people in an impudent way. Wickedness is always wickedness, but folly is not always folly.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Don’t be silly. Loving is easy. It’s finding someone to love you back that’s hard.
quotes.author: Sabrina Jeffries

quotes.quote: When pain brings you down, don't be silly, don't close your eyes and cry, you just might be in the best position to see the sun shine.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.quote: If silly things were not done, intelligent things would never happen.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: It is always a silly thing to give advice, but to give good advice is absolutely fatal.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Creative people must entertain lots of silly ideas in order to receive the occasional strokes of genius.
quotes.author: Marshall Cook

quotes.quote: You're single not because you are not good enough for one, it's that you're too good for the wrong one.
quotes.author: Chris Burkmenn

quotes.quote: Next time you hit a speed bump otherwise known as the age old question, 'Why are you still single? look 'em in the eye and say: Because I'm too fabulous to settle.'
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: I love being single. I can come and go as I please and stay out as late as I want to.
quotes.author: Eric Dickerson

quotes.quote: Think about it this way: While being married is about becoming the wife you are meant to be, being single allows you to focus on becoming the woman you were born to be.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Being single doesn't make you weak, it means that you are strong enough to be on your own; Being alone could be a good thing, because there is no drama involved in your life, no pain, and free to do what ever you want. Life is too short to be chasing those who aren't even worth fighting for, you are worth more than that.
quotes.author: Xavier Zayas

quotes.quote: The best thing to do when being single, is to create a loving relationship with yourself before deciding to commit yourself with somebody else. When you're ready to find that special someone make sure that they're serious about being in a committed relationship. It takes time, and patience to be with the one you're truly destined to be with forever!
quotes.author: Bryan Burden

quotes.quote: Single is no longer a lack of options ? but a choice. A choice to refuse to let your life be defined by your relationship status but to live every day Happily and let your Ever After work itself out.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Being single doesn't necessarily mean you're available. Sometimes you have to put up a sign that says 'Do Not Disturb' on your heart.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: Being single doesn't mean no one loves you... It just means that God is busy writing your love story.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Being single doesn't mean your weak. It means your strong enough to wait for what you deserve.
quotes.author: Niall Horan

quotes.quote: Happily Single is recognizing that you don't need or want to be rescued from your life by a handsome prince because your life is pretty awesome, as is.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Being single is getting over the illusion that there is somebody out there to complete you and taking charge of your own life.
quotes.author: Omkar Phatakc

quotes.quote: Learning to enjoy being single involves the ability to experience everything through your own essence, instead of living vicariously through a spouse or partner.
quotes.author: Ernie Zelinski

quotes.quote: Being single is about celebrating and appreciating your own space that you're in. I couldn't have lived alone before. I always needed someone to share my space but now I like being by myself. If I want to be with people then I see my friends; if I want a date then I'll have one.
quotes.author: Kelly Rowland

quotes.quote: Being single is only sad if you have a problem with your company. I'm content with mine.
quotes.author: Olga Kurylenko

quotes.quote: I love being single. It's almost like being rich.
quotes.author: Sue Grafton.

quotes.quote: Being single is pretty good. It's a nice sense of irresponsibility.
quotes.author: Michael Douglas

quotes.quote: I like being single, I'm always there when I need me.
quotes.author: Art Leo

quotes.quote: While I still struggle with being single, I haven't always maintained that mountaintop experience. I've learned something about being content with where I am right now. I've realized I can't waste my life by waiting around for someone to come and make it worth living. Life itself is a beautiful thing. I've also learned that one of the wonderful benefits of being single is that I can actually, to my surprise, spend time just enjoying God.
quotes.author: Lori Smith

quotes.quote: Being single was seldom a negative experience for women and definitely not one that was harmful to their physical or mental health.
quotes.author: Carol Anderson and Susan Stewart

quotes.quote: The freedom to make the many small, daily choices, taken together, tenders a much larger gift: a sense of control and mastery. This is the gift of being single women most cherish.
quotes.author: Carol Anderson and Susan Stewart

quotes.quote: I've been single for a while and I have to say,It's going really well. Like...It's working out. I think I'm the one.
quotes.author: Emily Hunter

quotes.quote: The best thing about being single is sleeping around. You can sleep all over that bed of yours. Left, right, middle, wherever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Being single used to mean that nobody wanted you. Now it means you're pretty sexy and you're taking your time deciding how you want your life to be and who you want to spend it with.
quotes.author: Carrie Bradshaw

quotes.quote: I love being single. I can come and go as I please and stay out late as I want to.
quotes.author: Eric Dickerson

quotes.quote: Too many women throw themselves into romance because they're afraid of being single, then start making compromises and losing their identity. I won't do that.
quotes.author: Julie Delpy

quotes.quote: Working long hours being single helps because your time is yours. Once you have a family your time isn't all yours anymore. Most of the Mac team, we were in our mid-20_s, most of us were single, and we were able to essentially devote our lives to it.
quotes.author: Andy Hertzfeld

quotes.quote: I really enjoy being single again. I spent a lot of time in a relationship and the nearer we came to the end, the more difficult it got. You don't see things clearly as long as you're still involved.
quotes.author: Dido Armstrong

quotes.quote: Being single is better than being lied to, cheated on, and disrespected. Being single is far better than being part of broken relationship. Being single is not a status, it is a word that shows that you are strong enough to enjoy your life without depending on others.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I have stepped off the relationship scene to come to terms with myself.I have spent most of my adult life being 'someone's girlfriend',and now I am happy being single.
quotes.author: Penelope Cruz

quotes.quote: And I felt sorry, and I have felt bad about what happened.
quotes.author: Monica Lewinsky

quotes.quote: I don't like it, and I'm sorry I ever had anything to do with it.
quotes.author: Erwin Schrodinger

quotes.quote: Being sorry is the highest act of selfishness, seeing value only after discarding it.
quotes.author: Doug Horton

quotes.quote: I have learned that sometimes "sorry" is not enough. Sometimes you actually have to change.
quotes.author: Claire London

quotes.quote: When a man has been guilty of any vice or folly, I think the best atonement he can make for it is to warn others not to fall into the like.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: True repentance also involves reform.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: Repentance hath a purifying power, and every tear is of a cleansing virtue; but these penitential clouds must be still kept dropping: one shower will not suffice; for repentance is not one single action, but a course.
quotes.author: Bishop Robert South

quotes.quote: Repentance must be something more than mere remorse for sins: it comprehends a change of nature befitting heaven.
quotes.author: Lew Wallace

quotes.quote: To err is human; but contrition felt for the crime distinguishes the virtuous from the wicked.
quotes.author: Vittorio Alfieri

quotes.quote: I was very sorry when I found out that your intentions were good and not what I supposed they were.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It is never too late with us, so long as we are still aware of our faults and bear them impatiently, of long as noble propensities, greedy of conquest, stir within us.
quotes.author: Jacobi

quotes.quote: I don't mind dying if I have to, but I'm damned if I want to pay for the guarantee. I'm sorry.
quotes.author: Michael Landon

quotes.quote: I am immensely contrite. And I'm sorry for the damage I've done.
quotes.author: Jayson Blair

quotes.quote: It's very hard for me to say I'm sorry... but I do.
quotes.author: Joe Nichols

quotes.quote: I took it all for granted, I'm sorry to say.
quotes.author: Dorothy McGuire

quotes.quote: I am sorry for what has happened and I know that I need some help.
quotes.author: Susan Smith

quotes.quote: I want to say to each of you, simply, and directly, I am deeply sorry for my irresponsible and selfish behavior I engaged in.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.quote: The strongest proof of repentance is the endeavor to atone.
quotes.author: Mary Elizabeth Braddon

quotes.quote: What is past is past, there is a future left to all men, who have the virtue to repent and the energy to atone.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: True repentance has a double aspect; it looks upon things past with a weeping eye, and upon the future with a watchful eye.
quotes.author: Bishop Robert South

quotes.quote: Late repentance is seldom true, but true repentance is never too late.
quotes.author: Ralph Venning

quotes.quote: I Am Sorry for the pain I caused you, I feel so bad.
quotes.author: Gabor Timis

quotes.quote: So many things that we never will undo I know you're sorry, I'm sorry too.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: You can always say sorry, But the real apology is when you hear the sadness in their voice and see the look in their eyes. And you realize that they have hurt themselves just as much..
quotes.author: Kid Cudi

quotes.quote: True remorse is never just a regret over consequence; it is a regret over motive.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The ability of a person to atone has always been the most remarkable of human features.
quotes.author: Leon Uris

quotes.quote: Never apologize for showing feeling. When you do so you apologize for truth.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Right actions in the future are the best apologies for bad actions in the past.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: When you realize you've made a mistake, make amends immediately. It's easier to eat crow while it's still warm.
quotes.author: Dan Heist

quotes.quote: Being sorry for myself is a luxury I can't afford.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Slight sorrow for sin is sufficient, provided it at the same time produces amendment.
quotes.author: Colton

quotes.quote: If you would be good, first believe that you are bad.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: More people should apologize, and more people should accept apologies when sincerely made.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.quote: To truly repent of a big thing, you have to go into it with your heart open and force yourself to deal with it at that level and to apologize to God.
quotes.author: Bruce Wilkinson

quotes.quote: To grieve over sin is one thing, to repent is another.
quotes.author: F. W. Robertson

quotes.quote: Let us be quick to repent of injuries while repentance may not be a barren anguish.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: He who seeks repentance for the past, should woo the angel virtue for the future.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Every one goes astray, but the least imprudent are they who repent the soonest.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: I believe that when you're wrong, own it and apologize, and so I do and put it on the equivalent of my front page.
quotes.author: Peter Coyote

quotes.quote: He who is sorry for having sinned is almost innocent.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: We look to our last sickness for repentance, unmindful that it is during a recovery men repent, not during a sickness.
quotes.author: Augustus Hare

quotes.quote: People hardly ever do anything in anger, of which they do not repent.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: Apologies are great, but they don't really change anything. You know what does? Action.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: Sincere apologies are for those that make them, not for those to whom they are made. Sincere apologies are for those that make them, not for those to whom they are made.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.quote: The only correct actions are those that demand no explanation and no apology.
quotes.author: Red Auerbach

quotes.quote: I have made terrible mistakes that have hurt the people that I cared about the most, and I am terribly sorry. I am deeply ashamed of my terrible judgment and my actions.
quotes.author: Anthony Weiner

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of character strength to apologize quickly out of one's heart rather than out of pity. A person must possess himself and have a deep sense of security in fundamental principles and values in order to genuinely apologize.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Anyone who proposes to do good must not expect people to roll stones out of his way, but must accept his lot calmly, even if they roll a few stones upon it.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Proper apologies have three parts: 1) What I did was wrong. 2) I feel badly that I hurt you. 3) How do I make this better?
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: I felt ashamed for what I had done. I don't have any excuses. I did what I did. I take full responsibility for myself and my actions. I wouldn't pawn this off on anybody. I'm sorry it happened. And I hurt people.
quotes.author: Louie Anderson

quotes.quote: All successful people these days seem to be neurotic. Perhaps we should stop being sorry for them and start being sorry for me - for being so confounded normal.
quotes.author: Deborah Kerr

quotes.quote: There's a difference between remorse and repentance. Remorse is being sorry for being caught. Repentance is being sorry enough to stop.
quotes.author: Greg Laurie

quotes.quote: Only insofar as you enjoy being sorry, my dear, which, while it is a considerable amount, occurs only after the fact, thus making it a singularly ineffective deterrent, yes?
quotes.author: Jacqueline Carey

quotes.quote: Repentance is being sorry enough to quit your sin.
quotes.author: Albert Martin

quotes.quote: Don't feel sorry for no one if they dont feel sorry for you
quotes.author: Christian Omar Ortiz

quotes.quote: When you are drowned by your sorry state and you feel as if you are carried away from the road that leads to your desires you should know that you are the one responsible for being led away from the right path.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Not admitting a mistake is a bigger mistake.
quotes.author: Robert Half

quotes.quote: A sincere and warmly-expressed apology can produce the same effects as morphine on a suffering soul.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Mistakes are always forgivable if one has the courage to admit them.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: When you forgive, you free your soul. But when you say I’m sorry, you free two souls.
quotes.author: Donald Hicks

quotes.quote: I have always believed that life is too short for rows and disagreements. Even if I think I'm right, I would prefer to apologize and remain friends rather than win and be an enemy.
quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.quote: Repentance is being sorry for what you've quit doing.
quotes.author: Helen Eisenberg

quotes.quote: Sorry—two little syllables, yet even children have a difficult time saying it.
quotes.author: Martha Bolton

quotes.quote: When admitting you are wrong, you gain back the control others took away from you when making you lose it. That's why you must say sorry. It represents a change of attitude but not really a change of personality. The changes in the personality come later on, when, by controlling yourself better, you don't express anger. Because saying sorry means nothing but anger means a lot.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: Sorry means you feel the pulse of other people's pain as well as your own, and saying it means you take a share of it. And so it binds us together, makes us trodden and sodden as one another. Sorry is a lot of things. It's a hole refilled. A debt repaid. Sorry is the wake of misdeed. It's the crippling ripple of consequence. Sorry is sadness, just as knowing is sadness. Sorry is sometimes self-pity. But Sorry, really, is not about you. It's theirs to take or leave.
quotes.author: Craig Silvey

quotes.quote: Never ruin an apology with an excuse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I was born in very sorry circumstances. My mother was sorry and my father was sorry as well.
quotes.author: Norman Wisdom

quotes.quote: Somebody tries to say, 'I'm sorry, I'm so sorry.' People say that to me. There's no language for it. Sorry doesn't do it. I think you should just hug people and mop their floor or something.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: That reflexive maternal guilt ... emerges at the infant's first wail: "I'm sorry. I'm sorry. ... I'm sorry I can't keep you perfectly full, perfectly dry, perfectly free from gas and fear, perfectly, perfectly happy."
quotes.author: Nancy Mairs

quotes.quote: Go ahead and do it. It is much easier to apologize than it is to get permission.
quotes.author: Grace Hopper

quotes.quote: Several excuses are always less convincing than one.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: To the man-in-the-street, who, I'm sorry to say, / Is a keen observer of life, / The word 'Intellectual' suggests straight away / A man who's untrue to his wife.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: I never saw a wild thing / Sorry for itself. / A small bird will drop frozen dead / From a bough / Without ever having felt sorry for itself.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Being middle class means always having to say you're sorry.
quotes.author: Tony Parsons

quotes.quote: We are never sorry when we do our best. We are only sorry when we do not.
quotes.author: Todd Whitaker

quotes.quote: Most powerful words: "Thanks" and "Sorry."
quotes.author: Jennifer Egan

quotes.quote: Apologizing when you have hurt someone who really matters to you takes nothing away from you. Even if it was unintentional, it's so easy to just apologize and move on. Try not to say "I'm sorry, but ..." and make excuses for yourself. Learn how to make a sincere apology, and you can avoid breaking down the trust in your friendships and relationships.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: I came back from a campfire / Can you smell the fire on me / I found it in my own tears / Got up off my knees / Heard something in my ear / No use in being sorry / Impossibilities / Have no place in me / So I've heard from my place / Of vulnerabilities.
quotes.author: Thatcher Sunday

quotes.quote: Greyer than gloom on a rainy afternoon / Sadder than being sorry for me / Finer than finding my tail again / I'll be here for all of thee / It's comforting to know / It's comforting to know / You only get a few good friends in this life / Who are devoted and true / And right here in this now and near / It's clear that it's all of you.
quotes.author: Carly Simon

quotes.quote: Somebody tries to say, 'I'm sorry, I'm so sorry.' People say that to me. There's no language for it. Sorry doesn't do it. I think you should just hug people and mop their floor or something.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Sometimes you don't realize your own strength until you come face to face with your greatest weakness.
quotes.author: Susan Gale

quotes.quote: The weak fall, but the strong will remain and never go under!
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The most beautiful people I've known are those who have known trials, have known struggles, have known loss, and have found their way out of the depths.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: It's interesting how we often can't see the ways in which we are being strong - like, you can't be aware of what you're doing that's tough and brave at the time that you're doing it because if you knew that it was brave, then you'd be scared.
quotes.author: Lena Dunham

quotes.quote: Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: You cannot dream yourself into a character; you must hammer and forge yourself one.
quotes.author: James A. Froude

quotes.quote: I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragements, and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men.
quotes.author: John F Kennedy

quotes.quote: A heart is a strong muscle and what do muscles do when they are torn? They grow back STRONGER!
quotes.author: Ivan Avendano

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag - only in hot water do you realize how strong she is.
quotes.author: Nancy Reagan

quotes.quote: If God sends us on strong paths, we are provided strong shoes.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Never give in.. never, never, never, never, in nothing great or small, large or petty, never give in except to convictions of honor and good sense. Never yield to force.. never yield to the apparently overwhelming might of the enemy.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Through persistence, self-knowledge, prayer, commitment, optimism, a resolute trust in God and the building of your own personal moral strength, you can enjoy the blessings of a deeper faith and face the difficulties of life with courage and confidence.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go trough hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: The worst part about being strong is that no one ever asks if you're ok.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: It is worth remembering that the time of greatest gain in terms of wisdom and inner strength is often that of greatest difficulty.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: A strong women is someone who is able to smile this morning like she wasn't crying last night.
quotes.author: Harriet Morgan

quotes.quote: Sometimes, being strong is to forgive in the name of love, to make someone smile when our own heart is broken, to comfort a friend when we ourselves needed help and to keep faith when we have lost hope.
quotes.author: Brigitte Nicole

quotes.quote: Pain makes you stronger. Tears make you braver. Heartbreak makes you wiser. And vodka makes you not remember any of that crap.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: If you build the guts to do something, anything, then you better save enough to face the consequences.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: I am thankful for all of those who said NO to me. Its because of them I'm doing it myself.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Not everyday is a good day. You may feel like hell and some you may feel like nothing could be worse. Keep your head up, because someday you will have your day. It could be tomorrow or the next day but that day will come, and it will be the best day of your life, just you wait.
quotes.author: Ash Sweeney

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Things happen to you to make you realize your true potential, strength, will power, and heart. You've got to have faith.
quotes.author: Dr. Byron Hayes

quotes.quote: Strong women wear their pain like stilettos. No matter how much it hurts, all you see is the beauty of it.
quotes.author: Harriet Morgan

quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that ew must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Just as a broken arm needs a cast, we too need support mechanisms in order to make it through difficult times.
quotes.author: Holly Wagner

quotes.quote: I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.
quotes.author: Rita Mero

quotes.quote: You can't really be strong until you see a funny side to things.
quotes.author: Ken Kesey

quotes.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, vision cleared, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: You can always take the easy way out and give up, but real strength comes when you decide to keep pushing forward no matter what the circumstances are.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world right in the eye.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Being strong can be also feminine. I don't think feminine equals being weak. Being strong is very sexy.
quotes.author: Sanaa Lathan

quotes.quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: No matter how hard the past, you can always begin again.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Promise yourself to be so strong that nothing can disturb your peace of mind.
quotes.author: Christian Larson

quotes.quote: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: Christopher Robin

quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Smiling does not necessarily mean you're happy. Sometimes it just means you're strong.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Get connected to your reality, your real life, instead of your emotionally soaked narrative about your life
quotes.author: Gary John Bishop

quotes.quote: Life can be so difficult at times, but fighting through the pain is so worth it. It’s better to feel every kind of emotion than to not feel at all.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: Expose yourself to your deepest fear. After that, fear has no power.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Don't wait for extraordinary opportunities. Seize common occasions and make them great. Weak men wait for opportunities. Strong men make them.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: The weak are always anxious for justice and equality. The strong pay no heed to either.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: People cry, not because they're weak. It's because they've been strong for too long.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a well built porch. If one of the two posts leans too much, the porch collapses. So each must be strong enough to stand on its own.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't expect to build up the weak by pulling down the strong.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: The world is the great gymnasium where we come to make ourselves strong.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Anyone can hide. Facing up to things, working through them, that's what makes you strong.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Strength is a matter of the made up mind.
quotes.author: John Beecher

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Men are strong so long as they represent a strong idea they become powerless when they oppose it.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: A strong, positive self image is the best possible preparation for success.
quotes.author: Dr. Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: You must have an iron will, if you would cross the ocean. You must be strong enough to pierce mountains.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Ask for help. Not because you are weak. But because you want to remain strong.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Being taken for granted is an unpleasant but sincere form of praise. Ironically, the more reliable you are, and the less you complain, the more likely you are to be taken for granted.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.quote: Being taken for granted can be a compliment. It means that you've become a comfortable, trusted element in another person's life.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: All your youth you want to have your greatness taken for granted; when you find it taken for granted, you are unnerved.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: If they don't appreciate your presence, perhaps you should try giving them your absence.
quotes.author: Tinku Razoria

quotes.quote: He who undervalues himself is justly undervalued by others.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: When you're always there for people they stop appreciating you because your favors are now an expectation.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Hanging with people who make you feel unappreciated, for the mere sake of appearing to be popular, is the loneliest place to be.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: If they don't respect, appreciate and value you, then they don't deserve you.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: You don't need to waste your time on someone who only wants you around when it fits their needs.
quotes.author: Rajat Dogra

quotes.quote: Staying with someone who doesn't appreciate you isn't loyalty, its stupidity.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is absolutely nothing that can be taken for granted in this world.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: Being unwanted, unloved, uncared for, forgotten by everybody, I think that is a much greater hunger, a much greater poverty than the person who has nothing to eat.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: If you would be unloved and forgotten, be reasonable.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Nobody is forgotten, when it is convenient to remember him.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: If we don't feel appreciated, we don't feel loved.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: It is sad when you realize you are not as important to someone as they are to you!
quotes.author: Nikhil Andy

quotes.quote: I don't like being taken for granted anywhere in life. I don't want my vote taken for granted.
quotes.author: Rob Lowe

quotes.quote: Even the most caring people can get tired of being taken for granted.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Being dumped, cheated on and taken for granted is why many people choose to be single.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's simple. Women only nag when they feel unappreciated.
quotes.author: Louis de Bernieres

quotes.quote: I see myself as a flashlight in the dark. I'm not trying to be overlooked anymore.
quotes.author: Lloyd Banks

quotes.quote: I was overlooked long before anyone knew who I was.
quotes.author: Paul Desmond

quotes.quote: I'm the last guy in the world to feel overlooked by the Academy.
quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

quotes.quote: There's a world out there that nobody has bothered to promise her.
quotes.author: Lauren DeStefano

quotes.quote: To be forgotten, is to die a little.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: There's a lot of days where you feel forgotten.
quotes.author: Billy Corgan

quotes.quote: My biggest fear in life is to be forgotten.
quotes.author: Evita Peron

quotes.quote: I believe that it's better to be looked over than it is to be overlooked.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Yet food is something that is taken for granted by most world leaders despite the fact that more than half of the population of the world is hungry.
quotes.author: Norman Borlaug

quotes.quote: Remember, this is now, and now, and now. Live it, feel it, cling to it. I want to become acutely aware of all I've taken for granted.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Why does a man take it for granted that a girl who flirts with him, wants him to kiss her-when, nine times out of ten, she only wants him to kiss her?
quotes.author: Gabrielle Moore

quotes.quote: Recognize that every minute together is a gift, so treasure it.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: Don't prioritize your hobby, your career, or your possessions over your marriage and family.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: Fight for each other, but never fight against each other.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: In every disagreement, remember that your relationship is much more important than whatever you're arguing about.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: Many marriage start out strong and then slowly fade until there's nothing left, but it isn't supposed to be that way.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: If I would have taken my life for granted, letting the wrong people in before screening them, things would not have happen.
quotes.author: Minnie M. Lyons

quotes.quote: Love is a good thing not to be taken for granted, there are feelings involved with you and the other person.
quotes.author: Minnie M. Lyons

quotes.quote: When you meet someone you may like the way they look or like the way they act, the way they talk and so on.
quotes.author: Minnie M. Lyons

quotes.quote: As you grow with that person in your life it get stronger and stronger by the day finally you find yourself in love with them.
quotes.author: Minnie M. Lyons
