quotes.quote: Some do not choose to take it to the next level and that's fine, just love that person from the outside.
quotes.author: Minnie M. Lyons

quotes.quote: The first honest relationship you will have is with your children.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: If I wanted to feel used and unappreciated I would just start a family.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: If only relationships awarded metals to their long-tern survivors, you might have some value to staying in them.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: Tell someone close to you how much you need them. Tell them why you need them.
quotes.author: Bob Weinstein

quotes.quote: Fight for each other, but never fight against each other.
quotes.author: Bob Weinstein

quotes.quote: Take nothing and no one for granted.
quotes.author: Bob Weinstein

quotes.quote: A fulfilling long-term relationship is not accomplished by just finding the one. It is rather a co-operation between two passionate and highly motivated partners working together, figuring out every single situation holding hands.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: If there is trust at the root of the relationship, if the partners make an effort to keep it interesting, if difficulties are handled tactfullly and if you can appreciate every single deed of your partner no matter how insignificant it is, the flames of love would never burn out and your love can truly 'live happily ever after'.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: At the beginning both the individuals pose to be anything but themselves.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: It's not always the easiest relationship to navigate, but it's one of the most important ones.
quotes.author: Gianno Caldwell

quotes.quote: The relationship that shapes a boy into a man and prepares him for all other emotional connections.
quotes.author: Gianno Caldwell

quotes.quote: She used to love his kisses, but not anymore. She had lost him, somewhere along the way, and this man was a stranger-a stranger who took her for granted.
quotes.author: Caroline Anderson

quotes.quote: There are so many little things that we take for granted. Some have profound effect on our lives and other are a convenience, but in both cases we never give them a second thought, we just assume they will always be there for us.
quotes.author: Peter Delbridge

quotes.quote: Everyday we take for granted that we will see our loved ones and friends whenever we want, and never think of a time without them.
quotes.author: Peter Delbridge

quotes.quote: I'm sick of being taken for granted
quotes.author: Constance M. Burge

quotes.quote: Women are often overlooked, taken for granted. They can slip easily through a man's defense
quotes.author: Stan Lee

quotes.quote: As I was saying, I'm a woman and can't be taken for granted.
quotes.author: Bob Kane

quotes.quote: You know why all this happened, don't you? Because I took my marriage for granted. You know in twelve years, I never once helped out with the housework
quotes.author: James L. Brooks

quotes.quote: I saw how unappreciated you were. I know how that feels.
quotes.author: Rich Fogel

quotes.quote: I have been out with some of those guys. The short, fat, poor ones. It makes absolutely no difference. They are just as self-centered and unappreciative as the good-looking ones.
quotes.author: Darren Star

quotes.quote: Calling anything foolproof seems to take a lot for granted.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The honeymoon is over when the bride who took her husband for better or for worse, starts taking him for granted.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: In all affairs it's a healthy thing not and then to hang a question mark on the things you have long taken for granted.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Most people don't realize how futile a situation is/was until their out of it.
quotes.author: P.W. Imel

quotes.quote: If you start out a relationship based on lie, you'll have to keep lying just to keep the relationship alive.
quotes.author: P.W. Imel

quotes.quote: The light of love should never be put out or allowed to die in the hear of the one you love.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: It is also important to realize that you're not in a relationship to clean up what's wrong with your spouse.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: I have seen so many married couples who lose their zest, vim and vitality in their relationship right after the honey-moon.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Be thankful for problems. If they were less difficult, someone with less ability might have your job.
quotes.author: Jim Lovell

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes open to your mercies. The man who forgets to be thankful has fallen asleep in life.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Whatever happens in your life, no matter how troubling things might seem, do not enter the neighborhood of despair. Even when all doors remain closed, God will open up a new path only for you. Be thankful!
quotes.author: Elif Shafak

quotes.quote: Thankfulness creates gratitude which generates contentment that causes peace.
quotes.author: Todd Stocker

quotes.quote: I may not be where I want to be but I'm thankful for not being where I used to be.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: Some people are always grumbling because roses have thorns; I am thankful that thorns have roses.
quotes.author: Alphonse Karr

quotes.quote: Make it a habit to tell people thank you. To express your appreciation, sincerely and without the expectation of anything in return. Truly appreciate those around you, and you'll soon find many others around you. Truly appreciate life, and you'll find that you have more of it.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.
quotes.author: Tecumseh

quotes.quote: I'm blessed and I thank God for every day for everything that happens for me.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: We must learn to appreciate life. Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
quotes.author: London Mond

quotes.quote: Be thankful for what you have today. Work hard for what you have tomorrow.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect towards others.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: It is necessary, then, to cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: I'm thankful for a pair of shoes that feel really good on my feet; I like my shoes. I'm thankful for the birds; I feel like they're singing just for me when I get up in the morning... Saying, 'Good morning, John. You made it, John.' I'm thankful for the sea breeze that feels so good right now, and the scent of jasmine when the sun starts going down. I'm thankful...
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Gratitude can transform common days into thanksgivings, turn routine jobs into joy, and change ordinary opportunities into blessings.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought; and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: If you want to turn your life around, try thankfulness. It will change your life mightily.
quotes.author: Gerald Good

quotes.quote: Saying thank you is more than good manners. It is good spirituality.
quotes.author: Alfred Painter

quotes.quote: When eating bamboo sprouts, remember the man who planted them.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Every time we remember to say "thank you", we experience nothing less than heaven on earth.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: Just a "thank you" is a mighty powerful prayer. Says it all.
quotes.author: Rosie Cash

quotes.quote: Let us rise up and be thankful, for if we didn't learn a lot today, at least we learned a little, and if we didn't learn a little, at least we didn't get sick, and if we got sick, at least we didn't die; so, let us all be thankful.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: A noble person is mindful and thankful for the favors he receives from others.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The only people with whom you should try to get even are those who have helped you.
quotes.author: John E. Southard

quotes.quote: Thankfulness is the beginning of gratitude. Gratitude is the completion of thankfulness. Thankfulness may consist merely of words. Gratitude is shown in acts.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: If a fellow isn't thankful for what he's got, he isn't likely to be thankful for what he's going to get.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: The worst moment for the atheist is when he is really thankful and has nobody to thank.
quotes.author: Dante Rosetti

quotes.quote: He enjoys much who is thankful for little.
quotes.author: Thomas Secker

quotes.quote: There is nothing quite like the feeling of fellowship that we, as human beings experience when we come together for the purpose of being thankful for our lives and the many wonderful blessings we share.
quotes.author: David Mezapellle

quotes.quote: The older I get the more I realize the importance and the power of gratitude. It can help us rise above a situation and be thankful for what we do have instead of focusing on what we don't.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: Being thankful changes our energy from demanding to appreciation. Instead of increasing our expectations of how things should be, we can move toward recognizing what is.
quotes.author: Dorothea Hover-Kramer

quotes.quote: Those who make us happy are always thankful to us for being so; their gratitude is the reward of their benefits.
quotes.author: Madame Swetchine

quotes.quote: He who acknowledges a kindness has it still, and he who has a grateful sense of it has requited it.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: To the generous mind, the heaviest debt is that of gratitude, when it is not in our power to repay it.
quotes.author: Franklin

quotes.quote: When I find a great deal of gratitude in a poor man, I take it for granted there would be as much generosity if he were rich.
quotes.author: Pope

quotes.quote: O Lord, who lends me life, lend me a heart replete with thankfulness.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: There is as much greatness of mind in acknowledging a good turn, as in doing it.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Gratitude is a virtue most defied and yet most deserted; it is the ornament of rhetoric and the libel of practical life.
quotes.author: J.W. Forney

quotes.quote: God is pleased with no music below so much as with the thanksgiving songs of relieved widows and supported orphans; of rejoicing, comforted, and thankful persons.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: He who receives a benefit should never forget it; he who bestows should never remember it.
quotes.author: Charron

quotes.quote: Our thanks should be as ferment for mercies received, as our petitions for mercies sought.
quotes.author: C. Simmons

quotes.quote: A grateful thought toward heaven is of itself a prayer.
quotes.author: Lessing

quotes.quote: Gratitude is not only the memory but the homage of the heart—rendered to God for his goodness.
quotes.author: N.P. Willis

quotes.quote: I realized that being grateful was truly a way to live. It was also giving me a doorway into being able to truly open my heart to the world and make the difference I had always thought possible.
quotes.author: Dawn Sprong

quotes.quote: So much has been given to me; I have no time to ponder over that which has been denied.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Be grateful. Sounds obvious but we bring more gratitude into our lives by being grateful. Wherever gratitude goes, gratitude grows.
quotes.author: Nina Lesowitz, Mary Beth Sammons

quotes.quote: Sometimes our light goes out but is blown again into instant flame by an encounter with another human being. Each of us owes the deepest thanks to those who have rekindled this inner light.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: A thankful heart is not only the greatest virtue but the parent of all virtues.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive—to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Once I was invited to a dinner. The hostess asked me to say grace. I said, 'I will say grace to you, madam. MY grace and thanks are to you.'
quotes.author: Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Be glad of life because it gives you the chance to love, and to work, and to play and to look up at the stars.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: If you can't have what you want, be grateful for what you have. Keep thinking constantly of all the big things you have to be thankful for instead of complaining about the little things that annoy you.
quotes.author: Carnegie

quotes.quote: There is no closer bond than the one that gratefulness celebrates, the bond between giver and thanksgiver. Everything is a gift. Grateful Living is a celebration of the universal give-and-take of life, a limitless yes to belonging.
quotes.author: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.quote: A grateful attitude is a creative one, because, in the final analysis, opportunity is the gift within the gift of every moment—the opportunity to see and hear and smell and touch and taste with pleasure.
quotes.author: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.quote: Celebration is gratefulness for whatsoever life gives to you. Whatsoever existence gives to you, celebration is gratitude; it is gratefulness.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Just being there for someone can sometimes bring hope when all seems hopeless.
quotes.author: Dave G. Llewelyn

quotes.quote: I may not be the kind of person you want me to, but I will always be there for you.
quotes.author: Alfusainey jallow

quotes.quote: If someone needs you don't let them down. Because when you need someone and there is no one to be found you will know how they felt.
quotes.author: Isabella Poretsis

quotes.quote: If you love someone, the greatest gift you can give them is your presence.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Thank you...for gracing my life with your lovely presence, for adding sweet measure of your soul to my existence.
quotes.author: Richard Matheson

quotes.quote: Never confuse people who are always around you, with people who are always there for you.
quotes.author: Gee Linder

quotes.quote: Presence is more than just being there.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: It's very hard to balance being there for somebody else and taking care of yourself.
quotes.author: Jennifer Grey

quotes.quote: Just 'cause you can't see me don't mean I've gone away.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Always be there for the person who is always there for you
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Being present here and now is the highest compliment you can pay to a woman in your life.
quotes.author: Lada Ray

quotes.quote: Sometimes, the girl who's always there for everyone else needs someone there for her.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: We are not put on earth for ourselves, but are placed here for each other. If you are there always for others, then in time of need, someone will be there for you.
quotes.author: Jeff Warner

quotes.quote: Sometimes, the person who's always been there for everyone else needs someone to be there for them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's not your fault for not being there. It's my fault for thinking you would be.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Theres nothing more vital to the bond you share with someone than simply being there for them.
quotes.author: Suman Rai

quotes.quote: Just remember that when nobody was there for you, I was. And when nobody else gave a damn, I did.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: When I'm sad, you'll be there. When I'm hurt, you will care. When I need a friend, by my side. I'll look for you, who will not hide.
quotes.author: Sarah Griffin

quotes.quote: I won't promise to be always here for you, but I assure you that Christ will always be here for you. But I'll always be holding your hand in mine.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: Just because I'm always there for you all the time, doesn't mean you can take me for granted.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: With fame, you can't trust everybody. You can't depend on them being there for you as a person. They will only be there because of what you've got you as a person. They will only be there because of what you've got and what you can bring to their life. It's not a relationship-it's a leech.
quotes.author: Chris Brown

quotes.quote: Being there at the moment is everything.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The fact of just being there was phenomenal.
quotes.author: Ethan Russell

quotes.quote: You don't build a bond without being present.
quotes.author: James Earl Jones

quotes.quote: Being present is being connected to All Things. present.
quotes.author: S. Kelley Harrell

quotes.quote: Your children need your presence more than your presents.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: I may not always be there with you, but I will always be there for you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Think of me and I'll be there.
quotes.author: Richard Reeves

quotes.quote: Whenever you need me, whenever you want me, you know you call me. I'll be there shortly.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: If you fall, I'll be there. - the Floor
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If we live life from center of our being there will be no fear.
quotes.author: P.V.S. SURYANARAYANA RAJU

quotes.quote: Whatever keeps me in your arms. And I'm thanking you for being there for me.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.quote: Lucky me, just being there when I get to hold you.It's your world, and I'm just passing through.
quotes.author: Jason Aldean

quotes.quote:
Where would I be today without you being there for me all my life
What would I do today without you taking care of me all the time.
quotes.author: Ayọ

quotes.quote: Being there with you, I feel at ease. Being there with you is all I ever need.
quotes.author: Epica

quotes.quote: I know it's been hard, me not being there. I don't want you thinking that I really don't care.
quotes.author: Lionel Richie

quotes.quote: Thank you for being there for me. Thank you for listening, goodbye. I can forfeit selfishness. I hope for you that you apply this happiness.
quotes.author: R.E.M.

quotes.quote: Always there with a hand to lend with a firm look always there to defend. Always there to wipe our tears. Always there to be our peers
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: Always there for all types of advice.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: To have a love be with you and share your experiences and to understand you and love you with every fiber of your being there is no greater love.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: For a real friend I will always be there for them no matter where or when they need me.
quotes.author: Martin Jeszke

quotes.quote: Being there for a special friend when they most need you shows the mark of a true friend that really cares.
quotes.author: Martin Jeszke

quotes.quote: Be there for friends and family regardless, when it matters most, because you never know when you might need them to be there for you.
quotes.author: Martin Jeszke

quotes.quote: Shalom so let's start giving cause that's what we're being there is a chance we're taking our own lives.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: much love So rare to dare Afraid of ever being there take me home I need repair take me please To anywhere
quotes.author: Red Hot Chili Peppers

quotes.quote: I am sick of the disparity between things as they are and as they should be. I'm tired. I'm tired of the truth and I'm tired of lying about the truth.
quotes.author: Edward Franklin Albee

quotes.quote: When we are tired, we are attacked by ideas we conquered long ago.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A man grows most tired while standing still.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: Even when you have every right to be tired of everything, Never be tired of living.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: Once you become poor, tired and time-constrained, you become a much better human being.
quotes.author: Caitlin Moran

quotes.quote: Don't stop when you are tired. Stop when you are done!!
quotes.author: Brayden Brad

quotes.quote: I'm not tired of challenges. I'm tired of people challenging me for nothing.
quotes.author: Ces Peta

quotes.quote: Never be tired of a dream, if not fulfilled. Fear of failure should not deter you from your path of self belief. Your belief and determination will get you to your destination and make the dream come true.
quotes.author: Anil Sinha

quotes.quote: If one could run without getting tired I don't think one would often want to do anything else
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: If we want to get over being tired and weary, we have to learn how to go to God on a regular basis. The minute we feel like we cant take it anymore, we have to go spend a little time with him, read his word and talk to him in your prayers, he hears every words you tell him, just leave all your burden with him as soon as you tell him your troubles, feel the ease up on your shoulders, because he took your load of them, the pain in your heart ease up because he comforted you. What a friend we have in our Lord !!
quotes.author: Glen Rambharack

quotes.quote: Retired is being tired twice, I've thought, first tired of working, then tired of not.
quotes.author: Richard Armour

quotes.quote: Whenever I get fed up with life I love to go wandering in nature.
quotes.author: Andrea Arnold

quotes.quote: Sometimes the only way you can feel good about yourself is by making someone else look bad. And I'm tired of making other people feel good about themselves.
quotes.author: Dan Castellaneta

quotes.quote: Life is one long process of getting tired.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: I just got tired of being sick and tired and feeling down. Unfortunately, you don't realize this until you're getting sober but the reason why you're depressed all the time is it's the drugs that are depressing you.
quotes.author: Steven Adler

quotes.quote: We can be tired, weary and emotionally distraught, but after spending time alone with God, we find that He injects into our bodies energy, power and strength.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: You never get tired unless you stop and take time for it.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: I am tired of being tired and talking about how tired I am.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: The tired spirit is a hungry spirit.
quotes.author: Faith Puleston

quotes.quote: When a man is tired of London, he is tired of life; for there is in London all that life can afford.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: You get very tired, and there was a certain amount of pain and you slow up. Your legs are so tired that you are in fact slowing. If you don't keep running, keep your blood circulating, the muscles stop pumping the blood back and you get dizzy.
quotes.author: Roger Bannister

quotes.quote: So you're tired of living / Feel like you might give in / Well don't. It's not your time
quotes.author: Tomas Kalnoky

quotes.quote: When you've exhausted all possibilities, remember this you haven't.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: I start to feel like I can't maintain the facade any longer, that I may just start to show through. And I wish I knew what was wrong. Maybe something about how stupid my whole life is. I don't know. Why does the rest of the world put up with the hypocrisy, the need to put a happy face on sorrow, the need to keep on keeping on?... I don't know the answer, I know only that I can't. I don't want any more vicissitudes, I don't want any more of this try, try again stuff. I just want out. I've had it. I am so tired. I am twenty and I am already exhausted.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.quote: Money and Corruption Are ruining the land Crooked politicians Betray the working man, Pocketing the profits And treating us like sheep, And we're tired of hearing promises That we know they'll never keep
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.quote: My flame has gone out / My fuel has been spent / I forgot how to love / I can't pay the rent.
quotes.author: Hugh McLeod

quotes.quote: Well being tired is a lot better than being dead, man.
quotes.author: Larry Ferguson

quotes.quote: Tired of all this mad frustration / Tired of all the aggravation / Sick and tired of devastation / Give it some consideration
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.quote: I am tired of looking on what is, / One night as well see beauty never more, / As look upon it with an empty eye. / I would this world over. I am tired
quotes.author: Bailey's Festus

quotes.quote: My hear is very tired -- my strength is low --/ My hands are full of blossoms pluek'd before, / Held dead with in them 'till myself shall die.
quotes.author: Miss Barrett

quotes.quote: Full many a storm on this gray head has beat; / And now, on my high station do I stand, / Like the tired watchman in his rocked tower, / Who looked for the hour of his release. / I'm sick of worldly broils, and fain would rest / With those who war no more.
quotes.author: Joanna Baillie's Ethwald

quotes.quote: To an athlete, fatigue may mean poor recovery or lack of competitive drive.
quotes.author: Michael A. Schmidt

quotes.quote: Fatigue has many faces and many causes. Fatigue and tiredness mean different things to different people.
quotes.author: Michael A. Schmidt

quotes.quote: Fatigue is a pervasive influence in human life, experienced by everyone on a regular bases.
quotes.author: Bob Hockey

quotes.quote: Tiredness is just something that is appearing; it's not who you are.
quotes.author: Nirmala

quotes.quote: Right now I'm tired of everything / Tired of all this player hating that's going on in my own city
quotes.author: Jeff Bass

quotes.quote: I'm tired of using plastic silverware / Tired of working in Building Square / Tired of not being a millionaire / But if I had a million dollars / I'd buy a damn brewery, and turn the planet into alcoholics
quotes.author: Jeff Bass

quotes.quote: There's a whole in my heart / My soul is bleeding / I need to free my mind / And see what I'm feeling / 'Cause Lord knows, Lord knows, / I'm / (I'm tired) / Tired of the way he treats me
quotes.author: Anthony S Crawford

quotes.quote: I laid down last night, too tired to wake. / I had a chill this morning, too tired to shake. / I got a good poker hand, too tired to win. / I can hear my baby knocking, too tired to let her in.
quotes.author: Johnny Guitar Watson

quotes.quote:
I don't know what to do / Don't know what to do, I don't know what to do
I'm tired of weeping, tired of moaning / Tired of groaning for you
quotes.author: Nehemiah Curtis "Skip" James

quotes.quote: I'm getting tired of feeling run down now / Anxiety's high as buildings downtown / I want to hide until the sun goes down / Turning the tide / I hope I don't drown
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.quote: Anxiety is the partner of depression. It accompanies half the cases of depression. Sometimes it triggers depression.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: Anxiety and depression are an interesting mix. In many ways they are opposite experiences, and yet mix them together and you don't get a happy medium.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: You can be a depressive and be happy, just as you can be a sober alcoholic. It doesn't have always have an obvious case.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: One in five people gets depression at some point in their life. Though obviously more than that will suffer from mental illness.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: Twice as many women as men will suffer a serious bout of depression in their lives.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: The symptoms of clinical depression include excessive crying or sadness, extreme mood swings, erratic behavior, loss of interest in friends, loved ones, or any type of pleasure, loss of appetite, weight gain or loss, anger, irritability, fatigue.
quotes.author: Pat Love

quotes.quote: If you have a sad expression, it is much more likely you will make others feel this too. If you smile happily, you may have this effect on those around you as well.
quotes.author: I. C. Robledo

quotes.quote: A person who displays a negative character generates a negative atmosphere.
quotes.author: Jean Watson

quotes.quote: Purpose is the ultimate fuel for our journey through life. When we drive with purpose we don't get tired or bored and our engines don't burn out.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: No matter how tired you feel, no matter how much you want to quit, no matter what obstacles is in your way, keep moving toward the vision you have for your future.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Knocked down but not beaten. Tired but not giving up. I saw the sun peek through the clouds. Sometimes all we need is a glimmer of hope.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: While fear and worry can weaken or harden you, love transforms you and the people and situations around you.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: You don't have to wait to feel positive enough for a smile to happen. You can generate a positive feeling by smiling. Your smile can be the source of your positivity, not the result of it. Smile more today.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Tired, tired with nothing, tired with everything, tired with the world's weight he had never chosen to bear.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: We must also look into our feelings of grief and loss. When we accept that everything is constantly changing, when we accept the inevitability that people and animals die, we can deal with pain in a much better fashion.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: Embrace your grief and your sadness felt towards those that have passed and remember them with love.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: Replace your grief with love and appreciation. That is truly what any who have departed from our lives would wish for us.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: I’m tired of forgiving, / —your constant complaining / But I’m most tired of wishing, / —when the hope turns to pain
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: I'm tired, I'm tired of life, brother! / Of all that meets my eye; / And my weary spirit fain would pass / To worlds beyond the sky.
quotes.author: Frances Ellen Watkins Harper

quotes.quote: Sometimes I am too tired / To think of you. / Today was such a day, / But then I knew / Today, for certain, you'd be weary too / You there in hospital / With health to seek— / And me at my machine / Too tired to speak— / We're very funny lovers of a week.
quotes.author: Lesbia Harford

quotes.quote: And with a leaden sigh thou wilt invite / To rest thy tired hands and aching feet. / The wretched day was theirs, the night is mine; / Come tender sleep, and fold me to thy breast.
quotes.author: Claude Mckay

quotes.quote: O! yes after a tired day in the office; slaving more than 12 hours under my pretentious boss's nose; the world outside seemed as if it was recreated again; and things which seemed like wholesomely dead in office hours; now struck me as if they were bouncing and alive; as if they had been just born.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Tired of always being last / Tired of defending / Tired of pretending / That it's okay. for you to be exactly who you are / You'd need to quit / Accepting my justification of you lies
quotes.author: Pamela P. Mercer

quotes.quote: You've done enough. It's okay to be tired. You can take a break.
quotes.author: Shauna Niequist

quotes.quote: Jesus' response to tired people is rest.
quotes.author: Jeff VanVonderen

quotes.quote: Trusting your individual uniqueness challenges you to lay yourself open.
quotes.author: James Broughton

quotes.quote: I believe a unique core self is born into every human being; the result of millennia of environment and heredity combined in an unpredictable way that could never happen before or again.
quotes.author: Gloria Stienem

quotes.quote: You are obligated to understand that you are unique in the world. There has never been anyone like you because, of there were, there would be no need for you to exist. You are an utterly new thing in creation. Your life goal is to realize this uniqueness.
quotes.author: Aaron Perlow

quotes.quote: At bottom every man knows well enough that he is a unique being, only once on this earth; and by no extraordinary chance will such a marvelously picturesque piece of diversity in unity as he is, ever be put together a second time.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: We are all, each and every one, unique in the Universe. And that uniqueness is what makes us valuable.
quotes.author: James A. Owen

quotes.quote: From the very beginning you are being told to compare yourself with others. This is the greatest disease; it is like a cancer that goes on destroying your very soul because each individual is unique, and comparison is not possible.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Embrace your uniqueness. Time is much too short to be living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Kobi Yamada

quotes.quote: A human being is a single being. Unique and unrepeatable.
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: Each of us is a unique strand in the intricate web of life and here to make a contribution.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: You are you.You are unique individualYou have unique purpose.You have unique fulfillment.You have unique mission in life.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: As we grow as unique persons, we learn to respectthe uniqueness of others.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Your unique way of doing things is what makes you so special so don't always feel the need to do things the way others want you to do them.
quotes.author: Mufti Ismail Menk

quotes.quote: I personally like being unique. I like being my own person with my own style and my own opinions and my own toothbrush.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: You are unique, and if that is not fulfilled, then something has been lost.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: Insist on yourself; never imitate... Every great man is unique.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Everyone is unique. Compare not yourself with anyone else lest you spoil God's curriculum.
quotes.author: Baal Shem Tov

quotes.quote: Every man and woman is born into the world to do something unique and something distinctive and if he or she does not do it, it will never be done.
quotes.author: Benjamin E. Mays

quotes.quote: Being unique is never easy, and often, by the time culture catches up with you, there are only a few people who notice.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Being unique is a lifelong process. It's difficult to be fresh and new all the time but it's the only way to be.
quotes.author: Edwin Mamerto

quotes.quote: The goal is to become the unique, awesome, never to be repeated human being that we were called to be.
quotes.author: Patricia E. Deegan

quotes.quote: I suspect the secret of personal attraction is locked up in our unique imperfections, flaws and frailties.
quotes.author: Hugh Mackay

quotes.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Being the best is great, you're the number one. Being unique is greater, you're the only one.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We're all unique, just never in the ways we imagine.
quotes.author: Kate Morton

quotes.quote: Every human being has his/her unique potential that is irreplaceable.
quotes.author: Aniekee Tochukwu

quotes.quote: Every snowflake is unique, yet they are each perfect.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.quote: Uniqueness is what makes you the most beautiful.
quotes.author: Lea Michele

quotes.quote: Unique and different is the next generation of beautiful.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: For being different, it's easy. But to be unique, it's a complicated thing.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Being unique is better than being perfect.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: I am a unique expression of the universal fabric of creation.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Nobody can be exactly like me. Sometimes even I have trouble doing it.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of being unique. It's like being afraid of your best self.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: There is only one you in all time.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: Who wants to be normal when you can be unique?
quotes.author: Helena Bonham Carter

quotes.quote: What it takes to be unique, is just to realize that you are one & only i.e. you are a unique creation. So, be & remain unique.
quotes.author: Emeasoba George

quotes.quote: Don't let anyone tell you that you have to be a certain way. Be unique. Be what you feel.
quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

quotes.quote: I always find people who are unique very attractive.
quotes.author: Gina Gershon

quotes.quote: A human being is so irreplaceable. So valuable and so unique.
quotes.author: Goran Persson

quotes.quote: Remember, you're unique. And so is everyone else.
quotes.author: Jill Shalvis

quotes.quote: Accept that you are unique. Stop comparing yourself to others as this can be damaging to your happiness and self-esteem.
quotes.author: Nikhil Saluja

quotes.quote: Treasure the things about you that make you different and unique.
quotes.author: Karen Kain

quotes.quote: Each brain is exposed to different circumstances. It's very likely that your brain is unique in the history of the universe.
quotes.author: Gerald Edelman

quotes.quote: From the beginning, each human embryo has its own unique genetic identity.
quotes.author: Robert Casey

quotes.quote: What each must seek in his life was never on land or sea. It is something out of his own unique potentiality for experience. Something that never has been and never could have been experienced by anyone else.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: In becoming fully human, we are called to be individuals. We are called to be unique and different. We are called to power.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: Each of us is unique and special. No two sets of fingerprints are the same. although twins appear alike, they too, are different. Out of all the billions of people since the beginning of time, there will never be another you. so enjoy and appreciate your uniqueness.
quotes.author: Famous Amos

quotes.quote: Everyone is different. When you don't mind your difference, it stops being a problem and becomes your distinction.
quotes.author: Joan Alden

quotes.quote: I've always wanted to be somebody, but I see now I should have been more specific.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: I didn't belong as a kid, and that always bothered me. If only I'd known that one day my differentness would be an asset, then my early life would have been much easier.
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.quote: We have all been placed on this earth to discover our own path, and we will never be happy if we live someone else's idea of life.
quotes.author: James Van Praagh

quotes.quote: You have two choices in life: You can dissolve into the mainstream or you can be distinct. To be distinct you must be different. To be different you must strive to be what no one else but you can be.
quotes.author: Alan Ashley Pitt

quotes.quote: You have worth and unique value. You are more than enough. The world may seem to discredit you, or even oppose you, for one reason or another. Yet you have value that goes far beyond the superficial considerations of the world.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Pavarotti is not vain but is conscious of being unique.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: The way you would draw a tree is different from the way anyone else would draw a tree-- and that's the way it's supposed to be.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: So, at the root of all art and science there exists a gap-- a gap between what the world is like and what the human creator wishes and hopes for it to be like. Our unique way of bridging that gap in each of our lives seems to me to be the essence of the reason for human creativity.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: I think the greatest people in society carved niches that represented the unique expression of their combinations of talents, and if everyone had the luxury of expressing the unique combination of talents in this world, our society would be transformed overnight.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: If each of billions or trillions of leaves and snowflakes can display its own unique individual identity, how much more so should not each human being?
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: While each mother-child relationship is unique, this loving bond in strengthened most by the love each party shows to the other.
quotes.author: Familius

quotes.quote: Motherhood creates a unique kind of love that sees a child's faults, shortcomings, and strength but loves the child in spite of and because of them.
quotes.author: Familius

quotes.quote: The British nation is unique in this respect. They are the only people who like to be told how bad things are, who like to be told the worst.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I believe every guitar player inherently has something unique about their playing. They just have to identify what makes them different and develop it.
quotes.author: Jimmy Page

quotes.quote: We have certain standard of quality to be sure, but once music hits that level, we only react to a unique style, a fresh take on things. We don't like certain music because it's professional, we like it because it's raw, because it touched a nerve.
quotes.author: Mr. Richard Foster

quotes.quote: Dedicate yourself to writing and creating in ways that are unique to you, or spend your days living with fear and regret.
quotes.author: Mr. Richard Foster

quotes.quote: There's power in allowing yourself to be known and heard, in owning your unique story, in using your authentic voice
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Every child is unique and precious, whatever and whomever, they look like.
quotes.author: Anat Georgy

quotes.quote: You may exist here / But you cannot live / Without your soul / I am only your soul / Your life / Come to me / Merge into me / To become unique.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: The power of your inner sense is your neutrality / The purity of your heart and mind is your fairness / The strength of your soul is your love and help / To all people, in all good matters / Though you are not a perfect / But you are a unique person.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: You bring feelings that are hard for me to speak / for to find a word that has a meaning to what I am feeling / is to find something unique.
quotes.author: William Andrews

quotes.quote: How I remember solstice days / Through many winters long completed! / Each unrepeatable, unique / And each one countless times repeated.
quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

quotes.quote: No matter what your differences are, you have to embrace them and be proud of the way you are.
quotes.author: Jazz Jennings

quotes.quote: What sets you apart can sometimes feel like a burden and it’s not. And a lot of the time, it’s what makes you great.
quotes.author: Emma Stone

quotes.quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Greatness starts from bearing the willingness to embrace your uniqueness at all times.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: If you are always trying to be normal, you will never know how amazing you can be.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Being different isn’t a bad thing. It means you’re brave enough to be yourself.
quotes.author: Luna Lovegood

quotes.quote: People have a problem with me being different, but that propels me forward in life.
quotes.author: Mary Louise Parker

quotes.quote: I am tired of being used, hurt, and cast aside. It is my turn to use. My turn to hurt.
quotes.author: Marie Lu

quotes.quote: People that don't know what they are worth will always see their capture's wings, but never their tail.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: People know who they can walk over and who they can't. If someone is walking all over you it's because they KNOW you'll put up with it.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Anyone who allows other people to control and guide their destiny will eventually become bitter and feel used and taken advantage of.
quotes.author: Innah Delos Angeles

quotes.quote: I feel like I'm a library book. I've been used, tossed around, and put down. I'm just waiting for someone who think I'm good enough to keep.
quotes.author: Francine Chiar

quotes.quote: The feeling of being used...I guess it's Better then being forgotten.
quotes.author: Joan L Trejo

quotes.quote: Even The Most Caring People Can Get Tired Of Being Taken For Granted
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: There is no point in filling a woman's head up and leading her on if you don't see a future with her.
quotes.author: Diana Baybiee

quotes.quote: Some people use power, whilst they are some who let power use them.
quotes.author: Moffat Machingura

quotes.quote: People like to do what they used to do after they've stopped being able to do it.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: Things gain meaning by being used in a shared experience or joint action.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: People are used to being coddled.
quotes.author: Phil Mcgraw

quotes.quote: There's capital controls and there's people control. So every time you think of a fence keeping all those bad people out, think about those fences maybe being used against us, keeping us in.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.quote: You can't always be nice. That's how people take advantage of you. Sometimes you have to set boundaries.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: With all the toys in the world people choose feelings to play with.
quotes.author: Tyga

quotes.quote: Each of us is a small part of God's plan. I'm a small part. I create paintings that are being used by God.
quotes.author: Thomas Kinkade

quotes.quote: Because she was a blank mural and you wrote all over her.
quotes.author: Jasmine Sandozz

quotes.quote: I can think of worse things than being used as guinea pigs.
quotes.author: Tom McLoughlin

quotes.quote: Everyone is a tool for someone. The thing to consider is what exactly one should be used for.
quotes.author: Erich Hoeber

quotes.quote: It's time we stopped being lapdogs. Who are they to heckle us? It's time one of us drew a line in the sand.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.quote: And I'm counting down the moments until I am left alone / Cause I'm done with being used to fill the hole that's in your soul
quotes.author: Keli Thomson

quotes.quote: Did he drop to hard and let you know / You can find another shoulder to cry on / Cause it makes more sense being used
quotes.author: Wade Brown

quotes.quote: Now you're being used and you're so confused that there's nothing left to Gain / Baby you could be In your lover's reign...
quotes.author: Michael Sterling

quotes.quote: I'm not part of your institution / 'Cause you're just some grand illusion / It's paralyzing being used and abused
quotes.author: Caleb Shomo

quotes.quote: You make your way through the fire / I stand inside and I get burned / You make your love a liar / I'm hanging on to every word / I can't quit you / And I'm fine with being used
quotes.author: Derek Fuhrmann

quotes.quote: She doesn't know she's being used and it would break her heart in two.
quotes.author: Frazier

quotes.quote: Sick of seeing you bruised and burnt out / Ugly and low, so sick and tired of / Being sick and tired of being used and abused / That's right
quotes.author: David James Ball

quotes.quote: I see the freedom at the end of the road / I've heard so many lies and I've taken the blows / Give it to me take it from me nobody knows / Sick of being used and I'm gonna explode
quotes.author: Zoltan E Teglas

quotes.quote: I'm done thinking about you forever / And ever / Now I'm through / Being used / So I'm not going back there / Not ever
quotes.author: Richard Greentree

quotes.quote: Seems their lives have been abused / With a risk of being used, no happiness to find
quotes.author: Ben Adams

quotes.quote: Everything you said I erased from my mind / Now I'm crying over you / If I could only find an escape I would t
quotes.author: James H IV Ashhurst

quotes.quote: I've grown tired of being used / And I'm sick and tired of being accused / Now I'm walking away from you / And I'm not coming back
quotes.author: James Morrison

quotes.quote: She feels such pain when you say goodbye / Nearly goes insane / When you can't look her in the eye / And it's plain to see / That she's being used / But she's always there and she love you
quotes.author: Ian Owen

quotes.quote: How long will it take us to finally make something new? / When will we wake up and finally stop getting screwed / It's hypocrisy, not democracy and we're all being used / How long will it take us to make, make something new?
quotes.author: Jim Lindberg

quotes.quote: If this is only gonna be about win or lose, win or lose, / May I please be excused / If we still don't recognize who's being used, who's being used, / May I please be excused
quotes.author: FDave Grorl

quotes.quote: Sometimes I cry 'cause I'm confused / Is this a fact of being used / There is no life for me at all / Cause I give myself at beck and call
quotes.author: Jackie Jackson

quotes.quote: A brilliant lie. / All the time that was spent, / Being used,I should have said, / Goodbye and thanks for the memories.
quotes.author: Ashley Hittesdorp

quotes.quote: It saddens me to think / That the only ones I see are mannequins / Looking stupid, being used and being thin / And I don't know why I hang around with them
quotes.author: Cambe

quotes.quote: I can't decide / I'm so confused / Which way to go? Ooh / I'm being useful here / I'm being used / Which way to go? / Some line gets drawn
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: And if all that there is, is this fear of being used / I should go back to being lonely and confused / If I could, I would, I swear
quotes.author: Wham!

quotes.quote: I bought the thing brand new. / But it's worn out for being used. / Carrying it to door and back again. / I am gonna leave you some day.
quotes.author: Mary Virginia Taylor

quotes.quote: Look at us fools / Being used / We're totally dumb, surprised / Waiting for you to share with us / The myth behind the lies
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: But I didn't wanna face the truth / That I was only being used / And you was just fronting / Hey boy, thanks for nothing
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: I'll admit to being confused / And I'm used to being used / Think again... you're wrong / So wrong... so wrong... so wrong... / Think again... think again... think!
quotes.author: Mark White

quotes.quote: Unaware that the waves that you created / Caused a storm within / Cause you used me / If you only knew / I got used to being a fool for you you you
quotes.author: Anouk M Hendriks

quotes.quote: Some people just love like me / And then hope that they're not being used / Look at me and who do you see / A friend or two, a man or a fool, oh
quotes.author: Smokey Robinson

quotes.quote: Now I know I'm being used / That's okay because I like the abuse / I know she's playing with me / That's okay 'cause I've got no self-esteem
quotes.author: Bryan Holland

quotes.quote: Know when you're being taken advantage of.
quotes.author: Agnes Bonas

quotes.quote: Know the difference between helping others and being used by them.
quotes.author: Agnes Bonas

quotes.quote: Abuse is abuse; it is what it is.
quotes.author: Agnes Bonas

quotes.quote: If you lie, cheat and abuse people, realize that karma knows who you are.
quotes.author: Agnes Bonas

quotes.quote: There are many counterfeit people nowadays.
quotes.author: Agnes Bonas

quotes.quote: Next to knowing when to seize an opportunity, the most important thing in life is to know when to forgo an advantage.
quotes.author: Disraeli

quotes.quote: It's them as take advantage that get advantage in this world.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: It is the greatest of advantages to enjoy no advantage at all.
quotes.author: Thoreau

quotes.quote: If you don't get the better of yourself, someone else will.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A sworn vow never to be taken advantage of again.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: I've worked too hard and built too much to be taken advantage of. I know my worth and what I bring to the table.
quotes.author: Tony A. Gaskins

quotes.quote: I'm open to the possibilities of being one of those people who reach certain heights without being owned by others.
quotes.author: Tony A. Gaskins

quotes.quote: It's when you get complacent that you get taken advantage of.
quotes.author: Tony A. Gaskins

quotes.quote: You don't need to know every detail, but you should know the basics. There are so many people who get taken advantage of.
quotes.author: Tony A. Gaskins

quotes.quote: If you don't want to be taken advantage of, if you don't want your brand to be misrepresented, if you don't want someone else to be in control of your destiny, then do your work.
quotes.author: Tony A. Gaskins

quotes.quote: I think everybody's weird. We should all celebrate our individuality and not be embarrassed or ashamed of it.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: There's a whole category of people who miss out by not allowing themselves to be weird enough.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: I'd rather be a little weird than all boring.
quotes.author: Rebecca Mckinsey

quotes.quote: It's weird not to be weird.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Blessed are the weird people ? poets, misfits, writers, mystics, painters & troubadours ? for they teach us to see the world through different eyes.
quotes.author: Jacob Nordby

quotes.quote: Sharpen your rough edges and be the best version of your weird self.
quotes.author: Colin Wright

quotes.quote: People that are really very weird can get into sensitive positions and have a tremendous impact on history.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: I'M THANKFUL FOR WEIRD PEOPLE OUT THERE 'CAUSE THEY'RE SOME OF THE MOST CREATIVE PEOPLE.
quotes.author: Channing Tatum

quotes.quote: EVERY WEIRD THING ABOUT YOU IS BEAUTIFUL AND MAKES LIFE INTERESTING.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.quote: Being weird adds spice to life. Having weird friends just deepens the flavor.
quotes.author: Jayelle Cochran

quotes.quote: Weirdism is definitely the cornerstone of many an artist's career.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Its OK to be weird. And maybe your weird is my normal. Whos to say? I think its an attitude.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: I like being weird. Weird's all I've got. That, and my sweet style.
quotes.author: Leo Valdez

quotes.quote: Some are born weird, some achieve it, others have weirdness thrust upon them.
quotes.author: Dick Francis

quotes.quote: Nobody is so weird others can't identify with them.
quotes.author: Rebecca Miller

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a weird human being, It's just that some people require more understanding than others.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: I used to think anyone doing anything weird was weird. Now I know that it is the people that call others weird that are weird.
quotes.author: Paul Mccartney

quotes.quote: You laugh at me because I'm different, I laugh at you because you're all the same.
quotes.author: Jonathan Davis

quotes.quote: You have to be odd to be number one.
quotes.author: Dr Seuss

quotes.quote: I never set out to be weird. It was always other people who called me weird.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to be awesome. Sometimes being weird and different is good. When you think you're working hard, there is always someone else working harder, so always be yourself and know your stuff.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Macinnes Wood

quotes.quote: The longer you go by yourself the weirder you get, and the weirder you get the longer you go by yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Shepard

quotes.quote: When the going gets weird, the weird turn pro.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Maybe your weird is my normal. Who's to say'
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.quote: Being weird is not a bad thing, it shows how special you are in your own way.
quotes.author: D. Fetahu

quotes.quote: Being weird is just a side effect of being awesome
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Be the weird you want to see in the world.
quotes.author: Wein Benlick

quotes.quote: Stay Weird, Stay Different.
quotes.author: Graham Moore

quotes.quote: We're all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness and call it love ' true love.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: I am weird, you are weird. Everyone in this world is weird. One day two people come together in mutual weirdness and fall in love.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: If everyone is thinking alike, then somebody isn't thinking.
quotes.author: George S. Patton Jr.

quotes.quote: I was always fascinated by people who are considered completely normal, because I find them the weirdest of all.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Things are really weird around here, and most of us don't know everything. Half of everything.
quotes.author: James Dashner

quotes.quote: There are so many weird people that nobody takes any notice. We all just fit right in.
quotes.author: Graeme Simsion

quotes.quote: I learned a long time ago that reality was much weirder than anyone's imagination.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: We all know interspecies romance is weird.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.quote: I know stealing a foot is weird. But, hello, living in a house where a foot is available to be stolen is weird.
quotes.author: Lauren Ambrose

quotes.quote: People are weird. When we find someone with weirdness that is compatible with ours, we team up and call it love.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: I thought weirdness was a good thing. I don't mean that defensively, either. I thought it was something to be cultivated.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: I like the idea that we can contain our weirdness, but I prefer it when we wear it all over ourselves.
quotes.author: Kelly Oxford

quotes.quote: A real friendship ought to introduce each person to unexpected weirdness in the other.
quotes.author: Jaron Lanier

quotes.quote: The fact was, by the time she got to high school, being weird and proud of it was an asset. Suddenly cool, Blue could've happily had any number of friends. And she had tried. But the problem with being weird was that everyone else was normal.
quotes.author: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.quote: Human salvation lies in the hands of the creatively maladjusted.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: To pigeonhole a genre as being successful or unsuccessful is weird.
quotes.author: Chester Bennington

quotes.quote: It is sort of weird being honored for the worst day of your life.
quotes.author: Ben Fountain

quotes.quote: My smile wavers as I revert to my natural state of being: nervous and weird.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: Being called weird is like being called Limited Edition. Meaning youre something people dont see that often.
quotes.author: Ryan Forbes

quotes.quote: You're making me nervous by being so weird. But your weirdness is what I like about you.
quotes.author: Jaclyn Moriarty

quotes.quote: I am one of the happiest people I know. And that's a weird place to have arrived at from being a depressed Jewish kid.
quotes.author: Debra Winger

quotes.quote: For me the world is weird because it is stupendous, awesome, mysterious, unfathomable; my interest has been to convince you that you must assume responsibility for being here.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: Weird behavior is natural in smart children, like curiosity is to a kitten.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Whatever makes you weird is probably your greatest asset.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: What makes you different or weird, that's your strength.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: If someone ever says you're weird, say thank you.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Using the word weird implies that there is a norm.
quotes.author: Robyn Hitchcock

quotes.quote: This whole world is wild at heart and weird on top.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: How weird that must be, to stay the same as everyone else changes.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: It's weird how time can change something you thought would always stay the same.
quotes.author: Susane Colasanti

quotes.quote: It's good as an artist to always remember to see things in a new, weird way.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Always be a first rate version of yourself and not a second rate version of someone else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: You were born an original. Don't die a copy.
quotes.author: John Mason

quotes.quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Say what you feel. It's not being rude, it's called being real.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: He who trims himself to suit everyone will soon whittle himself away.
quotes.author: Raymond Hull

quotes.quote: We are so accustomed to disguise ourselves to others that in the end we become disguised to ourselves.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: EE Cummings

quotes.quote: I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Be what you are. This is the first step toward becoming better than you are.
quotes.author: Julius Charles Hare

quotes.quote: Be yourself. Above all, let who you are, what you are, what you believe shine through every sentence you write, every piece you finish.
quotes.author: John Jakes

quotes.quote: Be yourself, fill your life with good people, and don't get a big head. It can all be gone tomorrow.
quotes.author: Molly Sims

quotes.quote: Be yourself - not your idea of what you think somebody else's idea of yourself should be.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Don't compromise yourself - you're all you have.
quotes.author: John Grisham

quotes.quote: When you know yourself, you are empowered. When you accept yourself, you are invincible.
quotes.author: Tina Lifford

quotes.quote: Sometimes I have to remind myself that I don't have to do what everyone else is doing.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for something you are not.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Be yourself, but always your better self.
quotes.author: Karl G. Maeser

quotes.quote: Imitation is suicide.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't compromise even if it hurts to be yourself.
quotes.author: Toby Keith

quotes.quote: You're lucky enough to be different, never change.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Just because they disagree, doesn't mean you ain't right.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: To be one's self, and unafraid whether right or wrong, is more admirable than the easy cowardice of surrender to conformity.
quotes.author: Irving Wallace

quotes.quote: Oh, never mind the fashion. When one has a style of one's own, it is always 20 times better.
quotes.author: Margaret Oliphant

quotes.quote: We must not allow other people's limited perceptions to define us.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.quote: Be yourself. Be true to that, to your heart. Patience. See what happens if you step back instead of bounding forward.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: No other version, no matter how perfect it is, would ever feel better than being your true self.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Be yourself, don't take anything from anyone, and never let them take you alive.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Too many people overvalue what they are not and undervalue what they are.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: It's better to be a misfit than a one-size-fits-all!
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Before you can be anything, you have to be yourself. That's the hardest thing to find.
quotes.author: E.L. Konigsburg

quotes.quote: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: We all wear masks, and the time comes when we cannot remove them without removing some of our own skin.
quotes.author: Andre Berthiaume

quotes.quote: If they don't like you for being yourself, be yourself even more.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: It's just better to be yourself than to try to be some version of what you think the other person wants.
quotes.author: Matt Damon

quotes.quote: Some people say you are going the wrong way, when it's simply a way of your own.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: If you choose to be fearless, then be fearlessly authentic not an imitation of someone you envy.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right - for you'll be criticized anyways.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Don't let people's compliments get to your head and don't let their criticism get to your heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Bernard M. Baruch

quotes.quote: I don't care what you think about me. I don't think about you at all.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: It's better to walk alone than in a crowd going in the wrong direction.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you don't know what you want, others will want you for what they know! You must know yourself!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: You don't have to say everything to be a light. Sometimes a fire built on a hill will bring interested people to your campfire.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: When you dance to your own rhythm, Life taps its toes to your beat.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The belief that others think they are right doesn't mean that they are.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Few really believe. The most only believe that they believe or even make believe.
quotes.author: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.quote: He does not believe that does not live according to his belief.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Never believe anything that requires you to hate people who do not believe it.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: A wise man ... proportions his belief to the evidence.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: You don't believe things because they make your life better, you believe them because they're true.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Beliefs create reality.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: One person with a belief is equal to ninety nine who have only interests.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: A widespread belief is more often likely to be foolish than sensible.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: There can be no merit in believing something which you can neither explain nor understand.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: Everything is possible for him who believes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: It is one thing to believe and another to know.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Whatever you believe is true is true even if it is not true.
quotes.author: Saji Ijiyemi

quotes.quote: He who believes needs no explanation.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Remember that what you believe will depend very much on what you are.
quotes.author: Noah Porter

quotes.quote: The more we justify our beliefs, the more narrow-minded we become.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Strong beliefs win strong men, and then make them stronger.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: If you want to know what your true beliefs are, take a look at your actions.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: All beliefs and belief systems boil down to having faith in something we would like to believe to be the truth.
quotes.author: Neville Berkowitz

quotes.quote: Man is what he believes.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: To believe in something, and not to live it, is dishonest.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: He who does not know how to believe, should not know.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: I ask you to believe nothing that you cannot verify for yourself.
quotes.author: G.I. Gurdjieff

quotes.quote: When you believe it, you've created it, whatever it is.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Beliefs are choices. First you choose your beliefs. Then your beliefs affect your choices.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Just as no one can be forced into belief, so no one can be forced into unbelief.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: ur beliefs on you. It's always you who in the last instance can permit a belief to be true for you or not!
quotes.author: Marc Reklau

quotes.quote: Every man prefers belief to the exercise of judgment.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: A belief is not an idea held by the mind, it is an idea that holds the mind.
quotes.author: Elly Roselle

quotes.quote: A belief which leaves no place for doubt is not a belief; it is a superstition.
quotes.author: Jose Bergamin

quotes.quote: Men freely believe that which they desire.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: Man is made by his belief. As he believes, so he is.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: We are born believing. A man bears beliefs as a tree bears apples.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Believe in one thing too much and you have no room for new ideas.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: First we have to believe, and then we believe.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: You will only rise to the level of your belief.
quotes.author: Catrice M. Jackson

quotes.quote: An old belief is like an old shoe. We so value its comfort that we fail to notice the hole in it.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: As a man believes, so he will act.
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.quote: Belief is a beautiful armor, but it makes for the heaviest sword.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: In the end you regret less the things you believed that weren't true than the things that never came true because you didn't believe.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Belief is the wound that knowledge heals.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: It's what you choose to believe that makes you the person you are.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: Generally the theories we believe we call facts, and the facts we disbelieve we call theories.
quotes.author: Felix Cohen

quotes.quote: Belief gets in the way of learning.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Belief is the death of intelligence.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: When you believe in a thing, believe in it all the way, implicitly and unquestionable.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Belief creates the actual fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Faith: Belief without evidence in what is told by one who speaks without knowledge, of things without parallel.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: If what we worship fail us, still the fire burns on, and it is much to have believed.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: Believe in something larger than yourself to get involved in some of the big ideas of our time.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Miracles happen to those who believe in them.
quotes.author: Bernard Berenson

quotes.quote: Against my will, in the course of my travels, the belief that everything worth knowing was known at Cambridge gradually wore off. In this respect, my travels were very useful to me.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The fact that an opinion has been widely held is no evidence whatever that it is not utterly absurd.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Belief is a wise wager. Granted that faith cannot be proved, what harm will come to you if you gamble on its truth and it proves false? If you gain, you gain all; if you lose, you lose nothing. Wager, then, without hesitation, that He exists.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: If you believe in what you are doing, then let nothing hold you up in your work. Much of the best work of the world has been done against seeming impossibilities. The thing is to get the work done.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: If you believe you can, you probably can. If you believe you won't, you most assuredly won't. Belief is the ignition switch that gets you off the launching pad.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: To believe is to be happy; to doubt is to be wretched. To believe is to be strong. Doubt cramps energy. Belief is power. Only so far as a man believes strongly, mightily, can he act cheerfully, or do anything that is worth the doing.
quotes.author: Frederick William Robertson

quotes.quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
quotes.author: Gail Devers

quotes.quote: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: The practical effect of a belief is the real test of its soundness.
quotes.author: James Anthony Froude

quotes.quote: The constant assertion of belief is an indication of fear.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: It is always easier to believe than to deny. Our minds are naturally affirmative.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: The path of least resistance and least trouble is a mental rut already made. It requires troublesome work to undertake the alternation of old beliefs.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Tolerance implies no lack of commitment to one's own beliefs. Rather it condemns the oppression or persecution of others.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Belief in oneself is one of the most important bricks in building any successful venture.
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Faith is not the belief that God will do what you want. It is the belief that God will do what is right.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: It is the belief that extremes and excesses of inequality must be reduced so that each person is free to fully develop his or her full potential. This is why we take precious time out of our lives and give it to politics.
quotes.author: Paul Wellstone

quotes.quote: Reality is that which, when you stop believing in it, doesn't go away.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: Do continue to believe that with your feeling and with your work you are taking part in the greatest; the more strongly you cultivate in yourself this belief, the more will reality and world go forth from it.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Faith is the great cop-out, the great excuse to evade the need to think and evaluate evidence. Faith is belief in spite of, even perhaps because of, the lack of evidence.
