quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Religion is about turning untested belief into unshakable truth through the power of institutions and the passage of time.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: I believe that there is an explanation for everything, so, yes, I believe in miracles.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: I have great belief in the fact that whenever there is chaos, it creates wonderful thinking. I consider chaos a gift.
quotes.author: Septima Poinsette Clark

quotes.quote: Nothing makes a woman more beautiful than the belief that she is beautiful.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: The environment you fashion out of your thoughts, your beliefs, your ideals, your philosophy is the only climate you will ever live in. The key is in not spending time, but in investing it.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: It's not the events of our lives that shape us, but our beliefs as to what those events mean.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: A little reflection will show us that every belief, even the simplest and most fundamental, goes beyond experience when regarded as a guide to our actions.
quotes.author: William Kingdon Clifford

quotes.quote: When you believe in a thing, believe in it all the way, implicitly and unquestionably.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Always remember you are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: Christopher Robin

quotes.quote: Our success is measured by personal beliefs, not by anybody else's standards or beliefs.
quotes.author: Henry Marsh

quotes.quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: The only thing that stands between a man and what he wants from life is often merely the will to try it and the faith to believe that it is possible.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: Take a leap of faith and begin this wondrous new year by believing. Believe in yourself. And believe that there is a loving Source - a Sower of Dreams - just waiting to be asked to help you make your dreams come true.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Believe in rewards that await you, believe in the harvest in store.
quotes.author: Wish Belkin

quotes.quote: Follow your dreams, believe in yourself and don't give up.
quotes.author: Rachel Corrie

quotes.quote: Whatever it is you believe about yourself that is what others will believe about you too.
quotes.author: Harvey Volson

quotes.quote: You cannot believe in God until you believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: Changing your negative beliefs is the first step in the transformation process that will really make a difference in your life.
quotes.author: Anita Foley

quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: When I came with open hands and an open heart to see if God could actually speak for Himself, I realized how much baggage I had heaped upon the Bible and how much hearsay I had believed about God.
quotes.author: Brian Hardin

quotes.quote: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: I never thought of losing, but now that it' s happened, the only thing is to do it right. That's my obligation to all the people who believe in me. We all have to take defeats in life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: If you believe you can, you probably can. If you believe you won't, you most assuredly won't. Belief is the ignition switch that gets you off the launching pad.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, and the rest will fall into place. Have faith in your own abilities, work hard, and there is nothing you cannot accomplish.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: Believe in your ability to be successful in the things you have a passion for. These are God given gifts for you to use.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I believe in the compelling power of love. I do not understand it. I believe it to be the most fragrant blossom of all this thorny existence.
quotes.author: Theodore Dreiser

quotes.quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: You have to believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: I believe that good things come to those who work.
quotes.author: Wilt Chamberlain

quotes.quote: Those who believe they can do something and those who believe they can't are both right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Believing in yourself is not for you; it's for every person who has touched your life in a significant way and for every person your life will touch the same way five minutes from now, or five centuries from now.
quotes.author: Jaye Miller

quotes.quote: Believe it can be done. When you believe something can be done, really believe, your mind will find the ways to do it. Believing a solution paves the way to solution.
quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

quotes.quote: I'm the kinda person, you gotta fight for everything you get. You gotta believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Ace Frehley

quotes.quote: I firmly believe that any man's finest hour, the greatest fulfillment of all that he holds dear, is that moment when he has worked his heart out in a good cause and lies exhausted on the field of battle - victorious.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: If you want to be successful, it's just this simple. Know what you are doing. Love what you are doing. And believe in what you are doing.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: I believe that our circumstances can change based on what words we read, hear, and speak.
quotes.author: Kathy Collins

quotes.quote: Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: Be strong, be fearless, be beautiful. And believe that anything is possible when you have the right people there to support you.
quotes.author: Misty Copeland

quotes.quote: When you really believe in God, it gives you a courage, a confidence that enables you to meet the things coming.
quotes.author: Della Reese

quotes.quote: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something and that this thing must be attained.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: Because one believes in oneself, one doesn't try to convince. Because one is content with oneself, one doesn't need others' approval. Because one accepts oneself, the whole world accepts him or her.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it.
quotes.author: Ronnie Lott

quotes.quote: I believe in a God who measures us for who we are in our hearts and not by what we have done.
quotes.author: Floyd Kendall

quotes.quote: Believe nothing, no matter where you read it, or who said it, no matter if I have said it, unless it agrees with your own reason and your own common sense.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: To be a champ you have to believe in yourself when no one else will.
quotes.author: Sugar Ray Robinson

quotes.quote: Before you can win, you have to believe you are worthy.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.quote: So if you have a dream then just believe that you can achieve it no matter what. Even when you can't feel deep in your heart any words of encouragement, just believe in your dream and your heart will finally show you the way.
quotes.author: Shuchi Gupta

quotes.quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: With God in charge, I believe everything will work out for the best in the end.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
quotes.author: Gail Devers

quotes.quote: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
quotes.author: J. F. Clarke

quotes.quote: If you let people break your spirit and detour you from your path, then you have not been true to yourself or those you're here to touch, those who believe in you.
quotes.author: Allison DuBois

quotes.quote: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride - and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got to keep going.
quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
quotes.author: David Frost

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, listen to your gut, and do what you love.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.quote: Believe that deep inside us, we all strive to move forward and up, to scale new heights.
quotes.author: Paul Stoltz

quotes.quote: The liar's punishment is, not in the least that he is not believed, but that he cannot believe anyone else.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Be believing, be happy, don't get discouraged. Things will work out.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: When you're different, sometimes you don't see the millions of people who accept you for what you are. All you notice is the person who doesn't.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: It's what you choose to believe that makes you the person you are.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: That's how hearts get broken, you know. When you believe in promises.
quotes.author: Kathleen Glasgow

quotes.quote: People may doubt what you say, but they will believe what you do.
quotes.author: Lewis Cass

quotes.quote: When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Those who believe that they believe in God, but without passion in their hearts, without anguish in mind, without uncertainty, without doubt, without an element of despair even in their consolation, believe only in the God idea, not God Himself.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: If you believe in yourself anything is possible.
quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

quotes.quote: If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: You may be the only person left who believes in you, but it's enough. It takes just one star to pierce a universe of darkness. Never give up.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: And above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places. Those who don't believe in magic will never find it.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it.
quotes.author: Ronnie Lott

quotes.quote: The more you believed in yourself, the more you could trust yourself. The more you trust yourself, the less you compare yourself to others.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: If you believe very strongly in something, stand up and fight for it.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Don’t let others tell you what you can’t do. Don't let the limitations of others limit your vision. If you can remove your self-doubt and believe in yourself, you can achieve what you never thought possible.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: If you believe you can, you might. If you know you can, you will.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: For those who believe, no proof is necessary. For those who don't believe, no proof is possible.
quotes.author: Stuart Chase

quotes.quote: Never letting the competition define you. Instead, you have to define yourself based on a point of view you care deeply about.
quotes.author: Tom Chappel

quotes.quote: Quick believers need broad shoulders.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The believer is happy. The doubter is wise.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: For the believer, nothing is impossible. We put limitations on ourselves.
quotes.author: Sasha Azevedo

quotes.quote: A true believer does not fear physical death, rather he fears the death of his heart.
quotes.author: Ibn Qayyim Al-Jawziyya

quotes.quote: As believers, we all have the responsibility to leverage our wealth for kingdom purposes.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Believer's should never deal with doubts and fears because they are the devil's narcotics.
quotes.author: Kenneth E. Hagin

quotes.quote: Believers are never told to become one; we already are one and are expected to act like it.
quotes.author: Joni Eareckson Tada

quotes.quote: A believer is a bird in a cage, a freethinker is an eagle parting the clouds with tireless wing.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Believers are each other's mirrors.
quotes.author: Elif Shafak

quotes.quote: Shallow believers prefer a shallow God.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Even true believers had consciences, too bad.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: Only the believers pick up the prizes in life.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: It is comfort to the believer that all things are possible.
quotes.author: Samuel Rutherford

quotes.quote: The believer does not use God's power; God's power uses him.
quotes.author: Kenneth Wuest

quotes.quote: The true believer is rewarded in every thing, even in affliction.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr

quotes.quote: The believer who has never doubted will hardly convert a doubter.
quotes.author: Marie Von Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: Believers in political faith-healing enjoy a supreme immunity from doubt.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: To believers, the bible is a holy book, to unbelievers, it is a story book.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: The cosmic believer needs the energy of the universe to survive spiritually.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: The true believer can no more live without prayer, than without food day by day.
quotes.author: George Whitefield

quotes.quote: As believers in Jesus Christ, our work is to believe while God works on our behalf.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: As believers, you don't need to pray for a new heart, you need to pray for a new head.
quotes.author: Andrew Wommack

quotes.quote: If you are a believer in Christ, then you were predestined in eternity yet called in time.
quotes.author: Pedro Okoro

quotes.quote: The believer who feels the agony caused by rebellion will grow to become the best intercessor.
quotes.author: Max Anders

quotes.quote: The self-assured believer is a greater sinner in the eyes of God than the troubled disbeliever.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: A believer to another believer is like two hands, one washes the other (correcting each other).
quotes.author: Ibn Taymiyyah

quotes.quote: To be a 'believer' does not make you superior to others; but to be a 'humanist' does make it so!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Why is a believer patient? Because he looks for the coming of the Lord...He waits quietly for the King.
quotes.author: J. C. Ryle

quotes.quote: The present time of believers is no longer determined by the past. It takes its definition from the future.
quotes.author: Jurgen Moltmann

quotes.quote: The challenge of the believer is to take the faith that you got in here and take it to the place out there.
quotes.author: T.D. Jakes

quotes.quote: The true believer, no matter how rowdy and violent his acts, is basically an obedient and submissive person.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Every believer is God's miracle.
quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

quotes.quote: No believer lives a spiritually isolated life.
quotes.author: Theodore Epp

quotes.quote: Every believer is a witness whether he wants to be or not.
quotes.author: Donald Barnhouse

quotes.quote: Every believer is commanded to be plugged in to a local church.
quotes.author: David Jeremiah

quotes.quote: Any believer who has not encountered the Cross is not yet a follower of Christ.
quotes.author: S. E. Entsua-Mensah

quotes.quote: Believers in the doctrines of modern Christendom will reap damnation to their souls.
quotes.author: Bruce R. McConkie

quotes.quote: To a true believer, death is but going to church: from the church below to the church above.
quotes.author: Augustus Toplady

quotes.quote: But a faithful believer will in all circumstances mediate on the mercy and fatherly goodness of God.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Some believers tend to forget God's persistent faithfulness in the face of the spectacular and showy.
quotes.author: Max Anders

quotes.quote: Individual believers are not to usurp the role of civil government and judge people who are offensive.
quotes.author: Max Anders

quotes.quote: As believers we have no need to fear death. Christ himself assures us of a safe arrival home in heaven!
quotes.author: Paul Enns

quotes.quote: Believers may come from different cultures, countries, or customs, but we serve one God who unites us all.
quotes.author: Dillon Burroughs

quotes.quote: If you are a believer you are not supposed to begin to convince God to use you. God already desires to use you.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Be believing, be happy, don't get discouraged. Things will work out.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Believing is half the cure.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: By believing passionately in something that still does not exist, we create it. The nonexistent is whatever we have not sufficiently desired.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Believing in people before they have proved themselves is the key to motivating people to reach their potential.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: It's believing you can push through the exhaustion just to be able to sing after you do a cartwheel or a split.
quotes.author: Naima Adedapo

quotes.quote: Believing a person deserves a defence is not the same as doing anything in your power to get him off scot-free.
quotes.author: Tammy Bruce

quotes.quote: Believing in evolution is believing in the unproved, while believing in Christ is believing in the proven.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: You just have to keep believing in yourself.
quotes.author: Shannen Doherty

quotes.quote: We are born believing. A man bears beliefs as a tree bears apples.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The first step to believing something is true is wanting to believe it is true... or being afraid it is.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: If you're still believing, then you're almost there!
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Believing in something and being a part of something you believe in and watching it work and coming from it.
quotes.author: Jam Master Jay

quotes.quote: Believing in who you are is a major part of a powerful combination for success.
quotes.author: Darren L. Johnson

quotes.quote: Believing in progress does not mean believing that any progress has yet been made.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Find the good. It's all around you. Find it, showcase it and you'll start believing in it.
quotes.author: Jesse Owens

quotes.quote: Why don't you start believing that no matter what you have or haven't done, that your best days are still out in front of you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: We've survived by believing our life is going to get better.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: By virtue of believing in a Supreme Being one embraces certain mysteries.
quotes.author: Robert Vaughn

quotes.quote: When you start believing you're something special, then you're not going to be striving to move forward.
quotes.author: Robin Trower

quotes.quote: Believing you're something that you're not excites the mind and the imagination. And it's hopeful.
quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

quotes.quote: Believe it can be done. When you believe something can be done, really believe, your mind will find the ways to do it. Believing a solution paves the way to solution.
quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

quotes.quote: I rarely believe anything, because at the time of believing I am not really there to believe.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: Perhaps believing in good design is like believing in God, it makes you an optimist.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: Believing hath a core of unbelieving.
quotes.author: Robert Williams Buchanan

quotes.quote: When you want to believe in something, you also have to believe in everything that's necessary for believing in it.
quotes.author: Ugo Betti

quotes.quote: Not believing has a sickness which is believing a little.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: Believing is easier than thinking. Hence so many more believers than thinkers.
quotes.author: Bruce Calvert

quotes.quote: Believing in Hell must distort every judgement on this life.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: I think there is something, more important than believing: Action! The world is full of dreamers, there aren't enough who will move ahead and begin to take concrete steps to actualize their vision.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: The very act of believing creates strength of its own.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The brute necessity of believing something so long as life lasts does not justify any belief in particular.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: You can have anything you want if you will give up the belief that you can't have it.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: You live as you believe. If you believe you can fly, you can fly.
quotes.author: Vadim Kotelnikov

quotes.quote: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Sometimes you cannot believe what you see, you have to believe what you feel. And if you are ever going to have other people trust you, you must feel that you can trust them, too--even when you're in the dark. Even when you're falling.
quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

quotes.quote: I just try to be the best I can be and hope that is the best ever.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.quote: Believing in yourself is the first secret to success.
quotes.author: Disti Amalia

quotes.quote: Believing everyone is dangerous, but believing nobody is more dangerous.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Believing in yourself, is an endless destination. Believing you have failed. is the end of your journey.
quotes.author: Sarah Meredith

quotes.quote: Until you start believing in yourself, you aint gonna have a life!
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: No matter how your heart is grieving, if you keep on believing, the dream that you wish will come true.
quotes.author: Cinderella

quotes.quote: Just believe in yourself. Even if you don't, pretend that you do and, at some point you will.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: Never stop believing in hope because miracles happen everyday.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Believing that your competition is stronger and better than you pushes you to better yourselves.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Believing: it means believing in our own lies. And I can say that I am grateful that I got this lesson very early.
quotes.author: Gunter Grass

quotes.quote: When men stop believing in God, it isn't that they then believe in nothing: they believe in everything.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: There is no greater level and form of belief than believing in yourself.
quotes.author: Darren L. Johnson

quotes.quote: In believing too much in rationality, our contemporaries have lost something.
quotes.author: Krzysztof Kieslowski

quotes.quote: You have to go into each match believing you can beat all of the players.
quotes.author: Andy Murray

quotes.quote: Believing in God is a very intense inner struggle of mine. It's something I worry about a lot, but which I don't have the answer to.
quotes.author: Emily Watson

quotes.quote: You are a piece of the puzzle of someone else's life. You may never know where you fit, but others will fill the holes in their lives with pieces of you.
quotes.author: Bonnie Arbon

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It took me a long time not to judge myself through someone else's eyes.
quotes.author: Sally Field

quotes.quote: A successful person is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks that others throw at him or her.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.quote: It's not who you are that holds you back, it's who you think you're not.
quotes.author: Attributed to Hanoch McCarty

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got to keep going.
quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland

quotes.quote: Don't let fear or insecurity stop you from trying new things. Believe in yourself. Do what you love. And most importantly, be kind to others, even if you don't like them.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, and the rest will fall into place. Have faith in your own abilities, work hard, and there is nothing you cannot accomplish.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: The only person who can pull me down is myself, and I'm not going to let myself pull me down anymore.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: If you truly want to be respected by people you love, you must prove to them that you can survive without them.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Your time is way too valuable to be wasting on people that can't accept who you are.
quotes.author: Turcois Ominek

quotes.quote: You may be the only person left who believes in you, but it's enough. It takes just one star to pierce a universe of darkness. Never give up.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: To be of good quality, you have to excuse yourself from the presence of shallow and callow minded individuals.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: I don't measure a man's success by how high he climbs but how high he bounces when he hits bottom.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: There is nothing more beautiful than believing in yourself.
quotes.author: Sam Kao

quotes.quote: To be a champ, you have to believe in yourself when nobody else will.
quotes.author: Sugar Ray Robinson

quotes.quote: Just go out there and do what you've got to do.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: If you don't ask because you might be refused, you've already refused yourself.
quotes.author: Nisandeh Neta

quotes.quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Bernard M. Maruch

quotes.quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.quote: Faithless To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Don't feed your mind with negative thoughts. If you do, you will come to believe them.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: You are in charge of your feelings, beliefs, and actions. And you teach others how to behave toward you. While you cannot change other people, you can influence them through your own behaviors and actions. By being a living role model of what you want to receive from others, you create more of what you want in your life.
quotes.author: Eric Allenbaugh

quotes.quote: Those people who have the greatest success first needed to believe in what they have to offer the world. You need to trust that your unique contribution is worthwhile.
quotes.author: Grant Andrews

quotes.quote: Self-confidence and a belief in yourself is a must. To instill confidence in others, you first must have confidence in yourself.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A firm belief in yourself is all that is needed to alter your life. No one except you alone can change your life.
quotes.author: M. K. Soni

quotes.quote: There's a world, you see, which has people in it who believe in a variety of different things. Everybody believes in something and everybody, by virtue of the fact that they believe in something, use that something to support their own existence.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: The thing always happens that you really believe in; and the belief in a thing makes it happen.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: If you think you can, you can. And if you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Your belief determines your action and your action determines your results, but first you have to believe.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: What matters is not the idea a man holds, but the depth at which he holds it.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: Along with a strong belief in your own inner voice, you also need laser-like focus combined with unwavering determination.
quotes.author: Larry Flynt

quotes.quote: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: Believe deep down in your heart that you're destined to do great things.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself.. in all you can do.. and for you, the deals will start to work in your favor. You need to be open to such deals, and they will come, I assure you.
quotes.author: Ivana Trump

quotes.quote: Believe it can be done. When you believe something can be done, really believe, your mind will find the ways to do it. Believing a solution paves the way to solution.
quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian Larson

quotes.quote: Life can go in many directions but the belief in yourself is the map to the unknown.
quotes.author: Anne Neil

quotes.quote: The belief in yourself will allow your spirit to soar. It is a flight you don't want to miss.
quotes.author: Anne Neil

quotes.quote: We are most alone when we stop believing in ourselves.
quotes.author: Anne Neil

quotes.quote: When you give yourself the gift of quietly believing in yourself, you'll love yourself.
quotes.author: Callie Khouri

quotes.quote: Every journey starts with believing, and this belief will keep you going. Believe In yourself, believe in your dreams, and believe that you can.
quotes.author: Aysel Ghunar

quotes.quote: If you can't have faith in what is held up to you for faith, you must find things to believe in yourself, for a life without faith in something is too narrow a space to live.
quotes.author: George Woodberry

quotes.quote: If you do not believe in yourself, do not blame others for lacking faith in you.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: As is our confidence, so is our capacity.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Who has self-confidence will lead the rest.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: To these success gives heart: they can because they think they can.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Self-confidence is the first requisite to undertakings.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: There's one blessing only, the source and cornerstone of beatitude: confidence in yourself.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: No matter how big or small it is, think of something you like about yourself and take a moment to appreciate it. Recognizing your strengths will help you build confidence.
quotes.author: Theresa Emminizer

quotes.quote: Self-confidence is an important part of the core skill of self-awareness.
quotes.author: Melissa Rae Shofner

quotes.quote: Being self-assured allows you to do with the worst and trusting that the unknown is not to be feared.
quotes.author: Anne Neil

quotes.quote: Life is not easy for any of us, but what of that? We must have perseverance and, above all, confidence in ourselves.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: I believe that God has put gifts and talents and ability on the inside of every one of us. When you develop that and you believe in yourself and you believe that you're a person of influence and a person of purpose, I believe you can rise up out of any situation.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Use what you've been through as fuel, believe in yourself, and be unstoppable.
quotes.author: Yvonne Pierre

quotes.quote: Because one believes in oneself, one doesn't try to convince others. Because one is content with oneself, one doesn't need others' approval. Because one accepts oneself, the whole world accepts him or her.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are, know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Don't let others tell you what you can't do. Don't let the limitations of others limit your vision. If you can remove your self-doubt and believe in yourself, you can achieve what you never thought possible.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: You may be the only person left who believes in you, but it's enough. It takes just one star to pierce a universe of darkness. Never give up.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, your abilities, and your own potential. Never let self-doubt hold you captive. You are worthy of all that you dream of and hope for.
quotes.author: Roy Bennett

quotes.quote: Forgiving yourself, believing in yourself, and choosing to love yourself are the best gifts one could receive.
quotes.author: Brittany Burgunder

quotes.quote: Never stop believing in yourself. When others doubt, don't you.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Your beliefs about yourself often translate into your convictions about yourself. It is difficult to achieve what you believe is beyond your power.
quotes.author: Eugene C. Onyibo

quotes.quote: Great things are accomplished by talented people who believe they will accomplish them.
quotes.author: Warren G. Bennis

quotes.quote: It is necessary for us to believe in ourselves in order to become the best person that we can be.
quotes.author: Quirky Grandma

quotes.quote: One can only continue to expect to be read if one omits everything that is unimportant.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It's very important to be just to other people. It takes years and years of living to learn that injustice against oneself is always unimportant
quotes.author: Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: Little people belittle people. Great people make people feel great.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Most of our life is unimportant, filled with trivial things from morning till night. But when it is transformed by love it is of interest even to the angels.
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.quote: One of the most significant design principles is to omit the unimportant in order to emphasize the important.
quotes.author: Dieter Rams

quotes.quote: It may be in seemingly unimportant things that a man expresses his passion for perfection, yet they will count heavily in the long run.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schwab

quotes.quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: The world is unimportant and whoever recognizes this conquers his liberty.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: People who cannot distinguish between good and bad language, or who regard the distinction as unimportant, are unlikely to think carefully about anything else.
quotes.author: B.R. Myers

quotes.quote: They misunderstand us, they unwittingly belittle us, they do something that they think is nice that instead just makes us mad. And those are the good ones.
quotes.author: Joanne Lipman

quotes.quote: Whatever is not happening now is unimportant; it is merely curious.
quotes.author: Laura Riding

quotes.quote: The future will one day be the present and will seem as unimportant as the present does now.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: People use ridicule to belittle something perceived big enough to fear.
quotes.author: Vanna Bonta

quotes.quote: People often belittle the place where they were born.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Only one valid law: never belittle others. Never belittle yourself.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Sometimes an unimportant incident is capable of turning everything beautiful into a moment of anxiety. We insist on seeing the mote in the eye and forget about the mountains, the fields and the olive groves.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: No matter how small and unimportant what we are doing may seem, if we do it well, it may soon become the step that will lead us to better things.
quotes.author: Channing Pollock

quotes.quote: Insight without action is worthless.
quotes.author: Marie Forleo

quotes.quote: When it comes to art, money is an unimportant detail. It just happens to be a huge unimportant detail.
quotes.author: Iggy Pop

quotes.quote: We belittle God when we go through the outward motions of worship and take no pleasure in His person.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Everyone is a bore to someone. That is unimportant. The thing to avoid is being a bore to oneself.
quotes.author: Gerald Brenan

quotes.quote: Don't bother to ring a bell in the ear that doesn't listen. Move to another ear, and if he doesn't listen to your bell, sit back and listen to his nemesis.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: The act of bell ringing is symbolic of all proselytizing religions. It implies the pointless interference with the quiet of other people.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: A good bell is heard from far, a bad one still further.
quotes.author: Finnish Proverbs

quotes.quote: I heard the bells on Christmas Day. Their old familiar carols play. And wild and sweet the words repeat. Of peace on earth goodwill to men.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The bells which toll for mankind are most of them, anyway like the bells of Alpine cattle; they are attached to our own necks, and it must be our fault if they do not make a cheerful and harmonious sound.
quotes.author: Peter Medawar

quotes.quote: Once that bell rings you're on your own. It's just you and the other guy.
quotes.author: Joe Louis

quotes.quote: A good example is like a bell that calls many to church.
quotes.author: Danish Proverbs

quotes.quote: Great fools must have great bells.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverbs

quotes.quote: When big bells ring, little ones are not heard.
quotes.author: Serbian Proverb

quotes.quote: The game is not lost – or won – until the last bell goes.
quotes.author: John Curtin

quotes.quote: We go down with the bells ringing in all the sunken cities. Forgotten, we are greeted by the embassies of the dead, While your endless flowing carries us on and on; And neither is nor was. The moment only, eternal.
quotes.author: Czesław Miłosz

quotes.quote: Bells call others, but themselves enter not into the Church.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The Christmas bells from hill to hill Answer each other in the mist.
quotes.author: Alfred the Great

quotes.quote: Dear bells! how sweet the sound of village bells When on the undulating air they swim!
quotes.author: Thomas Hood

quotes.quote: For bells are the voice of the church; They have tones that touch and search The hearts of young and old.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Ring out the old, ring in the new, Ring, happy bells, across the snow: The year is going, let him go; Ring out the false, ring in the true.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: The temple bell stops but I still hear the sound coming out of the flowers.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: Of all sound of all bells... Most solemn and touching is the peal which rings out the Old Year
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: A tiger wearing a bell will starve.
quotes.author: Mongolian Proverb

quotes.quote: A cracked bell can never sound well.
quotes.author: Ghanaian Proverbs

quotes.quote: And the sad act like lepers / They stick to the shadows / They long to ring bells of warning / To tell of their coming / So that the pure can shut their doors.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.quote: And the Sabbath bell, That over wood and wild and mountain dell Wanders so far, chasing all thoughts unholy With sounds most musical, most melancholy.
quotes.author: Samuel Rogers

quotes.quote: A bell's not a bell 'til you ring it, A song's not a song 'til you sing it, Love in your heart wasn't put there to stay, Love isn't love 'til you give it away!
quotes.author: Oscar Hammerstein II

quotes.quote: A fighter never knows when it's the last bell. He doesn't want to face that.
quotes.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quotes.quote: Every time you hear a bell ring, it means that some angel's just got his wings.
quotes.author: Frances Goodrich

quotes.quote: When God rang the bell that ended the fight, the world cried out for one more round.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: If you are going to steal bells plug your ears.
quotes.author: Mongolian Proverb

quotes.quote: Thieves never steal bells.
quotes.author: Tibetan Proverb

quotes.quote: The belly is an ungrateful wretch, it never remembers past favors, it always wants more tomorrow.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: When the belly is empty, the body becomes spirit; and when it is full, the spirit becomes body.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: The belly is the reason that man does not easily mistake himself for a god.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A full belly is little worth where the mind is starved.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: An empty stomach is not a good political adviser.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: He who does not mind his belly, will hardly mind anything else.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Keep belly lightly loaded, if mind would wisdom see; For bodies crammed to bursting, make empty souls to be.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: A full belly does not make for a chaste spirit.
quotes.author: St. Catherine of Siena

quotes.quote: To a haughty belly, kindness is hard to swallow and harder to digest.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: Is it only the mouth and belly which are injured by hunger and thirst? Men's minds are also injured by them.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: Better belly burst than good liquor be lost.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: The belly laugh is the best way to evacuate anguish.
quotes.author: Jean Vanier

quotes.quote: A full belly neither fights nor flies well.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: After a full belly all is poetry.
quotes.author: Frank McCourt

quotes.quote: The belly will not listen to advice.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: The belly has no ears nor is it to be filled with fair words.
quotes.author: François Rabelais

quotes.quote: A hungry stomach cannot hear.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: The big belly can accommodate all kinds of things. The benevolence is never let a dust behind.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Only a stomach that rarely feels hungry scorns common things.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: An old stomach reforms more whiskey drinkers than a new resolve.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: When a man's stomach is full it makes no difference whether he is rich or poor.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Stomach: A slave that must accept everything that is given to it, but which avenges wrongs as slyly as does the slave.
quotes.author: Emile Souvestre

quotes.quote: The stomach is the teacher of the arts and the dispenser of invention.
quotes.author: Aulus Persius Flaccus

quotes.quote: The stomach is the only part of man which can be fully satisfied. The yearning of man's brain for new knowledge and experience and for more pleasant and comfortable surroundings never can be completely met. It is an appetite which cannot be appeased.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: The healthy stomach is nothing if it is not conservative. Few radicals have good digestions.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: A person who has spoiled his stomach will criticize his meal saying that the food is bad; the same thing happens with people who are not satisfied with their lives.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: The belly has no ears.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: The belly comes before the soul.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Now my belly is as noble as my heart.
quotes.author: Gabriela Mistral

quotes.quote: Rebellions of the belly are the worst.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: An empty belly hears nobody.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The belly is the giver of genius.
quotes.author: Aulus Persius Flaccus

quotes.quote: A belly laugh increases the ability of your immune system to fight infections.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: A fat stomach never breeds fine thoughts.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: A hungry stomach rarely despises common food.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Squeamish stomachs cannot eat without pickles.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The stomach is an essential part of the chess master.
quotes.author: Bent Larsen

quotes.quote: The best stomachs are not those which reject all foods.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: When the stomach is full, it is easy to talk of fasting.
quotes.author: Saint Jerome

quotes.quote: A stomach accustomed to hunger is satisfied with very little.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: If your stomach disputes you, lie down and pacify it with cool thoughts.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: A stomach without bread and a purse without gold have led to so many revolutions in history.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A fat stomach sticks out too far. It prevents you from looking down and seeing what is going on around you.
quotes.author: Norman Reilly Raine

quotes.quote: Never call a stomach a tummy without good reason.
quotes.author: William Strunk Jr.

quotes.quote: The stomach, when we lie down to rest, should have its work done, that it may enjoy rest, as well as other portions of the body. The work of digestion should not be carried on through any period of the sleeping hours.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.quote: ... the stomach is near the heart and one appetite pricks on another.
quotes.author: Storm Jameson

quotes.quote: You can't act on an empty stomach, because you're breathing's all wrong.
quotes.author: Vivien Leigh

quotes.quote: God designed the stomach to eject what is bad for it, but not the human brain.
quotes.author: Konrad Adenauer

quotes.quote: It isn't the head but the stomach that determines the fate of the stockpicker.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: The greatest achievements are those that benefit others
quotes.author: Dennis Waitley

quotes.quote: Write injuries in dust, benefits in marble.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: For dogs we kings should have lions, and for cats, tigers. The great benefits a crown.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to others
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: I have found that among its other benefits, giving liberates the soul of the giver.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: In America the young are always ready to give to those who are older than themselves the full benefits of their inexperience.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: When one side benefits more than the other, that's a win-lose situation. To the winner it might look like success for a while, but in the long run, it breeds resentment and distrust.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Every adversity, every failure, and every heartache, carries with it the seed of an equivalent or greater benefit
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: When every benefit received is a right, there is no place for good manners, let alone for gratitude.
quotes.author: Theodore Dalrymple

quotes.quote: If you put in the work, put in the time, put in the effort, you're going to reap the benefits.
quotes.author: Richard Sherman

quotes.quote: How terrible it is to have wisdom when it does not benefit those who have it.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: A benefit is estimated according to the mind of the giver
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: It is wickedness when you only enjoy the benefit of a country and not contribute to the development of the country.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Time is needed to convert all ideas and added values into the tangible products that benefits the world.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The real destroyer of the liberties of the people is he who spreads among them bounties, donations and benefits.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: I hope that what I am today is of positive benefit to other people
quotes.author: NNEKA

quotes.quote: For every benefit you receive a tax is levied
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Wise men, when in doubt whether to speak or to keep quiet, give themselves the benefit of the doubt, and remain silent.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Nothing will benefit human health and increase the chances for survival of life on Earth as much as the evolution to a vegetarian diet.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Heaven is a wonderful place and the benefits for the believer are out of this world!
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Human benevolence is totally unfair. We don't live in a kind or generous world, yet we are kind and generous.
quotes.author: Rob Sheffield

quotes.quote: Without love, benevolence becomes egotism.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: The highest benevolence acts without purpose.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: General benevolence, but not general friendship, make a man what he ought to be.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Dress yourself in the silks of benevolence because kindness makes you beautiful.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Benevolence does not consist in those who are prosperous pitying and helping those who are not. It consists in fellow feeling that puts you upon actually the same level with the fellow who suffers.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: When virtue is lost, benevolence appears, when benevolence is lost right conduct appears, when right conduct is lost, expedience appears. Expediency is the mere shadow of right and truth; it is the beginning of disorder.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Benevolence is a world of itself a world which mankind, as yet, have hardly begun to explore. We have, as it were, only skirted along its coasts for a few leagues, without penetrating the recesses, or gathering the riches of its vast interior.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: Every fresh act of benevolence is the herald of deeper satisfaction; every charitable act a stepping-stone towards heaven.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: True benevolence or compassion, extends itself through the whole of existence and sympathizes with the distress of every creature capable of sensation.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Benevolence alone will not make a teacher, nor will learning alone do it. The gift of teaching is a peculiar talent, and implies a need and a craving in the teacher himself.
quotes.author: John Jay Chapman

quotes.quote: The hand of benevolence is everywhere stretched out, searching into abuses, righting wrongs, alleviating distresses, and bringing to the knowledge and sympathies of the world the lowly, the oppressed, and the forgotten.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: The person of benevolence never worries.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Benevolence means whatever is good for your Spirit.
quotes.author: Nirmala Srivastava

quotes.quote: Benevolence is the characteristic element of humanity.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Benevolence, like religion, awes even those it cannot win.
quotes.author: Sophia Lee

quotes.quote: Benevolence and feeling ennoble the most trifling actions.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Benevolence is one of the distinguishing characters of man.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: We should be careful that our benevolence does not exceed our means.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Human benevolence is mingled with vanity, interest, or some other motive.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: A benevolent mind, and the face assumes the patterns of benevolence. An evil mind, then an evil face.
quotes.author: Jimmy Sangster

quotes.quote: Much benevolence of the passive order may be traced to a disinclination to inflict pain upon oneself.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: This is woman's great benevolence, that she will become a martyr for beauty, so that the world may have pleasure.
quotes.author: Robert Wilson Lynd

quotes.quote: The benevolence of wrapping the partridge in a vine leaf brings out its quality, just as the barrel of Diogenes brought forth the qualities of the great thinker.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Des Essarts

quotes.quote: Benevolence today has become altogether too huge an undertaking to be conducted otherwise than on business lines.
quotes.author: Julius Rosenwald

quotes.quote: The symptoms of compassion and benevolence, in some people, are like those minute guns which warn you that you are in deadly peril.
quotes.author: Sophie Swetchine

quotes.quote: Benevolence is the twin of pride.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Steadfast benevolence, sustained by the wisdom that anything other than benevolence is painful, protects the mind from all afflictions.
quotes.author: Sylvia Boorstein

quotes.quote: He who nurtures benevolence for all creatures within his heart overcomes all difficulties and will be the recipient of all types of riches at every step.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: Politeness has been well defined as benevolence in small things.
quotes.author: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.quote: Of neighborhoods, benevolence is the most beautiful. How can the man be considered wise who when he had the choice does not settle in benevolence.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Order and reason, beauty and benevolence, are characteristics and conceptions which we find solely associated with the mind of man.
quotes.author: Karl Pearson

quotes.quote: All is for the best in the best of all possible ways.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: All joy... emphasizes our pilgrim status; always reminds, beckons, awakens desire. Our best havings are wantings.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: We are not necessarily doubting that God will do the best for us; we are wondering how painful the best will turn out to be.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The fox has many tricks. The hedgehog has but one. But that is the best of all.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Whether it's the best of times or the worst of times, it's the only time we've got.
quotes.author: Art Buchwald

quotes.quote: Only the mediocre are always at their best.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: Far and away the best prize that life offers is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: The best things in life are often waiting for you at the exit ramp of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: The best revenge is to be unlike the one who performed the injustice.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: To help yourself, you must be yourself. Be the best that you can be. When you make a mistake, learn from it, pick yourself up and move on.
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.quote: Good or bad, everything we do is our best choice at that moment.
quotes.author: William Glasser

quotes.quote: If you want to be the best, you can't take the path of least resistance. Every morning, you wake up, and your mind tells you it's too early, and your body tells you you're a little too sore, but you've got to look deep within yourself and know what you want and what you're striving for.
quotes.author: Antonio Brown

quotes.quote: Always do your best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Doing your best means never stop trying.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The best hearts are ever the bravest.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: My life motto is 'Do my best, so that I can't blame myself for anything.
quotes.author: Magdalena Neuner

quotes.quote: The best people to have power are the ones who don't want it.
quotes.author: Kit Harington

quotes.quote: The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: The action is best that secures the greatest happiness for the greatest number.
quotes.author: Francis Hutcheson

quotes.quote: Best friends make the good times better and the hard times easier.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends are like stars?. You don't always see them, but you know they are always there.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Best friends are the siblings God forgot to give us.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends can turn a horrible day into one of the best days of your life.
quotes.author: Nathanael Richmond

quotes.quote: Best friends are like diamonds, precious and rare. False friends are like leaves, found everywhere.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Best friends don't necessarily have to talk every day. They don't even need to talk for weeks. But when they do, it's like they never stopped talking.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Everyone hears what you say. Friends listen to what you say. Best friends listen to what you don't say.
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: Your best friends are those that bring out the best in you.
quotes.author: John Mason

quotes.quote: Best friends know that you're slow, stupid, and mess around yet they still don't care about being seen with you in public because they know they're idiots, too.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends - the ones you can only be mad at for an hour cause you have important stuff to tell them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Strangers think I'm quiet. My friends think I'm outgoing.My best friends think I'm completely insane.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends are the people in your life who make you laugh louder, smile brighter and live better.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends understand when you say forget it. Wait forever when you say just a minute. Stay when you say leave me alone. And open the door before you can say come in.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I believe in angels, the kind that heaven sends. I'm surrounded by angels, and I call them my best friends.
quotes.author: Pamela Daranjo

quotes.quote: A stranger stabs you in the front;A friend stabs you in the back;A boyfriend stabs you in the heart,But best friends only poke each other with straws.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Friends Are People You Feel Comfortable Around.Best Friends Are People You Can Be Yourself With.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends are the ones who wipe the tears and hold your handwhile everyone else just stands around asking what happened.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Friends are for now, Best friends are forever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends are like diamonds the longer you keep them the more precious they are.
quotes.author: Dawsons Creek

quotes.quote: Best Friends are the people you can do anythingand nothing with and still have the best time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A best friend is someone who makes you laugh even when you think you'll never smile again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends sees the first tear, catches the second, and stops the third.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Friends ask why you're crying. Best friends already have the shovel ready to bury the loser that made you cry.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends are not necessarily the one you've known the longest. It's about who walked into your life and said 'hey, I'm here for you' and then actually proved it
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends: it's a promise, not a label.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Let's swear each with our pinky, We'll be the best of friends, Until we are old and wrinkly!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your best friend is the person who not only knows all the important stories and events in your life, but has lived through them with you. Your best friend isn't the person you call when you are in jail; mostly likely, she is sitting in the cell beside you.
quotes.author: Irene S. Levine

quotes.quote: That was the thing about best friends. Like sisters and mothers, they could piss you off and make you cry and break your heart, but in the end, when the chips were down, they were there, making you laugh even in your darkest hours.
quotes.author: Kristin Hannah

quotes.quote: You can't describe your best friends in words. You can describe them with memories that you had with them.
quotes.author: Saurabh Saini

quotes.quote: Best friends may argue about dumb reasons, but with a long hug, everything gets resolved.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends are the ones who can be the farthest awaybut there the fastest when you call.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: True friends are those who are there for you unconditionally. Never do they question, but always offer support no matter what the circumstances are. Best Friends are the people worth living for.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Friends buy you lunch....best friends eat yours.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends aren't the people that you know can keep your secrets; they are the ones that you know you can forgive when they don't.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends are those that are there when you need them and understanding enough to not be there when you don't.
quotes.author: Savio DSilva.

quotes.quote: Friends help you up when you fall. Best friends laugh and trip you again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friends are those who, when you show up at their door with a dead body,say nothing, grab a shovel, and follow you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Friends are the ones who will consider leaving you when your world is falling apart, but best friends are the ones who will stay with you when your world is falling apart, even if their world might fall apart too.
quotes.author: Talia Cobb

quotes.quote: Best friends are those who treat you kindly behind your back.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My very best friends are those who know without ever being told.
quotes.author: Authine Steinbeck

quotes.quote: The most beautiful discovery best friends can make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A good friend knows all your stories. A best friend helped you write them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Best friend' isn't just a name. A best friend is someone who's there for you, no matter what. You can trust them, with anything and everything. Best friends share tears and laughs, almost like their emotions are intertwined. Most importantly, you can always count on a best friend.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We are best friends. Always remember that if you fall, I will pick you up after I finish laughing.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I think best friends are the ones who have been through what you've been through. They understand where you're coming from and where you're going. It's always a challenge to stick by a friend who's making choices we disagree with and are sometimes even dangerous, but it's at these times that our friends need us most.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your best friends are going to hurt you every once in a while, you must forgive them for that.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Friends are whatever, best friends are forever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A good friend keeps your secrets for you. A best friend helps you keep your own secrets.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: Being soaked alone is cold. Being soaked with your best friend is an adventure.
quotes.author: Emily Wing Smith

quotes.quote: A best friend is like a four leaf clover: hard to find and lucky to have.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If we treated ourselves as well as we treated our best friend, can you imagine?
quotes.author: Meghan Markle

quotes.quote: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
quotes.author: David Tyson

quotes.quote: A single rose can be my garden… a single friend, my world.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: It’s not that diamonds are a girl’s best friend, but it’s your best friends who are your diamonds.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.quote: The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: When you're in jail, a good friend will be trying to bail you out. A best friend will be in the cell next to you saying, 'Damn, that was fun'.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Best friend, my well-spring in the wilderness!
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Best Friends: we're a parade - even by ourselves!
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: It's like being in love, discovering your best friend.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wein

quotes.quote: It is absolutely okay with me if you need to keep some secrets. I've been thinking about this and I decided that a best friend is someone who, when they don't understand, they still understand.
quotes.author: Nancy Werlin

quotes.quote: Give me one friend, just one, who meets the needs of all my varying moods.
quotes.author: Esther M. Clark

quotes.quote: There is one friend in the life of each of us who seems not a separate person, however dear and beloved, but an expansion, an interpretation, of one's self, the very meaning of one's soul.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: One friend with whom you have a lot in common is better than three with whom you struggle to find things to talk about. We never needed best friend gear because I guess with real friends you don't have to make it official. It just is.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.quote: Your best friend can send your spirits soaring one moment and crush you with a word or gesture the next.
quotes.author: Colette McBeth

quotes.quote: Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: The biggest ingredient in a best friend is someone whose actions you respect and who you can truly be yourself around.
quotes.author: Reneed Olstead

quotes.quote: When you meet your best friend in real life, or you meet your soulmate, you just know it, and you feel it.
quotes.author: Lili Reinhart

quotes.quote: When a man's best friend is his dog, that dog has a problem.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: I am ever my own best friend.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: There is no man so friendless but what he can find a friend sincere enough to tell him disagreeable truths.
quotes.author: Edward George Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Friendship is one mind in two bodies.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: In the misfortune of our best friends, we always find something which is not displeasing to us.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: My best friend is the man who'll get me a book I ain't read.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Outside of a dog, a book is man’s best friend. Inside of a dog it’s too dark to read.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: When women take care of their health, they become their best friend.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: You are your own best friend... love and accept yourself unconditionally.
quotes.author: Amanda Ray

quotes.quote: Old friends / Are the best friends / All my old friends / Are my best friends.
quotes.author: Eric Baker and Janice Johnson

quotes.quote: I don't know what I'd ever do without you / From the beginning to the end / You've always been here right beside me / So, I'll call you my best friend / Through the good times and the bad ones / Whether I lose or if I win / I know one thing that never changes, and / That's you as my best friend.
quotes.author: Glenn A McKinney and Edward Crouch Keith

quotes.quote: I know we've had some hard times, I know we've had some tears, but we've also had some good times and laughter over the years.
quotes.author: Audrey Newell

quotes.quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Keep your best wishes and your biggest goals close to your heart and dedicate time to them every day. If you truly care about what you do and you work diligently at it, there's almost nothing you cant accomplish.
quotes.author: Melchor Lim

quotes.quote: As we grow older together, As we continue to change with age, There is one thing that will never change. I will always keep falling in love with you.
quotes.author: Karen Clodfelder

quotes.quote: Best wishes for a great marathon. Be sure to savor it. The first marathon is something special. Run long and healthy.
quotes.author: Amby Burfoot

quotes.quote: Keep your best wishes, close to your heart and watch what happens.
quotes.author: Tony DeLiso

quotes.quote: Luck is yours wishes are mine Let's ur future be always shine. Best of Luck.
quotes.author: Ralph Chaplin

quotes.quote: I am glad to here that you are starting your own business after the excellent work experience. My Good Wishes are always with you..
quotes.author: Ralph Chaplin

quotes.quote: Best wishes to you as you progress from one stage in life to another. While this can be a difficult time, the results that you will achieve are worth all of the hard work that you will put in!
quotes.author: Rajesh Mankar

quotes.quote: Here is the best wish for the new year: Let there be more freedom of thought throughout the world! Fields need rain; truths need freedom of thought!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A little smile, a word of cheer, A bit of love from someone near, A little gift from one held dear, Best wishes for the coming year. These make a merry christmas!
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: To accomplish great things, We must not only act, But also dream, Not only plan but also believe, Best wishes for your exam.
quotes.author: Ralph Chaplin

quotes.quote: A birthday wish you should make, when you blow out the candles on your cake, but this special year that I've known you, I'd like to make 'my' wish come true. That friends we are now will continue for ever, as the girl I know now might be my best friend forever.
quotes.author: Leanne Davis

quotes.quote: Best wishes to you on your birthday may the day be filled with happiness, a day that's so special for you and memories you will cherish.
quotes.author: Susan Smith

quotes.quote: I wish I had it in my power to furnish you with accommodation I should feel proud to do it, shall be happy to hear from you at anytime when you engagements will allow you an hour and remain with best wishes for yourself, family and circuit.
quotes.author: John Hawley

quotes.quote: My anxious recollections, my sympathetic feeling, and my best wishes are irresistibly excited whensoever, in any country, I see an oppressed nation unfurl the banners of freedom.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: I wish you for all your dreams of tomorrow i wish your having faith they all come true. i wish you all these things—but rememberSometimes wishes and dreams are all up to you!
quotes.author: Ralph Chaplin

quotes.quote: Best wishes on your new endeavor.
quotes.author: Jim Kraus

quotes.quote: Best wishes for a happy and successful year ahead.
quotes.author: Lisa Solomon

quotes.quote: Keep your best wishes, close to your heart and watch what happens.
quotes.author: Tony DeLiso

quotes.quote: Best wishes for the future.
quotes.author: The Avengers

quotes.quote: Don't forget to give her best wishes from me. This life is a complicated business.
quotes.author: The Fratellis

quotes.quote: I'm sending you my best wishes. Consider me your best friend.
quotes.author: Ray Price

quotes.quote: Now you're sending me your best wishes.Tied with love and vicious kisses.
quotes.author: Elvis Costello

quotes.quote: Take back all best wishes, did I hear you say.
quotes.author: John Hiatt

quotes.quote: The best wishes on both ends.
quotes.author: The New Pornographers

quotes.quote: They only want the best wishes for me
quotes.author: Fall Out Boy

quotes.quote: Best wishes darlin', the best of everything to you.
quotes.author: Lonnie Johnson

quotes.quote: I gave my best wishes what more could I say that night will be cherished in my memory.
quotes.author: Webb Pierce

quotes.quote: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Everyone suffers at least one bad betrayal in their lifetime. It's what unites us. The trick is not to let it destroy your trust in others when that happens. Don't let them take that from you.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: Every betrayal contains a perfect moment, a coin stamped heads or tails with salvation on the other side.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: All a man can betray is his conscience.
