quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Trust is not established in the absence of betrayal, but in those whose betrayals least.
quotes.author: Wes Fessler

quotes.quote: We have to distrust each other. It is our only defense against betrayal.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: All trust involves vulnerability and risk, and nothing would count as trust if there were no possibility of betrayal.
quotes.author: Robert C. Solomon

quotes.quote: Mind what people do, not only what they say, for deeds will betray a lie.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: There is no greater blessing than a family hand that lifts you from a fall; but there is not lower curse than a family hand that strikes you when you're down.
quotes.author: Wes Fessler

quotes.quote: There is always a lesson of a lifetime to learn in every betrayal.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: All our experience with history should teach us, when we look back, how badly human wisdom is betrayed when it relies on itself.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Be cautious of who is holding your quarters because as soon as they get four quarters they will change them for a dollar.
quotes.author: Alexis A. Davis

quotes.quote: He that has eyes to see and ears to hear may convince himself that no mortal can keep a secret. If his lips are silent, he chatters with his fingertips; betrayal oozes out of him at every pore.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: There are three signs of a hypocrite: when he speaks he speaks lies, when he makes a promise he breaks it, and when he is trusted he betrays his trust.
quotes.author: Muhammad

quotes.quote: It's particularly hard to take being stabbed in the back close to home. There's always a feeling of betrayal when people of your own group oppose you.
quotes.author: Catharine MacKinnon

quotes.quote: It was a mistake, you said. But the cruel thing was, it felt like the mistake was mine, for trusting you.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: He who throws away a friend is as bad as he who throws away his life.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Pleasure which must be enjoyed at the expense of another's pain, can never be such as a worthy mind can fully delight in.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: You can't betray yourself too often, or you become somebody else.
quotes.author: Ed Harris

quotes.quote: There is nothing in which people more betray their character than in what they laugh at.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Anyone who hasn't experienced the ecstasy of betrayal knows nothing about ecstasy at all.
quotes.author: Jean Genet

quotes.quote: False friends are like our shadow, keeping close to us while we walk in the sunshine, but leaving us when we cross into the shade.
quotes.author: Christian Nevell Bovee

quotes.quote: Grow a thick skin - a very thick skin. And watch your back. For every back, there is a knife.
quotes.author: Lily Chatterjee

quotes.quote: The thorn from the bush one has planted, nourished and pruned pricks more deeply and draws more blood.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: To love without criticism is to be betrayed.
quotes.author: Djuna Barnes

quotes.quote: He who advises you to be reserved to your friends wishes to betray you without witnesses.
quotes.author: Don J. Manuel

quotes.quote: A fraudulent intent, however carefully concealed at the outset, will generally, in the end, betray itself.
quotes.author: Titus Livius

quotes.quote: One should rather die than be betrayed. There is no deceit in death. It delivers precisely what it has promised. Betrayal, though ... betrayal is the willful slaughter of hope.
quotes.author: Steven Deitz

quotes.quote: For there to be betrayal, there would have to have been trust first.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: Betrayal is about learning not to idealize external sources.
quotes.author: Linda Talley

quotes.quote: Betrayal can only happen if you love.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: Betrayal does that betrays the betrayer.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Betrayal is the only truth that sticks.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: You know that you have been stabbed when you feel the deep pain of betrayal.
quotes.author: Les Parrott

quotes.quote: The betrayal of trust carries a heavy taboo.
quotes.author: Aldrich Ames

quotes.quote: When you betray somebody else, you also betray yourself.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: Trust can take years to build, but only a second to break.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes blood isn't thicker than water and family will cross you quicker than strangers.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't saw off the branch you're sitting on.
quotes.author: Swedish Proverbs

quotes.quote: Don't bite the hand that feeds you.
quotes.author: English Proverbs

quotes.quote: Backstabbers specialize in saying the wrong thing at the wrong time to the wrong person.
quotes.author: Les Parrott

quotes.quote: Just because they say they're praying for you in your face, doesn't mean they aren't laughing at your struggle behind your back.
quotes.author: Trent Shelton

quotes.quote: Dealing with backstabbers, there was one thing I learned. They're only powerful when you got your back turned.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: It's not just about who's being real to your face, but also about who's being real behind your back.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To betray, you must first belong.
quotes.author: Kim Philby

quotes.quote: Only trust thyself, and another shall not betray thee.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: When someone breaks your trust don't feel stupid for trusting them. You didn't do anything wrong they're just an untrustworthy person.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: In life you can easily trust someone, but once the trust is broken its very difficult to trust anyone again.
quotes.author: Sushan Sharma

quotes.quote: It's a shame that the very people who you protect are the first ones to turn there backs on you.
quotes.author: Autumn Kohler

quotes.quote: And all men kill the thing they love, By all let this be heard Some do it with a bitter look Some with a flattering word The coward does it with a kiss, The brave man with a sword.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Betray a friend and you’ll often find you have ruined yourself.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Betrayal can be extremely painful, but it’s up to you how much that pain damages you permanently.
quotes.author: Emily V. Gordon

quotes.quote: Betrayal is my favorite subject.
quotes.author: Norman Jewison

quotes.quote: Betrayal is one of my biggest fears. Betrayal happens on many different levels all the time, and there is no worse feeling than realizing someone you thought you could trust has gone against you.
quotes.author: Katie Lee

quotes.quote: Confession is not betrayal. What you say or do doesn’t matter; only feelings matter. If they could make me stop loving you-that would be the real betrayal.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Do you believe a man can truly love a woman and constantly betray her? Never mind physically but betray her in his mind, in the very “poetry of his soul”. Well, it’s not easy but men do it all the time.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: Don’t fear the enemy that attacks you, but the fake friend that hugs you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don’t waste words on people who deserve your silence. Sometimes the most powerful thing you can say is nothing at all.
quotes.author: Alex E Kheyson

quotes.quote: I’m not upset that you lied to me, I’m upset that from now on I can’t believe you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Even as your body betrays you, your mind denies it.
quotes.author: Sara Gruen

quotes.quote: Even loss and betrayal can bring us awakening.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Even my closest friend whom I trusted, the one who ate my bread, has lifted his heel against me.
quotes.author: Psalm 41:9

quotes.quote: For me, I always wonder what’s worse: an emotional betrayal or a physical betrayal? That’s a really tough call.
quotes.author: Hilarie Burton

quotes.quote: He, who had done more than any human being to draw her out of the caves of her secret, folded life, now threw her down into deeper recesses of fear and doubt. The fall was greater than she had ever known, because she had ventured so far into emotion and had abandoned herself to it.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: I am crying because of you; you’re not worth it. I’m crying because my delusion of who you were was shattered by the truth of who you are.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: I believe that there is something drastically wrong with one's character if opportunity controls your loyalty.
quotes.author: Bhaavna Arora

quotes.quote: I have never known a more vulgar expression of betrayal and deceit.
quotes.author: Lucien Bouchard

quotes.quote: I used to advertise my loyalty and I don’t believe there is a single person I loved that I didn’t eventually betray.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: I’m not really sure why. But… do you stop loving someone just because they betray you? I don’t think so. That’s what makes the betrayal hurt so much – pain, frustration, anger… and I still loved her. I still do.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: If you spend your time hoping someone will suffer the consequences for what they did to your heart, then you’re allowing them to hurt you a second time in your mind.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Is it possible to succeed without any act of betrayal?
quotes.author: Jean Renoir

quotes.quote: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It's better to have an enemy who honestly says they hate you than to have a friend who's putting you down secretly.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It’s hard to tell who has your back from who has it long enough just to stab you in it.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love is understood, in a historical way, as one of the great human vocations – but its counter-spell has always been infidelity. This terrible, terrible betrayal that can tear apart not only another person, not only oneself, but whole families.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: My relatives stay far away, and my friends have turned against me. My family is gone, and my close friends have forgotten me.
quotes.author: Job 19:13-14

quotes.quote: Naturally, when one makes progressive steps, there may be some who see it as a betrayal of their goals and interests.
quotes.author: Louis Farrakhan

quotes.quote: People are always fascinated by infidelity because, in the end – whether we’ve had direct experience or not – there’s part of you that knows there’s absolutely no more piercing betrayal. People are undone by it.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Some of the most poisonous people come disguised as friends.
quotes.author: M.G. Crisci

quotes.quote: Sometimes the people closest to you betray you, and your home isn’t a place you can be happy anymore.
quotes.author: Kristin Cast

quotes.quote: Sometimes you don’t need to hear their excuses or what they have to say for themselves because their actions already spoke the truth.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: Mineko Iwasaki

quotes.quote: The fear really hits you. That’s what you feel first. And then it’s the anger and frustration. Part of the problem is how little we understand about the ultimate betrayal of the body when it rebels against itself.
quotes.author: Charles Bronson

quotes.quote: The male, for all his bravado and exploration, is the loyal one, the one who generally feels love. The female is skilled at betrayal and torture and damnation.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: The problem is that everywhere the gas drilling industry goes, a trail of water contamination, air pollution, health concerns and betrayal of basic American civic and community values follows.
quotes.author: Josh Fox

quotes.quote: The saddest thing about betrayal is that it never comes from your enemies; it always comes from those you trust.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are only really a few stories to tell in the end, and betrayal and the failure of love is one of those good stories to tell.
quotes.author: Sean Lennon

quotes.quote: They can betray me, but I choose not to be betray my peace of mind.
quotes.author: Dodinsky

quotes.quote: To me, the thing that is worse than death is betrayal. You see, I could conceive death, but I could not conceive betrayal.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Touch. It is touch that is the deadliest enemy of chastity, loyalty, monogamy, gentility with its codes and conventions and restraints. By touch we are betrayed and betray others … an accidental brushing of shoulders or touching of hands … hands laid on shoulders in a gesture of comfort that lies like a thief, that took, not gave, that wanted, not offered, that awoke, not pacified. When one flesh is waiting, there is electricity in the merest contact.
quotes.author: Wallace Stegner

quotes.quote: Tragedy in life normally comes with betrayal and compromise, and trading on your integrity and not having dignity in life. That’s really where failure comes.
quotes.author: Tom Cochrane

quotes.quote: We met less than a week ago and in that time I’ve done nothing but lie and cheat and betray you. I know. But if you give me a chance…all I want is to protect you. To be near you. For as long as I’m able.
quotes.author: Marissa Meyer

quotes.quote: We’re not friends, we’re not enemies, we’re just strangers with some shared memories.
quotes.author: Akshita Nagloor

quotes.quote: When no one you know tells the truth, you learn to see under the surface.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: When you’re out of sight for as long as I was, there’s a funny feeling of betrayal that comes over people when they see you again.
quotes.author: Esther Williams

quotes.quote: You are going to break your promise. I understand. And I hold my hands over the ears of my heart, so that I will not hate you.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: You want to believe that there’s one relationship in life that’s beyond betrayal. A relationship that’s beyond that kind of hurt. And there isn’t.
quotes.author: Caleb Carr

quotes.quote: Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It's better to be healthy alone than sick with someone else.
quotes.author: Phil Mcgraw

quotes.quote: Hope is important because it can make the present moment less difficult to bear. If we believe that tomorrow will be better, we can bear a hardship today.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone - so far.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The power for creating a better future is contained in the present moment: You create a good future by creating a good present.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Perhaps it is better to be irresponsible and right, than to be responsible and wrong.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You can't have a better tomorrow if you are thinking about yesterday all the time.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: It's a never ending battle of making your cars better and also trying to be better yourself.
quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.quote: You have to be able to accept failure to get better.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.quote: Be yourself, but always your better self.
quotes.author: Karl G. Maeser

quotes.quote: Silence is better than unmeaning words.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: It's better to look ahead and prepare, than to look back and regret.
quotes.author: Jackie Joynerkersee

quotes.quote: Always render more and better service than is expected of you, no matter what your task may be.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius, and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Be kind, don't judge, and have respect for others. If we can all do this, the world would be a better place. The point is to teach this to the next generation.
quotes.author: Jasmine Guinness

quotes.quote: It is nice to have valid competition; it pushes you to do better.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past, â€” so good night!
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: It is better to be alone than in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Positive Anything Is Better Than Negative Nothing.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.quote: Life is too short to worry about anything. You had better enjoy it because the next day promises nothing.
quotes.author: Eric Davis

quotes.quote: Leadership is a privilege to better the lives of others. It is not an opportunity to satisfy personal greed.
quotes.author: Mwai Kibaki

quotes.quote: I think that's the single best piece of advice: constantly think about how you could be doing things better and questioning yourself.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: It is better to be feared than loved, if you cannot be both.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It's about being better than you used to be.
quotes.author: Brett Hoebel

quotes.quote: Without change there is no innovation, creativity, or incentive for improvement. Those who initiate change will have a better opportunity to manage the change that is inevitable.
quotes.author: William Pollard

quotes.quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Don't gain the world and lose your soul; Wisdom is better than silver and gold.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than a hundred teaching it.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: Everyone looks so much better when they smile.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: We have always held to the hope, the belief, the conviction that there is a better life, a better world, beyond the horizon.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You don't get older, you get better.
quotes.author: Shirley Bassey

quotes.quote: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It is better to keep your mouth closed and let people think you are a fool than to open it and remove all doubt.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It's better to be a lion for a day than a sheep all your life.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kenny

quotes.quote: Well done is better than well said.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Better to fight for something than live for nothing.
quotes.author: George Smith Patton

quotes.quote: It is better to light a candle than curse the darkness.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: For every good reason there is to lie, there is a better reason to tell the truth.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts the better will be his world and the world at large.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The secret to success is good leadership, and good leadership is all about making the lives of your team members or workers better.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You'd better not know so much than know so many things that ain't so.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Seeing it once is better than being told one hundred times.
quotes.author: Zhou Chongguo

quotes.quote: Strong and wrong beats weak and right.
quotes.author: Edward Abott Parry

quotes.quote: Some things are better left undone.
quotes.author: Florence Burlingame

quotes.quote: Better to cheat than repeat.
quotes.author: Frances M. Briggs

quotes.quote: Better a big fish in a little pond than a little fish in a big pond.
quotes.author: New York Times

quotes.quote: Half a fish is better than none.
quotes.author: Philip Geen

quotes.quote: It is better to be pissed off than pissed on.
quotes.author: John Wood

quotes.quote: Better to die by blows than by jealousy fade away. Better to love a dog than a thankless woman, for a dog is grateful when he is fed.
quotes.author: New Mexico

quotes.quote: You can change all things for the better when you change yourself for the better.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: No one can know better than the person himself or herself when it hurts most and what relief is needed.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: People and things can change for the better.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: I wanna get better and stay there / Forever and forever / Like when I hear your voice / My heart rejoices / I wanna get better forever and stay there.
quotes.author: Amanda Lena Owens

quotes.quote: Better treat people with / Some respect / Because if I don't do that / I will lose all my friends.
quotes.author: Aldo Kraas

quotes.quote: As long as you keep going, you'll keep getting better. And as you get better, you gain more confidence. That alone is a success.
quotes.author: Tamara Taylor

quotes.quote: The smallest deed is better than the greatest intention.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: I think that anybody that smiles automatically looks better.
quotes.author: Diane Lane

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is better to lose and do the right thing than to win and do the wrong thing.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: Better never means better for everyone... It always means worse, for some.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: You're better than this. Better than whatever it is you're going to do now.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: There are better people in the world, do not let the worst do the worst to you, you deserve the best in life.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: To do better is better than to be perfect.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: If you want to see a better world, change the lens through which you see it and do the work to make it better.
quotes.author: Jeffrey G. Duarte

quotes.quote: When you get real within, you will realize who you are better without.
quotes.author: Christine E. Szymanski

quotes.quote: We have to make this world change for the better.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: You're going to use experiences to become either bitter or better. To get better you must reflect on your mistakes.
quotes.author: Patrick Bet-David

quotes.quote: Sometimes in a process of becoming better, you lose what makes you special.
quotes.author: Sarvesh Jain

quotes.quote: Every situation in life is temporary so, when life is good, make sure you enjoy and receive it fully. And when life isn't so good, remember that I will not last forever and better days are on the way.
quotes.author: Jenni Young

quotes.quote: The good old days were never that good, believe me. The good new days are today, and better days are coming tomorrow. Our greatest songs are still unsung.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: As you wait for better days, don't forget to enjoy today, in case they've already started.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Have faith in tomorrow, for it can bring better days. Never wish for yesterday, for it has gone its separate ways. Believe in today, for it's what you're living now.
quotes.author: Tonya K. Grant

quotes.quote: Only he who has seen better days and lives to see better days again knows their full value.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Always remember that better days are ahead if not in this life, in the next.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: Pause and remember nothing lasts forever. Better days are coming, but they will come faster with faith
quotes.author: Jennifer Young

quotes.quote: The very second you begin to doubt is the minute you lose sight of your outcome. Even in our darkest hour, will we find better days. Don't let the years pass, reflecting the light that becomes your shadow.
quotes.author: Richard Tovish

quotes.quote: Don't ever lose hope because better days will come.
quotes.author: Ana Monnar

quotes.quote: If you were a quitter you would have given up on life a long time ago. The fact that you're still here proves that you're a fighter with hopes of better days.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Better days are coming, I wish that they could bare with me. So all the blessings that I get, they can share it with me.
quotes.author: Gudda Gudda

quotes.quote: I do the very best I can to look upon life with optimism and hope and looking forward to a better day.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: Remember you will not always win. Some days, the most resourceful individual will taste defeat. But there is, in this case, always tomorrow after you have done your best to achieve success today.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: I am tomorrow, or some future day, what I establish today. I am today what I established yesterday or some previous day.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: Every day is different, and some days are better than others, but no matter how challenging the day, I get up and live it.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Buying flowers is not just a way to bring home beauty. It's an expression of confidence that better days are coming. It's a defiant finger in the face of those naysayers who would have you believe your fortunes will never improve.
quotes.author: Pearl Cleage

quotes.quote: Never give up believing that there is hope for better days to come. Bad things happen for a reason and sometimes it is to bring us to those better days.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Recognize that on certain days the greatest grace is that the day is over and you get to close your eyes. Tomorrow comes more brightly.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is no place to place your better days.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.quote: If you wish to live to see better days, then you must endure the bad days.
quotes.author: Isaiah Harden

quotes.quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: When you change, everything will change for you.When you get better, everything will get better for you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: All right, every day ain't going to be the best day of your life, don't worry about that. If you stick to it you hold the possibility open that you will have better days.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: The world awakens on the run and will soon be earning with hopes of better days to come It's a morning yearning.
quotes.author: Ben Harper

quotes.quote: Never give up. Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.quote: Blessed be the slot players for theirs is the hope of a better day dawning.
quotes.author: Frank Scoblete

quotes.quote: I close my eyes and I can see a better day. I close my eyes and pray.
quotes.author: Justin Bieber

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: Everyday is a good day, just some days are better.
quotes.author: Farrah Fawcett

quotes.quote: There is no better day than today to do the things you've been putting off. Take action; it's the only way to change your life!
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: Bad days always promise a better day tomorrow.
quotes.author: Arieana E.

quotes.quote: If ever you have looked on better days; / If ever been where bells have knolled to church; / If ever sat at any good man's feast; / If ever from your eyelids ever wiped a tear, / And know what 'tis to pity and be pitied, / Let gentleness my strong enforcement be.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I feel the best is past.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: We have seen the best of our time.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Green be the turf above thee, / Friend of my better days! / None knew thee but to love thee. / Nor named thee but to praise.
quotes.author: Fitz-Greene Halleck

quotes.quote: A brave world, sir, full of religion, knavery, and change: we shall shortly see better days.
quotes.author: Aphra Behn

quotes.quote: Ninety nine percent of the time we have an opportunity to be grateful for something. We just don't notice it. We go through our days in a daze.
quotes.author: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.quote: I can only note that the past is beautiful because one never realizes an emotion at the time. It expands later, and thud we don't have complete emotions about the present, only about the past.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: The happiest moments of my life have been the few which I have passed at at home in the bosom of my family.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The times you lived through, the people you shared those times with—nothing brings it all to life like an old mix tape. It does a better job of storing up memories than actual brain tissue can do. Every mixtape tells a story. Put them together and they can add up to the story of a life.
quotes.author: Rob Sheffield

quotes.quote: The trick is to enjoy life. Don't wish away your days, hoping for better ones ahead. The grand and the simple. They are equally wonderful.
quotes.author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quotes.quote: And I learned what is obvious to a child. That life is simply a collection of little lives, each lived one day at a time. That each day should be spent finding beauty in flowers and poetry and talking to animals. That a day spent with dreaming and sunsets and refreshing breezes cannot be bettered.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could; some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day; you shall begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: remember me in better days like these / in the turning of the leaves / in Idaho we can learn from years ago / nestled in the faint of the wire.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: Now they are gone, gone as thy setting blaze / Goes down the west, while night is pressing on, / And with them the old tale of better days, / And trophies of remembered power, are gone. / Yon field that gives the harvest, where the plough / Strikes the white bone, is all that tells their story now.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: With oar-strokes timing to their song, / They weave in simple lays / The pathos of remembered wrong, / The hope of better days.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: It is not revolutions and upheavals / That clear the road to new and better days, / But revelations, lavishness and torments / Of someone's soul, inspired and ablaze.
quotes.author: Boris Paternak

quotes.quote: Seek for better days amidst the grave gotta be brave / These are the days when anything goes yet it's coming down to the wire / Going to take you higher.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: Some days are better than others. The same can be said about people.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: There are more glorious days ahead, this should be your joy for today.
quotes.author: Laila Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: It was a pretty good day, I think we are just probably slightly ahead.
quotes.author: Shane Warne

quotes.quote: I'm just a dreamer / I dream my life away / i'm just a dreamer / Who dreams of better days.
quotes.author: Ozzy Osbourne

quotes.quote: If you are alive, there is hope for a better day and something good to happen. If there is nothing good left in the destiny of a person, he or she will die.
quotes.author: Ishmael

quotes.quote: A finished product is one that has already seen its better days.
quotes.author: Art Linkletter

quotes.quote: I myself often wished to be spared the expectations of better days ahead or such.
quotes.author: Daniel Woodrell

quotes.quote: Don't ever lose hope because better days are coming.
quotes.author: Anna Monar

quotes.quote: Everyday is a good day, just some days are better.
quotes.author: Farah Fawcett

quotes.quote: Accepting reality yet hoping for great days to come is a necessity to keep on going forward and believing in You...
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: The old days were the old days. And they were great days. But now is now.
quotes.author: Don Rickles

quotes.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Sometimes life is too hard to be alone, and sometimes life is too good to be alone.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: One of the greatest regrets in life is being what others would want you to be, rather than being yourself.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: He succeeded in being considered totally uninteresting. People left him alone. And that was all he wanted.
quotes.author: Patrick Süskind

quotes.quote: Better be alone than in bad company.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: There is a certain strength in being alone.
quotes.author: Heather Duffy Stone

quotes.quote: Every time my dreams threaten to become reality, something always happens and I end up alone.
quotes.author: Jane Green

quotes.quote: Sometimes you need to sit lonely on the floor in a quiet room in order to hear your own voice and not let it drown in the noise of others.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: Everybody is a stranger, but that's the danger in going my own way.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: I'd never chosen to be alone, but that was the way things had turned out, and I'd grown used to it.
quotes.author: Sebastian Faulks

quotes.quote: Always remember that you were once alone, and the crowd you see in your life today are just as unecessary as when you were alone.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The things one experiences alone with oneself are very much stronger and purer.
quotes.author: Eugene Delacroix

quotes.quote: When they are alone they want to be with others, and when they are with others they want to be alone. After all, human beings are like that.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: If you wanted to do something absolutely honest, something true, it always turned out to be a thing that had to be done alone.
quotes.author: Richard Yates

quotes.quote: People drain me, even the closest of friends, and I find loneliness to be the best state in the union to live in.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: No matter how lonely you get or how many birth announcements you receive, the trick is not to get frightened. There's nothing wrong with being alone.
quotes.author: Wendy Wasserstein

quotes.quote: That was the thing about being alone, in theory or in principle. Whatever happened-good, bad, or anywhere in between-it was always, if nothing else, all your own.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Being alone onstage is like legalized insanity.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Loneliness is never more cruel than when it is felt in close propinquity with someone who has ceased to communicate.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: Life is too precious to waste it with the wrong person. You're better off alone until the right one comes along.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.quote: One's better off alone, and yet there are so many things that are impossible to fathom on one's own. In fact it's a terrible business and the task is a hard one.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: The world is my oyster. The road is my home. And I know that I'm better off Alone.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: If people let other people alone, people would be better off. It's always people that screw things up for people anyway.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.quote: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone, and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom, for it is only when he is alone that he is really free.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: It is good to be alone, for solitude is difficult; that something is difficult should be one more reason to do it.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Separate we come, and separate we go, And this be it known, is all that we know.
quotes.author: Conrad Aiken

quotes.quote: Being alone is scary, but not as scary as feeling alone in a relationship.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: We are born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Everything in-between is a gift.
quotes.author: Yul Brynner

quotes.quote: The man who goes alone can start today; but he who travels with another must wait till that other is ready.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Being alone can be good. It's easy to find peace alone. But sometimes, being alone is a king of death.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: I live in that solitude which is painful in youth, but delicious in the years of maturity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Women would be better off when they no longer needed men more than they needed their own independent identities ... How long a time it took me after my divorce to understand that being alone is not the same as being lonely.
quotes.author: Alice Steinbach

quotes.quote: Solitude is such a potential thing. We hear voices in solitude, we never hear in the hurry and turmoil of life we receive counsels and comforts, we get under no other condition.
quotes.author: Amelia Barr

quotes.quote: The best remedy for those who are afraid, lonely or unhappy is to go outside, somewhere where they can be quiet, alone with the heavens, nature and God. Because only then does one feel that all is as it should be.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: All alone! Whether you like it or not, alone is something you'll be quite a lot!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The loneliest moment in someone’s life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Associate with men of good quality if you esteem your own reputation; for it is better to be alone than in bad company
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: If you are afraid of being lonely, don't try to be right.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: I felt a lot better; not being alone in being alone.
quotes.author: K.R. Albers

quotes.quote: Being alone & actually sitting with our own thoughts can lead to such growth and realizations that are rare in our everyday busy lives.
quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

quotes.quote: I just think that sometimes it is less hard to wake up feeling lonely when you are alone than to wake up feeling lonely when you are with someone else. Some people would be better off alone, but they feel they've got to get hold of someone to prove they're worthwhile.
quotes.author: Liv Ullmann

quotes.quote: There is pleasure in the pathless woods, there is rapture in the lonely shore, there is society where none intrudes, by the deep sea, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less, but Nature more.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Maybe she'll fight better this way. Nothing motivates you like being alone and cornered on the streets.
quotes.author: Marie Lu

quotes.quote: We allow our ignorance to prevail upon us and make us think we can survive alone, alone in patches, alone in groups, alone in races, even alone in genders.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Trust me on this no one is better off alone.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Better, Cilla thought, to be alone on a quiet night than to be alone in a crowd. Much better.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: Loneliness expresses the pain of being alone and solitude expresses the glory of being alone.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: The person who tries to live alone will not succeed as a human being. His heart withers if it does not answer another heart. His mind shrinks away if he hears only the echoes of his own thoughts and finds no other inspiration.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Being alone is better than sitting next to a lover and feeling lonely.
quotes.author: Richard Linklater

quotes.quote: I used to think the worst thing in life was to end up all alone. It's not. The worst thing in life is to end up with people who make you feel all alone.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: I don't need anyone to rectify my existence. The most profound relationship we will ever have is the one with ourselves.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: She began to wonder whether she would not do better to finish her life alone. What was left of life seemed unimportant.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: It makes one a better person to have had hardships and to have overcome hardships and not to blame anybody else for your mistakes.
quotes.author: Maureen Forrester

quotes.quote: If I want to be a better person for whoever is in my life, I have to learn.
quotes.author: Paul Gascoigne

quotes.quote: If you're going to become a better person, do it in high school.
quotes.author: Camila Mendes

quotes.quote: When you take care of yourself, you're a better person for others. When you feel good about yourself, you treat others better.
quotes.author: Solange Knowles

quotes.quote: I am a better person when I let myself have the time for romance and for love.
quotes.author: Diane Kruger

quotes.quote: It is less about becoming a better person, and more of being better, as a person.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: To be a better person, spend less time filling out your personal scorecard and more time being kind . . . to you.
quotes.author: Philip Chard

quotes.quote: If you are not a better person tomorrow than you are today, what need have you for a tomorrow?
quotes.author: Nachman of Breslov

quotes.quote: Every one of us strives to be a better person; and if I am to contribute one thing of myself, it would be compassion.
quotes.author: Masiela Lusha

quotes.quote: Become a better person and be sure to know who you are, before meeting someone new and hoping that person knows who you are
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: I want to be a better person in every aspect. I really don't feel I've in anyway fulfilled my potential in every area of my life. But I'm optimistic.
quotes.author: Damon Albarn

quotes.quote: He who stops being better stops being good.
quotes.author: Oliver Cromwell

quotes.quote: Courage make you strong, to become better person Show kind feelings to others.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: I feel like I'm a better person when I'm quieter.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: As soon as a person starts thinking, 'I want to be a better person,' that is the start of Yoga.
quotes.author: Baba Hari Dass

quotes.quote: I want to be a better person. I want to be a stronger person. I want to be someone who hurts less.
quotes.author: Brian Molko

quotes.quote: I feel like I'm a much better person when I'm developing my imagination and my innocence and my vulnerability. I like that version of me better than the version where I'm just working on my analytical mind.
quotes.author: Brit Marling

quotes.quote: I always hope to be a better person tomorrow than today.
quotes.author: Mahershala Ali

quotes.quote: It's certainly not wrong to want to be a better person. God gave us that desire.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: I am a better person when I have less on my plate.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Every job is an opportunity to be a better person.
quotes.author: Benjamin Walker

quotes.quote: You shouldn't just work on your jump shot. You should work on being a better person, a better teammate, and a better friend.
quotes.author: Sue Wicks

quotes.quote: I have an unending desire to be better and make myself a better person, better mother.
quotes.author: Tanya Tucker

quotes.quote: One emerges as a better person after going through the wringer.
quotes.author: S. Sreesanth

quotes.quote: I've done a lot of self-improvement. I'm always working on being a better person.
quotes.author: Joel Madden

quotes.quote: He's a better person when she's around, and isn't that what friends are for, to raise you up and keep you at your best?
quotes.author: David Nicholls

quotes.quote: It makes you a better person to know where you came from, because whereever you go, there is somebody in some town, city, hamlet, whatever, that has the same dreams you have.
quotes.author: Jamie Farr

quotes.quote: I'm a better person now, and not only that - I'm a better man
quotes.author: Paul Gascoigne

quotes.quote: I think I may be a better person for having given serious time and thought and effort to gardening.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.quote: It's not about money or connectionsâ€”it's the willingness to out work and outlearn everyone...And if it fails, you learn from what happened and do a better job next time.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: Without pain, there would be no suffering, without suffering we would never learn from our mistakes. To make it right, pain and suffering is the key to all windows, without it, there is no way of life.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Become addicted to constant and never-ending self-improvement.
quotes.author: Anthony J. DeAngelo

quotes.quote: You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Hope is a waking dream.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: If you always do what you've always done, you'll always be where you've always been.
quotes.author: T.D. Jakes

quotes.quote: We all need people who will give us feedback. That's how we improve.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: A proud man is always looking down on things and people; and, of course, as long as you are looking down, you cannot see something that is above you.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The time is now.Â Stop hitting the snooze button on your life.
quotes.author: Mel Robbins

quotes.quote: It is not as much about who you used to, as it is about who you choose to be.
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: You're either green and growing or you're ripe and rotting.
quotes.author: John Addison

quotes.quote: Follow what you are genuinely passionate about and let that guide you to your destination.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: We dream to give ourselves hope. To stop dreaming â€“ well, that's like saying you can never change your fate.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: Do your best, and be a little better than you are.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: When you see a good person, think of becoming like her/him. When you see someone not so good, reflect on your own weak points.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The dreaming has to be backed up by the doing.
quotes.author: Carrie Wilkerson

quotes.quote: No matter who you are, no matter what you did, no matter where you've come from, you can always change, become a better version of yourself.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: Change equals self-improvement. Push yourself to places you haven't been before.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Excellence is not a destination; it is a continuous journey that never ends.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Be so busy improving yourself that you have no time to criticize others.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We need to accept that we won't always make the right decisions, that we'll screw up royally sometimesâ€“understanding that failure is not the opposite of success, it's part of success.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.quote: Change is your friendÂ not your foe; change is a brilliant opportunity to grow.
quotes.author: Simon T. Bailey

quotes.quote: Self-knowledge is the beginning of self-improvement.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Don't you dare underestimate the power of your own instinct.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.quote: The curious paradox is that when I accept myself just as I am, then I can change.
quotes.author: Carl R. Rogers

quotes.quote: The very least you can do in your life is figure out what you hope for. And the most you can do is live inside that hope. Not admire it from a distance but live right in it, under its roof.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Hope begins in the dark, the stubborn hope that if you just show up and try to do the right thing, the dawn will come.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The key to happinessÂ is really progress and growth and constantly working on yourself and developing something.
quotes.author: Lewis Howes

quotes.quote: The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Don't wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: We can each define ambition and progress for ourselves. The goal is to work toward a world where expectations are not set by the stereotypes that hold us back, but by our personal passion, talents, and interests.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Only in the darkness can you see the stars.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Beginning today, set an intention and a relentless focus on living your life as the greatest person you can be, in all situations.
quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

quotes.quote: Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Hold fast to dreams,Â For if dreams die,Â Life is a broken-winged bird,Â That cannot fly.
quotes.author: James Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: Those who seek a better life must first become a better person.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The most terrifying thing is to accept oneself completely
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Growth is actually contagious, so if you want to reach your goals, you've got to get around people who are going in the same direction you want to be going, and you will catch the success.
quotes.author: Dr. Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Don't compare yourself to others. Compare yourself to the person from yesterday.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Work on yourself more than you do on your job.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Work harder than everybody. You're not going to get it by whining, and you're not going to get it by shouting, and you're not going to get it by quitting. You're going to get it by being there.
quotes.author: Barbara Walters

quotes.quote: When you face the adversity of challenging experiences head on you, you develop the skills, abilities, and strength, to face other adversities in the future.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: An action is always better than no action, and the right action will create more certainty and faith in your ability to take bigger risks.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: Don't play hide n seek with life. You can't hide form life challenges without seeking timely solution.
quotes.author: Sandeep Ravidutt Sharma

quotes.quote: Try your best to stay positive even when tides are not in your favour.
quotes.author: Sandeep Ravidutt Sharma

quotes.quote: Life's hard. It's even harder when you're stupid.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: It is better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to open one's mouth and remove all doubt.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Everything and anything is possible when you believe, put forth some action, and focus!
quotes.author: Aliya Abbas

quotes.quote: To push forward and show the world that you won't take any more of this nonsense truly defines the person you are and want to be.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: Hitting your bottom is like depression--it is the first step towards feeling better.
quotes.author: Tuchy Palmieri

quotes.quote: Whatever you think, that you will be. If you think yourselves weak, weak you will be; if you think yourselves strong, strong you will be.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Have faith in yourselves, great convictions are the mothers of great deeds.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: The win in you must be ready to show up at all times, without fail in any given situation.
quotes.author: Laura Lyseight

quotes.quote: Accept the challenges so that you may feel the exhilaration of victory.
quotes.author: George S Patton

quotes.quote: Seek not, my soul, the life of immortals; but enjoy to the full the resources that are within thy reach.
quotes.author: Pindar

quotes.quote: Look not mournfully into the past. It comes not back again. Wisely improve the present. It is thine. Go forth to meet the shadowy future, without fear.
quotes.author: Longfellow

quotes.quote: It is not enough to have knowledge; one must apply it. It is not enough to have wishes; one must also accomplish it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Become a possibilitarian. No matter how dark things seem to be or actually are, raise your sights and see the possibilities-always see them, for they are always there.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: I haven't failed; I just found 10,000 ways that didn't work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: The secret to success is to be ready when opportunity comes.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Exceed expectations. We are not driven to do extraordinary things, but to do ordinary things extraordinarily well.
quotes.author: Bishop Gore

quotes.quote: Show me someone who has done something worthwhile, and I'll show you someone who has overcome adversity.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction inn knowing that you did your best to become the best you are capable of becoming.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The world makes way for a man who knows where he is going.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Our limitations and success will be based most often on our own expectations for ourselves. What the mind dwells upon, the body acts upon.
quotes.author: Thomas Deward

quotes.quote: You may have a fresh start at any moment you choose, for this thing we call 'failure' is not falling down, but staying down.
quotes.author: Mary Pickford

quotes.quote: We must walk consciously only part way toward our gold, and then leap into the dark to our success.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
quotes.author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: The quality of a person's life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence, regardless of their chosen field of endeavor.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Every problem is an opportunity in disguise.
quotes.author: Jason K. Baxter

quotes.quote: Adversity reveals genius. Prosperity conceals it.
quotes.author: Horatius

quotes.quote: To be tested is good. The challenged life may be the best therapist.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: We may counter many defeats, but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: You don't make your character in a crises; you exhibit it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The darker the night, the sweetest the victory.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: No one searches of adversity. Bad experiences is simply part of life.
quotes.author: Eileen S. Lenson

quotes.quote: Support is the secret sauce that helps us find forgiveness, courage, perspective, perseverance, and hope. Support helps us make changes in our thoughts, feelings, and behaviors, and increases the sense of control over our lives.
quotes.author: Eileen S. Lenson

quotes.quote: You don't have to wait to feel positive enough for a smile to happen. You can generate a positive feeling by smiling. Your smile can be the source of your positivity, not the result of it. Smile more today.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Those who do not have worthy struggles in their lives neve enjoy the pleasure of celebrating a hard-won victory.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: You need resilience not just for the hard times. You need resilience if you're going to be happy.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: Those who look behind will never see beyond.
quotes.author: Sherry K. White

quotes.quote: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You can succeed beyond the past, but not beyond your belief
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: Sometimes you must do crazy things to discover the life beyond your life, to enter the unknown zone beyond your known zone!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The far we can see, we are! It is time we lifted our eyes beyond the horizon of our present boundaries and see goodies ahead of us.
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: The world is whole beyond human knowing.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Anything you want is just beyond your fear.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Dare to dream. Dare to reach beyond the stars.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Beyond each corner, new directions lie in wait.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: Beyond the walls of intelligence, life is defined.
quotes.author: Nas

quotes.quote: It's not trespassing to go beyond your own boundaries.
quotes.author: Dewitt Jones

quotes.quote: But somewhere, beyond space and time, is wetter water, slimier slime! And there (they trust) there swimmeth one, who swam ere rivers were begun. Immense, of fishy form and mind, squamous, omnipotent, and kind.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.quote: We never try and reinvent the past. We try to look forward to what's going on, ... We don't have a set plan -- you might have ideas, or a different set pieces you might use to put inside your puzzle -- but it's like you always have to look forward to what's beyond from where you just came from.
quotes.author: Big Boi

quotes.quote: At beyond continent of reality, there are oceans of ideas.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Unless we move beyond what’s behind us, we cannot reach out to what lies in front of us.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: In each action we must look beyond the action at our past, present, and future state, and at others whom it affects, and see the relations of all those things. And then we shall be very cautious.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Step beyond the scopes and limits because a narrow minded person has such boundaries of thinking 'I cannot , but I must'.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Being happy doesn't mean everything's perfect. It means you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Just beyond the horizon of the so-called impossible, is infinite possibility.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Strive to be beyond what others percieve you to be, by striving beyond the limits or yourself.
quotes.author: Debbie Tosun Kilday

quotes.quote: The sky above us is something we have very little control of, and the space beyond is something we don't completely understand.
quotes.author: Morena Baccarin

quotes.quote: The palest ink will endure beyond the memories of man.
quotes.author: Tan Twan Eng

quotes.quote: Someone who seeks the Way doesn't look beyond himself.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: We must carry things beyond conversation to conclusion.
quotes.author: Richard L. Evans

quotes.quote: Dreams take you beyond what you think you can do in life.
quotes.author: Vikram Chatwal

quotes.quote: Fearlessness is extending ourselves beyond our limited view.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: So if we have to look beyond our shores to provide the lift, then we might just have to do so.
quotes.author: John Koh

quotes.quote: We have always held to the hope, the belief, the conviction that there is a better life, a better world, beyond the horizon.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Your vision will determine your future, mirror only helps you to see your ugly or beautiful face, but only the vision you have can take you far beyond your expectations and imaginations in life.
quotes.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

quotes.quote: There was no destiny in life, nothing beyond what a man could take and hold for himself.
quotes.author: Conn Iggulden

quotes.quote: Our faith can reach beyond the limits of current reason.
quotes.author: Rosemary Mixom

quotes.quote: I try not to listen to the shoulds or coulds, and try to get beyond expectations, peer pressure, or trying to please - and just listen. I believe all the answers are ultimately within us.
quotes.author: Kim Cattrall

quotes.quote: Mental illness is nothing to be ashamed of, but stigma and bias shame us all.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: Biases and blind spots exist in big data as much as they do in individual perceptions and experiences. Yet there is a problematic belief that bigger data is always better data and that correlation is as good as causation.
quotes.author: Kate Crawford

quotes.quote: Bias, like beauty, is often in the eye of the beholder. Facts are your firewall against bias.
quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

quotes.quote: People will sometimes put each other in boxes and have biases toward one another because of what they look like or where they come from or who they are. But ultimately, it's up to us to decide who we are.
quotes.author: Rich Moore

quotes.quote: Persons who have a painful affection in any part of the body, and are in a great measure sensible of the pain, are disordered in intellect.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: It's not at all hard to understand a person; it's only hard to listen without bias.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Prejudice and passion and suspicion are more dangerous than the incitement of self-interest or the most stubborn adherence to real differences of opinion regarding rights.
quotes.author: Elihu Root

quotes.quote: There are cultural biases built into testing, and that was one of the motivations for the concept of affirmative action to try to balance out those effects.
quotes.author: Sonia Sotomayo

quotes.quote: The theory of cultural bias is the idea that a culture is based on a particular form of organization. It can't be transplanted except to another variant of that organization.
quotes.author: Mary Douglas

quotes.quote: Prejudice is a form of untruthfulness, and untruthfulness is an insidious form of injustice.
quotes.author: Miroslav Volf

quotes.quote: In an extroverted society, the difference between an introvert and an extrovert is that an introvert is often unconsciously deemed guilty until proven innocent.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The eye sees only what the mind is prepared to comprehend.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: The real bias of the media is not to the left or to the right, but to the thin strata of economic elites at the top of our society.
quotes.author: Jim Hightower

quotes.quote: It is easy for us to criticize the prejudices of our grandfathers, from which our fathers freed themselves. It is more difficult to search for prejudices among the beliefs and values we hold.
quotes.author: Peter Singer

quotes.quote: One way or another we are all biased, but still we have the modern cortical capacity to choose whether or not to let the harmful biases dictate our behavior.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Bias used to say that men ought to calculate life both as if they were fated to live a long and a short time, and that they ought to love one another as if at a future time they would come to hate one another; for that most men were bad.
quotes.author: Diogenes Laertius

quotes.quote: Labels bias our perceptions, thinking, and behavior. A label or story can either separate us from, or connect us to, nature. For our health and happiness, we must critically evaluate our labels and stories by their effects.
quotes.author: Michael J. Cohen

quotes.quote: We tend to accept information that confirms our prior beliefs and ignore or discredit information that does not. This confirmation bias settles over our eyes like distorting spectacles for everything we look at.
quotes.author: Kyle Hill

quotes.quote: We all have cultural bias, racial bias. One of the difficult things around this subject matter is to deny that we have places we go to subconsciously, and unless you consciously decide that that's wrong and you've got to do something about it, especially if you're in a position of power, it won't change.
quotes.author: David Oyelowo

quotes.quote: Fortunately for serious minds, a bias recognized is a bias sterilized.
quotes.author: Benjamin Haydon

quotes.quote: All of us show bias when it comes to what information we take in. We typically focus on anything that agrees with the outcome we want.
quotes.author: Noreena Hertz

quotes.quote: The human brain always concocts biases to aid in the construction of a coherent mental life, exclusively suitable for an individual's personal needs.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Two quite opposite qualities equally bias our minds habits and novelty.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Bias and prejudice are attitudes to be kept in hand, not attitudes to be avoided.
quotes.author: Charles Curtis

quotes.quote: We have a history of gender and racial bias on our court that continues to undermine the system. Excluding individuals based on race is antagonistic to the pursuit of justice.
quotes.author: Anita Hill

quotes.quote: Bigotry or prejudice in any form is more than a problem; it is a deep-seated evil within our society.
quotes.author: Judith Light

quotes.quote: Prejudice is sinful. All blood flows red. And the most harmful and foolish kind of prejudice is prejudice against yourself. Every woman is your sister, and every woman needs her sisters. So try to give other women the courtesy of your compassion, respect, and forgiveness. Love yourself despite and because of your flaws.
quotes.author: Jewell Parker Rhodes

quotes.quote: Never try to reason the prejudice out of a man; it was not reasoned into him and cannot be reasoned out.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Our prejudices are our mistresses; reason is at best our wife, very often needed but seldom minded.
quotes.author: Chesterfield

quotes.quote: A man's prejudice is mental, a woman's temperamental.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The man who does not think as we do is apt to be prejudiced.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Many a man makes mistake of developing his opinions in the dark room of prejudice.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Prejudice is merely a lazy man's substitute for lazy thinking.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The only person who is unbiased is one who has the same bias we have.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: I think, though, that people will read into a reporter's story a bias that they want to see in a reporter.
quotes.author: Garrett M. Graff

quotes.quote: Two quite opposite qualities equally bias our minds.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: The way to heaven is ascending; we must be content to travel uphill, though it be hard and tiresome, and contrary to the natural bias of our flesh.
quotes.author: Jonathan Edwards

quotes.quote: By recognizing the negativity effect and overriding our innate responses, we can break destructive patterns, think more effectively about the future, and exploit the remarkable benefits of this bias.
quotes.author: John Tierney

quotes.quote: Learning how the negativity bias affects you and everyone else, you see the world more realistically--and less fearfully. You can consciously override the impulses that cause crippling insecurities, panic attacks, and phobias.
quotes.author: John Tierney

quotes.quote: Wherever you look at human judgements, you are likely to find noise. To improve the quality of our judgements, we need to overcome noise as well as bias.
quotes.author: Dolly Chugh

quotes.quote: Two quite opposite qualities equally bias our minds.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: The way to heaven ascending; we must be content to travel uphill, though it be hard and tiresome and contrary to the natural bias of our flesh.
quotes.author: Jonathan Edwards

quotes.quote: It is never too late to give up our prejudices.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Let us have but one end in view the welfare of humanity; and let us put aside all selfishness in consideration of language, nationality or religion.
quotes.author: John Comenius

quotes.quote: Our prejudices are like physical infirmities - we cannot do what they prevent us from doing.
quotes.author: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.quote: I have no color prejudices nor caste prejudices nor creed prejudices. All I care to know is that a man is a human being, and that is enough for me; he can't be any worse.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you judge people you have no time to love them.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Somehow our devils are never quite what we expect when we meet them face to face.
quotes.author: Nelson DeMille

quotes.quote: Morality is simply the attitude we adopt towards people whom we personally dislike.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The test of courage comes when we are in the minority. The test of tolerance comes when we are in the majority.
quotes.author: Ralph W. Sockman

quotes.quote: In overcoming prejudices, working together is even more effective than talking together.
quotes.author: Ralph W. Sockman

quotes.quote: What is tolerance? It is the consequence of humanity. We are all formed of frailty and error; let us pardon reciprocally each other's folly - that is the first law of nature.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Prejudices is the child of ignorance.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: O Lord, help me not to despise or oppose what I do not understand.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Opinions founded on prejudice are always sustained with the greatest violence.
quotes.author: Hebrew Proverb

quotes.quote: I have often wondered how it is that every man loves himself more than all the rest of men, but yet sets less value on his own opinion of himself than on the opinion of others.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The man who never alters his opinion is like standing water, and breeds reptiles of the mind.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The Bible says that the devil is like a roaring lion (1 Peter 5:8). He comes in the darkness, and tries to frighten the children of God with his mighty roar. But when you switch on the light of the Word of God, you discover that there is no lion. There is only a mouse with a microphone! The devil is an imposter. Got it?
quotes.author: Reinhard Bonnke

quotes.quote: The Bible tells us that there are some things worth fighting for. In fact, the Bible says there's some things worth dying for.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: The Bible is a sanctum; the world, sputum.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Verse by verse, the Bible becomes more than theory. It becomes my firsthand experience.
quotes.author: Mark Batterson

quotes.quote: The Bible is the story of two gardens: Eden and Gethsemane. In the first, Adam took a fall. In the second, Jesus took a stand. In the first, God sought Adam. In the second, Jesus sought God. In Eden, Adam hid from God. In Gethsemane, Jesus emerged from the tomb. In Eden, Satan led Adam to a tree that led to his death. From Gethsemane, Jesus went to a tree that led to our life.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Make your own Bible. Select and collect all the words and sentences that in all your readings have been to you like the blast of a trumpet.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: No man ever believes that the Bible means what it says: He is always convinced that it says what he means.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: The Bible remained for me a book of books, still divine -- but divine in the sense that all great books are divine which teach men how to live righteously.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Keith

quotes.quote: Both read the Bible day and night, but thou read black where I read white.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: As the diamond is among precious stones, even so is the Bible among books.
quotes.author: William Scott Downey

quotes.quote: The Bible says somewhere that we are desperately selfish. I think we would have discovered that fact without the Bible.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: On the other hand, the Bible contains much that is relevant today, like Noah taking 40 days to find a place to park.
quotes.author: Curtis McDougall

quotes.quote: The Bible makes it clear that every time that there is a story of faith, it is completely original. God's creative genius is endless.
quotes.author: Eugene H. Peterson

quotes.quote: If you replace the word God in the Bible with the word Truth, it reads exactly right.
quotes.author: Ricky Williams

quotes.quote: The Bible is one of the greatest blessings bestowed by God on the children of men. It has God for its Author, salvation for its end, and truth without any mixture for its matter. It is all pure, all sincere; nothing too much; nothing wanting!
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: The Bible is very easy to understand. But we Christians are a bunch of scheming swindlers. We pretend to be unable to understand it because we know very well that the minute we understand, we are obliged to act accordingly.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Fight truth decay - study the Bible daily.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: God writes the Gospel not in the Bible alone, but also on trees, and in the flowers and clouds and stars.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The Gospel is like water; no man invented it, yet no man can live without it.
quotes.author: Reinhard Bonnke

quotes.quote: The Bible is the cradle wherein Christ is laid.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: No sciences are better attested than the religion of the Bible.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: The Bible tells us to love our neighbors as ourselves. Surely part of loving in this way is trying to understand what another person wants us to understand. I may not understand perfectly and I may not agree, but if I love you I should try to know what it is you wish I could know.
quotes.author: Kevin DeYoung
