quotes.quote: The great standard of literature as to purity and exactness of style is the Bible.
quotes.author: Hugh Blair

quotes.quote: One of my less pleasant chores when I was young was to read the Bible from one end to the other. Reading the Bible straight through is at least 70 percent discipline, like learning Latin. But the good parts are, of course, simply amazing. God is an extremely uneven writer, but when He's good, nobody can touch Him.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: The Bible isn't a storybook with many heroes. No, there's only one hero in Scripture: the Son, the Lamb, the Savior, the King, the Redeemer â€“ Jesus.
quotes.author: Paul David Tripp

quotes.quote: The Bible was composed in such a way that as beginners mature, its meaning grows with them.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: It is Christ Himself, not the Bible, who is the true Word of God. The Bible, read in the right spirit and with the guidance of good teachers, will bring us to Him.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The Bible must be considered as the great source of all the truth by which men are to be guided in government as well as in all social transactions.
quotes.author: Noah Webster

quotes.quote: The Bible tells us to love our neighbors, and also to love our enemies; probably because they are generally the same people.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: I never saw a useful Christian who was not a student of the Bible. If a man neglects his Bible, he may pray and ask God to use him in His work; but God cannot make much use of him, for there is not much for the Holy Ghost to work upon.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: A Bible that's falling apart usually belongs to someone who isn't.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: In the Bible it says they asked Jesus how many times you should forgive, and he said 70 times 7. Well, I want you all to know that I'm keeping a chart.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: The Bible shows the way to go to heaven, not the way the heavens go.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: The Bible was not given for our information but for our transformation.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: Bibles are strong entrenchments. Where they abound, men cannot pursue wicked courses, and at the same time enjoy quiet conscience.
quotes.author: James McHenry

quotes.quote: In all my perplexities and distresses, the Bible has never failed to give me light and strength.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: Hold fast to the Bible. To the influence of this Book we are indebted for all the progress made in true civilization and to this we must look as our guide in the future.
quotes.author: Ulysses S. Grant

quotes.quote: A thorough knowledge of the Bible is worth more than a college education.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The Book of Life was created as a tool for humans to use to grow in wisdom, knowledge, and power.
quotes.author: Stacy Snapp-Killian

quotes.quote: Those who talk of the Bible as a 'monument of English prose' are merely admiring it as a monument over the grave of Christianity.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Within the covers of the Bible are the answers for all the problems men face.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Properly read, the Bible is the most potent force for atheism ever conceived.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: The big problem is not whether the Bible is true. The big problem is whether it is true in you.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: I was thinking about how people seem to read the Bible a whole lot more as they get older; then it dawned on me - they're cramming for their final exam.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: It does not require great learning to be a Christian and be convinced of the truth of the Bible. It requires only an honest heart and a willingness to obey God.
quotes.author: Albert Barnes

quotes.quote: The firmament of the Bible is ablaze with answers to prayer.
quotes.author: Theodore L. Cuyler

quotes.quote: Get a bicycle. You will not regret it, if you live.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Bicycles are almost as good as guitars for meeting girls.
quotes.author: Bob Weir

quotes.quote: The bicycle is the most civilized conveyance known to man. Other forms of transport grow daily more nightmarish. Only the bicycle remains pure in heart.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: The bicycle is a curious vehicle. Its passenger is its engine.
quotes.author: John Howard

quotes.quote: A human and a bicycle are the perfect synthesis of body and machine.
quotes.author: Richard Ballantine

quotes.quote: The bicycle is a great good. But it can turn nasty, if ill employed.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: The very existence of the bicycle is an offense to reason and wisdom.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: The bicycle, the bicycle surely, should always be the vehicle of novelists and poets.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Buying a bicycle is a momentous event, akin to marriage: you are acquiring a partner.
quotes.author: Dervla Murphy

quotes.quote: A bicycle is the long-sought means of transportation for all of us who have runaway hearts.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: When I'm riding my bicycle I feel like a Buddhist who is happy just to enjoy his mundane existence.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: It is by riding a bicycle that you learn the contours of a country best, since you have to sweat up the hills and coast down them.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: To ride a bicycle properly is very like a love affair-chiefly it is a matter of faith. Believe you do it, and the thing is done; doubt, and, for the life of you, you cannot.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: The bicycle is its own best argument. You just get a bike, try it; start going with the thing and using it as it suits you. It'll grow and it gets better and better and better.
quotes.author: Richard Ballantine

quotes.quote: The bicycle is a former child's toy that has now been elevated to icon status because, presumably, it can move the human form from pillar to post without damage to the environment.
quotes.author: Brock Yates

quotes.quote: The bicycle is the perfect transducer to match man's metabolic energy to the impedance of locomotion. Equipped with this tool, man outstrips the efficiency of not only all machines but all other animals as well.
quotes.author: Ivan Illich

quotes.quote: Bicycles are pieces of art. You get that combination of kinetic engineering, but then, besides the welds, the paint jobs, the kind of the sculpture of it all is quite beautiful. Bikes have such great lines, and all different styles.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: The bicycle is a vehicle of revolution. It can destroy the tyranny of the automobile as effectively as the printing press brought down despots of flesh and blood. The revolution will be spontaneous, the sum total of individual revolts like my own. It may have already begun.
quotes.author: Daniel Behrman

quotes.quote: Riding a bicycle is about getting back to basics. It's good for the waistline and it's good for the wallet, is what I'm saying.
quotes.author: Phil Keoghan

quotes.quote: The bicycle is just as good company as most husbands and, when it gets old and shabby, a woman can dispose of it and get a new one without shocking the entire community.
quotes.author: Ann Strong

quotes.quote: Think of bicycles as rideable art that can just about save the world.
quotes.author: Grant Petersen

quotes.quote: Bike is the most democratic transport vehicle. Bike is the most daring, challenging as it gives its owner the tempting feeling of freedom, that is why one can say without any exaggeration, bike is a symbol of freedom
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: When man invented the bicycle he reached the peak of his attainments.
quotes.author: Elizabeth West

quotes.quote: With a bike you go from zero to a hundred in terms of mobility.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Bikes and planes aren't about going fast or having fun; they're toys, but serious ones.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: The bicycle is the noblest invention of mankind.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: Since the bicycle makes little demand on material or energy resources, contributes little to pollution, makes a positive contribution to health and causes little death or injury, it can be regarded as the most benevolent of machines.
quotes.author: S. S. Wilson

quotes.quote: Possibly the tragedy of the bicycle is that it was invented too close in time to the car. In the historical scheme, pedal power hardly got under way before the combustion engine appeared and, not only took over the roads, but changed our view of machines. We've forgotten that pedal power is a potent form of energy.
quotes.author: Richard Ballantine

quotes.quote: Riding a bicycle is the summit of human endeavour - an almost neutral environmental effect coupled with the ability to travel substantial distances without disturbing anybody. The bike is the perfect marriage of technology and human energy.
quotes.author: Jeremy Corbyn

quotes.quote: Nothing compares to the simple pleasure of a bike ride.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Bicycle means simplicity and simplicity means happiness!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Bicycles are the new rollerblades, talentless is the new talented, and I'm in hog heaven.
quotes.author: Ryan Seacrest

quotes.quote: Maybe the bike is more dangerous, but the passion for the car for me is second to the bike.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.quote: Our new baby arrived today. I'm a big brother now, hooray! / I used to be a little baby, too. But now I'm big! Look, what I can do! / I can help when baby feeds. And always find what baby needs. / Dirty diaper, yuck! Let's see...Here's a clean one found by me! / Mommy and Daddy say I'm clever, and that I'm the best big brother ever.
quotes.author: Caroline Jane Church

quotes.quote: After a girl is grown, her little brothers now her protectors seem like big brothers.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The best thing about having four big brothers is you always have someone to do something for you.
quotes.author: Chloe Moretz

quotes.quote: Big brothers are the ones who are supposed to pull their punches. Little sisters well, we should be able to hit as hard as we like, shouldn't we
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Sometimes being a brother is even better than being a superhero.
quotes.author: Marc Brown

quotes.quote: I enjoyed being your little sister. Yeah, just wanna say thank you for being there.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A brother is a friend given by Nature.
quotes.author: Jean Baptiste Legouve

quotes.quote: A brother shares childhood memories and grown-up dreams.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The younger brother must help to pay for the pleasures of the elder.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Who knows you better than your own brother?
quotes.author: Karen Joy Fowler

quotes.quote: I may not be my brothers keeper, but I am my brother's brother.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland

quotes.quote: Brothers don't necessarily have to say anything to each other- they can sit in a room and be together and just be completely comfortable with each other.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: When you deal with your brother, be pleasant, but get a witness.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: Brothers are first a bother, then a true friend.
quotes.author: Kate Summers

quotes.quote: There's no other love like the love for a brother. There's no other love like the love from a brother.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Let him know that it's natural for a big brother to feel proud and loving and, at the same time, jealous and angry.
quotes.author: Joanna Cole

quotes.quote: Big brothering is awesome, but it also means that things are changing. That is totally normal.
quotes.author: Ashley Moulton

quotes.quote: I'll teach you, little sibling, how to crawl and curl up like a tiny ball. We'll be the best of friends, but this isn't where it ends!
quotes.author: Lindsey Coker Luckey

quotes.quote: Baby brothers are small. Baby brothers are cute. But they can be a pain— and that is the truth.
quotes.author: Sam Williams

quotes.quote: A friend loveth at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.
quotes.author: The Bible (New Testament)

quotes.quote: A brother may not be a friend, but a friend will always be a brother.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Your brother or sister was a unique individual with many positive traits. He or she also had traits that weren't as likeable.
quotes.author: Ruth Ann Ruiz

quotes.quote: Brothers and sisters have many ways of relating to each other, either by showing closeness through positive comments or arguing. It is important to know that those with whom you argue are most often the closest to you.
quotes.author: Ruth Ann Ruiz

quotes.quote: I have a great feeling for the soil. My brother is the leading conservationist in the world, and I just love sitting in my bulldozer and experiencing nature.
quotes.author: Gary Player

quotes.quote: What really causes marital abuse is small families. If all women had a lot of brothers, this would never take place.
quotes.author: Charles Poncy

quotes.quote: I had older brothers. Growing up the only girl in a family is like growing up to be a tropical fruit drink...somewhere being spoiled and beaten to a pulp.
quotes.author: Diane Ford

quotes.quote: I grew up with six brothers.That's why I learned how to dance—waiting for the bathroom.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Having one child makes you a parent; having two makes you a referee.
quotes.author: David Frost

quotes.quote: You can easily make the argument that no one can piss you off, anger you, frustrate you...or cause as much consternation as your siblings. You know why? They're you.
quotes.author: Lawrence Dorfman

quotes.quote: They can be your strongest defender against the world...After they knocked you around a bit.
quotes.author: Lawrence Dorfman

quotes.quote: The best way to get a puppy is to beg for a baby brother— and they'll settle for a puppy every time.
quotes.author: Winston Pendelton

quotes.quote: What strange creatures brothers are!
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: We came into the world like brother and brother; And now let’s go hand in hand, not one before another.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: We have flown the air like birds and swum the sea like fishes, but have yet to learn the simple act of walking the earth like brothers.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: There is nothing better than to share thy bread with thy brother in the spirit of love.
quotes.author: Laila Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You don't get to be a keeper of the faith without being a keeper of your brother.
quotes.author: Jonathan Key

quotes.quote: Starting a business with brother either ends business or ends brotherhood.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Big head, target for enemy; big heart, target for friend.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.quote: If you let your head get too big, it'll break your neck.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Bigheadedness is usually a symptom of small-mindedness.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Who hasn't had a weight issue? If not the body, certainly the big head!
quotes.author: Aretha Franklin

quotes.quote: He had a big head and a face so ugly it became almost fascinating.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Don't try to be like somebody else. You'll be miserable. You need to be yourself, and don't ever get a big head.
quotes.author: Carlene Carter

quotes.quote: I have a big head, so I can appreciate a good hat.
quotes.author: Khalil Mack

quotes.quote: Small-mindedness is intensified by things such as big-headedness.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Be yourself, fill your life with good people, and don't get a big head. It can all be gone tomorrow.
quotes.author: Molly Sims

quotes.quote: The only way to get through the life I had was just to have a big head of steam and determination.
quotes.author: Ryan Murphy

quotes.quote: The Elephant Man claimed his head was big because, it's so full of dreams. Actually, it's because his skull was shaped like a turkey.
quotes.author: Dana Gould

quotes.quote: The big show is inside my head.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: It's all in your head -- you just have no idea how big your head is.
quotes.author: Lon Milo Duquette

quotes.quote: I'm not allowed to get a big head, I've still got to do the simple things in life.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: I'm impressed, I've never met such a small mind inside such a big head before.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Any fool can be happy. It takes a man with real heart to make beauty out of the stuff that makes us weep.
quotes.author: Clive Barker

quotes.quote: It doesn’t matter how strong or capable you are; if you don’t have a big heart, you will not succeed.
quotes.author: Li Ka-shing

quotes.quote: Little hearts, little souls give little lusts big power. Big hearts give little lusts little power.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Big head, target for enemy; big heart, target for friend.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: One day we will realize that big hearts will bring us more peace than big weapons.
quotes.author: Anthony Douglas

quotes.quote: You need a high degree of corruption or a very big heart to love absolutely everything.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: A big heart is both a clunky and a delicate thing; it doesn't protect itself and it doesn't hide. It stands out, like a baby's fontanel, where you can see the soul pulse through.
quotes.author: Anne Lamottq

quotes.quote: A small ego equals a big heart.
quotes.author: Manprit Kaur

quotes.quote: If your heart was as big as your mouth you'd be real.
quotes.author: DMX

quotes.quote: By association with nature's enormities, a man's heart may truly grow big also.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Have a big enough heart to love unconditionally, and a broad enough mind to embrace the differences that make each of us unique.
quotes.author: DB Harrop

quotes.quote: Don't judge a person by how important he is or how big he is. Judge a person by the strength of character or size of his heart.
quotes.author: Glad Munaiseche

quotes.quote: Even when you do not feel big hearted, you can give yourself permission to act that way.
quotes.author: Lama Willa Miller

quotes.quote: You cannot be a Big person with a Small heart.
quotes.author: T D Jakes

quotes.quote: The less you open your heart, the more your heart suffers.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.
quotes.author: John Holmes

quotes.quote: When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The human heart is bigger than the world.
quotes.author: Carlos Bulosan

quotes.quote: When somebody elses happiness makes you happy, it means you are a person with a big heart.
quotes.author: Jenni Rivera

quotes.quote: You have to show people how much you care about them before you can teach them anything.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: People do not care how much you know until they know how much you care.
quotes.author: Judith Campbell

quotes.quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: He spits out secrets like hot custard.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: If you've got a big mouth and you're controversial, you're going to get attention.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.quote: An indiscreet man is more hurtful than an ill-natured one; for as the latter will only attack his enemies, and those he wishes ill to, the other injures indifferently both friends and foes.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The talkative man speaks from his mouth, the eloquent man speaks from his heart.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: A talkative person runs himself upon great inconvenience by blabbing out his own and others' secrets.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.quote: The talkative listen to no one, for they are ever speaking. And the first evil that attends those who know not to be silent is that they hear nothing.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Look who's here--big mouth. Now the whole neighborhood will know.
quotes.author: Paul Schrader

quotes.quote: You don't talk much, do you?' she blurted out. 'I didn't think there was a need. You seem to be holding up both our ends of the conversation admirably.'
quotes.author: Julia Quinn

quotes.quote: Before opening your mouth to talk, you should open your mind to think.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: But far numerous was the Herd of such Who think too little and who talk too much.
quotes.author: John Dreyden

quotes.quote: Much chatter, little wit.
quotes.author: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.quote: A talker neither listens nor learns.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: A talkative bird will not build a nest.
quotes.author: West African Proverb

quotes.quote: I got in trouble my whole life for having a big mouth.
quotes.author: Steven Tyler

quotes.quote: I have a really big mouth, I have a lot of opinions and I will be heard.
quotes.author: Kimora Lee Simmons

quotes.quote: It requires two indiscreet persons to institute a quarrel; one individual cannot quarrel alone.
quotes.author: Aime Martin

quotes.quote: I'm a romantic; I would like Bigfoot to exist. I've met people who swear they've seen Bigfoot, and I think the interesting thing is, every single continent, there's an equivalent of Bigfoot or Sasquatch. There's the Yeti, the Yowie in Australia, the Chinese Wildman, and on and on and on.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: But Bigfoot is out there just knowing you don't care / About his life in solitude / He's dancing with the lonely, he'd choose you only / He'd rock from side to side
quotes.author: James Samuel Cooper; Matthew Ryan Quinn

quotes.quote: As a child I had been obsessed by stories about Bigfoot. I grew up in the 1970s and early ‘80s, a time when Sasquatch had become a pop-culture icon after a string of movies and television shows exploited the public’s apparent fascination with the creature. I became literate by reading some of the first books published on the subject. For years the creatures, which I had come to believe in wholeheartedly, even appeared to me in my dreams at night. They were otherworldly, existing far beyond the pale, yet fit perfectly into the fabric of my mental universe.
quotes.author: John Zada

quotes.quote: So far no Sasquatch, living or dead, or any of its mammoth body parts has been produced. Bigfoot enthusiasts say that because the creatures are nocturnal, numerically rare, and highly evasive, it is difficult to see one, let alone capture one. No Sasquatch remains are found, they add, because bodies of animals who die natural deaths in the forest are seldom ever found. Animals usually go into hiding when sick and vulnerable. Their remains, including bones, are picked apart by scavengers, and what’s left quickly decomposes.
quotes.author: John Zada

quotes.quote: When asked why there isn’t better photographic evidence than the handful of blurry, inconclusive pictures taken to date, Sasquatch enthusiasts say that it’s hard to take quality pictures in high-contrast or dimly lit cluttered forests where Bigfoots, often seen at a distance, are usually exposed in the open for just a few seconds. Observers, they add, are so shaken by an encounter that most of them forget to use their cameras or phones.
quotes.author: John Zada

quotes.quote: One popular 1970s TV series, The Six Million Dollar Man, featured the most memorable fictional cameo involving the Sasquatch. In a two-part episode, the show’s protagonist, a bell-bottomed cyborg secret agent named Steve Austin, fought a scraggly-looking, cave-dwelling Sasquatch (played by the seven-foot-four-inch-tall wrestler André the Giant). That bearded, white-eyed, feral beast, who turned out to be a robot created by space aliens, and whose image, I’m certain, bore into the consciousness of millions of young people like me, derived its spellbinding horror from the fact that it looked and acted more like a human than an ape. It was cognizant, a 'wild man' in the truest sense of the term.
quotes.author: John Zada

quotes.quote: In the half century since big, upright creatures, leaving hundreds of tracks, were seen in the high snowfield on the north side of Mount Everest by a band of British mountaineers, the ye-teh, or yeti, has met with a storm of disapproval from upset scientists around the world. But as with the sasquatch of the vast rain forests of the Pacific Northwest, the case against the existence of the yeti — entirely speculative, and necessarily based on assumptions of foolishness or mendacity in many observers of good reputation — is even less 'scientific' than the evidence that it exists.
quotes.author: Peter Matthiesen

quotes.quote: Stories about the beast are found elsewhere all around the globe. In the Himalayas, the Sherpa people of Nepal and Tibet have legends about a large, hairy beast that walks on two legs. They call the animal yeti, a term meaning 'rock-bear.' In Russia and Mongolia, the creature is known as Almas. In Scotland, tales are told about Am Fear Hath Mor, or 'Gray Man.' Chinese people tell of the Yeren, which means 'wild man.' In Australia, people call it a Yowie. To many who follow the oversize tracks of this legend, the mysterious creature is known simply as Bigfoot.
quotes.author: Jennifer Joline Anderson

quotes.quote: The Yeti, or Dremo in Tibetan, is a dim-witted mythical beast said to feed only on marmots. It sees a marmot, grabs the hapless creature, and then sits on it — saving the delicious morsel for later. And then the Yeti sees another marmot and leaps up to snatch it — while the first marmot makes a quick break for freedom. An image of bumbling, foolish effort — and the pitfalls of greed.
quotes.author: Pema Tsewang

quotes.quote: People only see Bigfoot at campgrounds and parks. He’s clearly on vacation.
quotes.author: Darby Conley

quotes.quote: It has been theorized that Gigantopithecus karakus (Bigfoot) was not an antecedent of man, but a convergent species. This was an animal that was aware of man, possibly dealing with him on a regular basis. Following this concept, it can also be surmised as to why Bigfoot went into hiding. Did it compete with humans for food, water and habitat? It can be postulated that due to its size and/or relative appearance to man and his primeval behavior that the two species simply could not coexist. Primitive man was likely frightened by Bigfoot, and it is possible that he tried to scare it off, and at times hunt Bigfoot for food.
quotes.author: M.P. Raymond

quotes.quote: Unlike UFOs, Bigfoot sightings are not just limited to a certain segment of our population. Bigfoot sightings have been reported by all types of people, but after a thorough review of the data, I have determined that there are generally two types of people who are more apt to report a Bigfoot sighting. The data is inconclusive as to whether these two types of people have actually seen Bigfoot more often than other types; it just might be that they are more apt to report it. These two types of people are mushroom pickers, and cannabis enthusiasts. One popular theory for this is that Bigfoot might actually be attracted to tie-dyed clothing and the smell of burning cannabis, but this has never actually been proven.
quotes.author: Jim Griffin

quotes.quote: Today’s Sasquatch seekers have come to realize, through the DNA analysis of Sasquatch hair, droppings and nail clippings that what they used to call 'the creature,' the 'monster' and 'the missing link,' is in fact human. They are large hairy humans but can’t we celebrate diversity and accept others whose physical appearance may be different than our own? You would never think of calling a logger a 'brush ape,' to their face anyway so why is it okay to call the Sasquatch People 'swamp monsters'? This startling new DNA evidence proves what the Native Americans have said all along. The Sasquatch are people. Still, Bigfoot Hunters want to prove the existence of the Sasquatch People so they can be protected but given our record of protecting other indigenous people, I’d head for the hills before I got discovered if I was a Sasquatch.
quotes.author: Pat Neal

quotes.quote: The world is full of big hairy things. Bigfoot, moose, pandas, Seth Rogen, bears, these monsters are everywhere, and they all have one thing in common — they smell awful. Okay, two things. They’re also dangerous.
quotes.author: Jason Offutt

quotes.quote: Bigfoot is at least twice as big as a basking shark, lion, deer, bear, or Jessica Alba’s bodyguards, has a much larger cranial capacity, and has opposable thumbs. People who want to save Bigfoot cite the beast is too human to kill. Are you kidding? That just makes it a killing machine.
quotes.author: Jason Offutt

quotes.quote: When it comes to Bigfoot encounters, lumberjacks and drunken rednecks are your friend. Think about it. They’re 1) big and hairy themselves, 2) fearless, 3) heavily armed, and 4) always ready for a fight. Watching this would be like sitting in the front row of bear wrestling at a rural bar.
quotes.author: Jason Offutt

quotes.quote: Researchers and witnesses have speculated Bigfoot may be a remnant Neanderthal from the Geico commercials, a Pleistocene ape known as Gigantopithecus, an extraterrestrial, or the brother from Everybody Loves Raymond.
quotes.author: Jason Offutt

quotes.quote: Is Bigfoot a legitimate outdoor danger? There’s no way to really know—but yes. There is, however, a surefire way to avoid such a ferociously terrifying beast: Become an Indoorsman. Other than the 1987 family comedy Harry and the Hendersons, which starred John Lithgow, there is no record of a Sasquatch-type animal ever attempting to venture over a threshold and into an indoor space.
quotes.author: John Driver

quotes.quote: The bigfoot, as a species (Binomial Name: Homo Sasquatchis), does indeed exist. The Sasquatch is by nature, a very private animal. Guess what the 'natural enemy' of Bigfoot is? Humans, deforestation, you know . . . Manifest Destiny. What do you think that Bigfoot preys on? Cause they aren’t herbivores. They don’t eat honey. They eat: bears, coyotes, deer! And as humans spread farther and farther into Sasquatch territory and we send more unregulated 'Bigfoot Hunters' into the woods, well I think you can do the math: we scare bigfoot off and we have more bears, coyotes and deer to deal with.
quotes.author: Shawn Wickens

quotes.quote: Is the plural of Bigfoot 'Bigfoots' or 'Bigfeet'?
quotes.author: Michael Justice

quotes.quote: Aw, poor guy. I understand. It ain't easy being banished. Take my buddy Bigfoot. When he was banished he fashioned an enormous diaper out of poison ivy. Wore it on his head like a tiara. Called himself 'King Itchy.'
quotes.author: Yeti

quotes.quote: Yo momma's so hairy, Bigfoot takes pictures of her.
quotes.author: Rich from Astoria

quotes.quote: No, Bigfoot is a myth created to keep white people out of the woods.
quotes.author: Alva Keel

quotes.quote: B.A., do you know what you've done? Bigfoot got one look at you and high-tailed it back into the woods to warn his friends. I wouldn't be surprised if the Bigfoots didn't even have a a reward out on you!
quotes.author: Murdock

quotes.quote: Eh, what are you doing? He's both happy and quiet. Like seeing a unicorn and Bigfoot at the same time.
quotes.author: Leonard Hofstadter

quotes.quote: Yeah, the Loch Ness monster and Bigfoot wanted to know if you were still on for poker tomorrow night over at Darth Vader's house. The Klingons are bringing chips.
quotes.author: Kelly Bundy

quotes.quote: There's only one thing in the mountains that leaves a track like this. The creature of legend that roams the Timberline. My people named him Sasquatch. You call him... Bigfoot.
quotes.author: Tom Raintree

quotes.quote: What'd I see the other day that lacks style... 'My wife ran off with Bigfoot'. You're gonna tell everyone in the world you're such a shit to live with that she ran off with a beast?
quotes.author: Gallagher

quotes.quote: They call me Sasquatch, please check the watch / This is Bigfoot, don't get it shook / Out in Japan they call me Godzilla / Up in Africa, King Kong gorilla
quotes.author: O'Shea Jackson; Richard Bartell

quotes.quote: Down where the Sasquatch hide, in the misty mountainside, he's got shiny diamonds and he's got to protect . . . / Look into the Sasquatch eye, then you know that Sass can fly, Sasquatch is my Daddy and he's going to protect me! / Half man and half machine, on the cover of a magazine, / Bigfoot is my father and he's got to protect me! / These lyrics don't make sense, think I found the evidence, that yeti is my papa and he wants to protect me!
quotes.author: Thomas Jack Black; Kyle Richard Gass; John Robert King

quotes.quote: The Sasquatch is the strongest animal on the planet.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The inclination to believe in the fantastic may strike some as a failure in logic, or gullibility, but it's really a gift. A world that might have Bigfoot and the Loch Ness Monster is clearly superior to one that definitely does not.
quotes.author: Chris Van Allsburg

quotes.quote: We just haven't found Bigfoot because the world is big. And the woods are deep. The more TV shows that we can get where people go out looking for Bigfoot, the better our chances are. So let's get more of those shows going.
quotes.author: Rob Huebel

quotes.quote: They hunt and do all their work at night. They frequently come in the night and steal their salmon from their nets and eat them raw. If the people are awake they always know when they are coming very near, which is most intolerable.
quotes.author: Elkanah Walker

quotes.quote: Bigfoot loves celebrities. You just have to bring celebrities that Bigfoot loves. It would probably be just gorgeous women.
quotes.author: Rob Huebel

quotes.quote: Bigfoot may well be an extraterrestrial, because remember Chewbacca?
quotes.author: George Noory

quotes.quote: Strange tales of giant beasts. Half ape and half human. Massive footprints of mystery creatures found around the globe.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sasquatch and Bigfoot sightings almost always occur in or near bear habitats.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People must look at the bigger picture. We cannot continue doing things as was in the past. People must learn to accept change.
quotes.author: Pierre Voges

quotes.quote: You don't realize at the time the lessons you gain, but you see the bigger picture later on.
quotes.author: Randy Gipson

quotes.quote: Everything happens for a reason, everything is part of a puzzle that, even at the time, if we don't understand the bigger picture, everything has significant role in what's to come in the future.
quotes.author: Jon Connor

quotes.quote: Learn to see the big picture. Often times we get tunnel vision and lose sight of the big picture and what we're really trying to accomplish.
quotes.author: Robert Cheeke

quotes.quote: Life is a marathon, not a sprint. It's about taking a bigger-picture approach.
quotes.author: Ivanka Trump

quotes.quote: Become a positive person by seeing the bigger picture of whatever you dream of doing. Dream big and act big! It's your time to have a bigger image of you!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: We make small fixes with programs to emphasize key areas, but we don't think strategically about the bigger picture, ... We can't afford to leave the future of our nation's higher education community to chance.
quotes.author: Margaret Spellings

quotes.quote: I liked his ability to deal with a lot of the negativity that surrounded him. Even though he was in a world that he didn't want to be in, he still saw the bigger picture.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.quote: We are all on a collision course with ourselves. Inevitably, our existing habits will be counter-productive to achieving our bigger picture goals. To avoid the crash, we need to regularly review how we are doing things and make adjustments as needed.
quotes.author: John Fairclough

quotes.quote: Consciously or subconsciously, we become slaves to debt and social obligation. As a result, we end up more committed to the minutia and less in tune with the bigger picture: our deepest sense of purpose.
quotes.author: Romany Malco

quotes.quote: When things don't happen in my life, I believe that I've been pushed into another path for a reason, and there's a bigger picture.
quotes.author: Alex Scott

quotes.quote: It's only now that I see the bigger picture: Our ways to attain spirituality may be different - through diverse religious, customs and traditions - but they're modeled on similar principles and ideologies. That's what ties us all together.
quotes.author: Sunita Williams

quotes.quote: We become what we think; we don't become what we don't think about. When we think of a bigger picture, that's what we get printed.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: I'm living for myself, everything I do is to achieve my goals, so I'd love to stop caring so much about what I want by then and maybe focus on a bigger picture.
quotes.author: Keiynan Lonsdale

quotes.quote: When you live with a 20/20 mindset your path is straight, vision is clear, and decisions are precise. You see the bigger picture with a broader view and incorporate different angles and perspectives.
quotes.author: Farshad Asl

quotes.quote: For hers were the eyes that would hook on to the tiny details of the bigger picture.
quotes.author: Aarsha Sadar

quotes.quote: Life is too short to talk about the small, unimportant things when you catch the bigger picture.
quotes.author: Mya

quotes.quote: Places are part of nature, of the bigger picture. We are interrelated. When we contemplate them in their own right, they can sometimes change our lives; they can become spiritual experiences.
quotes.author: Etel Adnan

quotes.quote: I think the bigger picture message they're getting is how the health care system in this country is structured really makes a difference in people's lives.
quotes.author: Vicky Rideout

quotes.quote: Intellectuals are good at seeing the big picture. But they are not so good at process.
quotes.author: Michael Ignatieff

quotes.quote: You definitely have to think of the perception of things before you actually do certain things. It may not seem like it's a big deal to you yourself, but there's a bigger picture.
quotes.author: Ezekiel Elliott

quotes.quote: The best rides are the ones where you bite off much more than you can chew, and live through it.
quotes.author: Doug Bradbury

quotes.quote: A bicycle ride around the world begins with a single pedal stroke.
quotes.author: Scott Stoll

quotes.quote: If you worried about falling off the bike, you'd never get on.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Riding bicycles will not only benefit the individual doing it, but the world at large.
quotes.author: Udo E. Simonis

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. If you want to stay balanced you've got to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When you're riding, only the race in which you're riding is important.
quotes.author: Bill Shoemaker

quotes.quote: Learn to ride a bicycle. You will not regret it if you live.
quotes.author: Macrobioticos

quotes.quote: We find in biking the fullfilment of an antique instinct: vagabondage
quotes.author: Maurice Barres

quotes.quote: Faster, Faster, until the thrill of speed overcomes the fear of death.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: If biking is your passion, set aside time to enjoy a good ride.
quotes.author: Patrick Dempsey

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. In order to keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When your legs scream stop and your lungs are bursting, that's when it starts. That's the hurt locker. Winners love it in there.
quotes.author: Chris McCormack

quotes.quote: When you ride a bike and you get your heart rate up and you're out, after 30 or 40 minutes your mind tends to expand; it tends to relax.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: The secret in riding is to do few things right. The more one does, the less one succeeds. The less one does, the more one succeeds.
quotes.author: Nuno Oliveira

quotes.quote: Riding a bike works your legs but not your brain. Playing chess works your mind but not your body. Climbing brings it all together.
quotes.author: Pat Ament

quotes.quote: Ride as much or as little, as long or as short as you feel. But ride.
quotes.author: Eddy Merckx

quotes.quote: People ride bikes thinking there's nothing wrong with them. And, that's not always the case.
quotes.author: Ernest Berry

quotes.quote: Bicycling is a big part of the future. It has to be. There's something wrong with a society that drives a car to workout in a gym.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: Nothing compares to the simple pleasure of riding a bike.
quotes.author: John F Kennedy

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. You don't fall off unless you plan to stop pedaling.
quotes.author: Claude Pepper

quotes.quote: When you're riding a bike you're more connected to the outdoors and to other people than you are when you are stuck in your car.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: Riding a race bike is an art a thing that you do because you feel something inside.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.quote: Until mountain biking came along, the bike scene was ruled by a small elite cadre of people who seemed allergis to enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Jacquie Phelan

quotes.quote: Cyling has done more to emancipate women than anything else in the world.
quotes.author: Susan B Anthony

quotes.quote: The secret to mountain biking is pretty simple. The slower you go the more likely it is you'll crash.
quotes.author: Juli Furtado

quotes.quote: Biking is a good alternative. Use the city as your gym.
quotes.author: Ilana Glazer

quotes.quote: Until mountain biking came along, the bike scene was ruled by a small elite cadre of people who seemed allergic to enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Jacquie Phelan

quotes.quote: Riding is a complicated joy. You learn something each time. It is never quite the same, and you never know it all.
quotes.author: Monica Dickens

quotes.quote: Biking is about rhythm and flow. It's the wind in you face and the challenge of hammering up along hill. It's the reward at the top and the thrill of a high-speed descent. Biking lets you come alive in both body and spirit. After awhile the bike disappears beneath you and you feel as if you're suspended in midair.
quotes.author: Gary Klein

quotes.quote: It is by riding a bicycle that you learn the contours of a country best, since you have to sweat up the hills and coast down them.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Obviously you need to have a bike. But I don't mean an ordinary bike. You see, not all mountain bikes are the same. Remember this: riding on a wrong bike increases your chances of accidents.
quotes.author: Spruce Goose Enterprices

quotes.quote: Some bikers just want to ride without worrying about rules or guidelines. The excitement of going down a mountain any way possible is what inspires freeriding.
quotes.author: Elliott Smith

quotes.quote: Mastering all the cool moves in mountain biking takes years of practice. Getting outside and learning how to ride is a great first step.
quotes.author: Elliott Smith

quotes.quote: Mountain biking is a great wat to stay active, make new friends, and enjoy the outdoors!
quotes.author: Elliott Smith

quotes.quote: Mountain biking is more complicated than just getting on your bike and riding into the woods. But that's part of what makes it fun--going downhill, making quick turns, dodging roots and fallen trees, and climbing hills.
quotes.author: Aaron Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Mountain biking allows riders to challenge themselves on difficult, steep terrain. Mountain bike racing draws experienced riders who think that just riding off-road isn't extreme enough.
quotes.author: Chris Hayhurst

quotes.quote: If you talk about mountain biking, you are living on the edge. You are extreme just because you are different.
quotes.author: Chris Hayhurst

quotes.quote: Just riding a mountain bike may not be too hard, but when you make it extreme, the level of difficulty goes way, way up. Today an extreme sport also requires an adventurous attitude--the kind of attitude that says there are no limits.	Just riding a mountain bike may not be too hard, but when you make it extreme, the level of difficulty goes way, way up. Today an extreme sport also requires an adventurous attitude--the kind of attitude that says there are no limits.
quotes.author: Chris Hayhurst

quotes.quote: Try mountain biking. You'll find an adventure with every ride. In mountain you can be as extreme as you want to be.
quotes.author: Chris Hayhurst

quotes.quote: You're flying down a mountain trail, bouncing over rocks, jumping over logs, racing the wind. You're on a mountain bike, having the time of your life.
quotes.author: Michael Teitelbaum

quotes.quote: You've probably ridden a bike of some kind--in a playground, on a quiet street, or even on a smooth, paved trail. But when you hop on a mountain bike, you're entering a whole new world of fun and fitness.
quotes.author: Michael Teitelbaum

quotes.quote: The sport of mountain biking combines the thrill of riding a bike with the beauty of exploring nature's wonders.
quotes.author: Michael Teitelbaum

quotes.quote: On mountain bike, you'll discover wooded trails and rugged mountain paths as you pedal.
quotes.author: Michael Teitelbaum

quotes.quote: If you enjoy hiking and you enjoy bike riding, mountain biking is the perfect way to combine the two. You can cover much ground in a single day of outdoor fun than walking, so you get to see more of the great outdoors.
quotes.author: Michael Teitelbaum

quotes.quote: Mountain biking is a great way to experience new terrain. Riding trails can also teach a biker about local history.
quotes.author: Scott Wurdinger

quotes.quote: Mountain biking is an extreme sport. Extreme sports are daring, highspeed competitions in which athletes showcase incredible tricks.
quotes.author: Kelley MacAulay

quotes.quote: Do you ever wish you could fly a forest line an owl? Or follow a trail like a deer, leaves crackling beneath you? Have you ever wanted to whiz through the trees as the sun streamed through the leaves? One sport combines the fast pace of bike riding with the enjoyment of seeing nature up close. That sport is mountain biking.
quotes.author: Andy King

quotes.quote: On a bike, you can climb hills and jump logs in your path. You can test your sense of balance and your reflexes on challenging courses. You can follow a path or make your own.
quotes.author: Andy King

quotes.quote: Some people ride mountain bikes just for fun or exercise. For others, mountain biking is an extreme sport.
quotes.author: Kathleen W. Deady

quotes.quote: Mountain biking is more than just a leisure activity or sport--for many it is a way of life. More and more people are taking to the hills to ride trails.
quotes.author: Clive Forth

quotes.quote: Dirt bikes make it possible to travel areas where other vehicles would get stuck.
quotes.author: S.L. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Many dirt bikes owners also love to test their riding skill in motocross competitions.
quotes.author: S.L. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Imagine you are riding on a dirt bike. Warm air blows past you as you speed along hilly trails. You may even do special stunts, such as jumps or spins.
quotes.author: Sarah Tieck

quotes.quote: Many parts work together to make it move. A dirt bike is an amazing vehicle.
quotes.author: Sarah Tieck

quotes.quote: Some people ride dirt bikes for recreation, such as outdoor adventures.
quotes.author: Sarah Tieck

quotes.quote: To be a racer you have to do two things: have fun and know the tricks of the trade to get you around the trail as quickly as possible.
quotes.author: Ann Trombley

quotes.quote: Riding mountain bikes and competing in races are two totally different challenges. What could be better than being outside and seeing the most beautiful places while being able to hang out with a great group of people?
quotes.author: Ann Trombley

quotes.quote: Have you been mountain biking? Imagine flying through the forest with the wind whistling in your ears and tires crunching the ground below. Then you set off through some incredible landscape. These are the types of places that will provide some of the most incredible cycling experiences of your life.
quotes.author: Paul Molenberg

quotes.quote: It's much more than just riding a bike. It's an awesome experience that's difficult to meaningfully describe to those who've never tried it, something that instills a passion that can turn into an outright addiction and way of life.
quotes.author: Paul Molenberg

quotes.quote: It's true that there are inherent risks with mountain biking, but you don't have to get hurt; it's not a foregone destiny.
quotes.author: Paul Molenberg

quotes.quote: Those who know nothing of foreign languages know nothing of their own
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A special kind of beauty exists which is born in language, of language, and for language.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: A different language is a different vision of life.
quotes.author: Federico Fellini

quotes.quote: The more languages you know, the more human you are.
quotes.author: Tomáš Garrigue Masaryk

quotes.quote: It is literally the case that learning languages makes you smarter. The neural networks in the brain strengthen as a result of language learning.
quotes.author: Michael Gove

quotes.quote: We invent the world through language. The world occurs through language.
quotes.author: Mal Pancoast

quotes.quote: Bilingual means someone who speaks more than one language!
quotes.author: Susan Harris

quotes.quote: Now I'm not the kid you want to go with, know it / Good and well that I'm the bilingual poet
quotes.author: Julio R Gonzalez

quotes.quote: I marvel at people who are bilingual--that it is, who use two or more languages in their everyday life.
quotes.author: François Grosjean

quotes.quote: With so many languages in the world , a lot of contact is bound to take place between people of different language groups. And with such language contact, bilingualism will arise.
quotes.author: François Grosjean

quotes.quote: Among other factors leading to bilingualism, three come to mind: bilingual families, peoples professions, and deafness.
quotes.author: François Grosjean

quotes.quote: Today's workplace is very often bilingual, if not multilingual.
quotes.author: François Grosjean

quotes.quote: Bilingualism is a topic which must be treated on two levels at once - simultaneously as sociology and a psychology, just as learning a second language must be seen both as acquiring a culture and as embracing a new personal identity.
quotes.author: Colin Baker

quotes.quote: Bilingualism is a field of paradoxes as well.
quotes.author: Colin Baker

quotes.quote: Bilingualism exits as a possession of an individual. It is also possible to talk about bilingualism as a characteristic of a group or community of people.
quotes.author: Colin Baker

quotes.quote: A bilingual person's competence in a language may vary over time and according to changing circumstances.
quotes.author: Colin Baker

quotes.quote: It is more normal than not for people in most parts of the world to speak more than one language.
quotes.author: Safder Alladina

quotes.quote: A bilingual person knows, understands and uses two or more languages. Bilingual person may read and write in two languages.
quotes.author: Safder Alladina

quotes.quote: In most part of the world, people speak more than one language simply because they grow up doing so.
quotes.author: Safder Alladina

quotes.quote: Like many social issues receives the most attention in the press when legislation is being contested.
quotes.author: Josue M. Gonzalez

quotes.quote: Bilingualism emerges when two different language communities come into sustained contact.
quotes.author: Josue M. Gonzalez

quotes.quote: Bilingualism is more valuable when some members of each language are not bilingual.
quotes.author: Josue M. Gonzalez

quotes.quote: The language people speak influence the cultural values they acquire as part of their bilingual worlds.
quotes.author: Josue M. Gonzalez

quotes.quote: Learning another language is not only learning for the same things, but learning another way to think about things.
quotes.author: Flora Lewis

quotes.quote: No two languages are ever sufficiently similar to be considered as representing the same social reality.
quotes.author: Edward Sapir

quotes.quote: He who has two languages has two souls.
quotes.author: Quintus Ennius

quotes.quote: If we spoke a different language, we would perceive a somewhat different world.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote:
If you know two languages, the level of your intelligence
is multiplied a hundredfold in other people's eyes.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: To have another language is to possess a second soul.
quotes.author: Charlemagne

quotes.quote: One language sets you in a corridor for life. Two languages open every door along the way.
quotes.author: Frank Smith

quotes.quote: You can never understand one language until you understand at least two.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Willans and Ronald Searle

quotes.quote: A man who can speak two languages is worth two men.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The Bill of Rights isn't some legalistic fine print. It was written to make our lives freer, more prosperous, and happier. By forsaking it, America has become no better than any other country in the world.
quotes.author: Harry Browne

quotes.quote: The Bill of Rights is the United States. The United States is the Bill of Rights. Compromise the Bill of Rights and you dissolve the very foundation upon which the Union stands.
quotes.author: A.E. Samaan

quotes.quote: The Bill of Rights is a remarkable document because it weaves into the fabric of our democracy the idea that government has a responsibility to protect individual liberty.
quotes.author: Ted Lieu

quotes.quote: The Bill of Rights is a born rebel. It reeks with sedition. In every clause it shakes its fist in the face of constituted authority. It is the one guaranty of human freedom to the American people.
quotes.author: Frank I. Cobb

quotes.quote: If you're patriotic, stand up for the Bill of Rights because once they strip your rights from you, you will pay hell to get them back. You will and we're in the process of it right now.
quotes.author: Jessse Ventura

quotes.quote: We have enjoyed so much freedom for so long that we are perhaps in danger of forgetting how much blood it cost to establish the Bill of Rights.
quotes.author: Felix Frankfurt

quotes.quote: If the Bill of Rights contains no guarantee that a citizen shall be secure against lethal poisons distributed either by private individuals or by public officials, it is surely only because our forefathers, despite their considerable wisdom and foresight, could conceive of no such problem.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: Nowhere in the Bill of Rights are the words 'unless inconvenient' to be found.
quotes.author: A.E. Samaan

quotes.quote: The Bill of Rights wasn’t enacted to give us any rights. It was enacted so the Government could not take away from us any rights that we already had.
quotes.author: Kenneth G. Eade

quotes.quote: A Bill of Rights is what the people are entitled to against every government, and what no just government should refuse, or rest on inference.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The Bill of Rights isn't about us, it's about them. It isn't a list of things we're permitted to do, it's a list of things they aren't allowed even to consider.
quotes.author: L. Neil Smith

quotes.quote: The Framers of the Bill of Rights did not purport to 'create' rights. Rather, they designed the Bill of Rights to prohibit our Government from infringing rights and liberties presumed to be preexisting.
quotes.author: William J Brennan

quotes.quote: The whole of the Bill of Rights is a declaration of the right of the people at large or considered as individuals... It establishes some rights of the individual as unalienable and which consequently, no majority has a right to deprive them of.
quotes.author: Albert Galllatin

quotes.quote: The Bill of Rights does not come from the people and is not subject to change by majorities. It comes from the nature of things. It declares the inalienable rights of man not only against all government but also against the people collectively.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: There are only two things we should fight for. One is the defense of our homes and the other is the Bill of Rights.
quotes.author: Smedley Butler

quotes.quote: Who needs the protection of the Bill of Rights most? The weak, the most vulnerable in society.
quotes.author: Danny Kaye

quotes.quote: Democracy, in any rational form, also imposes conditions on majority rule. That's what the Bill of Rights is about, for example.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Our Bill of Rights, the most precious part of our legal heritage, is under subtle and pervasive attacks... In the struggle between our world and Communism, the temptation to imitate totalitarian security methods must be resisted day by day... When the rights of any individual or group are chipped away, the freedom of all erodes.
quotes.author: Earl Warren

quotes.quote: We have a Bill of Rights, which protects each of us from a bullying society, but no Bill of Responsibilities, which would oblige us to answer to the needs of others.
quotes.author: Scott Sanders

quotes.quote: The Bill of Rights was intended to secure freedom of speech - the freedom of speech of members of parliament to speak freely rather than be at threat of... the threat of an over powerful monarch at the time.
quotes.author: William Hague

quotes.quote: Of the billionaires I have known, money just brings out the basic traits in them. If they were jerks before they had money, they are simply jerks with a billion dollars.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The smartest billionaires I know never finished high school. I got my degree and my doctorate on the street and an advanced degree in jail.
quotes.author: Tommy Chong

quotes.quote: One of the many qualities that separate self-made billionaires from the rest of us is their ability to ask the right questions.
quotes.author: Justine Musk

quotes.quote: I never wanted to be on any billionaires list. I never define myself by net worth. I always try to define myself by my values.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: I find the fact that billionaires are quoted as if the fact that they are billionaires gives them some kind of wisdom is outrageous.
quotes.author: Ben Elton

quotes.quote: The death of a billionaire is worth more to the media than the lives of a billion poor people.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Billionaires’ working hours are twenty-four seven. They don’t wait till Monday.
quotes.author: Sophie Page

quotes.quote: Billionaires should never be responsible for solving problems, because they're not the government.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Millionaires don't use astrology...the billionaires do.
quotes.author: J. P. Morgan

quotes.quote: The best way to become a billionaire is to help a billion people.
quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

quotes.quote: The billionaire who sits on his money and doesn't do anything for the common good - I'm not interested in that person.
quotes.author: Arpad Busson

quotes.quote: I'm not a paranoid deranged millionaire. Goddamit, I'm a billionaire.
quotes.author: Howard Hughes

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter who you vote for. It's still the same billionaires that run the world.
quotes.author: Geezer Butler

quotes.quote: When billionaire car dealers or manufacturers pay for ambassadorships, at least they pay with money earned by selling something of value.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.quote: Look at all the billionaires. If I know 15 billionaires, I know 13 unhappy people.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: Some billionaires like cars, yachts and private jets. Others like newspapers.
quotes.author: Andrew Ross Sorkin

quotes.quote: When you look at billionaires, many of them share one characteristic: They were not born billionaires.
quotes.author: Sergio Ermotti

quotes.quote: Ever wonder why billionaires always need more and more money? It's a power trip.
quotes.author: Sebastian Roche

quotes.quote: You can't become a billionaire stepping over children sleeping on the street.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.quote: Unless you're one of the five billionaires out there who don't have to worry about anything, every aspect of everything is stressful, no matter what your job is.
quotes.author: Peter Gallagher

quotes.quote: Billionaire investors know they're going to be wrong, so they have a plan to protect against wrong.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Binary approach is an obsolete school of thought in the process of structuring human perception towards reality. True nature of the reality fits better with spectrum approach.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Of course, technology is not an exogenous force over which humans have no control. We are not constrained by a binary choice between acceptance and rejection. Rather, the decisions we make every day as citizens, consumers, and investors guide technological progress.
quotes.author: Klaus Schwab

quotes.quote: Obviously there is no such thing as race, and in many ways, sex is a continuum, not a binary. So it doesn't make sense to label people in that way.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: A film is sort of binary - it either works or it doesn't work. It has nothing to do with how good a job you do. If you bring it up to an adequate level where the audience goes with the movie, then it works, that is all.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: In our business, things look like a failure until they're not. It's pretty binary transitions.
quotes.author: Satya Nadella

quotes.quote: A literary solution to a binary problem. It might work.
quotes.author: Peter S. Fischer

quotes.quote: He's soulless. He's made up of binary numbers.
quotes.author: Jane Espenson

quotes.quote: A planet where gender is no longer binary... nor is technology.
quotes.author: Adam Green

quotes.quote: As I understand pregnancy, it's a binary state. You either are or you aren't.
quotes.author: Aaron Sorkin

quotes.quote: It's not binary. You can be decent and gifted at the same time.
quotes.author: Aaron Sorkin

quotes.quote: Screaming is fun, I think, at a skatepark. It's screaming and quiet, very binary.
quotes.author: Flula Borg

quotes.quote: Firing a gun is a binary choice. You either pull the trigger or you don't...
quotes.author: Sam Lake

quotes.quote: Gender is not always binary. People are afraid of what they don't know.
quotes.author: Dick Wolf

quotes.quote: You've been staring at a computer screen way too long, homie. Life's not that binary.
quotes.author: Sam Esmail

quotes.quote: I find it difficult to take communication advice from a guy who talks to his girlfriend in binary.
quotes.author: Donald P. Bellisario

quotes.quote: Life is binary: zero and ones. Only two things keep a group like this together; fear or loyalty - and I don't see a drop of fear amongst you guys.
quotes.author: Chris Morgan

quotes.quote: I'll tell you a simple rule. Understanding is binary. Zero or One. If you understand what's being said, you pass. If you don't understand what's being said, you fail.
quotes.author: Pushpendra Nath Misra

quotes.quote: We're a binary heart / Tear each other apart / Growing from the same stem / They were us, we were them / On a course to collide / Is it strength not to hide?
quotes.author: Benjamin

quotes.quote: Binary, a centrifugal force / Pushing us far away, that's our eternity / Binary, we can't escape the force / Crushing us, gravity is our eternity
quotes.author: Benjamin

quotes.quote: I'm a binary code that you cracked long ago, but to you I'm just a novel that you wish you never wrote
quotes.author: Daniel De Mussenden

quotes.quote: Binary stars, / Companions in the sky always in orbit / But never to collide / We're just not going supernova any time soon / We're just two stars out under the moon
quotes.author: Bryan Adams

quotes.quote: Told it to call a friend, didn't tell it to listen / So very scary, so binary, zero or one / Like or dislike, coal mine canary
quotes.author: Childish Gambino

quotes.quote: To see past tomorrow, / today in freefall / A binary motion / of polar extremes / All consciousness split / —dark hole of my dreams
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: The world is always changing and, right now, the number of people identifying outside of binary categories is one of the biggest and most obvious of those changes.
quotes.author: CN Lester

quotes.quote: When we turn to the wider world, we see a good deal of binary thinking.
quotes.author: Alex Iantaffi

quotes.quote: We're all living in this binary world and all have good reasons for exploring alternative ways of understanding and experiencing.
quotes.author: Alex Iantaffi

quotes.quote: Sexuality is the area where it's perhaps most acknowledged that something that has been assumed to be binary actually isn't?
quotes.author: Alex Iantaffi

quotes.quote: It's important to point out that one exciting feature of non-binary activism is the tendency to the challenge and blur other binaries beyond just the gender binary.
quotes.author: Christina Richards

quotes.quote: Binary options Trading is as easy as predicting if a flip coin is up or down..
quotes.author: Benjamin Daniel

quotes.quote: Binaries are a complex phenomenon that continues to be defined, conceptualized, and constructed from multiple and heterogeneous perspectives.
quotes.author: Warren Midgley

quotes.quote: A crucial element of binaries-- and hence of the potential for disrupting them--is their integral connection with constructions of the other and of otherness.
quotes.author: Warren Midgley

quotes.quote: Binary representations of reality are at the core of all human thinking.
quotes.author: Aki-Mauri Huhtinen

quotes.quote: Binary representations of self and other are therefore vital for the formation of identity, and for the sense of uniqueness of the self.
quotes.author: Aki-Mauri Huhtinen

quotes.quote: When binaries are broken apart, new space is made for diversity, difference, and multiplicity.
quotes.author: James M. Decker

quotes.quote: Western culture likes binaries: life feels less frightening when we can separate good and evil into tidy heaps, when we split off the mind from the body, when men are masculine and women are feminine.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: Knowing about binary is one thing, thinking and calculating in binary is all about a human practicing to be a computer.
quotes.author: Apurva Gaglani

quotes.quote: Binary Codes Usually , the digital data is represented , stored and transmitted as groups of binary digits ( bits )
quotes.author: A.P.Godse

quotes.quote: The group of bits , also known as binary code , represent both numbers and letters of the alphabets as well as many special characters and control functions.
quotes.author: A.P.Godse

quotes.quote: Binary computers use the binary numbering system to represent numbers and to perform math computations.
quotes.author: Deborah Morley

quotes.quote: The binary number system is the one which is used in computers and is based on the fundamental concept of decimal number system.
quotes.author: J.B. dixit

quotes.quote: Chair or no chair: a binary relation. But the vicissitudes of moving the body around are infinite. You never know what a person in a chair can do.
quotes.author: Sarah Manguso

quotes.quote: Anyone with a child knows that children learn about the world through binary options: up or down, hot or cold, big or little, inside or outside, wet or dry, good or bad, boy or girl, man or woman.
quotes.author: Phyllis Schlafly

quotes.quote: Masculinity is part of a binary and requires its opposite, since, in the absence of femininity, masculinity would have no meaning.
quotes.author: Sheila Jeffreys

quotes.quote: The simplest kind of decision is binary: that is, the question can be answered, in principle at least, by either yes or no.
quotes.author: E. J. W Barber

quotes.quote: Laughter is binary: It either happens or it doesn't. As each joke arrives in the course of a film, the cavernous space of the theater is either filled with joy and laughter or with the quiet of cringing embarrassment. Every time you step to the plate to make a joke, you're going to experience one or the other.
quotes.author: David Dobkin

quotes.quote: There is a double rhythm in all human beings. We are binary beings â€“ two arms, two legs, two eyes, two ears. Two legs for walking. And the heartbeat thumping in our chest mirrors that.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: The virtue of binary is that it's the simplest possible way of representing numbers. Anything else is more complicated. You can catch errors with it, it's unambiguous in its reading, there are lots of good things about binary. So it is very, very simple once you learn how to read it.
quotes.author: George M. Whitesides

quotes.quote: This idea that a book can either be about character and feeling, or about politics and idea, is just a false binary. Ideas are an expression of the feelings and the intense emotions we hold about the world.
quotes.author: Richard Powers

quotes.quote: At its most fundamental, information is a binary choice. In other words, a single bit of information is one yes-or-no choice.
quotes.author: James Gleick

quotes.quote: Unity can only be manifested by the Binary. Unity itself and the idea of Unity are already two.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Digital time does not flow; it flicks. Like any binary, discrete decision, it is either here or there. In contrast to our experience of the passing of time, digital time is always in the now, or in no time. It is still. Poised.
quotes.author: Douglas Rushkoff

quotes.quote: Biodiversity is the greatest treasure we have... Its diminishment is to be prevented at all cost.
quotes.author: Thomas Eisner

quotes.quote: We advocate biodiversity for biodiversity's sake. It may take our extinction to set things straight.
quotes.author: David Foreman

quotes.quote: If we pollute the air, water and soil that keep us alive and well, and destroy the biodiversity that allows natural systems to function, no amount of money will save us.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.quote: Biodiversity is the totality of all inherited variation in the life forms of Earth, of which we are one species. We study and save it to our great benefit. We ignore and degrade it to our great peril.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: The preservation of biodiversity is not just a job for governments. International and non-governmental organisations, the private sector and each and every individual have a role to play in changing entrenched outlooks and ending destructive patterns of behaviour.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: The value of biodiversity is that it makes our ecosystems more resilient, which is a prerequisite for stable societies; its wanton destruction is akin to setting fire to our lifeboat.
quotes.author: Johan Rockstrom

quotes.quote: Look closely at nature. Every species is a masterpiece, exquisitely adapted to the particular environment in which it has survived. Who are we to destroy or even diminish biodiversity?
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: Biodiversity starts in the distant past and it points toward the future.
quotes.author: Frans Lanting

quotes.quote: It is that range of biodiversity that we must care for - the whole thing - rather than just one or two stars.
quotes.author: David Attenborough

quotes.quote: We should preserve every scrap of biodiversity as priceless while we learn to use it and come to understand what it means to humanity.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: To survive, humans need food, water, and air. Yet biodiversity, the Earth's bodies of water, and the planet's atmosphere are all under threat.
quotes.author: Graciela Chichilnisky

quotes.quote: We're losing biodiversity globally at an alarming rate, and we need a cornucopia of different plants and animals, for the planet's health and our own.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: Protecting biodiversity is just as important and critical to the survival of mankind as stabilizing the climate. Species protection and climate are interdependent.
quotes.author: Klaus Topfer

quotes.quote: To many people, 'biodiversity' is almost synonymous with the word 'nature,' and 'nature' brings to mind steamy forests and the big creatures that dwell there. Fair enough. But biodiversity is much more than that, for it encompasses not only the diversity of species, but also the diversity within species.
quotes.author: Cary Fowler

quotes.quote: Biodiversity can't be maintained by protecting a few species in a zoo, or by preserving greenbelts or national parks. To function properly, nature needs more room than that. It can maintain itself, however, without human expense, without zookeepers, park rangers, foresters or gene banks. All it needs is to be left alone.
quotes.author: Donella Meadows

quotes.quote: People still do not understand that a live fish is more valuable than a dead one, and that destructive fishing techniques are taking a wrecking ball to biodiversity.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.quote: Collective human actions are transforming, even ravaging, the biosphere - perhaps irreversibly - through global warming and loss of biodiversity.
quotes.author: Martin Rees

quotes.quote: The evolution of the cosmos invokes in me a sense of mystery; the increase in biodiversity invokes the response of humility; and an understanding of the evolution of death offers me helpful ways to think about my own death.
quotes.author: Ursula Goodenough

quotes.quote: Whether we consciously realize it or not, the biodiversity with which we are most familiar, and the biodiversity with which we have most intimate historical, cultural and biological connections, is that associated with food plants.
quotes.author: Cary Fowler

quotes.quote: There is properly no history; only biography.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Live your life as if you are writing your Biography.
quotes.author: Keshia Chante

quotes.quote: Biography is the mesh through which real life escapes.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: When you read a biography remember that the truth is never fit for publication.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The immense appetite we have for biography comes from a deep-seated sense of equality.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: No great man lives in vain. The history of the world is but the biography of great men.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Writing a biography is not a love affair. It's not a marriage. It's a job, it's a piece of work.
quotes.author: Hermione Lee

quotes.quote: Biography can be the most middle-class of all forms, the judgment of little people avenging themselves on the great.
quotes.author: Edmund White

quotes.quote: A biography is considered complete if it merely accounts for six or seven selves, whereas a person may well have as many as a thousand.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Biography is a very definite region bounded on the north by history, on the south by fiction, on the east by obituary, and on the west by tedium.
quotes.author: Philip Guedalla

quotes.quote: All good biography, as all good fiction, comes down to the study of original sin, of our inherent disposition to choose death when we ought to choose life.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: Life is a biography, not a series of disconnected moments, more or less pleasurable but increasingly tedious and unsatisfying unless one imposes a purposive pattern upon them.
quotes.author: Anthony Daniels

quotes.quote: All history is biography.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Biography is the only true history.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Our theology must become biography.
quotes.author: Tim Hansel

quotes.quote: Your biography becomes your biology.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: A photograph is a biography of a moment.
quotes.author: Art Shay

quotes.quote: Someone calls biography the home aspect of history.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Your biography is not your destiny, your decisions are.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Biography is history seen through the prism of a person.
quotes.author: Louis Fischer

quotes.quote: History is neither more nor less than biography on a large scale.
quotes.author: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.quote: There is no psychology; there is only biography and autobiography.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: Once the implicit aim of biography was to uplift now it is to unveil.
quotes.author: Mark Feeney

quotes.quote: Biography is the most universally pleasant and profitable of all reading.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Biography is: a system in which the contradictions of a human life are unified.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.quote: You can use a biography to examine political power, but only if you pick the right guy.
quotes.author: Robert Caro

quotes.quote: The biography of a writer - or even the autobiography - will always have this incompleteness.
quotes.author: V. S. Naipaul

quotes.quote: For me the fascination with biography is the life of the individual in the context of history.
quotes.author: Rachel Holmes

quotes.quote: The art of biography is different from geography. Geography is about maps, but biography is about chaps.
quotes.author: Edmund Clerihew Bentley

quotes.quote: A biography should be a dissection and demonstration of how a particular human being was made and worked.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: Biography is essentially a collaborative art, the latest biographer collaborating with all those who wrote earlier.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Behind each biography there should always be a rich treasury of unformulated knowledge, a tapestry that has not been unrolled.
