quotes.quote: To me, the human experience does involve a great deal of anguish. It's joyful, but it's bittersweet. I just think that's life.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.quote: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: It is strange how often a heart must be broken before the years can make it wise.
quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

quotes.quote: Our sweetest songs are those of saddest thought.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: I finally understood what true love meant. Love meant that you care for another person's happiness more than your own, no matter how painful the choices you face might be.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: One of the hardest things in life is having words in your heart that you can't utter.
quotes.author: James Earl Jones

quotes.quote: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Life at best is bittersweet.
quotes.author: Jack Kirby

quotes.quote: The heart is the only broken instrument that works.
quotes.author: T. E. Kalem

quotes.quote: Life is bittersweet, when we can let darkness and light co-exist as illumination, we can live in true happiness. When we live life at its best, it is a symphony of feelings, of high and low notes, of tragedy and comedy, love and loss, magic and the sublime. It can be quite a spectacular journey when we fully embrace and accept it.
quotes.author: Jaeda Dewalt

quotes.quote: And no hand can gather up the fallen withered petals of the rose of youth.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Rudderless, we drift athwart a tempest, and when once the storm of youth is past, / Without lyre, without lute or chorus, / Death the silent pilot comes at last.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: How unbearable, for women, is a tenderness which a man can give them without love. For men, how bittersweet this is.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: It takes forty muscles to frown, and only twelve to jam a cupcake in your mouth and get over it.
quotes.author: Sarah Ockler

quotes.quote: I shall stay all day in the sun / Where the wide winds blow, -- / But oh, I shall cry at night / When none will know.
quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

quotes.quote: So even though I left you / Can't forget you / Oh when I think about you / It's bittersweet, it's bittersweet.
quotes.author: Stevie Scott

quotes.quote: At times / Part of me wants you, part of me don't / Part of me is missing you, part of me is gone / Part of me is saying that the love is still strong, / Part of me is letting go.
quotes.author: Stevie Scott

quotes.quote: The vines were beautiful, twining up through the split-rail fence and onto some nearby saplings, climbing and twisting up to the top of the branches. They produced beautiful golden leaves and brilliant orange berries in the fall, as they slowly choked the life out of the host plant.
quotes.author: Linda Cushman

quotes.quote: Even death is bittersweet when one has faith in eternal life in Christ.
quotes.author: Isabella Patton

quotes.quote: Poverty makes you sad as well as wise.
quotes.author: Bertholt Brecht

quotes.quote: Remember me when I am gone away, / Gone far away into the silent land. / Better by far you should forget and smile / Than you should remember and be sad.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Love has unbound my limbs and set me shaking, / A monster bittersweet and my unmaking.
quotes.author: Sappho

quotes.quote: Love— bittersweet, irrepressible, / Loosens my limbs and I tremble.
quotes.author: Sappho

quotes.quote: That which was bitter to endure may be sweet to remember.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The roots of education are bitter but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: When you are full you will refuse honey, but when you are hungry, even bitter food tastes sweet.
quotes.author: Proverbs 27:7

quotes.quote: ...the remembrance even of joy having its bitterness, and the memories of pleasure their pain.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Each kiss was nearer to the last one of all.
quotes.author: Philip Pullman

quotes.quote: I told you I loved you, but I said it a little too late. You move in time and sometimes our timing is against one another.
quotes.author: Dominic Riccitello

quotes.quote: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Mother's Day is a bittersweet day for many of us. We all have mothers, but some of us have lost them.
quotes.author: Faith Salie

quotes.quote: Sentimental outbreaks are like liquorice; when first you suck it, it's not bad, but afterwards it leaves a very nasty taste in the mouth.
quotes.author: Ivan Turgenev

quotes.quote: What I used to be will pass away and then you'll see / That all I want now is happiness for you and me.
quotes.author: Elliott Smith

quotes.quote: my own chocolate center has filled up with poison, / the roses he gave me all twisted black
quotes.author: Terra Elan McVoy

quotes.quote: That she was irreplaceable became a bittersweet loyalty: Her death was what I had now instead of her.
quotes.author: Gail Caldwell

quotes.quote: Birth is a bittersweet event ... a place where heaven and earth collide in a perplexing clash of hopes, dreams, facts, fears, questions, and expectations.
quotes.author: Debra Evans

quotes.quote: We feel a kind of bittersweet pricking of malicious delight in contemplating the misfortunes of others.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: To be running breathlessly, but not yet arrived, is itself delightful, a suspended moment of living hope.
quotes.author: Anne Carson

quotes.quote: You can measure the happiness of a marriage by the number of scars that each partner carries on their tongues, earned from years of biting back angry words.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: The black skin is not a badge of shame, but rather a glorious symbol of national greatness.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: Black is modest and arrogant at the same time. Black is lazy and easy- but mysterious.
quotes.author: Yohji Yamamoto

quotes.quote: In order for the light to shine so brightly, the darkness must be present.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Black detraction will find faults where they are not.
quotes.author: Philip Massinger

quotes.quote: Black care rarely sits behind the rider whose pace is fast enough.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The whisper of the dusk is night shedding its husk.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: The darkening of the world makes the irrationality of art rational: radically darkened art.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: Without black, no color has any depth. But if you mix black with everything, suddenly there's shadow - no, not shadow, but fullness. You've got to be willing to mix black into your palette if you want to creat something real.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Black is not sad... Black is poetic.
quotes.author: Ann Demeulemeester

quotes.quote: All the darkness in the world cannot extinguish the light of a single candle.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: Black consciousness is an attitude of the mind and a way of life, the most positive call to emanate from the black world for a long time.
quotes.author: Steven Biko

quotes.quote: Black is a pearl in a woman's eye.
quotes.author: George Chapman

quotes.quote: It is in the darkness that one finds the light.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: A life is black, whiten it as you will.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: It's always darkest before it becomes totally black.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: You can have any colour as long as it's black.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Black love is black wealth.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: dusk is the time when men whisper of matters about which they remain silent in the full light of the sun.
quotes.author: Simon Raven

quotes.quote: Better have a black face than be worried about black deeds.
quotes.author: Robert Lee

quotes.quote: There will never be a chanel collection without black.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Black Poetry is not for Black People...it is for everybody
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: Dusk is just an illusion because the sun is either above the horizon or below it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: It's always darkest before it turns absolutely pitch black.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: The darkness that surrounds us cannot hurt us. It is the darkness in your own heart you should fear.
quotes.author: Silvertris

quotes.quote: Black and white always looks modern, whatever that word means.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: The man in black travels with your soul in his pocket.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: And out of darkness came the hands that reach through nature, moulding men.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: The dusk runs down the lane driven like hail; Far off a precise whistle is escheat, To the dark; and then the towering weak and pale.
quotes.author: Allen Tate

quotes.quote: Diversity is not about embracing one's another uniqueness.
quotes.author: Ola Joseph

quotes.quote: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broekn men.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Hating people because of their color is wrong. And it doesn't matter which color does the hating. It's just plain wrong.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: One day our descendants will think it incredible that we paid so much attention to things like the amount of melanin in our skin or the shape of our eyes or our gender instead of the unique identities of each of us as complex human beings.
quotes.author: Franklin Thomas

quotes.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: You have seen how a man was made a slave; you shall see how a slave was made a man.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Black history is part of American history, and it should be treated as such.
quotes.author: Janelle Monae

quotes.quote: Freedom is never given; it is won.
quotes.author: A. Philip Randolph

quotes.quote: You can't separate peace from freedom because no one can be at peace unless he has his freedom.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Black history isn't a separate history. This is all of our history, this is American history, and we need to understand that. It has such an impact on kids and their values and how they view black people.
quotes.author: Karyn Parsons

quotes.quote: What we need is not a history of selected races or nations, but the history of the world void of national bias, race hate, and religious prejudice.
quotes.author: Carter Woodson

quotes.quote: Whatever we believe about ourselves and our ability comes true for us.
quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

quotes.quote: Education is for improving the lives of others and for leaving your community and world better thn you find it.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: We must never forget that Black History is American History. The achievements of African Americans have contributed to our nation's greatness.
quotes.author: Yvette Clarke

quotes.quote: The African-American experience is one of the most important threads in the American tapestry.Â
quotes.author: Bill Frist

quotes.quote: The thing about black history is that the truth is so much more complex than anything you could make up.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Gates

quotes.quote: Hate is too great a burden to bear. It injures the hater more than it injures the hated.
quotes.author: Coretta Scott King

quotes.quote: The time is always right to do what is right.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: As we celebrate Black History Month we should be grateful for the achievements they made and inspired by their legacies to continue their work.Â
quotes.author: Marty Meehan

quotes.quote: For children, diversity needs to be real and not merely relegated to learning the names of the usual suspects during Black History Month or enjoying south-of-the-border cuisine on Cinco de Mayo. It means talking to and spending time with kids not like them so that they may discover those kids are in fact just like them.
quotes.author: John Ridley

quotes.quote: Black history is American history.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.quote: Have a vision. Be demanding.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: The cost of liberty is less than the price of repression.
quotes.author: W.E.B. Du Bois

quotes.quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome while trying to succeed.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: You must never be fearful about what you are doing what is right.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: History has shown us that courage can be contagious and hope can take on a life of its own.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: There is no obstacle in the path of young people who are poor or members of minority groups that hard work and thorough preparation cannot cure. Do not call for Black power or green power, call for brain power.
quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

quotes.quote: Never be limited by other people's limited imaginations.
quotes.author: Dr. Mae Jemison

quotes.quote: We all have dreams. In order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline and effort.
quotes.author: Jesse Owens

quotes.quote: Black people have always been America's wilderness in search of a promised land.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken winged bird that cannot fly.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Black magic operates most effectively in preconscious, marginal areas. Casual curses are the most effective.
quotes.author: Wiilliam S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Black magic is not a myth. It is a totally unscientific and emotional form of magic, but it does get results — of an extremely temporary nature.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: Many people take exception to me and say that I'm doing black magic and things they can't do at church. But I'm doing magic that started their church.
quotes.author: Tony Andruzzi

quotes.quote: None can use black magic without straining the soul to the uttermost—and staining it into the bargain. None can inflict suffering without enduring the same. None can send death by spells and sorcery without walking on the brink of death’s own abyss, aye, and dripping his own blood into it. The forces black magic evokes are like two-edged poisoned swords with grips studded with scorpion stings. Only a strong man, leather-handed, in whom hate and evil are very powerful, can wield them, and he only for a space.
quotes.author: Fritz Leiber

quotes.quote: Black Magick is the process of self-transformation through an antinomian initiatory structure, Black meaning the hidden wisdom, power of darkness, dreams and staging the reality you wish and Magick being the process to ascend, become immortal in spirit.
quotes.author: Michael W. Ford

quotes.quote: That old black magic has me in its spell, That old black magic that you weave so well; Icy fingers up and down my spine, The same old witchcraft when your eyes meet mine.
quotes.author: Johnny Mercer

quotes.quote: I'd sort of dabbled in Black Magic, not practicing it, but I was interested in it. All these horrible things kept happening to me - a lot of my aunts and uncles started dying and I was seeing all these bloody things visiting me during the night.
quotes.author: Geezer Butler

quotes.quote: When chaste people need body or mind to resort to action or thought, they find steel in their muscles or knowledge in their intelligence. Theirs the diabolic vigor or the black magic of will power.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.quote: Your eyes are like the bright reflection of black magic. Mysterious and murderous. Invading my life.
quotes.author: Moumita Haldar

quotes.quote: We are what we were at birth, and each trait has remained in conformity with earth's and with heaven's logic: Be the devil's tool, resort to black magic, None can diverge from the ends which Heaven foreordained.
quotes.author: Marianne Moore

quotes.quote: My dad liked to say that magic itself is never black; only the uses to which it is put, but mind magic is already tinted a deep, dark gray.
quotes.author: Christine Amsden

quotes.quote: Writing prejudicial, off-putting reviews is a precise exercise in applied black magic. The reviewer can draw free-floating disagreeable associations to a book by implying that the book is completely unimportant without saying exactly why, and carefully avoiding any clear images that could capture the reader's full attention.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Both had indulged in, if not Black Magic, then certainly magic of a darker hue than seemed desirable or legitimate
quotes.author: Susanna Clarke

quotes.quote: People who don't do jazz think it's black magic. But really, it's just a matter of getting used to it. It's fun to gamble. The trick is not to fall back on the things you've done before.
quotes.author: Andre Previn

quotes.quote: Gossip is black magic because it spreads emotional poison, perpetuates fear, and keeps others down.
quotes.author: Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: The use of soul-force for turning stones into bread would have been considered, as it is still considered, as black magic.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: When you become impeccable with your word, your mind is no longer fertile ground for words that come from black magic. Instead, it is fertile for the words that come from love
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: I can say with certitude that superstitions are more deleterious than black magic.
quotes.author: Sagey Malik

quotes.quote: He said that black sheeps express everyone else's anger and pain. It's not that they have all the anger and pain-they're just the only ones who let it out. Then the other people don't have to.
quotes.author: Francesca Lia Block

quotes.quote: A family without a black sheep is not a typical family.
quotes.author: Heinrich Boll

quotes.quote: A black sheep is a biting beast.
quotes.author: Thomas Bastard

quotes.quote: I was the black sheep of the family, and my mother never really understood me.
quotes.author: Andre Rieu

quotes.quote: Every family needs a black sheep to call them on their bullsh—.
quotes.author: Karina Halle

quotes.quote: If I was a sheep, I'd be black.
quotes.author: Kirsty Eagar

quotes.quote: The black sheep are the ones you want to get to know.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: I'm a little bit more unusual so I consider myself as the black sheep.
quotes.author: Ann Wilson

quotes.quote: To rally every black sheep is my goal.
quotes.author: Julian Cope

quotes.quote: Being a black sheep is a way I would describe myself.
quotes.author: Gin Wigmore

quotes.quote: The pattern of the prodigal is: rebellion, ruin, repentance, reconciliation, restoration.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: To reclaim the prodigal is well, but to save him from ever being a prodigal is better.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: I am the prodigal son every time I search for unconditional love where it cannot be found.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: The Prodigal Son didn't repent of his sin because he got tired of living like and with the pigs. He repented because God gave him eyes to see.
quotes.author: Rosaria Champagne Butterfield

quotes.quote: People who lose money always need someone to blame.
quotes.author: James Chanos

quotes.quote: Blaming destiny is a poor out for those who don't reach desired destinations.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: When you check your own mind properly, you stop blaming others for your problems.
quotes.author: Thubten Yeshe

quotes.quote: People who blame things rarely change things. Blame is an unassailable change-avoidance strategy.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Don't try to blame the pain on anyone. Blaming others won't erase the pain.
quotes.author: Hyde

quotes.quote: It's not exactly fair to make a mistake yourself and then start blaming others for it.
quotes.author: Bashar al-Assad

quotes.quote: Blaming and punishing others are superficial expressions of anger.
quotes.author: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.quote: We would much rather blame nature for what we don't like in ourselves than credit it for what we do like.
quotes.author: Frans De Waal

quotes.quote: By blaming others, we fail to find the real solutions to our problems and we do not carry out our own responsibilities.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.quote: Do not blame anybody for your mistakes and failures.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: Placing the blame or judgment on someone else leaves you powerless to change your experience; taking responsibility for your beliefs and judgments gives you the power to change them.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: People are always blaming their circumstances for what they are. The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want, and, if they can't find them, make them.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Blaming society makes it awfully easy for a person of weak character to shrug off his own responsibility for his actions.
quotes.author: Stanley Schmidt

quotes.quote: Many think that assigning blame settles matters.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Blaming is so much easier than taking responsibility, because if you take responsibility, then you might be to blame.
quotes.author: Jennifer O'Neill

quotes.quote: Let us blame none, let us blame our own Karma.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Blaming the wolf would not help the sheep much. The sheep must learn not to fall in the clutches of the wolf.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Your failures won't hurt you until you start blaming them on others.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Blaming others is excusing yourself.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Blaming things on the past does not make them better.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Instead of blaming everyone and everything else for your problems, pray for God to help you take an inventory of what's been on your mind so you can think about what you've been thinking about.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Blaming something else makes that something else cause; and as that cause takes on power, the individual in the same act loses control and becomes effect.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: Human beings sometimes find a kind of pleasure in nursing painful emotions, in blaming themselves without reason or even against reason.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Blaming the system is soothing because it lets you off the hook. But when the system is broken, we wonder why you were relying in the system in the first place.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Never blame another person for your personal choices - you are still the one who must live out the consequences of your choices.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: Taking responsibility means not blaming yourself. Anything that takes away your power or your pleasure makes you a victim. Don't make yourself a victim of yourself!
quotes.author: Susan Jeffers

quotes.quote: Only when we stop holding others accountable for all of our troubles can we truly be free.
quotes.author: Tian Dayton

quotes.quote: The moment that you place blame somewhere, you undermine your resolve to change anything.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: If you reveal your secrets to the wind, you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Blaming is a way to protect your heart, trying to protect what is soft and open and tender in yourself.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Nobody is a real loser-until they start blaming somebody else.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Don't waste time blaming yourself when you can spend time planning how to destroy our enemies.
quotes.author: Sarah Rees Brennan

quotes.quote: We suffer as a result of our own actions; it is unfair to blame anybody for it.
quotes.author: Sarada Devi

quotes.quote: You can't keep blaming yourself. Just blame yourself once, and move on.
quotes.author: Dan Castellaneta

quotes.quote: An irresponsible person is a person who makes vague promises, then breaks his word, blames it on circumstances and expects other people to forgive it.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Yes, there are times when something is legitimately not our fault. Blaming others, however, keeps us in a stuck state and is ultimately rough on our own self-esteem.
quotes.author: Eric Allenbaugh

quotes.quote: One of the most common ways of not acknowledging our faults is to blame others.
quotes.author: Geshe Kelsang Gyatso

quotes.quote: You cannot blame everything on the enemy.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: An ignorant person is inclined to blame others for his own misfortune. To blame oneself is proof of progress. But the wise man never has to blame another or himself.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Don't try to blame the rest of the world. The blame only lies with you. Recognize that immediately.
quotes.author: Alan Sugar

quotes.quote: Blaming our behavior on forces outside ourselves is a way of avoiding responsibility.
quotes.author: James Redfield

quotes.quote: Blame neither man, nor God, nor anyone in the world. When you find yourselves suffering, blame yourselves, and try to do better.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: People blame their environment. There is only one person to blame - and only one - themselves.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: A man can fail many times, but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Blame is a change-avoidance strategy.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Stop blaming everybody and everything for what's going on. If you really believe that you deserve better, then you would have it.
quotes.author: Bobby Williams

quotes.quote: A blank canvas can scare any person, creative or non-creative. But to me, a blank canvas symbolizes a new start, new opportunities and (most importantly) a way to show the world who you are. Just like life, we all start with a clean slate and every step we take makes a new stroke on the canvas.
quotes.author: Michaela Schreiter

quotes.quote: People speak of the fear of the blank canvas as though it is a temporary hesitation, a trembling moment of self-doubt. For me it was more like being abducted from my bed by a clown, thrust into a circus arena with a wicker chair, and told to tame a pissed-off lion in front of an expectant crowd.
quotes.author: Hannah Kent

quotes.quote: I think in many ways, I'm sort of a blank canvas, because in many ways, I'm just observing the world and the people around me and their characters and letting them kind of explode off me and to find out why they're doing what they're doing. But then every once in awhile, I get to take on a whole new character.
quotes.author: Danny Pudi

quotes.quote: There is something beautiful about a blank canvas, the nothingness of the beginning that is so simple and breathtakingly pure. It’s the paint that changes its meaning and the hand that creates the story. Every piece begins the same, but in the end they are all uniquely different.
quotes.author: Piper Payne

quotes.quote: Everyone is a blank canvas, waiting to be filled with the colour of discovery.
quotes.author: Alexandra Christo

quotes.quote: Many painters are afraid of the blank canvas, but the blank canvas is afraid of the painter who dares and who has broken the spell of 'you can't' once and for all.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: Never look back. The past is done. The future is a blank canvas. Work on creating a masterpiece. Only you have the power to make your painting beautiful.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: A blank canvas is a playground for the imagination.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: A blank canvas is so abstract that only imagination can fill it. But wait! Don't hang it on the wall like that. It's upside down.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: I was a blank canvas, no thoughts, no emotions, no needs or desires, just a square of white floating through a loud, chaotic world, and life would paint me with color and substance, smear and spread and colorize me.
quotes.author: Jasinda Wilder

quotes.quote: Think of your day as a blank canvas, and everything you say, your art upon it. Then join your loved ones and friends, and create lasting beauty together, worthy of your inner Rembrandt.
quotes.author: Tom Althouse

quotes.quote: Give me a blank canvas, and I will give you the world.
quotes.author: Shauna Scheets

quotes.quote: In a way, the blank canvas... represents the infinity of trying to use color to express emotions - to assign a linguistic function to color.
quotes.author: Guido Molinari

quotes.quote: If life is a blank canvas and all people are artists, the big challenge we all face may be expressed this way: Will we ultimately produce something approaching a masterpiece, an acceptable but not particularly memorable work of art, or a creation that wouldn't even be purchased at a yard sale?
quotes.author: Mardy Grothe

quotes.quote: When entering a studio the most pleasant thing to see is a blank canvas. It looks so inviting to make a start, you are fresh and hoping for the best. Then a terrible time follows when everything seems lost and ruined, you fear you will never get it done, than suddenly a ray of light! And it seems you get what you wanted to tell.
quotes.author: Anton Mauve

quotes.quote: I find a blank canvas so beautiful that that to work immediately, in relation to how beautiful the canvas is as such, is inhibiting and, for me, demands 'too much to quickly'; so that my tendency is to get the canvas 'dirt', so to speak, in one way or another, and then, so to speak 'work in reverse', and try to bring it back to an equivalent of the original clarity and perfection of the canvas.
quotes.author: Robert Motherwell

quotes.quote: Just dash something down if you see a blank canvas staring at you with a certain imbecility. You do not know how paralyzing it is, that staring of a blank canvas which says to the painter: you don't know anything.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: Every other artist begins with a blank canvas, a piece of paper the photographer begins with the finished product.
quotes.author: Edward Steichen

quotes.quote: A canvas that I have covered is worth more than a blank canvas. My pretensions go no further; that is my right to paint, my reason for painting.
quotes.author: Irving Stone

quotes.quote: It's like painting the same blank canvas over and over and over and over and over. Once the concept is known, you don't need to see two. And that was in the back of my head, that I was really done artistically with what I had created or pastiched.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: I love to create, and to me, the ultimate freedom of expression is a blank canvas or a block of clay to capture whatever emotions your imagination gives it.
quotes.author: Daniel Boulud

quotes.quote: I'd love to try to sell a blank white canvas to an art dealer. And when he asks what it is I'd tell him it's a landscape painting of Key West from the perspective of an optimistic blind man.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Every moment has infinite potential. Every new moment contains for you possibilities that you cant possibly imagine. Every day is a blank page that you could fill with the most beautiful drawings.
quotes.author: John C. Parkin

quotes.quote: The day is an empty canvas, the shapes & colors are yours to choose.
quotes.author: Alex Noble

quotes.quote: Life in itself is an empty canvas; it becomes whatsoever you paint on it. You can paint misery, you can paint bliss. This freedom is your glory.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: The canvas isn’t empty. It’s full of whatever you imagine it to be full of.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: A blank canvas is a masterpiece in waiting; before you can apply the paint you must visualise the end result.
quotes.author: Benjamin Bonetti

quotes.quote: Even though I know who I am, musically I'm a blank canvas. I know what colors I want to use, but I don't know what picture I want to paint yet.
quotes.author: Becky G

quotes.quote: A child is like a blank canvas. As an artist of your most important masterpiece, it's your job to illustrate all the beauty of its potential. Disconnect from limitations, project inspiration.
quotes.author: Giulia Vecchio

quotes.quote: An empty canvas is a living wonder... far lovelier than certain pictures.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: A blessing is a circle of light drawn around a person to protect, heal and strengthen.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Our real blessings often appear to us in the shape of pains, losses and disappointments; but let us have patience and we soon shall see them in their proper figures.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Sometimes we don't realize the blessings we have until we no longer have them. Appreciate all the blessings in your life, take none for granted.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: We should certainly count our blessings, but we should also make our blessings count.
quotes.author: Neil A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: How blessings brighten as they take their flight.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: If you want to reap financial blessings, you have to sow financially.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: If you expect the blessings of God, be kind to His people.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr

quotes.quote: Over and over I marvel at the blessings of my life: Each year has grown better than the last.
quotes.author: Lawrence Welk

quotes.quote: When you are grateful - when you can see what you have - you unlock blessings to flow in your life.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Count your blessings. You are one of a kind. There's no one in the world like you. You are amazing.
quotes.author: Richard Simmons

quotes.quote: Don't block your blessings. Don't let doubt stop you from getting where you want to be.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hudson

quotes.quote: It is one of the blessings of this world that few people see visions and dream dreams.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: Material blessings, when they pay beyond the category of need, are weirdly fruitful of headache.
quotes.author: Philip Wylie

quotes.quote: When we lose one blessing, another is often most unexpectedly given in its place.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Those blessings are sweetest that are won with prayer and worn with thanks.
quotes.author: Thomas Goodwin

quotes.quote: Blessings sometimes show up in unrecognizable disguises.
quotes.author: Janette Oke

quotes.quote: Some wish blessings, others pray for them. Some send blessings and they become one.
quotes.author: Joyce C. Lock

quotes.quote: Better to lose count while naming your blessings than to lose your blessings to counting your troubles.
quotes.author: Maltbie D. Babcock

quotes.quote: Not what we say about our blessings, but how we use them, is the true measure of our thanksgiving.
quotes.author: W. T. Purkiser

quotes.quote: All the blessings we enjoy are Divine deposits, committed to our trust on this condition, that they should be dispensed for the benefit of our neighbors.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Of the blessings you discover in your life, none are any greater than the other.Each has equal value in and of itself to be appreciated for what it is.
quotes.author: Sumner M. Davenport

quotes.quote: If this is a blessing, it is certainly very well disguised.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: For blessings ever wait on virtuous deeds, And though a late, a sure reward succeeds.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: Blessings are more cherished by those who bear the spirit of gratitude.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Every Blessing Ignored Becomes A Curse.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Anything is a blessing which makes us pray.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Some of your greatest blessings come with patience.
quotes.author: Warren Wiersbe

quotes.quote: It is good for us to think that no grace or blessing is truly ours till we are aware that God has blessed some one else with it through us.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: No blessing lasts forever.
quotes.author: Titus Maccius Plautus

quotes.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There are no mistakes, no coincidences, all events are blessings given to us to learn from.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Blessings fall on ground that's been plowed in praise.
quotes.author: Janet Larson

quotes.quote: Nothing raises the price of a blessing like its removal; whereas, it was its continuance which should have taught us its value.
quotes.author: Henry Moore

quotes.quote: What a blessing it would be if we could open and shut our ears as easily as we open and shut our mouths.
quotes.author: Georg Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: If you beseech a blessing upon yourself, beware! lest without intent you invoke a curse upon a neighbor at the same time.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The hardest arithmetic to master is that which enables us to count our blessings.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: It is a very mixed blessing to be brought back from the dead.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Sometimes small setbacks are just blessings in disguise. They enhance your determination and whole-hearted dedication to achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Robert Cheeke

quotes.quote: Having a place to go - is a home. Having someone to love - is a family. Having both - is a blessing.
quotes.author: Donna Hedges

quotes.quote: Hem your blessings with thankfulness so they don't unravel.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The blessings we evoke for another descend upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Edmund Gibson

quotes.quote: Of the blessings set before you make your choice, and be content.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Reflect upon your present blessings of which every man has many not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Our greatest blessing is the fortune of good friends, being loved, and loving others.
quotes.author: Alan Robert Neal

quotes.quote: If you want blessing, make a room for it.
quotes.author: James Hudson Taylor

quotes.quote: Quit being sad. Hear blessings dropping their blossoms around you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Count your blessings, not your problems. Count your own blessings, not someone else's. Remember that jealousy is when you count someone else's blessings instead of your own.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: You have to participate relentlessly in the manifestation of your own blessings.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: When you wish someone joy, you wish them peace, love, prosperity, happiness... all the good things.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: This new day has greeted us with no rules; unconditional opportunity. Do not dilute the power of this new day with the hardship of yesterday. Greet this day the way it has greeted you; with open arms and endless possibility.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Concentrate on counting your blessings and you’ll have little time to count anything else.
quotes.author: Woodrow Kroll

quotes.quote: An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If we counted our blessings instead of our money, we would all be rich.
quotes.author: Linda Poindexter

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive—to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Be grateful for the tiny details of your life an make room for unexpected and beautiful blessings.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Count your blessings and you'll find that they are numerous.
quotes.author: Aysel Gunar

quotes.quote: Be grateful for experiences and blessings in your life. Commit to your goals, but don't forget to enjoy the journey that takes you to your end goal.
quotes.author: Aysel Gunar

quotes.quote: The best philosophy is to do one's duties, to take the world as it comes, submit respectfully to one's lot, and bless the goodness that has given us so much happiness with it, whatever it is.
quotes.author: Horace Walpole

quotes.quote: Blessed is he who has found his work; let him ask no other blessedness. He has a work, a life-purpose... Get your happiness out of your work or you will never know what real happiness is... Even in the meanest sorts of labor, the whole soul of a man is composed into a kind of real harmony the instant he sets himself to work.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: The unthankful heart... discovers no mercies; but let the thankful heart sweep through the day and, as the magnet finds the iron, so it will find, in every hour, some heavenly blessings!
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Most of my major disappointments have turned out to be blessings in disguise. So whenever anything bad does happen to me, I kind of sit back and feel, well, if I give this enough time, it'll turn out that this was good, so I shan't worry about it too much.
quotes.author: William Gaines

quotes.quote: The difficulties, hardships and trials of life, the obstacles... are positive blessings. They knit the muscles more firmly, and teach self-reliance.
quotes.author: William Matthews

quotes.quote: Just to be is a blessing. Just to live is holy.
quotes.author: Abraham Heschel

quotes.quote: The private and personal blessings we enjoy—the blessings of immunity, safeguard, liberty and integrity—deserve the thanksgiving of a whole life.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: I am convinced, the longer I live, that life and its blessings are not so entirely unjustly distributed as when we are suffering greatly we are inclined to suppose.
quotes.author: Mary Todd Lincoln

quotes.quote: A man with ambition and love for his blessings here on earth is ever so alive. Having been alive, it won't be so hard in the end to lie down and rest.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: For we must share, if we would keep, that blessing from above; Ceasing to give, we cease to have; such is the law of love.
quotes.author: Richard C. Trench

quotes.quote: To those leaning on the sustaining infinite, today is big with blessings.
quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.quote: Our prayers should be for blessings in general, for God knows best what is good for us.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Ask God's blessing on your work, but don't ask him to do it for you.
quotes.author: Dame Flora Robson

quotes.quote: All the great blessings of my life are present in my thoughts today.
quotes.author: Phoebe Cary

quotes.quote: No one can give what he or she hasn't received. So as we are blessed, we blessed the world giving thanks for every living thing.
quotes.author: Helen Schucman

quotes.quote: I am grateful for what I am and have. My thanksgiving is perpetual... O how I laugh when I think of my vague indefinite riches. No run on my bank can drain it, for my wealth is not possession but enjoyment.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The Blessing of God rest upon all those who have been kind to us, have cared for us, have worked for us, have served for us, and have shared our bread with us at this table.
quotes.author: Saint Cyril

quotes.quote: For peaceful homes, and healthful days, / For all the blessings Earth displays, / We owe Thee thankfulness and praise, / Giver of all!
quotes.author: Christopher Wadsworth

quotes.quote: The real issue in life is not how many blessings we have, but what we do with our blessings. Some people have many blessings and hoard them. Some have few and give everything away.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: May blessings be upon your house, / Your roof and hearth and walls; / May there be lights to welcome you / When evening's shadow falls— / The love that like a guiding star / Still signals when you roam; / A book, a friend—these be the things / That make a house a home.
quotes.author: Myrtle Reed

quotes.quote: Ye fearful saints fresh courage take, / The clouds ye so much dread / Are big with mercy, and shall break / In blessings on your head.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: All praise to thee, my God, this night, / For all the blessings of the light; / Keep me, O keep me, King of Kings, / Beneath thy own almighty wings.
quotes.author: Thomas Ken

quotes.quote: Give thanks for unknown blessings already on their way.
quotes.author: Native American Saying

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is to count your blessings while others are adding up their troubles.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Blessings star forth forever; but a curse is like a cloud, it passes.
quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

quotes.quote: When God at first made man, / Having a glass of blessings standing by; / Let us (said he) pour on him all we can: / Let the world's riches, which dispersed lie, / Contract into a span.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: As the years pass, I am coming more and more to understand that it is the common everyday blessings of our common everyday lives for which we should be particularly grateful.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.quote: God is more anxious to bestow his blessings on us than we are to receive them.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: The blind willingness to sacrifice people to truth, however, has always been the danger of an ethics abstracted from life.
quotes.author: Carol Gilligan

quotes.quote: A blind person who sees is better than a seeing person who is blind.
quotes.author: Iranian

quotes.quote: The blind must not only be fed and housed and cared for; they must learn to make thir lives useful to the community.
quotes.author: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.quote: You can't force someone to see the truth, just like you can't force a blind man to see.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: A blind man can make art if what is in his mind can be passed to another mind in some tangible form.
quotes.author: Sol Lewitt

quotes.quote: Only a blind man can easily define what light is. When you do not know, you are bold. Ignorance is always bold; knowledge hesitates. And the more you know, the more you feel that the ground underneath is dissolving. The more you know, the more you feel how ignorant you are.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: So blind is the curiosity by which mortals are possessed, that they often conduct their minds along unexplored routes, having no reason to hope for success, but merely being willing to risk the experiment of finding whether the truth they seek lies there.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: Blind people can stay up longer than someone with eyes.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.quote: If the blind put their hands in God's, they find their way more surely than those who see but have not faith or purpose.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: We're blind to our blindness. We have very little idea of how little we know. We're not designed to know how little we know.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: Blind certainty, a close-mindedness that amounts to an imprisonment so total that the prisoner doesn't even know he's locked up.
quotes.author: David Foster

quotes.quote: Man is blind by its own thoughts. Thought is the product of the past and with that past he looks.
quotes.author: Alexandre Branco Martins

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Never forget that turning a blind eye to oppression and watching from the sidelines is itself opression.
quotes.author: Harun Yahya

quotes.quote: The blind have no notion of time. The things of time are hidden from them too.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: A totally blind process can by definition lead to anything; it can even lead to vision itself.
quotes.author: Jacques Monod

quotes.quote: Blind faith in your leaders, or in anything, will get you killed.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: Being blind is as simple as closing your eyes. The blind don't act any different than you or I. You never see a blind person going around saying, I'm blind. So if you want to play blind just close your eyes and keep them closed and fare thee well.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.quote: To be blind is not miserable; not to be able to bear blindness, that is miserable.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Blind belief in authority is the greatest enemy of truth.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It is better to be blind than to see things from only one point of view.
quotes.author: Sabrina Jeffries

quotes.quote: Eyes that are blind have no way to tell the loveliness of faces and features; eyes with no pupils have no way to tell the beauty of colored and embroidered silks.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: As a blind man has no idea of colors, so have we no idea of the manner by which the all-wise God perceives and understands all things.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: Blind is not the situation when people cannot see others but when people fail to feel or sense the existence of others.
quotes.author: Millie

quotes.quote: Man is a blind, witless, low brow, anthropocentric clod who inflicts lesions upon the earth.
quotes.author: Ian McHarg

quotes.quote: The eye goes blind when it only wants to see why.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Better to be blind and see with your heart, than to have two good eyes and see nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: We can be blind to the obvious, and we are also blind to our blindness.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: You can become blind by seeing each day as a similar one. Each day is a different one, each day brings a miracle of its own. It's just a matter of paying attention to this miracle.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Blind eyes can perceive more than an ignorant mind.
quotes.author: Faisal Khosa

quotes.quote: A blind man knows he cannot see, and is glad to be led, though it be by a dog; but he that is blind in his understanding, which is the worst blindness of all, believes he sees as the best, and scorns a guide.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: If love is blind, then maybe a blind person that loves has a greater understanding of it.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The same men who are blind and deaf to feminism are acutely sensitive to what threatens their dominance and privilege.
quotes.author: Marilyn French

quotes.quote: But eyes are blind. You have to look with the heart.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Blind belief can be comforting, but it can easily cripple reason and productivity, and stop intellectual progress.
quotes.author: James Randi

quotes.quote: A blind man can see what she feels for you and you for her. Your souls are not merely entwined; they are fused.
quotes.author: Melina Marchetta

quotes.quote: Information and ignorance are like light and darkness. When light comes into your room, darkness must fly away. When information rules your mind, ignorance finds its way out!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Who is so deaf or so blind as is he that willfully will neither hear nor see?
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: I know and see too well, when not voluntarily blind, the speedy limits of persons called high and worthy.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote:
Then the eyes of the blind shall be opened, and the ears of the deaf shall be unstopped.
Then shall the lame man leap as an hart, and the tongue of the dumb sing.
quotes.author: The Holy Bible (Isaiah 35:5-6)

quotes.quote: They be blind leaders of the blind. And if the blind lead the blind, both shall fall into the ditch.
quotes.author: The Holy Bible (Matthew 15:14)

quotes.quote: Whether he be a sinner or no, I know not: one thing I know, that, whereas I was blind, now I see.
quotes.author: The Holy Bible (John 9:25)

quotes.quote: Each had but known one part, and no man all; / Hence into deadly error each did fall. / No way to know the All man’s heart can find: / Can knowledge e’er accompany the blind?
quotes.author: Sana'i

quotes.quote: Does it matter?—losing your sight?... / There's such splendid work for the blind; / And people will always be kind, / As you sit on the terrace remembering / And turning your face to the light.
quotes.author: Siegfried Sassoon

quotes.quote: And so I betake myself to that course, which is almost as much as to see myself go into my grave—for which, and all the discomforts that will accompany my being blind, the good God prepare me!
quotes.author: Samuel Pepys

quotes.quote: I would hate that death bandaged my eyes, and forbore, / And bade me creep past
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Abiding in the midst of ignorance, thinking themselves wise and learned, fools go aimlessly hither and thither, like blind led by the blind.
quotes.author: Vyasa

quotes.quote: What though the spicy breezes / Blow soft o'er Ceylon's isle; / Though every prospect pleases, / And only man is vile: / In vain with lavish kindness / The gifts of God are strown; / The heathen in his blindness / Bows down to wood and stone.
quotes.author: Reginald Heber

quotes.quote: You see, but you do not observe.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: You see, but you do not observe.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Is this a dagger which I see before me, / The handle toward my hand? Come, let me clutch thee: / I have thee not, and yet I see thee still. / Art thou not, fatal vision, sensible / To feeling as to sight? or art thou but / A dagger of the mind, a false creation, / Proceeding from the heat-oppressed brain?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The question is not what you look at—but how you look and whether you see.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: In the country of the blind the one-eyed man is king.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: When I consider how my light is spent, / E're half my days, in this dark world and wide, / And that one talent which is death to hide / Lodged with me useless.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: They who have put out the people's eyes, reproach them of their blindness.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: I have only one eye,—I have a right to be blind sometimes…I really do not see the signal!
quotes.author: Horatio Nelson

quotes.quote: To find a friend one must close one eye. To keep him—two.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.quote: It is a blind goose that cometh to the fox's sermon.
quotes.author: John Lyly

quotes.quote: The eyes are not responsible when the mind does the seeing.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: A blind man in a dark room — looking for a black hat which isn't there.
quotes.author: Lord Bowen

quotes.quote: If your eyes are blinded with your worries, you cannot see the beauty of the sunset.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Our safety is not in blindness, but in facing our danger.
quotes.author: J. C. F. von Schiller

quotes.quote: As a rule, what is out of sight disturbs men’s minds more seriously than what they see.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: Just because a man lacks the use of his eyes doesn't mean he lacks vision.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: What you don't see with your eyes, don't invent with your tongue.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: When my friends lack an eye, I look at them in profile.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: To a certain extent. a little blindness is necessary when you undertake a risk.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: I have such poor vision I can date anybody.
quotes.author: Garry Shandling

quotes.quote: Better squinting than blind.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: Don't you talk about God! You have any idea how it feels to go blind and still be afraid of the dark? And every day, you stand and pray just for a little light, and you don't get nothing. Cause God don't listen to people like me.
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: They say your whole life flashes before your eyes when you die. And it's true, even for a blind man.
quotes.author: Daredevil

quotes.quote: Look, I don't care if you're green or blue like a carrot! For me the word color doesn't mean anything. I feel colors... but you'd never understand that!
quotes.author: Blind Woman

quotes.quote: The only thing more terrifying than blindness is being the only one who can see.
quotes.author: Doctor's Wife

quotes.quote: You're darn right you're blind. I'm standing right here for you and you don't even look.
quotes.author: Amy Benic

quotes.quote: Darkness makes no difference to a blind man.
quotes.author: Zatoichi

quotes.quote: Blind people don't look the same. That play of expression isn't there. You know, when you're born blind, you don't have anyone to model yourself after. When you lose your sight, you tend to forget what you're supposed to look like.
quotes.author: Fay Conners

quotes.quote: That we, who see by sense of touch / And taste and hearing, see things you / May never look upon; and true / Is it that even in the scent / Of blossoms we find something meant / No eyes have in their faces read, / Or wept to see interpreted.
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: And you might think it strange if now / I told you you were smiling. How / Do I know that? I hold your hand-- / Its language I can understand--
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: Blind from my birth, / Where flowers are springing / I sit on earth / All dark.
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: A red-roofed house is shining to the skies; / A house red-roofed and brilliant in the wind: / A house of colour filled with wandering eyes; / And all the eyes are blind.
quotes.author: Leon Gellert

quotes.quote: Thou blind fool, Love, what dost thou to mine eyes / That they behold and see not what they see? / They know what beauty is, see where it lies, / Yet what the best is, take the worst to be.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Within a corner of this windowed room / He sits, and seldom speaks, and seldom moves. / Forever left within eternal gloom, / He thinks of those he left, and those he loves.
quotes.author: Leon Gellert

quotes.quote: I'm a blind man, I'm a blind man and my world is pale / When a blind man cries, Lord, you know there ain't no sadder tale
quotes.author: Ian Gillan; Ian Paice; Jon Lord; Ritchie Blackmore; Roger Glover

quotes.quote: Please don't pass me by, / oh please don't pass me by, / for I am blind, but you can see, / well, I've been blinded totally,
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: Blind eyes are weak, blind eyes are cruel / Look out for number one, survival's the rule / Look straight ahead on a one-way street / Let sleeping dogs lie, just turn a blind eye
quotes.author: John Farnham; David Hirschfelder; Raymond Donald Chapman

quotes.quote: The great thing about costume jewelry is that there's something for everyone - there are very humorous pieces and very extravagant and outrageous pieces.
quotes.author: Judith Miller

quotes.quote: Provenance is something very important in jewelry. You want to know who has worn a piece of jewelry and who it has belonged to - it's part of its history, part of its aura.
quotes.author: Simon de Pury

quotes.quote: We don't find it tough to sell gold; people love to buy jewelry. The only way to make your wife, sister or lover happy is to give them something that they love.
quotes.author: T. S. Kalyanaraman

quotes.quote: Jewelry, to me, is a pain in the derriere, because you have to be watching it all the time.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.quote: One mustn't mistake bling for excellence, just as one mustn't mistake quiet for mediocre.
quotes.author: Kevin McCloud

quotes.quote: The business is so upside down now. It's not just about the bling-bling.
quotes.author: Tim Reid

quotes.quote: I've never thought of my jewelry as trophies. I'm here to take care of it and to love it, for we are only temporary custodians of beauty.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: I think jewelry can change an outfit more than anything else. Transformation, punch, individuality: One or all of the above are why you should wear jewelry.
quotes.author: Iris Apfel

quotes.quote: Jewelry takes people's minds off your wrinkles.
quotes.author: Sarah Phillips

quotes.quote: Jewelry is the most transformative thing you can wear.
quotes.author: Iris Apfel

quotes.quote:
Costume jewelry is not made to give women an aura of wealth,
but to make them beautiful.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Be content to be what you are; shiny stones and silver bangles only make you look what you really are.
quotes.author: Tiny Tim

quotes.quote: Jewelry maybe is more expensive than clothes, but clothes are more important than jewelry.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The spread of Viking bling is a good indication of the spread of its culture.
quotes.author: Neil MacGregor

quotes.quote: Jewelry is something that has to do with emotion. That aspect of jewelry really interests me.
quotes.author: Ann Demeulemeester

quotes.quote: To me, jewelry is a natural progression and there is something so meaningful and magical about creating that one of a kind, special piece.
quotes.author: Pamela Love

quotes.quote: Whatever; bling always has something to hide.
quotes.author: Grace Jones

quotes.quote: Jewelry and profuse ornaments are unmistakable evidences of vulgarity.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: I love how significant jewelry is throughout the world and throughout time. People have been adorning themselves with jewelry for years and its one of the oldest forms of art and design. This is something that has and will always inspire me.
quotes.author: Pamela Love

quotes.quote: Bling is not an indication of riches. It is a product of value-based spending, to enrich the pockets of those outside of ones sphere of influence...the haves' bleeding the have-nots'.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: The Doctor: Don't blink. Don't even blink. Blink and you're dead. Don't turn your back. Don't look away. And don't blink.
quotes.author: Steven Moffat

quotes.quote: She knows her timing, always knows. The time to strike or the time to starve. Her eyes as a clock, she watches she waits she learns, and in the second she blinks, she changes her mind just like that.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Here's to love at first sight, and here's to getting over it the moment you blink.
quotes.author: Ahmed Mostafa

quotes.quote: The time in your life can go by in the blink of an eye, so look for what lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: Death is like that, it blinks, we blink; not always able to see the Stop signs, hiding behind trees in the corner of the roads.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: The night is the blink of a day.
quotes.author: Jaime Tenorio Valenzuela

quotes.quote: A blink of an eye is what separates you from reality.
quotes.author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quotes.quote: If you think a blink and a wink are one and the same thing, you need a drink to enable you rethink.
quotes.author: Vincent Okay Nwachukwu

quotes.quote: What better way to connect with people than by staring and talking straight at them? Don't blink - that's one less connection you could have made.
quotes.author: Ze Frank

quotes.quote: Time goes by so slowly when you're a child, and then, as an adult, it goes by in the blink of an eye.
quotes.author: David Lowery

quotes.quote: If I blink, I might lose her. So the last time I blinked, I lost you.
quotes.author: Marc Behm

quotes.quote: There is nothing that is faster or slower than anything else. Velocity doesn't exist; the eyelid has a time to blink just as the heart has a time to beat, and your leg has a time to knock this pipe out of my mouth.
quotes.author: Ernesto Díaz Espinoza

quotes.quote: So why don't we dance / Don't miss your chance, oh / Better not blink / You better not blink / Better not blink / 'Cause you don't wanna miss this
quotes.author: Bruce Fielder

quotes.quote: I don't want to blink, I can't close my eyes / These are the best years of our lives / I don't wanna sleep while I'm alive / I don't wanna miss a thing tonight
quotes.author: Manuel Reuter

quotes.quote: Maybe you think blinking is over-rated / But blinking stops your eyes getting dehydrated
quotes.author: Johnny and the Raindrops

quotes.quote: So Blink! Blink! Blink! to show me that you are real / Blink! Blink! Blink! to show that you're alive / Blink! for all those mornings, the time that I've waited
quotes.author: Johnny and the Raindrops

quotes.quote: In the blink, blink, blink of an eye / Oh your soul passes by / In the blink, blink, blink of the night / Am I ready to die?
quotes.author: Jetty Rae LLC

quotes.quote: Don't blink / Just like that you're six years old and you take a nap and you / Wake up and you're twenty-five and your high school sweetheart becomes your wife
quotes.author: Chris Allen Wallin

quotes.quote: Trust me friend a hundred years goes faster than you think / So don't blink
quotes.author: Chris Allen Wallin

quotes.quote: Do not breath too deep / And chance the moment / No way do not blink
quotes.author: Perry Farrell

quotes.quote: I can not blink for fear / That you might somehow disappear I will not blink
quotes.author: Perry Farrell

quotes.quote: In a Blink of an eye that is when / I'll be closer to You than I've ever been / Time will fly, but until then / I'll embrace every moment I'm given
quotes.author: Barry E Graul

quotes.quote: Don't wait too long / Or she'll be gone fast as a blink / Get on the ball / If you love your lover / No gesture too small / Tear down the walls if you love her / Just give it your all
quotes.author: Eric Stefani

quotes.quote: Blink Blink, every time you open up your eyes / Blink Blink, every time you open up your mind
quotes.author: Elusive

quotes.quote: Cause it could be gone in the blink of an eye / It could be dawn in the blink of an eye / Isn't it time that you reached for the sky / And let yourself go
quotes.author: Christopher Cross

quotes.quote: It happens in a blink / It happens in a flash / It happens in the time it took to look back / I try to hold on tight, but there's no stopping time / What is it I've done with my life
quotes.author: Jason Ingram

quotes.quote: If you hear me, baby, blink! / Do you even have the capability left to think? / There seems to be a missing link / Everybody's had a chance to see how far I can sin
quotes.author: Mark Brydon

quotes.quote: Play dumb, play dead / Trying to manipulate / You blink when you breathe and you breathe when you lie / You blink when you lie
quotes.author: Dean Fertita

quotes.quote: If all my life / It were a blink of / It were a blink of an eye / I'd make the future the best thing if I only knew
quotes.author: Joel Pack

quotes.quote: Can you weather the storm or get wetta / Don't blink slow, don't think slow / Or you might miss the whole thing bro
quotes.author: Gary N Reed

quotes.quote: In the blink of an eye / Seems like minutes as the years fly by / In the blink of an eye / Afraid to stop because I can't stop time
quotes.author: Darrell Lance Abbott

quotes.quote: Don't blink / They won't even miss you at all / And don't think / That I'll always be gone
quotes.author: Thomas H Jr Denney

quotes.quote: Oh, ride and ride, you riders, / Who rode ere I was born, / While blink-and-blink the star-dust / That blinks before the morn.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: It's amazing in the blink of an eye you finally see the light.
quotes.author: Steven Tyler

quotes.quote: A blink of an eye in itself is nothing. But the eye that blinks, that is something.
quotes.author: Chaim Potok

quotes.quote: If you blink enough and relax a whole new world is opened to you.
quotes.author: Kris Harte

quotes.quote: Everything can change in the blink of an eye. But don't worry; God never blinks.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: Enjoy every single day you get to lead because it will be over in a blink.
quotes.author: Bill Hybels

quotes.quote: Nothing is ever truly set by fate. In one blink, everything changes. Even though it should be a clear, sunny day, the softest whisper into the wind can become a hurricane that destroys everything it touches.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: In the blink of an eye, something happens by chance - when you least expect it - sets you on a course that you never planned, into a future you never imagined.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Life is a vapor. It passes in the blink of an eye.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.quote: In the blink of an eye everything can change. So forgive often and love with all your heart. You may not have that chance again.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Anything can happen in the blink of an eye. Anything at all. One. Two. Three. Blink.
quotes.author: Meg Cabot

quotes.quote: I don't blink to live; I live to blink; mischievously flirt with nubile maidens; trespassing through a carpet of ingratiating mysticism; and incredulous enthrallment
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Blind wet sheets / flapping on the lines… / sun in your eyes, / dark gold sun / full of little black spots, / you have to blink and blink…
quotes.author: Lola Ridge

quotes.quote: If it be in the dusk when, like an eyelid's soundless blink, / The dewfall-hawk comes crossing the shades to alight / Upon the wind-warped upland thorn, a gazer may think, / 'To him this must have been a familiar sight.'
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Blinking produces tears that help to keep the surface of the eye moist and clean.
quotes.author: Louise Spilsbury

quotes.quote: Every time people blink, a tear leaves the glands. It washes onto the eye through tiny holes called tear ducts.
quotes.author: Louise Spilsbury

quotes.quote: People blink a lot when they talk. A shyer character will blink more than a bold one.
quotes.author: Susannah Shaw

quotes.quote: If the character's startled and does a 'take' they might do a blink as the head draws back.
quotes.author: Susannah Shaw

quotes.quote: The search for bliss is inside ourselves..
quotes.author: Shay Mitchell

quotes.quote: Our highest purpose is to love God, the reservoir of bliss, love, beauty , and opulence which allows us to attain God-consciousness.
quotes.author: Terry Cole-Whitaker

quotes.quote: God is bliss, so we are bliss.
quotes.author: Terry Cole-Whitaker

quotes.quote: The highest form of bliss is living with a certain degree of folly.
quotes.author: Erasmus

quotes.quote: The greatest gift you can ever give another person is your own happiness.
quotes.author: Abraham Hicks

quotes.quote: Let no one ever come to you without leaving better and happier.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: That perfect bliss and sole felicity, the sweet fruition of an earthly crown.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.quote: If there's another world, he lives in bliss, if there is none, he made the best of this.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: Geniuses are people who follow their bliss.
quotes.author: Terry Cole-Whitaker

quotes.quote: Bliss is the intrinsic nature of every soul. Bliss is the key to personal and global transformation and transcendence into this new life and new world we have been praying for.
quotes.author: Terry Cole-Whitaker

quotes.quote: As soon as the center of all being is apprehended, there ariseth a joy in the heart that surpasseth all other.
quotes.author: Jacob Boehme

quotes.quote: So great a sweetness flows into the breast / We must laugh and we must sing, / We are blessed by everything,/ Everything we look upon is blest.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Your bliss can guide you to that transcendent mystery, because bliss is the welling up of the energy of the transcendent wisdom within you.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: But I do know what bliss is: that deep sense of being present, of doing what you absolutely must do to be yourself.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Bliss occurs when thought is surrendered, and it's 'triggers' are primarily affiliated with the emotional and physical domains of the person.
quotes.author: Catherine Schultz

quotes.quote: Bliss is the only true, permanent form of happiness. Everyday happiness is subject to fluctuation; even positive psychologists warn that we can't experience everyday happiness all of the time.
quotes.author: Sean Meshorer

quotes.quote: Bliss is like white light. Just as pure light is the totality of all color, bliss is the conglomeration of all positive qualities.
quotes.author: Sean Meshorer

quotes.quote: Bliss cannot even be attained, really. The soul simply realizes that bliss simply is.
quotes.author: Sean Meshorer

quotes.quote: Happiness, to some extent, requires an action on our part. Bliss, on the other hand, is a state of being.
quotes.author: Sean Meshorer

quotes.quote: Life is a pure flame, and we live by an invisible sun within us.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: Nothing is more important than reconnecting with your bliss. Nothing is as rich. Nothing is more real.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: When ignorance is bliss, 'tis folly to be wise.
quotes.author: Thomas Gray

quotes.quote: The weak have remedies, the wise have joys; superior wisdom is superior bliss.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Materialism is the only form of distraction from true bliss.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: Alone let him constantly meditate in solitude on that which is salutary for his soul, for he who meditates in solitude attains supreme bliss.
quotes.author: Guru Nanak

quotes.quote: Happiness is around every corner but everyone once in a while, we need a map or a pointer on how to find it.
quotes.author: Louise B. Harmon

quotes.quote: Bliss needs to be shared. It exists only in sharing.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Happiness that comes and never leaves; it is called the bliss of the Soul.
quotes.author: Dada Bhagwan

quotes.quote: Only laughter makes a man rich, but the laughter has to be blissful.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Happiness is a continuation of happenings which are not resisted.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Out of the bliss comes magic, wonderment and creativity.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: Happiness cannot be far behind a grateful mind heart and a peaceful mind.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: All happiness comes from awareness. The more we are conscious the deeper the joy. Acceptance of pain, non-resistance, courage and endurance - these open deep and perennial sources of real happiness, true bliss.
quotes.author: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.quote: Joy is the infallible sign of the presence of God.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: Nothing is more important than reconnecting with your bliss. Nothing is as rich. Nothing is more real.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Achieving your heart's desires is the key to living a life of bliss.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: When you are aligned with the truth of who you truly are, then you experience bliss.
quotes.author: Vivian Amis

quotes.quote: Follow your bliss and let the magic of life happen.
quotes.author: Janelle Jalbert

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, be.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: To live in infinite bliss, practice mindfulness and live in the moment.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: Follow life's bliss.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance; the wise grows it under his feet.
quotes.author: James Openheim

quotes.quote: Joy is the holy fireÂ that keeps our purpose warm and our intelligence aglow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Rules for Happiness:Â something to do,Â someone to love,Â something to hope for.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Perfect happiness is a beautiful sunset, the giggle of a grandchild, the first snowfall. It's the little things that make happy moments, not the grand events. Joy comes in sips, not gulps.
quotes.author: Sharon Draper
