quotes.quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Happiness is there when you express kindness, compassion, and unconditional love and fill yourself with bliss and joy.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Always follow your bliss; bliss is heavenly. Life will be divinely beautiful and grow spiritually. Life will be beautiful, peaceful, blissful, and divine.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: There is no way to happiness. Happiness is the way.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: You can only have bliss if you don't chase it.
quotes.author: Bhante Henepola Gunaratana

quotes.quote: Joy is what happens when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved-loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Bliss is doing that which fulfills you. Action that touches you deeply and fully. Bliss is active. Bliss is...following your dreams, desires, or heart. Bliss is that deep, fulfilling, sustainable, driving need you have. That thing that is the true "you." Your bliss is your life's purpose. Your bliss gives your otherwise meaningless life meaning. When you are following your bliss you are powerful and empowered. You are focused and the universe is waiting to help you.
quotes.author: Angie karan

quotes.quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
quotes.author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Bliss is terribly private.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Rees

quotes.quote: Follow your bliss and don't be afraid, and door will open where you didn't know they were going to be.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Bliss is not a feeling but a state of being. In the state of bliss, everything is loved.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Happiness is a mysterious thing, to be found somewhere between too little and too much.
quotes.author: Ruskin Bond

quotes.quote: Bliss can only come through gratitude, only through enlarging your heart with gratitude. Bliss is the reward of gratitude - the gratitude which is not just wordly or just spoken lip service, but is from the heart - the gratitude of the heart.
quotes.author: Nirmala Srivastava

quotes.quote: Sometimes bliss can only be found in the serenity of darkness.
quotes.author: Saim .A. Cheeda

quotes.quote: The supreme attainment of human life is divine bliss. Divine bliss is the nature of the Self.
quotes.author: Gurumayi Chidvilasananda

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice, a repetitive one.
quotes.author: Akilnathan Logeswaran

quotes.quote: Ignorance might be bliss. But self-forgetfulness is pure ecstasy.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: Joy is a sustained sense of well-being and internal peaceâ€”a connection to what matters.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Get in touch with your inner most desire and aspirations, then utilise the power of your heart to create a life of bliss.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Happiness without reason is bliss.
quotes.author: Tapan Ghosh

quotes.quote: Happiness is as exclusive as a butterfly, and you must never pursue it. If you stay very still, it may come and settle on your hand. But only briefly. Savour those moments, for they will not come in your way very often.
quotes.author: Ruskin Bond

quotes.quote: Happiness is not in things; it is in you.
quotes.author: Robert Holden

quotes.quote: The secret of being happy is not longing for it!
quotes.author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quotes.quote: Bliss is the ocean, a towel on the sand, the sun out, the chance to swim in waves or walk dragging a stick behind you, a good book, a cold drink.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: Find ecstasy in life;Â the mere sense of living is joy enough.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Inner bliss is ultimate happiness.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Happiness is the settling of the soul into its most appropriate spot.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: To experience peace does not mean that your life is always blissful. It means that you are capable of tapping into a blissful state of mind amidst the normal chaos of a hectic life.
quotes.author: Jill Bolte Taylor

quotes.quote: Only a man who has felt ultimate despair is capable of feeling ultimate bliss.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: If I look upon my whole life, I cannot think of another time when I felt more comfortable: when I had no worries, fears, or desires, when my life seemed as soft and lovely as lying inside a cocoon of rose silk.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: That perfect bliss and sole felicity, the sweet fruition of an earthly crown.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.quote: How we fare in any given situation depends on the conduct of our body, speech, and mind. Since mind is the chief, a disciplined mind is essential.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Beauty is whatever gives joy.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: To be happy one must find one's bliss.
quotes.author: Gloria Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: Pull love closely around you and snuggle into its bliss.
quotes.author: Hemat Malak

quotes.quote: Happiness comes to us by Itself, and It envelops our whole being when the mind becomes humble and silent, as it has understood its inability to encounter the Unknown.
quotes.author: Ilie Cioara

quotes.quote: True happiness ensues indirectly. It always appears in a state of non-search.
quotes.author: Ilie Cioara

quotes.quote: You are the guest of joy, you cannot impose yourself.
quotes.author: Jean Klein

quotes.quote: The bliss even of a moment still is bliss.
quotes.author: Joanna Baillie

quotes.quote: Life has no meaning. Each of us has meaning and we bring it to life. It is a waste to be asking the question when you are the answer.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: When you follow your bliss, you begin to meet people who are in the field of your bliss, and they open the doors to you.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: The goal of life is to make your heartbeat match the beat of the universe, to match your nature with Nature.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: I believe in karma, and I believe if you put out positive vibes to everybody, that’s all you're going to get back.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.quote: Pain and foolishness lead to great bliss and complete knowledge, for Eternal Wisdom created nothing under the sun in vain.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Everything about you is how I wanna be, your freedom comes naturally. Everything about you resonates happiness now I won't settle for less.
quotes.author: Matthew Bellamy

quotes.quote: Following all the rules leaves a completed checklist. Following your heart achieves a completed you.
quotes.author: Ray A. Davis

quotes.quote: Such bliss is not meant to last. In my husband's house, my children were my real gifts.
quotes.author: Ru Freeman

quotes.quote: Let me go to hell, that's all I ask, and go on cursing them there, and them look down and hear me, that might take some of the shine off their bliss.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: As you live your values, your sense of identity, integrity, control, and inner-directedness will infuse you with both exhilaration and peace.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Bliss is the nature of spirit-force in the same way that wetness is a quality of water.
quotes.author: Steve Taylor

quotes.quote: Success is realizing the true joy and wonder of life can only be yours if you follow your own intuition, aiming to achieve your bliss.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Where ignorance is bliss, 'Tis folly to be wise.
quotes.author: Thomas Gray

quotes.quote: Now may every living thing, young or old, weak or strong, living near or far, known or unknown, living or departed or yet unborn, may every living thing be full of bliss.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are dependent on blockchain - the underlying distributed ledger that guarantees tamper-resistant permanent transactions - to do business. But that's not all blockchain does, or has the potential to do.
quotes.author: Olawale Daniel

quotes.quote: Blockchain by itself isn't transformational, however it is foundational. As a foundational innovation, Blockchain's value can only be fully realized when the business process is transformed to take advantage of its capabilities, leading to ROI for existing business models and the ability to create value through new ones.
quotes.author: Tom Golway

quotes.quote: Blockchain itself is not dangerous, but if we start using decentralized blockchain as a complete substitute for our traditional transaction methods, then I am afraid, it would destroy the very human foundation of our financial system.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: The main advantage of blockchain technology is supposed to be that it's more secure, but new technologies are generally hard for people to trust, and this paradox can't really be avoided.
quotes.author: Vitalik Buterin

quotes.quote: In the blockchain world, each user can and should own their data, and 'central' players are less vulnerable to data losses and breaches.
quotes.author: William Mougayar

quotes.quote: The blockchain symbolizes a shift in power from the centers to the edges of the networks.
quotes.author: William Mougayar

quotes.quote: Blockchain is the tech. Bitcoin is merely the first mainstream manifestation of its potential.
quotes.author: Marc Kenisberg

quotes.quote: The blockchain does one thing: It replaces third-party trust with mathematical proof that something happened.
quotes.author: Adam Draper

quotes.quote: The Internet is programmable information. The blockchain is programmable scarcity.
quotes.author: Balaji Srinivasan

quotes.quote: Blockchain. The biggest opportunity set we can think of over the next decade.
quotes.author: Bob Grifeld

quotes.quote: The blockchain is all about bringing in transparency and efficiency into the existing systems which are running the upstream and downstream supply chains and making them more proactive and predictive.
quotes.author: Rahul Guhathakurta

quotes.quote: Without transforming the business process, Blockchain only offers the potential of incremental value in reducing TCO.
quotes.author: Tom Golway

quotes.quote: Centralized blockchain can be a great boon to the society, especially in the developing parts of the world, whereas decentralized blockchain will only cause chaos and destruction.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Blockchain's a very interesting technology that will have some very profound applications for society over the years to come.
quotes.author: Kenneth C. Griffin

quotes.quote: The ledger, the distributed database - it's called a Blockchain - is held in the cloud by all the parties involved. It can't be broken by any of them. It's cryptographically too strong. You would have to compromise the entire network to take over Bitcoin.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: The blockchain cannot be described just as a revolution. It is a tsunami-like phenomenon, slowly advancing and gradually enveloping everything along its way by the force of its progression.
quotes.author: William Mougayar

quotes.quote: Blockchain software companies may end up being amalgamated into existing software giants, at which point blockchain patents will just become part of the existing patent war.
quotes.author: Vitalik Buterin

quotes.quote: The blockchain is an asset normalization platform that can enable a new liquidity in transactions, hence creating large networks of usage and value effects with benefits in speed, cost, quality, or outcomes.
quotes.author: William Mougayar

quotes.quote: You have to think of the blockchain as a new utility. It is a new utility network for moving value, moving assets.
quotes.author: William Mougayar

quotes.quote: The blockchain is an incorruptible digital ledger of economic transactions that can be programmed to record not just financial transactions but virtually everything of value.
quotes.author: Don & Alex Tapscott

quotes.quote: Blog culture has a hard time digesting narratives, but it has an easy time digesting big ideas pieces.
quotes.author: Hanna Rosin

quotes.quote: The influence of blogging is overall a very positive force in the media.
quotes.author: Garrett Graff

quotes.quote: Blogs seem to have two magnetic poles, one attracting friends, the other repulsing relatives.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: The evidence that things are changing fast can be seen in the dramatic increase in the influence of blogging. We should be collecting emails as we used to collect telephone numbers and using them to better communicate our message to key voters.
quotes.author: Adam Rickitt

quotes.quote: Blogging can generate a great deal of traffic to your online business.
quotes.author: Fabrizio Moreira

quotes.quote: Blogs are a great way to monitor and even participate in the chatter about your new site.
quotes.author: Mike Davidson

quotes.quote: A blog is only as interesting as the interest shown in others.
quotes.author: Lee Odden

quotes.quote: A blog is a message in a bottle, both in purpose and likely readership.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Small blogs are starting up big campaigns.
quotes.author: Jessica Valenti

quotes.quote: Blogging is using a new medium for what it is good for connecting and interacting.
quotes.author: George Siemens

quotes.quote: Creating your own blog is about as easy as creating your own urine, and you're about as likely to find someone else interested in it.
quotes.author: Lore Sjoberg

quotes.quote: The currency of blogging is authenticity and trust.
quotes.author: Jason Calacanis

quotes.quote: To have a blog is to have some portion of your brain assigned to monitoring your audience.
quotes.author: Jake Lodwick

quotes.quote: Successful blogging is not about one time hits. It's about building a loyal following over time.
quotes.author: David Aston

quotes.quote: Blogging is hard because of the grind required to stay interesting and relevant.
quotes.author: Sufia Tippu

quotes.quote: The process for finding, creating, and consuming information has fundamentally changed with the advent of the web and the rise of blogging.
quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

quotes.quote: Developing your blog is a balancing act between appeasing current readers and reaching out to new ones.
quotes.author: Scribendi

quotes.quote: Blogging is best learned by blogging and by reading other bloggers.
quotes.author: George Siemens

quotes.quote: People can be anonymous when they go on blogs and say crazy things that they would never have the courage to say to your face.
quotes.author: John Leguizamo

quotes.quote: The heart of blogging is linking and commenting. Connecting and communicating the purpose of the Internet.
quotes.author: George Siemens

quotes.quote: Before blogs, it was all about physical presence. We used to send out videos and audiotapes to communicate. Blogging and the Internet allow us to engage in a lot more real time conversations as opposed to a one-way dump of information or a message.
quotes.author: Indra Nooyi

quotes.quote: If folks focus in on a niche and own it, there is a good chance they could make half a living from blogging.
quotes.author: Jason Calacanis

quotes.quote: Blogging got the concept of personal publishing, but it didn't really take advantage of the network.
quotes.author: Evan Williams

quotes.quote: Put your blog out into the world and hope that your talent will speak for itself.
quotes.author: Diablo Cody

quotes.quote: A blog is neither a diary nor a journal. Many people think of blogging in relation to those two things, confessional or practical. It is neither but includes elements of both.
quotes.author: Lemn Sissay

quotes.quote: Well, there are more writers of blogs right now than there are readers, so that's clearly a vanity phenomenon.
quotes.author: John Doerr

quotes.quote: Tall, sandy blonde, with sort of blue eyes, skinny in places, fat in others. An average gal.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.quote: Being blonde means people decide on sight that you are much prettier and nicer than you really are, just as Americans automatically add 10 points to someone's IQ when they hear an English accent. Fact.
quotes.author: Rachel Johnson

quotes.quote: Blonde symbolises sexuality and power - it holds very different connotations. The archetypal star has always been blonde.
quotes.author: Marina and the Diamonds

quotes.quote: A nervous blonde nymphet who thought that politics was some kind of game played by old people, like bridge.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: I really fought to make my character not a stereotype. I play a soap star with dyed blonde hair.
quotes.author: Sadie Frost

quotes.quote: The recognition factor is so much higher when I'm a redhead, so when I'm a blonde I can pass under the radar a lot more easily.
quotes.author: Cynthia Nixon

quotes.quote: Funny how a wife can spot a blonde hair at twenty yards, yet miss the garage doors.
quotes.author: Corey Ford

quotes.quote: I'm such a blonde. It just doesn't make sense for me to have dark hair.
quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

quotes.quote: I think my wife saw a picture of the rock group Journey, and they're kind of aging, and the one guy had dyed blonde hair with black roots, and... my idea was to get a little earring, I wanted to have a dangling earring.
quotes.author: Fred Willard

quotes.quote: The experience of being a young, blonde, naive but well-intentioned young producer was both intimidating and eye-opening.
quotes.author: Clarissa Ward

quotes.quote: I always envisioned her looking like a spindly blonde, but she looked like me.
quotes.author: Brittany Murphy

quotes.quote: When I was blonde I was perceived as an innocent and sweet young girl.
quotes.author: Samantha Mathis

quotes.quote: I personally prefer being a blonde, but whatever it takes for the character.
quotes.author: Peta Wilson

quotes.quote: It's great to be a blonde. With low expectations it's very easy to surprise people.
quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

quotes.quote: Blonde or brunette, this rhyme applies, happy is he who knows them not.
quotes.author: Francois Villon

quotes.quote: She was a natural blonde, with delicate hands and feet, and in her youthful photographs one saw a girl with mocking eyes and a tragic smile, the course of whose life would conspire in time to transpose that pair of adjectives.
quotes.author: Michael Chabon

quotes.quote: You know, if I tell the press that I like long blonde hair, the next day there will be girls with long hair wigs outside waiting for me.
quotes.author: Andy Lau

quotes.quote: I always say now that I'm in my blonde years. Because since the end of my marriage, all of my girlfriends have been blonde.
quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

quotes.quote: It's great being blonde - with such low expectations it's easy to impress.
quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

quotes.quote: The myth of the strong black woman is the other side of the coin of the myth of the beautiful dumb blonde.
quotes.author: Eldridge Cleaver

quotes.quote: Going blonde is like buying yourself a light bulb!
quotes.author: Heidi Klum

quotes.quote: You know, just because you're a blonde type doesn't mean you can't suddenly do serious parts.
quotes.author: Cleo Moore

quotes.quote: It is possible that blondes also prefer gentleman.
quotes.author: Mamie Van Doren

quotes.quote: I'm not the stereotypical blonde vixen girl but rather the blonde freckled girl from Kentucky.
quotes.author: Maggie Lawson

quotes.quote: I really enjoyed being a blonde. Men were more friendly and flirtatious. My face looked more worldly. It took the innocence away. It could be the new me.
quotes.author: Stephanie Zimbalist

quotes.quote: They're always such alive females. And also, all those love stories - no man in Austen has ever fallen in love with a female heroine because she's pretty or beautiful or has long, blonde hair. They fall in love with them because of who they are, because of their vibrancy and their intelligence and if only we were teaching that a bit more in schools.
quotes.author: Anna Maxwell Martin

quotes.quote: It was a blonde. A blonde to make a bishop kick a hole in a stained-glass window.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Being a Southern person and a blonde, it's not a good combination. Immediately, when people meet you, they think of you as not being smart.
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: People keep asking me if I am having more fun, being blonde, but I always have fun! Whether I'm blonde, redhead, or brunette! I always have fun.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.quote: For so long I hid behind the blonde hair and the blue eyes. Now I feel like I've done it, I've done what I set out to achieve, now I can just go back to being me.
quotes.author: Jodie Marsh

quotes.quote: I was traveling on our tour bus through Europe and I was thinking I want to have long blonde hair.
quotes.author: Nina Hagen

quotes.quote: I was never a dangerous woman. I'm not the prissy blonde woman that could take your husband away.
quotes.author: Catherine Deneuve

quotes.quote: They go the long way but we take the short cut Give me the blonde hair, long weave, short cut
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.quote: She was a lovely blonde, with fine teeth. She had gold and pearls for her dowry; but her gold was on her head, and her pearls were in her mouth.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: That gentlemen prefer blondes is due to the fact that, apparently, pale hair, delicate skin and an infantile expression represent the very apex of frailty which every man longs to violate.
quotes.author: Alexander King

quotes.quote: The best part of being blonde is forgivable momentary lapses of common sense.
quotes.author: Caity Lotz

quotes.quote: It isn't that gentlemen really prefer blondes, it's just that we look dumber.
quotes.author: Anita Loos

quotes.quote: I'm not offended by all the dumb-blonde jokes, because I know that I'm not dumb, I also know I'm not blonde.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: When you're not blonde and thin, you come up with a personality real quick.
quotes.author: Kathy Najimy

quotes.quote: Hair, not just blonde, but radiating gold like a candle flame behind a window in winter.
quotes.author: Stuart Dybek

quotes.quote: The thing that bugged me the most about the blonde women was that they just smiled and nodded and smiled and nodded. I could never tell what they were thinking.
quotes.author: Ellie Lofaro

quotes.quote: I wasn't able to bond with the blond women because they were so very different than I was. They looked, acted, spoke, smelled, and walked differently than I did.
quotes.author: Ellie Lofaro

quotes.quote: In New York, people invite you to their home and they feed you delectable treats. The blonde women will meet you for a muffin at a local cafe.
quotes.author: Ellie Lofaro

quotes.quote: How did the blonde explain how her helicopter crashed? She said it was getting cold, so she turned off the ceiling fan.
quotes.author: Ed Sullivan

quotes.quote: What do you call an all-blonde skydiving team? A new version of the Lawn Darts Game.
quotes.author: Ed Sullivan

quotes.quote: How did the blonde break her leg playing hockey with the Toronto Maple Leafs? She fell out of the tree.
quotes.author: Ed Sullivan

quotes.quote: Some women are born blonde. Some achieve it. Being blonde doesn't have anything to do with your natural hair color. It's an attitude.
quotes.author: Elaine Viets

quotes.quote: And come back as a blonde / Try a different lipstick on, as a blonde / Try a different lipstick on, as a blonde / Will I get whatever I want? / I'd be ever so enticing / Eat a lot of icing / Never have to watch my weight / Yeah when I'm gone / I'm gonna come back as a blonde.
quotes.author: Shely Peiken

quotes.quote: Tired of being blonde / Tired of all the platinum frustration / Tired of being blonde / Tired of looking like a cutie on the cover of a magazine / Tired of being blonde / Tired of chasing all the latest sensations.
quotes.author: Larry Raspberry

quotes.quote: I'm a blonde so excuse me / I'm a blonde I get crazy / And everybody knows / We're a little more than fun / I like to play it up like I'm dumb / D-dumb, dumb, dumb, dumb, dumb, dumb / 'Cause I'm a blonde
quotes.author: Bridgit Mendler

quotes.quote: I ain't no dumb blonde / I ain't no stupid Barbie doll / I got my game on / Watch me, watch me, watch me prove you wrong.
quotes.author: Avril Ramona Lavigne

quotes.quote: I was born to be blonde so I say what I want / I get paid when I want, I get laid when I want / I was born to be blonde, maybe all of us are / If you gave it a try you would feel like a star. / I was born to be blonde and you were born to be too / You were born to be me, I was born to be you.
quotes.author: Dylan Brady

quotes.quote: I'm very intelligent. I'm capable of doing everything put to me. I've launched a perfume and want my own hotel chain. I'm living proof blondes are not stupid.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: Being blonde is definitely a different state of mind. I can't really put my finger on it, but the artifice of being blonde has some incredible sort of sexual connotation. Men really respond to it. I love blonde hair but it really does something different to you. I feel more grounded when I have dark hair, and I feel more ethereal when I have light hair. It's unexplainable. I also feel more Italian when my hair is dark.
quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

quotes.quote: I don't think it's true that blondes have more fun... Trust me, it is not true!
quotes.author: Mila Kunis

quotes.quote: When I'm a blonde, I can say the world is purple, and they'll believe me because they weren't listening to me.
quotes.author: Kylie Bax

quotes.quote: Beware of her fair hair, for she excels all women in the magic of her locks; And when she winds them round a young man's neck, she will not ever set him free again.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: There's nobody in the world like me. I think every decade has an iconic blonde, like Marilyn Monroe or Princess Diana and, right now, I'm that icon.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: I'm a natural blonde, but I feel like a brunette. I feel like people treat me now how I should be treated. People used to be shocked, when I was blond, that I wasn't stupid.
quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

quotes.quote: I always say now that I'm in my blonde years. Because since the end of my marriage, all of my girlfriends have been blonde.
quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

quotes.quote: When I'm a brunette, it's four times harder to hail a taxi. Then I go blonde again, and suddenly there are taxis everywhere.
quotes.author: Sally Phillips

quotes.quote: I may be a dumb blonde, but I'm not that blonde.
quotes.author: Patricia Neal

quotes.quote: If people think I'm a dumb blonde, because of the way I look, then they're dumber than they think I am. If people think I'm not very deep because of my wigs and outfits, then they're not very deep.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Blonde is dumb comedy, red hair is smart, sexy comedy.
quotes.author: Lisa Kudrow

quotes.quote: Everybody is a dumb blonde at heart.
quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

quotes.quote: I love Marilyn Monroe. I think she was the coolest blonde. I think like me she just didn't care what anyone thinks. She's happy. She's smiling. I don't know, I just always thought she was so beautiful and she just seemed, like, magical.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: The best blood will at some time get into a fool or a mosquito.
quotes.author: Austin O’Malley

quotes.quote:
Blood is really warm,
it's like drinking hot chocolate
but with more screaming.
quotes.author: Ryan Mecum

quotes.quote: A man who is good enough to shed his blood for the country is good enough to be given a square deal afterwards.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Blood alone moves the wheels of history.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: We are linked by blood, and blood is memory without language.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: It will have blood, they say; blood will have blood.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Blood is that fragile scarlet tree we carry within us.
quotes.author: Osbert Sitwell

quotes.quote: Blood is a cleansing and sanctifying thing, and the nation that regards it as the final horror has lost its manhood.
quotes.author: Patrick Pearse

quotes.quote: The blood of the martyrs is the seed of the church.
quotes.author: Tertullian

quotes.quote: The patriot's blood is the seed of Freedom's tree.
quotes.author: Thomas Campbell

quotes.quote: It is said that blood is thicker than water. It is what joins us, binds us, curses us.
quotes.author: Barnabas

quotes.quote: Everybody is a book of blood; wherever we're opened, we're red.
quotes.author: Clive Barker

quotes.quote:
The blood jet is poetry
There is no stopping it.”
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: The blood is the life!
quotes.author: Bram Stoker

quotes.quote: When the blood burns, how prodigal the soulLends the tongue vows.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: All the soarings of my mind begin in my blood.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: If you feel lost, disappointed, hesitant, or weak, return to yourself, to who you are, here and now and when you get there, you will discover yourself, like a lotus flower in full bloom, even in a muddy pond, beautiful and strong.
quotes.author: Masaru Emoto

quotes.quote: Solitude is the soil in which genius is planted, creativity grows, and legends bloom; faith in oneself is the rain that cultivates a hero to endure the storm, and bare the genesis of a new world, a new forest.
quotes.author: Mike Norton

quotes.quote: It is said there are flowers that bloom only once in a hundred years. Why should there not be some that bloom once in a thousand, in ten thousand years? Perhaps we never know about them simply because this "once in a thousand years" has come today.
quotes.author: Zamyatin

quotes.quote: The crickets still sing in October. And lilly, she's trying to bloom. Tho she's resting her head on the shoulder of death, she still shines by the light of the moon.
quotes.author: Kevin Dalton

quotes.quote:
The rose has told
In one simplicity
That never life
Relinquishes a bloom
But to bestow
An ancient confidence.
quotes.author: Nathalia Crane

quotes.quote: You are built not to shrink down to less but to blossom into more.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Ignorance is like a delicate fruit; touch it, and the bloom is gone.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The bloom may be brief but the memory of its beauty will last a lifetime.
quotes.author: Doe Zantamata

quotes.quote: The flower that smells the sweetest is shy and lowly.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Let a hundred flowers bloom, let a hundred schools of thought contend.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Our bloom is gone. We are the fruit thereof.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: The finest qualities of our nature, like the bloom on fruits, can be preserved only by the most delicate handling.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Talent is like a little seed; when nurtured, it will flourish.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: You can flourish by faith.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The perfect blossom is a rare thing. You could spend your life looking for one and it would not be a wasted life.
quotes.author: Ken Watanabe

quotes.quote: It is so important to allow children to bloom and to be driven by their curiosity.
quotes.author: May-Britt Moser

quotes.quote: Blossoms are scattered by the wind and the wind cares nothing but the blossoms of the heart no wind can touch.
quotes.author: Yoshida Kenko

quotes.quote: If beautiful lilies bloom in ugly waters, you too can blossom in ugly situations.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Every flower is a soul blossoming in nature.
quotes.author: Gerard de Nerval

quotes.quote: All beings are flowers blossoming In a blossoming universe.
quotes.author: Soen Nakagawa

quotes.quote: Bloom as if you want to make the whole world beautiful.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: To be overcome by the fragrance of flowers is a delectable form of defeat.
quotes.author: Beverly Nichols

quotes.quote: Bloom where you are planted and sow where you are fed.
quotes.author: Stella Payton

quotes.quote: To flourish in life is to live according to the laws of the kingdom that God ordained
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: And so we are like flowers; and bloom only, when the sun, kisses us.
quotes.author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quotes.quote: Bloom like a flower; unfold your own beauty.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Hope blooms when the time is ready.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Desire makes everything blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: We blossom under praise like flowers in sun and dew; we open, we reach, we grow.
quotes.author: Gerhard E Frost

quotes.quote: A flower doesn't love you or hate you, it just exists.
quotes.author: Mike White

quotes.quote: Bloom where you are planted.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The flower of the present rosily blossomed.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Every flower blooms at a different pace.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Flowers are without hope. Because hope is tomorrow and flowers have no tomorrow.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: The flower that follows the sun does so even in cloudy days.
quotes.author: Robert Leighton

quotes.quote: All of us blossom when we feel loved and wither when we do not feel loved.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote:
I am in awe of flowers.
Not because of their colors,
but because even though they
have dirt in their roots,
they still grow.
They still bloom.
quotes.author: D. Antoinette Foy

quotes.quote: Love yourself, even a little bit each day, and your life will bloom into infinite joy.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote:
Do your thoughts continue and repeat a cycle
Seed, growth, bloom, and seed again.
quotes.author: Richard L. Ratliff

quotes.quote: Rewards of life lived with principles; bloom, when life is about to end or has departed already.
quotes.author: Aniruddha Sastikar

quotes.quote: What blooms from beautiful seeds of thought becomes a symphony of colorful abundance.
quotes.author: Jazz Feylynn

quotes.quote:
Be a wildflower
amongst cut flowers
quotes.author: Dahi Tamara Koch

quotes.quote: The earth is gentle. And the earth allows the flowers to bloom. We need to be gentle. And the flowers will bloom in our life.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: Be like the earth, and let the flowers bloom.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote:
All that blooms
must wither first.
quotes.author: Dahi Tamara Koch

quotes.quote: Science, or para-science, tells us that geraniums bloom better if they are spoken to. But a kind word every now and then is really quite enough. Too much attention, like too much feeding, and weeding and hoeing, inhibits and embarrasses them.
quotes.author: Victoria Glendinning

quotes.quote: Everything is blooming most recklessly; if it were voices instead of colors, there would be an unbelievable shrieking into the heart of the night.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote:
Vibrant verdure lights
the springtime landscape
in blazingly brilliant greens
a fresh flourishing canvas
for parti-colored sparks
of wildly blooming things.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Springtime flowers bloom like colorful arrows piercing their way to the sun.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote:
Comes happy Spring, like a maiden fair,
Quickly breathing the odorous air,
With grass-green robes, and round her hair
Apple and almond blooms, with care
Twisted and twined in a circlet rare...
And wherever she passes, morn or night,
All the broad earth smiles a smile of delight.
quotes.author: J.J. Britton

quotes.quote: Look at us, said the violets blooming at her feet, all last winter we slept in the seeming death but at the right time God awakened us, and here we are to comfort you.
quotes.author: Edward Payson Rod

quotes.quote: Spring itself is Faith. In all its glory and color the true nature of our being is being reborn. Faith roots in our souls and grows in our hearts. Faith is the very beat of our hearts. Faith is the air we breathe. Faith is the lump in our throats and the tears we shed. Faith is the first rose that blooms
quotes.author: Barbara Collier

quotes.quote:
Well, my love is a flower just beginning to bloom
Like those things from your garden that spring from the gloom.
quotes.author: Jonathan Richman

quotes.quote: Summer's in bloom, Summer's in bloom / Light her up, let her fill the room / Speak no lie, Summer's in bloom.
quotes.author: Dominic Joseph

quotes.quote: Do not ask me dear to linger, for I know not what to say / When duty calls, just sweetheart's name in vain / I hope your heart will not be crying, if I'm not among the dying / I'll be with you when the roses bloom again.
quotes.author: A.P. Carter

quotes.quote: They were strolling in the gloaming / Where the roses were in bloom / A soldier and his sweetheart brave and true / And their hearts were filled with sorrow / For their thoughts were of tomorrow / As she pinned a rose upon his coat of blue.
quotes.author: Jeff Tweedy

quotes.quote: Show what could be / How you and me / Find a route right to the stars / Bloom flower fair.
quotes.author: R2JBros

quotes.quote: Little girl in bloom / With happy heart you wipe aside / Any sadness, sorrow or gloom.
quotes.author: Philip Parris Lynott

quotes.quote: Can it be the spring that seems / To bring the stars right into this room? / Oh, no, it isn't the spring, it's love in bloom.
quotes.author: Leo Robin

quotes.quote: Is it all a dream, the joy supreme / That came to us in the gloom? / You know it isn't a dream, it's love in bloom.
quotes.author: Leo Robin

quotes.quote: Even if you don't have a whole lot of room, you can still have plenty of flowers in bloom!
quotes.author: Bob Hathcock

quotes.quote: The flower that blooms in adversity is the most rare and beautiful of all.
quotes.author: Robert D. San Souci

quotes.quote: By late summer, the plankton bloom is so vast it radiates across the North Pacific.
quotes.author: Joe Stevens

quotes.quote: Your mind is a walled garden; even Death cannot touch the flowers blooming there.
quotes.author: Jonathan Nolan

quotes.quote: Bloom upon the Mountain—stated / Blameless of a Name / Efflorescence of a Sunset / Reproduced—the same.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Like a vase containing flowers, a writer becomes a vessel for words / Beyond seconds, minutes, and hours, displaying lines set to bloom in what’s heard.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote:
When Roses cease to bloom, Sir,
And Violets are done / When Bumblebees in solemn flight / Have passed beyond the Sun / The hand that paused to gather / Upon this Summer's day
Will idle lie—in Auburn / Then take my flowers—pray!
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: All things were blossom, and God thrilled at that flower's birth / As when from night-sheathed chaos broke this blossom-earth.
quotes.author: Arthur Henry Adams

quotes.quote:
The time when daiseys bloom divine
With thy calm hours begun / And crowflowers blazing blooms are thine.
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.quote: The settler saw his oaken flail / Take bud, and bloom before his eyes / From frozen pools he saw the pale / Sweet summer lilies rise.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote:
Ah, who will tell me, in these leaden days,
Why the sweet Spring delays / And where she hides, -- the dear desire
Of every heart that longs / For bloom, and fragrance, and the ruby fire.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote:
The priceless worth of the flower that knows
No change, but a bloom divine / The bloom of a fadeless constancy / That hides in the leaves in wait for me.
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote:
I dream to-day, o'er a purple stain
Of bloom on a withered stalk / Pelted down by the autumn rain / In the dust of the garden-walk,
That an Angel-rose in the world to be
Will hide in the leaves in wait for me.
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: Now that the wind lets loose from orchard spray / Plum bloom and peach bloom down the dripping way / Their punctual gold through the wet blades they rear.
quotes.author: Lizette Woodworth Reese

quotes.quote: The Cherry Blossom Festival, Sakura Celebration captures the history and significance of the trees in Japan, the perseverance of those who envisioned them lining Washington's water banks and roadways, and the range of uplifting, multi faceted events of today's Festival.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: The breathtaking sight of the cherry trees blooming in Japan has inspired princes, poets, artists and ordinary people for over 1000 years.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: Like mount Fuji, the cherry blossoms have a spiritual meaning for the Japanese people. The sublime beauty of the flowers and their brief life at the beginning of each short life well-lived.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: The brief and exuberant blooming of the Japanese cherry trees was an important symbol for the samurai warriors. Their highly disciplined life as cultured men of war had as a highest goal to die an honorable death, preferably in the service of their overlord and in the prime of life.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: This gathered cherry branch can scarce convey A fancy of the blossom-laden tree; Blooming in sunlight, could I view it there Thoughts of its beauty would drive sleep away.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: Cherry blossom-viewing picnics traditionally included drinking sake, with portable kegs, warmers, cups and cup washers. Today, imbibing alcoholic beverages while participating in cherry blossom viewing or banami continues to be typical in Japan.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: Flowers are both perennial and transient; we get to enjoy single bloom for only a short time, but trust that there will always be more in the future.
quotes.author: Victoria Neblik

quotes.quote: Flowers bloom in many places. Water lilies bloom in ponds. Cactus plants bloom in the desert. Poppies bloom in cold places like Alaska. Orchids bloom in warm rain forests.
quotes.author: Victoria Neblik

quotes.quote: All species bloom in the spring and are summer-dormant and therefore may be planted underneath trees and spring blooming shrubs as long as they receive full sun before the plants overhead leaf out.
quotes.author: Beth Hanson

quotes.quote: Some of the best known and most beloved of all spring-blooming bulbs, daffodils are easy to grow. They seldom need dividing, are virtually disease-free, and are unappealing to deer as well as mice and other rodents because all parts of the plant are toxic.
quotes.author: Beth Hanson

quotes.quote: His eyes are blue, and blue eyes up close are a celestial phenomenon: nebulae as seen through telescopes, the light of unnamed stars diffused through dusts and elements and endlessness. Layers of light. Blue eyes are starlight.
quotes.author: Laini Taylor

quotes.quote: A gray eye is a sly eye, And roguish is a brown one; Turn full upon me thy eye,-- Ah, how its wavelets drown one! A blue eye is a true eye; Mysterious is a dark one, Which flashes like a spark-sun! A black eye is the best one.
quotes.author: William R. Alger

quotes.quote: Eyes of gentianellas azure, Staring, winking at the skies.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: He had these eyes. They were blue and they looked bluer because he had a dark head of hair. They were soulful, in some way; they seemed to say things that I knew he's probably never say out loud.
quotes.author: Audrey Bell

quotes.quote: They're crystal blue, a shade that shouldn't exist on the human body, I shade I immediately crave, a shade that makes my heart beat a little bit faster--almost as if I recognize it...It's the most perfect blue I've ever seen. Even from this distance his eyes are simply remarkable.
quotes.author: Kiersten White

quotes.quote: And, for an instant, she stared directly into those soft blue eyes and knew, with an instinctive mammalian certainty, that the exceedingly rich were no longer even remotely human.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.quote: But my deepest and most secret love belongs to the fair-haired and the blue-eyed, the bright children of life, the happy, the charming and the ordinary.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: Having talent is like having blue eyes. You don't admire a man for the colour of his eyes. I admire a man for what he does with his talent.
quotes.author: Anthony Quinn

quotes.quote: People with blue and green eyes are hyper and love to laugh. They tend to be quiet at first, but once you get to know them they never shut up. They're loyal and like long, committed relationships. They make amazing friends.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Having blue eyes is actually a mutation. Before the mutation occurred, all humans had brown eyes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You have to carry so many archetypes as an actor, especially as a blonde-haired, blue-eyed one.
quotes.author: Kristin Lehman

quotes.quote: Blue eyes are the most striking and well-loved eye color. Blue eyes are a recessive gene, so natural baby blue eyes are apparently rare.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People thought me a bit strange at first; a blond haired, blue-eyed Norwegian who sang Mexican folk songs, but I used it to my advantage and got a job. And so the music became my ticket to education.
quotes.author: David Soul

quotes.quote: According to a team of researchers from Copenhagen University, all blue-eyed people can be traced back to one ancestor who lived 10,000 years ago near the Black Sea.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Brown eyes are actually blue underneath, and as a result you can actually get surgery to turn brown eyes blue.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your big blue eyes and rosy smile remind me I'm blessed with a beautiful child.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Blue eyes say, love me or I die; black eyes say, love me or I kill thee.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Her blue eyes sought the west afar, for lovers love the western star.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: In the twilight glow I can see her blue eyes crying in the rain. When we kissed and parted, I knew we'd never meet again. Love is like a dying ember and only memories remain.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The first person ever to have blue eyes lived sometime between 6.000 and 10,000 years ago. Before then, all people had brown eyes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People with blue eyes are kind-hearted and always look for the best in people. They love with all their heart and are hard to forget about if you get the chance to love them. They are the best at pretending to be happy and tend to please others before themselves.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your eyes, your eyes, they shine like the pants of a blue serge suit. That's not a reflection on you--it's on the pants.
quotes.author: Morrie Ryskind

quotes.quote: The way your baby blue eyes sparkle when you look at me makes me want you even more.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your eyes are blue like the ocean, and baby I'm lost out at sea.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My eyes are an ocean in which my dreams are reflected.
quotes.author: Anna Uhlich

quotes.quote: Why, your eyes are like sapphires sparkling so bright.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you have blue eyes, then the share a common ancestor with every other blue-eyed person in the world.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love it when you look at me, with those eyes of ocean blue, I love it when you say my name, our love strong is and true, I love it when you hold me close, I miss you in my arms, I need your arms around me to protect me from all harm.
quotes.author: Mira Alonzo

quotes.quote: In Estonia, 99% of people have blue eyes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: White cats with blue eyes are usually deaf.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Those blue, blue eyes, icy blue, looking back at me as if I could warm them up. They’re pretty powerful, you know, those eyes, pretty beautiful, too.
quotes.author: Lucy Christopher

quotes.quote: His blue eyes were seas where sorrow sailed.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: A blue eye is a true eye. Mysterious is a dark one, Which flashes like a spark sun! A black eye is the best one.
quotes.author: William Rounseville Alger

quotes.quote: The blue of my eyes is extinguished in this night, the red gold of my heart.
quotes.author: Georg Trakl

quotes.quote: Blue eyes wash off sometimes.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: Lifestyles and sex roles are passed from parents to children as inexorably as blue eyes or small feet.
quotes.author: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.quote: You could drown a kitten in her blue eyes.
quotes.author: Gary Shteyngart

quotes.quote: Great murderers, like great men in other walks of activity, have blue eyes.
quotes.author: Erik Larson

quotes.quote: The Subject has really blue eyes that twinkle when he looks at someone like she's maybe a little bit insane.
quotes.author: Ally Carter

quotes.quote: The Ethiopians say that their gods are snub-nosed and black the Thracians that theirs have light blue eyes and red hair.
quotes.author: Xenophanes

quotes.quote: A little black girl yearns for the blue eyes of a little white girl, and the horror at the heart of her yearning is exceeded only by the evil of fulfillment
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Math can explain the reason there's one out of four chance that I'd have blue eyes. But it doesn't explain why me.
quotes.author: Heidi

quotes.quote: Black men built the railroads, not blue eyes.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Tall, sandy blonde, with sort of blue eyes, skinny in places, fat in others. An average gal.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.quote: Our devil has pale skin and blue eyes.
quotes.author: Jose Angel Gutierrez

quotes.quote: He used to have blue eyes but I painted them brown like mine and everybody's, to make him normal.
quotes.author: NoViolet Bulawayo

quotes.quote: I just am a Canadian. It is not a thing which you can escape from. It is like having blue eyes.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: The soft blue sky did never melt Into his heart; he never felt The witchery of the soft blue sky!
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: At sunrise, the blue sky paints herself with gold colors and joyfully dances to the music of a morning breeze.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Because gray clouds hang heavy with misery, blue skies seem bluer.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Cloud above cloud, a glorious sight, contrasting with the deep-blue sky!
quotes.author: Andrew Norton

quotes.quote: He battles heart and arm, his own blue sky above him, and his own green land around.
quotes.author: Halleck

quotes.quote: Within the sun-lit forest, our roof the bright blue sky, where fountains flow, and wild flowers blow, we lift our hearts on high.
quotes.author: Ebeneazer Elliott

quotes.quote: I never get tired of the blue sky.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: If the sight of the blue skies fills you with joy, rejoice, for your soul is alive.
quotes.author: Eleanora Duse

quotes.quote: Staring at the blue sky causes insomnia to occur in the human.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Beauty is and always will be blue skies and open highway.
quotes.author: Dave Hickey

quotes.quote: I love to soar in the boundless sky. In the vast emptiness of the blue, my soul rejoices listening to the soundless music of the wind.
quotes.author: Banani Ray

quotes.quote: See the golden beach sands and blue sky in a cool breeze my mind flys high
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: I wanted to kiss you like the waves kiss the shore under the blue sky.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: It would appear that the blue sky is actually produced by the solar wind and solar radiation exciting air molecules to emit light, just like a neon lamp!
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Today I spoke to you again and I feel completely happy! I feel like a cloud floating around in the wide blue sky. I feel totally alive. I feel as if time has paused in this moment. As if God is telling me to be totally happy and cheerful!
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: Complete people gaze into the blue sky above, plunge into the center of the earth below, and run freely in the eight directions without even a change of mood.
quotes.author: Liezi

quotes.quote: You're looking up, at a yellow sun, in the middle of a dark, dark blue sky. A warm summer breeze... blows across your face. White clouds streak across the dark blue sky. What do you see there?
quotes.author: Donald P. Bellisario

quotes.quote: Everyone can enjoy the blue sky. The world is fair.
quotes.author: Jukô Nishimura

quotes.quote: Smell that fresh morning air! Look at the blue sky above!
quotes.author: Dennis Hackin

quotes.quote: I'm a happy camper, I love the clear blue sky, and with the grace of God, I'll camp until I die!
quotes.author: Fritz Gordon

quotes.quote: You will see the blue sky spreading endlessly above you and smiling down.
quotes.author: Aya Kitô

quotes.quote: When you fall over, make the most of the chance to look up and see the sky.
quotes.author: Aya Kitô

quotes.quote: Wait, that doesn't look like Earth. Where's the blue sky? Where's the-the grass?
quotes.author: Andrew Stanton

quotes.quote: Yes. I imagined the cool, clean air and this huge, perfect blue sky all around me.
quotes.author: Ken Walshe

quotes.quote: If you should stop pushing clouds, the blue sky would swallow you up like a starving monster.
quotes.author: Tarryn-Tanille Prinsloo

quotes.quote: I do. It feels like how being in love should be. Floating through a dark blue sky.
quotes.author: Richard Curtis

quotes.quote: I hate nothing more than lies - wasted words, clouds that darken the blue sky yet bring no relief of rain.
quotes.author: Michael Green

quotes.quote: Live by the laws of the Blue Sky and you will follow in the steps of your father, who follows in mine.
quotes.author: John Fusco

quotes.quote: The important things haven't changed. There's still the same painted blue sky and and artificial trees. white birds on a brilliant rainbow purified water on man-made flowers the orange sun filtered through acid-free air,warming our beautiful world.
quotes.author: Yuichi Sasamoto

quotes.quote: I want to believe that. Just as the rain will eventually stop and reveal a blue sky that we both can see.
quotes.author: Ryôta Yamaguchi

quotes.quote: When the rain is falling / There's no silver lining / And you just can't seem to find the light / When you need a reason / To help you keep believing / Let my love be your blue sky
quotes.author: Francesca Battistelli

quotes.quote: I burn all my loneliness under the ocean / Wash away fears and I / I'm sending all my love to the blue skies / When light is raining over me
quotes.author: Maria Concepcion Balboa Buika

quotes.quote: When a rose make my tears roll down / Nothing better than a blue sky / To cry over my memories
quotes.author: Maria Concepcion Balboa Buika

quotes.quote: Blue skies smiling at me / Nothing but blue skies do I see / Bluebirds singing a song / Nothing but blue skies from now on
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: When you're in love, my how they fly by / Blue days, all of them gone / Nothing but blue skies from now on
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: And I can't seem to find my feet now / Somebody help me please / Sunshine, sunshine / I wanna see the blue sky
quotes.author: Jonathan Howard Fugler

quotes.quote: See how the sun shines brightly in the city / On the streets where once was pity / Mr. Blue Sky is living here today, hey hey
quotes.author: Jeff Lynne

quotes.quote: Hey you with the pretty face / Welcome to the human race / A celebration, Mr. Blue Sky's up there waiting / And today is the day we've waited for
quotes.author: Jeff Lynne

quotes.quote: Blue skies and summer life / And summer light / Blue skies and summer life / Take an effect / See the blue skies from the outside
quotes.author: Andrew Cocup

quotes.quote: Blue skies, blue skies / Smiling at me now, how now / Nothing but blue skies do I see / Spring is here, Spring is here,
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: When you're in love, my, my how they fly. / Blue days, all of them gone now / I see only blues skies, blues skies
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: I won't cry if it won't last forever / I'll just try to hold on / There will be sunshine after the rain / There will be blue sky's coming, blue sky's coming
quotes.author: Alain Robert Anna Vande Putte

quotes.quote: I'm seeing pink cause I've been looking at the bright side / I ain't letting nobody cloud up all my blue sky
quotes.author: Tinashe Kachingwe

quotes.quote: Everybody's looking for a blue sky / Searching for an answer on a satellite / I know that there's got to be a blue sky out there to see / A blue sky waiting for me
quotes.author: Jennifer Hanson

quotes.quote: Blue skies, setting sun / cherry pie, bubble gum / lullabies to be sung / blue skies for everyone
quotes.author: Robert Scheider

quotes.quote: Blue skies, blue skies / Not a cloud over head in my life / When it's gray out I don't mind / I've got blue skies on the inside
quotes.author: Andy Cloninger

quotes.quote: Clear blue skies, not too much to ask for, / They were here before we came, / Will they be here when we're gone?
quotes.author: Nash

quotes.quote: Mother Nature sits on the other side with a loaded gun / Why is there blue sky / Why is there red sky / Now's the time to ask the reason
quotes.author: Anthony George Banks

quotes.quote: Tall trees in a blue sky / Stand together don't ask why / Stretch up to the blue sky / Pierce that ceiling if you try
quotes.author: Jack Hues

quotes.quote: And blue skies and sunshine you gotta give respect to get respect / You know / Blue skies, sunshine / What a day to take a walk in a..
quotes.author: James Desmond

quotes.quote: The blue sky is how beautiful! / Under the same blue sky is how interesting! / The blue sky has covered so many, many stories about the truth, good ness, beauty, and falsity, badness, ugliness..
quotes.author: Jing Wang

quotes.quote: In Nature, one of the closest, most intimate teachers of source is the sky.
quotes.author: John P. Milton

quotes.quote: The clarity and spaciousness of the sky help inspire the realization of an even greater clarity and vastness that lies within you, which is the true, clear essence of Source.
quotes.author: John P. Milton

quotes.quote: If there are a few clouds in the sky, relax and place your main attention on the emptiness of the sky.
quotes.author: John P. Milton

quotes.quote: People of all cultures have found the sky's blueness particularly noteworthy.
quotes.author: Götz Hoeppe

quotes.quote: The belief that the blue sky is a protective shield for life on Earth is not new.
quotes.author: Götz Hoeppe

quotes.quote: The blues. It runs through all American music. Somebody bending the note. The other is the two-beat groove. It's in New Orleans music, it's in jazz, it's in country music, it's in gospel.
quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

quotes.quote: When you are through with the blues, you've got nothing to rest on.
quotes.author: Mahalia Jackson

quotes.quote: The blues brings you back into the fold. The blues isn't about the blues, it's about we have all had the blues and we are all in this together.
quotes.author: Peter Tork

quotes.quote: Blues is a natural fact, is something that a fellow lives. If you don't live it you don't have it. Young people have forgotten to cry the blues. Now they talk and get lawyers and things.
quotes.author: Big Bill Broonzy

quotes.quote: Blues ain't never going anywhere. It can get slow, but it ain't going nowhere.
quotes.author: David Edwards

quotes.quote: In blues music, there's a lot of borrowing, so it's often difficult to identify the originator of a song.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Blues is easy to play, but hard to feel.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: The blues are like the fugue in 18th century. It's probably the music that belongs most to our time.
quotes.author: Michael Tippett

quotes.quote: The blues are what I've turned to, what has given me inspiration and relief in all the trials of my life.
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.quote: Particularly with the blues, it's not just about bad times. It's about the healing spirit.
quotes.author: Taj Mahal

quotes.quote: Blues is to Jazz what yeast is to bread; without it, it's flat.
quotes.author: Carmen McRae

quotes.quote: The blues comes right back to a person's feelings, to his daily activities in life. But rich people don't know nothing about the blues, please believe me.
quotes.author: Jimmy Rushing

quotes.quote: The blues are the roots and the other musics are the fruits. It's better keeping the roots alive, because it means better fruits from now on. The blues are the roots of all American music. As long as American music survives, so will the blues.
quotes.author: Willie Dixon

quotes.quote: Blues is not a dream, blues is truth.
quotes.author: Brownie Mcghee

quotes.quote: Blues is a tonic for whatever ails you. I could play the blues and then not be blue anymore.
quotes.author: B. B. King

quotes.quote: The Blues are the true facts of life expressed in words and song, inspiration, feeling, and understanding.
quotes.author: Willie Dixon

quotes.quote: You don't have to live the blues to play the blues.
quotes.author: Herbie Mann

quotes.quote: The blues was bleeding the same blood as me.
quotes.author: B. B. King

quotes.quote: Without the blues, modern music would be nothing like it is now - not remotely.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: The blues is the foundation, and it's got to carry the top. The other part of the scene, the rock â€˜n' roll and the jazz, are the walls of the blues.
quotes.author: Luther Allison

quotes.quote: The blues is an impulse to keep the painful details and episodes of a brutal experience alive in one's aching consciousness, to finger its jagged grain, and to transcend it, not by the consolation of philosophy but by squeezing from it a near-tragic, near-comic lyricism. As a form, the blues is an autobiographical chronicle of personal catastrophe expressed lyrically.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: The blues is deceptively simple. Verse and chorus. Sometimes not even a chorus. Four bars that repeat, no Auto-Tune, electricity optional. It is the most direct, bare-bones of content. There is no interference between the head and heart.
quotes.author: Shawn Amos

quotes.quote: The blues tells a story in itself. It can make you happy or give you a feeling to swing.
quotes.author: Jimmy Rushing

quotes.quote: Blues is the bedrock of everything I do. All the characters in my plays, their ideas and their attitudes, the stance that they adopt in the world, are all ideas and attitudes that are expressed in the blues.
quotes.author: August Wilson

quotes.quote: Everything comes out in blues music: joy , pain , struggle . Blues is affirmation with absolute elegance.
quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

quotes.quote: The blues is losing someone you love and not having enough money to immerse yourself in drink.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Funk, gospel, blues is all out of slavery times, out of depression, out of sorrow.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.quote: The blues tells a story. Every line of the blues has a meaning.
quotes.author: John Lee Hooker

quotes.quote: Most blues don't have a beginning, middle, or end. You just cut a couple slices of blues.
quotes.author: Dave Van Ronk

quotes.quote: The blues - the sound of a sinner on revival day.
quotes.author: William Christopher Handy

quotes.quote: The Blues contain so much joy & sadness at the same time.
quotes.author: Bill Charlap

quotes.quote: The blues and jazz will live forever. So will the Delta and the Big Easy.
quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

quotes.quote: Nobody can tell you how the blues feel unless they have the blues. We all take it differently.
quotes.author: Otis Rush

quotes.quote: The blues is instilled in every musical cell that floats around your body.
quotes.author: Nick Cave

quotes.quote: The blues is played everywhere. There's no place I've been where they don't have blues or aren't interested in blues.
quotes.author: Taj Mahal

quotes.quote: The blues is a mighty long road. Or it could be a river, one that twists and turns and flows into a sea of limitless musical potential.
quotes.author: Billy Gibbons

quotes.quote: The blues is not the creation of a crushed-spirited people. It is the product of a forward-looking, upward-striving people.
quotes.author: Albert Murray

quotes.quote: Blues are the songs of despair, but gospel songs are the songs of hope.
quotes.author: Mahalia Jackson

quotes.quote: The blues echoes right through into soul, R&B and hip hop. It's part of the make-up of modern music. You can't turn your back on the blues.
quotes.author: Ronnie Wood

quotes.quote: 'Tis not enough your counsel still be true; Blunt truths more mischief than nice falsehoods do.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Justice and truth are too such subtle points that our tools are too blunt to touch them accurately.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: One of the truest tests of integrity is its blunt refusal to be compromised.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: Silence is the bluntest of blunt instruments.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: He was always smoothing and polishing himself, and in the end he became blunt before he was sharp.
quotes.author: George C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Downright admonition, as a rule, is too blunt for the recipient.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Praying without faith is like trying to cut with a blunt knife - much labor expended to little purpose.
quotes.author: James O. Fraser

quotes.quote: The past is a life sentence, a blunt instrument aimed at tomorrow.
quotes.author: Claudia Rankine

quotes.quote: Words are blunt instruments, better suited to murder than to making sense of the world.
quotes.author: Mark Lawrence

quotes.quote: I believe if something needs to be said, people should say it. Blunt doesn't stab as deep as being cut by a secret.
quotes.author: Kate Angell

quotes.quote: Don't confuse being stimulating with being blunt.
quotes.author: Barbara Walters

quotes.quote: Apart from blunt truth, our lives sink decadently amid the perfume of hints and suggestions.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: How blunt are all the arrows of thy quiver in comparison with those of guilt.
quotes.author: Hugh Blair

quotes.quote: The blunt truth about the politics of climate change is that no country will want to sacrifice its economy in order to meet this challenge.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: Some tools of thought are so blunt that they are almost useless; others are so sharp that they are dangerous. But the wise man will have the use of both kinds.
quotes.author: Gregory Bateson

quotes.quote: A hot iron, though blunt, will pierce sooner than a cold one, though sharper
quotes.author: John Flavel

quotes.quote: All means prove but a blunt instrument, if they have not behind them a living spirit.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: To wrong those we hate is to add fuel to our hatred. Conversely, to treat an enemy with magnanimity is to blunt our hatred for him.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Cease negative mental chattering. If you think a thing is impossible, you'll make it impossible. Pessimism blunts the tools you need to succeed.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: I have to say that anger is the blanket that comes around me, and that blunts and blurs my sense of proportion.
quotes.author: Pete Townshend

quotes.quote: The knowledge that women lack stimulates their imagination; the knowledge that men possess blunts theirs.
quotes.author: Madame de Sartory

quotes.quote: Fill your bowl to the brim and it will spill. Keep sharpening your knife and it will blunt.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Time only blunts the pain of loss. It doesn’t erase it.
quotes.author: Gail Honeyman

quotes.quote: Kindness in ourselves is the honey that blunts the sting of unkindness in another.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: A blunt statement can be as false as any other.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Blunt tools are sometimes found of use where sharper instruments would fail.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: In a world addicted to speed, I blur the moments into one unholy smear.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: The supreme accomplishment is to blur the line between work and play.
quotes.author: Arnold Toynbee

quotes.quote: That woman is the most difficult, the most stubborn redhead I've ever had the displeasure of meeting. He shot off, leaving only a blurry streak in his wake.
quotes.author: C.C. Hunter

quotes.quote: There's a thin, blurry line between humor and tragedy.
quotes.author: Christopher Paul Curtis

quotes.quote: No lake so still but it has its wave. No circle so perfect but that it has its blur. I would change things for you if I could. As I can't you must take them as they are.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A solid answer to everything is not necessary. Blurry concepts influence one to focus, but postulated clarity influences arrogance.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: I was discovering a hard truth, there's no way to catch up on sleep. When it's gone, it's gone, and the best you can hope for is to have better luck next time.
quotes.author: David Van Etten

quotes.quote: A blur of blinks, taps, jiggles, pivots and shifts. The body language of a man wishing urgently to be elsewhere.
quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.quote: One foot in front of the other, counting tiles on the floor so I don't have to focus the blur of painted smiles, fake faces.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: The memory of Cumshewa is of a great lonesomeness smothered in a blur of rain.
quotes.author: Emily Carr

quotes.quote: There are certain qualities of light that blur the years.
quotes.author: Emily St. John Mandel

quotes.quote: No matter how noble the objectives of a government. If it blurs decency and kindness, cheapens human life, and breeds ill will and suspicion, it is an evil government.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The world was not wheeling anymore. It was just very clear and bright and inclined to blur at the edges.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: No blur of inexactness, no cloud of vagueness, is allowable in good writing from the first seeing to the last putting down, there must be steady lucidity and uncompromising of purpose.
quotes.author: Eudora Welty

quotes.quote: Our brains have been designed to blur the line between self and other. It is an ancient neural circuitry that marks every mammal, from mouse to elephant.
quotes.author: Frans De Waal

quotes.quote: Power-worship blurs political judgment because it leads, almost unavoidably, to the belief that present trends will continue. Whoever is winning at the moment will always seem to be invincible.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: I don't create blurs. Blurring is not the most important thing, nor is it an identity tag for my pictures.
quotes.author: Gerhard Richter

quotes.quote: I like to see the difference between good and evil as kind of like the foul line at a baseball game. It’s very thin, it’s made of something very flimsy like lime, and if you cross it, it really starts to blur where fair becomes foul and foul becomes fair.
quotes.author: Harlan Coben

quotes.quote: A tear that trembles for a little while upon the trembling eyelid, till the world wavers within its circle like a dream. Holds more of meaning in its narrow orb than all the distant landscape that it blurs.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: To an artist, a picture is both a sum of ideas and a blurry memory of pushing paint, breathing fumes, dripping oils and wiping brushes, smearing and diluting and mixing.
quotes.author: James Elkins

quotes.quote: At my time of life opinions are tolerably fixed. It is not likely that I should now see or hear any thing to change them.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Artists can have greater access to reality. They can see patterns and details and connections that other people, distracted by the blur of life, might miss. Just sharing that truth can be a very powerful thing.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.quote: Why is it that weeks and months and years go by so quickly, all in a blur, but moments last forever?
quotes.author: Jennifer Donnelly

quotes.quote: Don't lose it all in the blur of the stars seeing is deceiving, dreaming is believing.
quotes.author: Jessie J

quotes.quote: Words are like eyeglasses they blur everything that they do not make clear.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Memory blurs, that's the point. If memory didn't blur you wouldn't have the fool's courage to do things again, again, again, that tear you apart.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: Why, she wondered despairingly, did happy memories fade and blur until one could scarcely recall them at all, while horrible memories seemed to retain their blinding clarity and painful sharpness?
quotes.author: Judith Mcnaught

quotes.quote: The cities, the roads, the countryside, the people I meet they all begin to blur. I tell myself I am searching for something. But more and more, it feels like I am wandering, waiting for something to happen to me, something that will change everything, something that my whole life has been leading up to.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: As a parent, I can empathize with how difficult raising children can be. There are challenges, especially within the framework of divorce, when parental guilt can sometimes blur what should be the best decision.
quotes.author: LZ Granderson

quotes.quote: Love blurs your vision, but after it recedes, you can see more clearly than ever. It's like the tide going out, revealing whatever's been thrown away and sunk broken bottles, old gloves, rusting pop cans, nibbled fish bodies bones. This is the kind of thing you see if you sit in the darkness with open eyes, not knowing the future.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: I'm sick of following my dreams. I'm just going to ask them where they're going, and hook up with them later.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: I have to say that anger is the blanket that comes around me, and that blunts and blurs my sense of proportion.
quotes.author: Pete Townshend

quotes.quote: Men are more sentimental than women. It blurs their thinking.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: I feel empty confused hurt numb disoriented mad vulnerable insignificant blurry tired sweaty overwhelmed temporary anxious.
quotes.author: Samantha Schutz

quotes.quote: Most days it feels as if the world is whirling around me and I am standing still. In slow motion, I watch the colors blur people and faces all become a massive wash.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: That's our story. How we became a we and that's what we are these days. A we. When you're a group that can hear each other's thoughts, the line between I and We gets kind of blurry.
quotes.author: Sarah Mlynowski

quotes.quote: Some things are best left a blur. Births and Visa Bills.
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: The world is a mess and I want to laugh because all I can think is how horrible and beautiful it is, that our eyes blur the truth when we can't bear to see it.
quotes.author: Tahereh Mafi

quotes.quote: Time would not change what I was feeling or not feeling. I'd had time, and though the ache from his desertion hadn't disappeared, it was decreasing. My future was blurry, yes, but I was beginning to imagine a future when I would no longer miss him at all.
quotes.author: Tammara Webber

quotes.quote: You're an expert at sorry and keeping the lines blurry.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: All your life, you live so close to truth, it becomes a permanent blur in the corner of your eye. And when something nudges it into outline, it is like being ambushed by a grotesque.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Teamwork is the ability to work as a group toward a common vision, even if that vision becomes extremely blurry.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Poetry is a finicky thing of air that lives uncertainly and not for long, yet radiantly beyond much lustier blurs.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: In the blur of the photograph, time leaves its gleaming, snail-like track.
quotes.author: Wright Morris

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: When life gets blurry, adjust your focus.
quotes.author: Laura Berman Fortgang

quotes.quote: Of all things visible, the highest is the heaven of the fixed stars.
quotes.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

quotes.quote: There is a very blurry line between the things we can't do and the things that we can.
quotes.author: Erik Weihenmayer

quotes.quote: Whoever blushes confesses guilt, true innocence never feels shame.
quotes.author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: He who blushes is already guilty.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: We never forget those who make us blush.
quotes.author: Jean-Francois de La Harpe

quotes.quote: The man that blushes is not quite a brute.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: The person who still blushes is not yet a degenerate.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: Blushing is the most peculiar and most human of all expressions.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: On the secretly blushing cheek is reflected the glow of the heart.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Men blush less for their crimes than for their weaknesses and vanity.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: When a woman stops blushing, she has lost the most powerful weapon of charm.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: The best of men is he who blushes when you praise him and remains silent when you defame him.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: People blush at praise — not only praise of their bodies, but praise of anything that is theirs.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis
