quotes.quote: A blush is no language; only a dubious flag - signal which may mean either of two contradictories.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: We should often blush at our noblest deeds if the world were to see all their underlying motives.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Blushing is the color of virtue.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.quote: Blushes are the rainbow of modesty.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: He who blushes at riding in a rattletrap, will boast when he rides in style.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: A blush is the sign which Nature hangs out to show where chastity and honor dwell.
quotes.author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quotes.quote: A faint blush melting through the light of thy transparent cheek like a rose-leaf bathed in dew.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: Seek to make a person blush for their guilt rather than shed their blood.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: The first blush of love, when the self has lost its mooring, and, half-drowning, succumbs to a fearful tide.
quotes.author: Eleanor Catton

quotes.quote: The blush is beautiful, but it is sometimes convenient.
quotes.author: Carlo Goldoni

quotes.quote: People blush when one of their core truths is revealed.
quotes.author: Keith Ablow

quotes.quote: Blushing is thought to be linked to increased levels of norepinephrine in the brain, which may be associated with romantic feelings. It signals that we are interested and excited, which is attractive to men.
quotes.author: Helen Fisher

quotes.quote: I always love rosy cheeks, so I am all about blush.
quotes.author: Tessa Virtue

quotes.quote: Blush at your faults.
quotes.author: Dario Fo

quotes.quote: Blushes cannot be counterfeited.
quotes.author: Margaret of Valois

quotes.quote: When someone blushes, doesn't that mean 'yes'?
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Such a blush In the midst of brown was born, Like red poppies grown with corn.
quotes.author: Thomas Hood

quotes.quote: We should blush for shame to show so much resentment at what is done or said against us, knowing that so many injuries and affronts have been offered to our Redeemer and the saints.
quotes.author: Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: Bronzer keeps me glowing, and a little blush makes it look natural.
quotes.author: Katie Stevens

quotes.quote: I think, in BMX, it's a lot like horse racing. I wouldn't really bet on it.
quotes.author: Caroline Buchanan

quotes.quote: We've all crashed; we see crashes every race and we know it's something we have to deal with. It's BMX - it can happen at anytime. Nothing's for sure in this sport, if I've learned anything.
quotes.author: Tory Nyhaug

quotes.quote: BMX riding breaks down racial perceptions. Coming from New York City and being a BMX rider, that isn't something that's too common. I feel like for the longest time, I would ride through certain neighborhoods and people would call me a "white boy" because they associated white boys from California with BMX riding, and it bugs me so much because I'm completely not that. I completely don't fit that mold. It's really important for me to bring BMX riding to the masses and show people exactly what it is.
quotes.author: Nigel Sylvester

quotes.quote: You're willing to sacrifice a solid future for a bicycle race. It's very self-destructive.
quotes.author: Talia Shire

quotes.quote: Cobbled together with old Schwinn cruiser frames, motocross-style handlebars, and gears borrowed from road bikes, these "klunkers"(as they were called) signaled a new era in the evolution of the bicycle. Once they were manufactured, I was not alone in wanting one, and the fat tire bike became my ride of choice as I traversed the fire roads and trails on Mt. Tamalpais following in the tracks of the sport's innovators.
quotes.author: Michael Carabetta

quotes.quote: I hear a motocross bike and I can smell hospital.
quotes.author: Guy Martin

quotes.quote: The hallmark of BMX are two fundamentals. One, it’s one of the few sports in the U.S. where you can go out as a family and participate together, whether it’s on a local level or a national level. Two, no one sits on the bench. When a brand-new racer joins the sport, they race in the novice category. Everyone actively participates in BMX.
quotes.author: John David

quotes.quote: What does BMX mean? Like Big Momma Xerox?
quotes.author: Flula Borg - Host

quotes.quote: Riding BMX is a constant pursuit and attainment of fun.
quotes.author: Tyson Jones-Peni

quotes.quote: BMX racing is one of the most physically demanding sports in the world. Regardless of how serious your take on BMX racing will be, take one lap around the BMX track as fast as you can and you’ll be wondering why you pay 70 bucks a week for your Crossfit membership.
quotes.author: Tyson Jones-Peni

quotes.quote: Making the choice to ride BMX is an opportunity to become infinitely better at something; There is no ceiling to hit in the realm of freestyle BMX.
quotes.author: Tyson Jones-Peni

quotes.quote: Sophisticated bmx / It's my life style / Riding all day / Across the river in the city of mine / Sophisticated bmx / It's my life style / Riding all day / Across the river in the city of mine.
quotes.author: Yung Ferry

quotes.quote: My mum says, "You be careful, careful" / I am sure to get an earful, earful / When I get out my bike, BMX bike / She will get very fearful, fearful / That I will end up tearful, tearful, when I fall off my bike.
quotes.author: Alan Pring

quotes.quote: Riding a race bike is an art a thing that you do because you feel something inside.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Ride your bike to enjoy a travel without hesitation.
quotes.author: Domlin

quotes.quote: You don't know how good you are until you actually get out on a bike and get riding.
quotes.author: Laura Trott

quotes.quote: Studies have shown that riding a bicycle everyday makes you more awesome than the general population.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you worried about falling off the bike, you'd never get on.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Life without a defined purpose is similar to a boat without a crew in the middle of the ocean.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Water in the boat is the ruin of the boat, but water under the boat is its support.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Boat is nothing without water and man without his dreams!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A sail boat that sails backwards can never see the sun rise.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: The sea is the same as it has been since before men ever went on it in boats.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Being on a boat that's moving through the water, it's so clear. Everything falls into place in terms of what's important and what's not.
quotes.author: James Taylor

quotes.quote: Thoughts will change and shift just like the wind and the water when you're on the boat; thoughts are no different than anything else.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: The goal is not to sail the boat, but rather to help the boat sail herself.
quotes.author: John Rousmaniere

quotes.quote: A boat may stay in water, but water should not stay in boat. A spiritual aspirant may live in the world, but the world should not live within him.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: We may have all come on different ships, but we're in the same boat now.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: There was a great difference in boats, of course. For a long time I was on a boat that was so slow we used to forget what year it was we left port in.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you boat a lot, you're known as a boating enthusiast. I like to boat, but I just don't want to ever be referred to as a boating enthusiast. I hope they call me a guy who likes to boat.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: A film is a boat which is always on the point of sinking-it always tends to break up as you go along and drag you under with it.
quotes.author: Francois Truffaut

quotes.quote: For the ocean is big and my boat is small. Find the courage.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.quote: The man who goes farthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare. The sure thing boat never gets far from shore.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: A boat without captain cannot remain long on the surface!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There is nothing more enticing, disenchanting, and enslaving than the life at sea.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: A boat at midnight sent alone to drift upon the moonless sea, a lute, whose leading chord is gone, a wounded bird, that hath but one imperfect wing to soar upon, are like what I am, without thee.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: The sea, the great unifier, is man's only hope. Now, as never before, the old phrase has a literal meaning: we are all in the same boat.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: There is no river at all, and no boat, and no boatman. There is not even a rope to tow the boat, and no one to pull it. There is no earth, no sky, no time, no thing, no shore, no ford!
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.quote: When a big ship and a small boat come together, you will see that the latter is happier than the former because it has much less problems!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Never mind who owns the boat. Pull for the shore.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.quote: A boat with a furled sail at rest in a harbor. In truth it pictures not my destination but my life.
quotes.author: Edgar Lee Masters

quotes.quote: When you get on the boat that's saving you, don't pull up the ladder behind you.
quotes.author: Adrienne Clarkson

quotes.quote: We are all in the same boat in a stormy sea, and we owe each other a terrible loyalty.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: This boat that we just built is just fine and don't try to tell us it's not the sides and the back are divine it's the bottom I guess we forgot.
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

quotes.quote: A boat is the hardest think I know of to put into perspective. It is so much like a human figure, there is something alive about it.
quotes.author: Barry S Strauss

quotes.quote: The boat is safer anchored at the port; but that's not the aim of boats.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: If the boat started shaking, we stayed on course and didn't lose focus. That made the difference.
quotes.author: Sebastian Vettel

quotes.quote: Running a boat isn't that hard. Just takes doing. Most or all women I ever knew were discouraged from running boats, but it was too late with me.
quotes.author: Diane Wilson

quotes.quote: When the water is calm, take as much distance as possible with your boat!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The boats outside the window were always still I wondered if one of them would take me to the ocean.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: It is not the ship so much as the skillful sailing that assures the prosperous voyage.
quotes.author: George William Curtis

quotes.quote: There are a lot of mysterious things about boats, such as why anyone would get on one voluntarily.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Reaction a boat which is going against the current but which does not prevent the river from flowing on.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: A boat can't have two captains.
quotes.author: Akira Mori

quotes.quote: The love boat has crashed against the everyday.
quotes.author: Vladimir Mayakovsky

quotes.quote: Vessels large may venture more, But little boats should keep near shore.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Boats in the harbor are safe but that is not what they are meant for.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Only the guy who isn't rowing has time to rock the boat.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Reaction - a boat which is going against the current but which does not prevent the river from flowing on.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: We did not all come over on the same ship, but we are all in the same boat.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: God made man to go by motives, and he will not go without them, any more than a boat without steam or a balloon without gas.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Should you find yourself in a chronically leaking boat, energy devoted to changing vessels is likely to be more productive than energy devoted to patching leaks.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Every man should pull a boat over a mountain once in his life.
quotes.author: Werner Herzog

quotes.quote: The most expensive hobby a rich man could have is a boat, and the second most expensive hobby he could have is a very old house.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.quote: We are imprisoned in the realm of life, like a sailor on his tiny boat, on an infinite ocean.
quotes.author: Anna Freud

quotes.quote: The man who rows the boat seldom has time to rock it.
quotes.author: Bill Copeland

quotes.quote: Every woman feels she is too old and has missed the boat.
quotes.author: Felicity Kendal

quotes.quote: Sometimes you need to tether your boats to stop them from following your dreams.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: If you are a boat that wants to sail in windy weather, you must be more stubborn than the waves!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Adrift! A little boat adrift! And night is coming down! Will no one guide a little boat unto the nearest town?
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: The sea's rising, the boat must be lightened.
quotes.author: Alfred Noyes

quotes.quote: A boat approach'd the wall, and eager to the welcome aid they crowd for safety all.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: A boat came in; the cliff was baked; the noisy boat-chain fell and clanked on the sand-an iron rattle-snake, a rattling rust among the plankton.
quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

quotes.quote: Never mind the company; only keep afloat. You can't be too particular who's mannin' of the boat.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.quote: Wherever they drive the boat. To put meaning in one's life may end in madness, but life without meaning is the torture of restlessness and vague desire -- it is a boat longing for the sea and yet afraid.
quotes.author: Edgar Lee Masters

quotes.quote: To a boat-house on the sea-shore, looks with care upon the fish-hooks, and the lines he well considers; lines, and hooks, and poles, arid fish-nets, places in a boat of copper.
quotes.author: Elias Lönnrot

quotes.quote: Healthy body image is not something that you're going to learn from fashion magazines.
quotes.author: Erin Heatherton

quotes.quote: If you ask men about their body image, they will tell you they look better than they do. And if you ask a woman, she'll tell you she looks worse.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Black women don't have the same body image problems as white women. They are proud of their bodies.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: It's incredibly difficult to keep a healthy body image in this business.
quotes.author: Courtney Thorne Smith

quotes.quote: To lose confidence in one's body is to lose confidence in oneself.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Each individual woman's body demands to be accepted on its own terms.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: The sexiest part of the body is the eyes. That's what I believe.
quotes.author: Clive Owen

quotes.quote: What no woman or man needs is anyone telling them they are 'too fat' or 'too skinny.' That just adds to the many stereotypes out there about a person's weight.
quotes.author: LeAnn Rimes

quotes.quote: I try not to be neurotic; I try to create and present healthy body image.
quotes.author: Kimora Lee Simmons

quotes.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: A figure with curves always offers a lot of interesting angles.
quotes.author: Wesley Ruggles

quotes.quote: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: I've long struggled with my body image and have worked hard to achieve a healthy weight.
quotes.author: Adam Richman

quotes.quote: For a woman, body image is always a palpable thing. Weirdly, for me, the only time I don't care is when I'm in character.
quotes.author: Juno Temple

quotes.quote: Do something every day that is loving toward your body and gives you the opportunity to enjoy the sensations of your body.
quotes.author: Golda Poretsky

quotes.quote: Any body type is beautiful. It's all about loving what you got and rocking it.
quotes.author: Meghan Trainor

quotes.quote: The body is meant to be seen, not all covered up.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: I'm not ashamed of what I am and that I have curves and that I'm thick. I like my body.
quotes.author: Alicia Keys

quotes.quote: Don't change your body to get respect from society. Instead let's change society to respect our bodies.
quotes.author: Golda Poretsky

quotes.quote: The body is a sacred garment.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: God gave me a great body and it's my duty to take care of my physical temple.
quotes.author: Jean Claude Van Damme

quotes.quote: I'd rather be overweight and curvy than super thin with no curves. I'm proud of my body.
quotes.author: Holly Madison

quotes.quote: You are imperfect, permanently and inevitably flawed. And you are beautiful.
quotes.author: Amy Bloom

quotes.quote: I don't use my body to seduce, no. I just stand there.
quotes.author: Ursula Andress

quotes.quote: Our own physical body possesses a wisdom which we who inhabit the body lack. We give it orders which make no sense.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: The human body is a machine which winds its own springs.
quotes.author: Julien Offroy de la Mettrie

quotes.quote: Our body is a machine for living. It is organized for that, it is its nature. Let life go on in it unhindered and let it defend itself.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Each body has its art...
quotes.author: Gwendolyn Brooks

quotes.quote: The body says what words cannot.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: Bottom line, your body is a temple, and you have to treat it that way. That's how God designed it.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.quote: Body language has no translation.
quotes.author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quotes.quote: Body language is more powerful than words.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: You can lie in any language on earth, and body language is no exception.
quotes.author: Nenia Campbell

quotes.quote: In a battle of believability, the winner is the one with the best body language, not the clearest logic.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz,

quotes.quote: Women's body language speaks eloquently, though silently, of her subordinate status in a hierarchy of gender.
quotes.author: Sandra Bartky

quotes.quote: If you adopt the body language of a power player, it will greatly facilitate your ability to be a power player.
quotes.author: Nick Morgan

quotes.quote: Proper posture sends a positive message since 90% of all communication occures through body language and how you carry yourself.
quotes.author: Cindy Ann Peterson

quotes.quote: Body language is so important, as is composition. You can not say something, and then the body reacts, and it says a lot of things dialogue can also say.
quotes.author: Anton Corbijn

quotes.quote: Body language is a very powerful tool. We had body language before we had speech, and apparently, 80% of what you understand in a conversation is read through the body, not the words.
quotes.author: Deborah Bull

quotes.quote: Body language is essential for an actress, even if you don't use your body in an athletic way. Just to be free, to use it like your voice. A body can be small and have incredible violence. A body talks.
quotes.author: Anne Parillaud

quotes.quote: Women are better at reading body language everywhere in the world. As a matter of fact, it's associated with the female hormone estrogen. Women are better at figuring out of tone of voice, reading your face and posture and gesture.
quotes.author: Helen Fisher

quotes.quote: The earliest language was body language and, since this language is the language of questions, if we limit the questions, and if we only pay attention to or place values on spoken or written language, then we are ruling out a large area of human language.
quotes.author: Paulo Freire

quotes.quote: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: There is no gesture more devastating than the back turning away.
quotes.author: Rachel Simmons

quotes.quote: Gestures, in love, are incomparably more attractive, effective and valuable than words.
quotes.author: Francois Rabelais

quotes.quote: The gesture is the thing truly expressive of the individual - as we think so will we act.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: Your body language shapes who you are.
quotes.author: Amy Cuddy

quotes.quote: We communicate all the time, even when we don't realize it. Be aware of body language.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: Shoes transform your body language and attitude. They lift you physically and emotionally.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: In a costume, you need very exaggerated body language - as you say, sort of mime-type skills.
quotes.author: Warwick Davis

quotes.quote: People responded to body language without even thinking. It was important to get it absolutely right.
quotes.author: Sara Sheridan

quotes.quote: Play with your physical workplace in a way that sends positive "body language" to employees and visitors.
quotes.author: Tom Kelley

quotes.quote: A shoe is not only a design, but it's a part of your body language, the way you walk. The way you're going to move is quite dictated by your shoes.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: Gesture is not always action.
quotes.author: Jay Maisel

quotes.quote: Even in your smallest gestures, you express your sense of honor, if you have one.
quotes.author: Brian Morton

quotes.quote: Gesture will survive whatever kind of light you have. Gesture can triumph over anything because of its narrative content.
quotes.author: Jay Maisel

quotes.quote: The gesture with which one generation guards the next is the movement, and the only time we see it clearly, of life itself.
quotes.author: Storm Jameson

quotes.quote: % of what you understand in a conversation is read through the body, not the words.
quotes.author: Deborah Bull

quotes.quote: Businesses have to make gestures that go beyond words. Persuasion no longer works.
quotes.author: John Gerzema

quotes.quote: Every gesture is a gesture from the blood, every expression a symbolic utterance... Everything is of the blood, of the senses.
quotes.author: Henry Williamson

quotes.quote: Don't have $100.00 shoes and a 10 cent squat.
quotes.author: Louie Simmons

quotes.quote: They can crack jokes. They can sit back and analyze and criticize and make all the fun they want. But I'm living my life, I'm doing it. What are you doing?
quotes.author: Kai Greene

quotes.quote: Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: If you can imagine it, you can achieve it; if you can dream it, you can become it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Not only are squats not bad for the knees, every legitimate research study on this subject has shown that squats improve knee stability and therefore help reduce the risk of injuries.
quotes.author: Charles Poliquin

quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. It may last a minute, or an hour, or a day, or a year, but eventually it will subside and something else will take its place. If I quit, however, it lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A lifetime of training for just ten seconds.
quotes.author: Jesse Owens

quotes.quote: In training, you listen to your body. In competition, you tell your body to shut up.
quotes.author: Rich Froning

quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between your bodybuilding goals and bodybuilding success.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Fortunately, there is a solution, and it's not performing multiple sets of whatever cable Kegel exercise is being pushed as The Answer. Just a little hard, smart, basic work.
quotes.author: Jim Wendler

quotes.quote: If you think lifting weights is dangerous, try being weak. Being weak is dangerous.
quotes.author: Bret Contreras

quotes.quote: Remember this: your body is your slave; it works for you.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as over training, just under nutrition and under sleeping.
quotes.author: The Barbarian brothers

quotes.quote: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it, as long as you really believe 100 percent.
quotes.author: Arnold

quotes.quote: Your body is a piece of art but it's always a work in progress. You are never done improving your symmetry and eliminating weak points.
quotes.author: Morgan Aste

quotes.quote: To feel strong, to walk amongst humans with a tremendous feeling of confidence and superiority is not at all wrong. The sense of superiority in bodily strength is borne out by the long history of mankind paying homage in folklore, song and poetry to strong men
quotes.author: Fred Hatfield

quotes.quote: There is nothing we cannot live down, rise above, and overcome.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: What doesn't kill me makes me stronger.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: â€œNobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
quotes.author: George Halas

quotes.quote: I do it as a therapy. I do it as something to keep me alive. We all need a little discipline. Exercise is my discipline.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: The best activities for your health are pumping and humping.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: I'm not sold on one diet philosophy. I'm sold on whatever will work for you.
quotes.author: Dave Tate

quotes.quote: All else being equal, the guy with the best genetics will have the best physique. But rarely are all things equal.
quotes.author: Dorian Yates

quotes.quote: Stimulate don't annihilate
quotes.author: Lee Haney

quotes.quote: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Is it 10g of protein more or 10g of protein less, who cares, just get started
quotes.author: Kai Greene

quotes.quote: I don't do this to be healthy, I do this to get big muscles.
quotes.author: Markus Ruhl

quotes.quote: If you train hard, you'll not only be hard, you'll be hard to beat.
quotes.author: Herschel Walker

quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning form failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: The man who has no imagination has no wings.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Intensity builds immensity
quotes.author: Kevin Levrone

quotes.quote: I will sacrifice whatever is necessary to be the best.
quotes.author: J.J. Watt

quotes.quote: Bodybuilders with goals succeed because they know where they're going.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Failure will not overcome me so long as my will to succeed is stronger
quotes.author: Micheal S. Kirby

quotes.quote: There's no secret formula. I lift heavy, work hard, and aim to be the best.
quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

quotes.quote: The pain of discipline is nothing like the pain of disappointment
quotes.author: Justin Langer

quotes.quote: You can't limit yourself, or else you will limit your progress.
quotes.author: Victor Martinez

quotes.quote: Choosing a bodybuilding goal and sticking to it changes everything.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Don't be scared to lift heavy! You won't get huge and bulky, you'll get amazing.
quotes.author: Jessie Hilgenberg

quotes.quote: It's pretty hard to stop a man who does not know the meaning of the word â€œquit.
quotes.author: Branch Warren

quotes.quote: Sell yourself short on nutrition and you're selling yourself short on maximizing your physique development.
quotes.author: Ernie Taylor

quotes.quote: Your love for what you do and willingness to push yourself where others aren't prepared to go is what will make you great.
quotes.author: Laurence Shahlaei

quotes.quote: Modern bodybuilding is ritual, religion, sport, art, and science, awash in Western chemistry and mathematics. Defying nature, it surpasses it.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: Strong people are harder to kill than weak people and more useful in general.
quotes.author: Mark Rippetoe

quotes.quote: Biceps are like ornaments on a Christmas tree.
quotes.author: Ed Coan

quotes.quote: I don't believe in bodybuilders using steroids. If a man doesn't have enough male hormones in his system to create, a nice hard, muscular body, he should take up ping pong.
quotes.author: Steve Reeves

quotes.quote: To be number one, you have to train like you're number two
quotes.author: Maurice Green

quotes.quote: Don't ever think like you can't achieve something. Keep riding it out and pushing and giving it your all. Even if you don't achieve that goal, you'll become a better person for trying.
quotes.author: Cedric McMillan

quotes.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryan

quotes.quote: I go for two kinds of men. The kind with muscles and the kind without.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: You too can have a body like mine.
quotes.author: Charles Atlas

quotes.quote: Athletic sports, if followed properly, and not elevated into a fetish, are admirable for developing character, besides bestowing on participants an invaluable fund of health and strength.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: To be really beneficial the sport must be enjoyed by the participator. Much more health will be gained by the man who is not always thinking of his health than by the poor being who is forever wondering whether he has helped his stomach or his lungs, or developed this or that muscle.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The five S's of sports training are: stamina, speed, strength, skill, and spirit; but the greatest of these is spirit.
quotes.author: Ken Doherty

quotes.quote: Strength training is performed by a wide range of people for a variety of reasons. Most are interested in gaining muscle strength and muscle mass with a concomitant loss of body fat.
quotes.author: Jim Stoppani

quotes.quote: Having muscles and being stronger than other kids was important. It was how you earned respect. Being weaker and slower meant getting picked on and bullied, be it in the neighborhood or at school.
quotes.author: Zach Even-Esh

quotes.quote: Lifting weights gives us a feeling of empowerment and strength when so many parts of our lives are still minimized or weakened.
quotes.author: Cassandra Forsythe

quotes.quote: Abs are made in the kitchen but glutes are made in the gym.
quotes.author: Kellie Davis

quotes.quote: Bodybuilding is much more than just a competitive sport or a personal interest. IT is an activity that pays enormous dividends over an entire lifetime. It is a lifelong activity that actually increases your life expectancy, self-esteem, overall health, and ability to enjoy the physical rigors of a productive life.
quotes.author: Peter Sisco

quotes.quote: Bodybuilding for us was a tremendous amount of fun. It is a way of life. Contests were incidental.
quotes.author: Art Zeller

quotes.quote: Without a doubt, this transformation has made me more confident in my appearance.
quotes.author: Caleb H.

quotes.quote: When I eventually discovered what bodybuilding was, I was blown away! I couldn't believe that there were real-life people who had muscles just like the superheroes.
quotes.author: John Hansen

quotes.quote: Bodybuilders were superheroes come to life.
quotes.author: John Hansen

quotes.quote: Everybody wants to be a bodybuilder but doesn’t anybody want to lift heavy ass weights!
quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

quotes.quote: If you’re capable of sending a legible text message between sets, you probably aren’t working hard enough.
quotes.author: Dave Tate

quotes.quote: When you have a well-developed body and you're confident, you see people bending your way, wanting to be on your side, wanting to do things for you.
quotes.author: Arnold Zchwarzenegger

quotes.quote: The barbells and dumbbells you hold in your hands and the way you use them have stories to tell.
quotes.author: Craig Cecil

quotes.quote: The gym was the one place I had control. I didn’t have to speak, I didn’t have to listen. I just had to push or pull. It was so much simpler, so much more satisfying than life outside. I didn’t have to think. I didn’t have to care. I didn’t have to feel. I simply had to lift.
quotes.author: Samuel Wilson Fussell

quotes.quote: Just keeping yourself interested and motivated to train over a long period of time is often the biggest hurdle and one of the biggest factors for success in building sustainable muscle.
quotes.author: Craig Cecil

quotes.quote: Somewhere along the way, / I forgot why I'm doing this. / I want to be bigger. / I want to be better./ I want to need no one.
quotes.author: Gian Andrea

quotes.quote: Bodybuilding isn’t 90 minutes in the gym. It’s a lifestyle.
quotes.author: Lee Priest

quotes.quote: I don’t do this to be healthy; I do this to get big muscles.
quotes.author: Marcus Ruhl

quotes.quote: If you don’t follow a good nutritional plan, you’re bodybuilding with one arm behind your back.
quotes.author: Shawn Ray

quotes.quote: Bodybuilding is an art, your body is the canvas, weights are your brush and nutrition is your paint. We all have the ability to turn a self-portrait into a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Kai Greene

quotes.quote: A bodybuilder is a sculptor who carries with him his own material.
quotes.author: Serge Nubret

quotes.quote: Strength is the product of struggle. You must do what others don’t to achieve what others won't.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as overtraining, just under nutrition and undersleeping.
quotes.author: The Barbarian brothers

quotes.quote: The land of Bohemia is a sad country, bounded on the North by need, on the South by poverty, on the East by illusion, and on the West by the hospital. It is irrigated by two inexhaustible streams: impudence and shame.
quotes.author: Alphonse De Callone

quotes.quote: Like positive and negative magnetic poles, Bohemian and bourgeois were— and are— parts of a single field: they imply, require, and attract each other.
quotes.author: Jerrold Siegel

quotes.quote: Bohemian or not according to how they were meant or how they were taken, Bohemian at some moments and not at others.
quotes.author: Jerrold Siegel

quotes.quote: A bohemian is one whose need, (because of a personality defect), of the unhampered social life thus provided accounts for his presence in the group providing it.
quotes.author: Cesar Grania

quotes.quote: I always knew that there's a risk in the bohemian lifestyle, and I decided to take it because, whether it's an illusion or not— I don't think it is— it helped my concentration, it stopped me from being bored, and stopped other people from being boring, to some extent.
quotes.author: Agnes Bojaxhiou

quotes.quote: The Bohemians say, 'He who wants to know himself should offend two or three of his neighbors.' I hope I have not done so.
quotes.author: Ted Kooser

quotes.quote: Being a Bohemian can be so much less and so much more.
quotes.author: Joseph Downing

quotes.quote: Bohemia can be anywhere because it is not a place but a state of mind.
quotes.author: Arthur Ransome

quotes.quote: Bohemian means getting drunk together all the time, but everyone round here works bloody hard.
quotes.author: Beryl Bainbridge

quotes.quote: Bohemia is a stage in artistic life: it is the preface to the Academy, the Hotel Dieu, or the Morgue.
quotes.author: Henry Murger

quotes.quote: The Bohemians know everything and go everywhere, as they have patent leather pumps or burst boots.
quotes.author: Henry Murger

quotes.quote: Bohemians speak amongst themselves a special language borrowed from the conversation of the studios, a jargon of behind the scenes, and the discussions of the editor's room.
quotes.author: Henry Murger

quotes.quote: The bohemian is above all an idea, the personification of a myth.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wilson

quotes.quote: The term bohemian has a bad reputation because it's allied to myriad clichés, but Parisians originally adopted the term, associated with nomadic Gypsies, to describe artists and writers who stayed up all night and ignored the pressures of the industrial world.
quotes.author: Sarah Thornton

quotes.quote: But an artist, he realized. Or rather so-called artist. Bohemian. That's closer to it. The artistic life without the talent
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: A Bohemian life, filled with poetry, it cuts like a knife, without coquetry!
quotes.author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quotes.quote: It was my mom and I against the world. We lived in New York in this bohemian lifestyle where an extended group of artists and photographers were like my aunts and uncles.
quotes.author: Brooke Shields

quotes.quote: I always knew that there's a risk in the bohemian lifestyle, and I decided to take it because, whether it's an illusion or not— I don't think it is— it helped my concentration, it stopped me from bring bored, and stopped other people from being boring, to some extent.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.quote: They were all brilliant. They wrote books and painted pictures, and if they ever stopped talking, which I was sure they would never do, they planned to change the world.
quotes.author: Gloria Whelan

quotes.quote: Channel a bohemian state of mind with an effortless dress paired with a must have embroidered moto jacket.
quotes.author: Lubov Azria

quotes.quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: Bohemia is nothing more than the little country in which you do not live. If you try to obtain citizenship in it, at once the court and retinue pack the royal archives and treasure and move away beyond the hills.
quotes.author: O. Henry

quotes.quote: There's a part of bohemia I love. The lack of prejudice, the lack of aggression, I love the lack, for the most part, of competitiveness. It's more peaceful.
quotes.author: nue

quotes.quote: The bohemian life that reigned in Paris until the end of the 50s is gone. The artists had more time to think, to reflect; success didn't come so suddenly.
quotes.author: Pontus Hulten

quotes.quote: No kind of bomb ever built will extinguish hatred.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: The atomic bomb is too dangerous to be loose in a lawless world.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: You can bomb the world to pieces, but you can't bomb it into peace. Power to the peaceful.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.quote: The atom bomb was no 'great decision.' It was merely another powerful weapon in the arsenal of righteousness.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: Making bombs will only destroy us. It doesn't matter whether we use them or not. They will destroy us either way.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: The nuclear bomb is the most useless weapon ever invented. It can be employed to no rational purpose. It is not even an effective defense against itself.
quotes.author: George F. Kennan

quotes.quote: Some people believe that the nuclear bomb should be awarded the Nobel Peace Prize, since it scared the major powers away from war by equating it with doomsday.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: The atomic bomb made the prospect of future war unendurable. It has led us up those last few steps to the mountain pass; and beyond there is a different country.
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: Bombs know no ism but barbarism. The laws that successfully govern a peaceful and democratic society do not interfere with the only law bombs know, which is the law of gravity.
quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.quote: Bombs do not choose. They will hit everything.
quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.quote: Bombs are probably more merciful than bayonets.
quotes.author: G. H. Hardy

quotes.quote: Any time bombs are used to target civilians it is an act of terror.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The greatest danger of bombs is in the explosion of stupidity that they provoke.
quotes.author: Octave Mirbeau

quotes.quote: Nuclear bombs have made mass murder a reality. Nuclear bombs threaten humankind.
quotes.author: Bernard Lown

quotes.quote: Pretty much the worst reason to bomb someone is to prove that you're willing to bomb someone.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Goldberg

quotes.quote: The atomic bomb embodies the results of a combination genius and patience as remarkable as any in the history of mankind.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: A bomb makes more noise than a caress, but for each bomb that destroys, there are millions of caresses that nourish life.
quotes.author: Facundo Cabral

quotes.quote: A bomb is a bomb, what's the difference between different kinds of bombs? All bombs are to kill, but it's about how to use it.
quotes.author: Bashar al-Assad

quotes.quote: The atomic bombs will surely shorten the war, and let us hope that they will effectively end war as a possibility in human affairs.
quotes.author: Ernest Lawrence

quotes.quote: The issue isn't the accuracy of the bombs you have, it's how you use the bombs you have - and more importantly, whether you ought to use bombs at all.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: The atomic bomb certainly is the most powerful of all weapons, but it is conclusively powerful and effective only in the hands of the nation which controls the sky.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: The moral to be legitimately drawn from the supreme tragedy of the bomb is that it will not be destroyed by counter bombs even as violence cannot be by counter-violence.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The man who throws a bomb is an artist, because he prefers a great moment to everything.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The nuclear bomb took all the fun out of war.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: The only use for an atomic bomb is to keep somebody else from using one.
quotes.author: George Wald

quotes.quote: Bombs take hours or days to reach every corner of the earth. Words arrive instantly and kill more people. They are a weapon of mass destruction.
quotes.author: Haim Harari

quotes.quote: There is such thing as a 'smart bomb' - bombs are smart these days, you know.
quotes.author: Adolfo Perez Esquivel

quotes.quote: The bondage we are born into is the bondage we cannot see. Verily, freedom is little more than the ignorance of tyranny. Live long enough, and you will see: Men resent not the whip so much as the hand that wields it.
quotes.author: R. Scott Bakker

quotes.quote: We pledge ourselves to liberate all our people from the continuing bondage of poverty, deprivation, suffering, gender and other discrimination.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Even a second of freedom is worth more than a lifetime of bondage.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: Being aware of the bondage is enough to free you from its clutches.
quotes.author: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.quote: Bondage is when the mind longs for something, grieves about something, rejects something, holds on to something, is pleased about something or displeased about something.
quotes.author: Ashá¹­Ävakra

quotes.quote: Familiarize yourself with the chains of bondage and you prepare your own limbs to wear them.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: There is only one decision you need to make: You are either working at your Freedom or you are accepting your bondage.
quotes.author: Robert Adams

quotes.quote: A slavish bondage to parents cramps every faculty of the mind.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: Bondage is hoarse, and may not speak aloud.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: When you are born into bondage you can't see the prison.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Bondage is subjection to external influences and internal negative thoughts and attitudes.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Bondage is the life of personality, and for bondage the personal self will fight with tireless resourcefulness and the most stubborn cunning.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Whoever is not tied to possessions, clinging neither to body nor mind, is never in bondage.
quotes.author: ThÃ­ch Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: True freedom, which is full joy, is the complete recognition of law and adaptation to it. Bondage comes from ignorance of law or opposition to it.
quotes.author: John Andreas Widtsoe

quotes.quote: The individual who has to justify his existence by his own efforts is in eternal bondage to himself.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Words are a pretext. It is the inner bond that draws one person to another, not words.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: There is such a thing as crazy-mother bonding. . . . It happens when one realizes the other also has had a crazy mother, and it is both painful and pleasurable. There are more crazy mothers than you might think.
quotes.author: Minrose Gwin

quotes.quote: Bond is stronger than blood. The family grows stronger by bond.
quotes.author: Itohan Eghide

quotes.quote: A slip of the foot may injure your body, but a slip of the tongue will injure your bond.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote:
When we establish human connections within the context of shared
experience we create community wherever we go.
quotes.author: Gina Greenlee

quotes.quote: What would it be like to feel so attached, so intrinsically bonded, so protective of one’s own best connection with time and the ages, of generations past and future, of another human life, of their time?
quotes.author: J.R. Tompkins

quotes.quote: bonding through dependence never works, whereas bonding through freedom always does.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: Accountability is the glue that bonds commitment to results.
quotes.author: Will Craig

quotes.quote: There is very hard bonding between Tears and Rain, often both falls together in Happiness and in Pain
quotes.author: Samar Sudha

quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other’s life.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Nothing is more exciting and bonding in relationships than creating together.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Anybody with a good sense of humor is one-up on their competition. We respond to somebody who has the ability to make us laugh. It's a bonding influence.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Emotion brings in the dimension of bonding or tuning in: An experience that touches your heart makes the meaning that much more personal.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Music has a bonding power, it's primal social cement
quotes.author: Oliver Sacks

quotes.quote: The break down for kids is communication. Music helps bring that bond.
quotes.author: Sheila E.

quotes.quote: When you go through a tragedy with someone, the bond is stronger.
quotes.author: Nushrat Bharucha

quotes.quote: No better way to bond than food.
quotes.author: Rajon Rondo

quotes.quote: The principle of subordination is the great bond of union and harmony through the universe.
quotes.author: Catharine Beecher

quotes.quote: The strong bond of friendship is not always a balanced equation; friendship is not always about giving and taking in equal shares. Instead, friendship is grounded in a feeling that you know exactly who will be there for you when you need something, no matter what or when.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: A loving family provides the foundation children need to succeed, and strong families with a man and a woman - bonded together for life - always have been, and always will be, the key to such families.
quotes.author: Jim Bunning

quotes.quote: Finding things you enjoy doing together is critical to family bonding. And although watching TV or going to a movie together are fine activities, the problem with them is they are not really interactive.
quotes.author: Randall Hicks

quotes.quote: The opportunity to experience the parent–child bond when a person may have otherwise thought that he or she would not be able to do so can be a wonderful and welcome benefit of becoming part of a blended family.
quotes.author: Matthew Massimo

quotes.quote: Strength alone does not create human bonds. The world is filled with more warmth than that.
quotes.author: Kyouta Shibano

quotes.quote: We dare not talk of the darkness for fear it will infect us. We dare not talk of the fire, for fear it will destroy us. And so we live in the half-light, Like our mothers before us. Come to the fire, Feel it warm your skin. Come to the fire, Feel it burn in your belly, Shine out through your eyes. Come dance in the fire, Let it fuel your prayers.
quotes.author: Lucy H. Pearce

quotes.quote: In the end, you will not see the physical beauty in others that caught your eye, but the fire that burned within them. This kind of beauty is the bonfire you had to attend.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Everything that had happened was shockingly beautiful, enough to make you crazy.
quotes.author: Banana Yoshimoto

quotes.quote: When the bonfire of love still smolders in the wake of emotional convulsions, seeds of regret and remorse may endlessly linger about on the path of life.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: Desire is a bonfire that burns with greater fury, asking for more fuel.
quotes.author: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: Knowledge and education are the key to this human tragedy which is a bonfire of hate fueled by ignorance.
quotes.author: Christina Engela

quotes.quote: As the bonfires of knowledge grow brighter, the more the darkness is revealed to our startled eyes.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: A strong reputation is like a good bonfire. When you have one kindled it's easy to keep the flame burning, even if someone comes along and tries to piss on it. But if you fall asleep and neglect it.You'll wake up with ashes.
quotes.author: Zachary Taylor

quotes.quote: The bigger you build the bonfire, the more darkness is revealed.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Bonfires dot the rolling hillsides figures dance around and around to drums that pulse out echoes of darkness and moving to the pagan sound.
quotes.author: Loreena McKennitt

quotes.quote: Your practice should be strengthened by the difficult situations you encounter, just as a bonfire in a strong wind is not blown out, but blazes even brighter.
quotes.author: Dilgo Khyentse Rinpoche

quotes.quote: When you do something, you should burn yourself up completely, like a good bonfire, leaving no trace of yourself.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: When you know you are dying, self deceptions fly from your bedside like embers off a bonfire.
quotes.author: Darin Strauss

quotes.quote: Absence diminishes small loves and increases great ones, as the wind blows out the candle and blows up the bonfire.
quotes.author: Rouchefoucauld

quotes.quote: You light the Spark in my Bonfire Heart.
quotes.author: James Blunt

quotes.quote: Everyone had something disparaging to say about the unfortunate Maltyshcheva, and the conversation began crackling merrily like a kindling bonfire
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Any book that helps a child to form a habit of reading, to make reading one of his deep and continuing needs, is good for him.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The book you don't read won't help.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: Books are like mirrors: if a fool looks in, you cannot expect a genius to look out.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Books are the quietest and most constant of friends; they are the most accessible and wisest of counselors, and the most patient of teachers.
quotes.author: Charles William Eliot

quotes.quote: Books are the perfect entertainment: no commercials, no batteries, hours of enjoyment for each dollar spent. What I wonder is why everybody doesn't carry a book around for those inevitable dead spots in life.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Books are my friends, my companions. They make me laugh and cry and find meaning in life.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: Here's to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris

quotes.quote: If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A book is a gift you can open again and again.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Books are a uniquely portable magic.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Books are the carriers of civilization. Without books, history is silent, literature dumb, science crippled, thought and speculation at a standstill. They are engines of change, windows on the world, lighthouses erected in the sea of time.
quotes.author: Barbara W. Tuchman

quotes.quote: Books are the legacies that a great genius leaves to mankind, which are delivered down from generation to generation as presents to the posterity of those who are yet unborn.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Do not read good books--life is too short for that--read only the best.
quotes.author: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.quote: Books are for people who wish they were somewhere else.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: No book is really worth reading at the age of ten which is not equally ? and often far more ? worth reading at the age of fifty and beyond.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Books are the plane, and the train, and the road. They are the destination, and the journey. They are home.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: A good book has no ending.
quotes.author: R.D. Cumming

quotes.quote: The world of books is the most remarkable creation of man. Nothing else that he builds ever lasts. Monuments fall; nations perish; civilizations grow old and die out; and, after an era of darkness, new races build others. But in the world of books are vol
quotes.author: Clarence Shepard Day

quotes.quote: Books are totally useless unless you take their advice. If you just keep reading them, thinking 'that's so insightful! that changes everything,' but never actually doing anything different, then pretty quickly the feeling will wear off and you'll start se
quotes.author: Aaron Swartz

quotes.quote: I don't believe in the kind of magic in my books. But I do believe something very magical can happen when you read a good book.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Some books are to be tasted, others to be swallowed, and some few to be chewed and digested.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: A book is a friend; a good book is a good friend. It will talk to you when you want it to talk, and it will keep still when you want it to keep still; and there are not many friends who know enough to do that.
quotes.author: B. A. Billingsly

quotes.quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Books, dear books,Have been, and are my comforts; morn and night,Adversity, prosperity, at home,Abroad, health, sickness?good or ill report,The same firm friends; the same refreshment rich,And source of consolation.
quotes.author: Dr. Dodd.

quotes.quote: Good books are to the young mind what the warming sun and the refreshing rain of spring are to the seeds which have lain dormant in the frosts of winter. They are more, for they may save from that which is worse than death, as well as bless with that whic
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: Nothing can supply the place of books. They are cheering or soothing companions in solitude, illness, affliction. The wealth of both continents would not compensate for the good they impart.
quotes.author: Channing

quotes.quote: Books are the ever-burning lamps of accumulated wisdom.
quotes.author: George William Curtis

quotes.quote: Book: A garden carried in a pocket.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: The man who does not read good books has no advantage over the man who can't read them.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: To buy books would be a good thing if we also could buy the time to read them.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog, it's too dark to read.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of books. Those that no one reads and those that no one ought to read.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Books are the bees which carry the quickening pollen from one to another mind.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: A book may be compared to your neighbor: if it be good, it cannot last too long; if bad, you cannot get rid of it too early.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.quote: The reading of all good books is like conversation with the finest men of the past centuries.
quotes.author: Descartes

quotes.quote: A man is known by the books he reads.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A book must be an ice-axe to break the seas frozen inside our soul.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: A good book is the best of friends, the same today and forever.
quotes.author: Martin Tupper

quotes.quote: Books are lighthouses erected in the great sea of time.
quotes.author: E.P. Whipple

quotes.quote: Books are good enough in their own way, but they are a mighty bloodless substitute for life.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: If a book is worth reading, it is worth buying.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Books open your mind, broaden your mind, and strengthen you as nothing else can.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Books serve to show a man that those original thoughts of his aren't very new after all.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: A book can talk to your mind. A book can go around the world with you. A book can make you a smarter individual.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Good books enlighten the mind, bad books corrupt the soul.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Books are more than educational - they are the quiet friends, loyal companions, and untiring teachers.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: I cannot live without books.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: There is more treasure in books than in all the pirate's loot on Treasure Island.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: There are books of which the backs and covers are by far the best parts.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: That's the thing about books. They let you travel without moving your feet.
quotes.author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quotes.quote: A great book should leave you with many experiences, and slightly exhausted at the end. You live several lives while reading.
quotes.author: William Styron

quotes.quote: A book is the only place in which you can examine a fragile thought without breaking it.
quotes.author: Edward P. Morgan

quotes.quote: A book is a version of the world. If you do not like it, ignore it; or offer your own version in return.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: A good book is an event in my life.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: Reading a book is like re-writing it for yourself.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: Books support us in our solitude and keep us from being a burden to ourselves.
quotes.author: Jeremy Collier

quotes.quote: There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Once you have read a book you care about, some part of it is always with you.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: There is no friend as loyal as a book.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Books are mirrors. You only see in them what you already have inside of you.
quotes.author: Carlos Zafon

quotes.quote: Some books should be tasted, some devoured, but only a few should be chewed and digested thoroughly.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Whenever you read a good book, somewhere in the world a door opens to allow in more light.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: All good books have one thing in common, they are truer than if they had really happened.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: No two persons ever read the same book.
quotes.author: Edmund Wilson

quotes.quote: Some books leave us free and some books make us free.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Books were safer than other people anyway.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Great books help you understand, and they help you feel understood.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong with reading a book you love over and over.
quotes.author: GAIL CARSON LEVINE

quotes.quote: The world was hers for the reading.
quotes.author: Betty Smith

quotes.quote: Good books don't give up all their secrets at once.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: There are many little ways to enlarge your child's world. Love of books is the best of all.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis

quotes.quote: I think of life as a good book. The further you get into it, the more it begins to make sense.
quotes.author: Harold Kushner

quotes.quote: You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A book is a dream that you hold in your hand.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Books: a beautifully browsable invention that needs no electricity and exists in a readable form no matter what happens.
quotes.author: Nicholson Baker

quotes.quote: Books serve to show a man that those original thoughts of his aren't very new after all.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If there's a book you really want to read but it hasn't been written yet, then you must write it.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Some like to believe it's the book that chooses the person.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Reading one book is like eating one potato chip.
quotes.author: Diane Duane

quotes.quote: Read the best books first, or you may not have a chance to read them at all.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A good book should leave you, slightly exhausted at the end. You live several lives while reading it.
quotes.author: William Styron

quotes.quote: There comes a time when you have to choose between turning the page and closing the book.
quotes.author: Josh Jameson

quotes.quote: There are two motives for reading a book; one, that you enjoy it; the other, that you can boast about it.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: A book is a device to ignite the imagination.
quotes.author: Alan Bennett

quotes.quote: Books let us into their souls and lay open to us the secrets of our own.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Keep reading books, but remember that a book is only a book, and you should learn to think for yourself.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.quote: Here is the treasure chest of the world - the public library, or a bookstore.
quotes.author: Benjamin Carson

quotes.quote: The quality of the content is not determined by the section it sits in in the bookstore.
quotes.author: Christine Riccio

quotes.quote: A place is not really a place without a bookstore.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Zevin

quotes.quote: I wanted a bookstore because the book business is the business of life.
quotes.author: George Whitman

quotes.quote: Standing there, staring at the long shelves crammed with books, I felt myself relax and was suddenly at peace.
quotes.author: Helene Hanff

quotes.quote: A bookstore is one of the many pieces of evidence we have that people are still thinking.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: This is a feminist bookstore. There is no humor section.
quotes.author: John Callahan

quotes.quote: Books are the greatest treasure of wisdom and knowledge for mankind.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Desire for books, desire to read.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Lover of books, lover of knowledge.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Read good books to improve yourself.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The bookstore and the coffeehouse are natural allies; Neither has a time limit, slowness is encouraged.
quotes.author: Lewis Buzbee

quotes.quote: I am fatally attracted to all bookstores.
quotes.author: Lewis Buzbee

quotes.quote: For someone who is hungry for the wisdom of the past, the smell of books in a bibliopole is more beautiful than the smell of the world's finest dishes!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: Profitable bookstores sell books. Unprofitable book sellers store books.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Books … they’re kind of a compulsion for me. To find a great bookstore is a great thing.
quotes.author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quotes.quote: We all just took the bookstore at its word, because if you couldn't trust a bookstore, what could you trust?
quotes.author: Rachel Cohn

quotes.quote: In a second-hand bookshop head to the back, find the old books with dust undisturbed and worn off covers for these clothe true treasures.
quotes.author: Rachel Hall

quotes.quote: Genre is a bookstore problem, not a literary problem.
quotes.author: Rick Moody

quotes.quote: A good little bookstore…is a laboratory for our coming together.
quotes.author: Ross Gay

quotes.quote: I love walking into a bookstore. It's like all my friends are sitting on shelves, waving their pages at me.
quotes.author: Tahereh Mafi

quotes.quote: A good bookshop is just a genteel Black Hole that knows how to read.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Bookstores always remind me that there are good things in this world.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: The game of life is a game of boomerangs. Our thoughts, deeds and words return to us sooner or later with astounding accuracy.
quotes.author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quotes.quote: A boomerang returns back to the person who throws it. But first, while moving in a circle, it hits its target. So does gossip.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Life truly is a boomerang. What you give, you get.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: I forgot how to throw a boomerang, but then it came back to me.
quotes.author: Hank Green

quotes.quote: That... is how the world moves: Not like an arrow, but a boomerang
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: I would happily help to turn the stone being thrown at me into a boomerang
quotes.author: Peer Steinbruck

quotes.quote: Hatred is a boomerang which is sure to hit you harder than the one at whom you throw it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All wars eventually act as boomerangs and the victor suffers as much as the vanquished.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you hate somebody, it's like a boomerang that misses its target and comes back and hits you in the head. The one who hates is the one who hurts
quotes.author: Louis Zamperini

quotes.quote: Karma is like a boomerang whatever you give out...will come back to you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A boomerang is just a frisbee for people that don't have friends.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It is never wise to seek or wish for another’s misfortune. If malice or envy were tangible and had a shape, it would be the shape of a boomerang.
quotes.author: Charley Reese

quotes.quote: My words, thoughts and deeds have a boomerang effect. So be-careful what you send out!
quotes.author: Alan Rufus

quotes.quote: Make your goals big and broad enough so that they never become answered prayers and boomerang to curse you.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: To get all that life wants for you, apply what I call the boomerang effect. Give out what you most want see come back.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Hatred is a boomerang which is sure to hit you harder than the one at whom you throw it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is like a boomerang; begin using what you have and it comes back to you in greater measure.
quotes.author: Charles L. Allen

quotes.quote: Malice is of the boomerang character, and is apt to turn upon the projector.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: I'm looking to buy a new boomerang, how can I throw the old one out?
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Whatever we think of the border, it’s important to recognise it as a limitation of Area X.
quotes.author: Jeff Vandermeer

quotes.quote: The border is way more porous than it should be, and I think we'd be open to discussing anything that enhances border security.
quotes.author: Mitch McConnell

quotes.quote: The world has only one border. It is called humanity. The differences between us are small compared to our shared humanity. Put humans first.
quotes.author: Nadia Murad

quotes.quote: Protecting a border is not a nice thing. It is not a matter of aesthetics; it cannot be done with flowers and teddy bears.
quotes.author: Viktor Orban

quotes.quote: Let borders become sunlight so we traverse this Earth as one nation and drive the darkness out.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: Dear if your limits and my limits were the same, our borders would not have been separate.
quotes.author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

quotes.quote: Our ports and our borders are the most unprotected fronts in the war on terror.
quotes.author: J.D.Hayworth

quotes.quote: Going forward, as we work to strengthen our border in the interests of homeland security, we must also recognize the economic importance of immigration reform.
quotes.author: Dave Reichert

quotes.quote: The border is a marketplace. The invisible hand of the powerful governs the crossings.
quotes.author: Amitava Kumar

quotes.quote: It's not about breaking down borders. It's about pushing off of them, and seeing what amazing places they might bring us.
quotes.author: Amy Purdy

quotes.quote: This planet is for everyone, borders are for no one. It's all about freedom.
quotes.author: Benjamin Zephania

quotes.quote: It is extremely dangerous to talk about limits or borders. It is vital, instead, that we remain completely open, that we are always involved, and that we aim to contribute personally in social events.
quotes.author: Dario Fo

quotes.quote: Adolescence is a border between childhood and adulthood. Like all borders, it's teeming with energy and fraught with danger.
quotes.author: Mary Pipher

quotes.quote: The love of one's country is a splendid thing. But why should love stop at the border?
quotes.author: Paolo Coelho

quotes.quote: We are defined not by our borders but by our bonds.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Borders are scratched across the hearts of men By strangers with a calm, judicial pen, And when the borders bleed we watch with dread The lines of ink across the map turn red.
quotes.author: Marya Mannes

quotes.quote: The sun will not shine on any country that has borders with ours.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: No country or continent can open its borders to all comers without fundamentally weakening itself and this is the risk that the countries of Europe run through misguided altruism.
quotes.author: Tony Abbott

quotes.quote: Human dignity is independent of national borders. We must always defend the interests of the poor and the persecuted in other countries.
quotes.author: Kjell Magne Bondevik

quotes.quote: I abhor the idea of a perfect world. It would bore me to tears.
quotes.author: Shelby Foote

quotes.quote: Perhaps the world's second worst crime is boredom. The first is being a bore.
quotes.author: Cecil Beaton

quotes.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: If you're bored with life – you don't get up every morning with a burning desire to do things – you don't have enough goals.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: The truth is that everyone is bored, and devotes himself to cultivating habits.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Boredom is not an end-product, it is comparatively rather an early stage in life and art. You've got to go by or past or through boredom, as through a filter, before the clear product emerges.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: When you're bored with yourself, marry and be bored with someone else.
quotes.author: Edward VIII

quotes.quote: Boredom is the conviction that you can't change. The shriek of unused capacities.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: The life of the creative man is lead, directed and controlled by boredom. Avoiding boredom is one of our most important purposes.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Boredom between two people doesn't come from being together physically. It comes from being apart mentally and spiritually.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: There's no excuse to be bored. Sad, yes. Angry, yes. Depressed, yes. Crazy, yes. But there's no excuse for boredom, ever.
quotes.author: Viggo Mortensen

quotes.quote: Human beings make life so interesting. Do you know, that in a universe so full of wonders, they have managed to invent boredom.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: The concept of boredom entails an inability to use up present moments in a personally fulfilling way.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Against boredom the gods themselves fight in vain.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Boredom is your window on the properties of time that one tends to ignore to the likely peril of one's mental equilibrium. It is your window on time's infinity. Once this window opens, don't try to shut it; on the contrary, throw it wide open.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: Are you bored with life? Then throw yourself into some work you believe in with all your heart, live for it, die for it, and you will find happiness that you had thought could never be yours.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: A bore is a person who opens his mouth and puts his feats in it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Patience and boredom are closely related. Boredom, a certain kind of boredom, is really impatience. You don't like the way things are, they aren't interesting enough for you, so you decide – and boredom is a decision – that you are bored.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: You ought not to be ashamed of being bored. What you ought to be ashamed of is being boring.
quotes.author: Lord Hailsham

quotes.quote: I want to feel something, as a person. I don't want to be bored.
quotes.author: Pina Bausch

quotes.quote: All kinds are good except the kind that bores you.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Boredom comes from a boring mind.
quotes.author: Metallica

quotes.quote: I dreaded having a boring life when I grew up. And I certainly can't complain about being bored.
quotes.author: Ina May Gaskin

quotes.quote: Boredom can be a lethal thing on a small island.
quotes.author: Christopher Moore

quotes.quote: There is something more terrible than a hell of suffering – a hell of boredom.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: You don't burn out from going too fast. You burn out from going too slow and getting bored.
quotes.author: Cliff Burton

quotes.quote: There are no uninteresting things, only uninterested people.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Being bored is an insult to oneself.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: I'm terrified of being bored and not learning.
quotes.author: Alexa Chung

quotes.quote: The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Boredom and fatigue are great historical forces.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: Staying busy keeps me away from being bored, which used to be a lot of my problem.
quotes.author: Kirk Windstein

quotes.quote: I want to be bored. But I can't. But I really don't want to be this thing that I'm having to be instead of being bored.
quotes.author: Ali Smith

quotes.quote: When people are bored, it is primarily with their own selves that they are bored.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The ear tends to be lazy, craves the familiar and is shocked by the unexpected; the eye, on the other hand, tends to be impatient, craves the novel and is bored by repetition.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Before you get bored of yourself try creativity in your life.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Life is never boring, but some people choose to be bored.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Boredom is a pleasing antidote for fear.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.quote: Boredom, the desire for desires.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Boredom is just the reverse side of fascination.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: A bore is a man who, when you ask him how he is, tells you.
quotes.author: Bert Leston Taylor

quotes.quote: I just get bored really quickly and want to push myself to the next level.
quotes.author: Courtney Barnett

quotes.quote: I always get bored with my hair. That's why I would always change it throughout my career.
quotes.author: Janet Jackson

quotes.quote: I always think boredom is to some extent the fault of the bored.
quotes.author: Kate Ross

quotes.quote: The penalty for success is to be bored by the people who used to snub you.
quotes.author: Nancy Astor

quotes.quote: A bored Gwenvael is an entire town destroyed accidently.
quotes.author: G.A. Aiken
