quotes.quote: The writer's curse is that even in solitude, no matter its duration, he never grows lonely or bored.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Only those who want everything done for them are bored.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Boredom is the root of all evil--the despairing refusal to be oneself.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Boredom is a disease of the mind and psyche, an insidious disease. It not only takes the joy out of life, but the creativity as well. No one of God's children should ever be bored with life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life is never boring, but some people choose to be bored.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Grasp your opportunities, no matter how poor your health; nothing is worse for your health than boredom.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Boredom is a sickness the cure for which is work; pleasure is only a palliative.
quotes.author: Le Duc De Lvis

quotes.quote: Boredom flourishes too, when you feel safe. It's a symptom of security.
quotes.author: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.quote: You'll find boredom where there is the absence of a good idea.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Running through things because you are familiar with them, breeds routine and this is the seed of boredom.
quotes.author: James Galway

quotes.quote: In order to live free and happily you must sacrifice boredom. It is not always an easy sacrifice.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Boredom rests upon the nothingness that winds its way through existence; its giddiness, like that which comes from gazing down into an infinite abyss, is infinite.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Boredom is the self being stuffed with itself.
quotes.author: Walker Percy

quotes.quote: Boredom is nothing but the experience of a paralysis of our productive powers.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Boredom is the conviction that you can't change'the shriek of unused capacities.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: Boredom is the fear of self.
quotes.author: Marie Josephine De Suin

quotes.quote: Boredom is the deadliest poison.
quotes.author: William F. Buckley

quotes.quote: The concept of boredom entails an inability to use up present moments in a personally fulfilling way.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Boredom is the dream bird that hatches the egg of experience. A rustling in the leaves drives him away.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.quote: The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
quotes.author: Ellen Parr

quotes.quote: Boredom: the desire for desires.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Boredom comes from a boring mind.
quotes.author: Metallica

quotes.quote: Perhaps the world's second worst crime is boredom. The first is being a bore.
quotes.author: Sir Cecil Beaton

quotes.quote: I always think boredom is to some extent the fault of the bored.
quotes.author: Kate Ross

quotes.quote: There's no excuse to be bored.Sad, yes.Angry, yes.Depressed, yes.Crazy, yes.But there's no excuse for boredom, ever.
quotes.author: Viggo Mortensen

quotes.quote: Boredom is rage spread thin.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: I can excuse everything but boredom.Boring people don't have to stay that way.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: Boredom is a sign of satisfied ignorance, blunted apprehension, crass sympathies, dull understanding, feeble powers of attention, and irreclaimable weakness of character.
quotes.author: James Bridie

quotes.quote: Boredom is the feeling that everything is a waste of time; serenity, that nothing is.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Szasz

quotes.quote: I can excuse everything but boredom. Boring people don't have to stay that way.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: When we hold back out of laziness, that is when we tie ourselves into knots of boredom.
quotes.author: Walter Annenberg

quotes.quote: Boredom is a vital problem for the moralist, since half the sins of mankind are caused by the fear of it.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Isn’t history ultimately the result of our fear of boredom?
quotes.author: Emil M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Boredom is simply the absence of an interesting perspective.
quotes.author: Brandon A. Trean

quotes.quote: Your true traveler finds boredom rather agreeable than painful. It is the symbol of his liberty - his excessive freedom. He accepts his boredom, when it comes, not merely philosophically, but almost with pleasure.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: I am convinced that boredom is one of the greatest tortures. If I were to imagine Hell, it would be the place where you were continually bored.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Boredom always precedes a period of great creativity.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: The life of the creative man is lead, directed and controlled by boredom. Avoiding boredom is one of our most important purposes.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Boredom is your imagination calling to you.
quotes.author: Sherry Turkle

quotes.quote: Boredom, anger, sadness, or fear are not 'yours,' not personal. They are conditions of the human mind. They come and go. Nothing that comes and goes is you.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: When you pay attention to boredom it gets unbelievably interesting.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Teens think listening to music helps them concentrate. It doesn't. It relieves them of the boredom that concentration on homework induces.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: The two enemies of human happiness are pain and boredom.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Immunity to boredom gives the computer an edge.
quotes.author: Alan Lakein

quotes.quote: I begin with the principle that all men are bores. Surely no one will prove himself so great a bore as to contradict me in this.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: All kinds are good except the kind that bores you.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The life of the creative person is led, directed, and controlled by boredom. Avoiding boredom is one of our most important purposes.
quotes.author: Saul Steinberg

quotes.quote: Boredom is like a pitiless zooming-in on the epidermis of time. Every instant is dilated and magnified like the pores of the face.
quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.quote: Boredom is the highest mental state.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Extreme boredom serves to distract us from boredom.
quotes.author: François Duc de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: We have a world of pleasures to win, and nothing to lose but boredom.
quotes.author: Raoul Vaneigem

quotes.quote: A tremendous number of people in America work very hard at something that bores them. Even a rich man thinks he has to go down to the office every day. Not because he likes it but because he can't think of anything else to do.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Entertainment is, in fact, the biggest cause of boredom in the modern world. The more man is entertained, the more bored he grows.
quotes.author: Anthony Daniels

quotes.quote: Jump out the window if you are the object of passion. Flee it if you feel it. Passion goes, boredom remains.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: The most costly disease is not cancer or coronaries. The most costly disease is boredom - costly for both individual and society.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: By his very success in inventing labor-saving devices, modern man has manufactured an abyss of boredom that only the privileged classes in earlier civilizations have ever fathomed.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: Boredom dismantles the mind, renders it superficial, out at the seams, saps it from within and dislocates it.
quotes.author: Emil M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Boredom is a larval anxiety; depression, a dreamy hatred.
quotes.author: Emil M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Boredom and restlessness are deeply related. Whenever you feel boredom, then you feel restlessness. Restlessness is a by-product of boredom.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: The man who lets himself be bored is even more contemptible than the bore.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: The effect of boredom on a large scale in history is underestimated. It is a main cause of revolutions, and would soon bring an end to all the static utopias and the farmyard civilization of the Fabians.
quotes.author: Dean Inge

quotes.quote: It is well-known that evils are alleviated by the fact that we bear them in common. People seem to regard boredom as one of these and therefore get together in order to be bored in common.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Ennui has made more gamblers than avarice, more drunkards than thirst, and perhaps as many suicides as despair.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Meanwhile, patriotic men and women must not only rise above fear; they must also rise above inconvenience and, perhaps, most of all, above boredom.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You have to be a materialist, to begin with. But don't stop there. The second thing that will make your journey complete is the search for significance. Otherwise, every enjoyment is going to become boredom sooner or later.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Complacency can lead to boredom. Try new experiences and put excitement back into your life.
quotes.author: Amanda Ray

quotes.quote: It's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: We are almost always bored by just those whom we must not find boring.
quotes.author: Francois De La Rochefoucau

quotes.quote: There is no conversation more boring than the one where everybody agrees.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Being dull and boring is far more tragic than being tacky.
quotes.author: Thom Filicia

quotes.quote: There is nothing boring in life except ourselves
quotes.author: Nadia Boulanger

quotes.quote: Never fail to know that if you are doing all the talking, you are boring somebody.
quotes.author: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.quote: For most people, life would be boring without meaningful work.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: The secret of boring people lies in telling them everything.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: The secret of being boring is to say everything.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Being bored is an insult to oneself.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Perfection is boring. If a face doesn't have mistakes, it's nothing.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.quote: The boring thing with taking a walk with someone is that your thoughts are then dictated by the subject or subjects of your conversation; and that is made worse by the fact that most sane people are terrified of silence whenever they are with or near someone.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Never be bored, and you will never be boring.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a boring person when you are lonely or extremely bored.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: It gets so boring you know just to do the same thing over and over again.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: Boredom is a vital problem for the moralist, since at least half of the sins of mankind are caused by the fear of it.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Beauty without expression is boring.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Boredom is only for boring people with no imagination.
quotes.author: Tim Tharp

quotes.quote: Boring is a syndrome of being too simple.
quotes.author: Deyth Banger

quotes.quote: Nothing is boring if you look at carefully.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.quote: The most boring scenes are the scenes where a character is alone.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: One way to prevent conversation from being boring is to say the wrong thing.
quotes.author: Francis Joseph Sheed

quotes.quote: Life is never boring, but some people choose to be bored.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Yes, I guess you could say I am a loner, but I feel more lonely in a crowded room with boring people than I feel on my own.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Life can be boring unless you put some effort into it.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: If something is boring after two minutes, try it for four. If still boring, then eight. Then sixteen. Then thirty-two. Eventually one discovers that it is not boring at all.
quotes.author: John Cage

quotes.quote: Too much good taste can be boring.
quotes.author: Diana Vreeland

quotes.quote: Nothing is so boring as having to keep up a deception.
quotes.author: E. V. Lucas

quotes.quote: Running became boring because it's so predictable. I got to a point where I knew what my competition could do.
quotes.author: Peter Snell

quotes.quote: I guess we'd be living in a boring, perfect world if everybody wished everybody else well.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: A stair not worn hollow by footsteps is, regarded from its own point of view, only a boring something made of wood.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: There's nothing more boring than unintelligent actors, because all they have to talk about is themselves and acting. There have to be other things.
quotes.author: Tim Robbins

quotes.quote: An author is a fool who, not content with boring those he lives with, insists on boring future generations.
quotes.author: Baron de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: Just standing around looking beautiful is so boring, really boring, so boring.
quotes.author: Michelle Pfeiffer

quotes.quote: A finished person is a boring person.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: We tend to do period stuff because it helps make it one step removed from boring everyday reality.
quotes.author: Ethan Coen

quotes.quote: Any subject can be made interesting, and therefore any subject can be made boring.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: Hobbies of any kind are boring except to people who have the same hobby. This is also true of religion, although you will not find me saying so in print.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: I thought that subtitles are boring because they're there generally to serve us with information to make you understand what people are saying in a different language.
quotes.author: Tony Scott

quotes.quote: One must work, if not from inclination, at least out of despair. Since it proves, on close examination, that work is less boring than amusing oneself.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: The only way a woman can ever reform a man is by boring him so completely that he loses all possible interest in life.
quotes.author: The Picture of Dorian Gray

quotes.quote: No place is boring, if you've had a good night's sleep and have a pocket full of unexposed film.
quotes.author: Robert Adams

quotes.quote: What if it's boring or if it's not boring, it might be too revealing, or worse, it might be too revealing and still be boring.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: There's a danger of the Internet just becoming loud, ugly and boring with a thousand voices screaming for attention.
quotes.author: Matt Drudge

quotes.quote: God help us if we ever take the theater out of the auction business or anything else. It would be an awfully boring world.
quotes.author: A. Alfred Taubman

quotes.quote: I can excuse everything but boredom. Boring people don't have to stay that way.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: Sometimes the most positive thing you can be in a boring society is absolutely negative.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: Highly educated bores are by far the worst; they know so much, in such fiendish detail, to be boring about.
quotes.author: Louis Kronenberger

quotes.quote: Without music to decorate it, time is just a bunch of boring production deadlines or dates by which bills must be paid.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Life is better than death, I believe, if only because it is less boring, and because it has fresh peaches in it.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Every kind of music is good, except the boring kind.
quotes.author: Gioachino Rossini

quotes.quote: There is something curiously boring about somebody else's happiness.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: There is nothing more boring for an intelligent woman than to spend endless amounts of time with small children.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: An honest lie is better than a boring truth.
quotes.author: Marcel Wanders

quotes.quote: You can't want to be happy, because that's too easy and too boring.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Accomplishing the impossible means only the boss will add it to your regular duties.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: The best executive is the one who has sense enough to pick good men to do what he wants done, and self-restraint to keep from meddling with them while they do it.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you think your teacher is tough, wait until you get a boss. He doesn't have tenure.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Good management is the art of making problems so interesting and their solutions so constructive that everyone wants to get to work and deal with them.
quotes.author: Paul Hawken

quotes.quote: Every boss started as a worker.
quotes.author: Moosa Rahat

quotes.quote: The boss inspires fear; the leader inspires enthusiasm.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: In my house I'm the boss, my wife is just the decision maker.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Boss may be on, but leader can be anyone.
quotes.author: Ameya Agrawal

quotes.quote: He isn't a real boss until he has trained subordinates to shoulder most of his responsibilities
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: A good boss realizes that they can also learn from those they work with no matter the level, title or position. Learning is a continuous habit and is one of the best lessons demonstrated by a good boss.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: No man goes before his time - unless the boss leaves early.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Be a leader with a ladder, not a boss with an order.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: The way to find the real boss is to find out who hires the lawyers
quotes.author: David Weinbaum

quotes.quote: The secret of successful managing is to keep the five guys who hate you away from the four guys who haven't made up their minds.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: The only time some people work like a horse is when the boss rides them.
quotes.author: Gabriel Heatter

quotes.quote: The speed of the boss is the speed of the team.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: A good manager is a man who isn't worried about his own career but rather the careers of those who work for him.
quotes.author: H. S. M. Burns

quotes.quote: There is a difference between being a leader and being a boss. Both are based on authority. A boss demands blind obedience; a leader earns his authority through understanding and trust.
quotes.author: Klaus Balkenhol

quotes.quote: Don't blame the boss. He has enough problems.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: Being a boss anywhere is lonely. Being a female boss in a world of mostly men is especially so.
quotes.author: Allison Gomme

quotes.quote: Learn to obey before you command.
quotes.author: Solon

quotes.quote: It is always a great honor to be the driver of your own car, to be the boss of your own fate!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Unless you accept anyone to be your boss, no man can be your boss!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The three "C's"of leadership are Consideration,Caring,and Courtesy.Be polite to everyone.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: In most cases being a good boss means hiring talented people and then getting out of their way.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: Become the kind of leader that people would follow voluntarily; even if you had no title or position.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: A good leader is a person who takes a little more than his share of the blame and a little less than his share of the credit.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Remember the difference between a boss and a leader; a boss says "Go!" - a leader says "Let's go!"
quotes.author: E.M. Kelly

quotes.quote: By working eight hours a day, you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: A boss says â€œgo and make sure you do itâ€; a leader says â€œlet's go and make it happenâ€. Bosses control people; leaders involve them.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: You'll never make a fortune working for the boss man
quotes.author: Jeannette Walls

quotes.quote: The person who knows how will always have job. The person who knows WHY will always be his boss.
quotes.author: Diane Ravitch

quotes.quote: A leader leads by example, not by force.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: People ask the difference between a leader and a boss. The leader leads, and the boss drives.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Being a leader is making the people you love hate you a little more each day.
quotes.author: Patrick Ness

quotes.quote: A leader is best when people barely know that he exists.
quotes.author: Witter Bynner

quotes.quote: A good boss is a person who can tolerate my complaints and still manage to say hello to me every day.
quotes.author: Byron Pusifer

quotes.quote: No great manager or leader ever fell from heaven; it's learned, not inherited.
quotes.author: Tom Northup

quotes.quote: A boss creates fear, a leader confidence. A boss fixes blame; a leader corrects mistakes. A boss knows all; a leader asks questions. A boss makes work drudgery; a leader makes it interesting.
quotes.author: Russell H. Ewing

quotes.quote: One of the true tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency.
quotes.author: Arnold Glasow

quotes.quote: Your real boss is the one who walks around under your hat.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The worst mistake a boss can make is not to say 'well done'.
quotes.author: John Ashcroft

quotes.quote: It's always better to deliver the news yourself rather than allow your boss to be surprised.
quotes.author: Mary Cheney

quotes.quote: Most bosses know instinctively that their power depends more on employee's compliance than on threats or sanctions.
quotes.author: Fernanda Bartolme

quotes.quote: Leaders are influential because they live and inspire other people's future.
quotes.author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

quotes.quote: Every boss, if you are forgetting, is another human being made of bones and flesh and likes it when his ego gets stroked.
quotes.author: Abhishek Ratna

quotes.quote: Leaders need to be optimists. Their vision is beyond the present.
quotes.author: Rudy Giuliani

quotes.quote: A good boss makes his men realize they have more ability than they think they have so that they consistently do better work than they thought they could.
quotes.author: Charles Erwin Wilson

quotes.quote: The person who knows how will always have a job. The person who knows why will always be his boss.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.quote: The first thing the secretary types is the boss.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: No man goes before his time - unless the boss leaves early.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Being the boss anywhere is lonely. Being a female boss in a world of mostly men is especially so.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: People and organizations don't grow much without delegation and completed staff work because they are confined to the capacities of the boss and reflect both personal strengths and weaknesses.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: In my house I'm the boss, my wife is just the decision maker.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Accomplishing the impossible means only that the boss will add it to your regular duties.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: I've never wanted to be the boss.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: I would be a billionaire if I was looking to be a selfish boss. That's not me.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Nobody is my boss.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.quote: Ok, boss, I don't mind shuffling, but I won't scratch my head.
quotes.author: Ruby Dee

quotes.quote: My relationship with my body has changed. I used to consider it as a servant who should obey, function, give pleasure. In sickness, you realise that you are not the boss. It is the other way around.
quotes.author: Federico Fellini

quotes.quote: No matter who is watching or paying the paycheck, we are ultimately each our own boss.
quotes.author: Kristin Armstrong

quotes.quote: To be honest, it makes you a lot better coach when your boss is in the meeting room. You're a lot more driven every day.
quotes.author: Kirby Smart

quotes.quote: Without false modesty, I feel that, when I'm on the stage, I'm the king, the boss of the situation.
quotes.author: Vladimir Horowitz

quotes.quote: There's a lot of sacrifices you have to make to be the boss.
quotes.author: Travis Fimmel

quotes.quote: Nothing is as embarrassing as watching your boss do something you assured him couldn't be done.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: I'm a hustler. I'm the Boss.
quotes.author: Rick Ross

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, I'm the biggest boss. I'm self-made.
quotes.author: Rick Ross

quotes.quote: He isn't a real boss until he has trained subordinates to shoulder most of his responsibilities.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Some days, I get overwhelmed and a bit breathless... I've probably cried at work, but I'm limited with my crying: I'm the boss; I'm not really allowed to cry at work.
quotes.author: Stella Mccartney

quotes.quote: Why do I want somebody to tell me what to do, tell me what I'm doing wrong? I want to be the boss.
quotes.author: Bubba Watson

quotes.quote: Being your own boss is much superior to working for the man. Including working for your father.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnel

quotes.quote: When I thought I couldn't write recipes, my boss at the time advised, 'Write as you talk.'
quotes.author: Mary Berry

quotes.quote: In the world there are so many Baby girl, you are that one I deserve that I deserve you I'll do anything that you say, anything cause you the boss
quotes.author: Rick Ross

quotes.quote: Run how you want, boss Chill how you want, boss Floss how you want, boss Do whatcha like Go rock your chain, boss Pour that champagne
quotes.author: Dre

quotes.quote: Big boss man Won't you hear me when I call I said big boss man Won't you hear me when I call Well you ain't so big You just tall that's all
quotes.author: Charley Pride

quotes.quote: You looked so lost What a fool I was You called me manly, so masterful You called me manly, so powerful Was I ever gullible She's the boss.
quotes.author: Mick Jagger

quotes.quote: I woke up feelin like a boss Stepped in some mud wiped it off Took a loan, then a took a loss then took some more now I'm a boss I woke up
quotes.author: Yfn Lucci

quotes.quote: To be the boss,it would be so great. Makes you feel,just like your on a date.
quotes.author: faenellaith

quotes.quote: My Boss wanted me to dance to his tunes all day; sway instantaneously to the most minuscule of his commands and instructions.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: My Boss keeps sporty girls, they say; His belly's big with cheer.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: We respected the cook; but the name of a Boss was a blot in our book.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: The shearers squint along the board to catch the Boss’s boots;
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: Run how you want, boss. Chill how you want, boss. Floss how you want, boss. Do whatcha like go rock your chain, boss.
quotes.author: Rick Ross

quotes.quote: Big boss man. Won't you hear me when I call I said big boss man. Won't you hear me when I call.
quotes.author: Charlie Rich

quotes.quote: When the boss comes callin' they'll put us down. When the boss comes callin' gotta stand your ground.
quotes.author: Dropkick Murphys

quotes.quote: If you want to be a boss and be treated like a boss, then firing someone is in your boss-size job description.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: Your boss is not your friend and if you're the boss, your employees aren't your friends.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: One member of your network deserves special attention: your boss.
quotes.author: Kent Lineback

quotes.quote: First, the boss plays conflicting roles: supporter and evaluator, which can create confusion.
quotes.author: Kent Lineback

quotes.quote: As an exceptional performer, your probably had minimal interaction with your boss.
quotes.author: Kent Lineback

quotes.quote: The boss is not only a potential source of great help, in both your job and your career, but also the one who evaluates your performance.
quotes.author: Kent Lineback

quotes.quote: Your boss depends on you and needs your commitment and support to succeed.
quotes.author: Kent Lineback

quotes.quote: Don't assume you can make significant differences in how your boss thinks or operates.
quotes.author: Kent Lineback

quotes.quote: Boston is a moral and intellectual nursery always busy applying first principals to trifles.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Boston is not an avant garde place. It stays literally 15 to 20 years behind New York at all times.
quotes.author: Paul Laffoley

quotes.quote: Boston's freeway system is insane. It was clearly designed by a person who had spent his childhood crashing toy trains.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: Boston has carried the practice of hypocrisy to the n-th degree of refinement, grace, and failure.
quotes.author: Lincoln Steffens

quotes.quote: Boston is so laced with jerseys that you can be dressed head to toe in team apparel and no one will look twice.
quotes.author: David Walton

quotes.quote: Boston is large enough to learn your independence and small enough to make your own.
quotes.author: Henry Winkler

quotes.quote: Boston is the one place in America where wealth and knowledge of how to use it are apt to coincide.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Boston does not represent the quintessential excellence of all the world's cities synthesized into a paradigm of urban beauty and virtue, but it is a place at once characteristic, mellow and mature, and possessed of many qualities not entirely divorced from charm.
quotes.author: Lucius Beebe

quotes.quote: The Boston people were willing to learn, but only if one recognized how much they knew already.
quotes.author: Van Wyck Brooks

quotes.quote: Boston is just a village, sprawling far and wide, more human than New York City.
quotes.author: Frederick Engels

quotes.quote: Boston has opened and kept open, more turnpikes that lead straight to free thought and free speech and free deeds than any other city of live or dead men.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: There is about Boston a certain reminiscent and classical tone, suggesting an authenticity and piety which few other American cities possess.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: Boston is the engine of the state's economy.
quotes.author: Thomas Menino

quotes.quote: Boston is an oasis in the desert, a place where the larger proportion of people are loving, rational and happy.
quotes.author: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.quote: Boston is really a small town, and the pro sports here are almost like a college sport.
quotes.author: Stephen Pagliuca

quotes.quote: Boston was a great city to grow up in, and it probably still is. We were surrounded by two very important elements: academia and the arts.
quotes.author: Leonard Nimoy

quotes.quote: Boston is the cream of the crop of the marathon world. It has such history that you feel such honor just being a part of it. All the other races have pacers to get you to a Boston qualifying time.
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.quote: In Boston, our strength is really our diversity.
quotes.author: Marty Walsh

quotes.quote: People got insights into what was bothering them, but they hardly did a damn thing to change.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: When you can't change what's bothering you, one typical response is to convince yourself that it doesn't actually bother you.
quotes.author: Stephanie Coontz

quotes.quote: Nothing in the world can bother you as much as your own mind, I tell you. In fact, others seem to be bothering you, but it is not others, it is your own mind.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: You're not bothering me. I'm not doing anything. Well, I was breathing, and my heart was beating. But the rest of me wasn't busy.
quotes.author: Emma Bull

quotes.quote: But we didn't speak of what was bothering us the most. Maybe we didn't need to. It couldn't have been 'talked out.' It had to be worn out.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: It is easy to answer the ultimate questions - it saves you bothering with the immediate ones.
quotes.author: John Osborne

quotes.quote: People with opinions just go around bothering each other.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: A lifetime can well be spent correcting and improving one's own faults without bothering about others.
quotes.author: Edward Weston

quotes.quote: The comfort zone takes our greatest aspirations and turns them into excuses for not bothering to aspire.
quotes.author: Peter McWiliiams

quotes.quote: Women treat us, men, like humanity treats gods and they worship us and keep bothering us to do something.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I've never had any trouble opposing people I've been close to. I've never worried about offending or bothering people I feel strongly about.
quotes.author: Randall Robinson

quotes.quote: It's just a crime that people don't take the time and make the effort to have a conversation if it's bothering them that much.
quotes.author: Shelley Long

quotes.quote: I want us to be together without bothering about ourselves- to be really together because we ARE together, as if it were a phenomenon, not a thing we have to maintain by our own effort.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: So unless you really care about me as a person, stop bothering me. I'm done pretending, you should be too.
quotes.author: Brynna Gabrielson

quotes.quote: Shouldn't everything you do matter if you're bothering at all? Not to hold on when it's over, that's the trick.
quotes.author: Evelyn Keyes

quotes.quote: I am successful because I did not waste time bothering about what others were doing but focussed on what I was doing.
quotes.author: Amit Abraham

quotes.quote: People always come up to me and say that my smoking is bothering them... Well, it's killing me!
quotes.author: Wendy Liebman

quotes.quote: We give so little when it's in us always to give so much more. It's bothering to listen with an open heart to someone who smells bad. It's hard.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berg

quotes.quote: Boundaries were necessary for a successful relationship. Most relationships aborted in the boundary defining stage. Not because people demanded what they needed. But because they didn't, then got resentful about it.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: Every human being must have boundaries in order to have successful relationships or a successful performance in life.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Boundaries need to be communicated first verbally and then with actions.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Boundaries are the lines we draw that mark off our autonomy and that of other people, that protect our privacy and that of others. Boundaries allow for intimate connection without dissolving or losing one's sense of self.
quotes.author: Amy Bloom

quotes.quote: No boundary or barrier surrounds the heart of a person that loves their self and others.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Boundaries are to protect life, not to limit pleasures.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: A boundary is not that at which something stops, but that from which something begins.
quotes.author: Martin Heidegger

quotes.quote: Just as we expect others to value our boundaries, it's equally important for us to respect the boundaries of others.
quotes.author: Laurie Buchanan

quotes.quote: The boundaries which divide life from death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Once you see the boundaries of your environment, they are no longer the boundaries of your environment.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: The boundaries of bodies are the least of all things.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Your personal boundaries protect the inner core of your identity and your right to choices.
quotes.author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quotes.quote: Boundaries are just made of Brick and cement.
quotes.author: Nikita Dudani

quotes.quote: Boundaries are basically about providing structure, and structure is essential in building anything that thrives.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Boundaries are a part of self-care. They are healthy, normal, and necessary.
quotes.author: Doreen Virtue

quotes.quote: Boundaries are actually the main factor in space, just as the present, another boundary, is the main factor in time.
quotes.author: Eduardo Chillida

quotes.quote: It's the boundaries where the excitement is and where we will be in the future.
quotes.author: Horst Ludwig Stormer

quotes.quote: The only boundaries we have are in form. There are no obstacles in thought.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Boundaries represent awareness, knowing what the limits are and then respecting those limits.
quotes.author: David W. Earle

quotes.quote: The boundaries of your life are merely a creation of the self.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Givers have to set limits because takers rarely do.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Boundaries protect the things that are of value to you. They keep you in alignment with what you have decided you want in life. That means the key to good boundaries is knowing what you want.
quotes.author: Adelyn Birch

quotes.quote: Boundaries and risk management are very important parts of living a healthy and positive life.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: Healthy boundaries are not walls. They are gates and fences that allow you to enjoy the beauty of your own garden.
quotes.author: Lydia Hall

quotes.quote: The boundaries of design are the same as the problem of perception.
quotes.author: John Hench

quotes.quote: And this is one of the major questions of our lives how we keep boundaries, what permission we have to cross boundaries, and how we do so.
quotes.author: A. B. Yehoshua

quotes.quote: Beauty has no boundaries, no rules, no colors. Beauty is like a religion. You can include everything inside it.
quotes.author: Alessandro Michele

quotes.quote: Love has no boundaries.
quotes.author: Andrej Pejic

quotes.quote: Lack of boundaries invites lack of respect
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Prayers have no boundaries. They can leap miles and continents and be translated instantly into any language.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Daring to set boundaries is about having the courage to love ourselves even when we risk disappointing others.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: When we fail to set boundaries and hold people accountable, we feel used and mistreated.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Never assume you can't do something. Push yourself to redefine the boundaries.
quotes.author: Brian Chesky

quotes.quote: Setting boundaries is a way of caring for myself. It doesn’t make me mean, selfish, or uncaring (just) because I don’t do things your way. I care about me, too.
quotes.author: Christine Morgan

quotes.quote: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.
quotes.author: Corita Kent

quotes.quote: There are two circumstances that lead to arrogance one is when you’re wrong and you can’t face it; the other is when you’re right and nobody else can face it.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Families living in dysfunction seldom have healthy boundaries. Dysfunctional families have trouble knowing where they stop and others begin.
quotes.author: David W. Earle

quotes.quote: There is a boundary to men's passions when they act from feelings, but none when they are under the influence of imagination.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Honouring your own boundaries is the clearest message to others to honor them, too.
quotes.author: Gina Greenlee

quotes.quote: My belief is that communication is the best way to create strong relationships.
quotes.author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quotes.quote: If you free yourself from the conventional reaction to a quantity like a million years, you free yourself a bit from the boundaries of human time. And then in a way you do not live at all, but in another way you live forever.
quotes.author: John McPhee

quotes.quote: I believe that two people are connected at the heart, and it doesn't matter what you do, or who you are or where you live; there are no boundaries or barriers if two people are destined to be together.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: The idea that there is a sharp boundary between our true, inner selves and the outside world is pervasive but highly questionable. The boundaries of the self might well be more porous than we ordinarily think.
quotes.author: Julian Baggini

quotes.quote: Speaking with kindness creates confidence, thinking with kindness creates profoundness, giving with kindness creates love.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: No one will listen to us until we listen to ourselves.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: While working as a team, you push yourself forward and move outside the boundaries. It's a great thing.
quotes.author: Martin Margiela

quotes.quote: We can say what we need to say. We can gently, but assertively, speak our mind. We do not need to be judgmental, tactless, blaming or cruel when we speak our truths.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Speak clearly, if you speak at all carve every word before you let it fall.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Individuals set boundaries to feel safe, respected and heard.
quotes.author: Pamela Cummins

quotes.quote: Never set limits, go after your dreams, don't be afraid to push the boundaries. And laugh a lot - it's good for you!
quotes.author: Paula Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Every woman that finally figured out her worth has picked up her suitcases of pride and boarded a flight to freedom, which landed in the valley of change.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: A broken soul doesn’t invest in boundaries because the world has crossed them, without mercy.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Confidence is knowing who you are and not changing it a bit because of someone’s version of your reality is not their reality.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The boundary to what we can accept is the boundary to our freedom.
quotes.author: Tarah Brach

quotes.quote: The brain may take advice, but not the heart.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: The difference between successful people and really successful people is that really successful people say ‘No’ to almost everything.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: You need boundaries even in our material creations, boundaries mark the most beautiful of places, between the ocean and the shore, between the mountains and the plains, where the canyon meets the river.
quotes.author: Wm. Paul Young

quotes.quote: There's still something so pure and heartfelt and emotional and genuine about a bouquet of flowers that, even with all the advances of technology and the millions of ways we have to communicate with each other, flowers are still relevant in my opinion.
quotes.author: Vanessa Diffenbaugh

quotes.quote: A human life was measured out in bouquets, was it not? New mothers received them. So did graduating seniors, young lovers, blushing brides, and the dead. A flower woman was time's avatar, colorizing the hours, perfuming fleeting instants.
quotes.author: James K. Morrow

quotes.quote: Can anything be more grotesque and barbarous than our 'florists' bouquets,' a series of concentric rings of flowers of divers colours, bordered by maidenhair and a piece of stiff lace paper, in which stems, leaves, and even petals are brutally crushed, and the grace and individuality of each flower systematically destroyed?
quotes.author: Isabella Bird

quotes.quote: The bouquet was white as a wedding and spoke of prayers, truth, and an unacquainted heart.
quotes.author: Vanessa Diffenbaugh

quotes.quote: Tis better to buy a small bouquet / And give to your friend this very day, / Than a bushel of roses white and red / To lay on his coffin after hes dead.
quotes.author: Traditional Proverb

quotes.quote: He would make a bouquet for a lovely lady; a bouquet gathered off the cheeks of the morning. . . these roses, only half awake, in the defencelessness of utter beauty.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: What this old world needs is more bouquets handed around to folks when they are alive and kicking. Flowers don't do a dead one much good.
quotes.author: ROBERT ELLIOTT GONZALES

quotes.quote: At break of day I feel as if I'm clasping a bouquet of smiling flowers / But the wind of time does not cease blowing / And the hours wilt like falling petals.
quotes.author: Xuân Diệu

quotes.quote: Wouldn't it be well to give some of your bouquets before a man dies, and not go and load down his coffin? He can't enjoy them then.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: Glorious bouquets and storms of applause are the trimmings which every artist naturally enjoys.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: If you look at every flower individually, they look quite miserable. Put them together in a vase and they become a bouquet and that's quite attractive.
quotes.author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quotes.quote: When you have a full bouquet you can't sit back and smell each flower.
quotes.author: Avner Strauss

quotes.quote: Happiness is the art of making a bouquet of those flowers within reach.
quotes.author: Bob Goddard

quotes.quote: Sometimes we need a bouquet of flowers to keep our spirits up–or a pot of bright cyclamen –or photos of flowers to remind us there is more to come.
quotes.author: Bev Drew Kindley

quotes.quote: Plant flowers in others' gardens and your life becomes a bouquet!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: When life hands us a beautiful bouquet of flowers we stare at it in cautious expectation of a bee.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Sometimes an April day will suddenly bring showers / Rain to grow the flowers for her first bouquet
quotes.author: Pat Boone

quotes.quote: A beautiful bouquet or a long-lasting flowering plant is a traditional gift for women, but I have recommended that both men and women keep fresh flowers in the home for their beauty, fragrance, and the lift they give our spirits.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.quote: Always keep that happy attitude. Pretend that you are holding a beautiful fragrant bouquet.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Spring is a time to make up a big bouquet of flowers for someone you love, or are trying to love, or are in love with.
quotes.author: Carew Papritz

quotes.quote: Take one flower that you like and get lots of them. And don't try to 'arrange' them. It's surprisingly hard to do a flower arrangement the way a florist does one. Instead, bunch them all together or put them in a series of small vases all down the table.
quotes.author: Ina Garten

quotes.quote: I have here only made a nosegay of culled flowers, and have brought nothing of my own but the thread that tied them together.
quotes.author: Michel Eyquem De Montaigne

quotes.quote: We went to buy you two flowers, but neither of us thought just one bouquet would do it.
quotes.author: Jamie McGuire

quotes.quote: I would far rather have two or three lilies of the valley gathered for me by a person I like, than the most expensive bouquet that could be bought!
quotes.author: Elisabeth Gaskell

quotes.quote: In Hollywood, brides keep the bouquets and throw away the groom.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: He who throws bouquets at himself need lose no sleep over the florist's bill.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: One flower maketh not a bouquet.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Whiskey is by far the most popular of all remedies that won't cure a cold.
quotes.author: Jerry Vale

quotes.quote: I like my whisky old and my women young.
quotes.author: Errol Flynn

quotes.quote: Always drink your whiskey with your gun hand, to show your friendly intentions.
quotes.author: Scottish Klondiker Proverb

quotes.quote: Bourbon does for me what the piece of cake did for Proust.
quotes.author: Walker Percy

quotes.quote: Whisky is liquid sunshine.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: There is no bad whiskey. There are only some whiskeys that aren't as good as others.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: There is no bad whiskey. There are only some whiskeys that aren't as good as others.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Too much of anything is bad, but too much good whiskey is barely enough.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Logic, like whiskey, loses its beneficial effect when taken in too large quantities.
quotes.author: Lord Dunsany

quotes.quote: Whiskey, like a beautiful woman, demands appreciation. You gaze first, then it's time to drink.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Courage is a vitamin best swallowed with whiskey.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: If I cannot drink Bourbon and smoke cigars in Heaven than I shall not go.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Always carry a flagon of whiskey in case of snakebite and furthermore always carry a small snake.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: If it's not bourbon or sweatpants, it's going in the garbage. No, don't get creative. Now is not a creative time. Now is a bourbon and sweatpants time.
quotes.author: Justin Halpern

quotes.quote: A man can take a little bourbon without getting drunk, but if you hold his mouth open and pour in a quart, he's going to get sick on it.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: Creativity is 80% bourbon and 20% ice.
quotes.author: Jack Doom

quotes.quote: One Bourbon, One Scotch, and One Beer.
quotes.author: John Lee

quotes.quote: Bourbon, though, is a shapeshifter. It can be a refined drink or it can be rough, depending on how it's served and who's drinking it.
quotes.author: Reid Mitenbuler

quotes.quote: Bourbon connects us to a past that was somehow less complicated, and we've turned to it for relief from modern confusion.
quotes.author: Reid Mitenbuler

quotes.quote: Bourbon is a comfort food. As the world becomes more complex, bourbon remains simple--its foundation is little more than a balanced combination of grains, mostly composed of corn, that us fermented and distilled into alcohol.
quotes.author: Reid Mitenbuler

quotes.quote: Bourbon refuses to be rushed--drinking it is an exercise in slow sipping, just letting the concentrated bursts of honey, spice, and vanilla flavors unwind on your tongue.
quotes.author: Reid Mitenbuler

quotes.quote: But even though bourbon connects us to the bedrock values of our past, the stories used to establish our ideas of heritage and authenticity are not always what they seem, as the story behind the 1964 resolution demonstrates.
quotes.author: Reid Mitenbuler

quotes.quote: The story of bourbon is recorded in many lively pages of our history. American whisky is intimately associated with valor and splendor and the graces of life; with villainy and folly.
quotes.author: Gerald Carson

quotes.quote: Tobacco farming is on its way out, and the state's dominance in the horse industry has been losing ground. But bourbon is here to stay.
quotes.author: Edward Lee

quotes.quote: Bourbon may be the new favorite of the bold young mixologists of today, but it is still made by the same kind of resilient people who have kept it alive for all these generations.
quotes.author: Edward Lee

quotes.quote: Blackberries and thyme are a great pairing, and they paly nicely together with the bourbon. This is elegant contemporary, and a great way to celebrate an old classic.
quotes.author: Edward Lee

quotes.quote: The gift of bourbon does not end with the libation. The old barrels still have an abundance of flavor let in them, and they are used to add a bourbon touch to everything from scotch to beer to hot sauce.
quotes.author: Edward Lee

quotes.quote: Bourbon transcends ingredients and brand names. It embodies a culture, a feeling, and a sense of unity that draws friends together and brings foes to peace.
quotes.author: Fred Minnick

quotes.quote: But with greatness comes misunderstanding. Despite being a core piece of Americana and instrumental in the US tax economy, bourbon is the most misunderstood product on liquor store shelves.
quotes.author: Fred Minnick

quotes.quote: Bourbon itself has no age requirement, but to be labeled straight bourbon it must be at least two years old.
quotes.author: Fred Minnick

quotes.quote: All bourbon us whiskey, but not all whiskey is bourbon.
quotes.author: Fred Minnick

quotes.quote: We are living in perhaps the most exciting time in bourbon history, both from a business perspective and because of the wealth of consumer options.
quotes.author: Fred Minnick

quotes.quote: Bourbon signifies coming together with family and friends, slowing down to savor moments of sweetness and joy. Celebration. Connection. Reward.
quotes.author: Lynn Marie Hulsman

quotes.quote: One sip of warming bourbon gives me a Christmassy feeling, the spicy heat teasing out memories of the fragrant liquor.
quotes.author: Lynn Marie Hulsman

quotes.quote: Bourbon was a natural partner to the sweet and bitter nuances of this holiday favorite.
quotes.author: Lynn Marie Hulsman

quotes.quote: Bourbon is Kentucky's true state drink.
quotes.author: Lynn Marie Hulsman

quotes.quote: I enjoy pairing bourbon with foods that offer a black slate, so both the aroma and the flavor have the chance to pop.
quotes.author: Lynn Marie Hulsman

quotes.quote: For distillers, summer is the season when whiskey warms in the warehouse intermingling with the toasted oak of the never-used barrels and absorbing the flavors of vanilla, cloves, coconut, and caramel. The flavors gained in this process make bourbon unique in the whiskey-making world.
quotes.author: Albert W.A. Schmid

quotes.quote: Summer is also when corn, bourbon's primary ingredient, is grown.
quotes.author: Albert W.A. Schmid

quotes.quote: Good corn also makes good bourbon.
quotes.author: Albert W.A. Schmid

quotes.quote: For the bourbon drinker, a highlight of summer is bourbon served over ice and the food that goes with it.
quotes.author: Albert W.A. Schmid

quotes.quote: Bourbon whiskey is many things to many people--a family business, an ingredient in mint juleps, Kentucky's signature industry.
quotes.author: Berkeley Scott

quotes.quote: Bourbon can be made in other states, but Kentucky has not only the tradition of fine bourbon-making, but also the perfect climate conditions and natural resources needed for excelling at the production of bourbon.
quotes.author: Berkeley Scott

quotes.quote: Bourbon is no longer made in the country that gave the amber-colored whiskey its name.
quotes.author: Berkeley Scott

quotes.quote: There's nothing mysterious about the art of tasting bourbon. Some bourbons are best enjoyed neat, others with a splash of water; still others lend themselves to mixing cocktails.
quotes.author: Susan Reigler

quotes.quote: Bourbon whisky is the best brown liquor on God's green earth. It comes from fermenting grains such as corn, wheat, rye, and barley.
quotes.author: Editors of Southern Living Magazine

quotes.quote: Whisky has but three ingredients: water, grain, and yeast. But it's how bourbon whisky is distilled and aged that truly sets it apart as the great American spirit.
quotes.author: Editors of Southern Living Magazine

quotes.quote: Some people have their own bowling ball and their own bowling shoes... and no friends.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: I'm a bowling pin, even when I fall I'll always stand back up.
quotes.author: Jay Park

quotes.quote: If you could see the insides of bowling ball holes, nobody would ever bowl again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Bowling is not a sport because you have to rent the shoes.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: It's not how you bowl. it's how you roll.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Part of the art of bowling spin is to make the batsman think something special is happening when it isn't.
quotes.author: Shane Warne

quotes.quote: Bowling is like dating...A smooth approach and a great follow through produce great rewards.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Bowling is a sport for people who have talent to spare.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every bowling center should have a house pro.
quotes.author: Don Johnson

quotes.quote: We're goin bowling. If we don't come back, avenge our deaths.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: In bowling and in life, if a person made the spares, the strikes would take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Even if you don't knock down a lot of pins, be sure to strike a pretty pose.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We are all bowlers trying to reach our goals, but once we've hit the correct pin the rest will come tumbling down.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All bowling balls look like they've just received shocking news.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The light you see at the end of the tunnel is the front of an oncoming train.
quotes.author: David Lee Roth

quotes.quote: The bowling alley is the poor man's country club.
quotes.author: Sanford Hansell

quotes.quote: One of the advantages bowling has over golf is that you seldom lose a bowling ball.
quotes.author: Don Carter

quotes.quote: You want perfection, go to a bowling alley!
quotes.author: John Calipari

quotes.quote: Bowling would be more interesting if it were slightly uphill.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: There aren't many millionaires who bowl over 100. Why not? Because they left the bowling league behind to build their fortunes.
quotes.author: Jeff Olson

quotes.quote: Bowling makes me happy like eating infinite bowls of rice!
quotes.author: Yôsuke Kuroda

quotes.quote: I got the bowling ball blues. When I first started bowling. Just a spare was great. My score looked good at 108.
quotes.author: Mack Fields

quotes.quote: We're going bowling for love.
quotes.author: Just Water

quotes.quote: Bowling down the alley with pretty playful sally. Rolling down the alley.
quotes.author: Joe Montgomery

quotes.quote: A bowling alley and lunch counter. Filled with fellas on their lunch break.
quotes.author: The Fiery Furnaces

quotes.quote: Usually one must go to bowling alley to a meet woman of your stature.
quotes.author: John Gielgud

quotes.quote: Fast bowling is an art, like spin bowling.
quotes.author: Kapil Dev

quotes.quote: You want perfection, go to a bowling alley!
quotes.author: John Calipari

quotes.quote: Bowling is not a sport because you have to rent the shoes.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Bowling, I like bowling. I’ve been getting into this bowling thing. It’s kinda fun.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: Having children is like having a bowling alley installed in your brain.
quotes.author: Martin Mull

quotes.quote: You can never find the right bowling ball. This one’s too heavy. This one’s good but its pink!
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: Bowling is so retro, it's post-modern.
quotes.author: Blaine Harden

quotes.quote: That's the first thing they teach you in bowling, by the way. Don't press the ball against your nose. The other one is don't lick the pins.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: Bowling is a game of mistakes. Generally, whoever makes the fewest comes out the best.
quotes.author: Earl Anthony

quotes.quote: There's something so familial and intimate between a boxer and his trainer.
quotes.author: Jimmy Smits

quotes.quote: To be a boxer is to be within yourself, inside your thoughts and feelings.
quotes.author: Brian D'Ambrosio

quotes.quote: In boxing, it is about the obsession of getting the most from yourself: wanting to dominate the world like a hungry young lion.
quotes.author: Anthony Joshua

quotes.quote: As a boxer, you have to put risk in to get to another level.
quotes.author: Nonito Donaire

quotes.quote: To be knocked out doesn't mean what it seems. A boxer does not have to get up.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: A boxer must exercise and develop every part of his body.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.quote: The life of a boxer is about fighting for world titles.
quotes.author: Roberto Duran

quotes.quote: A boxer is like a lion, the greatest predator on land, but you throw him in the shark tank and he's just another meal.
quotes.author: Renzo Gracie

quotes.quote: When you're a boxer, there is a lot of downtime and long periods of inactivity.
quotes.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quotes.quote: The mere fact that a boxer covers his face never means that he is much afraid of his opponent. A good punch will give a better explanation for his action!
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: A boxer never sees the big one that hits him.
quotes.author: George Foreman

quotes.quote: Just like a boxer can't win without a few punches on his face, a student can't be fully trained without ups and downs.
quotes.author: Pawan Mishra

quotes.quote: A boxer makes a comeback for two reasons: either he's broke or he needs the money.
quotes.author: Alan Minter

quotes.quote: No boxer in the history of boxing has had Parkinson's. There's no injury in my brain that suggests that the illness came from boxing.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Boxers, like prostitutes, are in the business of ruining their bodies for the pleasure of strangers.
quotes.author: Wayne Kelly

quotes.quote: Give a girl a boyfriend and she becomes a total expert on relationships.
quotes.author: Cecily von Ziegesar

quotes.quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: A TRUE boyfriend is someone that will take care of his girlfriend, stand up for her when needed and love her for who she is and not pretend to care about her!
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
quotes.author: Angela Lim

quotes.quote: Never laugh at your girlfriend's choices. You are one of them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: My heart made it's choice, and it chose you.
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: I cannot imagine a life in your absence. You are like the breathe of air that I need to live, the drop of water in a thirsty desert. I need you like a bird needs the skies to go higher.
quotes.author: Constantine Jake

quotes.quote: We come to love not by finding a perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: If you fight like a married couple, talk like bestfriends, flirt like first lovers, protect each other like siblings, you're meant to be.
quotes.author: Tyga

quotes.quote: When I am with you I don't need the warmth of a jacket or the light from a bulb; you are like a flame that gives me soft warmth and perfect light.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I always have many roads to travel, but I take the one which leads to you.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: If he...makes you laugh. Kisses your forehead. Says he's sorry. Makes an effort. Holds your hand. Works hard. Attempts to underhand you then, believe it or not, he's quite perfect.
quotes.author: Vicki Carnley

quotes.quote: Someone who really loves you sees what a mess you can be, how moody you can get, how hard you are to handle, but still wants you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
quotes.author: Moulin Rouge

quotes.quote: When a girl thinks of her future with her boyfriend, it's normal. But when the boy thinks of his future with his girlfriend, he's serious.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To me, you were more than just a person. You were a place where I finally felt at home.
quotes.author: Denice Enval

quotes.quote: Do not just look at your boyfriend as just a boyfriend. Look at him as a friend, too.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.quote: Bad boyfriends don't disguise themselves; their girlfriends do it for them.
quotes.author: Laurie Notaro

quotes.quote: A real boyfriend and girlfriend stand by each other's side on good days and stands even closer on bad days no matter what.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A guy who really loves a girl and thinks of her as his future wife, he will introduce her to all his friends and family. To tell his every relative that this is the one girl he will spend all his life with.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed but my soul.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Anyone can be passionate, but it takes real lovers to be silly.
quotes.author: Rose Franken

quotes.quote: Two souls share a single thought as both hearts beat as one.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love. Women like to be a man's last romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: You are the best thing that's ever been mine.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: The first best person in your life is yourself, the second best is another who believes in you.
quotes.author: Denise Grasso

quotes.quote: I think of you only twice a day—when I am alone and when I am with someone else.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Every girl deserves a guy that could make her smile even when she doesn't want to.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Meeting you was fate, becoming your friend was a choice, but falling in love with you was beyond my control.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I didn't choose you, my heart did.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The boyfriends who still hold bags, open doors, tell their girlfriends they're beautiful and shows respect are real men.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Husbands and boyfriends are nice accessories, but girlfriends are the essential must-haves of life.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: Don't leave a piece of jewelry at his house so you can go back and get it later; he may be with his real girlfriend.
quotes.author: Amy Sedaris

quotes.quote: Romantic love is a mental illness. But it's a pleasurable one. It's a drug. It distorts reality, and that's the point of it. It would be impossible to fall in love with someone that you really saw...what starts love is your ability to stupefy and blind yourself to the point of being able to fall in love. What stops it is waking up.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Romantic love is not only a necessary illusion, it is a desirable deception. Naturally, if we enter that illusion without an imagination for poetry and music, we may literally play the fool as love buffets us; but if we appreciate its theatrics, we could be profoundly deepened by it...It is one of the most powerful and most effective forms of soul-making.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: A man in love is incomplete until he has married, then he is finished.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: I judge how a man cares for a woman by the space he allots her under a jointly shared umbrella.
quotes.author: Jimmy Cannon

quotes.quote: Women fall in love when they get to know you. Men are just the opposite. when they finally know you, they're ready to leave.
quotes.author: James Salter

quotes.quote: Romantic love has taken precedence over all other relationships, probably because it offers an escape from reality. It's a complete con, of course, because it doesn't last, and anyone who says it does is lying.
quotes.author: Emma Thompson

quotes.quote: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Let us always meet each other with a smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Foch

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If you do not love me I shall not be loved. If I do not love you I shall not love.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: People happy in love have an air of intensity.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: I love you, and because I love you, I would sooner have you hate me for telling you the truth than adore me for telling you lies.
quotes.author: Pietro Aretino

quotes.quote: Romantic love is ephemeral and occasionally unavoidable...like the viral flu.
quotes.author: Marcia Froelke Coburn

quotes.quote: In real love, you want the other person's good. In romantic love, you want the other person.
quotes.author: Margaret Anderson

quotes.quote: Him that I love, I wish to be free—even from me.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: I love you so passionately, that I hide a great part of my love, not to oppress you with it.
quotes.author: Madame de Sevigne

quotes.quote: Love is not what we become, but what we already are.
quotes.author: Levine

quotes.quote: I shall be great and you rich, because we love each other.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Oh, my Luve's like a red, red rose / That's newly sprung in June: / O, my Luve's like the melodie / That's sweetly played in tune.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Being pursued, while easy, is purposeful. Intentional. Deliberate. It's not about getting a guy's attention--it's a process of ensuring that he's the one. Of all the men holding glass slippers, he has to be your perfect fit.
quotes.author: Bethany Jett

quotes.quote: Your boyfriend shouldn't be your only friend.
quotes.author: Bethany Jett

quotes.quote: Do not just look at your boyfriend as just a boyfriend. Look at him as a friend, too.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.quote: Guys make me feel secure and comfortable when I'm scared or need attention. They bring stability. And affection. And fun. And drama. You learn so much from a boyfriend. It's hard to put into words, I guess.
quotes.author: Hilary Duff

quotes.quote: True love does not come by finding the perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.author: Jason Jordan

quotes.quote: If he loves you then don't waste that, you might never be able to get it back.
quotes.author: Laurel

quotes.quote: Every time I hear your voice, I hear another reason to keep you forever.
quotes.author: Suzanne

quotes.quote: I seem to have loved you in numberless forms, numberless times, in life after life, in age after age forever.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: A TRUE boyfriend is someone that will take care of his girlfriend, stand up for her when needed and love her for who she is and not pretend to care about her!
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: No relationship is perfect nor will anyone ever be the best boyfriend or girlfriend. Long as you put in the effort and try to make your lover happy. That's all we can ask for.
quotes.author: Kevin McCarty

quotes.quote: If I was your boyfriend, I'd never let you go, keep you in my arms girl, you'd never be alone, and I could be a gentlemen anything you want, if I was your boyfriend.
quotes.author: Justin Bieber

quotes.quote: What's the difference between a boyfriend and a husband? About 30 pounds.
quotes.author: Cindy Gardner

quotes.quote: Save a boyfriend for a rainy day and another, in case it doesn't rain.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: A friend will tell you she saw your old boyfriend and he's a priest.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Boyfriends weren't friends at all, they were prizes, escorts, symbols of achievement, fascinating strangers, the Other
quotes.author: Susan Allen Toth

quotes.quote: Boyfriends come and go but friends are forever
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love having boyfriends. A girl can wait for the right man to come along - but in the meantime that doesn't mean she can't have a wonderful time with all the wrong ones.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: I've had enough boyfriends and enough issues. I'd seen enough train wrecks.
quotes.author: Taylor Dayne

quotes.quote: I'm quite sensitive to women. I saw how my sister got treated by boyfriends. I read this thing that said when you are in a relationship with a woman, imagine how you would feel if you were her father. That's been my approach, for the most part.
quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

quotes.quote: A good boyfriend loves his girl with all his heart. He isn't afraid to point his girl in front of his friends and say, "that's my baby."
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When I am with you, the only place I want to be is closer
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: Sometimes your nearness takes my breath away; and all the things I want to say can find no voice. Then, in silence, I can only hope my eyes will speak my heart
quotes.author: Robert Sexton

quotes.quote: There's this place in me where your fingerprints still rest, your kisses still linger, and your whispers softly echo. It's the place where a part of you will forever be a part of me
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Come live in my heart, and pay no rent.
quotes.author: Samuel Lover

quotes.quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Sometimes I can't see myself when I'm with you. I can only just see you.
quotes.author: Jodi Lynn Anderson

quotes.quote: I am catastrophically in love with you.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: I knew the second I met you that there was something about you I needed. Turns out it wasn't something about you at all. It was just you.
quotes.author: Jamie McGuire

quotes.quote: Adolescence is a period of rapid changes. Between the ages of 12 and 17, for example, a parent ages as much as 20 years
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Boyhood proves that there's still good roles for women over 40, as long as you get hired when you're under 40.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: Adolescence is perhaps nature's way of preparing parents to welcome the empty nest.
quotes.author: Karen Savage

quotes.quote: Adolescence is like having only enough light to see the step directly in front of you.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: One of the hardest conditions of boyhood is the almost continuous strain put upon the powers of invention by the constant and harassing necessity for explanations for every natural act.
quotes.author: Booth Tarkington

quotes.quote: A sportswriter is entombed in a prolonged boyhood.
quotes.author: Jimmy Cannon

quotes.quote: We'd drifted too far to rely on the old boyhood telepathy anymore.
quotes.author: Richard Powers

quotes.quote: As a teenager you are at the last stage in your life when you will be happy to hear that the phone is for you.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Boyhood is the longest time in life for a boy. The last term of the school-year is made of decades, not of weeks, and living through them is like waiting for the millennium.
quotes.author: Booth Tarkington

quotes.quote: Boyhood, like measles, is one of those complaints which a man should catch young and have done with, for when it comes in middle life it is apt to be serious.
quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Adolescents are not monsters. They are just people trying to learn how to make it among the adults in the world, who are probably not so sure themselves.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.quote: That toil of growing up; The ignominy of boyhood; the distress Of boyhood changing into man; The unfinished man and his pain.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: At some point, you're no longer growing up, you're aging. But no one can pinpoint that moment exactly.
