quotes.author: Richard Linklater

quotes.quote: For to a boy it can seem that he shall never have what he alone has never had.
quotes.author: Pier Paolo Pasolini

quotes.quote: Fatherhood is the unending imperfect task of turning yourself into your dad while secretly maintaining the unbridled elation of your boyhood.
quotes.author: Chris Hadfield

quotes.quote: No matter what happens, always keep your childhood innocence. It's the most important thing.
quotes.author: Federico Fellini

quotes.quote: To the man grown the long crowded mile of his boyhood becomes less than the throw of a stone.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Boyhood is a most complex and incomprehensible thing. Even when one has been through it, one does not understand what it was. A man can never quite understand a boy, even when he has been the boy.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The difference between a childhood and a boyhood must be this: our childhood is what we alone have had; our boyhood is what any boy in our environment would have had.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: There isn't a child who hasn't gone out into the brave new world who eventually doesn't return to the old homestead carrying a bundle of dirty clothes.
quotes.author: Art Buchwald

quotes.quote: Childhood is the one story that stands by itself in every soul.
quotes.author: Ivan Doig

quotes.quote: No human being, past the thoughtless age of boyhood, will wantonly murder any creature which holds its life by the same tenure that he does.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When you're a boy your life can be measured out as a series of uncomfortable conversations reluctantly initiated by adults in an effort to tell you things that you either already know or really don't want to know.
quotes.author: Ben Aaronovitch

quotes.quote: An idyllic childhood is probably illusion.
quotes.author: Martha Grimes

quotes.quote: If boyhood and youth are but vanity, must it not be our ambition to become men?
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Boyhood is distracted for years with precepts of grammar that are infinitely prolix, perplexed and obscure.
quotes.author: John Amos Comenius

quotes.quote: Anybody who has survived his childhood has enough information about life to last him the rest of his days.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: The fundamental condition of childhood is powerlessness.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.quote: Boys do not leave their boyhood behind when they leave off their school uniform.
quotes.author: Diane Setterfield

quotes.quote: Childhood should be carefree, playing in the sun; not living a nightmare in the darkness of the soul.
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.quote: Oh, for boyhood's painless play, sleep that wakes in laughing day, health that mocks the doctor's rules, knowledge never learned of schools.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: He who sings the praises of his boyhood's days.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Boys are beyond the range of anybody's sure understanding, at least when they are between the ages of 18 months and 90 years.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Give a boy address and accomplishments and you give him the mastery of palaces and fortunes where he goes.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: One of the best things in the world to be is a boy; it requires no experience, but needs some practice to be a good one.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: There comes a time in every rightly constructed boy's life that he has a raging desire to go somewhere and dig for hidden treasure.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A boy is a magical creature - you can lock him out of your workshop, but you can't lock him out of your heart.
quotes.author: Allan Beck

quotes.quote: The moment a little boy is concerned with which is a jay and which is a sparrow, he can no longer see the birds or hear them sing.
quotes.author: Eric Berne

quotes.quote: The boy gathers materials for a temple, and then when he is thirty, concludes to build a woodshed.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A boy can learn a lot from a dog: obedience, loyalty, and the importance of turning around three times before lying down.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: A boy's story is the best that is ever told.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than a boy who hates you: a boy that loves you.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: Boys were so proud - you always had to let them think they were good at things.
quotes.author: Diane Zahler

quotes.quote: Boys will never understand how much their small words can affect a girl.
quotes.author: Farah Mustafa

quotes.quote: A boy carries out suggestions more wholeheartedly when he understands their aim.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: Boys will be boys. And even that wouldn't matter if only we could prevent girls from being girls.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: The boy who expects every morning to open into a new world finds that today is like yesterday, but he believes tomorrow will be different.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: Every genuine boy is a rebel and an anarch. If he were allowed to develop according to his own instincts, his own inclinations, society would undergo such a radical transformation as to make the adult revolutionary cower and cringe.
quotes.author: John Andrew Holmes

quotes.quote: A boy cannot begin playing ball too early. I might almost say that while he is still creeping on all fours he should have a bouncing rubber ball.
quotes.author: Christy Mathewson

quotes.quote: The boys are in such a mood that if someone introduced the Ten Commandments, they'd cut them down to seven.
quotes.author: Norris Cotton

quotes.quote: No one knows how it is that with one glance a boy can break through into a girl's heart.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: A fairly bright boy is far more intelligent and far better company than the average adult.
quotes.author: John B. S. Haldane

quotes.quote: The fact that boys are allowed to exist at all is evidence of a remarkable Christian forbearance among men.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: I am convinced that every boy, in his heart, would rather steal second base than an automobile.
quotes.author: Thomas Campbell Clark

quotes.quote: There is nothing so aggravating as a fresh boy who is too old to ignore and too young to kick.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: The bad boy: always more fun.
quotes.author: Ian Mcshane

quotes.quote: A boy is naturally full of humor.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: Boys don't make passes at female smart-asses.
quotes.author: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.quote: Boys don't cry'or at least that's what everybody's supposed to believe.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: Boys always make things more complicated.
quotes.author: Katrina Abbott

quotes.quote: In Scouting, a boy is encouraged to educate himself instead of being instructed.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: A boy's will is the wind's will, / And the thoughts of youth are long, long thoughts.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Of all the animals, the boy is most unmanageable.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Boys are unpredictable. This maybe not be news, but I'm starting to think it's one of the best things about them.
quotes.author: Kate Brian

quotes.quote: Schoolboys are a merciless race, individually they are angels, but together, especially in schools, they are often merciless.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Men get opinions as boys learn to spell by reiteration chiefly.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: When the gender role starts to descend, boys get into the masculine box.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Boys do not leave their boyhood behind when they leave off their school uniform.
quotes.author: Diane Setterfield

quotes.quote: A boy knows not fire till it burns him.
quotes.author: Hausan Proverb

quotes.quote: A lazy boy and a warm bed are difficult to part.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Boys will become men, and then men boys.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Do not entrust a sword to a boy.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: Send a boy where he wants to go and you see his best pace.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: The smallest boy always carries the biggest fiddle.
quotes.author: Cambodian Proverb

quotes.quote: Train a boy strictly, but a girl kindly.
quotes.author: Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: Two boys are half a boy, and three boys are no boy at all.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: While the boy is young, you can see the man.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: All you're supposed to do is every once in a while give the boys a little tea and sympathy.
quotes.author: Robert Anderson

quotes.quote: Keep the Home-fires burning, / While your hearts are yearning, / Though your lads are far away / They dream of Home. / There's a silver lining / Through the dark cloud shining; / Turn the dark cloud inside out, / Till the boys come Home.
quotes.author: Lena Guilbert Ford

quotes.quote: There's a happy time coming, / When the boys come home. / There's a glorious day coming, / When the boys come home. / We will end the dreadful story / Of this treason dark and gory / In a sunburst of glory, / When the boys come home.
quotes.author: John Hay

quotes.quote: Where are they?--the friends of my childhood enchanted-- / The clear, laughing eyes looking back in my own, / And the warm, chubby fingers my palms have so wanted, / As when we raced over / Pink pastures of clover, / And mocked the quail's whir and the bumblebee's drone? / Have the breezes of time blown their blossomy faces / Forever adrift down the years that are flown? / Am I never to see them romp back to their places, / Where over the meadow, / In sunshine and shadow, / The meadow-larks trill, and the bumblebees drone?
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: Bragging is not an attractive trait, but let's be honest. A man who catches a big fish doesn't go home through an alley.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: The feller that brags about how cheap he heats his home always sees the first robin.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: He who is humble is confident and wise. He who brags is insecure and lacking.
quotes.author: Lisa Edmondson

quotes.quote: If you done it, it ain't bragging.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Tell me what you brag about and I'll tell you what you lack.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: He who truly knows has no occasion to shout.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: It's not bragging if you can back it up.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: A braggart is recognized by his headgear.
quotes.author: Namibian Proverb

quotes.quote: You have to do a little bragging on yourself even to your relatives-man doesn't get anywhere without advertising.
quotes.author: John Nance Garner

quotes.quote: The biggest challenge after success is shutting up about it.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Who knows himself a braggart, let him fear this, for it will come to pass that every braggart shall be found an ass.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You have to give yourself credit, not too much because that would be bragging.
quotes.author: Frank McCourt

quotes.quote: If I cannot brag of knowing something, then I brag of not knowing it; at any rate, brag.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If I seem to boast more than is becoming, my excuse is that I brag for humanity rather than for myself.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The dog who barks the loudest is not always the best watcher, neither are braggadocios the most valiant.
quotes.author: William Scott Downey

quotes.quote: The only way to cure an egotist from bragging is by surgery--amputation at the neck.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Perhaps the less we have, the more we are required to brag.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Mankind in general seem to take about as much pride in bragging of their faults as of their virtues.
quotes.author: H. W. SHAW

quotes.quote: Bragging is an ailment,Bragging is a blight;Bragging is an attributeOf a silly wight.
quotes.author: RALPH M. THOMSON

quotes.quote: Don't brag. It is not the whistle that moves the train.
quotes.author: D. V. Rangarajan

quotes.quote: With a braggart, it's no sooner done than said.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Now I'm not too keen about bragging on myself but you must admit I was the best.
quotes.author: Kim S. Jones

quotes.quote: It ain't bragging if you can do it.
quotes.author: Dizzy Dean

quotes.quote: Blow your own horn loud. If you succeed, people will forgive your noise; if you fail, they'll forget it.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Great boast, small roast.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: There is also this benefit in brag, that the speaker is unconsciously expressing his own ideal. Humor him by all means, draw it all out, and hold him to it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: People never have confidence in a Big Talker. They know his statements must be cut down, but they can never tell how much.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Noise proves nothing. Often a hen who has merely laid an egg cackles as if she had laid an asteroid.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It's as difficult to be rich without bragging as it is to be poor without complaining.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: Every man who praises himself brushes the luster from his best efforts.
quotes.author: Ellen Gould White

quotes.quote: Bragging saves advertising.
quotes.author: American Proverbs

quotes.quote: It is far more impressive when others discover your good qualities without your help.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: Do you wish men to speak well of you? Then never speak well of yourself.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Be wiser than other people, if you can, but do not tell them so.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: It isn't what a man knows, but what he thinks he knows that he brags about.
quotes.author: George Horace Lorimer

quotes.quote: For God hates utterly the bray of bragging tongues.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Mere flimflam stories, and nothing but shams and lies.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Do not boast about tomorrow, for you do not know what a day may bring forth.
quotes.author: Bible, Proverbs 27:1

quotes.quote: Bragging: The patter of tiny feats.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A loaded wagon makes no noise.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Empty vessels make most noise.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The person who has nothing to brag about but their ancestors is like a potato; the best part of them is underground.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Overbury

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as bragging. You're either lying or telling the truth.
quotes.author: Al Oliver

quotes.quote: Boasts are wind and deeds are hard.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: A person is bound to lose when he talks about himself; if he belittles himself, he is believed; if he praises himself, he isn't believed.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Its not bragging if its true.
quotes.author: Sara Shepard

quotes.quote: You have to give yourself credit, not too much because that would be bragging.
quotes.author: Frank McCourt

quotes.quote: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The really tough thing about humility is you can't brag about it.
quotes.author: Gene Brown

quotes.quote: What kills a skunk is the publicity it gives itself.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: You need to be a billionaire with a TV show to make bragging funny, and if you aren't, you just look like an ass.
quotes.author: Christopher Bedford

quotes.quote: The more time I have spent on famous rivers, the less I have enjoyed the angling. The trouble with big fish is that they attract people who are interested in bragging.
quotes.author: M.R. Montgomery

quotes.quote: Why was I repulsed by some people's bragging behaviors, yet could tolerate—heck, in some special cases, was riveted by — other's? What was it that distinguished a repellent brag from a palatable one.
quotes.author: Karan Tewari

quotes.quote: Bragging done right was found to be good for one's career or business.
quotes.author: Renee Weisman

quotes.quote: Contrary to many people would expect, those who bragged about themselves were actually seen as more competent and less of a braggart than those who bragged about others.
quotes.author: Renee Weisman

quotes.quote: A job is not done well unless you speak for yourself.
quotes.author: Renee Weisman

quotes.quote: If you can't brag of knowing something, then brag of not knowing it. At any rate brag.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Start bragging... If you don't speak up for yourself, who will?
quotes.author: Financial Times

quotes.quote: But...bragging is egocentric, disgusting, obnoxious, self-aggrandizing, and just plain wrong.
quotes.author: Peggy Klaus

quotes.quote: Bragging is a necessity— not a choice— you want to do more than just exist in a job; that is, be successful in your eyes and to others. It isn't conceit; it is being forthcoming about who you are, what you have done, and what you are capable of doing.
quotes.author: Caitlin Williams

quotes.quote: At its core, bragging is a very individual form of self-expression and communication.
quotes.author: Peggy Klaus

quotes.quote: Bragging better is using the facts to shine and tell the truth about the work you've done.
quotes.author: Meredith Fineman

quotes.quote: A session of boasting won't attract any real friends. It will set you up on a pedestal, however, making you a clearer target.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: A good deed is not a good deed if you brag about it.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Bernardo

quotes.quote: Some of the people who are showing off their speed are headed in the wrong direction.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Bragging about yourself violates norms of modesty and politeness - and if you were really competent, your work would speak for itself.
quotes.author: Adam Grant

quotes.quote: Braggarts are insecure and need attention, and bragging often has the opposite effect on most people when you're trying to gain their respect and increase your influence.
quotes.author: Mark Goulston

quotes.quote: There is a difference between conceit and confidence. Conceit is bragging about yourself. Confidence means you believe you can get the job done.
quotes.author: Johnny Unitas

quotes.quote: Bragging is often merely a ladder we build for ourselves out of words when we are afraid we are not tall enough in the eyes of the world. It is an unwitting confession to low self-esteem.
quotes.author: P.M. Forni

quotes.quote: Only one man has the right to boast, and that's the man who never does.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Contrary to many people would expect, those who bragged about themselves were actually seen as more competent and less of a braggart than those who bragged about others.
quotes.author: D. V. Rangarajan

quotes.quote: Bragging is generally considered inappropriate, and if you pat yourself too hard on the back, you are likely to find that others will refuse to do so.
quotes.author: David B. Brinkerhoff

quotes.quote: Bragging is like coughing without covering your mouth. It sends the virus of separateness and arrogance everywhere and makes everyone weaker.
quotes.author: Paul Pearsall

quotes.quote: The human brain starts working the moment you are born and never stops until you stand up to speak in public.
quotes.author: George Jessel

quotes.quote: The brain is a wonderful organ. It starts working the moment you get up in the morning and does not stop until you get into the office.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The human brain is a most unusual instrument of elegant and as yet unknown capacity.
quotes.author: Stuart Seaton

quotes.quote: The human brain is an incredible pattern-matching machine.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: If the human brain were so simple that we could understand it, we would be so simple that we couldn't.
quotes.author: Emerson M. Pugh

quotes.quote: A man's brain has a more difficult time shifting from thinking to feeling than a women's brain does.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: I consider that a man's brain originally is like a little empty attic, and you have to stock it with such furniture as you choose.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: That's your best friend and your worst enemy - your own brain.
quotes.author: Fred Durst

quotes.quote: Don't let your brain interfere with your heart.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The human brain is probably one of the most complex single objects on the face of the earth; I think it is, quite honestly.
quotes.author: Bill Viola

quotes.quote: The emotional brain responds to an event more quickly than the thinking brain.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: The brain is the organ of destiny. It holds within its humming mechanism secrets that will determine the future of the human race.
quotes.author: Wilder Penfield

quotes.quote: The human brain is a funny thing: it's very susceptible to tempo and melody. You put the right words to it, and it becomes very influential.
quotes.author: Ray Stevens

quotes.quote: A brain is only capable of what it could conceive, andit couldnt concieve what it hasnt experienced
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Brain: an apparatus with which we think we think.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Can the brain understand the brain? Can it understand the mind? Is it a giant computer, or some other kind of giant machine, or something more?
quotes.author: David Hubel

quotes.quote: We have a brain for one reason and one reason only - and that's to produce adaptable and complex movements.
quotes.author: Daniel Wolpert

quotes.quote: The softest, freest, most pliable and changeful living substance is the brain -- the hardest and most iron-bound as well.
quotes.author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quotes.quote: The human brain, then, is the most complicated organization of matter that we know.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: The brain is a commodity used to fertilize ideas.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The brain is conceded to be the master organ of the body, the regulator of life, the source of human progress.
quotes.author: Frederick Tilney

quotes.quote: No brain is stronger than its weakest think.
quotes.author: Thomas L. Masson

quotes.quote: The brain is a complex biological organ of great computational capability that constructs our sensory experiences, regulates our thoughts and emotions, and control our actions.
quotes.author: Eric Kandel

quotes.quote: The brain is a muscle of busy hills, the struggle of unthought things with things eternally thought.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: One of the difficulties in understanding the brain is that it is like nothing so much as a lump of porridge.
quotes.author: Richard L. Gregory

quotes.quote: We know the human brain is a device to keep the ears from grating on one another.
quotes.author: Peter Vries

quotes.quote: Fill the brain with high thoughts, highest ideals, place them day and night before you, and out of that will come great work.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: The brain appears to possess a special area which we might call poetic memory and which records everything that charms or touches us, that makes our lives beautiful.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: The brain is an island in an osmotically homogeneous sea.
quotes.author: Francis Daniels Moore

quotes.quote: The brain is highly structured, but it is also extremely flexible. It's not a blank slate, but it isn't written in stone, either.
quotes.author: Alison Gopnik

quotes.quote: Only when our clever brain and our human heart work together in harmony can we achieve our full potential.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: My childhood home I see again, / And gladden with the view; / And still as mem'ries crowd my brain, / There's sadness in it too. / O memory! though mid-way world / 'Twixt Earth and Paradise / Where things decayed, and loved ones lost / In dreamy shadows rise.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The brain may devise laws for the blood, but a hot temper leaps over a cold decree.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Despite past philosophic errors separating mind and body, we now know better. The mind is the brain in action; the brain is an organ of the body. Body, action, and thinking flow along identical biological conduits. The body is an instrument, the mind its function, the witness and regard of its operation.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: The brain has muscles for thinking as the legs have muscles for walking.
quotes.author: Julien Offroy de la Mettrie

quotes.quote: The mind grows and decays with the body.
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: The brain can stifle the expression of basic attributes, sometimes acting to prevent the natural flow of basic drives into creative expression. Thinking can sometimes be dangerous, cutting us off from instinctive behaviors, and even leading us toward species extinction. Have we become too smart? The brain is not an organ to be relied upon. It is developing monstrously. It is swelling like a goitre.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Blok

quotes.quote: The mind is the most capricious of insects—flitting, fluttering.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Don't think! Thinking is the enemy of creativity. It's self-conscious, and anything self-conscious is lousy. You can't try to do things; you simply must do them.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: It is wrong to think that misfortunes come from the east or from the west; they originate within one's own mind. Therefore, it is foolish to guard against misfortunes from the external world and leave the inner mind uncontrolled.
quotes.author: Seo Kyung Bo

quotes.quote: If you can engage people's pride, love, pity, ambition (or whatever is their prevailing passion) on your side, you need not fear what their reason can do against you.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: The more you reason the less you create.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: I was taught that the human brain was the crowning glory of evolution so far, but I think it's a very poor scheme for survival.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr.

quotes.quote: That priceless galaxy of misinformation called the mind.
quotes.author: Djuna Barnes

quotes.quote: I see mysteries and complications wherever I look, and I have never met a steadily logical person.
quotes.author: Martha Gellhorn

quotes.quote: The remarkable thing about the human mind is its range of limitations.
quotes.author: Celia Green

quotes.quote: The greatest intellectual capacities are only found in connection with a vehement and passionate will.
quotes.author: Arthur M. Schlesinger Jr.

quotes.quote: All the unhappy marriages come from the husbands having brains. What good are brains to a man? They only unsettle him.
quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: I used to think the brain was the most important organ in the body, until I realized who was telling me that.
quotes.author: Emo Phillips

quotes.quote: Only the man who finds everything wrong and expects it to get worse is thought to have a clear brain.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: No diet will remove all the fat from your body because the brain is entirely fat. Without a brain, you might look good, but all you could do is run for public office.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Every human brain is born not as a blank tablet (a tabula rasa) waiting to be filled by experience but as an exposed negative waiting to be slipped into developer fluid.
quotes.author: Edward O. Wilson

quotes.quote: A good man can be stupid and still be good. But a bad man must have brains - absolutely.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.quote: You can grow corn or potatoes, but you cannot grow brains. Brains come hard and they come high.
quotes.author: Sir William Osler

quotes.quote: Brains function on a need-to-know basis, and the need-to-know in order to survive on the African plains as hunter-gatherers. It's pure bonus if we manage to understand a bit about relativity and quantum theory as well. I think it's a tremendous privilege that we can understand as much as we can.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: The more you use your brain, the more brain you will have to use.
quotes.author: George A. Dorsey

quotes.quote: Little minds, like weak liquors, are soonest soured.
quotes.author: H. G. Bohn

quotes.quote: The human mind should be like a good hotel—open the year round.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: Purple haze is in my brain / Lately things don't seem the same.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: It has been said that the great events of the world take place in the brain. It is in the brain, and the brain only, that the great sins of the world take place also.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A new public opinion must be created privately and unobtrusively. The existing one is maintained by the press, by propaganda, by organization, and by financial and other influences which are at its disposal. The unnatural way of spreading ideas must be opposed by the natural one, which goes from man to man and relies solely on the truth of the thoughts and the hearer's receptiveness for new truth.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Manipulations of opinion, insofar as they are inspired by well-defined interests, have limited goals; their effect, however, if they happen to touch upon an issue of authentic concern, is no longer subject to their control and may easily produce consequences they never foresaw or intended.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: The brainwashing which has been going on for 150 years has also resulted in the replacement of intellectual activities and religion by ideologies and science.
quotes.author: Carroll Quigley

quotes.quote: Television to brainwash us all and Internet to eliminate any last resistance.
quotes.author: Paul Carvel

quotes.quote: One believes things because one has been conditioned to believe them.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: There is no way to be truly great in this world. We are all impaled on the crook of conditioning.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Intelligent men do not decide any subject until they have carefully examined both or all sides of it. Fools, cowards, and those too lazy to think, accept blindly, without examination, dogmas and doctrines imposed upon them in childhood by their parents, priests, and teachers, when their minds were immature and they could not reason.
quotes.author: James Hervey Johnson

quotes.quote: Almost all people are hypnotics. The proper authority saw to it that the proper belief should be induced, and the people believed properly.
quotes.author: Charles Fort

quotes.quote: It is no coincidence that one cardinal rule in brainwashing is to remove from the victim all photographs of himself and people he has known.
quotes.author: A. D. Coleman

quotes.quote: Propaganda is amazing, people can be led to believe anything.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: As there is no worse lie than a truth misunderstood by those who hear it, so reasonable arguments, challenges to magnanimity, and appeals to sympathy or justice, are folly when we are dealing with human crocodiles and boa-constrictors.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: What is terrifying is the ability, through mass brainwashing or propaganda, to change normal human instinct, which does not necessarily contain very much hatred.
quotes.author: Antony Beevor

quotes.quote: The family that prays together...is brainwashing their children.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: All forms of tampering with human beings, getting at them, shaping them against their will to your own pattern, all thought control and conditioning is, therefore, a denial of that in men which makes them men and their values ultimate.
quotes.author: Isaiah Berlin

quotes.quote: Brainwashing: (a.k.a. thought control, mind control, coercive persuasion). A non-violent method that uses mind control techniques to convince a person to abandon some of their basic beliefs and adopt the beliefs of the indoctrinator.
quotes.author: B.A. Robinson

quotes.quote: If you repeat a lie often enough, people will believe it. It really is public brainwashing and misinformation.
quotes.author: Robert Kane Pappas

quotes.quote: Human beings have an inalienable right to invent themselves; when that right is pre-empted it is called brain-washing.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: If you wish to win a man over to your ideas, first make him your friend.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Brainwashing is defined as an observable set of transactions between a charismatically-structured collectivity and an isolated agent of the collectivity with the goal of transforming the agent into a deployable agent. Brainwashing is thus a process of ideological resocialization carried out within a structure of charismatic authority.
quotes.author: Thomas Robbins

quotes.quote: Propaganda is that branch of the art of lying which consists in nearly deceiving your friends without quite deceiving your enemies.
quotes.author: Francis Macdonald Cornford

quotes.quote: Oral delivery aims at persuasion and making the listener believe they are converted. Few persons are capable of being convinced; the majority allow themselves to be persuaded.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The easiest way to propagandize people is to let a propaganda theme go in through an entertainment picture when people do not realize they are being propagandized.
quotes.author: Elmer Davis

quotes.quote: Propaganda is a soft weapon; hold it in your hands too long, and it will move about like a snake, and strike the other way.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.quote: We have been brainwashed into craving a diet that is killing us. What we believe tastes good is generally what we have been socially conditioned to enjoy.
quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.quote: This is the secret of propaganda: To totally saturate the person, whom the propaganda wants to lay hold of, with the ideas of the propaganda, without him even noticing that he is being saturated.
quotes.author: Paul Watzlawick

quotes.quote: Good advertising can make people buy your product even if it sucks ... A dollar spent on brainwashing is more cost-effective than a dollar spent on product improvement.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Until you realize how easily it is for your mind to be manipulated, you remain the puppet of someone else's game.
quotes.author: Evita Ochel

quotes.quote: In time of war, when truth is so precious, it must be attended by a bodyguard of lies.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The line between education and brainwashing is paper thin.
quotes.author: Yana Toboso

quotes.quote: Branding is the process of connecting good strategy with good creativity.
quotes.author: Marty Neumeier

quotes.quote: Branding is the art of aligning what you want people to think about your company with what people actually do think about your company. And vice-versa.
quotes.author: Jay Baer

quotes.quote: The key to branding, especially for smaller firms, is to focus on a limited number of issue areas and develop superb expertise in those areas.
quotes.author: Philip Kotler

quotes.quote: Never let them give you their own branding upon your name, brand yourself to avoid being falsely branded.
quotes.author: Tare Munzara

quotes.quote: Be intentionally infectious. Make your brand contagiously buzz worthy.
quotes.author: Catrice M. Jackson

quotes.quote: A great brand is a story that's never completely told.
quotes.author: Scott Bedbury

quotes.quote: Don't promote negativity online and expect people to treat you with positivity in person.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: An exceptional brand culture has the effect of a charm, it entices and binds people.
quotes.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quotes.quote: Branding is the art of becoming knowable, likable and trustable.
quotes.author: John Jantsch

quotes.quote: A brand should take into account the customer's total shopping experienceâ€”every contact point is important and should be in accord with the customer expectations.
quotes.author: Daniel C. Felsted

quotes.quote: When people use your brand name as a verb, that is remarkable.
quotes.author: Meg Whitman

quotes.quote: Brands and branding are the most significant gifts that commerce has ever made to popular culture.
quotes.author: Wally Olins

quotes.quote: When you're too concerned about branding, you're restricting yourself.
quotes.author: Nelly Furtado

quotes.quote: Branding is quite an important thing. As an artist, you want to be able to explore facets of yourself.
quotes.author: Nick Offerman

quotes.quote: In an era of transparency, you can have innovation without branding, but you cannot have branding without innovation
quotes.author: Martin Sorrell

quotes.quote: It can be tricky with branding these days, because everything is kind of branded.
quotes.author: Yukimi Nagano

quotes.quote: Determine who you are and what your brand is, and what you're not. The rest of it is just a lot of noise.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Zakarian

quotes.quote: The assumption now is that the interests of the brand and of the game overlap to the degree that cricket need hardly be mentioned.
quotes.author: Gideon Haigh

quotes.quote: Personal brands have become anvils on which great businesses are forged
quotes.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quotes.quote: A brand is a person that has a voice, evokes emotion and spreads a message.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: If you don't build a personal brand, someone else will brand you with the wrong label.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: A great brand is a story that never stops unfolding.
quotes.author: Tony Hsieh

quotes.quote: A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: A branding program should be designed to differentiate your cow from all the other cattle on the range. Even if all the cattle on the range look pretty much alike.
quotes.author: Al Ries

quotes.quote: A brand that captures your mind gains behavior. A brand that captures your heart gains commitment.
quotes.author: Scott Talgo

quotes.quote: Branding is not about what something says or what it means, but how it makes us feel.
quotes.author: Martin Lindstrom

quotes.quote: Branding is the art of becoming knowable, likable and trustable
quotes.author: John Jantsch

quotes.quote: Branding is a profound manifestation of the human condition
quotes.author: Wally Olins

quotes.quote: Personal branding is about figuring who you are and what turns you on and then monetising it
quotes.author: Kelly Cutrone

quotes.quote: Art is wine and experience is the brandy we distill from it.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: If wine tells truth â€“ and so have said the wise, it makes me laugh to think how brandy lies!
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: Brandy is the great cause of destruction for the aborigines of America.
quotes.author: Sam Houston

quotes.quote: As for the Brandy, "Nothing extenuate" And the water, "Put naught in in malice.â€
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: BRANDY, n. A cordial composed on one part thunder-and-lightning, one part remorse, two parts bloody murder, one part death-hell-and-the-grave and four parts clarified Satan.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Call things by their right names - Glass of brandy and water! That is the current, but not the appropriate name, ask for a glass of liquid fire and distilled damnation.
quotes.author: Robert Hall

quotes.quote: Alcoholic drinks, rightly used, are good for body and soul alike, but as a restorative of both there is nothing like brandy.
quotes.author: George Sainsbury

quotes.quote: Brandy and water spoils two good things.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: I hate brandy...it stinks of modern literature.
quotes.author: Harold Pinter

quotes.quote: A man may acquire a taste for wine or brandy, and so lose his love for water, but should we not pity him.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If brandy was made out of sparrows there would soon be no sparrows.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: A shot of brandy can save your life, but a bottle of brandy can kill you.
quotes.author: Cary Grant

quotes.quote: Claret is the liquor for boys; port for men; but he who aspires to be a hero must drink brandy.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: An American monkey, after getting drunk on brandy, would never touch it again, and thus is much wiser than most men.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: The most sensible thing to do to people you hate is to drink their brandy.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: I neither want it [Brandy] nor need it, but I should think it pretty hazardous to interfere with the ineradicable habit of a lifetime.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: And he took another swallow of the brandy, shaking his great fair head like a man who looks forward to the worst.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: So, after three days of incessant brandy-drinking, he had burned out the youth from his blood, he had achieved this kindled state of oneness with all the world, which is the end of youth's most passionate desire.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Brandy, which is fallen and accursed wine, as devils are fallen and accursed angels.
quotes.author: Fitz James O'Brien

quotes.quote: Harris, I am not well; pray get me a glass of brandy.
quotes.author: George IV

quotes.quote: As for the brandy, nothing extenuate; and the water, put nought in it malice.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: To get over the guilt of drinking, take your brandy in milk. This way, it becomes medicinal.
quotes.author: Catherine Cookson

quotes.quote: Now, some recipes put in gin, while others call for brandy, flavored vodka, triple sec, or Cognac. The point here is to give your brew a kick compatible with citrus fruit flavors—and even then, other recipes call for apples in addition to raspberries or blueberries. It's all up to you, amigo.
quotes.author: Steven Kates

quotes.quote: Crazed with avarice, lust and rum, New York, thy name's Delirium.
quotes.author: Byron R. Newton

quotes.quote: When I am an old woman I shall wear purple, with a red hat which doesn't go and doesn't suit me. And I shall spend my pension on brandy and summer gloves, and satin sandals, and say we've no money for butter.
quotes.author: Jenny Joseph

quotes.quote: We all drew on the comfort which is given out by the major works of Mozart, which is as real and material as the warmth given up by a glass of brandy.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: When I see a merchant over-polite to his customers, begging them to taste a little brandy and throwing half his goods on the counter—thinks I, that man has an axe to grind.
quotes.author: Charles Miner

quotes.quote: She's crazier than a rat in a brandy keg.
quotes.author: Eloise Dalton

quotes.quote: Teddy, I'm a Scotch drinker, you know that. I just have the occasional brandy when I'm not drinking.
quotes.author: Jim Naboth

quotes.quote: If this fellow had his way with me, I don't suppose I'd ever have had another brandy and soda. That's a dismal thought, isn't it? You know it hadn't occurred to me before, but this brandy-and-soda business put it into my mind, that being dead must be rather like living in America, you know? It's a dry state.
quotes.author: Lord Montague

quotes.quote: There's some are fou o'love divine; / There's some are fou o'brandy.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: I have something which makes it all bearable, the presents, the in-laws, other people's children, your own children, the games, the noise, the mess, the ridiculous meals. It consists of one part French cooking brandy, one part Irish whiskey and four parts fresh milk. The hard part is remembering to put milk instead of water into your ice cube trays the night before. Drink the mixture immediately on rising, while others are having breakfast or throwing up behind the snowman.
quotes.author: Kingsley Amis

quotes.quote: The brandy went to Whit's stomach like a saber cut.
quotes.author: John Farris

quotes.quote: Deprive him [the habitual reader] of printed matter and he grows nervous, moody and restless; then, like the alcoholic bereft of brandy who will drink shellac or methylated spirit, he will make do with the advertisements of a paper five years old; he will make do with a telephone directory.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Her voice was rich and dark like good brandy, yet somehow lively too, like the very best champagne.
quotes.author: George Garrett

quotes.quote: Hell is full of musical amateurs: music is the brandy of the damned.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I meditate, I do yoga and I have a lot of friends who are healers.....And if none of that works, I go buy a chocolate bar and a bottle of cognac.
quotes.author: Susan Strasberg

quotes.quote: Cognac and cigars... it's like finding the perfect woman. When you've got her, why go chasing after another?
quotes.author: Michael Nouri

quotes.quote: Begin a meal with a good blessing, Johnny. Finish it with a good brandy. And then, you've got something.
quotes.author: Grandma

quotes.quote: There's a girl in this harbor town / And she works layin' whiskey down / They say, Brandy, fetch another round / She serves them whiskey and wine / The sailors say, Brandy, you're a fine girl.
quotes.author: Meredith Quill

quotes.quote: We each have our own escape, you see. Mother her prayers. You, your horses your falcons and your dreams of an age that is no more. And I, my cognac.
quotes.author: Henri

quotes.quote: One does not snort cognac, Klinger. One entices cognac. First, one warms it. Then one lures the scent to the waiting nostrils. One urges it to insinuate its fumes through the joyous olfactory passages.
quotes.author: Maj. Charles Winchester

quotes.quote: Eyes that send me chasing after feelings that I lost one day / Why befriend me when the brandy tells me what they want to say? / Playing big protector is a grand disguise / 'Til you contradict yourself with brandy eyes / No beginning / Still no end to let me shrug and walk away / Silly grinning, teasing talk that promises a kiss some day / I would put you out of mind if I were wise / But wisdom has no power over brandy eyes.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: I used to spend my nights out in a barroom / Liquor was the only love I've known / But you rescued me from reaching for the bottle / And you brought me back from being too far gone / You're as smooth as Tennessee whiskey / You're as sweet as strawberry wine / You're as warm as a glass of brandy / And I stay stoned on your love all the time.
quotes.author: Linda H. Bartholomew and Dean Dillon

quotes.quote: The opposite of bravery is not cowardice but conformity.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: Fear can keep a man out of danger but courage only can support him in it.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Bravery is not a quality of the body. It is of the soul.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Bravery is being the only one who knows you're afraid.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: Cowards die many times before their deaths, the valiant never taste of death but once.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Some have been thought brave because they were afraid to run away.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Valor is stability, not of legs and arms, but of courage and the soul.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as bravery; only degrees of fear.
quotes.author: John Wainwright

quotes.quote: A brave man acknowledges the strength of others.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of your fears. They're not there to scare you. They're there to let you know that something is worth it.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Expose yourself to your deepest fear; after that, fear has no power, and the fear of freedom shrinks and vanishes. You are free.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Bravery is the capacity to perform properly even when scared half to death.
quotes.author: Omar N. Bradley

quotes.quote: In battle it is the cowards who run the most risk; bravery is a rampart of defense.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: A true knight is fuller of bravery in the midst, than in the beginning of danger.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: Physical bravery is an animal instinct; moral bravery is much higher and truer courage.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: The bravest are surely those who have the clearest vision of what is before them, glory and danger alike, and yet notwithstanding, go out to meet it.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: True bravery is shown by performing without witness what one might be capable of doing before all the world.
quotes.author: Franois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: A timid person is frightened before a danger, a coward during the time, and a courageous person afterward.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Boldness is ever blind, for it sees not dangers and inconveniences whence it is bad in council though good in execution.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The brave man is not he who feels no fear, For that were stupid and irrational; But he, whose noble soul its fears subdues, And bravely dares the danger nature shrinks from.
quotes.author: Joanna Baillie

quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: There is no living thing that is not afraid when it faces danger. The true courage is in facing danger when you are afraid.
quotes.author: L. Frank Baum

quotes.quote: Nothing splendid has ever been achieved except by those who dared believe that something inside them was superior to circumstance.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: Moral excellence comes about as a result of habit. We become just by doing just acts, temperate by doing temperate acts, brave by doing brave acts.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: One of the greatest discoveries a man makes, one of his great surprises, is to find he can do what he was afraid he couldn't do.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: No matter how long you train someone to be brave, you never know if they are or not until something real happens.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: I am proud of how brave I have been. I am proud of how brave I am being. I am doing my best and I know that is enough.
quotes.author: Cassie Mendoza-Jones

quotes.quote: It was times like these when I thought my father, who hated guns and had never been to any wars, was the bravest man who ever lived.
quotes.author: Atticus Finch

quotes.quote: Bravery has no place where it can avail nothing.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Brave men go forward not expecting to return.
quotes.author: Bona

quotes.quote: Life is not meant to be easy, my child; but take courage: it can be delightful.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Great crisis produce great men and great deeds of courage.
quotes.author: John F Kennedy

quotes.quote: If it scares you, it might be a good thing to try.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Be brave enough to start a conversation that matters.
quotes.author: Dau Voire

quotes.quote: Being brave means knowing that when you fail, you don't fail forever.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: To live with fear and not be afraid is the final test of maturity.
quotes.author: Edward Weeks

quotes.quote: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Fight till the last gasp.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Bravery is believing in yourself, and that thing nobody can teach you.
quotes.author: El Cordobes

quotes.quote: You can't be brave if you've only had wonderful things happen to you.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.quote: I just don't want to die without a few scars.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Life is either a great adventure or nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The world continues to offer glittering prizes to those who have stout hearts and sharp swords.
quotes.author: F. E. Smith

quotes.quote: Great deeds are usually wrought at great risks.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: Often the test of courage is not to die but to live.
quotes.author: Vittorio Alfieri

quotes.quote: The ideal man bears the accidents of life with dignity and grace, making the best of circumstances.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Trust the still, small voice that says, 'this might work and I'll try it.
quotes.author: Diane Mariechild

quotes.quote: When you jump across a canyon, cautious small steps and vacillation won't work. Sometimes you just have to go for it.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Be proud of how brave you have been, taking a risk and following your dreams.
quotes.author: Cassie Mendoza-Jones

quotes.quote: Scared is what you're feeling. Brave is what you're doing.
quotes.author: Emma Donoghue

quotes.quote: Bran thought about it. 'Can a man still be brave if he's afraid?' 'That is the only time a man can be brave,' his father told him.
quotes.author: Bran Stark

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: I wanted you to see what real courage is, instead of getting the idea that courage is a man with a gun in his hand. It's when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what.
quotes.author: Atticus Finch

quotes.quote: Courage is the most important of all the virtues because without courage, you can't practice any other virtue consistently.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Everyone has talent. What's rare is the courage to follow it to the dark places where it leads.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Confront the dark parts of yourself, and work to banish them with illumination and forgiveness. Your willingness to wrestle with your demons will cause your angels to sing.
quotes.author: August Wilson

quotes.quote: There is a stubbornness about me that never can bear to be frightened at the will of others. My courage always rises at every attempt to intimidate me.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Live the Life of Your Dreams: Be brave enough to live the life of your dreams according to your vision and purpose instead of the expectations and opinions of others.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for.
quotes.author: John A. Shedd

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear - not absence of fear.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Courage is found in unlikely places.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The two hardest tests on the spiritual road are the patience to wait for the right moment and the courage not to be disappointed with what we encounter.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: All happiness depends on courage and work.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Courage isn't having the strength to go on - it is going on when you don't have strength.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: I have accepted fear as part of life – specifically the fear of change... I have gone ahead despite the pounding in the heart that says: turn back....
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: It’s your life; you don’t need someone’s permission to live the life you want. Be brave to live from your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Be Brave and Take Risks: You need to have faith in yourself. Be brave and take risks. You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote:
Life is mostly froth and bubble,
Two things stand like stone.
Kindness in another's trouble,
Courage in your own.
quotes.author: Adam Lindsay Gordon

quotes.quote: No matter how long you train someone to be brave, you never know if they are or not until something real happens.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Have courage for the great sorrows of life and patience for the small ones; and when you have laboriously accomplished your daily task, go to sleep in peace. God is awake.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: A man with outward courage dares to die; a man with inner courage dares to live.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Life is made of so many moments that mean nothing. Then one day, a single moment comes along to define every second that comes after. Such moments are tests of courage, of strength.
quotes.author: Sabaa Tahir

quotes.quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the little voice at the end of the day that says I'll try again tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Real courage is when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: Keep in mind that many people have died for their beliefs; it's actually quite common. The real courage is in living and suffering for what you believe.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is freedom, the secret of freedom is courage.
quotes.author: Carrie Jones

quotes.quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: The strongest people find the courage and caring to help others, even if they are going through their own storm.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Courage is feeling fear, not getting rid of fear, and taking action in the face of fear.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: To share your weakness is to make yourself vulnerable; to make yourself vulnerable is to show your strength.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It is curious that physical courage should be so common in the world and moral courage so rare.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You must be bold, brave, and courageous and find a way... to get in the way.
quotes.author: John Lewis

quotes.quote: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Life is tough, and things don't always work out well, but we should be brave and go on with our lives.
quotes.author: Suga

quotes.quote: A hero is no braver than an ordinary man, but he is brave five minutes longer.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: With the bravery of being out of range / We strafe the train / With the bravery of being out of range / We gain terrain
quotes.author: Roger Waters

quotes.quote: Fill your lives / With love and bravery / And you shall lead / A life uncommon
quotes.author: Jewel Kilcher

quotes.quote: Chase your dreams, and remember me, sweet bravery / 'Cause after all those wings will take you, up so high / So bid the forest floor goodbye as you race the wind / And take to the sky (you take to the sky)
quotes.author: Adam R. Young

quotes.quote: The dream is still alive, immune to their commands / Bravery abounds steadfast in the underground / Until the day arrives, children understand / Father's safe and sound living in the underground
quotes.author: Ivan Lins

quotes.quote: I'm headed west to try to test my bravery / Face to face with my thoughts is what I need / The rear view reminds me the future's passing presently
quotes.author: Garret Zablocki

quotes.quote: Silence for the innocent / Bravery will conquer this / You can find a way out
quotes.author: Kate Wilson

quotes.quote: No one can imagine what drove you to calamity / Done with dignity / I salute your bravery
quotes.author: Martin Weller

quotes.quote: We'll tear it all down / I know your tactics all the practice this bravery took / And the flags are flying you're trying out a different look
quotes.author: Thea Gilmore

quotes.quote: And I will always follow my heart and my convictions / I'll always hold my head up high / I've found the bravery to follow my own destiny / Your fading memory is what will set me free
quotes.author: Joakim Bjoerklund

quotes.quote: No chain shall sully thee / No strength shall taint your bravery / The songs remain for the young and free / They shall never sound in slavery
quotes.author: Leroy Anderson

quotes.quote: Staring into the face of adversity (he will remain) / With courage and bravery / It keeps him walking towards the flames (he will remain) / In good faith that he will remain
quotes.author: Brent Gerald Rambler

quotes.quote: Bravery will find you when your head is hung low / Your fear is like a fever / It too will go
quotes.author: Justin Chad Davidson

quotes.quote: You are under the unfortunate delusion that simply because you run away from danger, you have no courage. You're confusing courage with wisdom.
quotes.author: Noel Langley

quotes.quote: What makes a king out of a slave? Courage! What makes the flag on the mast to wave? Courage! What makes the elephant charge his tusk in the misty mist, or the dusky dusk? What makes the muskrat guard his musk? Courage! What makes the sphinx the seventh wonder? Courage! What makes the dawn come up like thunder? Courage!
quotes.author: Noel Langley

quotes.quote: I feel that bravery is the ability to face up to difficult situations not without fear but in spite of great and overwhelming fear.
quotes.author: Busby Berkeley

quotes.quote: Sometimes all you need is twenty seconds of insane courage. Just literally twenty seconds of just embarrassing bravery. And I promise you, something great will come of it.
quotes.author: Aline Brosh McKenna

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: I have to tell you a secret that will see you through all the trials that life can offer. Have courage and be kind.
quotes.author: Chris Weitz

quotes.quote: Not the showy kind that you get medals for but a private courage that only you know about.
quotes.author: Lloyd C. Douglas

quotes.quote:
That havin' courage didn't mean that you ain't afraid.
Rather havin' courage meant being afraid but still being able to do what needs to be done in spite of it.
quotes.author: Trevor Munson

quotes.quote: Being fearless was the same as being stupid; that havin' courage didn't mean that you ain't afraid.
quotes.author: Trevor Munson

quotes.quote: So have courage. Courage is an angel. Courage is an angel... that makes the difference between a good life and a great life.
quotes.author: Michael Sardo

quotes.quote: The greatest courage is the courage to change.
quotes.author: Nicholas Boxer

quotes.quote: Take courage'—courage! ay, my purple peer, / I will take courage; for thy Tyrian rays / Refresh me to the heart, and strangely dear / And healing is thy praise.
quotes.author: Jean Ingelow

quotes.quote: And what does he do when in doubt? / And the proof of his faith is the courage he shows / When sorrows lie deep in his breast; / It's the way that he suffers the griefs that he knows / That brings out his worst or his best.
quotes.author: Edgar Albert Guest

quotes.quote: It's the way you hold out against odds that are great / That proves what your courage is worth, / It's the way that you stand to the bruises of fate / That shows up your stature and girth.
quotes.author: Edgar Albert Guest

quotes.quote: Courage! / Disaster and destruction tend / To taller triumph in the end.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: And they fought manfully to the last, with courage unshaken, / Until the tower of Hougemont was in a blaze but still it remained untaken.
quotes.author: William Topaz McGonagall

quotes.quote: Yet fearless and undaunted, and with the help of Heaven, / He gathered his small band possessed of courage bold, / Determined to make a last effort to capture the stronghold.
quotes.author: William Topaz McGonagall

quotes.quote: No one can know the potential, / Of a life that is committed to win; / With courage - the challenge it faces, / To achieve great success in the end!
quotes.author: Anonymous Americas

quotes.quote: So, possess the strength and the courage, / To conquer whatever you choose; / It's the person who gets started, / That is destined forever to lose!
quotes.author: Anonymous Americas

quotes.quote: With its blaze of colour, and courage, its daring in every fold, / And underneath is the title, 'What we have we'll hold.' / 'Tis a picture plain as a mirror, but the reflex it contains / Is the counterpart of the life and heart of the Riders of the Plains
quotes.author: Emily Pauline Johnson

quotes.quote: Courage isn't about fearless. It's taking action even though you're scared.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: Every possibility begins with the courage to imagine.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: Sometimes bravery calls for rebellion.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: When you consciously choose to say and do things outside your comfort zone, you build your 'courage muscles' for taking on bigger challenges and for responding more bravely to those that land unwanted in your lap.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: One act of raw courage at a time, one day at a time, over the passage of time you become what you do: brave, strong,selff-reliant annd equipped with everything it takes to pursue your great aspirations.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: Only when those of us with the freedom to stand up, to speak up, and to champion for change find the courage to do so.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: Bravery won't always guarantee your success -- in work, in love and in life -- it will always precede it.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: Every act of bravery stems from a decision to make a stand for something that's bigger than yourself and more important than your emotional comfort or pride.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: But who you become by the courage you've shown will always leave you better off. Stronger. Smarter. Braver. Bolder
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: Knowing what you stand for is the foundation stone upon which bravery is built.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: The more you face your fear, stare it down and then step up right through the heart of it, the more you strengthen your faith in yourself and you courage for life.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: Acting bravely in small ways when it doesn't seem to matter so much is what enables you to build your courage for when it does.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: Have courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.
quotes.author: Margie Warrell

quotes.quote: Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees all others.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The kind of courage that fascinated me went beyond physical bravery, though almost always it did involve that admirable quality. It was the an expression of character and strength of belief.
quotes.author: Gordon Brown

quotes.quote: As far as courage is concerned, it can be good to learn from real examples of courageous conduct as a moral model of excellence of action in dangerous or difficult situations.
quotes.author: Douglas N. Walton

quotes.quote: Courage has always been one of the most prized virtues, and people who would unblushingly admit to their lack of many other qualities are commonly unwilling to be thought cowards.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Scarre

quotes.quote: Courage and bravery are highly regarded qualities-- possibly because it is difficult to be courageous and brave all the time, especially when times are difficult
quotes.author: Amanda Elizabeth Barden

quotes.quote: Pain will follow the act of building courage just as it does building a muscle.
quotes.author: Angela Sebaly

quotes.quote: The importance of courage to get back up after you have been brought to your knees.
quotes.author: Angela Sebaly

quotes.quote: When we think of courageous people, we often associate their courage with their behaviors. And although how we see courage is in action, we often miss an inherent and important step that comes first-- our emotions.
quotes.author: Angela Sebaly

quotes.quote: Brazil was, is, and will be in fashion.
quotes.author: Gilberto Gil

quotes.quote: I see the future of Brazil as the future of the planet.
quotes.author: Gilberto Gil

quotes.quote: Brazil eats, sleeps and drinks football. It lives football!
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: They have a joy for life in Brazil unlike any country I've ever seen.
quotes.author: Morena Baccarin

quotes.quote: Brazil is bigger than Europe, wilder than Africa, and weirder than Baffin Land.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: Brazil is not what you see but what you feel. Once you spend time here - a week, two weeks - you get in the vibe. It's really intoxicating.
quotes.author: Francisco Costa

quotes.quote: Brazil is where I belong, the place that feels like home. They love their family, their country and God, and are not afraid to let anybody know it.
quotes.author: Dionne Warwick

quotes.quote: Brazil is crazy about football. People, they wait for this moment, but this doesn't mean we are going to win the championship. That is the problem.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: Brazil has rediscovered itself, and this rediscovery is being expressed in its people's enthusiasm and their desire to mobilize to face the huge problems that lie ahead of us.
quotes.author: Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva

quotes.quote: The most beautiful thing about Brazil that I always find that is so unlike any other place I've been in the world is the diversity of its people.
quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

quotes.quote: Brazil has no parties, only acronyms.
quotes.author: Michel Temer

quotes.quote: No one knows anything about the fashion industry in Brazil. They don't care what you do. They just want the beach and the sun and the fun. I feel the freest and the happiest there.
quotes.author: Candice Swanepoel

quotes.quote: The forests of Russia and Brazil are the lungs of the Earth.
quotes.author: Mikhail Gorbachev

quotes.quote: Brazil - they're so good it's like they are running round the pitch playing with themselves.
quotes.author: John Motson

quotes.quote: Brazil is my way to see the world. Being born in that country means: "you don't have a wall separating the physical reality from the magical reality."
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Brazil is one of the biggest Latin American countries, the biggest, no doubt, and, more importantly, it is a country with immense development potential.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: Brazil's got everything to be a great country for Brazilians and for immigrants.
quotes.author: Anderson Silva

quotes.quote: Brazil has people in some places with so difficult situations. They prefer to smile than cry because they love life. They love to be happy. That's Brazilian style.
quotes.author: David Luiz

quotes.quote: A man's bread and butter is only insured when he works for it.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: A slice of bread eaten is a million times more nourishing than a loaf of bread imagined.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Bread for myself is a material question. Bread for my neighbor is a spiritual one.
quotes.author: Nikolai Berdyaev

quotes.quote: Bread for today is bread enough.
quotes.author: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.quote: Bread is for us a kind of successor to the motherly breast, and it has been over the centuries responsible for billions of sighs of satisfaction.
quotes.author: Margaret Visser

quotes.quote: Bread is like dressed, hats and shoes - in other words, essential!
quotes.author: Emily Post

quotes.quote: Bread is the king of the table and all else is merely the court that surrounds the king. The countries are the soup, the meat, the vegetables, the salad, but bread is king.
quotes.author: Louis Bromfield

quotes.quote: Bread is the staff of life.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Bread of flour is good; but there is bread, sweet as honey, if we would eat it, in a good book.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Bread takes the effort of kneading but also requires sitting quietly while the dough rises with a power all its own.
quotes.author: David Richo

quotes.quote: Bread that must be sliced with an axe is bread that is too nourishing.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Bread, milk and butter are of venerable antiquity. They taste of the morning of the world.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: Cast your bread upon the waters, and after many days it will come back buttered.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: For if you bake bread with indifference, you bake a bitter bread that feeds but half man's hunger.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Good bread is the most fundamentally satisfying of all foods; and good bread with fresh butter, the greatest of feasts.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: Here is bread, which strengthens man's heart, and therefore is called the staff of Life.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: If we are going to ask for our daily bread, we've got to take the time to receive it and eat it. God provide, but we've got to slow down long enough to taste and see.
quotes.author: Glennon Doyle Melton

quotes.quote: If you cast your bread upon the water and you have faith, you'll get back cash. If you don't have faith, you'll get soggy bread.
quotes.author: Don King

quotes.quote: If you have extraordinary bread and extraordinary butter, it's hard to beat bread and butter.
quotes.author: Jacques Pepin

quotes.quote: It is the savor of bread broken with comrades that makes us accept the values of war.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Most brown bread is merely white bread with a fake tan.
quotes.author: Joel Fuhrman

quotes.quote: My piece of bread only belongs to me when I know that everyone else has a share, and that no one starves while I eat.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Our bread is not only the Word of God, our meat is not only to do His will, our bread is also...the difficulties that are in our way.
quotes.author: Watchman Nee

quotes.quote: The Angel's bread is made the Bread of man today.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: The smell of good bread baking, like the sound of lightly flowing water is indescribable in its evocations of innocence and delight.
quotes.author: M. F. K. Fisher

quotes.quote: This supernatural bread and this consecrated chalice are for the health and salvation of mankind.
quotes.author: Cyprian

quotes.quote: To a hungry man, a piece of bread is the face of God.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: To eat bread without hope is still slowly to starve to death.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Today's bread does not eliminate yesterday's hunger, much less that of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: We can grow good wheat and make good bread only if we understand that we do not live by bread alone.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: When we break bread and give it to each other, fear vanishes and God becomes very close.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: While earning your daily bread, be sure you share a slice with those less fortunate.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: As we have seen, bread, and especially dry bread, evokes secretion of considerably larger quantities of saliva than meat.
quotes.author: Ivan Pavlov

quotes.quote: Behind every morsel of bread, fruits, or meat is a large amount of transformed fossil fuels.
quotes.author: Vaclav Smil

quotes.quote: Bread is a celebration.
quotes.author: Lynne Rossetto Kasper

quotes.quote: Dry bread at home is better then rost meate abroad.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Eaten bread is forgotten.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Half a loaf is better than no bread.
quotes.author: Julia McNair Wright
