quotes.quote: If bread is the first necessity of life, recreation is a close second.
quotes.author: Edward Bellamy

quotes.quote: If you can break bread with a guy, you will actually go the extra mile on the court; that just happens.
quotes.author: Steven Adams

quotes.quote: Instead of loaves of bread, many times God gives out handfuls of purpose.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: It isn't bread that feeds you; it is life and the spirit that feed you through bread.
quotes.author: Angelus Silesius

quotes.quote: Lava bread makes you passionate.
quotes.author: Anne Carson

quotes.quote: Our bread and water are of one table: the progeny of Adam are as a single soul.
quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.quote: Steal a loaf of bread and they hang you, steal a land and they'll make you king.
quotes.author: David Gemmell

quotes.quote: The bread while becoming by virtue of Christ's words the body of Christ does not cease to be bread.
quotes.author: John Wycliffe

quotes.quote: The whiter the bread, the quicker you're dead because white bread lacks vitamin E and lecithin.
quotes.author: Kent Hovind

quotes.quote: What a piece of bread looks like depends on whether you are hungry or not.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: To fall in love is awfully simple, but to fall out of love is simply awful.
quotes.author: Bess Myerson

quotes.quote: I was born when you kissed me. I died when you left me. I lived a few weeks while you loved me.
quotes.author: Humphrey Bogart

quotes.quote: Breaking up is like knocking over a Coke machine. You can't do it in one push. You gotta rock it back and forth a few times, and then it goes over.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Breakups can be sad, but sometimes tears are the price we pay for a freedom we need.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: No one goes straight to happiness after a breakup.Â
quotes.author: Estelle

quotes.quote: Some people think that it's holding on that makes one strong; sometimes it's letting go.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Getting out of a horrible relationship is not only good for the mind, but it is also good for the soul.
quotes.author: Simon Wash

quotes.quote: Give sorrow words. The grief that does not speak, whispers the o'er fraught heart and bids it break.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: In a separation it is the one who is not really in love who says the more tender things.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: No matter how bad you want a person, if your hearts are in two different places, you'll have to pass and move on.
quotes.author: Alexandra Elle

quotes.quote: The loss of love is not nearly as painful as our resistance to accepting it is.
quotes.author: Tigress Luv

quotes.quote: In a separation it's the one who is not really in love who says the more tender things.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: The hottest love has the coldest end.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: When you break up, your whole identity is shattered. It's like death.
quotes.author: Dennis Quaid

quotes.quote: Breakups are still uncomfortable, period, and especially when you really are in love with somebody. They are not the easiest things to deal with, and once you break up, you're trying to get used to not being with that person.
quotes.author: Sevyn Streeter

quotes.quote: Love is unconditional. Relationships are not.
quotes.author: Grant Gudmunson

quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake & help us see we are worth so much more than we're settling for.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: I wish i were a little girl again, because skinned knees are easier to fix than broken heart.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: Breakup is hard enough to live with, why do we need the paperwork of divorce.
quotes.author: Nilesh Rathod

quotes.quote: Breaking up is not a stupid thing. Instead, it makes you a better person and realize your mistakes.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is a curious sensation: the sort of pain that goes mercifully beyond our powers of feeling. When your heart is broken, your boats are burned; nothing matters any more. It is the end of happiness and the beginning of peace.Â
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Hearts will never be practical until they are made unbreakable.
quotes.author: The Wizard of Oz

quotes.quote: And I would have, now love is over, an end to all, an end: I cannot, having been your lover, stoop to become your friend!
quotes.author: Arthur Symons

quotes.quote: Cheating and lying aren't struggles. They're reasons to break up.
quotes.author: Patti Callahan Henry

quotes.quote: Â I was never one to patiently pick up broken fragments and glue them together again and tell myself that the mended whole was as good as new. What is broken is broken, and I'd rather remember it as it was at its best than mend it and see the broken pieces as long as I lived.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: If you never learned to hold onto someone, how could it possibly hurt now to let them go?
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that loves knows not its own death until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Sometimes we tend to be in despair when the person we love leaves us, but the truth is, it's not our loss, but theirs, for they left the only person who wouldn't give up on them.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Have you recently been through a challenge, disappointment, break up or disloyalty with somebody in your life? If so, it's important after you've been hurt, to take some time to think like a lion tamer about your pain, so you can tame the possibility of more negativity coming back to bite you again!
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Just because a relationship ends, it doesn't mean it's not worth having.
quotes.author: Sarah Mlynowski

quotes.quote: Failed relationships canÂ be described as so much wasted make-up.
quotes.author: Marian Keyes

quotes.quote: If you break up with a girlfriend or a boyfriend, you're in this vulnerable state where you're still kind of half in the relationship with them, but you're single, and it takes a while to feel solid in yourself again.
quotes.author: Sam Palladio

quotes.quote: Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: It is better to end aÂ relationshipÂ too early than too late. You will never get the days, weeks, and years spent with someone you don't truly love back.
quotes.author: Jennifer Wallace

quotes.quote: The heart was made to be broken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: I believe much of the pain of a breakup comes from having a life plan that you have fallen in love with. When it does not work out, you become angry that you now have to pursue a new life plan.Â
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Breaking up is part of life, but we shouldn't let it control it.
quotes.author: Barbara Willington

quotes.quote: Relationships are like glass. Sometimes it's better to leave them broken than try to hurt yourself putting it back together.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Relationships take up energy; letting go of them, psychiatrists theorize, entails mental work. When you lose someone you were close to, you have to reassess your picture of the world and your place in it.Â
quotes.author: Meghan O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Heartbreak could be lived with if it weren't accompanied by regret.
quotes.author: Laura Kasischke

quotes.quote: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over.Â
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Breaking up is a natural evolution when you try to figure out what you want in life. If you're with an individual who isn't moving in the same direction and at the same rate that you are, it ain't going to work.
quotes.author: Usher

quotes.quote: The pain of having a broken heart is not so much as to kill you, yet not so little as to let you live.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You will never know true happiness until you have truly loved, and you will never understand what pain really is until you have lost it.Â
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: So it's true, when all is said and done, grief is the price we pay for love.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Most things break, including hearts. The lessons of life amount not to wisdom, but to scar tissue and callus.Â
quotes.author: Wallace Stegner

quotes.quote: Don't waste time trying to break a man's heart; be satisfied if you can just manage to chip it in a brand new place.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr.Seuss

quotes.quote: There is one thing I would break up over, and that is if she caught me with another woman. I won't stand for that.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Everyone deals with breakups differently. While some people sit at home crying into a teacup and drinking their own tears, others opt for more productive coping methods.
quotes.author: Eric Grzymkowski

quotes.quote: It's afterward you realize that the feeling of happiness you had with a man didn't necessarily prove that you loved him.
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.quote: And I shall find some girl perhaps, and a better one than you. With eyes as wise, but kindlier, and lips as soft, but true, and I daresay she will do.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.quote: There is a good way to break up with someone and it doesn't include a Post-it.
quotes.author: Carrie (Sex and the City)

quotes.quote: You know what is the worst thing about being rejected? The lack of control. If I could only control the where and how of being dumped, it wouldn't seem as bad.
quotes.author: Rob Fleming

quotes.quote: I never hated a man enough to give him his diamonds back.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: I broke up with someone and she said, 'You'll never find anyone like me again.' And I'm thinking, 'I hope not!' Does anybody end a bad relationship and say, 'By the way, do you have a twin?'
quotes.author: Larry Miller

quotes.quote: Days end as days begin / Alone and incomplete / Shattered dreams are pains wield / Despair is true defeat. / Not seeing you the scorching loss / Is surging through my veins / Every song reminds me of how / I will never love again.
quotes.author: Clifton Redmond

quotes.quote: Till heaven and earth standing / This Reminisce will remain; / Sealed with tears as I look up / Please enjoy this lovely break up.
quotes.author: Ging Alburo D.

quotes.quote: Will cause so much sadness and pain, / Thank you for your understanding. / Things just can't be continued between us; / But our friendship will remain if you will ask.
quotes.author: Ging Alburo D.

quotes.quote: I think it's time to take a risk / by ending now and starting new. / You'll always be a part of me on the inside / and I'll always have our memories to share.
quotes.author: Shelby Floro

quotes.quote: Don’t cry when the sun is gone because the tears won't let you see the stars.
quotes.author: Violeta Para

quotes.quote: I'm not crying because of you; you're not worth it. I'm crying because my delusion of who you were was shattered by the truth of who you are.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: When you leave weary of me without a word, I shall gently let you go.
quotes.author: Kim Sowol

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own death until the hour of separation?
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Every time your heart is broken, a doorway cracks open to a world full of new beginnings, new opportunities.
quotes.author: Patti Roberts

quotes.quote: Doctoring her seemed to her as absurd as putting together the pieces of a broken vase. Her heart was broken. Why would they try to cure her with pills and powders?
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: When someone leaves, it’s because someone else is about to arrive.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Sometimes, I don't know what haunts me more. The memories of you… Or the happy person I used to be.
quotes.author: Ranata Suzuki

quotes.quote: You can love them, forgive them, want good things for them ... but still move on without them.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: How do you know when it's over? Maybe when you feel more in love with your memories than with the person standing in front of you.
quotes.author: Gunnar Ardelius

quotes.quote: I didn't lose you. You lost me. You'll search for me inside of everyone you're with and I won't be found.
quotes.author: R.H. Sin

quotes.quote: You don't need closure. You just need to give yourself permission to move on.
quotes.author: Steve Harvey

quotes.quote: It’s difficult for me to imagine the rest of my life without you. But I suppose I don't have to imagine it... I just have to live it.
quotes.author: Ranata Suzuki

quotes.quote: Is there a chance? / A fragment of light at the end of a tunnel? / A reason to fight? / Is there a chance you might change your mind? / Or are we ashes and wine?
quotes.author: Fine Frenzy

quotes.quote: Every major difficulty you face in life is a fork in the road. You choose which track you will head down, toward breakdown or breakthrough.
quotes.author: John Maxwell

quotes.quote: Disordered love always leads to misery and breakdown. The only way to 'reorder' our loves is to love God supremely.
quotes.author: Timothy Keller

quotes.quote: Catastrophe is the essence of the spiritual path, a series of breakdowns allowing us to discover the threads that weave all of life into a whole cloth.
quotes.author: Joan Halifax

quotes.quote: If you want to give the devil a nervous breakdown, just get up every day and see how much good you can do.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Your best is whatever you can do comfortably without having a breakdown.
quotes.author: J. R. Moehringer

quotes.quote: Breakdowns are really just breakthroughs. It takes hitting the bottom to make it to the top.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When there is breakdown in a relationship, you must have the hard conversation. It may not be pretty and it may not feel good. But if you are willing to listen and tell the truth, it will open up.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: You're heading for a breakdown. Why don't you pull yourself to pieces.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Nervous breakdowns can be highly underrated methods of spiritual transformation.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Whether we like it or not, a breakdown in home-life will eventually lead to a breakdown everywhere. This is, surely, the most menacing and dangerous aspect of the state of society at this present time. Once the family idea, the family unit, the family life is broken up â€“ once that goes, soon you will have no other allegiance.
quotes.author: Martyn

quotes.quote: Madness need not be all breakdown. It may also be break-through. It is potential liberation and renewal as well as enslavement and existential death.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: To be ill adjusted to a deranged world is not a breakdown.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: A small communication breakdown is enough for everyone to be working on slightly different things. And then you loose focus.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: To transform breakdowns into breakthroughs is the whole function of a master.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: One of the symptoms of an approaching nervous breakdown is the belief that one's work is terribly important.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: It is so easy to break down and destroy. The heroes are those who make peace and build.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Sometimes a breakdown can be the beginning of a kind of breakthrough, a way of living in advance through a trauma that prepares you for a future of radical transformation.
quotes.author: Cherrie Moraga

quotes.quote: Psychological breakdowns are actually breakthroughs to enlightenment.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: The simplest type of breakdown exhibits itself as an oscillation in a goal-seeking process which appears only when that process is actively invoked.
quotes.author: Norbert Wiener

quotes.quote: And revolutions always mean the breakdown of old authority.
quotes.author: Hu Shih

quotes.quote: War is not the continuation of policy. It is the breakdown of policy.
quotes.author: Hans von Seeckt

quotes.quote: There is no breakthrough without a breakdown.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: A nervous breakdown waits around the corner for anyone who lets himself wallow in bitterness. Little by little, it takes over your whole being.
quotes.author: Mariama Bâ

quotes.quote: The Breakdown in all human relations is unstated expectations.
quotes.author: Eric Holtzclaw

quotes.quote: The financial costs of family breakdown are incredibly high.
quotes.author: Iain Duncan Smith

quotes.quote: Sometimes you just need to breakdown to have all the pieces you need to build yourself up again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: What appears to be a breakdown can often be a breakthrough, if you understand God's grace.
quotes.author: Carl Lentz

quotes.quote: Instead of me having a breakdown, I'm focusing on me having a breakthrough.
quotes.author: Terrell Owens

quotes.quote: It is no good being a Manager with an engineering background if you cannot get yourself out of trouble in times of breakdown and failure.
quotes.author: Richard Hardy

quotes.quote: As a believer in evolution and the breakdown in barriers, I am using my practice to show that art conversations break down barriers: art/ not art, high/low, etc.
quotes.author: Virgil Abloh

quotes.quote: A nervous breakdown is a relapse into auto eroticism.
quotes.author: Edward J. Kempf

quotes.quote: Madness need not be all breakdown. It may also be a breakthrough.
quotes.author: R.D. Laing

quotes.quote: How to achieve the moral breakdown of the enemy before the war has started—that is the problem that interests me. Whoever has experienced war at the front will want to refrain from all avoidable bloodshed.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: Adaptable as human beings are and have to be, I sometimes sympathize with the chameleon who had a nervous breakdown on a patchwork quilt.
quotes.author: John Stephen Strange

quotes.quote: The sorrow you can hold, however desolating if nobody speaks to you. If they speak, you break down.
quotes.author: Bede Jarrett

quotes.quote: A nervous breakdown shows you care.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: For the parents of a little Leaguer, a baseball game is simply a nervous breakdown into innings.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: When families are strong and stable, so are children— showing higher levels of wellbeing and more positive outcomes. But when things go wrong—either through family breakdown or a damaged parental relationship—the impact on a child's later life can be devastating.
quotes.author: Lain Duncan Smith

quotes.quote: I do not think burning the candles at both ends casts a lovely light; on the contrary, I am of the opinion that it is a dandy way to get a nervous breakdown.
quotes.author: George Abbott

quotes.quote: The biggest trouble with success is is that its formula is just about the same as that for a nervous breakdown.
quotes.author: John Holmes

quotes.quote: Your day give yourself a break do something that makes you happy / do some workout / Music and meditation / at the end of the day it goes easy.
quotes.author: Perpetua Aperocho

quotes.quote: If you're not breaking, you're not really living.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: Live boldly and rejoice in work is a worthy mantra for enduring a life that will ultimately break the fibrous soul.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: Something as straightforward as a difference could lead to something as complex as a breakdown.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Sometimes, breaking down is the bravest thing you can do.
quotes.author: Vironika Tugaleva

quotes.quote: Give yourself a break to avoid a breakdown.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Things don't go wrong and break your heart so you can become bitter and give up. They happen to break you down and build you up so you can be all that you were intended to be.
quotes.author: Charlie Tremendous Jones

quotes.quote: We will see a breakdown of the family and family values if we decide to approve same-sex marriage and if we decide to establish homosexuality as an acceptable alternative lifestyle with all the benefits that go with equating it with the heterosexual lifestyle.
quotes.author: Jerry Falwell

quotes.quote: I put enough pressure on myself already - I can sit here and work myself into an anxiety-filled breakdown without worrying about What everyone else is going to think.
quotes.author: Sam Fender

quotes.quote: It does not always silence responsible for the breakdown.
quotes.author: Aditya Chandel

quotes.quote: I don't want to be a leader. I want to be one who goes around with a little oil can and offers help when I see a breakdown.
quotes.author: Baba Amte

quotes.quote: With the breakdown of the medieval system, the gods of chaos, lunacy, and bad taste gained ascendancy.
quotes.author: John Kennedy Toole

quotes.quote: I believe in work, hard work, and long hours of work. Men do not break down from overwork but from worry and dissipation.
quotes.author: Charles Evans Hughes

quotes.quote: Your best is whatever you can do comfortably without having a breakdown.
quotes.author: J.R. Moehringer

quotes.quote: To me, breakfast is my most important meal. It's often the meal you play a game on. I make sure I have oatmeal, milk, and fruit. It's the fuel you use to hopefully do your best, so eating right is a big part of being a professional athlete. I wish I paid more attention to it earlier in my life.
quotes.author: Andrew Luck

quotes.quote: Breakfast was only worth having when somebody else made it for you.
quotes.author: Caroline B Cooney

quotes.quote: Breakfast without orange juice is like a day without sunshine.
quotes.author: Anita Bryant

quotes.quote: When you have bacon and eggs for breakfast, the chicken makes a contribution, the pig makes a commitment.
quotes.author: Fred Shero

quotes.quote: Breakfast cereals that come in the same colors as polyester leisure suits make oversleeping a virtue.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Breakfast is everything. The beginning, the first thing. It is the mouthful that is the commitment to a new day, a continuing life.
quotes.author: A A Gill

quotes.quote: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day and I definitely have a hearty breakfast before I do anything.
quotes.author: Mayer Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Hope makes a good breakfast. Eat plenty of it.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: The little energy you obtained from your breakfast can ignite your willingness to kick start. Don't overlook the little energy you have now by fixing eyes on a supposed magical influence farther away!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Breakfast is a notoriously difficult meal to serve with a flourish.
quotes.author: Clement Freud

quotes.quote: Don't eat breakfast cereals that change the color of your milk.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: One should not attend even the end of the world without a good breakfast.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Breakfast alone by gaslight is about as ghastly as champagne in daylight.
quotes.author: Jessie Douglas Kerruish

quotes.quote: It is more important to eat some carbohydrates at breakfast, because the brain needs fuel right away, and carbohydrate is the best source.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.quote: If you look upon ham and eggs and lust, you have already committed breakfast in your heart.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: All happiness depends on a leisurely breakfast.
quotes.author: John Gunther

quotes.quote: We had our breakfasts whatever happens in a house, robbery or murder, it doesn't matter, you must have your breakfast.
quotes.author: Wilkie Collins

quotes.quote: Breakfast is always the best time for something juicy, sweet and fresh - it just feels like the right way to open the day. There's no right way, though, when it comes to choosing the fruit.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.quote: Have a smile for breakfast, you'll be sh—ting joy by lunch.
quotes.author: Joe Abercrombie

quotes.quote: When you have something for breakfast, you're not going to be starving by lunch.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: Everyone's favorite breakfast dish can be prepared in a moment's time with just a few ingredients and minimum effort.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.quote: I think its important to start the day with a proper breakfast.
quotes.author: Hanneli Mustaparta

quotes.quote: A simple enough pleasure, surely, to have breakfast alone with one's husband, but how seldom married people in the midst of life achieve it.
quotes.author: Anne Spencer

quotes.quote: Not eating breakfast is the worst thing you can do, that's really the take-home message for teenage girls.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: Breakfast is the one meal at which it is permissible to read the paper.
quotes.author: Amy Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: Like a breakfast time or lunch time, you must have a thinking time! Without eating and thinking we cannot stick to the existence; without them we cannot stay in the port of this universe!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: I have eaten the plums / that were in the icebox / and which you were probably saving for breakfast. / Forgive me they were delicious / so sweet and so cold.
quotes.author: Bartlett

quotes.quote: I'll bet you think an egg is something you casually order for breakfast. Well, I did once. But that was before the egg and I.
quotes.author: Claudette Colbert

quotes.quote: Never work before breakfast; if you have to work before breakfast, eat your breakfast first.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: In due time the tea was spread forth in handsome style; and neither ham, tart, nor marmalade was wanting among its accompaniments.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: A good breakfast is no substitute for a large dinner.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Eat breakfast like a king, lunch like a prince, and dinner like a pauper.
quotes.author: Adelle Davis

quotes.quote: Life, within doors, has few pleasanter prospects than a neatly arranged and well-provisioned breakfast table
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: The American does not drink at meals a sensible man should. Indeed he has no meals. He stuffs for ten minutes rice a day.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The law may...depend on what the judge has had for breakfast.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hutchins

quotes.quote: For instance, my breakfast was for a long time bread and milk (no tea), and I ate it out of a two-penny earthen porringer, with a pewter spoon. But mark how luxury will enter families, and make a progress, in spite of principle; being called one morning to breakfast
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Once a woman has forgiven her man, she must not reheat his sins for breakfast.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: The critical time in marriage is breakfast.
quotes.author: A.P. Herbert

quotes.quote: I went to a restaurant that served 'breakfast at any time.' I ordered French toast during the Renaissance.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Fibroids? Isn't that a breakfast cereal?
quotes.author: Victoria Wood

quotes.quote: I used this product called 'I Can't Believe It's Not Butter' 'cause sometimes, when I'm eating toast, I like to be incredulous. 'How was breakfast?' ' Unbelievable.'
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: I used to have a friend who said that if she didn't have breakfast she would be ravished by 11 o'clock.
quotes.author: Maureen Gourlay

quotes.quote: In England, people actually try to be brilliant at breakfast. That is so dreadful of them! Only dull people are brilliant at breakfast.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A bad review may spoil your breakfast but you shouldn't allow it to spoil your lunch.
quotes.author: Kingsley Amis

quotes.quote: Why is it that however old one gets it is always exciting to have breakfast on train?
quotes.author: Canon Roger Lloyd

quotes.quote: Those were such breakfasts as made history.
quotes.author: Canon Roger Lloyd

quotes.quote: Of all the meals that glad my day / My morning one's the best; / Purveyed me on a silver tray, / Immaculately dressed. / I rouse me when the dawn is bright; / I leap into the sea, / Returning with a rare delight / To honey, toast and tea.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: I sit here with my cereal / and swear it's water into wine. / Salt swims with milk, / changing the flavor from Honeycombs to you.
quotes.author: Sarah Anne Dennis

quotes.quote: A breakfast, merits; ever giving / Cheerful notice we are living / Another day refreshed by sleep, / When its festival we keep.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Bread and milk for breakfast, / And woolen frocks to wear, / And a crumb for robin redbreast / On the cold days of the year.
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Sweet yawn and a stretch / in cold morning's aroma / sumptuous breakfast.
quotes.author: Didar Bhaizanov

quotes.quote: A glossary of things is opened as / The breakfast is about to be made / The kitchen is cleaned and so is the stove / Eggs are broken into two, scrambled eggs are on the menu today / With toast, bread is toasted brown!
quotes.author: Seema Ali

quotes.quote: The table is set up and children are washed up / Breakfast is served hot / Time means mercy, children are given jam and toast; reminding me of the beauty of the early morning post! / Love is so kind and so is Allah / Hours and minutes tend to be redefined / Morning's rhythm and rhyme into great times!
quotes.author: Seema Ali

quotes.quote: Your morning sets up the success of your day… I use my first hour awake for my morning routine of breakfast and meditation to prepare myself.
quotes.author: Carolyn Ghosn

quotes.quote: Everyone runs around trying to find a place where they still serve breakfast because eating breakfast, even if it's 5 o'clock in the afternoon, is a sign that the day has just begun and good things can still happen.
quotes.author: Jonathan Goldstein

quotes.quote: Breakfast is everything. The beginning, the first thing. It is the mouthful that is the commitment to a new day, a continuing life.
quotes.author: A. A. Gill

quotes.quote: Give yourself a break to avoid a breakdown.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Instead of me having a breakdown, I'm focusing on me having a breakthrough.
quotes.author: Terrell Owens

quotes.quote: Shame on the body for breaking down while the spirit perseveres.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: We often hear of people breaking down from overwork, but in nine out of ten they are really suffering from worry or anxiety.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: It is so easy to break down and destroy. The heroes are those who make peace and build.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: When you feel yourself breaking down, may you break open instead.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Lesser

quotes.quote: Under Adverse conditions-some people break down,some break records.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.quote: Sometimes a breakdown can be the beginning of a kind of breakthrough, a way of living in advance through a trauma that prepares you for a future of radical transformation.
quotes.author: Cherrie Moraga

quotes.quote: Breakdowns can create breakthroughs. Things fall apart so things can fall together.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes an overwhelming breakdown to have an undeniable breakthrough .
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Any breakdown is a breakthrough.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Allow yourself to really feel your feelings. It's okay to bare your soul, break down or cry. Because through that breakdown comes your breakthrough.
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: There's moments where I want to break down and cry, but not give up.
quotes.author: Ashlee Simpson

quotes.quote: Sometimes breakdowns are so important in your life that you come to know your hidden potentials.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: Breakdowns are your greatest breakthroughs. Rank the severity, and know this is the quantity of the spectacular gift you'll receive on the other side. You planned it all perfectly.
quotes.author: Melanie Tonia Evan

quotes.quote: Breakdowns are really just breakthroughs. It takes hitting the bottom to make it to the top.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Lots of things can be fixed. Things can be fixed. But many times, relationships between people cannot be fixed, because they should not be fixed. You're aboard a ship setting sail, and the other person has joined the inland circus, or is boarding a different ship, and you just can't be with each other anymore. Because you shouldn't be.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: When things break, it's not the actual breaking that prevents them from getting back together again. It's because a little piece gets lost -- the two remaining ends couldn't fit together even if they wanted to. The whole shape has changed.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: And that's when I know it's over. As soon as you start thinking about the beginning, it's the end.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: Two words. Three vowels. Four constenants. Seven letters. It can either cut you open to the core and leave you in ungodly pain or it can free your soul and lift a tremendous weight off you shoulders. The phrase is: It's over.
quotes.author: Maggi Richard

quotes.quote: When she left, it was like someone had ripped my heart out, crumbled it up like a flimsy piece of loose leaf paper and crammed it back into my chest. It somehow managed to work, but it would never, ever feel the same.
quotes.author: Steph Campbell

quotes.quote: Hold on to the thought that no emotion lasts forever, no matter how wonderful or how terrible the emotion may be. The tears may last a little longer than you would like, but it will get better. I promise.
quotes.author: Osayi Osar-Emokpae

quotes.quote: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: The harder you slam a ball into the ground, the higher it bounces back up? A divorce, a breakup, losing a job, or just feeling seriously down can ground you, rough you up a bit, leave calluses on your feet and grit under your finger nails. But more than that, it leaves you wiser and stronger next time? Life is about experiencing opposites isn?t it?
quotes.author: Laurel House

quotes.quote: This is why we call people exes, I guess because the paths that cross in the middle end up separating at the end. It's too easy to see an X as a cross-out. It's not, because there's no way to cross out something like that. The X is a diagram of two paths.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we've planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: I wanted a perfect ending. Now I've learned, the hard way, that some poems don't rhyme, and some stories don't have a clear beginning, middle, and end. Life is about not knowing, having to change, taking the moment and making the best of it, without knowing what's going to happen next.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: If a relationship is going wrong, if a marriage is going wrong, the answer cannot simply be to say, 'You can't afford to break up because you are going to lose the house.' The answer has to be only one thing, which is 'I love you.'
quotes.author: Rory Stewart

quotes.quote: If you say, I love you, then you have already fallen in love with language, which is already a form of break up and infidelity.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: In my own relationships, I know that I should break up with someone who doesn't encourage me to be strong and make my own choices and do what's best in my life, so if you're dating someone who doesn't want you to be the best person you can be, you shouldn't be dating them.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: When you break up, your whole identity is shattered. It's like death.
quotes.author: Dennis Quaid

quotes.quote: Groups break up because they never got across what they wanted to do personally, and they have creative differences, and egos start to clash.
quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: I was never one to patiently pick up broken fragments and glue them together again and tell myself that the mended whole was as good as new. What is broken is broken, and I'd rather remember it as it was at its best than mend it and see the broken pieces as long as I lived.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: Letting go doesn't mean that you don't care about someone anymore. It's just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.
quotes.author: Deborah Reber

quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself 'I have lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.' You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: New clothes are a great way to deal after a breakup. A good mix CD also helps you get through it and you know, 72 hours of ice cream.
quotes.author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quotes.quote: After a breakup, it takes a couple weeks for the fog to settle, but it's always a period of self-priority and growth. Life presents you with so many decisions. A lot of times, they're right in front of your face and they're really difficult, but we must make them.
quotes.author: Brittany Murphy

quotes.quote: When you break up, your whole identity is shattered. It's like death.
quotes.author: Dennis Quaid

quotes.quote: The best way to mend a broken heart is time and girlfriends.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: Heaven knows we need never be ashamed of our tears, for they are rain upon the blinding dust of earth, overlying our hard hearts.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Breaking up is a natural evolution when you try to figure out what you want in life. If you're with an individual who isn't moving in the same direction and at the same rate that you are, it ain't going to work.
quotes.author: Usher

quotes.quote: Sometimes we must undergo hardships, breakups, and narcissistic wounds, which shatter the flattering image that we had of ourselves, in order to discover two truths: that we are not who we thought we were; and that the loss of a cherished pleasure is not necessarily the loss of true happiness and well-being
quotes.author: Jean-Yves Leloup

quotes.quote: Healing yourself is connected with healing others.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: When someone leaves you, apart from missing them, apart from the fact that the whole little world you?ve created together collapses, and that everything you see or do reminds you of them, the worst is the thought that they tried you out and, in the end, the whole sum of parts adds up to you got stamped REJECT by the one you love. How can you not be left with the personal confidence of a passed over British Rail sandwich?
quotes.author: Helen Fielding

quotes.quote: The only whole heart is a broken one because it lets the light in.
quotes.author: David J. Wholpe

quotes.quote: You may have a fresh start any moment you choose, for this thing that we call failure is not the falling down, but the staying down.
quotes.author: Mary Pickford

quotes.quote: When you break up with someone, and I'm not talking casual breakups here, it's hard to take the sudden absence of such an important person in your life. It reminded me of when I'd stopped going to school and the weird uneasy feeling I'd gotten afterward, like I was forgetting to do something. My life until that point had pivoted around some form of education, and all of a sudden, it was gone. Homework, classes, running around, and then 'bam' nothing but a life of work stretching out before you. No one prepares you for that feeling or even mentions it. You just suddenly have a gap and have to decide how to fill it. A break up is like that gap, only much, much more painful. One day the person you talked to constantly or did stuff with is just absent. Gone. Poof. And even though I'm not one of those people who has to be in a relationship all the time, I was feeling at a loss.
quotes.author: Lish McBride

quotes.quote: Those who do not know how to weep with their whole heart do not know how to laugh either.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: Recovery is something that you have to work on every single day and it's something that it doesn't get a day off.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: It hurts to let go. Sometimes it seems the harder you try to hold on to something or someone the more it wants to get away. You feel like some kind of criminal for having felt, for having wanted. For having wanted to be wanted. It confuses you, because you think that your feelings were wrong and it makes you feel so small because it's so hard to keep it inside when you let it out and it doesn't come back. You're left so alone that you can't explain. Damn, there's nothing like that, is there? I've been there and you have too. You're nodding your head.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Bad things do happen; how I respond to them defines my character and the quality of my life. I can choose to sit in perpetual sadness, immobilized by the gravity of my loss, or I can choose to rise from the pain and treasure the most precious gift I have life itself.
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.quote: I Know You Care - is really personal and fragile for me. For me, it's about losing a family member and also about a breakup. It's about this idea of losing someone for good.
quotes.author: Ellie Goulding

quotes.quote: There is a time for departure even when there's no certain place to go.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: A broken heart never fully mends, it only endures.
quotes.author: Shane Pendley

quotes.quote: Hearts live by being wounded.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Our story has three parts: a beginning, a middle, and an end. And although this is the way all stories unfold, I still can't believe that ours didn't go on forever.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Pleasure of love lasts but a moment, Pain of love lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: After the break up of the municipality and the loss of his income my father lost health and spirits.
quotes.author: Catherine Helen Spence

quotes.quote: The sweetest part of being a couple is sharing your life with someone else. But my life, evidently, had not been good enough to share.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris

quotes.quote: All in all I learned a lesson from it though. You never see it coming you just get to see it go.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Like some wines our love could neither mature nor travel.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: I felt her absence. it was like waking up one day with no teeth in your mouth. you wouldn't need to run to the mirror to know they were gone
quotes.author: James Dashner

quotes.quote: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.author: Jean Plaidy

quotes.quote: Cry me a river, build a bridge, and get over it.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: When you are sorrowful look again in your heart, and you shall see that in truth you are weeping for that which has been your delight.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The heart will break, but broken live on.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: If it is your time, love will track you down like a cruise missile.
quotes.author: Lynda Barry

quotes.quote: It is foolish to tear one's hair in grief, as though sorrow would be made less by baldness.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Why do you have to break up with her? Be a man. Just stop calling.
quotes.author: Matt LeBlanc

quotes.quote: In the arithmetic of love, one plus one equals everything, and two minus one equals nothing.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: I refuse to let what happened to me make me bitter.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: The heart was made to be broken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: No man is rich enough to buy back his past.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours if they don't they never were.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Have you ever been hurt and the place tries to heal a bit, and you just pull the scar off of it over and over again.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: Even on my weakest days I get a little bit stronger
quotes.author: Sara Evans

quotes.quote: I believe there are more urgent and honorable occupations than the incomparable waste of time we call suffering.
quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quotes.quote: There is one thing I would break up over, and that is if she caught me with another woman. I won't stand for that.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: How can I be reasonable? To me our love was everything and you were my whole life. It is not very pleasant to realize that to you it was only an episode.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: To weep is to make less the depth of grief.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Break-ups are hard for anybody, but it's particularly tough when it's being documented and you see the person's picture everywhere. Most people don't have that added problem when they break up with someone.
quotes.author: Winona Ryder

quotes.quote: All personal breakthroughs begin with a change in beliefs.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Breakthrough is how to distinguish a leader and who followed.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Brokenness is often the road to breakthrough. Be encouraged.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: Great breakthroughs are always followed by great catastrophes.
quotes.author: Rosalia de Castro

quotes.quote: You have to push through every difficulty to have a breakthrough.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: All significant breakthroughs are break -"withs" old ways of thinking.
quotes.author: Thomas Kuhn

quotes.quote: A breakthrough occurs when you recognize, you are more energy than matter.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: Breakthroughs, in art, in culture, in personality, come when tackling the unexpected.
quotes.author: Lynda Obst

quotes.quote: Sometimes our breakthrough begins when we refuse to be impressed with the size of our problem.
quotes.author: Bill Johnson

quotes.quote: The emotion at the point of technical breakthrough is better than wine, women and song put together.
quotes.author: Richard Hamming

quotes.quote: Almost every significant breakthrough is the result of a courageous break with traditional ways of thinking.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: My breakthrough came very late in life, really only starting when I was 50...I had the strength for new deeds and ideas.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you are the closest to your breakthrough the pressure is the greatest. You have come too far to give up now!
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Launching a breakthrough idea is like shooting skeet. People's needs change, so you must aim well ahead of the target to hit it.
quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

quotes.quote: The most exciting breakthroughs of the 21st century will not occur because of technology but because of an expanding concept of what it means to be human.
quotes.author: John Naisbitt

quotes.quote: To have a breakthrough, you must consciously connect with the invisible forces that are everywhere around you, urging you to go beyond your old conditioning.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The biggest breakthroughs in consciousness occur when things are difficult; when we have a choice to fall to the worst of ourselves or rise to the best of ourselves.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.quote: We all hope for breakthrough rebirth moments. When you're headed for a breakthrough moment, it's kind of scary because you say, 'If I break through then I have to make great change in my life.'
quotes.author: Dane Cook

quotes.quote: We can be creative and generate new breakthroughs, if we're willing to work with ideas from the pool of history - both distant and more recent - despite the potential for our experiments to fail.
quotes.author: Doug Dawson

quotes.quote: Every time you have a major breakthrough in self-knowledge, and see the way the divine works within your own psyche, external events, and interior experiences of the divine, you are transformed in some degree.
quotes.author: Thomas Keating

quotes.quote: When you realize that the real breakthroughs come from levels of higher consciousness, then you also realize that the achievement of maturity and wisdom is the most powerful generator of new beginnings possible.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The great breakthrough in your life comes when you realize that you can learn anything you need to learn to accomplish any goal that you set for yourself. This means there are no limits on what you can be, have or do.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: When there's ever a breakthrough, a true breakthrough, you can go back and find a time period when the consensus was 'well, that's nonsense!' so what that means is that a true creative researcher has to have confidence in nonsense.
quotes.author: Burt Rutan

quotes.quote: The nature of a breakthrough is for you to stand on what you've gotten, what you've loved, what's been important to you, what's touched you, what's inspired you, what's turned your life on; to stand on the value you've already created for yourself and look out at the possibility for being alive that opens up, like a freedom, in front of you.
quotes.author: Werner Erhard

quotes.quote: Any breakdown is a breakthrough.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: There is no breakthrough without a breakdown.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Breakthrough happened around me when breakup happened within me.
quotes.author: Jack W. Hayford

quotes.quote: The longevity of success depends on how well you manage your breakthroughs
quotes.author: Constance Chuks Friday

quotes.quote: Breakthrough ideas usually come from guys who look like they're hallucinating
quotes.author: Ben Horowitz

quotes.quote: To have a major breakthrough in policy, you have to be able to stop and think.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: When you are tempted to give up, your breakthrough is probably just around the corner.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Big breakthroughs happen when what is suddenly possible meets what is desperately needed
quotes.author: Thomas Friedman

quotes.quote: You never know how close you are to a breakthrough. It may be right around the corner. Don't quit!
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: When will we make the same breakthroughs in the way we treat each other as we have made in technology?
quotes.author: Theodore Zeldin

quotes.quote: Nearly every major breakthrough innovation has been preceded by a string of failed or misguided executions.
quotes.author: Frans Johansson

quotes.quote: For anyone that's ever had a musical breakthrough in their career, it's always followed by the departure period right after.
quotes.author: Questlove

quotes.quote: Real breakthroughs are not found because you want to develop some new technology, but because you are curious and want to find out how the world is.
quotes.author: Anton Zeilinger

quotes.quote: The actual breakthrough in the privacy of the studio, when one dares to apply paint in a new manner, is a solitary thrill, dependent upon no one else.
quotes.author: Mary Carroll Nelson

quotes.quote: All personal breakthroughs being with a change in beliefs. So how do we change? The most effective way is to get your brain to associate massive pain to the old belief.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Even in the dark times between experimental breakthroughs, there always continues a steady evolution of theoretical ideas, leading almost imperceptibly to changes in previous beliefs.
quotes.author: Steven Weinberg

quotes.quote: There is not ultimate breakthrough; what we find in the development of a creative life is an open-ended series of provisional breakthroughs. In this journey there is no endpoint, because it is the journey into the soul.
quotes.author: Stephen Nachmanovitch

quotes.quote: This is what happens with a breakthrough. The first ones through the door often get bruised if not broken. Eventually, with a little political acumen and racial sensitivity and a lot of hard work, a smooth new place can emerge.
quotes.author: Gwen Ifill

quotes.quote: Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Those who do not know how to weep with their whole heart do not know how to laugh either.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: The loss of love is not nearly as painful as our resistance to accepting it is.
quotes.author: Tigress Luv

quotes.quote: I'm going to smile and make you think I'm happy, I'm going to laugh, so you don't see me cry, I'm going to let you go in style, and even if it kills me - I'm going to smile.
quotes.author: Lone Star

quotes.quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
quotes.author: M. Kathleen Casey

quotes.quote: Don't you dare, for one more second, surround yourself with people who are not aware of the greatness that you are.
quotes.author: Jo Blackwell-Preston

quotes.quote: I will not try to convince you to love me, to respect me, to commit to me. I deserve better than that; I AM BETTER THAN THAT Goodbye.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: If you don't like being a doormat then get off the floor.
quotes.author: Al Anon

quotes.quote: Shoo. Away with you. It's my fault for expecting the extraordinary from the ordinary.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Just because a relationship ends, it doesn't mean it's not worth having.
quotes.author: Sarah Mlynowski

quotes.quote: Life always waits for some crisis to occur before revealing itself at its most brilliant.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: One day they'll realize they lost a diamond while playing with worthless stones.
quotes.author: Turcois Ominek

quotes.quote: Never love anybody that treats you like you're ordinary.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The love that lasts the longest is the love that is never returned.
quotes.author: William Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Families break up when people take hints you don't intend and miss hints you do intend.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Our story has three parts: a beginning, a middle, and an end. And although this is the way all stories unfold, I still can't believe that ours didn't go on forever.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: No man is rich enough to buy back his past.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I don't know why they call it heartbreak. It feels like every part of my body is broken too.
quotes.author: Missy Altijd

quotes.quote: The hottest love has the coldest end.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Love is unconditional, relationships are not.
quotes.author: Grant Gudmundson

quotes.quote: If we must part forever, Give me but one kind word to think upon, And please myself with, while my heart's breaking.
quotes.author: Thomas Otway

quotes.quote: For all sad words of tongue and pen, the saddest are these, It might have been.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf

quotes.quote: No matter who broke your heart, or how long it takes to heal, you'll never get through it without your friends.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The saddest thing about love is that not only that it cannot last forever, but that heartbreak is soon forgotten.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: I have lost and loved and won and cried myself to the person I am today.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: If people refuse to look at you in a new light and they can only see you for what you were, only see you for the mistakes you've made, if they don't realize that you are not your mistakes, then they have to go.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: I wish i were a little girl again, because skinned knees are easier to fix than broken heart.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.author: Victoria Holt

quotes.quote: The heart was made to be broken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.
quotes.author: Rita Mero

quotes.quote: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Watching you walk out of my life does not make me bitter or cynical about love. But rather makes me realize that if I wanted so much to be with the wrong person, how beautiful it will be when the right person comes along.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Hold on to the thought that no emotion lasts forever, no matter how wonderful or how terrible the emotion may be. The tears may last a little longer than you would like, but it will get better. I promise.
quotes.author: Osayi Osar-Emokpae

quotes.quote: I thought I lost something this summer, but I just realized, I never needed it.
quotes.author: Nicole Christie

quotes.quote: But thinking never took away tears. Only time did.
quotes.author: Allan Folsom

quotes.quote: Someone I loved once gave me a box full of darkness. It took me years to understand that this too, was a gift"
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Breaking up is part of life, but we shouldn't let it control it.
quotes.author: Barbara Willington

quotes.quote: Knowing when it is over is the beginning of a new life and the end of an old one.
quotes.author: Michael Penn

quotes.quote: Feeling hurt and lonely after a break up is natural. Spend time with family and friends to help ease the feeling.
quotes.author: Dr. Sigmund Hess

quotes.quote: Getting out of a horrible relationship is not only good for the mind but it is also good for the soul.
quotes.author: Simon Wash

quotes.quote: It is better to end a relationship too early than too late. You will never get the days, weeks, and years spent with someone you don't truly love back.
quotes.author: Jennifer Wallace

quotes.quote: Pleasure of love lasts but a moment, Pain of love lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: There are very few people who are not ashamed of having been in love when they no longer love each other.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: We always believe our first love is our last, and our last love our first.
quotes.author: George John Whyte-Melville

quotes.quote: It takes a couple seconds to say Hello, but forever to say Goodbye.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To fall in love is awfully simple, but to fall out of love is simply awful.
quotes.author: Bess Myerson

quotes.quote: I have a new found respect for women who have been through breast cancer and this surgery.
quotes.author: Giuliana Rancic

quotes.quote: Once I overcame breast cancer, I wasn't afraid of anything anymore.
quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

quotes.quote: Whether you're a mother or father, or a husband or a son, or a niece or a nephew or uncle, breast cancer doesn't discriminate.
quotes.author: Stephanie McMahon

quotes.quote: Breast cancer is not just a disease that strikes at women. It strikes at the very heart of who we are as women: how others perceive us, how we perceive ourselves, how we live, work and raise our families-or whether we do these things at all.
quotes.author: Debbie Wasserman Schultz

quotes.quote: Life after breast cancer can go back to normal. It's just the normal that has changed.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cancer is a word, not a sentence.
quotes.author: John Diamond

quotes.quote: You can be a victim of cancer, or a survivor of cancer. It's a mindset.
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.quote: I had cancer, cancer never had me.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There can be life after breast cancer. The prerequisite is early detection.
quotes.author: Ann Jillian

quotes.quote: Keep your sunny side up, keep yourself beautiful, and indulge yourself.
quotes.author: Betsey Johnson

quotes.quote: You beat cancer by how you live, why you live and in the manner in which you live.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Having cancer does make you try to be better at everything you do and enjoy every moment. It changes you forever. But it can be a positive change.
quotes.author: Jaclyn Smith

quotes.quote: Don't let breast cancer take away the motivation to achieve your dreams.
quotes.author: Diana Cohen

quotes.quote: If you have any doubt, go back againâ€¦ Because someone is in a white coat and using big medical instruments doesn't necessarily mean they're right
quotes.author: Kylie Minogue

quotes.quote: Cancer can touch you, but not your soul; neither your thoughts, nor your heart.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: Breast cancer changes you, and the change can be beautiful.
quotes.author: Jane Cook

quotes.quote: Cancer may have started the fight, but I will finish it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Breast cancer is scary and no one understands that like another woman who has gone through it too.
quotes.author: Mindy Sterling

quotes.quote: If you have a friend or family member with breast cancer, try not to look at her with â€˜sad eyes.' Treat her like you always did; just show a little extra love.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.quote: I have surgery scars, but I consider them battle scars.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Love and laughter are two of the most important universal cancer treatments on the planet. Overdose on them.
quotes.author: Tanya Masse

quotes.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself. So the only thing to really be afraid of is if you don't go get your mammograms.
quotes.author: Cynthia Nixon

quotes.quote: It's about focusing on the fight and not the fright.
quotes.author: Robin Roberts

quotes.quote: Whenever women struggle with breast cancer and face better care than ever, that's feminism.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Fight each round take it on the chin. And never never never ever give in.
quotes.author: Olivia Newton-John

quotes.quote: The most important thing in illness is never to lose heart.
quotes.author: Nikolai Lenin

quotes.quote: I've always thought of myself as being a warrior. When you actually have a battle, it's better than when you don't know who to fight.
quotes.author: Carly Simon

quotes.quote: Cancer is WAY too serious to be taken seriously all the time.
quotes.author: Tanya Masse

quotes.quote: I believe that breast cancer will soon become something we live with rather than die fromâ€¦
quotes.author: Lindsay Nicholson

quotes.quote: Show you care. Be aware.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The death clock is ticking slowly in our breast, and each drop of blood measures its time, and our life is a lingering fever.
quotes.author: Karl Georg Bchner

quotes.quote: Never be ashamed of a scar. It simply means you were stronger than whatever tried to hurt you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Whoever said winning isn't everything, obviously wasn't fighting breast cancer.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I have cancer. Cancer doesn't have me.
quotes.author: Marco Calderon

quotes.quote: When someone has cancer, the whole family & everyone who loves them does, too.
quotes.author: Terri Clark

quotes.quote: October is breast cancer awareness month, but for a survivor, it's every single day.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Joy shouldn't go away because you have cancer.
quotes.author: Mandi Hudson

quotes.quote: No matter what the statistics say, there is always a way.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.quote: You have been assigned this mountain, to show others it can be moved.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cancer does not have a face until it's yours or someone you know.
quotes.author: Anthony del Monte

quotes.quote: As a survivor of breast cancer, I cannot imagine what it must be like for children to battle the disease, or to be a terrified parent watching their child endure treatments.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.quote: I wasn't ever afraid of cancer, but I was annoyed. It was an interruption because I was turning 48 and time was getting on for my running. But I heeded the message. And now that I've come out the other end, I can help other ladies go through the same thing.
quotes.author: Priscilla Welch

quotes.quote: My mother has had breast cancer twice. And my mother has always been this very positive human being; a glass-half-full type. Like when she was in treatment and feeling really bad, she would always talk about some nurse that was particularly nice to her.
quotes.author: Susanne Bier

quotes.quote: Whoever thought up the word 'mammogram?' Every time I hear it I think I'm supposed to put my breast in an envelope and then send it to someone.
quotes.author: Jan King

quotes.quote: If you maintain that god awards the appropriate cancers, you must also account for the numbers of infants who contract leukemia.
quotes.author: Hitchens

quotes.quote: Cancer victimhood contains a permanent temptation to be self-centered and even solipsistic.
quotes.author: Hitchens

quotes.quote: Cancer patients are lied to, not just because the disease is, a death sentence, but because it is felt to be obscene— in the original meaning of that word: ill-omened, abominable, repugnant to the senses.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: While breast cancer among young women is on the rise, 80 percent of breast cancers occur in postmenopausal women, and 60 percent of women with breast cancer live as long as women without the disease.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: Now, it is cancer's turn to be the disease that doesn't knock before it enters.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: To confront cancer is to encounter a parallel species, one perhaps more adapted to survival than we are.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Mukherjee

quotes.quote: Cancer is on the rise, and though most of us will not 'slouch towards a malignant end' each of us will know someone who does.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Mukherjee

quotes.quote: An imaginary ailment is worse than a disease.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: Desperate diseases must have desperate cures.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: A disease known is half-cured.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: All diseases of Christians are to be ascribed to demons.
quotes.author: St. Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Before you can cure the diseases of the body, you must cure the diseases of the soul— greed, ignorance, prejudice, and intolerance.
quotes.author: Paul Ehrlich

quotes.quote: Cures were developed for which there were no known diseases
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: My diagnosis flung me into despair until it hit me: I’m alive.
quotes.author: Dana Dinerman

quotes.quote: Cancer didn't bring me to my knees; it brought me to my feet.
quotes.author: Michael Douglas

quotes.quote: Cancer is a journey, but you walk the road alone. There are many places to stop along the way and get nourishment – you just have to be willing to take it.
quotes.author: Emily Hollenberg

quotes.quote: More than 10 million Americans are living with cancer, and they demonstrate the ever-increasing possibility of living beyond cancer.
quotes.author: Sheryl Crow

quotes.quote: You know, once you've stood up to cancer, everything else feels like a pretty easy fight.
quotes.author: David H. Koch

quotes.quote: Men get it. I think us men need you, women, to help us survive.
quotes.author: Peter Criss

quotes.quote: Every woman needs to know the facts. And the fact is, when it comes to breast cancer, every woman is at risk.
quotes.author: Debbie Wasserman Schultz

quotes.quote: With breast cancer, it’s all about detection. You have to educate young women and encourage them to do everything they have to do.
quotes.author: Bill Rancic

quotes.quote: Since I had cancer I've realized that every day is a bonus.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Boycott

quotes.quote: Time is shortening. But every day that I challenge this cancer and survive is a victory for me.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: Cancer has shown me what family is. It showed me a love that I never knew really existed.
quotes.author: Michael Douglas

quotes.quote: Children don't just get milk from breastfeeding, they get our energy too.
quotes.author: Stephen Gaskin

quotes.quote: There are three reasons for breast-feeding: the milk is always at the right temperature; it comes in attractive containers; and the cat can't get it.
quotes.author: Irena Chalmers

quotes.quote: Breastfeeding is an instinctual and natural act, but it is also an art that is learned day by day. The reality is that almost all women can breastfeed, have enough milk for their babies and learn how to overcome problems both large and small. It is almost always simply a matter of practical knowledge and not a question of good luck.
quotes.author: La Leche League

quotes.quote: Breastfeeding reminds us of the universal truth of abundance; the more we give out, the more we are filled up, and that divine nourishment - the source from which we all draw is, like a mother's breast, ever full and ever flowing.
quotes.author: Sarah Buckley

quotes.quote: Something as simple as better breastfeeding could save a million children a year.
quotes.author: Anne M Mulcahy

quotes.quote: Breast milk is better than any udder milk!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: As a breastfeeding mother you are basically just meals on heels.
quotes.author: Kathy Lette

quotes.quote: While breastfeeding may not seem the right choice for every parent, it is the best choice for every baby.
quotes.author: Amy Spangler

quotes.quote: A baby nursing at a mother's breast is an undeniable affirmation of our rootedness in nature
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.quote: Breastfeeding is an unsentimental metaphor for how love works, in a way. You don't decide how much and how deeply to love you respond to the beloved, and give with joy exactly as much as they want.
quotes.author: Marni Jackson

quotes.quote: The natural power of breastfeeding is one of the greatest wonders of the world. It is about real love. It is about caring and celebrating the wondrous joy of nurturing a new life. It is about enjoying being a woman.
quotes.author: Anwar Fazal

quotes.quote: There is no substitute for mother's milk.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: Human milk is not just a food; it also complements the immaturity of organs in infants.
quotes.author: Peter Hartmann

quotes.quote: Breastfeeding is amazing; you can actually feel your stomach shrink with every feed.
quotes.author: Melanie Brown

quotes.quote: Mother's milk, time-tested for millions of years, is the best nutrient for babies because it is nature's perfect food.
quotes.author: Robert S. Mendelsohn

quotes.quote: They do say breastfeeding is nature's lipo.
quotes.author: Ana Ortiz

quotes.quote: Breastfeeding is nature's health plan.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A little child born yesterday a thing on mother's milk and kisses fed.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: It seems as if every month brings another study showing that breast milk is what Ponce de LeÃ³n should have been searching for.
quotes.author: Nicholas Day

quotes.quote: Breastfeeding is a mother's gift to herself, her baby and the earth.
quotes.author: Pamela K. Wiggins

quotes.quote: A newborn baby has only three demands. They are warmth in the arms of its mother, food from her breasts, and security in the knowledge of her presence. Breastfeeding satisfies all three.
quotes.author: Grantly Dick-Read

quotes.quote: I love to breathe. Oxygen is sexy!
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.quote: The air up there in the clouds is very pure and fine, bracing and delicious. And why shouldn't it be? it is the same the angels breathe.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Do not be afraid that joy will make the pain worse; it is needed like the air we breathe.
quotes.author: Goran Persson

quotes.quote: Remember to breathe. It is after all, the secret of life.
quotes.author: Gregory Maguire

quotes.quote: It's a breath you took too late.It's a death that's worse than fate.
quotes.author: Elvis Costello

quotes.quote: When you own your breath, nobody can steal your peace.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Try to learn to breathe deeply, really to taste food when you eat, and when you sleep, really to sleep. Try as much as possible to be wholly alive with all your might, and when you laugh, laugh like hell. And when you get angry, get good and angry. Try to be alive. You will be dead soon enough.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: One should not go into churches if one wants to breathe pure air.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Only when you explore the ecstasy of simply being, where even to breathe is a distraction, can you call yourself complete.
quotes.author: Sadghuru

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive, to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Breath is the finest gift of nature. Be grateful for this wonderful gift.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Breathing is the greatest pleasure in life.
quotes.author: Giovanni Papini

quotes.quote: I would like to say that your beauty made it difficult to breathe.
quotes.author: Waylon H. Lewis

quotes.quote: Remember how to breathe, how to live, please!!
quotes.author: Fuyumi Soryo

quotes.quote: Underwear makes me uncomfortable and besides my parts have to breathe.
quotes.author: Jean Harlow

quotes.quote: Breathe and don't try to be perfect.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: Breath is the bridge which connects life to consciousness, which unites your body to your thoughts.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: While we breathe, we will hope.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The delicous breath of rain was in the air.
quotes.author: Kate Chopin

quotes.quote: If you woke up breathing, congratulations! You have another chance.
quotes.author: Andrea Boydston

quotes.quote: The more we talk about our troubles and our fears, the more life we breathe into them.
quotes.author: Evinda Lepins

quotes.quote: I live and breathe every element in life.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: Breathing, according to me, corresponds to taking charge of one's own life.
quotes.author: Luce Irigaray

quotes.quote: You are that one breath. that puts all the remaining breaths. back into my body.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: Breathe. It's only a bad day not a bad life.
quotes.author: Ashley Purdy

quotes.quote: I write for the same reason I breathe because if I didn't, I would die.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: And when I breathed, my breath was lightning.
quotes.author: Black Elk

quotes.quote: Do you mind if I sit back a little? Because your breath is very bad.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: I have to be a star like another man has to breathe.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quotes.quote: He lives most life whoever breathes most air.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
