quotes.quote: Bliss begins with the breath. We breathe in, and accept all that is new. We breathe out, and release all that has passed.
quotes.author: Sara Wiseman

quotes.quote: You honestly expect me to breathe in a world without air?
quotes.author: Renee Ahdieh

quotes.quote: The air we breathe is still free, but for how much time. I believe someone is busy patenting it to start selling it for profit
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Happiness breathes when you do.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: This air we breathe is precious, and the glaciers helped me understand that and stay focused on that.
quotes.author: James Balog

quotes.quote: As you breathe in, cherish yourself. As you breathe out, cherish all Beings.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Every breath is a resurrection.
quotes.author: Gregory Orr

quotes.quote: Conscious breathing is the best antidote to stress, anxiety and depression.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Keep breathing. Just keep doing it. It's easy. In and out.
quotes.author: Jenny Downham

quotes.quote: There is one way of breathing that is shameful and constricted. Then, there's another way: a breath of love that takes you all the way to infinity.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: To know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Your omnipresence is marvellous! I breathe and you enter me. I exhale and enter into you.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: The moment you breathe your first breath, you won.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: Take every breath as an event.
quotes.author: Arzum Uzun

quotes.quote: As long as I breathe, I attack.
quotes.author: Bernard Hinault

quotes.quote: What can we do but keep on breathing in and out, modest and willing, and in our places?
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Just breathe. Ten tiny breaths. Seize them. Feel them. Love them.
quotes.author: K.A. tucker

quotes.quote: Breathe life back into your ambitions, your desires, your goals, your relationships.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: It is a common belief that we breathe with our lungs alone, but in point of fact, the work of breathing is done by the whole body.
quotes.author: Alexander Lowen

quotes.quote: Breathe gently. Let go of your thoughts, past and future, memories and plans.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: Breathe quietly and let it be. Let your body relax and your heart soften. Open to whatever you experience without fighting.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: We breathe when we're wrong, we breathe when we're right, we breathe even as we slip off the ledge toward an early grave. It cannot be undone.
quotes.author: Tahereh Mafi

quotes.quote: We breathe so that the trees thrive and the trees breathe so that we are able to live. Perfect symbiosis.
quotes.author: Sanchita Pandey

quotes.quote: Breathe. Don't panic and flee. Sink. Feel it all. Imagine. Let it burn.
quotes.author: Glennon Doyle

quotes.quote: Now breathe, and step out again, a step further from the past. Step into the streets as narrow as bones, the white streets of the labyrinth, and breathe deeply. Breathe, and step out once more.
quotes.author: Kevin Barry

quotes.quote: When life's storms threaten to drown us we just do our best to keep calm, carry on, and breathe. If I've learned one thing along the way it's that learning to breathe again is a team sport and we all need a little help along the way.
quotes.author: Niki Hardy

quotes.quote: There are so many distractions in your daily life that taking the time to pause and consciously breathe is a gift you can give yourself – and in so doing you give it to others who feel your sense of calm and inner strength.
quotes.author: Ntathu Allen

quotes.quote: Breathe in, take what life hands you; hold it, accept it; breathe out, let it go.
quotes.author: Susan Gable

quotes.quote: Some things are out of your control, but not your breath, so breathe in with me, okay?
quotes.author: R.S. Grey

quotes.quote: The more you breathe, the more you feel.
quotes.author: Isabel Losada

quotes.quote: No man should have to fight to breathe in good health and peace.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: The deep breathe you just took to show that your problems are bigger than you, is the final breathe someone had taken right now in his life! As long as your breathe is not the final one, you still have a hope!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: It would be ridiculous to hold your breath and blame others for your inability to breathe.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: You feel yourself a broken one and you still breathe.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Now but to breathe its praise, minds me in many ways.
quotes.author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quotes.quote: Breathe softly into it, accepting all that is present with a healing kindness.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: The air we breathe, the wind that blows around us, the earth that we walk upon, the lives of others around us, the most intimate things of our lives, are the place of our sleep or of our awakening.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: Thoughts that breathe, and words that burn.
quotes.author: Thomas Gray

quotes.quote: For you, I'll stay invisible. I'll be the air you breathe.
quotes.author: Frances de Pontes Peebles

quotes.quote: Fill your paper with the breathings of your heart.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Through Christ, you can breathe again, inhaling the wonder of God that always surrounds you, exhaling words and deeds of praise that reflect all of who He is.
quotes.author: Louie Giglio

quotes.quote: I wish that I could breathe, if only I could breathe.
quotes.author: Tamala Tiedemann

quotes.quote: Breathe with unconditional breath the unconditioned air.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: You are breathing patiently; it is a beautiful sound. It is your life, which is so close to my own that I would not know.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Breathing dreams like air.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: There is no difference between your breathing and the breathing of the rain forest, between your bloodstream and the world’s rivers, between your bones and the chalk cliffs of Dover.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: With every breath, the old moment is lost; a new moment arrives. We exhale and we let go of the old moment. It is lost to us. In doing so, we let go of the person we used to be. We inhale and breathe in the moment that is becoming.
quotes.author: Lama Surya Das

quotes.quote: Breathing in, let golden light come into you through your head.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: A true leader always keeps an element of surprise up his sleeve, which others cannot grasp but which keeps his public excited and breathless.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: He was free to enjoy the breathless glee that overwhelmed him: the speed, the clear cold air, the total silence, the feeling of balance and excitement and peace.
quotes.author: Lois Lowry

quotes.quote: A good novel rushes you forward like a skiff down a stream, and you arrive at the end, perhaps breathless, but unexhausted
quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

quotes.quote: There must be always remaining in every life, some place for the singing of angels, some place for that which in itself is breathless and beautiful.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: Sometimes, people trying to commit suicide manage it in a manner that leaves them breathless with astonishment.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: It was less like seeing than like being for the first time seen, knocked breathless by a powerful glance.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: You are that one breath. that puts all the remaining breaths. back into my body.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: Many of us pursue pleasure with such breathless haste that we hurry past it.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: May our twilights mix togetherlike breath and breathlessness.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: People are so wonderful that a photographer has only to wait for that breathless moment to capture what he wants on film.
quotes.author: Weegee

quotes.quote: Like tourists huffing and puffing to reach the peak we forget the view on the way up.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's the same moments that take your breath away that breathe purpose and love back into your life.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: All Heaven and Earth are still, though not in sleep, but breathless, as we grow when feeling most.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Breathless, we flung us on a windy hill, laughed in the sun, and kissed the lovely grass.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.quote: Breathless and unharmed, we emerge from the mazes of metaphysics and psychology where man and the soul are playing hide-and-seek.
quotes.author: Ameen Rihani

quotes.quote: That's how I always want to remember my time with you. Like a pure white light, breathtaking to behold.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: It is still breathtaking to me to watch people bring love, preciousness and kindness to their inner world, allowing the light of God to shine through their eyes so that the beauty of their soul can come forth.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: The view after 70 is breathtaking. What is lacking is someone, anyone, of the older generation to whom you can turn when you want to satisfy your curiosity about some detail of the landscape of the past. There is no longer any older generation. You have become it, while your mind was mostly on other matters.
quotes.author: William Maxwell

quotes.quote: Be like the ocean. Breathtaking to look at, strong enough to be destroyed and gentle enough so others find comfort in your presence.
quotes.author: c.w. brooke

quotes.quote: Life can be just black and white, but with imagination, life is a kaleidoscope of exhilarating colors and breathtaking adventures.
quotes.author: Wes Adamson

quotes.quote: You are a breathtaking work of art, far too brilliant to be hidden, far too beautiful to be broken.
quotes.author: Sai Pradeep

quotes.quote: It is the climbing of the mountain that makes the view from the top so breathtaking.
quotes.author: Richard C. Miller

quotes.quote: Sometimes you won't feel pleasant during a meditation session; it seems like an uphill run. But when you get to the top, the view is rather breathtaking.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: What gave money its true meaning was its dark-night namelessness, its breathtaking interchangeability.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Breathtaking, splendid, wondrous, sublime, all those words describe you, exactly as you are. You are a work of art! Enjoy your beauty!
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Life is amazing. And then it's awful. And then it's amazing again. And in between the amazing and the awful, it's ordinary and mundane and routine. Breathe in the amazing, hold on through the awful, and relax and exhale during the ordinary. That's just living heartbreaking, soul-healing, amazing, awful, ordinary life. And it's breathtakingly beautiful.
quotes.author: L.R.Knost

quotes.quote: Every woman should see herself looking uniquely breathtaking, in something tailored to celebrate her body, so that she is better able to appreciate her own beauty and better equipped to withstand the ideals of our narrow-waisted, narrow- minded culture.
quotes.author: Susan Jane Gilman

quotes.quote: With breathtaking rapidity, we are destroying all that was lovely to look at and turning America into a prison house of the spirit. The affluent society, with relentless single-minded energy, is turning our cities, most of suburbia and most of our roadways into the most affluent slum on earth.
quotes.author: Eric Sevareid

quotes.quote: The breeze at dawn has secrets to tell you. Don't go back to sleep.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The breeze of grace is always blowing; set your sail to catch that breeze.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: Speak to the breeze cautiously during those lonely summer nights.
quotes.author: Marlen Komar

quotes.quote: Each time a breeze starts, I feel the air all the way through me.
quotes.author: Nina LaCour

quotes.quote: A persistent breeze lifted the thin curtains, fluttering a few moments of tranquility into the turbulent day.
quotes.author: Susan Abulhawa

quotes.quote: A breeze shook rain out of new leaves onto their hair, but in their pursuit of eternity they never noticed the chill.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: A slight breeze cooled the Hawaiian spring air, swaying the branches of palm trees, which cast black silhouettes against the purple and orange colors of the twilight sky.
quotes.author: Victoria Kahler

quotes.quote: The breezes of the West African night were intimate and shy, licking the hair, sweeping through cotton dresses with unseemly intimacy, then disappearing into the utter blackness.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The summer breeze was blowing on your face Within your violet you treasure your summery words And as the shiver from my neck down to my spine Ignited me in daylight and nature in the garden.
quotes.author: Van Morrison

quotes.quote: A breeze blew softly, slightly rippling the water as it carried the heady scents of late Carolina springtime through the air. Honeysuckle. Jasmine. Ripe, pungent river mud. Ah, the world felt right.
quotes.author: Caitlin Rush

quotes.quote: A fragrant breeze wandered up from the quiet sea, trailed along the beach, and drifted back to the sea again, wondering where to go next. On a mad impulse it went up to the beach again. It drifted back to sea.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: A breeze lifted off the ocean and several hundred notes from the wind chimes tinkled like ice shaken in silver cups. They altered the mood of the forest the way an orchestra does a theater when it begins tuning up its instruments.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: Every breeze wafts intelligence from country to country, every wave rolls it and gives it forth, and all in turn receive it. There is a vast commerce of ideas, there are marts and exchanges for intellectual discoveries, and a wonderful fellowship of those individual intelligences which make up the minds and opinions of the age.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: Sometimes the tender breeze can help us feel the presence of someone by bringing us their fragrance.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: Whenever there is a breeze in the old forest, you might, for a moment, realize that the trees are singing. There, on the wind, are the voices of sugarberry and juniper and maple...
quotes.author: Kathi Appelt

quotes.quote: The breeze across the desert as the light died was so sweet she could almost drink it.
quotes.author: Mike Bond

quotes.quote: The gentle wind, a sweet and passionate wooer, Kisses the blushing leaf.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: No one knows what makes the soul wake up so happy! Maybe a dawn breeze has blown the veil from the face of God.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The whispering breeze pants on the leaves, and dies upon the trees.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: A gentle wind of western birth, From some far summer sea, Wakes daisies in the wintry earth.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: You cannot kill a breeze, a wind, a fragrance; you cannot kill a dream or an ambition.
quotes.author: Michel Onfray

quotes.quote: They have a fine breeze and are now we hope, well on their way.
quotes.author: Lewis Tappan

quotes.quote: One small breeze doesn't make a wind storm.
quotes.author: John McGraw

quotes.quote: A breeze discovered my open book And began to flutter the leaves to look
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: A breeze, a forgotten summer, a smile, all can fit into a storefront window.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: A breeze passes in the night. When did it spring up? Whence does it come? Whither is it going? No man knows.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: The softest breeze to fairest flowers gives birth: Think not that Prudence dwells in dark abodes, She scans the future with the eye of gods.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: A cool breeze stirred my hair at that moment, as the night wind began to come down from the hills, but it felt like a breath from another world.
quotes.author: Francis Marion

quotes.quote: As a breeze ruffles the surface of a lake and distorts the images reflected therein, so also the chitta vrtti (fluctuations of mind) disturb the peace of the mind. The still waters of a lake reflect the beauty around it. When the mind is still, the beauty of the Self is seen reflected in it.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: A breeze will always blow in the direction that it wishes to go.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: A ray of sunshine, a balmy breeze Are a gift from God above, And He also gives us faithful friends. To warm our hearts with love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You evidently feel that brevity is the soul of widowhood.
quotes.author: Hector Hugh Munro

quotes.quote: Like all sweet dreams, it will be brief, but brevity makes sweetness, doesn't it?
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The brevity of life is grace to walk on your own path.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The fewer the words, the better the prayer.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: This is a brief life, but in its brevity it offers us some splendid moments, some meaningful adventures.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: There's a great power in words, if you don't hitch too many of them together.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Brevity in writing is the best insurance for its perusal.
quotes.author: Rudolf Virchow

quotes.quote: If brevity is the soul of wit then brevity and levity are the whole of it.
quotes.author: Michael R. Burch

quotes.quote: The little things are what is eternal, and the rest, all the rest, is brevity, extreme brevity.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: Brevity and conciseness are the parents of correction.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: Let those who thoughtfully consider the brevity of life remember the length of eternity.
quotes.author: Thomas Ken

quotes.quote: With this sense of the splendour of our experience and of its awful brevity, gathering all we are into one desperate effort to see and touch, we shall hardly have time to make theories about the things we see and touch.
quotes.author: Walter Pater

quotes.quote: If human lives be, for their very brevity, sweet, then beast lives are sweeter still.
quotes.author: Isobelle Carmody

quotes.quote: It is my ambition to say in ten sentences what others say in a whole book.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Many things prevent knowledge, including the obscurity of the subject and the brevity of human life
quotes.author: Protagoras

quotes.quote: Brevity is the soul of lingerie.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: The brevity of human life gives a melancholy to the profession of the architect.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There is need of brevity, that the thought may run on.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Aim for brevity while avoiding jargon.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: True brevity of expression consists in a man only saying what is worth saying, while avoiding all diffuse explanations of things which every one can think out for himself.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: The more you say, the less people remember.
quotes.author: Francois Fenelon

quotes.quote: Brevities are the golden formations in the quartz of literature.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: Never be so brief as to become obscure.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: If it takes a lot of words to say what you have in mind, give it more thought.
quotes.author: Dennis Roth

quotes.quote: To write good poems is the secret of brevity.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: A few sentences are enough to tell the truth.
quotes.author: Robert Sarah

quotes.quote: If you can't explain something in a few words, try fewer.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: A parsimony of words prodigal of sense.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: No weapons are more potent than brevity and simplicity.
quotes.author: Katherine Cecil Thurston

quotes.quote: The definition of Brevity: That which people believe would be a virtue - in me!
quotes.author: Greg Curtis

quotes.quote: The secret to good writing is to use small words for big ideas, not to use big words for small ideas.
quotes.author: Oliver Markus Malloy

quotes.quote: When a sentence is made stronger, it usually becomes shorter. Thus, brevity is a by-product of vigor.
quotes.author: William Strunk, Jr.

quotes.quote: In the pleading of cases nothing pleases so much as brevity.
quotes.author: Pliny The Younger

quotes.quote: It is with words as with sunbeams - the more they are condensed, the deeper they burn.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Brevity may be the soul of wit, but not when someone's saying "I love you.
quotes.author: Judith Viorst

quotes.quote: Those who make the worst use of their time are the first to complain of its brevity.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Brevity is a great charm of eloquence.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: It is excellent discipline for an author to feel that he must say all that he has to say in the fewest possible words, or his readers is sure to skip them.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: it is the brevity of life which makes it tolerable; its experiences have value because they have an end.
quotes.author: Winifred Holtby

quotes.quote: Brevity in writing is what charity is to all other virtues - righteousness is nothing without the one, nor authorship without the other.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Every epigram should resemble a bee; it should have sting, honey, and brevity.
quotes.author: Martial

quotes.quote: Brevity is the best recommendation of speech, whether in a senator or an orator.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: It is such a great fault to talk too much that, in business and conversation, if what is good is also brief, it is doubly good, and one gains by brevity what one often loses by an excess of words.
quotes.author: Madeleine de Souvre

quotes.quote: The most valuable of all talents is that of never using two words when one will do.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: For effective communication, use brevity. Jesus said, 'Follow me.' Now that's brief! He could be brief because of all that he was that he didn't have to say.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Brevity never fatigues; therefore, brevity is always a welcome guest.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.quote: Brevity is the soul of wit.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It is such a great fault to talk too much that, in business and conversation, if what is good is also brief, it is doubly good, and one gains by brevity what one often loses by an excess of words.
quotes.author: Madame de Sable

quotes.quote: As it is the characteristic of great wits to say much in few words, so it is of small wits to talk much and say nothing.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: I have made this letter longer than usual because I lack the time to make it short.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Be sincere...be brief..be seated.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: They talk most who have the least to say.
quotes.author: Matthew Prior

quotes.quote: Be brief, for no discourse can please when too long.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Much wisdom often goes with the fewest words.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: People who know little are usually great talkers while men who know much say little.
quotes.author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: Blessed is the man who, having nothing to say, abstains from giving us wordy evidence of the fact.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Nothing is more unseemly than to give very long legs to very brief ideas.
quotes.author: Joaquim Maria Machado de Assis

quotes.quote: Nothing is often a good thing to say, and always a clever thing to say.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: A vast meaning is unfolded in each line, with such power that a sentence only a line long would suffice for a whole life's training.
quotes.author: Rufinus

quotes.quote: One rare, strange virtue in speeches, and the secret of their mastery, is, that they are short.
quotes.author: Halleck

quotes.quote: Have something to say; say it, and stop when you've done.
quotes.author: Tyron Edwards

quotes.quote: When one has no design but to speak the plain truth, he may say a great deal in a very narrow compass.
quotes.author: Steele

quotes.quote: Genuine good taste consists in saying much in few words, in choosing among our thoughts, in having order and arrangement in what we say, and in speaking with composure.
quotes.author: Fenelon

quotes.quote: Talk to the point, and stop when you have reached it.
quotes.author: John Neal

quotes.quote: Words are like leaves, and where they most abound, Much fruit of sense beneath is rarely found.
quotes.author: Pope

quotes.quote: When you introduce a moral lesson let it be brief.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: When asked his greatest surprise — the brevity of life.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The little things are what is eternal, and the rest, all the rest, is brevity, extreme brevity.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: Brevity is wise in discussions; wordiness leads to invention.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: If I am to speak ten minutes, I need a week for preparation; if fifteen minutes, three days; if half an hour, two days; if an hour, I am ready now.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Spartans, stoics, heroes, saints, and gods use short and positive speech.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: One false word, one extra word, and somebody's thinking about how they have to buy paper towels at the store. Brevity is very important. If you're going to be long-winded, it should be for a purpose. Not just because you like your words.
quotes.author: Patricia Marx

quotes.quote: Through an arbitrary problem, I had arrived at a tenet of good writing: brevity wins.
quotes.author: Michael Winter

quotes.quote: There are risks in the sheer brevity of Twitter, and it's actually quite an elegant art reducing what you have to say to 140 characters, and it's something that I quite enjoy attempting to do.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: I take six or seven years to write really small books. There is a kind of aesthetic of leanness, of brevity.
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.quote: Writing is 1 percent inspiration and 99 percent elimination.
quotes.author: Louise Brooks

quotes.quote: Most of the money given by rich people in 'charity' is made up of conscience money, 'ransom,' political bribery, and bids for titles.... One buys moral credit by signing a cheque, which is easier than turning a prayer wheel.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: You don't necessarily need atomic bombs to destroy a nation. Politicians who value their pockets more than the life of citizens always do that every day.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: I have often noticed that a bribe has that effect - it changes a relation. The man who offers a bribe gives away a little of his own importance; the bribe once accepted, he becomes the inferior, like a man who has paid for a woman.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: When I go to hell, I mean to carry a bribe: for look you, good gifts evermore make way for the worst persons.
quotes.author: John Webster

quotes.quote: Richer, than doing nothing for a bribe; Prouder, than rustling in unpaid-for silk.
quotes.author: Belarius

quotes.quote: Honesty stands at the gate and knocks, and bribery enters in.
quotes.author: Barnabe Rich

quotes.quote: In poor countries, officials receive explicit bribes; in D.C. they get the sophisticated, implicit, unspoken promise to work for large corporations.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: It is a great mistake to suppose that bribery and corruption, although they may be very convenient for gratifying the ambition or the vanity of individuals, have any great effect upon the fortunes or the power of parties. And it is a great mistake to suppose that bribery and corruption are means by which power can either be ob-tained or retained.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: In the last few years, the very idea of telling the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth is dredged up only as a final resort when the alternative options of deception, threat and bribery have all been exhausted.
quotes.author: Michael Musto

quotes.quote: Judges and senates have been bought for gold; Esteem and love were never to be sold.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Until the nineteen-seventies, Western countries paid little attention to corruption overseas, and bribery was seen as an unpleasant but necessary part of doing business there. In some European countries, businesses were even allowed to deduct bribes as an expense.
quotes.author: James Surowiecki

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the effectiveness of a straight cash bribe.
quotes.author: Claud Cockburn

quotes.quote: Though the bribe be small, yet the fault is great.
quotes.author: Edward Coke

quotes.quote: Corruption in Saudi Arabia is quite different from corruption in most other countries, as it is not limited to a 'bribe' in return for a contract, or expensive gift for the family member of a government official or prince, or use of a private jet that is charged to the government so a family can go on vacation.
quotes.author: Jamal Khashoggi

quotes.quote: If people are stealing the resources of this nation, if people are taking bribes - if judges or persons in authority, whether they are judges or whoever they may be in government, ministers, whoever, if they are taking bribes - it attacks the fundament of our existence as a society.
quotes.author: Yemi Osinbajo

quotes.quote: Too poor for a bribe, and too proud to importune, he had not the method of making a fortune.
quotes.author: Thomas Gray

quotes.quote: The money on your hands is the reward for your hard work. The money under your table is the ruining of someone else's hardowork. Be paid for your hardworks. Else you will be paid back one day.
quotes.author: Anubama Gopal

quotes.quote: Corruption in the form of bribery and misuse of public funds is a major obstacle to democracy and economic development.
quotes.author: Ulla Tørnæs

quotes.quote: One of the biggest curses from which India is suffering - I do not say that other coutries are free from it, but I think our condition is much worse - is bribery and corruption, That really is a poison.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quotes.quote: You could not bribe honest people, but bad people would accept bribery.
quotes.author: Anne Holm

quotes.quote: By gold all good faith has been banished; by gold our rights are abused; the law itself is influenced by gold, and soon there will be an end of every modest restraint.
quotes.author: Sextus Propertius

quotes.quote: Between friends there is no bribery. ... the relationship of friends is intrinsically fair and equal. Neither feels stronger or more clever or more beautiful than the other.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: One must beware of this ministers who can do nothing without money and those who want to do everything with money.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: No mortal thing can bear so high a price, But that with mortal thing it may be bought.
quotes.author: Walter Raleigh

quotes.quote: Corruption happens because there is impunity. That's the reason why corruption is widespread at all levels - from the person who asks for a bribe on the street to those who hold prominent positions.
quotes.author: Joao Lourenco

quotes.quote: In my opinion it is less shameful for a king to be overcome by force of arms than by bribery.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: The core of the concept of a bribe is an inducement improperly influencing the performance of a public function meant to be gratuitously exercised.
quotes.author: John T. Noonan Jr.

quotes.quote: All over the world, wherever there are capitalists, freedom of the press means freedom to buy up newspapers, to buy writers, to bribe, buy and fake “public opinion” for the benefit of the bourgeoisie.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: It's often said that there are countries where bribery is a way of life, and that's still the case.
quotes.author: Laurence Urgenson

quotes.quote: The dictionary defines bribery as the act or practice of giving or taking money or other payment to influence judgment or action. This is a bribe.
quotes.author: Betty Martini

quotes.quote: Not every gift must you stretch your hands to take! Sometimes, just put your hands by your side and humbly and courageously say thank you!
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: Men say they love independence in a woman, but they don't waste a second demolishing it brick by brick.
quotes.author: Candice Bergen

quotes.quote: Brick walls are there for a reason. The brick walls aren't there to keep us out. The brick walls are there to show us how badly we want things.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: We build our character from the bricks of habit we pile up day by day.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It takes a thousand bricks to build a wall, but only one to tear it down.
quotes.author: Markus W. Lunner

quotes.quote: I like talking to a brick wall- it's the only thing in the world that never contradicts me!
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Belief in oneself is one of the most important bricks in building any successful venture.
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: No man ever wetted clay and then left it, as if there would be bricks by chance and fortune.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.quote: Your own words are the bricks and mortar of the dreams you want to realize. Your words are the greatest power you have. The words you choose and their use establish the life you experience.
quotes.author: Sonia Choquette

quotes.quote: A concept is a brick. It can be used to build a courthouse of reason. Or it can be thrown through the window.
quotes.author: Gilles Deleuze

quotes.quote: Big things are built one brick at a time. Victories are achieved one choice at a time. A life well lived is chosen one day at a time.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: Remember, don't try to build the greatest wall that's ever been built. Focus on laying a single, expertly-placed brick. Then keep doing that, every day.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: A half truth, like half a brick, is always more forcible as an argument than a whole one. It carries better.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: A career is like a house: it's made of many bricks, and each brick has the same value, because without any one of them, the house would collapse.
quotes.author: Andrea Bocelli

quotes.quote: Bricks without straw are more easily made than imagination without memories.
quotes.author: Lord Dunsany

quotes.quote: Guilt and defensiveness are bricks in a wall against which we all flounder; they serve none of our futures.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: I think your life is governed not by the bricks or mortar around you, it's governed by who holds your hand and who spits in your eye.
quotes.author: David McCallum

quotes.quote: After the door of a woman's heart has once swung on its silent hinges, a man thinks he can prop it open with a brick and go away and leave it.
quotes.author: Myrtle Reed

quotes.quote: If you don't break a hole through the brick wall, don't just start digging a new hole. Keep going until you break through that wall.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: I do not have to build a perfect wall today. I just have to lay a perfect brick.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: People who avoid the brick walls - all power to ya, but we all have to hit them sometimes in order to push through to the next level, to evolve.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: The ships hung in the sky in much the same way that bricks don't.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: The way to become famous fast is to throw a brick at someone who is famous.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: The creation of a world view is the work of a generation rather than of an individual, but we each of us, for better or for worse, add our brick to the edifice.
quotes.author: John Dos Passos

quotes.quote: The family is where we are formed as people. Every family is a brick in the building of society.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: They cannot see that we must lay one brick at a time, take one step at a time.
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.quote: That city is well fortified which has a wall of men instead of brick
quotes.author: Lycurgus of Sparta

quotes.quote: If you want to knock down the wall between you and the life of your dreams, it's best to do it one brick at a time!
quotes.author: Paul McKenna

quotes.quote: A loving woman finds heaven or hell on the day she is made a bride.
quotes.author: Lena Lathrop

quotes.quote: A young bride is like a plucked flower; but a guilty wife is like a flower that had been walked over.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: A bride at her second marriage does not wear a veil. She wants to see what she is getting.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: The bride, the white bride today a maiden, tomorrow a wife.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: On the wedding day, the bride is always on cloud nine because she knows that from this day onward the groom will be dancing only to the tune of her blown musical rhyme.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: In Hollywood, brides keep the bouquets and throw away the groom.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: A young bride can put on makeup at 6 in the morning and look fabulous at midnight.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.quote: The true beauty of the bride lies in the eyes of the groom.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A bride is a woman with a fine prospect of happiness behind her.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Happy is the bride that the sun shines on.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: Every bride is beautiful. It’s like newborn babies or puppies. They can’t help it.
quotes.author: Emme Rollins

quotes.quote: A bride will always be the belle of the ball at her own wedding.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: A bride should look chaste—not caught.
quotes.author: Roberta Pearce

quotes.quote: You are the most beautiful bride there ever be. Don't let anyone else tell you otherwise.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: You will be the most beautiful girl to the person you love even if you walk down the aisle in jeans and t-shirt.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Bride and groom are not just two contracting parties but two loving and beloved companions, joined in establishing a home that will be nothing less than a source of immortality.
quotes.author: Meir Soloveichik

quotes.quote: A smile is the most beautiful on bride's face.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: A million people can tell the bride that she is beautiful but the only time she will listen is when it's said by the man she loves.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is no greater feeling than when a groom turns to see his bride and has tears in his eyes because she is so beautiful.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: Nothing can make a woman look beautiful like the glow on her wedding day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: On your wedding day you should look like yourself at your most beautiful.
quotes.author: Bobbi Brown

quotes.quote: Bridesmaids are never going to upstage the bride.
quotes.author: Georgina Chapman

quotes.quote: A happy bridesmaid makes a happy bride.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: The idea of being bridesmaid is to make a bride the prettiest, not to make yourself prettier.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You think your friends have good taste in fashion, until they ask you to wear an ugly bridesmaid dress!
quotes.author: Wendi McLendon-Covey

quotes.quote: A friend never defends a husband who gets his wife an electric skillet for her birthday.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: A bridesmaid's super powers include loyalty, humor, and punctuality.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Bridesmaids proved there was an audience there that we knew was there. It proved that women go to the movies. They want to see story about themselves.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A bride can always count on her bridesmaids to lift her up.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: An invitation to be a bridesmaid is an honor which cannot be declined without some very good reason. Our idea of one of the better reasons is the impending arrival of a little stranger.
quotes.author: Alice-Leone Moats

quotes.quote: Asking your friend to be a bridesmaid is one of the modern paradoxes: no one actually wants to do it, but everyone would be offended if you didn't ask.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.quote: Behind every dazzling bride is an effective crew of bridesmaids - the ladies who help the wedding loveboat sail without snags
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Bridesmaids are a bride's best friends.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Bridesmaids don't just share the bride's joy, they multiply it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Bridesmaid for a day, but best friend for life...
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We all wish there were more ‘Bridesmaids’ out there.
quotes.author: Gillian Jacobs

quotes.quote: You'd better be my bridesmaid, since you gave me the idea that led to this whole farce. It's a horrible job, I'm sure, so you deserve it.
quotes.author: Jane Bauling

quotes.quote: I am usually part of any disaster at a wedding if I'm a bridesmaid, which I've been lucky enough to be several times.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.quote: My five best friends, who were my bridesmaids in my wedding, are still my best friends.
quotes.author: Jill Kargman

quotes.quote: Immortality, thou art a chimerical bridesmaid of life.
quotes.author: Aporva Kala

quotes.quote: Mothers! They promise you they'll never get married again, and next thing you know you're a bridesmaid.
quotes.author: Mindy Schanback

quotes.quote: I'm not blond or super fit or perfect. Not romantic, not "an individual," and definitely not a genius. So what am I? I'll tell you what : a bridesmaid.
quotes.author: Tamara Summers

quotes.quote: So many times, I have a speech ready but no dice. Always a bridesmaid, never a mother.
quotes.author: Michael Curtiz

quotes.quote: Always a bridesmaid never a bride my foot!
quotes.author: Peter O'Toole

quotes.quote: I don't think I've ever tried on a corset, though a certain bridesmaid's dress did require a torturous bustier that will stay forever burned in my sensory memory.
quotes.author: Laura Moriarty

quotes.quote: How can I thank you for everything you've done to help my wedding run smoothly? In the whirlwind of events leading up to this moment, you've been there for me all the way. Your friendship and support have made so much difference.
quotes.author: Ariel

quotes.quote: Always a bridesmaid, but never a bride.
quotes.author: Pennsylvania Proverb

quotes.quote: Why am I always the bridesmaid, / Never the blushing bride?
quotes.author: Fred W. Leigh

quotes.quote: Bridesmaids are brides in training, they're like matrimonial interns.
quotes.author: Man

quotes.quote: Weddings are a joyful occasion. You know, unless you're one of the bridesmaids.
quotes.author: King Shark

quotes.quote: The best bridesmaid experiences come when the bride has a laid-back vibe and just goes with the flow.
quotes.author: Emily Schumann

quotes.quote: I’ve had more pins than I can count in my hair; I’ve had glitter hairspray; I’ve had corn rows halfway up my scalp; I’ve had tendrils framing my face; I’ve gone home and cried because the up-do is so bad. The worst is when the other bridesmaids are like, ‘Oh, yours looks so good!’ and you’re just thinking. Are you insane? I’m trying to meet someone at this wedding. I don’t want anyone to see me looking like this.
quotes.author: Emily Schumann

quotes.quote: Mama I tried, Mama I tried / I cheated and I lied / I painted up my face like a rodeo clown / And I choked on cheap perfume as I spread myself around / I strutted my stuff at every juke joint in town / Always the bridesmaid, never the bride / Mama, Mama, I tried.
quotes.author: Angaleena Presley and Oran Thorton

quotes.quote: On common ground / We'll build our castle walls / We'll build them stone by stone / And how / With more and more / You know it won't take long / Where it burned orange / Let it burn gold... / And given half the chance / To turn the hands of time / I'm always the bridesmaid / Couldn't live with myself / If I tried to be the bride.
quotes.author: Mark Roberts

quotes.quote: Drest as a bridesmaid, but all pale and cold, / With roseless cheek, all pale and cold and dim, / Lie lifeless at my feet! / And then came Love, a sylph in bridal trim, / And stood beside my seat; / She bent, and kiss'd her sister's lips, / As she was wont to do;-- / Alas! 'twas but a chilling breath / Woke just enough of life in death / To make Hope die anew.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Our bridge to the future must include bridges to other nations, because we remain the world's indispensable nation to advance prosperity, peace and freedom and to keep our own children safe from the dangers of terror and weapons of mass destruction.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: Build a bridge by extending your hand.
quotes.author: Ken Poirot

quotes.quote: The bridges that you cross before you come to them are over rivers that aren't there.
quotes.author: Gene Brown

quotes.quote: Bridges are meant for burning, when the people and memories they join aren't the same.
quotes.author: Jim Croce

quotes.quote: A bridge has no allegiance to either side.
quotes.author: Les Coleman

quotes.quote: Bridges take people across rivers. Leaders take people across ignorance. With a leader, the destination of a journey is sure.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Never burn bridges. If it's a faulty bridge then close it off and let it fall on its own.
quotes.author: Gregor Collins

quotes.quote: If the building of a bridge does not enrich the awareness of those who work on it, then that bridge ought not to be built.
quotes.author: Frantz Fanon

quotes.quote: Knowledge of other people's beliefs and ways of thinking must be used to build bridges, not to create conflicts.
quotes.author: Kjell Magne Bondevik

quotes.quote: We can cross the rivers of doubt and discouragement on the bridge of faith even before we get to them.
quotes.author: Sterling W Sill

quotes.quote: Effort and hard work construct the bridge that connects your dreams to reality.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: A bridge can still be built, while the bitter waters are flowing beneath.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: We build too many walls and not enough bridges.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: You don't build walls; you build bridges between people.
quotes.author: Andrew Cuomo

quotes.quote: If a man can bridge the gap between life and death, if he can live on after he's dead, then maybe he was a great man.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Large motorway flyovers are the cathedrals of the modern world.
quotes.author: Barbara Castle

quotes.quote: We have to build bridges of peace instead of building walls of wars.
quotes.author: Widad Akrawi

quotes.quote: There are certain bridges that are not worth crossing, no matter what others think. Loyalty and relationships are important.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: Some bridges you crossed on your own, no matter who drove you to the edge
quotes.author: J.R. Ward

quotes.quote: The wise man bridges the gap by laying out the path by means of which he can get from where he is to where he wants to go.
quotes.author: J. P. Morgan

quotes.quote: Bridges are happy, because they do not judge those who come to them.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Come, let us build bridges of love with each other with the cement of kindness and pillars of trust.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: We have to build bridges that are stronger than the bombs that other people might throw.
quotes.author: Eboo Patel

quotes.quote: The fate of the bridges is to be lonely; because bridges are to cross not to stay!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If you are good at building bridges, you will never fall into the abyss!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: For too long, information, opportunities, and resources have been constraints, they need to be the bridges.
quotes.author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

quotes.quote: The wisdom of bridges comes from the fact that they know the both sides, they know the both shores!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us, with nothing to show for our progress except a memory of the smell of smoke, and a presumption that once our eyes watered.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Hopefully, we can build bridges, but we also have to draw lines.
quotes.author: Fred Thompson

quotes.quote: Bridges become frames for looking at the world around us.
quotes.author: Bruce Jackson

quotes.quote: A bridge is a meeting place. a possibility, a metaphor
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Some bridges are so beautiful that we wish them to be our own home!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A lot of the roads, bridges, railways, and such are built through the use of forced labor, and that is causing the people great suffering. What we put into this in the form of human suffering is not worth what comes out of it.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: Land bridges were everywhere during the extinction, many species were spreading, and there were many diseases.
quotes.author: Robert T. Bakker

quotes.quote: Bridges are a monument to progress.
quotes.author: Joseph Straus

quotes.quote: We believe more in bridges and making the border better.
quotes.author: Ildefonso Guajardo Villarreal

quotes.quote: Roads do not upgrade or maintain themselves. Bridges do not repair themselves or rebuild themselves.
quotes.author: Martin O'Malley

quotes.quote: Bridges are built not to cross over it but it is built to lift you to the other side safely.
quotes.author: Edwin Lawrence

quotes.quote: Bridges are perhaps the most invisible form of public architecture.
quotes.author: Bruce Jackson

quotes.quote: Sometimes, if you stand on the bottom rail of a bridge and lean over to watch the river slipping slowly away beneath you, you will suddenly know everything there is to be known.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Money is no good unless it contributes something to the community, unless it builds a bridge to a better life. Any man can make money, but it takes a special kind of man to use it responsibly.
quotes.author: A. G. Gaston

quotes.quote: A bridge of silver wings stretches from the dead ashes of an unforgiving nightmare to the jeweled vision of a life started anew.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: Prayer cannot bring water to parched fields, or mend a broken bridge, nor rebuild a ruined city; but prayer can water an arid soul, mend a broken heart, and rebuild a weakened will.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: A proper home can provide the bridge across that terrible gulf between utter poverty the possibility of a better future.
quotes.author: Aga Khan IV

quotes.quote: Sometimes, if you aren't sure about something, you just have to jump off the bridge and grow your wings on the way down.
quotes.author: Danielle Steel

quotes.quote: The hardest thing in life is to know which bridge to cross and which to burn.
quotes.author: David Russell

quotes.quote: Don’t dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Your problem is to bridge the gap which exists between where you are now and the goal you intend to reach.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: A picture is nothing but a bridge between the soul of the artist and that of the spectator.
quotes.author: Eugene Delacroix

quotes.quote: It makes no difference if I burn my bridges behind me ― I never retreat.
quotes.author: Fiorello LaGuardia

quotes.quote: Passion is the bridge that takes you from pain to change.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: Nobody can build the bridge for you to walk across the river of life, no one but you yourself alone. There are, to be sure, countless paths and bridges and demi-gods, which carry you across this river; but only at the cost of yourself; you would pawn yourself and lose. There is in the world only one way, on which nobody can go, except you: where does it lead?
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: What is great in man is that he is a bridge and not a goal.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: He who cannot forgive breaks the bridge over which he himself must pass.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: People who have lost relationships often wonder why they can't just let it be "water under the bridge." It is water under the bridge - the trouble is we do not live on the bridge but in the river of life with its many twists and turns.
quotes.author: Grant Fairley

quotes.quote: The statesman's duty is to bridge the gap between his nation's experience and his vision.
quotes.author: Henry A Kissinger

quotes.quote: Life is a bridge. Cross over it, but builds no house on it.
quotes.author: Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: People are lonely because they build walls instead of bridges.
quotes.author: Joseph Fort Newton

quotes.quote: It is easier to bridge the oceans that lie between continents than it is to bridge the gap between individuals or the peoples.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Love is that condition in the human spirit so profound that it empowers us to develop courage; to trust that courage and build bridges with it; to trust those bridges and cross over them so we can attempt to reach each other.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Politicians are the same all over. They promise to build bridges even where there are no rivers.
quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.quote: Respect yourself enough to walk away from anything that no longer serves you, grows you, or makes you happy.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: There is a land of the living and a land of the dead and the bridge is love, the only survival, the only meaning.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: Until you cross the bridge of your insecurities, you can't begin to explore your possibilities.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: The only bad thing about burning your bridges behind you is that the world is round.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the bridge between two hearts.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We are told never to cross a bridge until we come to it, but this world is owned by men who have 'crossed bridges' in their imagination far ahead of the crowd.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Imagination is the pontoon bridge making way for the timid feet of reason.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Having sex is like playing bridge. If you don't have a good partner, you'd better have a good hand.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: There's nothing worse than a brilliant beginning.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: A brilliant man would find a way not to fight a war.
quotes.author: Isoroku Yamamoto

quotes.quote: There is a brilliant child locked inside every student.
quotes.author: Marva Collins

quotes.quote: Being brilliant is no great feat if you respect nothing.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: How we learn has nothing to do with how brilliant we are.
quotes.author: Henry Winkler

quotes.quote: Our children are only as brilliant as we allow them to be.
quotes.author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quotes.quote: You weren't born to fit in. You were born to be brilliant.
quotes.author: Simon T. Bailey

quotes.quote: Humans: such a brilliant model of emotional self-awareness.
quotes.author: Charles Stross

quotes.quote: Don't trust a brilliant idea unless it survives the hangover.
quotes.author: Jimmy Breslin

quotes.quote: It's brilliant, being depressed; you can behave as badly as you like.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.quote: Brilliant people never think of the lives they smash, being brilliant.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: Operating in an unlit world, the unconscious mind is a brilliant detective.
quotes.author: Jo Coudert

quotes.quote: Do you want a collection of brilliant minds or a brilliant collection of minds?
quotes.author: Meredith Belbin

quotes.quote: Surrounded yourself with brilliant people. You can't HELP but grow when that happens.
quotes.author: Chris Brogan

quotes.quote: The most brilliant fortunes are often not worth the littleness required to gain them.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Behind every brilliant performance there were countless hours of practice and preparation.
quotes.author: Eric Butterworth

quotes.quote: The most brilliant qualities become useless when they are not sustained by force of character.
quotes.author: Louis-Philippe I of France

quotes.quote: A brilliant mind was never as clever as three average minds sniffing after something of interest.
quotes.author: Robert Reed

quotes.quote: There is no idea so brilliant or original that a sufficiently-untalented writer can't screw it up.
quotes.author: Raymond E. Feist

quotes.quote: The most successful and brilliant work a lighting designer can do is usually the least noticeable.
quotes.author: Jean Rosenthal

quotes.quote: There are very few really brilliant men who have not had at least one madman among their ancestors.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: There are fine things that are more brilliant when they are unfinished than when finished too much.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: The true test of a brilliant theory is what first is thought to be wrong is later shown to be obvious.
quotes.author: Assar Lindbeck

quotes.quote: If you can talk brilliantly about a problem, it can create the consoling illusion that it has been mastered.
quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.quote: The most brilliant flashes of wit come from a clouded mind, as lightning leaps only from an obscure firmament.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Champions are brilliant at the basics.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Being in the desert was brilliant and it was hard.
quotes.author: Toni Collette

quotes.quote: If you're brilliant and open-minded, you can start at the top.
quotes.author: Uri Geller

quotes.quote: A brilliant design will always benefit from the input of others.
quotes.author: Zaha Hadid

quotes.quote: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: It's always a struggle to make things sound more or less brilliant.
quotes.author: Victoria Legrand

quotes.quote: Everyone we regard as brilliant has endured an enormous amount of failure.
quotes.author: Frans Johansson

quotes.quote: Brilliant strategy is the best route to desirable ends with available means.
quotes.author: Max McKeown

quotes.quote: A perfect conversation would run much less to brilliant sentences than to unfinished ones.
quotes.author: Louis Kronenberger

quotes.quote: There are many really stupid ideas that wind up being brilliant, if you can implement them.
quotes.author: Gene Simmons

quotes.quote: One of my main goals in life is to make those that believed in me look extremely brilliant.
quotes.author: Greg Gilbert

quotes.quote: You can have brilliant ideas, but if you can't get them across, your ideas won't get you anywhere.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: There are plenty of brilliant people who are too stressed out to read challenging literary novels.
quotes.author: John Burdett

quotes.quote: A dull speech which is full of truths is much more brilliant than an eloquent speech which is full of lies!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Brilliant results don't just show up by chance. The finest things in life take patience, focus and sacrifice.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: The key to getting a reputation for being brilliant is actually being brilliant, not just acting like you are.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Anything said in upper-crust British automatically sounded intelligent.
quotes.author: Nancy Kress

quotes.quote: The British nation is unique in this respect: they are the only people who like to be told how bad things are, who like to be told the worst.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: The British have always been madly overambitious, and from one angle it can seem like bravery, but from another it looks suspiciously like a lack of foresight.
quotes.author: Ben Aaronovitch

quotes.quote: Many British people of different faiths follow religious codes and practices and benefit a great deal from the guidance they offer.
quotes.author: Theresa May

quotes.quote: The British people think that if someone is disabled, then they should get all the care and support that we can offer.
quotes.author: George Osborne

quotes.quote: The British have chosen liberty with Brexit and can congratulate themselves every day.
quotes.author: Marine Le Pen

quotes.quote: British aren't really known for their physical loveliness but firemen, generally speaking, are gorgeous.
quotes.author: Emma Thompson

quotes.quote: British people don't express when they are in pain. They don't think it's elegant.
quotes.author: Monica Bellucci

quotes.quote: The British people are good all through. You can test them as you would put a bucket into the sea and always find it salt.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The British are special. The world knows it. In our innermost thoughts we know it. This is the greatest nation on earth.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: The British love permanence more than they love beauty.
quotes.author: Hugh Casson

quotes.quote: A British villain never loses their sense of humour.
quotes.author: Tom Hooper

quotes.quote: We The British have not journeyed across the centuries, across the oceans, across the mountains, across the prairies, because we are made of sugar candy.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The British like any kind of music so long as it is loud.
quotes.author: Thomas Beecham

quotes.quote: British girls are as temperamental as Americans.
quotes.author: Ivor Novello

quotes.quote: The British needlewoman follows blindly where the merchant leads.
quotes.author: Ann Macbeth

quotes.quote: The British are brave people. They can face anything, except reality.
quotes.author: George Mikes

quotes.quote: British people would die for their right to drink themselves to death.
quotes.author: John Oliver

quotes.quote: The British power is the overlord without whom Indian princes cannot breathe.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The British were sporting. They would accept a fight under almost all conditions.
quotes.author: Gunther Rall

quotes.quote: The British are weak in numbers, we are weak in spite of our numbers.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The British are so incestuous. They pass around partners like they're passing popcorn at a movie.
quotes.author: Cameron DÃ­az

quotes.quote: The British countryside is threatened by people and interests who really do not care for it.
quotes.author: Simon Jenkins

quotes.quote: The British have always coped without becoming a dictatorship.
quotes.author: Frederick Forsyth

quotes.quote: The British retreat is over and now the advance will begin.
quotes.author: William Hague

quotes.quote: British humour is very cruel. It's my favourite kind of humour; if it isn't cruel and funny it doesn't really cut the cake for me.
quotes.author: Jason Sellards

quotes.quote: The British who rarely start a fight, but always know how to finish it have nothing to be ashamed of.
quotes.author: Tony Parsons

quotes.quote: All British people have plain names, and that works pretty well over there.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: British education is probably the best in the world, if you can survive it. If you can't there is nothing left for you but the diplomatic corps.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: The British feel of blues has been hard, rather than emotional. Far too much emphasis on 12 bar, too little attention to words, far too little originality.
quotes.author: Alexis Korner

quotes.quote: If I should die, think only this of me: / That there’s some corner of a foreign field / That is forever England.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.quote: When a man is tired of London, he is tired of life; for there is in London all that life can afford.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Farewell to the Highlands, farewell to the North, / The birth-place of Valour, the country of Worth; / Wherever I wander, wherever I rove, / The hills of the Highlands for ever I love.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: The English certainly and fiercely pride themselves in never praising themselves.
quotes.author: Wyndham Lewis

quotes.quote: Growing up in the English countryside, I feel like I’m in a Jane Austen novel when I walk around.
quotes.author: Lily Collins

quotes.quote: I live in the English countryside, so I’m surrounded by magpies.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.quote: The British do not expect happiness. I had the impression, all the time that I lived there, that they do not want to be happy; they want to be right.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Amazing what the British do with language; the nuances of politeness. The world's great diplomats, surely.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: I do like the sound of the name, 'Big Ben'... it has a certain ring to it.
quotes.author: Martin H. Samuel

quotes.quote: I think London’s sexy because it’s so full of eccentrics.
quotes.author: Rachel Weisz

quotes.quote: The English never draw a line without blurring it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Their will was resolute and remorseless, and as it proved, unconquerable. It fell to me to express it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I see it is said that leaders should keep their ears to the ground. All I can say is that the British nation will find it very hard to look up to the leaders who are detected in that somewhat ungainly posture.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: However British you may be, I am more British still.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: This is where I grew up. This is where I started life. This is my country and when I put on a Great Britain vest I'm proud. I'm very proud.
quotes.author: Mo Farah

quotes.quote: I cannot lead you into battle. I do not give you laws or administer justice, but I can do something else — I can give my heart and my devotion to these old islands and to all the peoples of our brotherhood of nations.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: To many, no doubt, he will seem to be somewhat blatant and bumptious, but we prefer to regard him as being simply British.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The world is a place on which England is found.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: You think the Welsh are friendly, but the Irish are fabulous.
quotes.author: Bonnie Tyler

quotes.quote: Be blind. Be stupid. Be British. Be careful.
quotes.author: Virginia Graham

quotes.quote: There are only three things against living in Britain: the place, the climate and the people.
quotes.author: Jimmy Edwards

quotes.quote: The ability for us to laugh at ourselves is Britain's saving grace.
quotes.author: Martin Parr

quotes.quote: In Britain, a cup of tea is the answer to every problem. Fallen off your bicycle? Nice cup of tea.
quotes.author: David Walliams

quotes.quote: The maxim of the British people is business as usual.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: My children are not royal; They just happen to have the Queen for their aunt.
quotes.author: Princess Margaret

quotes.quote: It took me 20 years of studied self-restraint, aided by the natural decay of my faculties, to make myself dull enough to be accepted as a serious person by the British public.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: An Irishman fights before he reasons, a Scotchman reasons before he fights, an Englishman is not particular as to the order of precedence, but will do either to accommodate his customers.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Life is unliveable to them unless they have tea and puddings.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: I think the British have the distinction above all other nations of being able to put new wine into old bottles without bursting them.
quotes.author: Clement Attlee

quotes.quote: There's nothing the British like better than a bloke who comes from nowhere, makes it, and then gets clobbered.
quotes.author: Melvyn Bragg

quotes.quote: Lloyd George would have a better rating in British mythology if he had shared the fate of Abraham Lincoln.
quotes.author: John Grigg

quotes.quote: The British Constitution has always been puzzling and always will be.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: There is a difference between being poor and being broke. Broke is temporary, and poor is eternal.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Being broke is a temporary situation. Being poor is a state of mind.
quotes.author: Mike Todd

quotes.quote: People who go broke in a big way never miss any meals. It is the poor jerk who is shy a half slug who must tighten his belt.
quotes.author: Robert Heinlein

quotes.quote: Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: When everybody has got money they cut taxes, and when they're broke they raise 'em. That's statesmanship of the highest order.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Being broke is not a disgrace, it is only a catastrophe.
quotes.author: Rex Stout

quotes.quote: He broke through the barriers of the skies.
quotes.author: William Herschel

quotes.quote: What we're trying to do is get things fixed, not allow them to stay broke.
quotes.author: Mark Rippetoe

quotes.quote: If someone broke your heart it doesn't mean you should build a wall around it and quit loving. Redirect your love.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Acting makes me feel broke again, it makes me feel unaccomplished.
quotes.author: Ester Dean

quotes.quote: Broke people giving financial advice is like a shop teacher with missing fingers.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: Being mature is when you finally grow enough, to be able to joke about the things that once broke you as a person.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you're planning only to make money and nothing else, you'll be broke.
quotes.author: Haile Gebrselassie

quotes.quote: Being broke is a very efficient educational agency.
quotes.author: Edwin Lefevre

quotes.quote: Go for broke. Always try and do too much. Dispense with safety nets. Take a deep breath before you begin
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: No one ever went broke by taking a profit.
quotes.author: Jesse Lauriston Livermore

quotes.quote: When you're going broke, it's best to have a great time.
quotes.author: Diane Kochilas

quotes.quote: Nobody has ever gone broke selling escape to the American public.
quotes.author: John Lahr

quotes.quote: You have to go broke three times to learn how to make a living.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: Being broke didn't seem so awful as it had yesterday, being broke but being at peace with the world.
quotes.author: Cornell Woolrich

quotes.quote: If you're broke, you don't want to rap about being broke; you gonna rap about hustling and getting that bread.
quotes.author: Juicy J

quotes.quote: Poor is a state of mind. Broke is a state of wallet. You can fix being broke; it's not so easy to fix being poor.
quotes.author: Ric Edelman

quotes.quote: If no one ever broke the rules, then we'd never advance.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: If you're perpetually broke, you should be working hard at overcoming stupidity and not getting rich.
quotes.author: Taiwo Abraham

quotes.quote: Broke people talk about people and problems. Rich people talk about ideas and goals. Your conversation chooses your destiny.
quotes.author: Darren Hardy

quotes.quote: The only excuse for being broke is being in Jail.
quotes.author: Curtis Jackson

quotes.quote: Lost motivation means that you broke promises to yourself and haven't corrected them yet. You need to believe in yourself again. This can only happen when you start fulfilling the small promises you make to yourself.
quotes.author: Chris Powell

quotes.quote: The lack of money is the root of all evil.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There is a difference between broke and being poor. Being broke is a temporary economic condition, but being poor is a disabling frame of mind and a depressed condition of your spirit, and you must vow to never, ever be poor again.
quotes.author: John Hope Bryant

quotes.quote: There's only one requirement for enjoying God's grace, being broke and knowing it.
quotes.author: Randy Alcorn

quotes.quote: It has always seemed to me that broken things, just like broken people, get used more it's probably because God has more pieces to work with.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: My bank is the worst. They're charging me money for not having enough money in my account. Apparently, I can't even afford to be broke
quotes.author: Uknown

quotes.quote: My wallet is like an onion. When I open it, it makes me cry.
quotes.author: Matthew Hovey

quotes.quote: Dogs have no money. Isn't that amazing? They're broke their entire lives. But they get through. You know why dogs have no money? No pockets.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: The heart was made to be broken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: When our heart breaks it is because it has edges and boundaries; when something painful happens, it has nowhere to go, but to break. But heartbreak can grow and soften our heart if we let it. A small heart cannot hold much, but a big heart can hold much more. Our heart can in fact grow to become limitless and hold all that comes in life, even the most painful things.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Mattis Namgyel

quotes.quote: Broken heart will turn into a stronger one within hope.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: A broken heart is what makes life so wonderful five years later, when you see that specialÂ in an elevator and he is fat and smoking and saying 'Long time no see.'
quotes.author: Phyllis Batelle

quotes.quote: This is a good sign, having aÂ brokenÂ heart. It means we have tried for something.Â
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: You flew off with the wings of my heart and left me flightless.
quotes.author: Stelle Atwater

quotes.quote: Don't cry because it's over, SMILE because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: There are many ways of breaking a heart. Stories were full of hearts broken by love, but what really broke a heart was taking away its dream -- whatever that dream might be.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: They say â€œfollow your heart,â€ but if your heart is in a million pieces which piece do you follow?
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A broken heart bleeds tears.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: TheÂ heartÂ will break, butÂ brokenÂ live on.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: You've got to learn to leave the table when love's no longer being served.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.quote: Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Then his heart, now broken into a thousand pieces, slowly began to turn to ice.
quotes.author: Morgan Rhodes

quotes.quote: You may have a broken heart, but you may find someone else.Â
quotes.author: Douglas Booth

quotes.quote: A broken heart in real life isn't half as dreadful as it is in books. It's a good deal like a bad tooth, though you won't think THAT a very romantic simile. It takes spells of aching and gives you a sleepless night now and then, but between times it lets you enjoy life and dreams and echoes and peanut candy as if there were nothing the matter with it.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: Every time your heart is broken, a doorway cracks open to a world full of new beginnings, new opportunities.
quotes.author: Patti Roberts

quotes.quote: A broken heart is just the growing pains necessary so that you can love more completely when the real thing comes along.
quotes.author: J.S.B. Morse

quotes.quote: Heartbreak could be lived with if it weren't accompanied by regret.
quotes.author: Laura Kasischke

quotes.quote: A broken heart is not a broken glass.
quotes.author: ABC

quotes.quote: A broken heart doesn't need repaired. Because maybe one of your pieces fits perfectly with someone else's heart.
quotes.author: Chris Mitchell

quotes.quote: I wish i were a little girl again, because skinned knees are easier to fix than broken heart.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: Better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: I guess when your heart gets broken you sort of start to see cracks in everything. I'm convinced that tragedy wants to harden us and our mission is never to let it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A broken heart is a very pleasant complaint for a man in London if he has a comfortable income.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw
