quotes.quote: Broken hearts made faults and fools of us all.
quotes.author: Natalia Jaster

quotes.quote: The heart is the only broken instrument that works.
quotes.author: T.E. Kalem

quotes.quote: AÂ heartÂ that's neverÂ brokenÂ isn't open.
quotes.author: William Weil

quotes.quote: Be still my heart; thou hast known worse than this.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: There is a road from the eye to heart that does not go through the intellect.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Never love with all your heart, it only ends in breaking.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: A broken hand works, but not a broken heart.
quotes.author: Persian Proverb

quotes.quote: If thy heart fails thee, climb not at all.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth

quotes.quote: Half heart is no heart.
quotes.author: Old Proverb

quotes.quote: The teeth are smiling, but is the heart?
quotes.author: Congolese Proverb

quotes.quote: Never morning wore To evening, but some heart did break.
quotes.author: Tennyson

quotes.quote: A broken heart is what makes life so wonderful five years later when you see the guy in the elevator and he is fat and smoking a cigar and saying 'long time no see,'
quotes.author: Phyllis Battelle

quotes.quote: It's so hard to forget pain, but it's even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: I was never one to patiently pick up broken fragments and glue them together again and tell myself that the mended whole was as good as new. What is broken is broken— and I'd rather remember it as it was at its best than mend it and see the broken places as long as I lived.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: You don't always win your battles, but it's good to know you fought.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: How beautiful it is and how easily it can be broken.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: The pleasure of love lasts but a moment, Pain of love lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: Jean Pierre Claris de Florian

quotes.quote: Look at every exit as being an entrance somewhere else.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: A woman's heart always has a burned mark.
quotes.author: Louise Labe

quotes.quote: The best remedy for a bruised heart is not, as so many people seem to think, repose upon a manly bosom. Much more efficacious are honest work, physical activity, and the sudden acquisition of wealth.
quotes.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

quotes.quote: Most things break, including hearts. The lessons of life amount not to wisdom, but to scar tissue and callus.
quotes.author: Wallace Stegner

quotes.quote: How else but through a broken heart may Lord Christ enter in?
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It's hard asking someone with a broken heart to fall in love again.
quotes.author: Eric Kripke

quotes.quote: Is there a cure for a broken heart? Only time can heal your broken heart, just as time can heal his broken arms and legs.
quotes.author: Miss Piggy

quotes.quote: The best way to mend a broken heart is time and girlfriends.`
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: Love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: There is nothing more whole than a broken heart.
quotes.author: Rabbi Menacher

quotes.quote: To be a spiritual warrior, one must have a broken heart; without a broken heart and a sense of tenderness and vulnerability, your warrior ship is untrustworthy.
quotes.author: Sreechinth C.

quotes.quote: Whatever sorrow shakes from your heart, far better things will take their place.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: There's no cure, except the retreat into love. For the suffering of subtly afflicted hearts.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Hearts will never be practical until they are made unbreakable.
quotes.author: The Wizard of Oz

quotes.quote: It is a curious sensation: the sort of pain that goes mercifully beyond our powers of feeling. When your heart is broken, your boats are burned; nothing matters anymore. It is the end of happiness and the beginning of peace.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: If I can stop one heart from breaking, I shall not live in vain.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: You don't die of a broken heart; you only wish you did.
quotes.author: Marilyn Peterson

quotes.quote: Nothing now my heart can fire but regret and desire.
quotes.author: Mary Queen of Scot's

quotes.quote: There are some moments I feel those shards of my broken heart start to fit together. That is when I can actually celebrate. At that moment I find hope. I think it's at that moment that the world changes.
quotes.author: Marilyn de Guehery

quotes.quote: My desire to live is as intense as ever, and though my heart is broken, hearts are made to be broken: that is why God sends sorrow into the world.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Broken heart will turn into a stronger one within hope.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Envy hurt exponentially more than heartbreak because your soul was torn in two, half soaring with happiness for another person, half mired in a well of selfpity and pain.
quotes.author: Diana Peterfreund

quotes.quote: No matter how hard your heart is broken, the world doesn't stop for your grief."
quotes.author: Faraaz Kazi

quotes.quote: Learning from other people's mistakes is better than making your owns. And it is easier to live lonely than to have a broken heart.
quotes.author: Aria Adams

quotes.quote: I don't want to break someone's heart, but you can't control that. A broken heart happens; that's inevitable.
quotes.author: Lykke Li

quotes.quote: I guess when your heart gets broken, you sort of start to see the cracks in everything.
quotes.author: Janeane Garofalo

quotes.quote: As the light begins to intensify, so does my misery, and I wonder how it is possible to hurt so much when nothing is wrong
quotes.author: Tabitha Suzuma

quotes.quote: His broken heart was unfeeling, like shattered glass in an acid bath.
quotes.author: Pete Townshend

quotes.quote: Heartbreak could be lived with if it weren't accompanied by regret.
quotes.author: Laura Kasischke

quotes.quote: You know, a heart can be broken, but it keeps on beating, just the same.
quotes.author: Fannie Flagg

quotes.quote: There are a million ways to lose someone you love.
quotes.author: Tammara Webber

quotes.quote: They are many wounded hearts here. Many! Some admit. Others - the stubborn ones, scribble poetry instead.
quotes.author: Saru Singhal

quotes.quote: When trees burn, they leave the smell of heartbreak in the air.
quotes.author: Jodi Thomas

quotes.quote: I have a good imagination. Look, I know what it feels like to have a broken heart. I know what it feels like to feel something for somebody. I'm just too weird to be in a relationship.
quotes.author: Diane Warren

quotes.quote: You find out what you are made of when you have a broken heart. If it happens early and often, all the better.
quotes.author: Isabel Gillies

quotes.quote: Every happy girl has a broken heart. But every broken heart girl is not happy
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: You may have a broken heart, but you may find someone else.
quotes.author: Douglas Booth

quotes.quote: The heart will break, but broken live on.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: This is what it felt like to have a broken heart. It felt less like a cracking down the middle and more like she had swallowed it whole and it sat bruised and bleeding in the pit of her stomach.
quotes.author: Wendy Wunder

quotes.quote: Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes just be an illusion.
quotes.author: Javan

quotes.quote: No matter how bad your heart is broken, the world doesn't stop for your grief.
quotes.author: Faraaz Kazi

quotes.quote: Throughout my lifetime I've left pieces of my heart here and there. And now, there's almost barely enough to stay alive. But I force a smile, knowing that my ambition far exceeded my talent.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that loves knows not its own death until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Broken hearts don't need medical treatment, they need a lover to mend them.
quotes.author: Dixie Waters

quotes.quote: A broken heart is just the growing pains necessary so that you can love more completely when the real thing comes along.
quotes.author: J.S.B. Morse

quotes.quote: Heaven doesn't ignore cries of a broken heart.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: I know my heart will never be the same but I'm telling myself I'll be okay
quotes.author: Sara Evans

quotes.quote: She went around with a broken heart, and she wasn't sure who'd broken it. She thought it was herself, mostly.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: The past can't hurt you anymore, not unless you let it.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: Then his heart, now broken into a thousand pieces, slowly began to turn to ice.
quotes.author: Morgan Rhodes

quotes.quote: Broken vows are like broken mirrors. They leave those who held to them bleeding and staring at fractured images of themselves.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: Eggs and oaths are easily broken.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Half the promises people say were never kept, were never made.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Promises and pie crusts are made to be broken.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Some persons make promises for the pleasure of breaking them.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Some promises are better left unsaid.
quotes.author: Ashlee Simpson

quotes.quote: Promises are like crying babies in a theater, they should be carried out at once.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Liars make the best promises.
quotes.author: Pierce Brown

quotes.quote: Sometimes your pledges become your problems.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: But promises based on ignorance always prove disappointing.
quotes.author: Jussi Adler-Olsen

quotes.quote: Promises mean everything, but after they are broken, sorry means nothing.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Oaths are but words, and words but wind.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: He loses his thanks who promises and delays.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: A promise made is a debt unpaid.
quotes.author: Robert Service

quotes.quote: For every promise, there is price to pay.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Promises are like the full moon, if they are not kept at once they diminish day by day.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: One must have a good memory to be able to keep the promises one makes.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Better break your word than do worse in keeping it.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The promise given was a necessity of the past: the word broken is a necessity of the present.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: When a man repeats a promise again and again, he means to fail you.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: It's useless to hold a person to anything he says while he's in love, drunk, or running for office.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: Promises may fit the friends, but non-performance will turn them into enemies.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: There is no greater fraud than a promise not kept.
quotes.author: Gaelic Proverb

quotes.quote: Breach of promise is a base surrender of truth.
quotes.author: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: The best way to keep one's word is not to give it.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Promises make debt, and debt makes promises.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: We must not promise what we ought not, lest we be called on to perform what we cannot.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: When a man takes an oath... he's holding his own self in his own hands. Like water. And if he opens his fingers then - he needn't hope to find himself again.
quotes.author: Robert Bolt

quotes.quote: All promise outruns performance.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Better a broken promise than none at all.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: He spoke again as if he hadn’t just shattered his promise and her security. Her house of glass now lay in a pile of shards.
quotes.author: Aleatha Romig

quotes.quote: Don't make any promises that you can't keep.
quotes.author: Ann Marie Aguilar

quotes.quote: The world is always changing. Learn how to allow for it. Someone makes a promise, and then they break it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Trust, is the stone thrown into the sea, sinking deep in all its murkiness, unable to see what it once lived and believed to be a promise.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: When you have a dream and someone makes promises they keep breaking, it is hard to recover. You lose hope.
quotes.author: Yasmine El Rashidi

quotes.quote: Far too often, the best thing I can have in my hand when someone makes a promise is a really big broom so that I can sweep up the broken pieces.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Promises are about as good as already chewed-up gum.
quotes.author: Ce Johnson

quotes.quote: His words were like Satin on her Skin. She just picked the lies she liked the best.
quotes.author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quotes.quote: At the point that our promises have become tactics to get what we want verses commitments that we intend to keep, the only thing that we are promising is the delivery of a broken promise.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Broken promises are the worst. Better not to promise anything.
quotes.author: Bill Lishman

quotes.quote: It felt liked a broken promise. Like the Fisher King's wound; never heals.
quotes.author: Ian Brennan

quotes.quote: A broken promise is like a child's pinwheel, you've got to be yourself or at least within the confines.
quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

quotes.quote: Don't say that I'm crazy not overreacting / I'm just placing all the facts and then you leave me broken / Promises promises / You making broken promises
quotes.author: Myron Roberts

quotes.quote: Promises promises / You making broken promises / That's all I get / And I'm like where your mind is at your heart don't wanna be / And I'm like where your mind it at your heart don't wanna be no
quotes.author: Myron Roberts

quotes.quote: Feeling I could hold you, And you want me to / But all your broken promises, Heartache through and through / Looking for directions, Should I go or stay / All your broken promises Getting in the way
quotes.author: Chris Glen

quotes.quote: All your broken promises Getting out of hand / Running out of patience, Losing ground for speed / All your broken promises, May just kill the need / You're the right kind of lover, But you're looking for cover
quotes.author: Chris Glen

quotes.quote: Your broken promises can lose it all / Undecided things, While waiting in the wings / or the start of the show / To make a move and let it flow over me
quotes.author: Chris Glen

quotes.quote: Head to head, face to face / Out of time,Out of place / Back to back, bound to fall / With broken promises we lose all...
quotes.author: Chris Glen

quotes.quote: Nothing but broken promises / Everyday, promises / Fair weather, promises / No matter where look our go I find the opposite / In this around this is nothing but broken promises
quotes.author: Rasheed Walter Thomas

quotes.quote: You promised everything / But that was yesterday / You threw it all away / Ain't it a shame / Love's a game / Full of broken promises
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: All the broken promises / Love could never be like this / Lips that give the tender kiss / Make the broken promises
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: So what's left that I should ever feel / Cause since the day you left me I have been so alone / And now we're left with broken promises / My heart can't take no more
quotes.author: Loick Mark Essien

quotes.quote: The road I walk is paved with the broken / promises I made / At least a million times I've fallen / but never will I break
quotes.author: Bradley Kirk Arnold

quotes.quote: I scattered in the breeze / Living on memories / Everywhere I look / As far as I can see / Broken promises, broken promises / Pieces of me...
quotes.author: J. Matheos

quotes.quote: All that I remember now / Are people and shadows / Broken promises, broken promises / Pieces of me...No connection
quotes.author: J. Matheos

quotes.quote: Forgive, forget all of our broken promises / We run, run, run to loose it all / These days, are darker and they draw me in / And I left a trail but no one missed me in, in the end
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: Take your broken promises, and don't come back again / It's time to say goodbye, I'm gonna leave you where you lie
quotes.author: Lance Dowdle

quotes.quote: I told you in confidence / And trusted you'd never sacrifice our silence / I rise from the ashes / And remains of your broken promises
quotes.author: Jonas Ekdahl

quotes.quote: I've tried to change but they always around, pulling me down in bed / Gave you my word but they were just broken promises
quotes.author: Christopher Maurice Brown

quotes.quote: Now you're breaking my heart / With all your broken promises / You say you're gonna do this / And you say you're gonna do that / But you never come through
quotes.author: Dino Esposito

quotes.quote: Throw it all away / Empty promises, broken dreams / All reminders of what we could have been
quotes.author: Audio Insurgency

quotes.quote: I should've seen it coming, running with a fallen angel / Living on a broken promise when the day is through / Trying to make a life for us, I only knew it my way / I'm just a shadow on the highway, fade to blue / Fade to blue
quotes.author: Danny Chauncey

quotes.quote: My distant colours still bleeding / A broken promise for the soul / Never loving, never healing
quotes.author: James Dean Bradfield

quotes.quote: The path of least resistance / Is catching up with me again today / I'm broken down, not good enough / The broken promises add up / To twice their weight in tears which I have caused
quotes.author: Brandi M Carile

quotes.quote: Broken sticks and broken stones / Will turn to dust just like our bones again today / I'm broken down / Not good enough / The broken promises add up again today
quotes.author: Brandi M Carile

quotes.quote: His promises were, as he then was, mighty; But his performance, as he is now, nothing.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Broken promises , like a broken glass, is hard to replace.
quotes.author: Wille Mae Gaskin

quotes.quote: Broken promises like delayed gratification / is like paying for trip / Long before the vacation / Is like forever paying forward / with no returns on your investment
quotes.author: I. Bernard Brown

quotes.quote: Broken promises like stored up treasures / robbing the soul of temporary pleasures / But never delivering on what is envisioned / without any explanation of your expectation
quotes.author: I. Bernard Brown

quotes.quote: Broken promises life scratch records / a nonstop reminder of what is to be / With no how, no what, no when / or where it suppose to end / But expects you to keep on believing / that soon you will be receiving
quotes.author: I. Bernard Brown

quotes.quote: Broken promises putting your life on hold until this great thing happens / Living temporary forever to be told hold on just a little bit longer / The wait will amke you stronger / you have no other choice but to wait / Ask for patience and try and keep the faith
quotes.author: I. Bernard Brown

quotes.quote: We have to constantly see ourselves as better, more deserving, and more right than everyone else. Which is why so many of us keep falling for the empty promises of power and control.
quotes.author: Pete Wilson

quotes.quote: Broken promises like glass upon the floor / Shattered dreaming like haze upon the morn
quotes.author: Missy Ray

quotes.quote: Broken promises bonds coming undone / Wasting away the years are build up
quotes.author: Missy Ray

quotes.quote: Broken promises wash away like sand / Leaving nothing but crushed promises in my hand / Break me / You break me down
quotes.author: Missy Ray

quotes.quote: Mankind can make promises and break them. The truth is mankind doesn't always keep their promises.
quotes.author: Beatrice Ivory

quotes.quote: Our life is reflected on the broken vows of a broken-marriage and can't seem to get over the fact that he let you down and he had a changed of heart that turned into stone.
quotes.author: Beatrice Ivory

quotes.quote: Many marriages failed is due to broken vows and broken promises and when this lead to the downfall of a marriage; you may start to feel that you cannot trust others.
quotes.author: Beatrice Ivory

quotes.quote: Pain is eased. Rules are broken / Promises---forgotten. Trust betrayed / Love cools. Hate dies. / Stars fall. Things change / Life ends, but -- God is always God!
quotes.author: Terrance L. Weber

quotes.quote: Decisions and promises can be made, and also broken due to sudden unexpected changes.
quotes.author: Tara Ramsey

quotes.quote: Trust can be broken in many different ways.
quotes.author: Cindy Beall

quotes.quote: What's burned is burned, but what's broken can heal. And broken trust in a relationship is not like a house on fire.
quotes.author: Mira Kirshenbaum

quotes.quote: Broken trust forces us, first, to acknowledge a painful reality we may have chosen to ignore, then, to make some difficult decisions.
quotes.author: Dr. Jane Greer

quotes.quote: Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: It is better to suffer wrong than to do it, and happier to be sometimes cheated than not to trust.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The trust has broken down. It will take some time to change attitudes and attitudes are going to be needed to develop trust
quotes.author: Jim Leach

quotes.quote: Rebuilding trust when it's been broken is not dependent only on the person who has broken it, or how many times they can prove they are honest. It depends on the person who has decided not to trust anymore. Though they may be totally justified in their decision not to trust, as long as they choose not to, the relationship has no hope of survival and should be ended. If or when they decide to trust again, there is hope reborn
quotes.author: Doe Zantamata

quotes.quote: I was never one to patiently pick up broken fragments and glue them together again and tell myself that the mended whole was as good as new. What is broken is broken, and I'd rather remember it as it was at its best than mend it and see the broken pieces as long as I lived
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: We're never so vulnerable than when we trust someone - but paradoxically, if we cannot trust, neither can we find love or joy
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.quote: Don't trust the person who has broken faith once.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: What do people gain from lying? Besides losing: your respect, your dignity, your reputation, and those who love you. I guess those few minutes of satisfaction, smiling behind your lies, are soon well worth a lifetime of a regretful guilty conscience.
quotes.author: Amir Riveroll

quotes.quote: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: It was a mistake," you said. But the cruel thing was, it felt like the mistake was mine, for trusting you.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: For there to be betrayal, there would have to have been trust first.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: To forgive someone who hurt you is easy but to trust them again is next to impossible.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Sometimes trusting a friend is the hardest thing to do, even the closest friends can become enemies.
quotes.author: James Merrow

quotes.quote: When someone breaks your trust don't feel stupid for trusting them. You didn't do anything wrong. They're just an untrustworthy person.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: The toughest thing about the power of trust is that it's very difficult to build and very easy to destroy. The essence of trust building is to emphasize the similarities between you and the customer.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: The chief lesson I have learned in a long life is that the only way you can make a man trustworthy is to trust him; and the surest way to make him untrustworthy is to distrust him.
quotes.author: Henry L. Stimson

quotes.quote: Not everyone can be trusted. I think we all have to be very selective about the people we trust.
quotes.author: Shelley Long

quotes.quote: When trust is broken, it does not need to be the end of a relationship. Much can be learned from staying in a relationship and learning from the conflict situation.
quotes.author: Dr. Margaret Paul

quotes.quote: It breaks my heart to know I will never be able to trust you again. I've learned so many lies and each time it takes a piece of me that you will never get back again.
quotes.author: Karen Kostyla

quotes.quote: Broken people lead to broken hearts. That's why it's so important to heal from one relationship before starting another.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Trust, once you get it. It's priceless. But once you lose it, you are useless.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Trust is the highest form of human motivation. It brings out the very best in people. But it takes time and patience.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Love all, trust few.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Trust him not with your secrets, who, when left alone in your room, turns over your papers.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: Trust is like a vase. Once it is broken, though you can fix it, the vase will never be the same again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I believe everything happens for a reason. People change so you can learn to let go. Things go wrong so you can appreciate them when they're right. You believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: You may be deceived if you trust too much, but you will live in torment if you don't trust enough.
quotes.author: Frank Crane

quotes.quote: Do not trust all men, but trust men of worth; the former course is silly, the latter a mark of prudence.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: Trust is like a paper. Once it's crumpled, it can't be perfect again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If offering apologies and making promises fixed broken trust, there’d be no broken trust left to fix.
quotes.author: Tim Cole

quotes.quote: Breaking someone’s trust is like crumpling up a perfect piece of paper. You can smooth it over but it’s never going to be the same again.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don’t ever break someone’s trust. Once you do, then nobody wants to do business with you.
quotes.author: Robert Budi Hartono

quotes.quote: Broken trust and anger will close a heart until honesty and love is once again found.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's easy to forgive the mistakes from others. But it's hard to rebuild that trust that has been destroyed.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Stop caring about the people who broke your trust , and start caring only about the people who still have faith in you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Trust is tough. Once trust has been broken by multiple people on multiple occasions, believing in anyone or anything becomes increasingly difficult. Much of the skepticism of our world can be traced back to broken trust.
quotes.author: Dillon Burroughs

quotes.quote: t's the same old story you've heard a thousand times. Somebody's trust gets broken. Somebody's left behind.
quotes.author: Travis Tritt

quotes.quote: Trust is like a vase.. once it's broken, though you can fix it, the vase will never be same again.
quotes.author: Walter Inglis Anderson

quotes.quote: Trust is like that. You can break it for a good reason. But it still remains broken
quotes.author: Harlan Coben

quotes.quote: Broken trust is like melted chocolate. No matter how hard you try to freeze it. you can never return it to the original shape.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The total act of betrayal is broken trust.
quotes.author: Notes from Nora

quotes.quote: Broken trust can heal.
quotes.author: Mira Kirshenbaum

quotes.quote: One of these reasons is that the person who's broken your trust is very possibly not as bad as he seems to be right now.
quotes.author: Mira Kirshenbaum

quotes.quote: The healing of broken trust is a natural process. Trust itself is natural.
quotes.author: Mira Kirshenbaum

quotes.quote: Now you can see why it's been so hard for you and me and everybody else to heal broken trust. It's not that broken trust is hard to heal itself. It's that the things we do not make ourselves feel safe when we're living with mistrust prevent the broken trust from healing.
quotes.author: Mira Kirshenbaum

quotes.quote: Broken trust is hard to heal because we're not even trying to heal it. We're just trying to make ourselves feel safe.
quotes.author: Mira Kirshenbaum

quotes.quote: When your trust is someone is broken, you will inevitably experience shock, denial, anger, and sadness, feelings that are, in many ways, akin to the mourning process following a death.
quotes.author: Dr. Jane Greer

quotes.quote: OurÂ brokennessÂ has no other beauty but the beauty that comes from the compassion that surrounds it.
quotes.author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quotes.quote: BrokennessÂ is the operative issue of our time - broken souls, broken hearts, broken places.
quotes.author: Samantha Power

quotes.quote: Brokenness is the stripping of self-reliance and independence from God. The broken person has no confidence in his own righteousness or his own works, but he is cast in total dependence upon the grace of God working in and through him.
quotes.author: Nancy Leigh Demoss

quotes.quote: BrokennessÂ is often the road to breakthrough. Be encouraged.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: You grow up a bit damaged or broken then you have some success but you don't know how to feel good about the work you're doing or the life you're leading.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: The worst kind of brokenness is the kind that you don't know you have.
quotes.author: Amy Neftzger

quotes.quote: BrokennessÂ involves removing inappropriate pride and self-reliance and building healthy God-reliance.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: BrokennessÂ is the bow from which God launches the arrow of healing.
quotes.author: Louie Giglio

quotes.quote: If you cannot speak yourÂ brokenness, yourÂ brokennessÂ will speak for you.
quotes.author: Peter Rollins

quotes.quote: To experienceÂ brokennessÂ and humiliation all you have to do is lead.
quotes.author: Dan B. Allender

quotes.quote: A broken soul is not the absence of beauty, but a cracked and torn soul reeks of the sweet incense it contains.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell

quotes.quote: We are all broken by something. We have all hurt someone and have been hurt. We all share the condition of brokenness even if our brokenness is not equivalent.
quotes.author: Bryan Stevenson

quotes.quote: Brokenness is God's requirement for maximum usefulness.Â
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: YourÂ brokennessÂ is not useless. God can always use your pain to rebuild a stronger you.
quotes.author: Trent Shelton

quotes.quote: Our lives,our brokenness,our flaws and failures are precisely what God designed to reflect a perfect love.Â
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A broken bone can heal, but the wound a word opens can fester forever.
quotes.author: Jessamyn West

quotes.quote: It is through that brokenness that we find courage and strength. It is what empowers us to do great things.
quotes.author: K.S. Ruff

quotes.quote: GenuineÂ brokennessÂ pleases God more than pretend spirituality.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: I would rather be the man who bought the Brooklyn Bridge than the man who sold it.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: We wept, Brooklyn was a lovely place to hit. If you got a ball in the air, you had a chance to get it out. When they tore down Ebbets Field, they tore down a little piece of me.
quotes.author: Duke Snider

quotes.quote: Poor thing. To die and never see Brooklyn.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: Where I grew up in Brooklyn, nobody committed suicide. Everyone was too unhappy.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: We're definitely going to get Brooklyn christened, but we don't know into which religion.
quotes.author: David Beckham

quotes.quote: The Brooklyn Dodgers had a no hitter last night.
quotes.author: Bob Dole

quotes.quote: Comparing the Brooklyn that I know with Manhattan is like comparing a comfortable and complacent duenna to her more brilliant and neurotic sister.
quotes.author: Carson McCullers

quotes.quote: Manhattan is like Beverly Hills. And the soul of New York has moved to Brooklyn, where everything new and exciting seems to be.
quotes.author: Alec Baldwin

quotes.quote: People from Brooklyn grow up with a certain common sense. If it doesn't ring true, it's not true.
quotes.author: Judy Sheindlin

quotes.quote: Brooklyn praise is half slander.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Spread love, it's the Brooklyn way.
quotes.author: The Notorious B.I.G

quotes.quote: Brooklyn was the most wonderful city a man could play in, and the fans there were the most loyal there were.
quotes.author: Pee Wee Reese

quotes.quote: Brooklyn has become a brand, and it represents something, and there is this tension between the old and new world.
quotes.author: Eliza Hittman

quotes.quote: Brooklyn is the only place where a guy can open up a candy store sell no candy and gross over eight million dollars a year.
quotes.author: Richard Jeni

quotes.quote: Brooklyn was like Philadelphia made better by its proximity to Manhattan.
quotes.author: Jonathan Franzen

quotes.quote: Brooklyn's good. Brooklyn's funky. Brooklyn's happening.
quotes.author: Waris Dirie

quotes.quote: Brooklyn, it's a great town, a great city. It's New York.
quotes.author: Patrick Ewing

quotes.quote: I, who have no sisters or brothers, look with some degree of innocent envy on those who may be said to be born to friends.
quotes.author: James Boswell

quotes.quote: To have a loving relationship with a sister is not simply to have a buddy or a confident -- it is to have a soulmate for life.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: The thing with brothers is, you're supposed to take turns being the keeper. Sometimes you get to sit down and be the brother who is kept.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Our brothers and sisters are there with us from the dawn of our personal stories to the inevitable dusk.
quotes.author: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.quote: Our siblings. They resemble us just enough to make all their differences confusing, and no matter what we choose to make of this, we are cast in relation to them our whole lives long.
quotes.author: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.quote: Being his real brother I could feel I live in his shadows, but I never have and I do not now. I live in his glow.
quotes.author: Michael Morpurgo

quotes.quote: Your parents are the parents you know best. Your brother and sister, if you have them, are the brother and sister you know best. They may not be the ones you like the best. They may not be the most interesting, but they are the closest and probably the clearest to you.
quotes.author: James Salter

quotes.quote: What sets sisters apart from brothers and also from friends is a very intimate mashing of heart, soul and the mystical cords of memory.
quotes.author: Carol Saline

quotes.quote: Brothers don't necessarily have to say anything to each other—they can sit in a room and be together and just be completely comfortable with each other.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: There is a little boy inside the man who is my brother. Oh, how I hated that little boy, and how I love him too.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlan

quotes.quote: A sibling may be the keeper of one's identity, the only person with the keys to one's unfettered, more fundamental self.
quotes.author: Marian Sandmaier

quotes.quote: Siblings: children of the same parents, each of whom is perfectly normal until they get together.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: I don't believe an accident of birth makes people sisters or brothers. It makes them siblings, gives them mutuality of parentage. Sisterhood and brotherhood is a condition people have to work at.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Siblings are the people we practice on, the people who teach us about fairness and cooperation and kindness and caring quite often the hard way.
quotes.author: Pamela Dugdale

quotes.quote: If you have a brother or sister, tell them you love them every day—that's the most beautiful thing. I told my sister how much I loved her every day. That's the only reason I'm OK right now.
quotes.author: Amaury Nolasco

quotes.quote: Brother and sister, together as friends, ready to face whatever life sends. Joy and laughter or tears and strife, holding hands tightly as we dance through life.
quotes.author: Suzie Huitt

quotes.quote: To the outside world we all grow old. But not to brothers and sisters. We know each other as we always were. We know each other's hearts. We share private family jokes. We remember family feuds and secrets, family griefs and joys. We live outside the touch of time.
quotes.author: Clara Ortega

quotes.quote: Sisters and brothers are the truest, purest forms of love, family and friendship, knowing when to hold you and when to challenge you, but always being a part of you.
quotes.author: Carol Ann Albright Eastman

quotes.quote: For there is no friend like a sister in calm or stormy weather; To cheer one on the tedious way, To fetch one if one goes astray, To lift one if one totters down, To strengthen whilst one stands.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: The mildest, drowsiest sister has been known to turn tiger if her sibling is in trouble.
quotes.author: Clara Ortega

quotes.quote: The best thing about having a sister was that I always had a friend.
quotes.author: Cali Rae Turner

quotes.quote: Children of the same family, the same blood, with the same first associations and habits, have some means of enjoyment in their power, which no subsequent connections can supply.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Having a sister is like having a best friend you can't get rid of. You know whatever you do, they will still be there.
quotes.author: Amy Li

quotes.quote: If thy brother wrongs thee, remember not so much his wrong-doing, but more than ever that he is thy brother.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: My sister and I are so close that we finish each other's sentences and often wonder who's memories belong to whom.
quotes.author: Shannon Celebi

quotes.quote: Brothers and sisters are as close as hands and feet.
quotes.author: Vietnamese Proverb

quotes.quote: My brother is one of my true heroes. Steady and sober where I am impulsive and emotional.
quotes.author: Mark McKinnon

quotes.quote: After a girl is grown, her little brothers—now her protectors—seem like big brothers.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: A sister is a gift to the heart, a friend to the spirit, a golden thread to the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Isadora James

quotes.quote: Half the time when brothers wrestle, it's just an excuse to hug each other.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: Because brothers don't let each other wander in the dark alone.
quotes.author: Jolene Perry

quotes.quote: There's no other love like the love for a brother. There's no other love like the love from a brother.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: Brothers and sisters separated by distance, joined by love.
quotes.author: Chuck Danes

quotes.quote: Sometimes being a brother is even better than being a superhero.
quotes.author: Marc Brown

quotes.quote: A brother may not be a friend, but a friend will always be a brother.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: Sincere art brings us together, the brotherhood and sisterhood of mankind.
quotes.author: Yaroslaw Rozputnyak

quotes.quote: What's the good news if you haven't a sister to share it?
quotes.author: Jenny DeVries

quotes.quote: We came into the world like brother and brother; And now let's go hand in hand, not one before another.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: There is a destiny which makes us brothers; none goes his way alone. All that we send into the lives of others comes back into our own.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.quote: What makes a brother-sister relationship special is the way, each one remember the other when they are apart. They miss the talks, the laughs and the time they spent together. Life changes, memories don't. I miss you bro.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A brother is a friend God gave you; a friend is a brother your heart chose for you.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Mum used to say we were the same soul split in two and walking around on four legs.
quotes.author: Melodie Ramone

quotes.quote: Big sisters are the crab grass in the lawn of life.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: People inflict pain on others in the selfish pursuit of their happiness or satisfaction. Yet true happiness comes from a sense of brotherhood and sisterhood.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: We are part of a great whole. All living things are our brothers and sisters.
quotes.author: Kenneth Clark

quotes.quote: A sister is a little bit of childhood that can never be lost.
quotes.author: Marion C. Garretty

quotes.quote: Until blacks and whites see each other as brother and sister, we will not have parity. It's very clear.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Being sister and brother means being there for each other.
quotes.author: Shellygb

quotes.quote: The great renewal of the world will perhaps consist in this, that man and maid, freed of all false feelings and reluctances, will seek each other not as opposites, but as brother and sister, as neighbors, and will come together as human beings.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: What are sisters for if not to point out the things the rest of the world is too polite to mention.
quotes.author: Claire Cook

quotes.quote: The greatest gift our parents ever gave us was each other.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Brother, sister too / Do what you must do / Don't trust people you meet / They might promise you / That the river ain't deep.
quotes.author: Damon Albarn

quotes.quote: I say it again, brothers and sisters, can we not find a way / Out of this mess, into a brighter, a brighter day? / To save the world for our children to play.
quotes.author: Karl Hyde

quotes.quote: But remember, brothers and sisters / You can still stand tall / Just be thankful / For what you got.
quotes.author: O'Shea Jackson

quotes.quote: Brothers and sisters unite / It's the time of your lives its the time of your lives / Break down, break down / Got to spread love around, got to spread it around.
quotes.author: Coldplay

quotes.quote: Brothers need sisters, sisters need brothers / All need the master, gotta stay together / Haven't got a friend, and your world is caving in / The world will know how far we've come / When the children are as.
quotes.author: Willie B. Williams Jr.

quotes.quote: A brother who is unhappy is a dangerous relative to have.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.quote: When you deal with your brother, be pleasant, but get a witness.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: My brother is my best friend and nothing is stronger than family.
quotes.author: Robert Cheeke

quotes.quote: Sisters make the best friends in the world.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: A sister is both your mirror - and your opposite.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fishel

quotes.quote: Sisters are a shield against life's cruel adversity.
quotes.author: Nancy Mitford

quotes.quote: With a sister, one can never fear that success will go to one's head.
quotes.author: Charlotte Gray

quotes.quote: When sisters stand shoulder to shoulder, who stands a chance against us?
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Sisterhood is a funny thing. It's easy to recognize, but hard to define.
quotes.author: Pearl Cleage

quotes.quote: Be kind to thy sister. Not many may know the depths of true sisterly love.
quotes.author: Margaret Ann Courtney

quotes.quote: Sisterhood is a powerful metaphor; it ought not become a synonym for groupthink.
quotes.author: Kathleen Hall Jamieson

quotes.quote: Sisters are the true friends who ask how you are, and then wait to hear the answer.
quotes.author: Jill Shalvis

quotes.quote: Sisterly love is, of all sentiments, the most abstract. Nature does not grant it any functions.
quotes.author: Ugo Betti

quotes.quote: A sister should set her brother up with one of her friends, unless her only friend is her sister.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: It is at times such as this that we show our true spirit of giving and of brotherhood of revealing the good Samaritan in all of us.
quotes.author: Jo Bonner

quotes.quote: The spirit of brotherhood recognizes of necessity both the need of self-help and also the need of helping others in the only way which every ultimately does great god, that is, of helping them to help themselves.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I may not be my brothers keeper, but I am my brother's brother.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland

quotes.quote: You cannot contribute anything to the ideal condition of mind and heart known as Brotherhood, however much you preach, posture, or agree, unless you live it.
quotes.author: Faith Baldwin

quotes.quote: The idea of brotherhood re-dawns upon the world with a broader significance than the narrow association of members in a sect or creed.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Brotherhood is the very price and condition of man's survival.
quotes.author: Carlos P. Romulo

quotes.quote: Brotherhood is not just a Bible word. Out of comradeship can come and will come the happy life for all.
quotes.author: Heywood Broun

quotes.quote: All men were made by the Great Spirit Chief. They are all brothers.
quotes.author: Chief Joseph

quotes.quote: Sometimes being a brother is even better than being a superhero.
quotes.author: Marc Brown

quotes.quote: Brotherhood means laying down your life for somebody, really willing to sacrifice yourself for somebody else.
quotes.author: Tim Hetherington

quotes.quote: The most dangerous word in any human tongue is the word for brother. It's inflammatory.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: People are realizing that color has no bearing on what's known as brotherhood.
quotes.author: Omar Epps

quotes.quote: The more man knows of man, the better for the common brotherhood among men.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Because brothers don't let each other wander in the dark alone.
quotes.author: Jolene Perry

quotes.quote: There's no other love like the love for a brother. There's no other love like the love from a brother.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: The only redemptive feature of war is the brotherhood which it forges.
quotes.author: Max Hastings

quotes.quote: We don't need holy wars. What we need is tolerance and brotherhood and simple humanity.
quotes.author: Arlen Specter

quotes.quote: One can be a brother only in something. Where there is no tie that binds men, men are not united but merely lined up.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The mystical bond of brotherhood makes all men brothers.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: When man to man shall be friend and brother.
quotes.author: Gerald Massey

quotes.quote: The opportunity for brotherhood presents itself every time you meet a human being.
quotes.author: Jane Wyman

quotes.quote: When you are a grown up your brothers become your neighbors and your unconditional brotherhood become your conditional neighborhood.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Brotherhood is an ideal better understood by example than precept!
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Either men will learn to live like brothers, or they will die like beasts.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: I look to a time when brotherhood needs no publicity; to a time when a brotherhood award would be as ridiculous as an award for getting up each morning.
quotes.author: Daniel D. Mich

quotes.quote: Grant us brotherhood, not only for this day but for all our years a brotherhood not of words but of acts and deeds.
quotes.author: Stephen Vincent Benet

quotes.quote: Being his real brother I could feel I live in his shadows, but I never have and I do not now. I live in his glow.
quotes.author: Michael Morpurgo

quotes.quote: The crest and crowning of all good, life's final star, is Brotherhood.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.quote: If we desire a society in which men are brothers, then we must act towards one another with brotherhood. If we can build such a society, then we would have achieved the ultimate goal of human freedom.
quotes.author: Bayard Rustin

quotes.quote: Brotherhood is not so wild a dream as those, who profit by postponing it, pretend.
quotes.author: Eric Sevareid

quotes.quote: It takes two men to make one brother.
quotes.author: Israel Zangwill

quotes.quote: Nothing about 'Brotherhood' is ever wrapped up in a nice package.
quotes.author: Annabeth Gish

quotes.quote: If someone saves your life, you develop a brotherhood, no matter what your race.
quotes.author: Omar Epps

quotes.quote: We must live together as brothers or perish together as fools.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: None of you believes until he wishes for his brother what he wishes for himself.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad

quotes.quote: Equality lies only in human moral dignity. ... Let there be brothers first, then there will be brotherhood, and only then will there be a fair sharing of goods among brothers.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Brotherhood is my father, harmony is my mother and peace is my wife.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Godly brothers have fought for wisdom but humanely brothers are fighting for wealth.
quotes.author: Dr.P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quotes.quote: True happiness comes from a sense of brotherhood and sisterhood, but not from hatred and division.
quotes.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

quotes.quote: Brothers don’t necessarily have to say anything to each other — they can sit in a room and be together and just be completely comfortable with each other.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: To the outside world we all grow old. But not to brothers and sisters. We know each other as we always were. We know each other’s hearts. We share private family jokes. We remember family feuds and secrets, family griefs and joys. We live outside the touch of time.
quotes.author: Clara Ortega

quotes.quote: I don’t believe an accident of birth makes people sisters or brothers. It makes them siblings, gives them mutuality of parentage. Sisterhood and brotherhood is a condition people have to work at.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: You cannot see brotherhood; neither can you hear it nor taste it. But you can feel it a hundred times a day. It is the pat on the back when things look gloomy. It is the smile of encouragement when the way seems hard. It is the helping hand when the burden becomes unbearable.
quotes.author: Peter E. Terzick

quotes.quote: The world is now too small for anything but brotherhood.
quotes.author: Powell Davies

quotes.quote: As life in general constituted much pain in the form of struggles against poverty, disease, ignorance, and emotional anguish, what more civilized way for people to alleviate the same than by giving themselves to one another as brothers and sisters in deed, as well as in word?
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: You may call for peace as loudly as you wish, but where there is no brotherhood there can in the end be no peace.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: I refuse to accept the view that mankind is so tragically bound to the starless midnight of racism and war that the bright daybreak of peace and brotherhood can never become a reality... I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: I believe in the brotherhood of all men, but I don't believe in wasting brotherhood on anyone who doesn't want to practice it with me. Brotherhood is a two-way street.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: The uniform makes for brotherhood, since when universally adopted it covers up all differences of class and country.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: The great city can teach something that no university by itself can altogether impart: a vivid sense of the largeness of human brotherhood, a vivid sense of man's increasing obligation to man; a vivid sense of our absolute dependence on one another.
quotes.author: Seth Low

quotes.quote: The hope of a secure and livable world lies with disciplined nonconformists who are dedicated to justice, peace and brotherhood.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: If, if a white man puts his arm around me voluntarily, that's brotherhood. But if you - if you hold a gun on him and make him embrace me and pretend to be friendly or brotherly toward me, then that's not brotherhood, that's hypocrisy.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: If the whole of mankind is to be united into one brotherhood, all obstacles must be removed so that men, all over the surface of the globe, should be as children playing in a garden.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: The Son of God became incarnate in the souls of men to instill the feeling of brotherhood. All are brothers and all children of God.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Ignoring all prejudices of caste, creed, class, color, sex, or race, a swami follows the precepts of human brotherhood. His goal is absolute unity with Spirit.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: I cannot lead you into battle. I do not give you laws or administer justice but I can do something else - I can give my heart and my devotion to these old islands and to all the peoples of our brotherhood of nations.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: Surely the day will come when color means nothing more than the skin tone, when religion is seen uniquely as a way to speak one's soul, when birth places have the weight of a throw of the dice and all men are born free, when understanding breeds love and brotherhood.
quotes.author: Josephine Baker

quotes.quote: You cannot further the Brotherhood of Man by encouraging class hatred.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.quote: I believe that if we really want human brotherhood to spread and increase until it makes life safe and sane, we must also be certain that there is no one true faith or path by which it may spread.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

quotes.quote: History teaches us that unity is strength, and cautions us to submerge and overcome our differences in the quest for common goals, to strive, with all our combined strength, for the path to true African brotherhood and unity.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.quote: There is no limit to the potential of brethren working together in complete brotherhood and selflessness toward spiritual goals. The power of God working through such channels will bring unimaginable blessings to all concerned.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Right knows no boundaries, and justice no frontiers; the brotherhood of man is not a domestic institution.
quotes.author: Learned Hand

quotes.quote: My entire life has been an attempt to get back to the kind of feelings you have on a field. The sense of brotherhood, the esprit de corps, the focus - there being no past or future, just the ball. As trite as it sounds, I was happiest playing ball.
quotes.author: David Duchovny

quotes.quote: It is doubtless true that men are bad because they are unhappy. If anyone could give them real happiness, the happiness of brotherhood, they would all want to live the true and brotherly life.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.quote: Whoever in prayer can say, 'Our Falther,' acknowledges and should feel the brotherhood of the whole race of mankind.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: There is no brotherhood of man without the fatherhood of God.
quotes.author: H. M. Field

quotes.quote: The brotherhood off man is an integral part of Christianity no less than the. Fatherhood of God; and to deny the one is no less infidel than to deny the other.
quotes.author: Lyman Abbott

quotes.quote: Give  broad to the stanger, in the name of the universal brotherhood which hinds together all men under the common fatherhood of nature.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: The brotherhood of man is evoked by particular men according to their circumstance.s But it seldom extends to all men.I n the name of our freedom and our brotherhood we are prepared to blow up the other half of mankind and to be blown up in our turn.
quotes.author: Robert Andrews

quotes.quote: THe world has narrowed to a neighborhood before it has broadened to a brotherhood.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: The universal brotherhood of man is our most precious possession--what there is of it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The aim of democracy is harmony, its goal is Brotherhood.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Peace..happiness..brotherhood.. that is what we want in this world.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It called for brotherhood and equality among human beings and made clear that what distinguishes one person from another is none but righteousness, morality, benefit and good deeds; and that one's appearance,color or  race has no role in this preference.
quotes.author: Dr. Adel Ibn Ali Al-shiddy and Dr. Abdul-Razaaq Maash

quotes.quote: Islam regards all off the prophets as one brotherhood, inviting people to the belief that there is no deity worthy of worship exept Allah, alone, without assocates.
quotes.author: Dr. Adel Ibn Ali Al-shiddy and Dr. Abdul-Razaaq Maash

quotes.quote: Dickens did not merely believe in the brotherhood of men in the weak modern way; he was the brotherhood of men, and knew it was a brotherhood in sin as well as in aspiration.
quotes.author: Kevin Belmonte

quotes.quote: Bridge, whose very name alludes to the awful Abbey; Charing Cross holds up the symbol of Christendom; the next station is called a Temple; and Blackfriars remembers the mediavel dream of a Brotherhood.
quotes.author: Kevin Belmonte

quotes.quote: It is a world of wireless telegraphy for the soul; of a psychological brotherhood of men of which the commucations could not be cut.
quotes.author: Kevin Belmonte

quotes.quote: The brotherhood does not differentiate between religion and politics.
quotes.author: Khalil al-Anani and Khalīl ʻAnānī

quotes.quote: The brotherhood tends to treat these aims as part of members religious duties that must be fulfilled. Most important, these these aims help the brotherhood survive and gain support.
quotes.author: Khalil al-Anani and Khalīl ʻAnānī

quotes.quote: The brotherhood does not believe in revolution,and does not rely on it in achieving its goals and if it happend, we will not adopt it..Our task is to create a new generation of believers who can reformulate the islamic umma in its all aspects of life.
quotes.author: Khalil al-Anani and Khalīl ʻAnānī

quotes.quote: Brotherhood is universal. A self gets built, two selves find an orbit around each other, a society absorbs them into a collective fabric that is never the same tomorrow as it was yesterday.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra, Sanjiv Chopra

quotes.quote: Did we not establish brotherhood, we did not become brothers for a single day. Did we not establish brotherhood and friendly relations in perpetuity? In the end, the real victor was not any one of the great powers, it was idea of brotherhood.
quotes.author: Amanda H. Podany

quotes.quote: He knew that God's shining light would lead him and his Brotherhood as they delivered their country toward salvation -- both economic and political.
quotes.author: Mark Vertreese

quotes.quote: The origin of the brotherhood are a clouded mystery to all but a select few of the currrent members. It is only through limited oral history that their traditions and ritual have been passed from one generation to the next.
quotes.author: Mark Vertreese

quotes.quote: The more skilled their dectators became, the more the brotherood mastered the concept of misdirection, an invaluable tool they had learned to use very well.
quotes.author: Mark Vertreese

quotes.quote: Honour all men.Love the borhterhood. Fear God. Honour the king.
quotes.author: I Peter ch. 2, v. 9

quotes.quote: United we stand / Divided we fall / That's how it is in the brotherhood
quotes.author: Tariano Jackson

quotes.quote: No more politics or denominations / Brotherhood / No more war, violence, or pain/ Compassion
quotes.author: Santana

quotes.quote: Mighty cities laid to ruin, burning to the ground. / Murder is become the law; you cannot make a stand, / Chaos rules the world, now mortal, brotherhood of man.
quotes.author: Motörhead

quotes.quote: Imagine no possessions / I wonder if you can / No need for greed or hunger / A brotherhood of man / Imagine all the people sharing all the world
quotes.author: Paul Rodgers

quotes.quote: Only God can break down the national and racial barriers that divide men today. Only God can supply that love we must have for our fellowman. We will never build brotherhood of man upon earth until we are believers in Christ Jesus.
quotes.author: Billy Graham and Donna Lee Toney

quotes.quote: It is time for martyrs now, and if I am to be one, it will be for the cause of brotherhood. That's the only thing that can save this country.
quotes.author: Malcom X

quotes.quote: Laughter is the true brotherhood of man. At some time or another we've all done something that could be laughed at. Anyone who claims he hasn't is the most laughable of all.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: There's no other love like the love for a brother. There's no other love like the love from a brother.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Sometimes being a brother is even better than being a superhero.
quotes.author: Marc Brown

quotes.quote: Our brothers and sisters are there with us from the dawn of our personal stories to the inevitable dusk.
quotes.author: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.quote: A brother is a friend given by Nature.
quotes.author: Jean Baptiste Legouve

quotes.quote: Never make a companion equal to a brother.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: Brothers don't necessarily have to say anything to each other - they can sit in a room and be together and just be completely comfortable with each other.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: He is my most beloved friend and my bitterest rival, my confidant and my betrayer, my sustainer and my dependent, and scariest of all, my equal.
quotes.author: Gregg Levoy

quotes.quote: We came into the world like brother and brother; And now let's go hand in hand, not one before another.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: If we are not our brother's keeper, at least let us not be his executioner.
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.quote: Because brothers don't let each other wander in the dark alone.
quotes.author: Jolene Perry

quotes.quote: Brothers and sisters are as close as hands and feet.
quotes.author: Vietnamese Proverb

quotes.quote: When brothers agree, no fortress is so strong as their common life.
quotes.author: Antisthenes

quotes.quote: After a girl is grown, her little brothers - now her protectors - seem like big brothers.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: It takes two men to make one brother.
quotes.author: Israel Zangwill

quotes.quote: There is a destiny that makes us brothers, no one goes his way alone; all that we send into the lives of others, comes back into our own.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.quote: Affliction's sons are brothers in distress; A brother to relieve, how exquisite the bliss!
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: He who understands you is greater kin to you than your own brother. For even your own kindred neither understand you nor know your true worth.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: I think people that have a brother or sister don't realize how lucky they are. Sure, they fight a lot, but to know that ther's always somebody there, somebody that's family.
quotes.author: Trey Parker & Matt Stone

quotes.quote: As we grew up, my brothers acted like they didn't care, but I always knew they looked out for me and were there!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Moreover if your brother shall trespass against you, go and tell him his fault between you and him alone.
quotes.author: Matthew 18:15

quotes.quote: What strange creatures brothers are!
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Being his real brother I could feel I live in his shadows, but I never have and I do not now. I live in his glow.
quotes.author: Michael Morpurgo

quotes.quote: There was brotherhood between people who had fed from the same breast, a kinship that even time could not break. - Amir
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: A brother shares childhood memories and grown-up dreams.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Help your brother's boat across, and your own will reach the shore.
quotes.author: Hindu Proverb

quotes.quote: I've been blessed to have A brother like you, You're my pal, my buddy And my best friend too. And it means a lot Having a brother like you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Siblings are the people we practice on, the people who teach us about fairness and cooperation and kindness and caring - quite often the hard way.
quotes.author: Pamela Dugdale

quotes.quote: One can be a brother only in something. Where there is no tie that binds men, men are not united but merely lined up.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The younger brother must help to pay for the pleasures of the elder.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: A mystic bond of brotherhood makes all men one.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: He is my most beloved friend and my bitterest rival, my confidant and my betrayer, my sustainer and my dependent, and scariest of all, my equal.
quotes.author: Gregg Levoy

quotes.quote: It snowed last year too: I made a snowman and my brother knocked it down and I knocked my brother down and then we had tea.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.quote: My father used to play with my brother and me in the yard. Mother would come out and say, You're tearing up the grass. We're not raising grass, Dad would reply. We're raising boys.
quotes.author: Harmon Killebrew

quotes.quote: A sibling may be the keeper of one's identity, the only person with the keys to one's unfettered, more fundamental self.
quotes.author: Marian Sandmaier

quotes.quote: One can be a brother only in something. Where there is no tie that binds men, men are not united but merely lined up.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Our siblings. They resemble us just enough to make all their differences confusing, and no matter what we choose to make of this, we are cast in relation to them our whole lives long.
quotes.author: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.quote: We are not only our brother's keeper; in countless large and small ways, we are our brother's maker.
quotes.author: Bonaro Overstreet

quotes.quote: A brother is a friend God gave you; A friend is a brother your heart chose.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Children of the same family, the same blood, with the same first associations and habits, have some means of enjoyment in their power, which no subsequent connections can supply.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: To the outside world we all grow old. But not to brothers and sisters. We know each other as we always were. We know each other's hearts. We share private family jokes. We remember family feuds and secrets, family griefs and joys. We live outside the touch of time.
quotes.author: Clara Ortega

quotes.quote: Brothers in suffering, brothers in resistance, brothers in ideals and conviction. It is now our duty to further strengthen this bond in order to secure this hard-won freedom for future generations.
quotes.author: Guy Verhofstadt

quotes.quote: Having two older brothers is a healthy reminder that you're always closer to the bottom than you are to the top.
quotes.author: Andy Roddick

quotes.quote: I believe that we must reach our brother, never toning down our fundamental oppositions, but meeting him when he asks to be met, with a reason for the faith that is in us, as well as with a loving sympathy for them a brothers.
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.quote: Blood ties do not necessarily make a brother; this special bond may be kindled through years of friendship as well so that a brotherly relationship is possible.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: I don't believe an accident of birth makes people sisters or brothers. It makes them siblings, gives them mutuality of parentage. Sisterhood and brotherhood is a condition people have to work at.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Everyone knows that if you've got a brother, you're going to fight.
quotes.author: Liam Gallagher

quotes.quote: A friend loveth at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.quote: When you deal with your brother, be pleasant, but get a witness.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: Your brother is always the first male friend you will have in your life.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: Brothers naturally invite comparison.
quotes.author: Larry Watson

quotes.quote: Give love, and keep blood between brothers.
quotes.author: Pete Townshend

quotes.quote: Little brothers are the buck privates of life!
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: We have flown the air like birds and swum the sea like fishes, but have yet to learn the simple act of walking the earth like brothers.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: I, who have no sisters or brothers, look with some degree of innocent envy on those who may be said to be born friends.
quotes.author: James Boswell

quotes.quote: When I look at each of my brothers, I see two things. First, I see the next place I want to leave a rosy welt. Second, I see a good man who will always be there, no matter how hard life gets for me or him. Then, I get out of the way because I realize he’s coming at me with a wet dish towel.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: I had a brother who was my savior, made my childhood bearable.
quotes.author: Maurice Sendak

quotes.quote: Being pretty on the inside means you don’t hit your brother and you eat all your peas – that’s what my grandma taught me.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Oh, brothers! I don't care for brothers. My elder brother won't die, and my younger brothers seem never to do anything else.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We are not our brother's keeper, we are our brother and we are our sister. We must look past complexion and see community.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: There is a little boy inside the man who is my brother… Oh, how I hated that little boy. And how I love him too.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: No life's worth more than any other, no sister worth less than any brother.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.quote: The crest and crowning of all good, / Life's final star, is Brotherhood.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.quote: A gentleman nurses the roots: when the root has taken, the truth will grow; and what are the roots of love, but the duty of son and of brother.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A brother may not be a friend, but a friend will always be a brother.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: All men are my brethren, and all things my companion.
quotes.author: Chang Tsai

quotes.quote: And much more am I sorrier for my good knight's loss than for the loss of my fair queen; for queens I might have enough, but such a fellowship of good knights shall never be together in no company.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Malory

quotes.quote: If thy brother wrongs thee, remember not so much his wrong-doing, but more than ever that he is thy brother.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: To hunt tigers one must have a brother's help.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A brother noble, / Whose nature is so far from doing harms / That he suspects none.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Your big brother, best friend forever / Like two peas in a pod, you did everything together.
quotes.author: Pinkie Pie; Applejack; Rainbow Dash; Fluttershy; Rarity

quotes.quote: How lovely the elder brother’s / Life all laced in the other’s, / Lóve-laced!—what once I well / Witnessed; so fortune fell.
quotes.author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quotes.quote: Brothers o' mine, brothers o' mine, / All the world over, from pole to pole / All of them brothers of mine and thine / Every wondering, blundering soul. / Banded together by grace divine, / Brothers o' mine, brothers o' mine.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.quote: We are in ancient stories told, / All were brothers in days of old, / But these with facts they do not chime / For all mankind do love the dime, / And worship the mighty dollar, / And admire the golden collar, / The rich man's washed with whitest lime, / The poor man's cover'd o'er with slime, / But we should try to love each other / And treat each man as our brother.
quotes.author: James McIntyre

quotes.quote: Equality is absolute or no. / Nothing between can stand. We are the sons / Of the same sire, or madness breaks and runs / Through the rude world. Ridiculous our woe / If single pity does not love it. So / Our separate fathers love us. No man shuns / His poorest child's embrace. We are the sons / Of such, or ground and sky are soon to go.
quotes.author: Mark Van Doren

quotes.quote: My brothers all are proud of purse, / But though my poverty I curse, / I would not for a diadem / Exchange my lowly lot with them: / A garret and a crust for me, / And reams and dreams of Poetry.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: I grew up with six brothers.It's how I learned to dance-waiting for the bathroom.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: If God is thy father, man is thy brother.
quotes.author: Lamartine

quotes.quote: A man may be a brother, but he should pay for his cheese.
quotes.author: Serbian Proverb

quotes.quote: Brotherhood is brotherhood, but a kid is always worth half a crown.
quotes.author: Iraqi Proverb

quotes.quote: Our brothers and sisters are there with us from the dawn of our personal stories to the inevitable dusk.
quotes.author: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.quote: To the outside world we all grow old. But not to brothers and sisters. We know each other as we always were. We know each other's hearts. We share private family jokes. We remember family feuds and secrets, family griefs and joys. We live outside the touch of time.
quotes.author: Clara Ortega

quotes.quote: Brothers and sisters are as close as hands and feet.
quotes.author: Vietnamese Proverb

quotes.quote: I don't believe an accident of birth makes people sisters or brothers. It makes them siblings, gives them mutuality of parentage. Sisterhood and brotherhood is a condition people have to work at.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Brothers and sisters should never be in the same family.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Sisters could do a great deal for their brothers, if they would.
quotes.author: Isabella MacDonald Alden

quotes.quote: I love you, you were there for me, you protected me, and most of all, you loved me. We'd fight, scream, and argue, but, under it all, is a love. That only exists, in a brother, and a sister.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Brother and sister, together as friends, ready to face whatever life sends. Joy and laughter or tears and strife, holding hands tightly as we dance through life.
quotes.author: Suzie Huitt

quotes.quote: Brothers and sisters separated by distance joined by love.
quotes.author: Chuck Danes

quotes.quote: After a girl is grown, her little brothers-now her protectors-seem like big brothers.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Children of the same family; the same blood; with the same first associations and habits; have some means of enjoyment in their power; which no subsequent connections can supply...
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: I, who have no sisters or brothers, look with some degree of innocent envy on those who may be said to be born to friends.
quotes.author: James Boswell

quotes.quote: We know one another's faults, virtues, catastrophes, mortifications, triumphs, rivalries, desires, and how long we can each hang by our hands to a bar. We have been banded together under pack codes and tribal laws.
quotes.author: Rose Macaulay

quotes.quote: Our siblings. They resemble us just enough to make all their differences confusing, and no matter what we choose to make of this, we are cast in relation to them our whole lives long.
quotes.author: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.quote: If you want to know how your girl will treat you after marriage, just listen to her talking to her little brother
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: We may look old and wise to the outside world. But to each other, we are still in junior school.
quotes.author: Charlotte Gray

quotes.quote: There is no time like the old time, when you and I were young!
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

quotes.quote: I think people that have a brother or sister don't realize how lucky they are. Sure, they fight a lot, but to know that ther's always somebody there, somebody that's family.
quotes.author: Trey Parker & Matt Stone

quotes.quote: If you have a brother or sister, tell them you love them every day-that's the most beautiful thing. I told my sister how much I loved her every day. That's the only reason I'm OK right now.
quotes.author: Amaury Nolasco

quotes.quote: As we grew up, my brothers acted like they didn't care, but I always knew they looked out for me and were there!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer
