quotes.quote: All you’ll ever be is a fading memory of a bully / Make another joke while they hang another rope so lonely / Push them to the dirt till the words don’t hurt can you hear me / No one’s gonna cry on the very day you die you’re a bully
quotes.author: Brent Smith; Dave Bassett; Zachary Myers

quotes.quote: Teachers said it's just a phase / When I grow up my children will probably do the same / Kids just love to tease / Who'd know it put me underground at seventeen
quotes.author: Aaron Solowoniuk; Ben Kowalewicz; Ian D'sa; Jon Gallant

quotes.quote: You, with your words like knives / And swords and weapons that you use against me / You, have knocked me off my feet again, / Got me feeling like a nothing / You, with your voice like nails / On a chalk board, calling me out when I'm wounded / You, picking on the weaker man
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: These labels that they give you / just 'cause they don't understand / If you look past this moment / You'll see you've got a friend / Waving a flag for who you are / And all you're gonna do / Yeah, so here's to you / And here's to anyone who's ever felt invisible
quotes.author: Bonnie J. Baker; Hunter Easton Hayes; Katrina Ruth Elam

quotes.quote: They'll hate you if you're pretty / They'll hate you if you're not / They'll hate you for what you lack, baby / And they'll hate you for what you got
quotes.author: Kristian Bush

quotes.quote: How would you feel every time you go to school / Someone's looking at you weird calling you a loser / All these girls wearing bubble-gum pink / Guess I didn't get the memo / 'Cause they're laughing at my blue shirt / Well I hope you feeling good about you treating someone you know like a perfect stranger / 'Cause it's easier than standing by my side
quotes.author: Autumn Rowe; Toby Gad; Rachel Crow

quotes.quote: Don't spit on me and shame yourself / Because you wish you were someone else / You look so clean but you spread your dirt / As if you think that words don't hurt
quotes.author: Haylie Katharine N. Duff; Hilary N. Duff; Charlie Midnight; Marc D. N. Swersky

quotes.quote: Get dem haters out your circle / Smile in your face but all they wanna do is bring ya down / See them try them best to hurt you / And work you / Anything to bring ya down
quotes.author: Dane Anthony Deviller; Sean Hosein; Stephen Kipner; Stephen Alan Kipner

quotes.quote: Guess that's all the reason some kids need / 'Cause they all call me names, and say I should just take it on the chin. / If I'm overreacting, then why is it so cold here / Why is it so cold here, in this hell / Why would my friend Suzy / Tell me I should just go kill myself?
quotes.author: Michael Whitaker Smith; Tommy L. Sims

quotes.quote: Did someone hurt you / Make you feel small / You take it out on me / 'Cause it makes you feel tall / I bet you're scared and alone / If you looked in my eyes, you'd see / Hey, bully, you're a lot like me
quotes.author: Morgan Roxanne Frazier; Sherrie Austin; Tiffany Lane Goss

quotes.quote: Hate is too great a burden to bear. It injures the hater more than it injures the hated.
quotes.author: Coretta Scott King

quotes.quote: They all try to look the same / all try to give themselves a name / pick on the boy who is all alone / just because his identity is his own
quotes.author: Jon Evans

quotes.quote: The next person you go to hurt / or try to make feel like dirt / instead of trying to look cool / feel for the guy you make look a fool
quotes.author: Jon Evans

quotes.quote: You, blatant coward that you are, / Upon the helpless vent your spite. / Suppose you ply your trade on me; / Come, monkey with this bard, and see / How I'll repay your bark with bite!
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: He has blossomed into be nobody's fool / The boy who was taunted and bullied at school / Quite a brilliant scientist and few of his kind / And his very equal would be hard to find.
quotes.author: Francis Duggan

quotes.quote: Oh, it's not myself, but a drover chap,' said Stingy Smith with glee, / 'A bullying fellow called Saltbush Bill, and you are the man for me. / He's on the road with his hungry sheep, and he's certain to raise a row, / For he's bullied the whole of the Castlereagh till he's got them under cow ⁠— / Just pick a quarrel and raise a fight, and leather him good and hard, / And I'll take good care that his wretched sheep don't wander a half a yard. / It's a five-pound job if you belt him well — do anything short of kill, / For there isn't a beak on the Castlereagh will fine you for Saltbush Bill.'
quotes.author: Andrew Barton Paterson

quotes.quote: You're fat and ugly and an imbecile too / And that's why they draw funny pictures of you / And talk bad about all the kids / 'Cause it's a real cool club and you're not a part of it / Yeah it's a real cool club and you'll never be a part of it
quotes.author: Benjamin M. Foster

quotes.quote: I stand condemned. A wandering vagabond.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I am a Vagabond: I care not who knows it, nor who is frightened from perusing my papers because of the announcement. You who dwell in dull propriety for ever, may be shocked; you who take names for things, may shut up the book; you may remember that Johnson defined a Vagabond as 'a term of reproach,' and that he stigmatized vagabundus as 'low Latin,' the lexicographer ! but you must at least admit that I who have so exact an appreciation of my own character, am likely to be correct in my notions about other people.
quotes.author: Adam Badeau

quotes.quote: Vagabond has a merry sound in my ears; the word is at any rate classical French, and vagare was good enough Latin for Virgil; while as regards English, Shakespeare used it; and though Richard III does speak of 'vagabonds, rascals, and runaways,' all in one breath, surely the Crookback is poor authority in such matters; and though La Feu does say to Parolles, in 'All’s Well that Ends Well,' 'You are a vagabond, and no true traveller,' La Feu was himself a scamp unworthy of belief. I maintain that the vagabonds are an illustrious fraternity.
quotes.author: Adam Badeau

quotes.quote: I am a vagabond around town. I go prying into all sorts of places, and frequent every corner of Manhattan. I purpose one day to give you a sketch of some scene — say in a pawnbroker’s shop, and at another time will discuss the marvellous beauty of an opera singer’s legs.
quotes.author: Adam Badeau

quotes.quote: Precisely why and how the term 'hobo' came into use remains a mystery. In the absence of any traceable etymology, contemporary observers turned to various origin myths, each more imaginative than the other. Some believed the Latin homo bonus ('good man') to be the root. Others privileged the familiar salutation 'Ho, boy!' or the descriptive 'hoc-boy.' Searching further afield, a creative few, such as William Aspinwall, argued that 'hobo' was an anglicized version of foreign phrases like 'Haut Beau.'
quotes.author: Todd DePastino

quotes.quote: Willard used 'hobo' in a pejorative sense to denote the more aggressive western version of the work-shunning 'professional tramp.' Western workers themselves, however, came to adopt the term as a 'badge of honor' to distinguish themselves from other groups of homeless men, whom they derided with terms like 'tramp' and 'bum.'
quotes.author: Todd DePastino

quotes.quote: I have known men who had been hobo workers. Perhaps many can still be found. There was that minority who never could settle. For such there was only one course, to go down as they aged.
quotes.author: Nels Anderson

quotes.quote: Most Americans of the time fell roughly into two camps in their attitudes toward the hobo. One side viewed the hobo as a rugged American individualist, flouting the law to live as he liked and reveling in the absolute freedom to control his destiny. This hobo lured many artist-intellectuals with the promise of experiencing America, including writers from Carl Sandburg to W.H. Davies, Vachel Lindsay, Harvey Kemp, Jack Kerouac, Robert Service, and Jim Tully. The other side viewed the hobo as a pitiful figure, victim of the rising industrial order.
quotes.author: S. Andrew Granade

quotes.quote: Poor Sober! I have often teased him with reproof, and lie has often promised reformation: for no man is so much open to conviction as the idler, but there is none on whom it operates so little.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: No matter what you do, do your best at it. If you’re going to be a bum, be the best bum there is.
quotes.author: Robert Mitchum

quotes.quote: Every man is, or hopes to be, an idler.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It is good to do nothing and rest afterwards.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: A man who leaves home to mend himself and others is a philosopher; but he who goes from country to country, guided by a blind impulse of curiosity, is a vagabond.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: An idler is a watch that wants both hands; / As useless if it goes as when it stands.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: And homeless near a thousand homes I stood, / And near a thousand tables pined and wanted food.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: To you, clerk, literary man, sedentary person, man of fortune, idler . . . Up! The world (perhaps you now look upon it with pallid and disgusted eyes) is full of zest and beauty for you, if you approach it in the right spirit!
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: It’s so bad being homeless in the winter. They should go somewhere hot like the Caribbean where they can eat free fish all day.
quotes.author: Lady Victoria Harvey

quotes.quote: When I hear a rich man described as a colourful character, I figure he’s a bum with money.
quotes.author: Jimmy Cannon

quotes.quote: Show me a man who cares no more for one place than another, and I will show you in that same person one who loves nothing but himself. Beware of those who are homeless by choice.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: The hungry need bread and the homeless need a roof; the dispossessed need justice and the lonely need fellowship; the undisciplined need order and the slaves need freedom. To allow the hungry to remain hungry would be blasphemy against God and one’s neighbor, for what is nearest to God is precisely the need of one’s neighbor.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: I could have had class. I could’ve been a contender. I could’ve been somebody. Instead of a bum, which is what I am.
quotes.author: Budd Schulberg

quotes.quote: Give me your tired, your poor, / Your huddled masses yearning to breathe free, / The wretched refuse of your teeming shore, / Send these, the homeless, tempest-tost to me: / I lift my lamp beside the golden door.
quotes.author: Emma Lazarus

quotes.quote: And The Day shall come, with a red, red dawn; / And you in your gilded halls, / Shall taste the wrath and vengeance of the men in overalls.
quotes.author: Harry Kirby Mclintock

quotes.quote: The truth and rapture of man are holy things, not lightly to be scorned. A carelessness of life and beauty mark the glutton, the idler, and the fool in their deadly path across history.
quotes.author: John Masefield

quotes.quote: He festered in a Marseilles slum, / A starving genius, god-inspired. / You'd take him for a lousy bum, / Tho' poetry of paint he lyred, / In dreamy pastels each a gem: . . . / How people laughed at them!
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: Oh sure I could go on — but gee! it's rough / To be a pork-and-beaner at the best; / To beg for bouts, yet getting not enough / To keep a decent feed inside my vest; / To go on canvas-kissing till I come / To cadge for drinks just like a Bowery bum.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: My brother is a man of weight; / For every civic plum / He grabs within one pie of state, / While I am just a bum.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: Some people may think you a straight-shooting chum / and call you a wonderful guy / But the guy in the glass says you're only a bum / if you can't look him straight in the eye
quotes.author: Dale Wimbrow

quotes.quote: The poor would never be able to live at all if it were not for the poor.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: The poor have little, beggars none, the rich too much, enough not one.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Many a bum show has been saved by the flag.
quotes.author: George M. Cohan

quotes.quote: If you're going to be a bum, be the biggest. If you're going to blow it, blow it big.
quotes.author: Broderick Crawford

quotes.quote: The beggar is the only person in the universe not obliged to study appearance.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: A poor man with nothing in his belly needs hope, illusion, more than bread.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.quote: The poor don't know that their function in life is to exercise our generosity.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: The bum was justified in his actions because he was homeless and poor. He was allowed to beg for money because the circumstances made it acceptable. Society had shunned him and he was owed that much.
quotes.author: Karina Halle

quotes.quote: Bums are the well to do of this day. They didn't have as far to fall.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: To be poor and independent is very nearly an impossibility.
quotes.author: William Cobbett

quotes.quote: The poor are prevented from thinking by the discipline of others, the rich by their own.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: Slouching along in smelly rags, a bleary-eyed, no-good bum; / A knight of the hollow needle, pard, spewed from the sodden slum.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: When I was brash and gallant-gay / Just fifty years ago, / I hit the ties and beat my way / From Maine to Mexico; / For though to Glasgow gutter bred / A hobo heart had I, / And followed where adventure led, / Beneath a brazen sky.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: God pity all the homeless ones, / The beggars pacing to and fro, / God pity all the poor to-night / Who walk the lamp-lit streets of snow.
quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

quotes.quote: See that choice supper — needless — cast aside — / Though worth a thousand fortunes, counting all, / To them for whom no crumb of it will fall — / The starved and homeless in the street outside.
quotes.author: Ada Cambridge

quotes.quote: I will break through my bondage. Let me be / Homeless once more, a wanderer on the Earth, / Marked with my soul's sole care for company, / Like Cain, lest I do murder on my hearth.
quotes.author: Wilfrid Scawen Blunt

quotes.quote: Give me a quart of good old ale, / Am I a homeless man on earth? / Nay, I want not your roof and quilt, / I'll lie warm at the moon's cold hearth; / No grumbling ghost to grudge my bed, / His grave, ha! ha! holds up my head.
quotes.author: William Henry Davies

quotes.quote: The winds and the rains were abroad — the homeless looked vainly for alms; / And they prayed in the dark to the Lord, with agony clenched in their palms, / 'There is none of us left that is whole,' they cried, through their faltering breath, / 'We are clothed with a sickness of soul, and the shape of the shadow of death.'
quotes.author: Henry Kendall

quotes.quote: Only, alas! the poor, who had neither friends nor attendants, / Crept away to die in the almshouse, home of the homeless.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Yet hear a single cry of pain! / Lord! whilst we dream in quiet beds, / The summer sun and winter rain / Beat still on many homeless heads.
quotes.author: Henry Timrod

quotes.quote: His unshaved, educated face, / His inextinguishable grace. / And his hard smile, are with me still, / Deplore the vision as I will; / For whatsoever he be at, / So droll a derelict as that / Should have at least another hat.
quotes.author: Edwin Arlington Robinson

quotes.quote: You know that old and withered man, that derelict of art, / Who for a paltry franc will make a crayon sketch of you? / In slouching hat and shabby cloak he looks and is the part, / A sodden old Bohemian, without a single sou.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: A tramp was trampin’ on the road — / The afternoon was warm an’ muggy — / And by-and-by he chanced to meet / A parsin ridin’ in a buggy. / Said he: 'As follerers ov the Loard, / To do good offices we oughter!' / An’ from a water-bag he poured, / An’ guv the tramp, a drink er water.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: He talks to none but wends his silent way, / And finds a hovel at the close of day, / Or under any hedge his house is made. / He has no calling and he owns no trade.
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.quote: An old smoaked blanket arches oer his head, / A whisp of straw or stubble makes his bed. / He knows a lawless law that claims no kin / But meet and plunder on and feel no sin —
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.quote: A restless, homeless class they are / Who tramp in Borderland. / They take their rest ’neath moon and star — / Their bed the desert sand,
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: You know you're old when you notice how young the derelicts are getting.
quotes.author: Jeanne Phillips

quotes.quote: I have never watched a man do anything useful who has not been graceful at some moment of his labour: it is only the loafer and the idle saunterer who is as useless and uninteresting to the artist as he is to himself.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If a man walk in the woods for love of them half of each day, he is in danger of being regarded as a loafer; but if he spends his whole day as a speculator, shearing off those woods and making earth bald before her time, he is esteemed an industrious and enterprising citizen.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A slacker is just like custard pie, yellow all through but without crust enough to go over the top.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Standing on a corner / Living in the street / I got to made a living from / The people that I meet / I'm a tramp / Just a tramp
quotes.author: Randy Bachman

quotes.quote: But would He stand today upon the sands of California / And walk the sweating blacktop of New York and Mississippi? / Would He be a guest on Sunday, a vagrant on a Monday? / With the doors locked tight against His kind you know
quotes.author: Christopher H. Wren

quotes.quote: Once a wand'ring ne'er do well, / Just a vagrant roving fellow, / I went my way.
quotes.author: Jerome Kern; Oscar Ii Hammerstein

quotes.quote: Bee scientists always speak of the bee as she. It is because all the important bees are of thet sex.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Surely, every child has had the heady experience of catching a foraging bumblebee in an old Mason jar., of feeling its resonant and angry buzz vibrate through the metal lid, and then, realizing that delicious excitement of indecision, hesitate to lift the lid to release the bee, fearing some angry retaliation for its brief imprisonment.
quotes.author: Brian L. Griffin

quotes.quote: Now everybody knows, I suppose, without bees in your garden, nothing grows.
quotes.author: Craig Smith

quotes.quote: If bumblebee leavings and stump paste are good for you, why can't any of those guys (in the health stores) grow full beard?
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: Now, bumblebees, from the day they are born, wear a black-and-yellow jersey just to keep them warm.
quotes.author: Craig Smith

quotes.quote: Honey bees cannot pollinate eggplant and tomato flowers; bumblebees can. So whenever you eat a tomato...thank a bumblebee.
quotes.author: April Pulley Sayre

quotes.quote: Surely, everyone knows the geat furry bumblebee, that gentle giant of the blossoms, that somehow awkward, slow, bumbling bear of a bee.
quotes.author: Brian L. Griffin

quotes.quote: I find many people who don't seem to know just what a bumblebee looks like, others who assure me that they are terrified of bumblebees or any bee for that matter.
quotes.author: Brian L. Griffin

quotes.quote: A bee is never as busy at it seems; it's just that it can't buzz any slower.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: A quirk of genetics of bumblebees means that it is very easy for the queen to control the sex of her offspring by laying either unfertilised eggs, which becomes son, or fertilised eggs, which becomes daughters. It is probably a good thing that humans are unable to do this
quotes.author: Dave Goulson

quotes.quote: If a bumblebee runs out of energy, she cannot fly, and if she cannot fly she cannot get to flowers to get more food, so she is doomed — unless a small boy comes along and gives her a teaspoon of honey.
quotes.author: Dave Goulson

quotes.quote: For her fuzzy body, round as a ball. Her dainty wings seem much too small, to zip, or zoom, or fly at all.
quotes.author: Dawn Matheson

quotes.quote: These creatures build their nests under or near the ground, filling in holes or hiding in brush so as to stay out of the way of unfriendly predators.
quotes.author: Omar Stone

quotes.quote: Little bee, little bee, why do you flee? Because there's a hungry frog chasing me.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbs

quotes.quote: Surely, everyone knows the great furry bumblebee, that gentle giant of the blossoms, that somehow awkward, slow, bumbling bear of a bee.
quotes.author: Dave Goulson

quotes.quote: Bumblebee buzzes around bothering everyone until he comes to a gentle butterfly who understands that the busy bee is looking for someone to be his friend.
quotes.author: Colin West

quotes.quote: The hum of bees is the voice of the garden.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Lawrence

quotes.quote: We think we can make honey without sharing in the fate of bees, but we are in truth nothing but poor bees, destined to accomplish our task and then die.
quotes.author: Muriel Barbery

quotes.quote: The bee collects honey from flowers in such a way as to do the least damage or destruction to them, and he leaves them whole, undamaged and fresh, just as he found them.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: The bee is more honored than other animals, not because she labors, but because she labors for others.
quotes.author: St. John Chrysostom

quotes.quote: The worst decision, hands down, was wearing bright yellow when I was 9 months pregnant. I looked like a bumble bee. I have not worn yellow since.
quotes.author: Safra A. Catz

quotes.quote: Aerodynamically, the bumble bee shouldn't be able to fly, but the bumble bee doesn't know it so it goes on flying anyway.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Some carry the burden of bitterness and resentfulness for many years.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: The burden of intelligence: you can always imagine all those wonderful places where you can never belong.
quotes.author: Robert Reed

quotes.quote: We all have burdens and we need to learn to carry each other's burdens, lighten each other's load.
quotes.author: Ann Romney

quotes.quote: A diagnosis is burden enough without being burdened by secrecy and shame.
quotes.author: Jane Pauley

quotes.quote: Gratitude is a burden, and every burden is made to be shaken off.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Burdens are the foundations of ease and bitter things the forerunners of pleasure.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Hope is like the sun, which, as we journey toward it, casts the shadow of our burden behind us.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: Burdens become light when cheerfully borne.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: You only have the burdens on you that you choose to put there.
quotes.author: Brandon Lee

quotes.quote: It has always seemed that a fear of judgment is the mark of guilt and the burden of insecurity.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: If God can turn night into day then He can turn your burden into a blessing.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burden of it to anyone else.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: There is no lighter burden, nor more agreeable, than a pen.
quotes.author: Petrarch

quotes.quote: Any concern too small to be a prayer is too small to be a burden.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Everyone has his burden. What counts is how you carry it.
quotes.author: Merle Miller

quotes.quote: It is a burden to be challenged to discover your promise land.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Burdens are for shoulders strong enough to carry them.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: The burden which is well borne becomes light.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Life is like unto a long journey with a heavy burden.
quotes.author: Ieyasu Tokugawa

quotes.quote: Lay the burden at the feet of the Savior.
quotes.author: Richard G. Scott

quotes.quote: It's a heavy burden to look up at the mountain and want to start the climb.
quotes.author: Abby Wambach

quotes.quote: Remember, the burden of sorrow is doubled when it is borne alone.
quotes.author: Goran Persson

quotes.quote: Talk about your blessings more than you talk about your burdens.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The burden of this world is too great for one man to bear, and the world's sorrow too heavy for one heart to suffer.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: No burden is so heavy for a man to bear as a succession of happy days.
quotes.author: Max Planck

quotes.quote: Sometimes you don't realize the weight of a burden you've been carrying until you feel the weight of its release.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: No greater burden can be borne by an individual than to know no one cares or understands.
quotes.author: Arthur H. Stainback

quotes.quote: A prosperous fool is a grievous burden.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: Envy is a burden. It is something that makes the heart heavy.
quotes.author: Ebenezer Akinrinade

quotes.quote: Whenever you're having a burden in your heart, share it to those people whom you trust. It'll make you feel better.
quotes.author: Jayson Engay

quotes.quote: Every burden is a blessing.
quotes.author: Walt Kelly

quotes.quote: Never give up. Never give in. Never become hostile. Hate is too big a burden to bear.
quotes.author: John Lewis

quotes.quote: Don't let your mind bully your body into believing it must carry the burden of its worries.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: Today's burdens can strengthen you for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Bureaucracies are inherently antidemocratic. Bureaucrats derive their power from their position in the structure, not from their relations with the people they are supposed to serve. The people are not masters of the bureaucracy, but its clients.
quotes.author: Alan Keyes

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy is not an obstacle to democracy but an inevitable complement to it.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Schumpeter

quotes.quote: The bureaucracy is expanding to meet the needs of the expanding bureaucracy.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The true nature of bureaucracy may be nowhere more obvious to the observer than in a developing country, for only there will it still be made manifest by the full complement of documents, files, veneered desks and cabinets which convey the strict and inverse relationship between productivity and paperwork.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy is not an obstacle to democracy, but an inevitable complement to it.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Schumpeter

quotes.quote: In any bureaucracy, the people devoted to the benefit of the bureaucracy itself always get in control, and those dedicated to the goals the bureaucracy is supposed to accomplish have less and less influence, and sometimes are eliminated entirely.
quotes.author: Jerry Pournelle

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy is the art of making the possible impossible.
quotes.author: Javier Pascual

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy develops the more perfectly, the more it is dehumanized, the more completely it succeeds in eliminating from business love, hatred, and all purely personal, irrational, and emotional elements which escape calculation.
quotes.author: Max Weber

quotes.quote: The only thing that saves us from the bureaucracy is inefficiency. An efficient bureaucracy is the greatest threat to liberty.
quotes.author: Eugene J. McCarthy

quotes.quote: Paperwork is the embalming fluid of bureaucracy, maintaining an appearance of life where none exists.
quotes.author: Pobert Meltzer

quotes.quote: The bureaucracy is a circle from which no one can escape. Its hierarchy is a hierarchy of knowledge.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy, the rule of no one, has become the modern form of despotism.
quotes.author: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy is a giant mechanism operated by pygmies.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: A bureaucrat is an official who is clothed with power and whom it doesn't fit.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A bureaucracy is sure to think that its duty is to augment official power, official business, or official members, rather than to leave free the energies of mankind; it overdoes the quantity of government, as well as impairs its quality. The truth is, that a skilled bureaucracy is, though it boasts of an appearance of science, quite inconsistent with the true principles of the art of business.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy is the epoxy that greases the wheels of progress.
quotes.author: James Boren

quotes.quote: There's so much kind of bureaucracy involved with the whole concept of net neutrality and like technical stuff.
quotes.author: Terry Gross

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy defends the status quo long past the time when the quo has lost its status.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy is a huge beast; deeply rooted, it exists even among artists; it's an almost losing battle against it.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy gives birth to itself and then expects maternity benefits.
quotes.author: Dale Dauten

quotes.quote: The bureaucracy takes itself to be the ultimate purpose of the state.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Every revolution evaporates and leaves behind only the slime of a new bureaucracy.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy expands to meet the needs of the expanding bureaucracy.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy by its nature resists change and nullifies progress.
quotes.author: James Cook

quotes.quote: The perfect bureaucrat everywhere is the man who manages to make no decisions and escape all responsibility.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy is like a fungus that contaminates everything.
quotes.author: Jaime Lerner

quotes.quote: Bureaucrats write memoranda both because they appear to be busy when they are writing and because the memos, once written, immediately become proof that they were busy.
quotes.author: Charles Peters

quotes.quote: In any bureaucracy, there's a natural tendency to let the system become an excuse for inaction.
quotes.author: Chris Fussell

quotes.quote: Bureaucracies tend to grow and to brag about their growth based on how many individuals they have and how much money they spend.
quotes.author: Darrell Issa

quotes.quote: On soviet bureaucrats: They don't ask much of you. They only want you to hate the things you love and to love the things you hate.
quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

quotes.quote: If you're going to sin, sin against God, not the bureaucracy. God will forgive you but the bureaucracy won't.
quotes.author: Hyman Rickover

quotes.quote: To be a corporation, a board of directors is required, though there's mighty little agreement about what directors are supposed to do.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: I think we have more machinery of government than is necessary, too many parasites living on the labor of the industrious.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: One of the enduring truths of the nation's capital is that bureaucrats survive.
quotes.author: Gerald Ford

quotes.quote: It is increasingly clear that the fate of the universe will come to depend more and more on individuals as the bungling of bureaucracy permeates every corner of our existence.
quotes.author: Edna O' Brien

quotes.quote: The inner spirit of bureaucracy lies in the exciting interplay of non-ideas and the effervescent sparkling of human personalities engaged in nondirective pursuits.
quotes.author: James H. Boren

quotes.quote: It is an inevitable defect, that bureaucrats will care more for routine than for results.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: Where there is officialism every human relationship suffers.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: Official dignity tends to increase in inverse ratio to the importance of the country in which the office is held.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: A desk is a dangerous place from which to watch the world.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: The concept of the 'official secret' is its bureaucracy's specific invention.
quotes.author: Max Weber

quotes.quote: The man who is denied the opportunity of taking decisions of importance begins to regard as important the decisions he is allowed to take.
quotes.author: C. Northcote Parkinson

quotes.quote: The accumulation of laws and bureaucracy over time weighs heavily on all of us. Don't destroy the government, use it.
quotes.author: Will Marshall

quotes.quote: Some civil servants are neither servants nor civil.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: If there's anything a public servant hates to do, it's something for the public.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy is not an obstacle to democracy but an inevitable complement to it.
quotes.author: Joseph Schumpeter

quotes.quote: I think the only government of which the human race is capable is more or less efficient or corrupt bureaucracy. The degrees of efficiency and corruption are what make the difference.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy is the death of any achievement.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Bureaucracies are designed to perform public business. But as soon as a bureaucracy is established, it develops an autonomous spiritual life and comes to regard the public as its enemy.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: Fight hierarchy and bureaucracy as hard as you possibly can. Don't ever let it become the master; always remember it's the servant.
quotes.author: Herb Kelleher

quotes.quote: The best way to put the federal bureaucracy back on a leash is to make it obey the laws the people write.
quotes.author: Josh Hawley

quotes.quote: The bureaucracy always goes with the way politicians go.
quotes.author: Yogi Adityanath

quotes.quote: As a bureaucracy becomes more established, it develops its own career structure. It is less dependent and should be less dependent, on individual personalities. Absolutely no one is indispensable.
quotes.author: John Scarlett

quotes.quote: I understand how bureaucracies work. And that's important because our government has become a vast, huge, bloated, corrupt bureaucracy.
quotes.author: Carly Fiorina

quotes.quote: An official man is always an official man, and he has a wild belief in the value of reports.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.quote: Government! Three-fourths parasitic and the other fourth Stupid fumbling.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Bureaucracies force us to practice nonsense. And if you rehearse nonsense, you may one day find yourself the victim of it.
quotes.author: Laurence Gonzales

quotes.quote: You can find your way across this country using burger joints the way a navigator uses stars.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: When people pile seven things onto one burger, it drives me nuts!
quotes.author: Bobby Flay

quotes.quote: It has just stopped me cold from eating another burger!
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: It requires a certain kind of mind to see beauty in a hamburger bun.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.quote: Sacred cows make the tastiest hamburger.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand pounds begins with a single burger.
quotes.author: Chris O'Brien

quotes.quote: A burger and Fries Fixes Everything.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: Hamburgers! The corner-stone of any nutritious breakfast.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.quote: A burger is something anyone can do, just follow the rules.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: Just because people want to eat the burger doesn't mean they want to meet the cow.
quotes.author: Steve Buscemi

quotes.quote: Man who invented the hamburger was smart; man who invented the cheeseburger was a genius.
quotes.author: Matthew McConaughey

quotes.quote: A hamburger is an icon of layered circles, the circle being at once the most spiritual and the most sensual of shapes.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: I don't know if you call a burger 'recession food.' It's comfort food.
quotes.author: Michael Mina

quotes.quote: The hamburgers in America are the best in the world.
quotes.author: Liam Hemsworth

quotes.quote: We all need to make time for a burger once in a while.
quotes.author: Erica Durance

quotes.quote: We take the hamburger business more seriously than anyone else.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.quote:
Flipping burgers is not beneath your dignity. Your grandparents had a
different word for burger flipping; they called it opportunity.
quotes.author: Charles J. Sykes

quotes.quote: The hardest thing in life to learn is which bridge to cross and which to burn.
quotes.author: David Russell

quotes.quote: It makes no difference if I burn my bridges behind me ― I never retreat.
quotes.author: Fiorello LaGuardia

quotes.quote: I’m not a wilting flower. I’m honest, so I pick a lot of fights. I’ve burned a lot of bridges.
quotes.author: Scott Thompson

quotes.quote: I demolish my bridges behind me ― then there is no choice but to move forward.
quotes.author: Fridtjof Nansen

quotes.quote: Respect yourself enough to walk away from anything that no longer serves you, grows you, or makes you happy.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Never burn your bridges till you come to them.
quotes.author: Clayton Rawson

quotes.quote: I never wanted to set the world on fire. So I never had to burn any bridges behind me.
quotes.author: Dinah Shore

quotes.quote: If the bridge to your past is burned behind you, then you have no choice but to travel the path into a successful future.
quotes.author: John Di Lemme

quotes.quote: Don’t dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us, with nothing to show for our progress except a memory of the smell of smoke, and a presumption that once our eyes watered.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: When all your love is lost / And burning bridges can't be crossed / Lord won't you let me know / Or give me one more reason to go
quotes.author: Christopher Bridges

quotes.quote: These bridges burning so fast, we can't just stomp 'em out / As if you know what I'm talking about
quotes.author: Christopher Bridges

quotes.quote: Ain't no way to stay warm at the fire / Of burning bridges burning bridges / I've made some adjustments / Worked out some problems
quotes.author: Daniel Smith Chauncey

quotes.quote: Why'd we want to burn those bridges / Why'd we want to light such a flame / Ain't no way to stay warm at the fire / Of burning bridges
quotes.author: Daniel Smith Chauncey

quotes.quote: I can feel a strong desire / A distant fire burning through the past / Deep inside my heart is yearning / A bridge is burning
quotes.author: Remy David Shand

quotes.quote: Oh, burning bridges behind me / You can follow me down but it's plain to see / I'm a victim of the burn and it's third degree
quotes.author: Remy David Shand

quotes.quote: Oh, setting bridges on fire / You can call out my name but I won't return / I'm a fugitive of love and this heart's been burned
quotes.author: Remy David Shand

quotes.quote: And we're burning all the bridges now / Watching it go up in flames / And then we'd build it up again
quotes.author: Casey Michael Laforet

quotes.quote: And we're burning all the bridges now / Cause it was sink or swim and I went down, down, down
quotes.author: Casey Michael Laforet

quotes.quote: Burning bridges behind me / It's too late to turn back now / Burning bridges behind me / All I want is to forget you somehow
quotes.author: Remy David Shand

quotes.quote: If you took your own direction / If only you practice what you preach / If you follow your advice / You wouldn't be burning bridges all the time
quotes.author: Dave Mustaine

quotes.quote: I've been burning bridges all day, I think I'll just knock this one down.
quotes.author: Chris Soares

quotes.quote: You know, the thing about burned bridges is, they can be rebuilt.
quotes.author: Tim Kring

quotes.quote: You build bridges, John. You have to go where the rivers are.
quotes.author: William Goldman

quotes.quote: Commitment means burning all bridges behind you.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Growth and development includes the experience of being exposed to difficult/stressful situations and learning to cope with them.
quotes.author: Sharon L. Johnson

quotes.quote: If you burn your bridges, you do something that makes it impossible to go back from the position you have taken.
quotes.author: Cliff Townsend

quotes.quote: I will burn all bridges behind me and stake my entire future on my ability to get what I want.
quotes.author: Cliff Townsend

quotes.quote: The reason why we do not normally burn our option bridges when we attempt new ventures, is because we go into our new venture with the idea of failing.
quotes.author: Cliff Townsend

quotes.quote: The hardest thing to do is change, the easiest thing to do, is simply stay the same or go back to doing the same.
quotes.author: Cliff Townsend

quotes.quote: Burning bridges is an expression used to warn you that if you treat a person like don't matter to you, that person might decide not to help you in the future.
quotes.author: Eric Stanberry Jr.

quotes.quote: Once you cross, Accept the loss.
quotes.author: James Pesutich

quotes.quote: If you really want to transcend, Don't worry-it is not the end.
quotes.author: James Pesutich

quotes.quote: Embrace the pain And chase the inevitable gain.
quotes.author: James Pesutich

quotes.quote: Burning Bridges In order to escape.
quotes.author: James Pesutich

quotes.quote: If you really yearn, No need to return.
quotes.author: James Pesutich

quotes.quote: He who can not forgive others breaks the bridge over which he must pass himself.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: You never know when a relationship will come in handy, so be cautious about burning bridges.
quotes.author: John Michael Morgan

quotes.quote: The act of burning one's bridges is historically an expression used to signify staking everything on the success of one venture or another, usually battle.
quotes.author: Jerald Ford

quotes.quote: A bridge has almost forever been a metaphor for transition.
quotes.author: John H. Hayes

quotes.quote: Don't cross the bridge before you come to it.
quotes.author: John H. Hayes

quotes.quote: Many of us are guilty of burning our bridges before we cross them.
quotes.author: John H. Hayes

quotes.quote: Burning one's bridges is never a good thing,
quotes.author: Katherine Hall Page

quotes.quote: My father used to tell me, “never burn your bridges,” all of the time, but I never understood it until I burned a bridge.
quotes.author: Eric Stanberry Jr.

quotes.quote: Any bridge to the past that refuses to burn just gives the enemy an invitation and an entry point back into your life.
quotes.author: Femi Olorunnisola

quotes.quote: A bridge serves a link, mean of access to a place because a gap has been created.
quotes.author: Femi Olorunnisola

quotes.quote: Burning a bridge, for example, does not just impact the situation at hand. It can Impact opportunities you may never be aware of.
quotes.author: Valorie Burton

quotes.quote: I wish someone had told me about 'burning bridges.' I have “burned” loads of “bridges” in my life and I just had to move forward
quotes.author: Natalie Bandlow

quotes.quote: I don't believe in burning bridges. I will never forget the dying words of my pious and saintly great-grandfather.
quotes.author: Dating Secrets of the Ten Commandments

quotes.quote: You don't want to burn bridges or make people angry. Building a career is all about creating relationships.
quotes.author: Ricki Frankel

quotes.quote: Bridges are meant for burning, when the people and memories they join aren't the same.
quotes.author: Jim Croce

quotes.quote: The only way you can write is by the light of the bridges burning behind you.
quotes.author: Richard Peck

quotes.quote: Sometimes you get the best light from a burning bridge.
quotes.author: Don Henley

quotes.quote: You don't have to worry about burning bridges, if you're building your own.
quotes.author: Kerry E Wagner

quotes.quote: You know the hardest thing to do in hollywood is burn bridges. There is usually some sucker who still likes me. There is usually some sucker who will still work with me.
quotes.author: Terry Gilliam

quotes.quote: Don't burn bridges. You'll be surprised how many times you have to cross the same river.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Burning bridges behind you is understandable. It's the bridges before us that we burn, not realizing we may need to cross, that brings regret.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: My land is bare of chattering folk; the clouds are low along the ridges, and sweet's the air with curly smoke from all my burning bridges.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Stop telling me not to burn bridges. Some bridges are meant to be burned; some roads are never meant to be traveled again.
quotes.author: Dr. Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: When you follow Christ, it must be a total burning of all your bridges behind you.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: With every bridge that burns a new path is opened for the way your destiny is to be shaped. If you believe in destiny then you must believe that the bridge was burned so you can find a new way to go to find the destiny that you were meet to follow.
quotes.author: Terry Perkins

quotes.quote: We should think seriously before we slam doors, before we burn bridges, before we saw off the limb on which we find ourselves sitting.
quotes.author: Richard L. Evans

quotes.quote: You'll burn out, and the people right along with you. this is way too much for you— you can't do it alone.
quotes.author: Exodus 18:18

quotes.quote: No one will burn out doing aerobic running. It is anaerobic running, which the American scholastic athletic system tends to put young athletes through, that burns them out.
quotes.author: Arthur Lydiard

quotes.quote: Burnout is a state of mind.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Boredom is a vital problem for the moralist, since at least half the sins of mankind are caused by the fear of it.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: You'll find boredom when there's an absence of a good idea.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: The life of the creative person is led, directed, and controlled by boredom. Avoiding boredom is one of our most important purposes.
quotes.author: Saul Steinberg

quotes.quote: Burnout: nature's way of telling you that you've been going through the motions, but your soul has departed; you're a zombie, a member of the walking dead, a sleepwalker.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: It is better that aged diplomats be bored than for the young men to die.
quotes.author: Warren Austin

quotes.quote: We have a world of pleasures to win, and nothing to lose but boredom.
quotes.author: Raoul Vaneigem

quotes.quote: Having to listen to someone talk about themselves when I want to talk about me.
quotes.author: Tom Paciorek

quotes.quote: Righteous people are not perfect beings who never make mistakes, who never experience burnout. Rather righteous people are those who despite everything, despite falling, despite burnout, stand up, start all over again.
quotes.author: Sally Ann Berk

quotes.quote: It's better to burn out than to fade away.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: Sometimes, caregivers just need to refresh their emotional sensibilities or overcome physical weariness. They need to reclaim their sense of mission and motivation.
quotes.author: Craig Hlas

quotes.quote: A tragic event at work can add to the usual stress of a busy practice to push you over the edge.
quotes.author: Dike Drummond

quotes.quote: Nearly all the research on burnout is on professional burnout— specifically 'people who help people,' like teachers and nurses— but a growing area of research is 'parental burnout.'
quotes.author: Emily Nagoski

quotes.quote: Changing jobs is not always the right answer to burnout. But if you're going to leave your job, make sure you've got another opportunity in the wings. Leave on your terms, and don't burn bridges.
quotes.author: Rex Baker

quotes.quote: As long as you can see the light at the end of the tunnel, the burnout isn't fatal.
quotes.author: Rex Baker

quotes.quote: Just because you take breaks doesn't mean you're broken.
quotes.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quotes.quote: BurnoutÂ is what happens when you try to avoid being human for too long.
quotes.author: Michael Gungor

quotes.quote: It's better to burn out than it is to rust.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: BurnoutÂ is a way of telling you that your form of activism was perhaps not very full circle.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: BurnoutÂ is not the result of doing too much; it is the result of not getting enough rest.
quotes.author: John Patrick Hickey

quotes.quote: Burnout is nature's way of telling you, you've been going through the motions your soul has departed; you're a zombie, a member of the walking dead, a sleepwalker. False optimism is like administrating stimulants to an exhausted nervous system.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: In dealing with those who are undergoing great suffering, if you feel "burnout" setting in, if you feel demoralized and exhausted, it is best, for the sake of everyone, to withdraw and restore yourself. The point is to have a long-term perspective.
quotes.author: Tenzin Gyatso

quotes.quote: The No. 1 cause of burnout is doing the same thing over and over again and not seeing results.
quotes.author: Steve Kaczmarski

quotes.quote: Burnout is the result of too much energy output and not enough energy self-invested. In other words, it's burning too much fuel than you've put in your tank.
quotes.author: Melissa Steginus

quotes.quote: Those who truly love their work have the tendency to get sick and tired of resting, and very quickly.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Burnout is a way of telling you that your form of activism was perhaps not very full circle.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: That's the thing: You don't understand burnout unless you've been burned out. And it's something you can't even explain. It's just doing something you have absolutely no passion for.
quotes.author: Elena Delle Donne

quotes.quote: I liked my skirts short because I wanted to run and catch the bus to get to work.
quotes.author: Mary Quant

quotes.quote: A bus ride is like being in another world.
quotes.author: J.A. Redmerski

quotes.quote: Psychology is a bus that accompanies an airplane.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: I live in a bus and go from place to place and sometimes feel very detached from what's going on.
quotes.author: Gavin Degraw

quotes.quote: Don't waste your energy on those who don't get on your bus
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Know how to travel from your town to a nearby town without a car, either by bus or by rail.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: Finding a good bus driver can be as important as finding a good musician.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: Life on the road can get a little one-dimensional. I didn't want to reach 40 and have to say all I'd done was look out the window of a tour bus and get drunk.
quotes.author: Bruce Dickinson

quotes.quote: Every day I get in the queue (Too much, the Magic Bus) / To get on the bus that takes me to you (Too much, the Magic Bus) / I'm so nervous, I just sit and smile (Too much, the Magic Bus) / Your house is only another mile (Too much, the Magic Bus)
quotes.author: Peter Townshend

quotes.quote: You know, I can't make this bus go faster / But I can make it go louder / I think I can make it go higher / Like one of those fancy jets
quotes.author: Peter Townshend

quotes.quote: I came here before the sun came up / I mean here, waiting for the bus / Don't wanna be late, as you can plainly see / Bus driver, bus driver take pity on me / At the bus stop / A cool bus, school bus
quotes.author: Tom Robson

quotes.quote: The wheels on the bus go / Round and round / All through the town
quotes.author: Steve Whitmire

quotes.quote: And said to myself if I miss school I'm ruined / But I ran down hill and I rushed rushed / I ran down the hill trying to catch the bus / Now I'm hoping to myself everything is cool
quotes.author: Jermaine Dupri

quotes.quote: Get up in the morning, get on the bus / Get up in the morning like the rest of us / Places to go, important people to meet / Better not get up or you might lose your seat
quotes.author: The Guess Who

quotes.quote: On the bus, watch our reflection / On the bus, I can't stand no rejection / Common, let's make a scene / Oh, baby, don't be so mean
quotes.author: The Replacements

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of missing the bus. / You will catch your bus. / Don't be afraid of missing the bus. why / You will catch your bus, catch your bus
quotes.author: Michie Nakatani

quotes.quote: Let's ride the city bus / Let's ride it clean on the yellow line / Ride the circuit rapid transit / Ride it on the road to Utopia / Get on the bus
quotes.author: Wesley Willis

quotes.quote: Everybody move to the back of the bus / Do you want to bump and slump with us / We the type of people make the club get crunk
quotes.author: Andre Benjamin

quotes.quote: Have mercy, old bus be packed up tight / Well, I'm glad just to get on and home tonight
quotes.author: Billy F. Gibbons

quotes.quote: Well the bus pulled away / In a roaring black cloud / Well I stood in the road / And Honey I hollered right out loud
quotes.author: Guy Clark

quotes.quote: Buses are large, self-propelled , wheeled vehicles that are designed to carry passengers, generally on a fixed route.
quotes.author: Britannica Educational Publishing

quotes.quote: The bus was a natural outgrowth of the horse-driven coach.
quotes.author: Britannica Educational Publishing

quotes.quote: Today buses are defined as vehicles that accommodate more than 10 passengers.
quotes.author: Britannica Educational Publishing

quotes.quote: The buses have been preferred over the tram and the trolley bus, because buses can use any assigned route and need no sophisticated infrastructure life substations, supply cables and rail track and stations.
quotes.author: D. Johnson Victor

quotes.quote: With the introduction of automobiles and buses in post world war ear, the bus transportation replaced coaches and supplemented other modes.
quotes.author: D. Johnson Victor

quotes.quote: Public transport us a theme of enormous importance in all societies. The bus is the most patronized of all land-based public passenger modes.
quotes.author: David A. Hensher

quotes.quote: In many Western societies and a growing number of developing economies, motorized urban public bus and rail transport is a niche market provider and looks like being so for the foreseeable future.
quotes.author: David A. Hensher

quotes.quote: In most cities, buses move more public transport passengers than any other public mode.
quotes.author: David A. Hensher

quotes.quote: Buses however operate mainly on mixed-mode infrastructure, competing with cars and trucks, a regime that has not, in general, favored bus services.
quotes.author: David A. Hensher

quotes.quote: Frequent bus service promises freedom, but when that bus service is unreliable, it's a false promise.
quotes.author: Steven Higashide

quotes.quote: Freeing buses from the chaos of the city traffic can do a lot to remove chaos from bus rider's lives.
quotes.author: Steven Higashide

quotes.quote: When buses appeared. streetcars began to fall behind to the competition of the buses.
quotes.author: Un-sik Ch?oe

quotes.quote: Many people ride the bus. Buses take people to shop, to work, and to school. They take people all over the city.
quotes.author: Joanne Mattern

quotes.quote: You can ride a bus in many places in the world.
quotes.author: Joanne Mattern

quotes.quote: School buses transport the nation's most important resource, its youth.
quotes.author: US Department of Transportation

quotes.quote: Buses break down occasionally.
quotes.author: Michael Aitkens

quotes.quote: Buses are for people that doesn't know each other.
quotes.author: Daniel Scheinert

quotes.quote: I rode the buses back in the 60's to bring people together. Seems pretty unfashionable nowadays.
quotes.author: Martyn Burke

quotes.quote: Well, like you say: men are like buses. Nothing for ages, then three arrive at once, eh.
quotes.author: Michael Chaplin

quotes.quote: Do you know I always thought these travel buses were the corniest thing in the world. Crowded buses jammed with people all going places. Now, I wouldn't mind being in one of those buses and I also wouldn't care where I was going.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Upton

quotes.quote: My old man told me, before he left this shitty world, never chase buses or women, you'll always be left behind.
quotes.author: Don Michael Paul

quotes.quote: My mother says that lovers are like buses. You just have to wait a little while and another one comes along.
quotes.author: Christopher Isherwood

quotes.quote: I'm all for school busing. I've learned so much more in a school bus than I'll ever learn in a school!
quotes.author: Digby Wolfe

quotes.quote: Buses were a tough sell. They jolted. They smelled. They inched through traffic.
quotes.author: Jim Klein

quotes.quote: Listen to me: girls are like buses - if you miss one, another one will come along. Girls are like mirrors: you see yourself, your dimples and your pimples.
quotes.author: Shemi Zarhin

quotes.quote: We are all riding on the same bus.
quotes.author: Mark Sheppard

quotes.quote: Finding a good bus driver can be as important as finding a good musician.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: People will often give you a detailed tour of the underside of the bus that they will throw you under later.
quotes.author: Steffan Piper

quotes.quote: If you want reality take the bus.
quotes.author: David LaChapelle

quotes.quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: It's a good day when a goddess gets on the school-bus with you.
quotes.author: Barry Lyga

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's good to miss a bus. It might be the wrong bus.
quotes.author: Steve Guttenberg

quotes.quote: A bus is a vehicle that runs twice as fast when you are after it as when you are in it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Children must always wear a seat belt, except if you put 50 of them in one vehicle.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Never run after a bus or a man. There will always be another one.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Bus stops are far more interesting and useful places to have art than in museums.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: Being sober on a bus is, like, totally different than being drunk on a bus.
quotes.author: Ozzy Osbourne

quotes.quote: A bus ride is like being in another world.
quotes.author: JA Redmerski

quotes.quote: Keys show up when you reconcile yourself to the bus.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: What do you need to start a business? Three simple things: know your product better than anyone. Know your customer, and have a burning desire to succeed.
quotes.author: Dave Thomas

quotes.quote: A business has to be involving, it has to be fun, and it has to exercise your creative instincts.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: To be successful,you have to have your heart in your business,and your business in your heart.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: Success in business requires training and discipline and hard work. But if you're not frightened by these things, the opportunities are just as great today as they ever were.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Business opportunities are like buses, there's always another one coming.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: If you don't drive your business, you will be driven out of business.
quotes.author: Bertie Charles Forbes

quotes.quote: The secret of business isto know something that nobody else knows.
quotes.author: Aristotle Socrates Onassis

quotes.quote: It takes more than capital to swing business. You've got to have the A. I. D. degree to get by Advertising, Initiative, and Dynamics.
quotes.author: Ren Mulford Jr.

quotes.quote: In the business world, everyone is paid in two coins: cash and experience. Take the experience first; the cash will come later.
quotes.author: Harold Geneen

quotes.quote: The golden rule for every business man is this: Put yourself in your customer's place.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: In business, I've discovered that my purpose is to do my best to my utmost ability every day. That's my standard. I learned early in my life that I had high standards.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Let's be honest. There's not a business anywhere that is without problems. Business is complicated and imperfect. Every business everywhere is staffed with imperfect human beings and exists by providing a product or service to other imperfect human beings.
quotes.author: Bob Parsons

quotes.quote: To succeed in business, to reach the top, an individual must know all it is possible to know about that business.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.quote: Business is not financial science, it's about trading.. buying and selling. It's about creating a product or service so good that people will pay for it.
quotes.author: Anita Roddick

quotes.quote: Emotion. Passion. Ideas. Simplicity. These are the big things that big business needs from its creative agencies. No one else is going to provide these essential elements for business.
quotes.author: Kevin Roberts

quotes.quote: In the modern world of business, it is useless to be a creative, original thinker unless you can also sell what you create.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: Without customers, you don't have a business. You have a hobby.
quotes.author: Don Peppers & Martha Rogers

quotes.quote: In business, the competition will bite you if you keep running; if you stand still, they will swallow you.
quotes.author: William Knudsen Jr

quotes.quote: Success in business does not depend on what you say, what you hear, what you feel, what you see. It depends on what you do.
quotes.author: Selwyn D. Goodwin

quotes.quote: The way to get started in business is to stop talking and just start doing!
quotes.author: Bill Todd

quotes.quote: If you're not a risk taker, you should get the hell out of business.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.quote: Business has only two functions marketing and innovation.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: A business absolutely devoted to service will have only one worry about profits. They will be embarrassingly large.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The successful man is the one who finds out what is the matter with his business before his competitors do.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: A business is successful to the extent that it provides a product or service that contributes to happiness in all of its forms.
quotes.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quotes.quote: In business, one of the challenges is making sure that your product is the easiest to experience and complete a sale.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: Every successful business (1) creates or provides something of value that (2) other people want or need (3) at a price they're willing to pay, in a way that (4) satisfies the purchaser s needs and expectations and (5) provides the business sufficient revenue to make it worthwhile for the owners to continue operation.
quotes.author: Josh Kaufman

quotes.quote: There's no luck in business. There's only drive, determination and more drive.
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: Whenever you see a successful business, someone once made a courageous decision.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: The person who figures out how to harness the collective genius of his or her organization is going to blow the competition away.
quotes.author: Walter Wriston

quotes.quote: A lot of people have ideas, but there are few who decide to do something about them now. Not tomorrow. Not next week. But today. The true entrepreneur is a doer, not a dreamer.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.quote: If you don't find a way to make money while you sleep, you will work until you die.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: Your income is directly related to your philosophy, NOT the economy.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If you work just for money, you'll never make it, but if you love what you're doing and you always put the customer first, success will be yours.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.quote: In modern business it is not the crook who is to be feared most, it is the honest man who doesn't know what he is doing.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Willingness to change is a strength, even if it means plunging part of the company into total confusion for a while.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: In looking for people to hire, look for three qualities. Integrity, intelligence and energy. And if they don't have the first, the other two will kill you.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Profit in business comes from repeat customers, customers that boast about your project or service, and that bring friends with them.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: I do not believe you can do today's job with yesterday's methods and be in business tomorrow.
quotes.author: Horatio Nelson Jackson

quotes.quote: The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: If you need to bring in a business partner, make sure your partner brings along some money.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: The business of government is to keep the government out of business - that is, unless business needs government aid.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Business is more exciting than any game.
quotes.author: Max Aitken

quotes.quote: The most valuable thing you can make is a mistake. You can't learn anything from being perfect.
quotes.author: Adam Osborne

quotes.quote: Good business leaders create a vision, articulate the vision, passionately own the vision, and relentlessly drive it to completion.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: To succeed in business it is necessary to make others see things as you see them.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: The purpose of a business is to create a customer.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Great work is done by people who are not afraid to be great.
quotes.author: Fernando Flores

quotes.quote: Business is a good game. Lots of competition and a minimum of rules. You keep score with money.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: All lasting business is built on friendship.
quotes.author: Alfred Armand Montapert

quotes.quote: If you must use more than ten slides to explain your business, you probably don't have a business.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Being in business is not about making money. It is a way to become who you are.
quotes.author: Paul Hawken

quotes.quote: In business or in life, don't follow the wagon tracks too closely.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: If a business does well, the stock eventually follows.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Businesses are successful because someone makes the sacrifices other are unwilling to.
quotes.author: Kim Ki-jung

quotes.quote: Business? It's quite simple; it's other people's money.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: In statesmanship get formalities right, never mind about the moralities.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The ethics of excellence are grounded in action - what you actually do, rather than what you say you believe. Talk, as the saying goes, is cheap.
quotes.author: Price Pritchett

quotes.quote: Each man has his own fortune in his hands; as the artist has a piece of rude matter, which he is to fashion to a certain shape. But the art of living rightly is like all arts: the capacity alone is born with us; it must be learned, and practiced with incessant care.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: I am not interested in power for power's sake, but I'm interested in power that is moral, that is right and that is good.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: To love our neighbor as ourselves is such a truth for regulating human society, that by that alone one might determine all the cases in social morality.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: I like to see a man* proud of the place in which he lives. I like to see a man live so his place will be proud of him.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Let each one of us leave every other kind of knowledge and seek and follow one thing only, if peradventure he may be able to learn and find some one who will make him able to learn and discern between good and evil, and so to choose always and everywhere the better life as he has opportunity.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Equality is not the empirical claim that all groups of humans are interchangeable; it is the moral principle individuals should not be judged or constrained by the average properties of their group.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a minor lapse of integrity
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: Never let your sense of morals get in the way of doing what's right.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Live one day at a time emphasizing ethics rather than rules.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: This is my simple religion. There is no need for temples; no need for complicated philosophy. Our own brain, our own heart is our temple; the philosophy is kindness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what's right.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote: If you really want to be happy, always try to do what's right.
quotes.author: Bill Blackman

quotes.quote: I hope I shall possess firmness and virtue enough to maintain what I consider the most enviable of all titles, the character of an honest man.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Every aspect of Western culture needs a new code of ethics -- a rational ethics -- as a precondition of rebirth.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: No artist has ethical sympathies. An ethical sympathy in an artist is an unpardonable mannerism of style.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I think it's unethical to take money for poor quality performance.
quotes.author: Alvin Burger

quotes.quote: Whoever loves becomes humble. Those who love have, so to speak, pawned a part of their narcissism.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: There's a thin line between narcissism, even if it's a healthy narcissism, and entertainment.
quotes.author: Richard Lewis

quotes.quote: Nice people don't necessarily fall in love with nice people.
quotes.author: Jonathan Franzen

quotes.quote: For the most part people are not curious except about themselves.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: I like to be admired from afar, and then complimented up close.
quotes.author: Gena Showalter

quotes.quote: He's satisfied with himself. If you have a soul you can't be satisfied.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: This conversation with myself has an overwhelming aroma of narcissism.
quotes.author: Tawny Lara

quotes.quote: It is not love that should be depicted as blind, but self-love.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Self-love for ever creeps out, like a snake, to sting anything which happens . . . to stumble upon it.
quotes.author: George Gordon Noel Byron

quotes.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a life-long romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I don't care what you think unless it is about me.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: Only man is a narcissistic enough species to think that a highly evolved alien life force would travel across billions and billions of light-years a group of aliens so intelligent, so insouciant, so utterly above it all, they feel no need whatsoever to equip their spacecraft with windows so that they can gaze out on all that celestial beauty but then immediately upon landing, their first impulse is to get in some hick's ass with a flashlight.
quotes.author: Dennis Miller

quotes.quote: He who is enamored of himself will at least have the advantage of being inconvenienced by few rivals.
quotes.author: G.C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Nobody can be kinder than the narcissist while you react to life in his own terms.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: I do not exist to build your ego with my pain. My tears are not there to cleanse your soul. I now know that without you I am complete and whole!
quotes.author: Roy McWilliams

quotes.quote: I loathe narcissism, but I approve of vanity.
quotes.author: Diana Vreeland

quotes.quote: Shyness has a strange element of narcissism, a belief that how we look, how we perform, is truly important to other people.
quotes.author: Andre Dubus III

quotes.quote: There's a kind of journalistic narcissism that New York-based journalists are guilty of.
quotes.author: Bernard Goldberg

quotes.quote: Because that's what narcissism is all about looking in the mirror everyday and thinking 'Damn, I'd like to shag myself.'
quotes.author: Eddie Izzard

quotes.quote: Narcissism and self-deception are survival mechanisms without which many of us might just jump off a bridge.
quotes.author: Todd Solondz

quotes.quote: True self-love is the opposite of narcissism, where one cant take their eyes off themselves and feels superior to another. Self-love is wholeness. It allows one to say, I am perfect just the way I am and so are you.
quotes.author: Colleen Laukka

quotes.quote: I didn't know what narcissism was until I beheld my own naricssus.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: Whoever loves becomes humble. Those who love have, so to speak, pawned a part of their narcissism.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: A mirror is like my own personal reality TV show where I'm both the star and only viewer. I've got to get my ratings up.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Love isn't something natural. Rather it requires discipline, concentration, patience, faith, and the overcoming of narcissism. It isn't a feeling, it is a practice.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: For the most part people are not curious except about themselves.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: true humility is when you can surprise yourself more than others; the rest is either shyness or good marketing
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: If you're a nobody, just imagine a lot of celebrities are in love with you. Narcissism is the best cure for attention deficit disorder.
quotes.author: Bauvard

quotes.quote: Vanity and narcissism the compulsive need to be admired and praised undermine one's courage, for one then fights on someone else's conviction rather than one's own.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: As individuals and as a nation, we now suffer from social narcissism. The beloved Echo of our ancestors, the virgin America, has been abandoned. We have fallen in love with our own image, with images of our making, which turn out to be images of ourselves.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: We're making far too big a deal out of our sexual preferences. It's just another form of narcissism, and I think it can be a big problem and a tremendous obstacle.
quotes.author: Andrew Cohen

quotes.quote: We thought the hard part was over—but we were wrong. Living is the hardest part. Figuring out how to live your life when you’re all busted up inside and out—there is nothing harder.
quotes.author: Paulina Simons

quotes.quote: We busted a lot of family secrets with this. But to make a long story short, my parents relationship was built heavily on security issues for my Mom, and when my Dad couldn't provide security, the relationship unraveled.
quotes.author: Kenny Loggins

quotes.quote: Down the road of hate, at every busted corner lurks the need for love.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: The authority of depression is horrifying. I felt like my brain was busted and that I could never feel good again. I really thought that I was never gonna heal.
quotes.author: Dick Cavett

quotes.quote: I pretty much got busted for everything, but I definitely stretched out my boundaries as a kid, as well.
quotes.author: Matt Bomer

quotes.quote: A bird painted not with beauty but with all the dirt and wounds collected in a long hard life, in battle, in love, with torn feathers and a busted leg and a chipped beak and one of its eyes half closed; and yet a bird of deeper loveliness for all of that.
quotes.author: Jeff Noon

quotes.quote: A rolling stone, that gathers no moss, but leaves a trail of busted stuff.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.quote: I go out there and get my eyes gouged, my nose busted, my body slammed. I love the pain of the game.
quotes.author: Dennis Rodman

quotes.quote: The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: I busted a mirror and got seven years bad luck, but my lawyer thinks he can get me five.
quotes.author: Steven Wright
