quotes.quote: You're awfully philosophical for a girl that just got busted
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Some people are busy working on their pose instead of their purpose.
quotes.author: Saji Ijiyemi

quotes.quote: We are so busy that the truth about our lives can't catch up.
quotes.author: Brena Brown

quotes.quote: I was busy welcoming a new experience. I had never done a movie before.
quotes.author: Chita Rivera

quotes.quote: Anyone too busy to say thank you will get fewer and fewer chances to say it.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Busy doesn't mean better. I have never envied a busy person the one who likes to point out their busy lives to others.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: I am so busy doing nothing that the idea of doing anything which as you know, always leads to something cuts into the nothing and then forces me to have to drop everything.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Because my business life is so busy, my home is really my sanctuary. That is where I reflect and spend quality time with my girls.
quotes.author: Rachel Roy

quotes.quote: Keep yourself busy if you want to avoid depression. For me, inactivity is the enemy.
quotes.author: Matt Lucas

quotes.quote: It's as busy as we can possibly get. It's monstrous. In terms of dollars bet, it's growing a little bit.
quotes.author: Robert Walker

quotes.quote: Real men stay faithful. They don't have time to look for other women because they're too busy looking for new ways to love their own.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: If you are too busy to develop your talents, you are too busy.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: I'm too busy looking for the next role to do. I think about how to continue, to survive in the same vein. I like my career and my life as it is.
quotes.author: John Travolta

quotes.quote: You were so busy trying to be my savior that you left me all alone.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: Being busy is better than being bored. Bored left a long time ago. Busy is always around for me.
quotes.author: Tabitha Robin

quotes.quote: Busy remaking the world, man forgot to remake himself.
quotes.author: Andrei Platonov

quotes.quote: People are often so busy living that they never stop to wonder why.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: People are busy and should feel good about doing what they can.
quotes.author: Ryan Rybolt

quotes.quote: Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Some of us are busy doing things; some of us are busy complaining.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Keep busy while you are waiting for something to happen.
quotes.author: Robert Genn

quotes.quote: The man who is too busy to read is never likely to lead.
quotes.author: B C Forbes

quotes.quote: It will be extremely busy and we will have an extra person again just taking care of the lottery people.
quotes.author: Johnnie Lowery

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: O man you are busy working for the world, and the world is busy trying to turn you out.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr

quotes.quote: Let the refining and improving of your own life keep you so busy that you have little time to criticize others.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: As long as you're too busy trying to become something that you're not, you can't see your own immortality.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: I am always busy, which is perhaps the chief reason why I am always well.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.quote: Heaven is too busy to listen to half hearted prayers or to respond to pop calls.
quotes.author: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.quote: The great thing about an independent film is that you're too busy working, and you're too busy hoping to God to get it done.
quotes.author: Ann Dowd

quotes.quote: He who is too busy doing good finds no time to be good.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Being busy does not always mean real work. The object of all work is production or accomplishment and to either of these ends there must be forethought, system, planning, intelligence, and honest purpose, as well as perspiration. Seeming to do is not doing.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: I love to keep busy. The challenge of fitting all of my activities into each day is my motivation.
quotes.author: Sarah Kochik

quotes.quote: Nowhere so busy a man as he than he, and yet he seemed busier than he was.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: Don't get so busy making a living that you forget to make a life.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: The busy man is never wise and the wise man is never busy.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: We may be very busy, we may be very efficient, but we will also be truly effective only when we begin with the end in mind.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Some people are so busy learning the tricks of the trade that they never learn the trade.
quotes.author: Vernon Law

quotes.quote: Everybody is now so busy teaching that nobody has any time to learn.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: It is good to be busy. Being busy takes our mind off being in love at the wrong time, in the wrong place and with the wrong guy.
quotes.author: Melissa de la Cruz

quotes.quote: If you are too busy to love, you are too busy to live; if you are too busy to live, you are too busy to love.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: No matter how busy you are, you must take time to make the other person feel important.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: The busy have no time for tears.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: You can't right the wrongs because you'll never understand the cause and you'll be too busy dodging the effect.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: We hurt people by being too busy. Too busy to notice their needs. Too busy to drop that note of comfort or encouragement or assurance of love. Too busy to listen when someone needs to talk. Too busy to care.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: We are too busy to pray, and so we are too busy to have power. We have a great deal of activity, but we accomplish little; many services but few conversions; much machinery but few results.
quotes.author: R. A. Torrey

quotes.quote: For everybody in their busy lives, you need to invest in sharpening your tools, and you need to invest in longevity.
quotes.author: Ryan Holmes

quotes.quote: We want to continue to keep our youth busy so they have more activities than just hanging around the streets and getting in trouble.
quotes.author: Steve Russell

quotes.quote: Facts are too busy being true to worry about how you feel about them.
quotes.author: Dan Wells

quotes.quote: My feeling is that any day I am too busy to run is a day that I am too busy.
quotes.author: John Bryant

quotes.quote: Hurried...like one who had always a multiplicity of tasks on hand.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: I often meet people who are too busy to take care of their wealth. And there are people too busy to take care of their health. The cause is the same. They're busy, and they stay busy as a way to avoid something they do not want to face.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: It's not enough to be busy...The question is: What are we busy about?
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The Chinese word for 'busy' consists of two parts. One part symbolizes the human heart, the other part symbolizes death. The meaning that can be extrapolated is that when one is excessively busy, his heart is dead.
quotes.author: Chin-Ning Chu

quotes.quote: Guard the senses and life is ever full...always be busy and life is beyond hope.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Every man is worth just as much as the things he busies himself with.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius Antoninus

quotes.quote: None are so busy as the fool and the knave.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: The busiest men have the most leisure.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: The happiest people are those who are too busy to notice whether they are or not.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: The busy man has few idle visitors; to the boiling pot, the flies come not.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The more we do, the more we can do; the more busy we are, the more leisure we have.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The busier we are, the more acutely we feel that we live.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: No thoroughly occupied man was ever yet very miserable.
quotes.author: Letitia Landon

quotes.quote: A man who is very busy seldom changes his opinions.
quotes.author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Extreme busyness, whether at school or college, kirk or market, is a symptom of deficient vitality; and a faculty for idleness implies a catholic appetite and a strong sense of personal identity.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: We all have exactly the same number of minutes in a day. The question is, how will we use them? Most people today are either too busy— or not busy enough. The Bible tells us that both extremes are wrong.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: I was tired from training and leading such a busy life, tired of having to bear the pressure and come through for others.
quotes.author: Grete Waitz

quotes.quote: Keep always busy so that the devil will find you always engaged.
quotes.author: Jerome

quotes.quote: It is day still, you better get busy! Night will intrude when no one can be active.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Don't be so busy looking for problems that you forget to notice the improvement.
quotes.author: Todd Whitaker

quotes.quote: While one person hesitates because he feels inferior, the other is busy making mistakes and becoming superior.
quotes.author: Henry C. Link

quotes.quote: He not busy being born is busy dying.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Don't confuse being busy with being productive. Just because you're busy all the time doesn't mean you're getting closer to your goals.
quotes.author: Karen McKenna

quotes.quote: You wear a watch to keep on schedule. You buy books on time management. And complain that you're so busy you just don't have enough time in the day.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Ours is too busy a world, and here is no time for considering.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: His crowded life of God's good giving / No man has relished more than I; / I've been so goldarned busy living / I've never had the time to die. / So busy fishing, hunting, roving, / Up on my toes and fighting fit; / So busy singing, laughing, loving, / I've never had the time to quit.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: I would think of a thousand things, / Lovely and durable, and taste them slowly, / One after one, like tasting a sweet food. / I have need to busy my heart with quietude.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.quote: Hello, hello, baby / You called, I can't hear a thing / I have got no service / In the club, you see, see / Wha-wha-what did you say? / Oh, you're breaking up on me / Sorry, I cannot hear you / I'm kinda busy.
quotes.author: Beyonce Giselle Knowles

quotes.quote: And you were just too busy being fabulous / Too busy to think about us / I don't know what you were dreaming’ of / Somehow you forgot about love / And you were just too busy being fabulous, uh-huh.
quotes.author: Glenn Frey

quotes.quote: Although the buttercup is a cheerful-looking addition to gardens and meadows, 'it enters so frequently into the sports of infancy,' which is why the flower came to symbolize childishness.
quotes.author: Henry Phillips

quotes.quote: A centuries-old children's game is to hold the flower of a yellow buttercup under the chin of a friend. If the chin glows bright yellow, it means the person likes butter.
quotes.author: Odessa Begay

quotes.quote: Despite its toxicity, its ability to blister skin made buttercups useful to medicinally in the sixteenth century, when it was crushed and applied to growths and lesions to make them fall off.
quotes.author: Odessa Begay

quotes.quote: The meadows are yellow with buttercups, and the birds fly out of the gold.
quotes.author: George Augustus Moore

quotes.quote: The buttercup's reflective ability can be attributed to a unique cellular makeup that allows the top surface of its petals to reflect yellow light with an intensity similar to glass.
quotes.author: Odessa Begay

quotes.quote: Buttercups were once known in Europe as king's cups because of their resemblance to a crown.
quotes.author: Odessa Begay

quotes.quote: Buttercups. They'd drawn her for years— always her favorite flower— and she never understood why. She'd been delighted to find some still blossoming in this late fall.
quotes.author: Miralee Ferrell

quotes.quote: The name 'buttercup' comes from the belief that the flower gave yellow color to butter but this is fancy, not fact, for grazing cattle usually avoid it.
quotes.author: Marian S. Edsall

quotes.quote: All buttercup species contain varying amount of toxic and acid blistering compounds and should not be used internally or externally.
quotes.author: Steven Foster

quotes.quote: Meadow Buttercup , which gives a yellow sheen to fields and meadows, is beloved of poets and a favorite of children.
quotes.author: Marian S. Edsall

quotes.quote: Not till June can the grass be said to be waving in the fields. When the frogs dream. and the grass waves, and the buttercups toss their heads, and the heat disposes to bathe in the ponds and streams, then is summer begun.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Meadows carpeted with buttercups, like slabs of gold in the somber forest.
quotes.author: John Fowles

quotes.quote: I can do nothing at all, because I'm only a buttercup; and buttercups are such common flowers— hardly a flower at all, some think.
quotes.author: Hariet Hamilton

quotes.quote: Why Buttercup, if He did not love you, would He ever have made you at all? Would He have put that beautiful golden colour on you? Would He have made your petals so perfect, your stem so straight, your little cup so round and even?
quotes.author: Hariet Hamilton

quotes.quote: Buttercup flowers are protogynous— the green pistils mature first, thus reducing the chances of pollination.
quotes.author: John Eastman

quotes.quote: Buttercups are not important wildlife food plants. A variety of birds and mammals consume the foliage and seeds, but in relatively small amount.
quotes.author: Joh Eastman

quotes.quote: According to an old herbal,a decoction of buttercup splashed on the ground will make earthworms rice for a fisherman's plucking.
quotes.author: John Eastman

quotes.quote: Buttercup is the essential essence to use when we feel like a stranger in a strange land. This essence helps us to stop comparing yourself to others.
quotes.author: Mary Ann Antenucci

quotes.quote: Meadow buttercup has been used medicinally as the juice from the leaves to treat warts, and as a plaster applied locally to ease violent headaches and gouts.
quotes.author: Steve Andrews

quotes.quote: With its fiery nature it comes as no surprise to learn that the Meadow Buttercup is a herb of Mars.
quotes.author: Steve Andrews

quotes.quote: Spindly branches of buttercups were secreted among gleaming stems still moist at the roots from last night's rain that had washedand refreshed the entire wood, had dowered it in poignant transparency, the unique, inconsolable quality of rainy countries, as if all was glimpsed through tears.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: Buttercups and daisies, Oh, the pretty flowers; Coming ere the spring time, To tell of sunny hours. When the trees are leafless; When the fields are bare; Buttercups and daisies Spring up here and there.
quotes.author: Mary Howitt

quotes.quote: Like a yellow blanket in the Himalayan foothills with a crown of gold, as a honey pot for bees, she stands as yellw bird dances inth e morning breeze winks with the glowing snow she is the gorgeous buttercup flower.
quotes.author: Asha

quotes.quote: Yellow japanned buttercups and star-disked dandelions, just as we see them lying in the grass, like sparks that have leaped from the kindling sun of summer.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: The buttercups across the field made sunshine rifts of splendor.
quotes.author: Dinah Maria Mulock

quotes.quote: From the mud come flowers as golden as sunshine, as fluid as rain. They come at first in ones and twos, yet soon they are the most buoyant of crowds, happily dancing in the wind.
quotes.author: Angela Abraham

quotes.quote: The buttercups, bright-eyed and bold, held up their chalices of gold to catch the sunshine and the dew.
quotes.author: Julia C. R. Dorr

quotes.quote: Where are the flowers, the fair young flowers, that lately sprang and stood in brighter light and softer airs, a beauteous sisterhood?
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: Beautiful and graceful, varied and enchanting, small but approachable, butterflies lead you to the sunny side of life. And everyone deserves a little sunshine.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Glassberg

quotes.quote: The caterpillar does all the work but the butterfly gets all the publicity
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: The mark of your ignorance is the depth of your belief in injustice and tragedy. What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: We delight in the beauty of the butterfly, but rarely admit the changes it has gone through to achieve that beauty.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Everyone is like a butterfly, they start out ugly and awkward and then morph into beautiful graceful butterflies that everyone loves.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: As with the butterfly, adversity is necessary to build character in people.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Butterflies are self propelled flowers.
quotes.author: R.H. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Just like the butterfly, I too will awaken in my own time
quotes.author: Deborah Chaskin

quotes.quote: Butterflies are God's confetti, thrown upon the Earth in celebration of His love
quotes.author: K. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: The butterflies...What an educated sense of beauty they have. They seem only an ornament to society, and yet, if they were gone, how substantial would be their loss
quotes.author: Phil Robinson

quotes.quote: This magnificent butterfly finds a little heap of dirt and sits still on it; but man will never on his heap of mud keep still...
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: The butterfly is a flying flower, the flower a tethered butterfly.
quotes.author: Ponce Denis Ecouchard Lebrun

quotes.quote: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Adding wings to caterpillars does not create butterflies, it creates awkward and dysfunctional caterpillars. Butterflies are created through transformation.
quotes.author: Stephanie Marshall

quotes.quote: There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you it's going to be a butterfly.
quotes.author: Richard Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Butterflies are a breath of beauty fluttering by, they are mystery chronicled upon wing, they bring forth the grace and wonder of this world to our eyes everyday
quotes.author: K. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Not quite birds, as they were not quite flowers, mysterious and fascinating as are all indeterminate creatures.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Goudge

quotes.quote: I'd be a butterfly, born in a bower, Where roses and lilies and violets meet.
quotes.author: Thomas Haynes Bayly

quotes.quote: Awaken to the universes simple gift of the butterfly. Watch with fascination and joy as a jeweled treasure glides by and gently touches your soul
quotes.author: K. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: With the rose the butterfly's deep in love, A thousand times hovering round; But round himself, all tender like gold, The sun's sweet ray is hovering found.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: Much converse do I find in thee, Historian of my infancy! Float near me; do not yet depart! Dead times revive in thee: Thou bring'st, gay creature as thou art! A solemn image to my heart.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The butterfly flits from bloom to bloom, as not to miss one fragrant plume. In her sight exists no garden finale, only paradise of flowered hill and valley
quotes.author: K. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: I only ask to be free. The butterflies are free.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Just living is not enough," said the butterfly, "one must have sunshine, freedom and a little flower.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Anderson

quotes.quote: How does one become a butterfly?" she asked pensively. You must want to fly so much that you are willing to give up being a caterpillar.
quotes.author: Trina Paulus

quotes.quote: Butterflies...flowers that fly and all but sing.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: They seemed to suddenly come upon happiness as if they had surprised a butterfly in a winter wood.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: Butterflies are perhaps one of the most familiar and endearing groups of insects in the world. Their grace and exquisite beauty have fascinated many people over the centuries, often inspiring a child's first insight into nature.
quotes.author: Dr. Ross Field

quotes.quote: ...Nine butterflies appear within an hour, not on the wing but in the word, bringing a message of transformation and hope..
quotes.author: Carol Lynne Pearson

quotes.quote: There are butterflies in my stomach and I'm feeling full of woe. I think I ate some caterpillars a few days ago.
quotes.author: Carolyn Argyle

quotes.quote: Beautiful and graceful, butterflies lift our spirits with their loveliness and lyric flight.
quotes.author: Gloria B. Schlaepfer

quotes.quote: In early cultures, religions,art and myths, butterflies became symbols of immortality, fleeting beauty and freedom.
quotes.author: Gloria B. Schlaepfer

quotes.quote: Butterflies love to be out in the sunshine, just like people. You can look for them on warm, bright sunny days.
quotes.author: John Woodward

quotes.quote: Literature and butterflies are the two sweetest passions known to man.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: The sound of a million butterflies flapping their wings is indescribable. It's very heavenly.
quotes.author: Louie Schwartzberg

quotes.quote: Run away from the boy that gives you butterflies, he's going to break your heart.
quotes.author: Ashley Antoinette

quotes.quote: The toad beneath the harrow knows exactly where each tooth-point goes; tThe butterfly upon the road preaches contentment to that toad.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Americans consider the butterfly a symbol of good fortune and some tribes believe they bring the blessing of sleep and peaceful dreams.
quotes.author: Tom Frost

quotes.quote: In mythology throughout the world, the butterfly repesents the soul and its journey in this life and the next.
quotes.author: Tom Frost

quotes.quote: Some things, when they change, never do return to the way they once were. Butterflies for instance, and women who've been in love with the wrong man too often.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.quote: When the spirit of nature touches us, our hearts turn into a butterfly.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Your butterfly love just flutters around, from flower to flower, drops their heads to the ground. There're leaves that fall and wither and die, When your butterfly love comes drifting by.
quotes.author: Jim Reeves

quotes.quote: Spread your wings and prepare to fly for you have become a butterfly. Oh fly abandonedly into the sun. If you should return to me, we truly were meant to be. So spread your wings and fly butterfly.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: Green fields where we used to wander. Purple valleys near my home. We would play there , beneath the sky. And then I kissed you , butterfly
quotes.author: Bee Gees

quotes.quote: Caterpillar in the tree, how you wonder who you'll be. Can't go far but you can always dream. Wish you may and wish you might, don't you worry, hold on tight I promise you there will come a day, butterfly fly away.
quotes.author: Billy Ray Cyrus

quotes.quote: There will be butterflies, there will be summer skies. And flowers upthrust, when all that Caesar bids, and all the pyramids are dust.
quotes.author: Haniel Long

quotes.quote: Eyes aloft, over dangerous places, the children follow the butterflies, and in the sweat of their upturned faces, slash with a net at the empty skies.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: You give me butterflies that I thought were forever still, and now that I found you, I hope they never will.
quotes.author: Rita Blooding

quotes.quote: A poet is also like a butterfly It should not be a victim of adoption. One should only watch, observe. It is the nature of it. It is its life.
quotes.author: Ehgan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Don't go chasing after butterflies when everything you want is right by your side.
quotes.author: Norah Jones

quotes.quote: We are like butterflies who flutter for a day and think it is forever.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Don't waste your time chasing butterflies. Mend your garden, and the butterflies will come.
quotes.author: Mario Quintana

quotes.quote: Well, I must endure the presence of a few caterpillars if I wish to become acquainted with the butterflies.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The green grass and the happy skies court the flattering butterflies.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: I love that feeling of being in love,the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: Parents know how to push your buttons because, hey, they sewed them on.
quotes.author: Camryn Manheim

quotes.quote: The good thing about having our buttons pushed is that we can no longer ignore the sensitive areas where we need to heal.
quotes.author: Mary Buchan

quotes.quote: I don't push buttons to push buttons. Throwing the rebel card out there is really cheap.
quotes.author: Kacey Musgraves

quotes.quote: It usually takes two people a little while to learn where the funny buttons are and testy buttons are.
quotes.author: Matt Lauer

quotes.quote: I keep pushing buttons and trying to grow as a person and as a filmmaker.
quotes.author: Famke Janssen

quotes.quote: Buttons are the fossils of the sartorial world, enduring long past the garments they were designed to hold together.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.quote: Once you have missed the first buttonhole you'll never manage to button up
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Never allow anyone to take you out of character, some people know which buttons to press.
quotes.author: Charmaine J. Forde

quotes.quote: I can't cut out a piece of cloth and make a lovely dress, but I can mend tears in shirts and sew on buttons.
quotes.author: Joanna Lumley

quotes.quote: Never hold anyone by the button, or the hand, in order to be heard out; for if people are unwilling to hear you, you had better hold your tongue than them
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Photographers feel guilty that all they do for a living is press a button.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: You may turn into an archangel, a fool, or a criminal - no one will see it. But when a button is missing - everyone sees that.
quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

quotes.quote: If the first button of one's coat is wrongly buttoned, all the rest will be crooked.
quotes.author: Giordano Bruno

quotes.quote: There are no innocent bystanders. What were they doing there in the first place?
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Silence encourages the tormentor, never the tormented.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: A person seldom falls sick but the bystanders are animated with a faint hope that he will die.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Like secondhand smoke, the leakage of emotions can make a bystander an innocent casualty of someone else's toxic state.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: There are no bystanders in life. Our humanity makes us each a part of something greater than ourselves.
quotes.author: Sonia Sotomayor

quotes.quote: Art changes posture and posture changes innocent bystanders.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: All the bystanders at an event worthy of note adopt various gestures of admiration when contemplating the occurrence.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: A man's work is his dilemma: his job is his bondage, but it also gives him a fair share of his identity and keeps him from being a bystander in somebody else's world.
quotes.author: Melvin Maddocks

quotes.quote: The measure of a civilization is in the courage, not of its soldiers, but of its bystanders.
quotes.author: Jack Mcdevitt

quotes.quote: One of the ill effects of cruelty is that it makes the bystanders cruel.
quotes.author: Sir Fowell Buxton

quotes.quote: The torments of martyrdom are probably most keenly felt by the bystanders.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: One eye witness is better than ten hear sayers.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: The honest and good man ought to be exactly like a man who smells strong, so that the bystander as soon as he comes near him must smell whether he choose or not.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: What hurts the victim most is not the cruelty of the oppressor, but the silence of the bystander.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: The man who is honest and good ought to be exactly like a man who smells strong, so that the bystander as soon as he comes near him must smell whether he choose or not.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Thou shall not be a victim, thou shall not be a perpetrator, and thou shall never, but never, be a bystander.
quotes.author: Yehuda Bauer
